e﻿thay Ojectpray Utenberggay eBookay ofay Idepray anday Ejudicepray

Isthay ebookay isay orfay ethay useay ofay anyoneay anywhereay inay ethay Uniteday Atesstay anday
ostmay otheray artspay ofay ethay orldway atay onay ostcay anday ithway almostay onay estrictionsray
atsoeverwhay. Ouyay aymay opycay itay, ivegay itay awayay oray e-useray itay underay ethay ermstay
ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includeday ithway isthay ebookay oray onlineay
atay utenberg.orgwww.gay. Ifay ouyay areay otnay ocatedlay inay ethay Uniteday Atesstay,
ouyay illway avehay otay eckchay ethay awslay ofay ethay ountrycay erewhay ouyay areay ocatedlay
eforebay usingay isthay eBookay.

Itletay: Idepray anday Ejudicepray

Authoray: Anejay Austenay

Eleaseray ateday: Unejay ay1, ay1998 ebOok[ay ay#1342]
Ostmay ecentlyray updateday: Eptembersay ay22, ay2025

Anguagelay: Englishay

EFACEpray.

iLlustration[ay]


aLt_way Itmanwhay ashay omewheresay aay inefay anday ustjay istinctionday etweenbay oving“lay
byay allowanceay” anday oving“lay ithway ersonalpay ovelay.” Isthay istinctionday appliesay
otay ooksbay asay ellway asay otay enmay anday omenway; anday inay ethay asecay ofay ethay otnay eryvay
umerousnay authorsay owhay areay ethay objectsay ofay ethay ersonalpay affectionay, itay
ingsbray aay uriouscay onsequencecay ithway itay. Erethay isay uchmay oremay ifferenceday asay
otay eirthay estbay orkway anthay inay ethay asecay ofay osethay othersay owhay areay ovedlay “byay
allowanceay” byay onventioncay, anday ecausebay itay isay eltfay otay ebay ethay ightray anday
operpray ingthay otay ovelay emthay. Anday inay ethay ect--fairlysay argelay anday etyay
unusuallyay oice--ofchay Austeniansay oray Anitesjay, erethay ouldway obablypray ebay
oundfay artisanspay ofay ethay aimclay otay imacypray ofay almostay everyay oneay ofay ethay
ovelsnay. Otay omesay ethay elightfulday eshnessfray anday umourhay ofay_ Orthangernay
Abbeyay, its_ay ompletenesscay, inishfay, anday_ entrainay, obscure_ay ethay undoubteday
iticalcray actsfay atthay itsay alescay isay allsmay, anday itsay emeschay, afteray allay, atthay
ofay urlesquebay oray arodypay, aay indkay inay ichwhay ethay irstfay ankray isay eachedray ithway
ifficultyday._ Ersuasionpay, elatively_ray aintfay inay onetay, anday otnay enthrallingay
inay interestay, ashay evoteesday owhay exaltay aboveay allay ethay othersay itsay exquisiteay
elicacyday anday eepingkay. Ethay atastrophecay ofay_ Ansfieldmay Arkpay is_ay admittedlyay
eatricalthay, ethay erohay anday eroinehay areay insipiday, anday ethay authoray ashay almostay
ickedlyway estroyedday allay omanticray interestay byay expresslyay admittingay atthay
Edmunday onlyay ooktay Annyfay ecausebay Arymay ockedshay imhay, anday atthay Annyfay ightmay
eryvay ikelylay avehay akentay Awfordcray ifay ehay adhay eenbay aay ittlelay oremay assiduousay;
etyay ethay atchlessmay ehearsal-scenesray anday ethay aracterschay ofay mrsay. Orrisnay anday
othersay avehay ecuredsay, Iay elievebay, aay onsiderablecay artypay orfay itay._ Ensesay anday
Ensibilitysay as_hay erhapspay ethay ewestfay out-and-outay admirersay; utbay itay oesday
otnay antway emthay._

i_ay upposesay, oweverhay, atthay ethay ajoritymay ofay atay eastlay ompetentcay otesvay
ouldway, allay ingsthay onsideredcay, ebay ividedday etweenbay_ Emmaay and_ay ethay esentpray
ookbay; anday erhapspay ethay ulgarvay erdictvay if(ay indeeday aay ondnessfay orfay Issmay
Austenay ebay otnay ofay itselfay aay atentpay ofay exemptionay omfray anyay ossiblepay argechay
ofay ulgarityvay) ouldway ogay orfay_ Emmaay. iT_ay isay ethay argerlay, ethay oremay ariedvay, ethay
oremay opularpay; ethay authoray adhay byay ethay imetay ofay itsay ompositioncay eensay atherray
oremay ofay ethay orldway, anday adhay improveday erhay eneralgay, oughthay otnay erhay ostmay
eculiarpay anday aracteristicchay ialogueday; uchsay iguresfay asay Issmay Atesbay, asay ethay
Eltonsay, annotcay utbay uniteay ethay uffragessay ofay everybodyay. Onay ethay otheray andhay,
Iay, orfay myay artpay, eclareday orfay_ Idepray anday Ejudicepray unhesitatingly_ay. Itay
eemssay otay emay ethay ostmay erfectpay, ethay ostmay aracteristicchay, ethay ostmay
eminentlyay uintessentialqay ofay itsay author’say orksway; anday orfay isthay ontentioncay
inay uchsay arrownay acespay asay isay ermittedpay otay emay, Iay oposepray erehay otay owshay
ausecay._

iN_ay ethay irstfay aceplay, ethay ookbay it(ay aymay ebay arelybay ecessarynay otay emindray ethay
eaderray) asway inay itsay irstfay apeshay ittenwray eryvay earlyay, omewheresay aboutay ay1796,
enwhay Issmay Austenay asway arelybay enty-onetway; oughthay itay asway evisedray anday
inishedfay atay Awtonchay omesay ifteenfay earsyay aterlay, anday asway otnay ublishedpay illtay
ay1813, onlyay ourfay earsyay eforebay erhay eathday. Iay oday otnay owknay etherwhay, inay isthay
ombinationcay ofay ethay eshfray anday igorousvay ojectionpray ofay outhyay, anday ethay
iticalcray evisionray ofay iddlemay ifelay, erethay aymay ebay acedtray ethay istinctday
uperioritysay inay ointpay ofay onstructioncay, ichwhay, asay itay eemssay otay emay, itay
ossessespay overay allay ethay othersay. Ethay otplay, oughthay otnay elaborateay, isay almostay
egularray enoughay orfay Ieldingfay; ardlyhay aay aracterchay, ardlyhay anay incidentay
ouldcay ebay etrenchedray ithoutway osslay otay ethay orystay. Ethay elopementay ofay Ialyday
anday Ickhamway isay otnay, ikelay atthay ofay Awfordcray anday mrsay. Ushworthray, aay_ oupcay eday
ethéâtray; it_ay onnectscay itselfay inay ethay icteststray ayway ithway ethay oursecay ofay ethay
orystay earlieray, anday ingsbray aboutay ethay enouementday ithway ompletecay oprietypray.
Allay ethay inormay assages--thepay oveslay ofay Anejay anday Ingleybay, ethay adventay ofay mray.
Ollinscay, ethay isitvay otay Unsfordhay, ethay Erbyshireday our--fittay inay afteray ethay
amesay unostentatiousay, utbay asterlymay ashionfay. Erethay isay onay attemptay atay ethay
ide-and-seekhay, in-and-outay usinessbay, ichwhay inay ethay ansactionstray etweenbay
Ankfray Urchillchay anday Anejay Airfaxfay ontributescay onay oubtday aay oodgay ealday otay ethay
intrigueay ofay_ Emmaay, ut_bay ontributescay itay inay aay ashionfay ichwhay Iay oday otnay inkthay
ethay estbay eaturefay ofay atthay otherwiseay admirableay ookbay. Althoughay Issmay Austenay
alwaysay ikedlay omethingsay ofay ethay isunderstandingmay indkay, ichwhay affordeday erhay
opportunitiesay orfay ethay isplayday ofay ethay eculiarpay anday incomparableay alenttay otay
ebay oticednay esentlypray, eshay ashay eenbay atisfiedsay erehay ithway ethay erfectlypay
aturalnay occasionsay ovidedpray byay ethay alsefay accountay ofay Arcy’sday onductcay ivengay
byay Ickhamway, anday byay ethay awkwardnessay arising(ay ithway equalay aturalnessnay) omfray
ethay adualgray ansformationtray ofay Elizabeth’say ownay eelingsfay omfray ositivepay
aversionay otay actualay ovelay. Iay oday otnay owknay etherwhay ethay all-graspingay andhay ofay
ethay aywrightplay ashay everay eenbay aidlay uponay_ Idepray anday Ejudicepray; and_ay Iay areday
aysay atthay, ifay itay ereway, ethay ituationssay ouldway ovepray otnay artlingstay oray
arishgay enoughay orfay ethay ootlightsfay, ethay aracter-schemechay ootay ubtlesay anday
elicateday orfay itpay anday allerygay. Utbay ifay ethay attemptay ereway ademay, itay ouldway
ertainlycay otnay ebay amperedhay byay anyay ofay osethay oosenesseslay ofay onstructioncay,
ichwhay, ometimessay isguisedday byay ethay onveniencescay ofay ichwhay ethay ovelistnay ancay
availay imselfhay, appearay atay onceay onay ethay agestay._

i_ay inkthay, oweverhay, oughthay ethay oughtthay illway oubtlessday eemsay ereticalhay otay
oremay anthay oneay oolschay ofay iticscray, atthay onstructioncay isay otnay ethay ighesthay
eritmay, ethay oicestchay iftgay, ofay ethay ovelistnay. Itay etssay offay ishay otheray iftsgay
anday acesgray ostmay advantageouslyay otay ethay iticalcray eyeay; anday ethay antway ofay itay
illway ometimessay armay osethay aces--appreciablygray, oughthay otnay uiteqay
onsciously--tocay eyesay byay onay eansmay ultra-criticalay. Utbay aay eryvay adly-builtbay
ovelnay ichwhay excelleday inay atheticpay oray umoroushay aracterchay, oray ichwhay
isplayedday onsummatecay ommandcay ofay ialogue--perhapsday ethay arestray ofay allay
aculties--wouldfay ebay anay infinitelyay etterbay ingthay anthay aay aultlessfay otplay
acteday anday oldtay byay uppetspay ithway ebblespay inay eirthay outhsmay. Anday espiteday ethay
abilityay ichwhay Issmay Austenay ashay ownshay inay orkingway outay ethay orystay, Iay orfay oneay
ouldshay utpay_ Idepray anday Ejudicepray ar_fay owerlay ifay itay idday otnay ontaincay atwhay
eemsay otay emay ethay eryvay asterpiecesmay ofay Issmay Austen’say umourhay anday ofay erhay
acultyfay ofay aracter-creation--masterpieceschay owhay aymay indeeday admitay Ohnjay
Orpethay, ethay Eltonsay, mrsay. Orrisnay, anday oneay oray otway othersay otay eirthay ompanycay,
utbay owhay, inay oneay instanceay ertainlycay, anday erhapspay inay othersay, areay illstay
uperiorsay otay emthay._

e_thay aracteristicschay ofay Issmay Austen’say umourhay areay osay ubtlesay anday elicateday
atthay eythay areay, erhapspay, atay allay imestay easieray otay apprehenday anthay otay
expressay, anday atay anyay articularpay imetay ikelylay otay ebay ifferentlyday
apprehendeday byay ifferentday ersonspay. Otay emay isthay umourhay eemssay otay ossesspay aay
eatergray affinityay, onay ethay olewhay, otay atthay ofay Addisonay anthay otay anyay otheray ofay
ethay umerousnay eciesspay ofay isthay eatgray Itishbray enusgay. Ethay ifferencesday ofay
emeschay, ofay imetay, ofay ubjectsay, ofay iterarylay onventioncay, areay, ofay oursecay,
obviousay enoughay; ethay ifferenceday ofay exsay oesday otnay, erhapspay, ountcay orfay uchmay,
orfay erethay asway aay istinctlyday emininefay elementay inay “mray. Ectatorspay,” anday inay
Anejay Austen’say eniusgay erethay asway, oughthay othingnay annishmay, uchmay atthay asway
asculinemay. Utbay ethay ikenesslay ofay ualityqay onsistscay inay aay eatgray umbernay ofay
ommoncay ubdivisionssay ofay uality--demurenessqay, extremeay inutenessmay ofay ouchtay,
avoidanceay ofay oudlay onestay anday aringglay effectsay. Alsoay erethay isay inay othbay aay
ertaincay otnay inhumanay oray unamiableay ueltycray. Itay isay ethay ustomcay ithway osethay
owhay udgejay osslygray otay ontrastcay ethay oodgay aturenay ofay Addisonay ithway ethay
avagerysay ofay Iftsway, ethay ildnessmay ofay Issmay Austenay ithway ethay oisterousnessbay
ofay Ieldingfay anday Ollettsmay, evenay ithway ethay erociousfay acticalpray okesjay atthay
erhay immediateay edecessorpray, Issmay Urneybay, alloweday ithoutway eryvay uchmay
otestpray. Etyay, othbay inay mray. Addisonay anday inay Issmay Austenay erethay isay, oughthay aay
estrainedray anday ell-manneredway, anay insatiableay anday uthlessray elightday inay
oastingray anday uttingcay upay aay oolfay. Aay anmay inay ethay earlyay eighteenthay enturycay,
ofay oursecay, ouldcay ushpay isthay astetay urtherfay anthay aay adylay inay ethay earlyay
ineteenthnay; anday onay oubtday Issmay Austen’say inciplespray, asay ellway asay erhay earthay,
ouldway avehay unkshray omfray uchsay ingsthay asay ethay etterlay omfray ethay unfortunateay
usbandhay inay ethay_ Ectatorspay, o_whay escribesday, ithway allay ethay ustogay anday allay ethay
innocenceay inay ethay orldway, owhay ishay ifeway anday ishay iendfray induceay imhay otay ayplay
atay ind-man’s-buffblay. Utbay anotheray_ Ectatorspay etter--that_lay ofay ethay amselday
ofay ourteenfay owhay ishesway otay arrymay mray. Apelyshay, anday assuresay erhay electedsay
Entormay atthay e“hay admiresay ouryay_ Ectatorsspay ightily”--might_may avehay eenbay
ittenwray byay aay atherray oremay adylikelay anday intelligentay Ialyday Ennetbay inay ethay
aysday ofay Ia’slyday eat-grandmothergray; ilewhay, onay ethay otheray andhay, omesay i(ay
inkthay unreasonablyay) avehay oundfay icism“cynay” inay ouchestay ofay Issmay Austen’say
ownay, uchsay asay erhay atiresay ofay mrsay. Usgrove’smay elf-deceivingsay egretsray overay
erhay onsay. Utbay isthay ordway ical“cynay” isay oneay ofay ethay ostmay isusedmay inay ethay
Englishay anguagelay, especiallyay enwhay, byay aay aringglay anday atuitousgray
alsificationfay ofay itsay originalay ensesay, itay isay applieday, otnay otay oughray anday
arlingsnay invectiveay, utbay otay entlegay anday obliqueay atiresay. Ifay icismcynay eansmay
ethay erceptionpay ofay e“thay otheray idesay,” ethay ensesay ofay e“thay accepteday ellshay
eneathbay,” ethay onsciousnesscay atthay otivesmay areay earlynay alwaysay ixedmay, anday
atthay otay eemsay isay otnay identicalay ithway otay e--ifbay isthay ebay icismcynay, enthay
everyay anmay anday omanway owhay isay otnay aay oolfay, owhay oesday otnay arecay otay ivelay inay aay
ool’sfay aradisepay, owhay ashay owledgeknay ofay aturenay anday ethay orldway anday ifelay, isay
aay iccynay. Anday inay atthay ensesay Issmay Austenay ertainlycay asway oneay. Eshay aymay evenay
avehay eenbay oneay inay ethay urtherfay ensesay atthay, ikelay erhay ownay mray. Ennetbay, eshay
ooktay anay epicureanay elightday inay issectingday, inay isplayingday, inay ettingsay atay
orkway erhay oolsfay anday erhay eanmay ersonspay. Iay inkthay eshay idday aketay isthay elightday,
anday Iay oday otnay inkthay atay allay ethay orseway ofay erhay orfay itay asay aay omanway, ilewhay eshay
asway immenselyay ethay etterbay orfay itay asay anay artistay._

iN_ay espectray ofay erhay artay enerallygay, mray. Oldwingay Ithsmay ashay ulytray observeday
atthay etaphor“may ashay eenbay exhausteday inay epictingday ethay erfectionpay ofay itay,
ombinedcay ithway ethay arrownessnay ofay erhay ieldfay;” anday ehay ashay ustlyjay addeday atthay
eway eednay otnay ogay eyondbay erhay ownay omparisoncay otay ethay artay ofay aay iniaturemay
ainterpay. Otay akemay isthay atterlay observationay uiteqay exactay eway ustmay otnay useay ethay
ermtay iniaturemay inay itsay estrictedray ensesay, anday ustmay inkthay atherray ofay Emlingmay
atay oneay enday ofay ethay istoryhay ofay aintingpay anday Eissoniermay atay ethay otheray, anthay
ofay Oswaycay oray anyay ofay ishay indkay. Anday Iay amay otnay osay ertaincay atthay Iay ouldshay
elfmysay useay ethay ordway arrow“nay” inay onnectioncay ithway erhay. Ifay erhay orldway isay aay
icrocosmmay, ethay osmiccay ualityqay ofay itay isay atay eastlay asay eminentay asay ethay
ittlenesslay. Eshay oesday otnay ouchtay atwhay eshay idday otnay eelfay erselfhay alledcay otay
aintpay; Iay amay otnay osay uresay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay avehay aintedpay atwhay eshay idday otnay
eelfay erselfhay alledcay otay ouchtay. Itay isay atay eastlay emarkableray atthay inay otway eryvay
ortshay eriodspay ofay iting--onewray ofay aboutay eethray earsyay, anday anotheray ofay otnay
uchmay oremay anthay ive--shefay executeday ixsay apitalcay orksway, anday ashay otnay eftlay aay
inglesay ailurefay. Itay isay ossiblepay atthay ethay omanticray astepay inay erhay
ompositioncay asway efectiveday: eway ustmay alwaysay ememberray atthay ardlyhay
anybodyay ornbay inay erhay ecade--thatday ofay ethay eighteenth-centuryay
eventies--independentlysay exhibiteday ethay ullfay omanticray ualityqay. Evenay Ottscay
equiredray illhay anday ountainmay anday alladbay, evenay Oleridgecay etaphysicsmay anday
Ermangay otay enableay emthay otay ipchay ethay assicalclay ellshay. Issmay Austenay asway anay
Englishay irlgay, oughtbray upay inay aay ountrycay etirementray, atay ethay imetay enwhay
adieslay entway ackbay intoay ethay ousehay ifay erethay asway aay itewhay ostfray ichwhay ightmay
iercepay eirthay idkay oesshay, enwhay aay uddensay oldcay asway ethay ubjectsay ofay ethay
avestgray earsfay, enwhay eirthay udiesstay, eirthay aysway, eirthay onductcay ereway
ubjectsay otay allay osethay antasticfay imitslay anday estrictionsray againstay ichwhay
Arymay Ollstonecraftway otestedpray ithway etterbay eneralgay ensesay anthay articularpay
astetay oray udgmentjay. Issmay Austenay, ootay, ewdray ackbay enwhay ethay itewhay ostfray
ouchedtay erhay oesshay; utbay Iay inkthay eshay ouldway avehay ademay aay ettypray oodgay ourneyjay
evenay inay aay ackblay oneay._

oR_fay ifay erhay owledgeknay asway otnay eryvay extendeday, eshay ewknay otway ingsthay ichwhay
onlyay eniusgay owsknay. Ethay oneay asway umanityhay, anday ethay otheray asway artay. Onay ethay
irstfay eadhay eshay ouldcay otnay akemay aay istakemay; erhay enmay, oughthay imitedlay, areay
uetray, anday erhay omenway areay, inay ethay olday ensesay, absolute“ay.” Asay otay artay, ifay eshay
ashay evernay iedtray idealismay, erhay ealismray isay ealray otay aay egreeday ichwhay akesmay
ethay alsefay ealismray ofay ouray ownay ayday ooklay erelymay ead-aliveday. Aketay almostay anyay
Enchmanfray, exceptay ethay atelay may. eday Aupassantmay, anday atchway imhay aboriouslylay
ilingpay upay okesstray inay ethay opehay ofay ivinggay aay ompletecay impressionay. Ouyay etgay
onenay; ouyay areay uckylay ifay, iscardingday o-thirdstway ofay atwhay ehay ivesgay, ouyay ancay
apeshay aay ealray impressionay outay ofay ethay estray. Utbay ithway Issmay Austenay ethay
iadmyray, ivialtray, unforceday okesstray uildbay upay ethay icturepay ikelay agicmay.
Othingnay isay alsefay; othingnay isay uperfluoussay. Enwhay o(tay aketay ethay esentpray ookbay
onlyay) mray. Ollinscay angedchay ishay indmay omfray Anejay otay Elizabethay ile“whay mrsay.
Ennetbay asway irringstay ethay irefay” and(ay eway owknay_ owhay _mrsay. Ennetbay ouldway avehay
irredstay ethay irefay), enwhay mray. Arcyday ought“bray ishay offee-cupcay ackbay_
imselfhay,” e_thay ouchtay inay eachay asecay isay ikelay atthay ofay Ift--“tallersway byay ethay
eadthbray ofay myay ail”--whichnay impresseday ethay alf-reluctanthay Ackeraythay ithway
ustjay anday outspokenay admirationay. Indeeday, antasticfay asay itay aymay eemsay, Iay
ouldshay utpay Issmay Austenay asay earnay otay Iftsway inay omesay aysway, asay Iay avehay utpay erhay
otay Addisonay inay othersay._

iS_thay Iftiansway ualityqay appearsay inay ethay esentpray ovelnay asay itay appearsay
owherenay elseay inay ethay aracterchay ofay ethay immortalay, ethay ineffableay mray.
Ollinscay. mray. Ollinscay isay eallyray_ eatgray; ar_fay eatergray anthay anythingay Addisonay
everay idday, almostay eatgray enoughay orfay Ieldingfay oray orfay Iftsway imselfhay. Itay ashay
eenbay aidsay atthay onay oneay everay asway ikelay imhay. Utbay inay ethay irstfay aceplay,_ ehay
as_way ikelay imhay; ehay isay ere--alivethay, imperishableay, oremay ealray anthay undredshay
ofay imepray inistersmay anday archbishopsay, ofay etals“may, emi-metalssay, anday
istinguishedday ilosophersphay.” Inay ethay econdsay aceplay, itay isay ashray, Iay inkthay,
otay oncludecay atthay anay actualay mray. Ollinscay asway impossibleay oray on-existentnay atay
ethay enday ofay ethay eighteenthay enturycay. Itay isay eryvay interestingay atthay eway
ossesspay, inay isthay amesay allerygay, atwhay aymay ebay alledcay aay oiledspay irstfay
aughtdray, oray anay unsuccessfulay udystay ofay imhay, inay Ohnjay Ashwoodday. Ethay
ormalityfay, ethay under-breedingay, ethay eannessmay, areay erethay; utbay ethay ortraitpay
isay onlyay alfhay aliveay, anday isay eltfay otay ebay evenay aay ittlelay unnaturalay. mray.
Ollinscay isay erfectlypay aturalnay, anday erfectlypay aliveay. Inay actfay, orfay allay ethay
iniature“may,” erethay isay omethingsay iganticgay inay ethay ayway inay ichwhay aay ertaincay
idesay, anday oremay anthay oneay, ofay umanityhay, anday especiallyay eighteenth-centuryay
umanityhay, itsay Ilistinismphay, itsay ell-meaningway utbay ide-boundhay oralitymay,
itsay ormalfay ettinesspay, itsay ovellinggray espectray orfay ankray, itsay aterialismmay,
itsay elfishnesssay, eceivesray exhibitionay. Iay illway otnay admitay atthay oneay eechspay
oray oneay actionay ofay isthay inestimableay anmay isay incapableay ofay eingbay econciledray
ithway ealityray, anday Iay ouldshay otnay onderway ifay anymay ofay esethay ordsway anday actionsay
areay istoricallyhay uetray._

uT_bay ethay eatnessgray ofay mray. Ollinscay ouldcay otnay avehay eenbay osay atisfactorilysay
exhibiteday ifay ishay eatresscray adhay otnay adjusteday osay artfullyay otay imhay ethay
iguresfay ofay mray. Ennetbay anday ofay Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay. Ethay atterlay, ikelay
mray. Ollinscay imselfhay, ashay eenbay argedchay ithway exaggerationay. Erethay isay,
erhapspay, aay eryvay aintfay adeshay ofay olourcay orfay ethay argechay; utbay itay eemssay otay emay
eryvay aintfay indeeday. Evenay ownay Iay oday otnay inkthay atthay itay ouldway ebay impossibleay
otay indfay ersonspay, especiallyay emalefay ersonspay, otnay ecessarilynay ofay oblenay
irthbay, asay overbearingay, asay elf-centredsay, asay eglectfulnay ofay oodgay annersmay,
asay Adylay Atherinecay. Aay undredhay earsyay agoay, anay earl’say aughterday, ethay Adylay
Owerfulpay if(ay otnay exactlyay Ountifulbay) ofay anay out-of-the-wayay ountrycay arishpay,
ichray, onglay outay ofay aritalmay authorityay, anday osay orthfay, adhay opportunitiesay ofay
evelopingday esethay agreeableay aracteristicschay ichwhay eldomsay esentpray
emselvesthay ownay. Asay orfay mray. Ennetbay, Issmay Austenay, anday mray. Arcyday, anday evenay
Issmay Elizabethay erselfhay, ereway, Iay amay inclineday otay inkthay, atherray ardhay onay imhay
orfay ethay impropriety“ay” ofay ishay onductcay. Ishay ifeway asway evidentlyay, anday ustmay
alwaysay avehay eenbay, aay uiteqay irreclaimableay oolfay; anday unlessay ehay adhay otshay erhay
oray imselfhay erethay asway onay ayway outay ofay itay orfay aay anmay ofay ensesay anday iritspay utbay
ethay ironicay. Omfray onay otheray ointpay ofay iewvay isay ehay openay otay anyay eproachray,
exceptay orfay anay excusableay anday otnay unnaturalay elplessnesshay atay ethay isiscray ofay
ethay elopementay, anday ishay utterancesay areay ethay ostmay acutelyay elightfulday inay ethay
onsciouslycay umoroushay ind--inkay ethay indkay atthay eway aughlay ithway, otnay at--thatay
evenay Issmay Austenay ashay utpay intoay ethay outhmay ofay anyay ofay erhay aracterschay. Itay isay
ifficultday otay owknay etherwhay ehay isay ostmay agreeableay enwhay alkingtay otay ishay ifeway,
oray enwhay uttingpay mray. Ollinscay oughthray ishay acespay; utbay ethay eneralgay ensesay ofay
ethay orldway ashay obablypray eenbay ightray inay eferringpray otay ethay irstfay ankray ishay
onsolationcay otay ethay ormerfay enwhay eshay aundersmay overay ethay entailay, “myay earday,
oday otnay ivegay ayway otay uchsay oomyglay oughtsthay. Etlay usay opehay orfay etterbay ingsthay.
Etlay usay atterflay ourselvesay atthay_ Iay ay_may ebay ethay urvivorsay;” anday ishay inquiryay
otay ishay olossalcay ousincay asay otay ethay omplimentscay ichwhay mray. Ollinscay ashay ustjay
elatedray asay ademay byay imselfhay otay Adylay Atherinecay, aY“may Iay askay etherwhay esethay
easingplay attentionsay oceedpray omfray ethay impulseay ofay ethay omentmay, oray areay ethay
esultray ofay eviouspray udystay?” Esethay areay ethay ingsthay ichwhay ivegay Issmay Austen’say
eadersray ethay easantplay ocksshay, ethay elightfulday illsthray, ichwhay areay eltfay byay
ethay eadersray ofay Iftsway, ofay Ieldingfay, anday eway aymay erehay adday, ofay Ackeraythay, asay
eythay areay eltfay byay ethay eadersray ofay onay otheray Englishay authoray ofay ictionfay
outsideay ofay esethay ourfay._

e_thay oodnessgay ofay ethay inormay aracterschay inay_ Idepray anday Ejudicepray as_hay eenbay
alreadyay alludeday otay, anday itay akesmay aay etailedday ellingdway onay eirthay eautiesbay
ifficultday inay anyay acespay, anday impossibleay inay isthay. mrsay. Ennetbay eway avehay
ancedglay atay, anday itay isay otnay easyay otay aysay etherwhay eshay isay oremay exquisitelyay
amusingay oray oremay orriblyhay uetray. Uchmay ethay amesay aymay ebay aidsay ofay Ittykay anday
Ialyday; utbay itay isay otnay everyay authoray, evenay ofay eniusgay, owhay ouldway avehay
ifferentiatedday ithway uchsay unerringay illskay ethay effectsay ofay ollyfay anday
ulgarityvay ofay intellectay anday ispositionday orkingway uponay ethay ommoncay
eaknessesway ofay omanway atay uchsay ifferentday agesay. Ithway Arymay, Issmay Austenay ashay
akentay atherray esslay ainspay, oughthay eshay ashay eenbay evenay oremay unkinday otay erhay;
otnay erelymay inay ethay exttay, utbay, asay eway earnlay omfray osethay interestingay
aditionaltray appendicesay ichwhay mray. Austenay Eighlay ashay ivengay usay, inay oomingday
erhay ivatelypray otay arrymay one“ay ofay mray. Ilips’sphay erksclay.” Ethay abitshay ofay
irstfay opyingcay anday enthay etailingray oralmay entimentssay, ofay ayingplay anday
ingingsay ootay onglay inay ublicpay, areay, onay oubtday, ievousgray anday iminalcray; utbay
erhapspay oorpay Arymay asway atherray ethay apegoatscay ofay ethay inssay ofay ueblay ockingsstay
inay atthay Ordyce-belecturedfay enerationgay. Itay isay atay anyay ateray ifficultday otnay
otay extenday otay erhay aay areshay ofay ethay espectray anday affectionay affection(ay anday
espectray ofay aay eculiarpay indkay; oubtlessday), ithway ichwhay oneay egardsray mray.
Ollinscay, enwhay eshay awsdray ethay oralmay ofay Ia’slyday allfay. Iay ometimessay ishway
atthay ethay exigenciesay ofay ethay orystay adhay ermittedpay Issmay Austenay otay uniteay
esethay ersonagespay, anday usthay atay onceay achieveay aay otablenay atingmay anday oothesay
oorpay mrsay. Ennet’sbay anguishay overay ethay entailay._

e_thay Ingleysbay anday ethay Ardinersgay anday ethay Ucaseslay, Issmay Arcyday anday Issmay eday
Ourghbay, Anejay, Ickhamway, anday ethay estray, ustmay asspay ithoutway ecialspay ommentcay,
urtherfay anthay ethay emarkray atthay Arlottechay Ucaslay er(hay egregiousay apapay, oughthay
elightfulday, isay ustjay aay ittlelay onay ethay itherthay idesay ofay ethay inelay etweenbay
omedycay anday arcefay) isay aay onderfullyway everclay udystay inay abdray ofay oneay indkay, anday
atthay Ickhamway ough(thay omethingsay ofay Issmay Austen’say esitationhay ofay ouchtay inay
ealingday ithway oungyay enmay appearsay) isay aay otnay uchmay esslay otablenay etchskay inay
abdray ofay anotheray. Onlyay eniusgay ouldcay avehay ademay Arlottechay atwhay eshay isay, etyay
otnay isagreeableday; Ickhamway atwhay ehay isay, ithoutway investingay imhay eitheray ithway
aay eapchay Onday Uanishjay attractivenessay oray aay isgustingday ascalityray. Utbay ethay
erohay anday ethay eroinehay areay otnay intstay otay ebay ismissedday._

aRcy_day ashay alwaysay eemedsay otay emay byay arfay ethay estbay anday ostmay interestingay ofay
Issmay Austen’say eroeshay; ethay onlyay ossiblepay ompetitorcay eingbay Enryhay Ilneytay,
osewhay artpay isay osay ightslay anday implesay atthay itay ardlyhay entersay intoay
omparisoncay. Itay ashay ometimessay, Iay elievebay, eenbay urgeday atthay ishay idepray isay
unnaturalay atay irstfay inay itsay expressionay anday aterlay inay itsay ieldingyay, ilewhay
ishay allingfay inay ovelay atay allay isay otnay extremelyay obablepray. Erehay againay Iay
annotcay ogay ithway ethay objectorsay. Arcy’sday ownay accountay ofay ethay ayway inay ichwhay
ishay idepray adhay eenbay amperedpay, isay erfectlypay ationalray anday ufficientsay; anday
othingnay ouldcay ebay, ologicallypsychay eakingspay, aay_ ausacay eriorvay or_fay itsay
uddensay estorationray otay ealthyhay onditionscay anthay ethay ockshay ofay Elizabeth’say
ornfulscay efusalray actingay onay aay aturenay_ exay othesihypay enerous_gay. Othingnay inay
evenay ouray authoray isay inerfay anday oremay elicatelyday ouchedtay anthay ethay angechay ofay
ishay emeanourday atay ethay uddensay eetingmay inay ethay oundsgray ofay Emberleypay. Adhay ehay
eenbay aay adbay igpray oray aay adbay oxcombcay, ehay ightmay avehay eenbay illstay artingsmay
underay ishay ejectionray, oray uspicioussay atthay ethay irlgay adhay omecay
usband-huntinghay. Ishay eingbay eithernay isay exactlyay onsistentcay ithway ethay
obablepray eelingsfay ofay aay anmay oiltspay inay ethay ommoncay ensesay, utbay otnay eallyray
injureday inay ispositionday, anday oroughlythay inay ovelay. Asay orfay ishay eingbay inay
ovelay, Elizabethay ashay ivengay asay ustjay anay expositionay ofay ethay ausescay ofay atthay
enomenonphay asay Arcyday ashay ofay ethay onditionscay ofay ishay unregenerateay atestay,
onlyay eshay ashay ofay oursecay otnay ountedcay inay atwhay asway ueday otay erhay ownay ersonalpay
armchay._

e_thay ecretsay ofay atthay armchay anymay enmay anday otnay aay ewfay omenway, omfray Issmay Austenay
erselfhay ownwardsday, avehay eltfay, anday ikelay ostmay armschay itay isay aay ingthay atherray
otay ebay eltfay anthay otay ebay explaineday. Elizabethay ofay oursecay elongsbay otay ethay_
allegroay or_ay_ allegraay ivision_day ofay ethay armyay ofay Enusvay. Issmay Austenay asway
alwaysay ovokinglypray arychay ofay escriptionday inay egardray otay erhay eautiesbay; anday
exceptay ethay inefay eyesay, anday aay inthay oray otway atthay eshay adhay atay anyay ateray
ometimessay aay ightbray omplexioncay, anday asway otnay eryvay alltay, eway earhay othingnay
aboutay erhay ookslay. Utbay erhay iefchay ifferenceday omfray otheray eroineshay ofay ethay
ivelylay etypay eemssay otay ielay irstfay inay erhay eingbay istinctlyday ever--almostclay
ong-mindedstray, inay ethay etterbay ensesay ofay atthay objectionableay ord--andway
econdlysay inay erhay eingbay entirelyay estituteday ofay ill-natureay orfay allay erhay
opensitypray otay easetay anday ethay arpnessshay ofay erhay onguetay. Elizabethay ancay ivegay
atay eastlay asay oodgay asay eshay etsgay enwhay eshay isay attackeday; utbay eshay evernay
atches“scray,” anday eshay evernay attacksay irstfay. Omesay ofay ethay erestmay
obsoletenessesay ofay asephray anday annermay ivegay oneay oray otway ofay erhay earlyay
eechesspay aay ightslay ertnesspay, utbay atthay isay othingnay, anday enwhay eshay omescay otay
erioussay usinessbay, asay inay ethay eatgray oposalpray enescay ithway Arcyday ich(whay isay,
asay itay ouldshay ebay, ethay imaxclay ofay ethay interestay ofay ethay ookbay), anday inay ethay
inalfay adieslay’ attlebay ithway Adylay Atherinecay, eshay isay unexceptionableay. Enthay
ootay eshay isay aay erfectlypay aturalnay irlgay. Eshay oesday otnay isguiseday omfray erselfhay
oray anybodyay atthay eshay esentsray Arcy’sday irstfay ill-mannereday ersonalitypay ithway
asay ersonalpay aay eelingfay. (byay ethay ayway, ethay eproachray atthay ethay ill-mannersay ofay
isthay eechspay areay overdoneay isay ertainlycay unjustay; orfay ingsthay ofay ethay amesay
indkay, expresseday onay oubtday esslay iltedlystay utbay oremay oarselycay, ightmay avehay
eenbay eardhay inay oremay anthay oneay all-roombay uringday isthay eryvay earyay omfray ersonspay
owhay oughtay otay avehay eenbay onay orseway edbray anthay Arcyday.) Anday eshay etslay ethay
injuryay oneday otay Anejay anday ethay ontemptcay ownshay otay ethay estray ofay erhay amilyfay
aggravateay isthay esentmentray inay ethay ealthiesthay ayway inay ethay orldway._

iLl_stay, allay isthay oesday otnay explainay erhay armchay, ichwhay, akingtay eautybay asay aay
ommoncay ormfay ofay allay eroineshay, aymay erhapspay onsistcay inay ethay additionay otay erhay
ayfulnessplay, erhay itway, erhay affectionateay anday aturalnay ispositionday, ofay aay
ertaincay earlessnessfay eryvay uncommonay inay eroineshay ofay erhay etypay anday ageay.
Earlynay allay ofay emthay ouldway avehay eenbay inay eechlessspay aweay ofay ethay agnificentmay
Arcyday; earlynay allay ofay emthay ouldway avehay alpitatedpay anday utteredflay atay ethay
ideaay ofay oposalspray, evenay aughtynay onesay, omfray ethay ascinatingfay Ickhamway.
Elizabethay, ithway othingnay offensiveay, othingnay_ iraginousvay, othing_nay ofay ethay
eW“nay Omanway” aboutay erhay, ashay byay aturenay atwhay ethay estbay odernmay ot(nay ew“nay”)
omenway avehay byay educationay anday experienceay, aay erfectpay eedomfray omfray ethay ideaay
atthay allay enmay aymay ullybay erhay ifay eythay oosechay, anday atthay ostmay illway awayay ithway
erhay ifay eythay ancay. Oughthay otnay inay ethay eastlay impudent“ay anday annishmay owngray,”
eshay ashay onay eremay ensibilitysay, onay astynay icenessnay aboutay erhay. Ethay ormfay ofay
assionpay ommoncay anday ikelylay otay eemsay aturalnay inay Issmay Austen’say ayday asway osay
invariablyay onnectedcay ithway ethay isplayday ofay oneay oray ethay otheray, oray othbay ofay
esethay ualitiesqay, atthay eshay ashay otnay ademay Elizabethay outwardlyay assionatepay.
Utbay Iay, atay eastlay, avehay otnay ethay ightestslay oubtday atthay eshay ouldway avehay
arriedmay Arcyday ustjay asay illinglyway ithoutway Emberleypay asay ithway itay, anday
anybodyay owhay ancay eadray etweenbay ineslay illway otnay indfay ethay overslay’
onversationscay inay ethay inalfay apterschay osay igidfray asay eythay ightmay avehay ookedlay
otay ethay Elladay Uscanscray ofay eirthay ownay ayday, anday erhapspay oday ooklay otay ethay Elladay
Uscanscray ofay isthay._

aNd_ay, afteray allay, atwhay isay ethay oodgay ofay eekingsay orfay ethay easonray ofay
arm?--itchay isay erethay. Erethay ereway etterbay ensesay inay ethay adsay echanicmay
exerciseay ofay eterminingday ethay easonray ofay itsay absenceay erewhay itay isay otnay. Inay
ethay ovelsnay ofay ethay astlay undredhay earsyay erethay areay astvay umbersnay ofay oungyay
adieslay ithway omwhay itay ightmay ebay aay easureplay otay allfay inay ovelay; erethay areay atay
eastlay ivefay ithway omwhay, asay itay eemssay otay emay, onay anmay ofay astetay anday iritspay ancay
elphay oingday osay. Eirthay amesnay areay, inay onologicalchray orderay, Elizabethay
Ennetbay, Ianaday Ernonvay, Argemoneay Avingtonlay, Eatrixbay Esmonday, anday Arbarabay
Antgray. Iay ouldshay avehay eenbay ostmay inay ovelay ithway Eatrixbay anday Argemoneay; Iay
ouldshay, Iay inkthay, orfay eremay occasionalay ompanionshipcay, avehay eferredpray Ianaday
anday Arbarabay. Utbay otay ivelay ithway anday otay arrymay, Iay oday otnay owknay atthay anyay oneay
ofay ethay ourfay ancay omecay intoay ompetitioncay ithway Elizabethay._

eORGE_gay AINTSBURYsay._

iLlustration[ay: iDE·pray ANDay EJUDICEpray·




Apterchay Iay.]


Itay isay aay uthtray universallyay acknowledgeday, atthay aay inglesay anmay inay ossessionpay
ofay aay oodgay ortunefay ustmay ebay inay antway ofay aay ifeway.

Oweverhay ittlelay ownknay ethay eelingsfay oray iewsvay ofay uchsay aay anmay aymay ebay onay ishay
irstfay enteringay aay eighbourhoodnay, isthay uthtray isay osay ellway ixedfay inay ethay indsmay
ofay ethay urroundingsay amiliesfay, atthay ehay isay onsideredcay asay ethay ightfulray
opertypray ofay omesay oneay oray otheray ofay eirthay aughtersday.

“myay earday mray. Ennetbay,” aidsay ishay adylay otay imhay oneay ayday, ave“hay ouyay eardhay atthay
Etherfieldnay Arkpay isay etlay atay astlay?”

mray. Ennetbay epliedray atthay ehay adhay otnay.

uT“bay itay isay,” eturnedray eshay; or“fay mrsay. Onglay ashay ustjay eenbay erehay, anday eshay
oldtay emay allay aboutay itay.”

mray. Ennetbay ademay onay answeray.

o“day otnay ouyay antway otay owknay owhay ashay akentay itay?” iedcray ishay ifeway, impatientlyay.

ou“_yay_ antway otay elltay emay, anday Iay avehay onay objectionay otay earinghay itay.”

iLlustration[ay:

e“hay amecay ownday otay eesay ethay aceplay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

Isthay asway invitationay enoughay.

“whyay, myay earday, ouyay ustmay owknay, mrsay. Onglay ayssay atthay Etherfieldnay isay akentay
byay aay oungyay anmay ofay argelay ortunefay omfray ethay orthnay ofay Englanday; atthay ehay amecay
ownday onay Ondaymay inay aay aisechay anday ourfay otay eesay ethay aceplay, anday asway osay uchmay
elightedday ithway itay atthay ehay agreeday ithway mray. Orrismay immediatelyay; atthay ehay isay
otay aketay ossessionpay eforebay Ichaelmasmay, anday omesay ofay ishay ervantssay areay otay ebay
inay ethay ousehay byay ethay enday ofay extnay eekway.”

aT“whay isay ishay amenay?”

iNgley“bay.”

iS“ay ehay arriedmay oray inglesay?”

oH“ay, inglesay, myay earday, otay ebay uresay! Aay inglesay anmay ofay argelay ortunefay; ourfay oray
ivefay ousandthay aay earyay. Atwhay aay inefay ingthay orfay ouray irlsgay!”

oW“hay osay? owhay ancay itay affectay emthay?”

“myay earday mray. Ennetbay,” epliedray ishay ifeway, ow“hay ancay ouyay ebay osay iresometay? Ouyay
ustmay owknay atthay Iay amay inkingthay ofay ishay arryingmay oneay ofay emthay.”

iS“ay atthay ishay esignday inay ettlingsay erehay?”

eSign“day? Onsensenay, owhay ancay ouyay alktay osay! Utbay itay isay eryvay ikelylay atthay ehay
ay_may_ allfay inay ovelay ithway oneay ofay emthay, anday ereforethay ouyay ustmay isitvay imhay asay
oonsay asay ehay omescay.”

i“ay eesay onay occasionay orfay atthay. Ouyay anday ethay irlsgay aymay o--orgay ouyay aymay endsay
emthay byay emselvesthay, ichwhay erhapspay illway ebay illstay etterbay; orfay asay ouyay areay
asay andsomehay asay anyay ofay emthay, mray. Ingleybay ightmay ikelay ouyay ethay estbay ofay ethay
artypay.”

“myay earday, ouyay atterflay emay. Iay ertainlycay ave_hay_ adhay myay areshay ofay eautybay, utbay
Iay oday otnay etendpray otay ebay anythingay extraordinaryay ownay. Enwhay aay omanway ashay ivefay
own-upgray aughtersday, eshay oughtay otay ivegay overay inkingthay ofay erhay ownay eautybay.”

iN“ay uchsay asescay, aay omanway ashay otnay oftenay uchmay eautybay otay inkthay ofay.”

uT“bay, myay earday, ouyay ustmay indeeday ogay anday eesay mray. Ingleybay enwhay ehay omescay intoay
ethay eighbourhoodnay.”

iT“ay isay oremay anthay Iay engageay orfay, Iay assureay ouyay.”

uT“bay onsidercay ouryay aughtersday. Onlyay inkthay atwhay anay establishmentay itay ouldway
ebay orfay oneay ofay emthay. Irsay Illiamway anday Adylay Ucaslay areay eterminedday otay ogay,
erelymay onay atthay accountay; orfay inay eneralgay, ouyay owknay, eythay isitvay onay ewnay
omerscay. Indeeday ouyay ustmay ogay, orfay itay illway ebay impossibleay orfay us_ay_ otay isitvay
imhay, ifay ouyay oday otnay.”

oU“yay areay overay upulousscray, urelysay. Iay areday aysay mray. Ingleybay illway ebay eryvay
adglay otay eesay ouyay; anday Iay illway endsay aay ewfay ineslay byay ouyay otay assureay imhay ofay myay
eartyhay onsentcay otay ishay arryingmay icheverwhay ehay ooseschay ofay ethay irls--thoughgay
Iay ustmay owthray inay aay oodgay ordway orfay myay ittlelay Izzylay.”

i“ay esireday ouyay illway oday onay uchsay ingthay. Izzylay isay otnay aay itbay etterbay anthay ethay
othersay: anday Iay amay uresay eshay isay otnay alfhay osay andsomehay asay Anejay, ornay alfhay osay
ood-humouredgay asay Ialyday. Utbay ouyay areay alwaysay ivinggay er_hay_ ethay eferencepray.”

eY“thay avehay onenay ofay emthay uchmay otay ecommendray emthay,” epliedray ehay: ey“thay areay
allay illysay anday ignorantay ikelay otheray irlsgay; utbay Izzylay ashay omethingsay oremay ofay
uicknessqay anthay erhay isterssay.”

“mray. Ennetbay, owhay ancay ouyay abuseay ouryay ownay ildrenchay inay uchsay aay ayway? Ouyay aketay
elightday inay exingvay emay. Ouyay avehay onay ompassioncay onay myay oorpay ervesnay.”

oU“yay istakemay emay, myay earday. Iay avehay aay ighhay espectray orfay ouryay ervesnay. Eythay
areay myay olday iendsfray. Iay avehay eardhay ouyay entionmay emthay ithway onsiderationcay
esethay entytway earsyay atay eastlay.”

aH“ay, ouyay oday otnay owknay atwhay Iay uffersay.”

uT“bay Iay opehay ouyay illway etgay overay itay, anday ivelay otay eesay anymay oungyay enmay ofay ourfay
ousandthay aay earyay omecay intoay ethay eighbourhoodnay.”

iT“ay illway ebay onay useay otay usay, ifay entytway uchsay ouldshay omecay, incesay ouyay illway otnay
isitvay emthay.”

ePend“day uponay itay, myay earday, atthay enwhay erethay areay entytway, Iay illway isitvay emthay
allay.”

mray. Ennetbay asway osay odday aay ixturemay ofay uickqay artspay, arcasticsay umourhay,
eserveray, anday apricecay, atthay ethay experienceay ofay ee-and-twentythray earsyay adhay
eenbay insufficientay otay akemay ishay ifeway understanday ishay aracterchay. eR_hay_ indmay
asway esslay ifficultday otay evelopeday. Eshay asway aay omanway ofay eanmay understandingay,
ittlelay informationay, anday uncertainay empertay. Enwhay eshay asway iscontentedday, eshay
anciedfay erselfhay ervousnay. Ethay usinessbay ofay erhay ifelay asway otay etgay erhay
aughtersday arriedmay: itsay olacesay asway isitingvay anday ewsnay.

iLlustration[ay: m^{ray.} ay& m^{rsay.} Ennetbay

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




iLlustration[ay:

i“ay opehay mray. Ingleybay illway ikelay itay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IIay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ennetbay asway amongay ethay earliestay ofay osethay owhay aitedway onay mray. Ingleybay. Ehay
adhay alwaysay intendeday otay isitvay imhay, oughthay otay ethay astlay alwaysay assuringay ishay
ifeway atthay ehay ouldshay otnay ogay; anday illtay ethay eveningay afteray ethay isitvay asway
aidpay eshay adhay onay owledgeknay ofay itay. Itay asway enthay isclosedday inay ethay ollowingfay
annermay. Observingay ishay econdsay aughterday employeday inay immingtray aay athay, ehay
uddenlysay addresseday erhay ithway,--

i“ay opehay mray. Ingleybay illway ikelay itay, Izzylay.”

e“way areay otnay inay aay ayway otay owknay at_whay_ mray. Ingleybay ikeslay,” aidsay erhay othermay,
esentfullyray, ince“say eway areay otnay otay isitvay.”

uT“bay ouyay orgetfay, ammamay,” aidsay Elizabethay, at“thay eway allshay eetmay imhay atay ethay
assembliesay, anday atthay mrsay. Onglay ashay omisedpray otay introduceay imhay.”

i“ay oday otnay elievebay mrsay. Onglay illway oday anyay uchsay ingthay. Eshay ashay otway iecesnay
ofay erhay ownay. Eshay isay aay elfishsay, ocriticalhypay omanway, anday Iay avehay onay opinionay
ofay erhay.”

o“nay oremay avehay Iay,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay; and“ay Iay amay adglay otay indfay atthay ouyay oday
otnay ependday onay erhay ervingsay ouyay.”

mrsay. Ennetbay eignedday otnay otay akemay anyay eplyray; utbay, unableay otay ontaincay
erselfhay, eganbay oldingscay oneay ofay erhay aughtersday.

oN’t“day eepkay oughingcay osay, Ittykay, orfay eaven’shay akesay! Avehay aay ittlelay
ompassioncay onay myay ervesnay. Ouyay eartay emthay otay iecespay.”

iTty“kay ashay onay iscretionday inay erhay oughscay,” aidsay erhay atherfay; e“shay imestay
emthay illay.”

i“ay oday otnay oughcay orfay myay ownay amusementay,” epliedray Ittykay, etfullyfray. eN“whay
isay ouryay extnay allbay otay ebay, Izzylay?”

o-morrow“tay ortnightfay.”

aY“ay, osay itay isay,” iedcray erhay othermay, and“ay mrsay. Onglay oesday otnay omecay ackbay illtay
ethay ayday eforebay; osay, itay illway ebay impossibleay orfay erhay otay introduceay imhay, orfay
eshay illway otnay owknay imhay erselfhay.”

eN“thay, myay earday, ouyay aymay avehay ethay advantageay ofay ouryay iendfray, anday introduceay
mray. Ingleybay otay er_hay_.”

iMpossible“ay, mray. Ennetbay, impossibleay, enwhay Iay amay otnay acquainteday ithway imhay
elfmysay; owhay ancay ouyay ebay osay easingtay?”

i“ay onourhay ouryay ircumspectioncay. Aay ortnight’sfay acquaintanceay isay ertainlycay
eryvay ittlelay. Oneay annotcay owknay atwhay aay anmay eallyray isay byay ethay enday ofay aay
ortnightfay. Utbay ifay e_way_ oday otnay enturevay, omebodysay elseay illway; anday afteray
allay, mrsay. Onglay anday erhay iecesnay ustmay andstay eirthay ancechay; anday, ereforethay,
asay eshay illway inkthay itay anay actay ofay indnesskay, ifay ouyay eclineday ethay officeay, Iay
illway aketay itay onay elfmysay.”

Ethay irlsgay aredstay atay eirthay atherfay. mrsay. Ennetbay aidsay onlyay, oNsense“nay,
onsensenay!”

aT“whay ancay ebay ethay eaningmay ofay atthay emphaticay exclamationay?” iedcray ehay. o“day
ouyay onsidercay ethay ormsfay ofay introductionay, anday ethay essstray atthay isay aidlay onay
emthay, asay onsensenay? Iay annotcay uiteqay agreeay ithway ouyay ere_thay_. Atwhay aysay ouyay,
Arymay? Orfay ouyay areay aay oungyay adylay ofay eepday eflectionray, Iay owknay, anday eadray
eatgray ooksbay, anday akemay extractsay.”

Arymay ishedway otay aysay omethingsay eryvay ensiblesay, utbay ewknay otnay owhay.

iLe“whay Arymay isay adjustingay erhay ideasay,” ehay ontinuedcay, et“lay usay eturnray otay mray.
Ingleybay.”

i“ay amay icksay ofay mray. Ingleybay,” iedcray ishay ifeway.

i“ay amay orrysay otay earhay at_thay_; utbay whyay idday ouyay otnay elltay emay osay eforebay? Ifay Iay
adhay ownknay asay uchmay isthay orningmay, Iay ertainlycay ouldway otnay avehay alledcay onay
imhay. Itay isay eryvay unluckyay; utbay asay Iay avehay actuallyay aidpay ethay isitvay, eway
annotcay escapeay ethay acquaintanceay ownay.”

Ethay astonishmentay ofay ethay adieslay asway ustjay atwhay ehay ished--thatway ofay mrsay.
Ennetbay erhapspay urpassingsay ethay estray; oughthay enwhay ethay irstfay umulttay ofay oyjay
asway overay, eshay eganbay otay eclareday atthay itay asway atwhay eshay adhay expecteday allay ethay
ilewhay.

oW“hay oodgay itay asway inay ouyay, myay earday mray. Ennetbay! Utbay Iay ewknay Iay ouldshay
ersuadepay ouyay atay astlay. Iay asway uresay ouyay ovedlay ouryay irlsgay ootay ellway otay
eglectnay uchsay anay acquaintanceay. Ellway, owhay easedplay Iay amay! Anday itay isay uchsay aay
oodgay okejay, ootay, atthay ouyay ouldshay avehay onegay isthay orningmay, anday evernay aidsay aay
ordway aboutay itay illtay ownay.”

oW“nay, Ittykay, ouyay aymay oughcay asay uchmay asay ouyay oosechay,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay; anday,
asay ehay okespay, ehay eftlay ethay oomray, atiguedfay ithway ethay apturesray ofay ishay ifeway.

aT“whay anay excellentay atherfay ouyay avehay, irlsgay,” aidsay eshay, enwhay ethay oorday asway
utshay. i“ay oday otnay owknay owhay ouyay illway everay akemay imhay amendsay orfay ishay indnesskay;
oray emay eitheray, orfay atthay attermay. Atay ouray imetay ofay ifelay, itay isay otnay osay
easantplay, Iay ancay elltay ouyay, otay ebay akingmay ewnay acquaintancesay everyay ayday; utbay
orfay ouryay akessay eway ouldway oday anythingay. Ialyday, myay ovelay, oughthay ouyay are_ay_
ethay oungestyay, Iay areday aysay mray. Ingleybay illway anceday ithway ouyay atay ethay extnay
allbay.”

oH“ay,” aidsay Ialyday, outlystay, i“ay amay otnay afraiday; orfay oughthay Iay am_ay_ ethay
oungestyay, I’may ethay allesttay.”

Ethay estray ofay ethay eveningay asway entspay inay onjecturingcay owhay oonsay ehay ouldway
eturnray mray. Ennet’sbay isitvay, anday eterminingday enwhay eythay ouldshay askay imhay otay
innerday.

iLlustration[ay: i’m“ay ethay allesttay”]




iLlustration[ay:

e“hay oderay aay ackblay orsehay”
ay]




APTERchay IIIay.


iLlustration[ay]

Otnay allay atthay mrsay. Ennetbay, oweverhay, ithway ethay assistanceay ofay erhay ivefay
aughtersday, ouldcay askay onay ethay ubjectsay, asway ufficientsay otay awdray omfray erhay
usbandhay anyay atisfactorysay escriptionday ofay mray. Ingleybay. Eythay attackeday imhay
inay ariousvay aysway, ithway arefacedbay uestionsqay, ingeniousay uppositionssay, anday
istantday urmisessay; utbay ehay eludeday ethay illskay ofay emthay allay; anday eythay ereway atay
astlay obligeday otay acceptay ethay econd-handsay intelligenceay ofay eirthay eighbournay,
Adylay Ucaslay. Erhay eportray asway ighlyhay avourablefay. Irsay Illiamway adhay eenbay
elightedday ithway imhay. Ehay asway uiteqay oungyay, onderfullyway andsomehay, extremelyay
agreeableay, anday, otay owncray ethay olewhay, ehay eantmay otay ebay atay ethay extnay assemblyay
ithway aay argelay artypay. Othingnay ouldcay ebay oremay elightfulday! Otay ebay ondfay ofay
ancingday asway aay ertaincay epstay owardstay allingfay inay ovelay; anday eryvay ivelylay
opeshay ofay mray. Ingley’sbay earthay ereway entertaineday.

iF“ay Iay ancay utbay eesay oneay ofay myay aughtersday appilyhay ettledsay atay Etherfieldnay,”
aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay otay erhay usbandhay, and“ay allay ethay othersay equallyay ellway
arriedmay, Iay allshay avehay othingnay otay ishway orfay.”

Inay aay ewfay aysday mray. Ingleybay eturnedray mray. Ennet’sbay isitvay, anday atsay aboutay entay
inutesmay ithway imhay inay ishay ibrarylay. Ehay adhay entertaineday opeshay ofay eingbay
admitteday otay aay ightsay ofay ethay oungyay adieslay, ofay osewhay eautybay ehay adhay eardhay
uchmay; utbay ehay awsay onlyay ethay atherfay. Ethay adieslay ereway omewhatsay oremay
ortunatefay, orfay eythay adhay ethay advantageay ofay ascertainingay, omfray anay upperay
indowway, atthay ehay oreway aay ueblay oatcay anday oderay aay ackblay orsehay.

Anay invitationay otay innerday asway oonsay afterwardsay espatchedday; anday alreadyay adhay
mrsay. Ennetbay annedplay ethay oursescay atthay ereway otay oday editcray otay erhay
ousekeepinghay, enwhay anay answeray arriveday ichwhay eferredday itay allay. mray. Ingleybay
asway obligeday otay ebay inay owntay ethay ollowingfay ayday, anday onsequentlycay unableay otay
acceptay ethay onourhay ofay eirthay invitationay, etcay. mrsay. Ennetbay asway uiteqay
isconcertedday. Eshay ouldcay otnay imagineay atwhay usinessbay ehay ouldcay avehay inay owntay
osay oonsay afteray ishay arrivalay inay Ertfordshirehay; anday eshay eganbay otay earfay atthay
ehay ightmay alwaysay ebay ingflyay aboutay omfray oneay aceplay otay anotheray, anday evernay
ettledsay atay Etherfieldnay asay ehay oughtay otay ebay. Adylay Ucaslay uietedqay erhay earsfay aay
ittlelay byay artingstay ethay ideaay ofay ishay

iLlustration[ay:

eN“whay ethay Artypay entereday”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

eingbay onegay otay Ondonlay onlyay otay etgay aay argelay artypay orfay ethay allbay; anday aay
eportray oonsay ollowedfay atthay mray. Ingleybay asway otay ingbray elvetway adieslay anday
evensay entlemengay ithway imhay otay ethay assemblyay. Ethay irlsgay ievedgray overay uchsay aay
umbernay ofay adieslay; utbay ereway omfortedcay ethay ayday eforebay ethay allbay byay earinghay
atthay, insteaday ofay elvetway, ehay adhay oughtbray onlyay ixsay ithway imhay omfray Ondonlay,
ishay ivefay isterssay anday aay ousincay. Anday enwhay ethay artypay entereday ethay
assembly-roomay, itay onsistedcay ofay onlyay ivefay altogetheray: mray. Ingleybay, ishay
otway isterssay, ethay usbandhay ofay ethay eldestay, anday anotheray oungyay anmay.

mray. Ingleybay asway ood-lookinggay anday entlemanlikegay: ehay adhay aay easantplay
ountenancecay, anday easyay, unaffecteday annersmay. Ishay isterssay ereway inefay omenway,
ithway anay airay ofay ecidedday ashionfay. Ishay other-in-lawbray, mray. Ursthay, erelymay
ookedlay ethay entlemangay; utbay ishay iendfray mray. Arcyday oonsay ewdray ethay attentionay
ofay ethay oomray byay ishay inefay, alltay ersonpay, andsomehay eaturesfay, oblenay ienmay, anday
ethay eportray, ichwhay asway inay eneralgay irculationcay ithinway ivefay inutesmay afteray
ishay entranceay, ofay ishay avinghay entay ousandthay aay earyay. Ethay entlemengay
onouncedpray imhay otay ebay aay inefay igurefay ofay aay anmay, ethay adieslay eclaredday ehay asway
uchmay andsomerhay anthay mray. Ingleybay, anday ehay asway ookedlay atay ithway eatgray
admirationay orfay aboutay alfhay ethay eveningay, illtay ishay annersmay avegay aay isgustday
ichwhay urnedtay ethay idetay ofay ishay opularitypay; orfay ehay asway iscoveredday otay ebay
oudpray, otay ebay aboveay ishay ompanycay, anday aboveay eingbay easedplay; anday otnay allay ishay
argelay estateay inay Erbyshireday ouldcay avesay imhay omfray avinghay aay ostmay orbiddingfay,
isagreeableday ountenancecay, anday eingbay unworthyay otay ebay omparedcay ithway ishay
iendfray.

mray. Ingleybay adhay oonsay ademay imselfhay acquainteday ithway allay ethay incipalpray
eoplepay inay ethay oomray: ehay asway ivelylay anday unreserveday, ancedday everyay anceday,
asway angryay atthay ethay allbay osedclay osay earlyay, anday alkedtay ofay ivinggay oneay
imselfhay atay Etherfieldnay. Uchsay amiableay ualitiesqay ustmay eakspay orfay
emselvesthay. Atwhay aay ontrastcay etweenbay imhay anday ishay iendfray! mray. Arcyday ancedday
onlyay onceay ithway mrsay. Ursthay anday onceay ithway Issmay Ingleybay, eclinedday eingbay
introduceday otay anyay otheray adylay, anday entspay ethay estray ofay ethay eveningay inay
alkingway aboutay ethay oomray, eakingspay occasionallyay otay oneay ofay ishay ownay artypay.
Ishay aracterchay asway ecidedday. Ehay asway ethay oudestpray, ostmay isagreeableday anmay inay
ethay orldway, anday everybodyay opedhay atthay ehay ouldway evernay omecay erethay againay.
Amongstay ethay ostmay iolentvay againstay imhay asway mrsay. Ennetbay, osewhay islikeday ofay
ishay eneralgay ehaviourbay asway arpenedshay intoay articularpay esentmentray byay ishay
avinghay ightedslay oneay ofay erhay aughtersday.

Elizabethay Ennetbay adhay eenbay obligeday, byay ethay arcityscay ofay entlemengay, otay itsay
ownday orfay otway ancesday; anday uringday artpay ofay atthay imetay, mray. Arcyday adhay eenbay
andingstay earnay enoughay orfay erhay otay overhearay aay onversationcay etweenbay imhay anday
mray. Ingleybay, owhay amecay omfray ethay anceday orfay aay ewfay inutesmay otay esspray ishay
iendfray otay oinjay itay.

oMe“cay, Arcyday,” aidsay ehay, i“ay ustmay avehay ouyay anceday. Iay atehay otay eesay ouyay
andingstay aboutay byay ourselfyay inay isthay upidstay annermay. Ouyay adhay uchmay etterbay
anceday.”

i“ay ertainlycay allshay otnay. Ouyay owknay owhay Iay etestday itay, unlessay Iay amay
articularlypay acquainteday ithway myay artnerpay. Atay uchsay anay assemblyay asay isthay, itay
ouldway ebay insupportableay. Ouryay isterssay areay engageday, anday erethay isay otnay
anotheray omanway inay ethay oomray omwhay itay ouldway otnay ebay aay unishmentpay otay emay otay
andstay upay ithway.”

i“ay ouldway otnay ebay osay astidiousfay asay ouyay areay,” iedcray Ingleybay, or“fay aay
ingdomkay! Uponay myay onourhay, Iay evernay etmay ithway osay anymay easantplay irlsgay inay myay
ifelay asay Iay avehay isthay eveningay; anday erethay areay everalsay ofay emthay, ouyay eesay,
uncommonlyay ettypray.”

ou“_yay_ areay ancingday ithway ethay onlyay andsomehay irlgay inay ethay oomray,” aidsay mray.
Arcyday, ookinglay atay ethay eldestay Issmay Ennetbay.

oH“ay, eshay isay ethay ostmay eautifulbay eaturecray Iay everay eheldbay! Utbay erethay isay oneay
ofay erhay isterssay ittingsay ownday ustjay ehindbay ouyay, owhay isay eryvay ettypray, anday Iay
areday aysay eryvay agreeableay. Oday etlay emay askay myay artnerpay otay introduceay ouyay.”

iLlustration[ay:

e“shay isay olerabletay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

iCh“whay oday ouyay eanmay?” anday urningtay oundray, ehay ookedlay orfay aay omentmay atay
Elizabethay, illtay, atchingcay erhay eyeay, ehay ithdrewway ishay ownay, anday oldlycay aidsay,
e“shay isay olerabletay: utbay otnay andsomehay enoughay otay empttay e_may_; anday Iay amay inay onay
umourhay atay esentpray otay ivegay onsequencecay otay oungyay adieslay owhay areay ightedslay
byay otheray enmay. Ouyay adhay etterbay eturnray otay ouryay artnerpay anday enjoyay erhay
ilessmay, orfay ouyay areay astingway ouryay imetay ithway emay.”

mray. Ingleybay ollowedfay ishay adviceay. mray. Arcyday alkedway offay; anday Elizabethay
emainedray ithway onay eryvay ordialcay eelingsfay owardstay imhay. Eshay oldtay ethay orystay,
oweverhay, ithway eatgray iritspay amongay erhay iendsfray; orfay eshay adhay aay ivelylay,
ayfulplay ispositionday, ichwhay elightedday inay anythingay idiculousray.

Ethay eveningay altogetheray assedpay offay easantlyplay otay ethay olewhay amilyfay. mrsay.
Ennetbay adhay eensay erhay eldestay aughterday uchmay admireday byay ethay Etherfieldnay
artypay. mray. Ingleybay adhay ancedday ithway erhay icetway, anday eshay adhay eenbay
istinguishedday byay ishay isterssay. Anejay asway asay uchmay atifiedgray byay isthay asay erhay
othermay ouldcay ebay, oughthay inay aay uieterqay ayway. Elizabethay eltfay Ane’sjay
easureplay. Arymay adhay eardhay erselfhay entionedmay otay Issmay Ingleybay asay ethay ostmay
accomplisheday irlgay inay ethay eighbourhoodnay; anday Atherinecay anday Ialyday adhay eenbay
ortunatefay enoughay otay ebay evernay ithoutway artnerspay, ichwhay asway allay atthay eythay
adhay etyay earntlay otay arecay orfay atay aay allbay. Eythay eturnedray, ereforethay, inay oodgay
iritsspay otay Ongbournlay, ethay illagevay erewhay eythay ivedlay, anday ofay ichwhay eythay
ereway ethay incipalpray inhabitantsay. Eythay oundfay mray. Ennetbay illstay upay. Ithway aay
ookbay, ehay asway egardlessray ofay imetay; anday onay ethay esentpray occasionay ehay adhay aay
oodgay ealday ofay uriositycay asay otay ethay eventay ofay anay eveningay ichwhay adhay aisedray
uchsay endidsplay expectationsay. Ehay adhay atherray opedhay atthay allay ishay ife’sway
iewsvay onay ethay angerstray ouldway ebay isappointedday; utbay ehay oonsay oundfay atthay ehay
adhay aay eryvay ifferentday orystay otay earhay.

oH“ay, myay earday mray. Ennetbay,” asay eshay entereday ethay oomray, e“way avehay adhay aay ostmay
elightfulday eveningay, aay ostmay excellentay allbay. Iay ishway ouyay adhay eenbay erethay.
Anejay asway osay admireday, othingnay ouldcay ebay ikelay itay. Everybodyay aidsay owhay ellway
eshay ookedlay; anday mray. Ingleybay oughtthay erhay uiteqay eautifulbay, anday ancedday ithway
erhay icetway. Onlyay inkthay ofay at_thay_, myay earday: ehay actuallyay ancedday ithway erhay
icetway; anday eshay asway ethay onlyay eaturecray inay ethay oomray atthay ehay askeday aay econdsay
imetay. Irstfay ofay allay, ehay askeday Issmay Ucaslay. Iay asway osay exedvay otay eesay imhay andstay
upay ithway erhay; utbay, oweverhay, ehay idday otnay admireay erhay atay allay; indeeday, obodynay
ancay, ouyay owknay; anday ehay eemedsay uiteqay uckstray ithway Anejay asay eshay asway oinggay
ownday ethay anceday. Osay ehay inquireday owhay eshay asway, anday otgay introduceday, anday
askeday erhay orfay ethay otway extnay. Enthay, ethay otway irdthay ehay ancedday ithway Issmay
Ingkay, anday ethay otway ourthfay ithway Ariamay Ucaslay, anday ethay otway ifthfay ithway Anejay
againay, anday ethay otway ixthsay ithway Izzylay, anday ethay oUlanger_bay_----”

iF“ay ehay adhay adhay anyay ompassioncay orfay e_may_,” iedcray erhay usbandhay impatientlyay,
e“hay ouldway otnay avehay ancedday alfhay osay uchmay! Orfay Od’sgay akesay, aysay onay oremay ofay
ishay artnerspay. Oay atthay ehay adhay ainedspray ishay ancleay inay ethay irstfay anceday!”

oH“ay, myay earday,” ontinuedcay mrsay. Ennetbay, i“ay amay uiteqay elightedday ithway imhay. Ehay
isay osay excessivelyay andsomehay! anday ishay isterssay areay armingchay omenway. Iay evernay
inay myay ifelay awsay anythingay oremay elegantay anthay eirthay essesdray. Iay areday aysay ethay
acelay uponay mrsay. Urst’shay owngay----”

Erehay eshay asway interrupteday againay. mray. Ennetbay otestedpray againstay anyay
escriptionday ofay ineryfay. Eshay asway ereforethay obligeday otay eeksay anotheray anchbray
ofay ethay ubjectsay, anday elatedray, ithway uchmay itternessbay ofay iritspay, anday omesay
exaggerationay, ethay ockingshay udenessray ofay mray. Arcyday.

uT“bay Iay ancay assureay ouyay,” eshay addeday, at“thay Izzylay oesday otnay oselay uchmay byay otnay
uitingsay is_hay_ ancyfay; orfay ehay isay aay ostmay isagreeableday, orridhay anmay, otnay atay
allay orthway easingplay. Osay ighhay anday osay onceitedcay, atthay erethay asway onay enduringay
imhay! Ehay alkedway erehay, anday ehay alkedway erethay, ancyingfay imselfhay osay eryvay
eatgray! Otnay andsomehay enoughay otay anceday ithway! Iay ishway ouyay adhay eenbay erethay, myay
earday, otay avehay ivengay imhay oneay ofay ouryay et-downssay. Iay uiteqay etestday ethay anmay.”




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IVay.


iLlustration[ay]

Enwhay Anejay anday Elizabethay ereway aloneay, ethay ormerfay, owhay adhay eenbay autiouscay inay
erhay aisepray ofay mray. Ingleybay eforebay, expresseday otay erhay istersay owhay eryvay uchmay
eshay admireday imhay.

e“hay isay ustjay atwhay aay oung-manyay oughtay otay ebay,” aidsay eshay, ensible“say,
ood-humouredgay, ivelylay; anday Iay evernay awsay uchsay appyhay annersmay! osay uchmay easeay,
ithway uchsay erfectpay oodgay eedingbray!”

e“hay isay alsoay andsomehay,” epliedray Elizabethay, ich“whay aay oungyay anmay oughtay
ikewiselay otay ebay ifay ehay ossiblypay ancay. Ishay aracterchay isay erebythay ompletecay.”

i“ay asway eryvay uchmay atteredflay byay ishay askingay emay otay anceday aay econdsay imetay. Iay
idday otnay expectay uchsay aay omplimentcay.”

iD“day otnay ouyay? i_ay_ idday orfay ouyay. Utbay atthay isay oneay eatgray ifferenceday etweenbay
usay. Omplimentscay alwaysay aketay ou_yay_ byay urprisesay, anday e_may_ evernay. Atwhay
ouldcay ebay oremay aturalnay anthay ishay askingay ouyay againay? Ehay ouldcay otnay elphay
eeingsay atthay ouyay ereway aboutay ivefay imestay asay ettypray asay everyay otheray omanway inay
ethay oomray. Onay anksthay otay ishay allantrygay orfay atthay. Ellway, ehay ertainlycay isay
eryvay agreeableay, anday Iay ivegay ouyay eavelay otay ikelay imhay. Ouyay avehay ikedlay anymay aay
upiderstay ersonpay.”

eAr“day Izzylay!”

oH“ay, ouyay areay aay eatgray ealday ootay aptay, ouyay owknay, otay ikelay eoplepay inay eneralgay.
Ouyay evernay eesay aay aultfay inay anybodyay. Allay ethay orldway areay oodgay anday agreeableay
inay ouryay eyesay. Iay evernay eardhay ouyay eakspay illay ofay aay umanhay eingbay inay myay ifelay.”

i“ay ouldway ishway otnay otay ebay astyhay inay ensuringcay anyoneay; utbay Iay alwaysay eakspay
atwhay Iay inkthay.”

i“ay owknay ouyay oday: anday itay isay at_thay_ ichwhay akesmay ethay onderway. Ithway our_yay_
oodgay ensesay, otay ebay osay onestlyhay indblay otay ethay olliesfay anday onsensenay ofay
othersay! Affectationay ofay andourcay isay ommoncay enoughay; oneay eetsmay ithway itay
everywhereay. Utbay otay ebay andidcay ithoutway ostentationay oray esign,--today aketay ethay
oodgay ofay everybody’say aracterchay anday akemay itay illstay etterbay, anday aysay othingnay
ofay ethay ad,--belongsbay otay ouyay aloneay. Anday osay, ouyay ikelay isthay an’smay isterssay,
ootay, oday ouyay? Eirthay annersmay areay otnay equalay otay ishay.”

eRtainly“cay otnay, atay irstfay; utbay eythay areay eryvay easingplay omenway enwhay ouyay
onversecay ithway emthay. Issmay Ingleybay isay otay ivelay ithway erhay otherbray, anday eepkay
ishay ousehay; anday Iay amay uchmay istakenmay ifay eway allshay otnay indfay aay eryvay armingchay
eighbournay inay erhay.”

Elizabethay istenedlay inay ilencesay, utbay asway otnay onvincedcay: eirthay ehaviourbay atay
ethay assemblyay adhay otnay eenbay alculatedcay otay easeplay inay eneralgay; anday ithway oremay
uicknessqay ofay observationay anday esslay iancyplay ofay empertay anthay erhay istersay, anday
ithway aay udgmentjay, ootay, unassaileday byay anyay attentionay otay erselfhay, eshay asway
eryvay ittlelay isposedday otay approveay emthay. Eythay ereway, inay actfay, eryvay inefay
adieslay; otnay eficientday inay ood-humourgay enwhay eythay ereway easedplay, ornay inay ethay
owerpay ofay eingbay agreeableay erewhay eythay osechay itay; utbay oudpray anday onceitedcay.
Eythay ereway atherray andsomehay; adhay eenbay educateday inay oneay ofay ethay irstfay ivatepray
eminariessay inay owntay; adhay aay ortunefay ofay entytway ousandthay oundspay; ereway inay ethay
abithay ofay endingspay oremay anthay eythay oughtay, anday ofay associatingay ithway eoplepay
ofay ankray; anday ereway, ereforethay, inay everyay espectray entitleday otay inkthay ellway ofay
emselvesthay anday eanlymay ofay othersay. Eythay ereway ofay aay espectableray amilyfay inay
ethay orthnay ofay Englanday; aay ircumstancecay oremay eeplyday impresseday onay eirthay
emoriesmay anthay atthay eirthay other’sbray ortunefay anday eirthay ownay adhay eenbay
acquireday byay adetray.

mray. Ingleybay inheriteday opertypray otay ethay amountay ofay earlynay aay undredhay
ousandthay oundspay omfray ishay atherfay, owhay adhay intendeday otay urchasepay anay estateay,
utbay idday otnay ivelay otay oday itay. mray. Ingleybay intendeday itay ikewiselay, anday
ometimessay ademay oicechay ofay ishay ountycay; utbay, asay ehay asway ownay ovidedpray ithway aay
oodgay ousehay anday ethay ibertylay ofay aay anormay, itay asway oubtfulday otay anymay ofay osethay
owhay estbay ewknay ethay easinessay ofay ishay empertay, etherwhay ehay ightmay otnay endspay ethay
emainderray ofay ishay aysday atay Etherfieldnay, anday eavelay ethay extnay enerationgay otay
urchasepay.

Ishay isterssay ereway eryvay anxiousay orfay ishay avinghay anay estateay ofay ishay ownay; utbay
oughthay ehay asway ownay establisheday onlyay asay aay enanttay, Issmay Ingleybay asway byay onay
eansmay unwillingay otay esidepray atay ishay abletay; ornay asway mrsay. Ursthay, owhay adhay
arriedmay aay anmay ofay oremay ashionfay anthay ortunefay, esslay isposedday otay onsidercay
ishay ousehay asay erhay omehay enwhay itay uitedsay erhay. mray. Ingleybay adhay otnay eenbay ofay
ageay otway earsyay enwhay ehay asway emptedtay, byay anay accidentalay ecommendationray, otay
ooklay atay Etherfieldnay Ousehay. Ehay idday ooklay atay itay, anday intoay itay, orfay alfhay anay
ourhay; asway easedplay ithway ethay ituationsay anday ethay incipalpray oomsray, atisfiedsay
ithway atwhay ethay owneray aidsay inay itsay aisepray, anday ooktay itay immediatelyay.

Etweenbay imhay anday Arcyday erethay asway aay eryvay eadystay iendshipfray, inay itespay ofay aay
eatgray oppositionay ofay aracterchay. Ingleybay asway endeareday otay Arcyday byay ethay
easinessay, opennessay, anday uctilityday ofay ishay empertay, oughthay onay ispositionday
ouldcay offeray aay eatergray ontrastcay otay ishay ownay, anday oughthay ithway ishay ownay ehay
evernay appeareday issatisfiedday. Onay ethay engthstray ofay Arcy’sday egardray, Ingleybay
adhay ethay irmestfay elianceray, anday ofay ishay udgmentjay ethay ighesthay opinionay. Inay
understandingay, Arcyday asway ethay uperiorsay. Ingleybay asway byay onay eansmay
eficientday; utbay Arcyday asway everclay. Ehay asway atay ethay amesay imetay aughtyhay,
eservedray, anday astidiousfay; anday ishay annersmay, oughthay ellway edbray, ereway otnay
invitingay. Inay atthay espectray ishay iendfray adhay eatlygray ethay advantageay. Ingleybay
asway uresay ofay eingbay ikedlay ereverwhay ehay appeareday; Arcyday asway ontinuallycay
ivinggay offenceay.

Ethay annermay inay ichwhay eythay okespay ofay ethay Erytonmay assemblyay asway ufficientlysay
aracteristicchay. Ingleybay adhay evernay etmay ithway easanterplay eoplepay oray ettierpray
irlsgay inay ishay ifelay; everybodyay adhay eenbay ostmay indkay anday attentiveay otay imhay;
erethay adhay eenbay onay ormalityfay, onay iffnessstay; ehay adhay oonsay eltfay acquainteday
ithway allay ethay oomray; anday asay otay Issmay Ennetbay, ehay ouldcay otnay onceivecay anay angelay
oremay eautifulbay. Arcyday, onay ethay ontrarycay, adhay eensay aay ollectioncay ofay eoplepay
inay omwhay erethay asway ittlelay eautybay anday onay ashionfay, orfay onenay ofay omwhay ehay adhay
eltfay ethay allestsmay interestay, anday omfray onenay eceivedray eitheray attentionay oray
easureplay. Issmay Ennetbay ehay acknowledgeday otay ebay ettypray; utbay eshay iledsmay ootay
uchmay.

mrsay. Ursthay anday erhay istersay alloweday itay otay ebay osay; utbay illstay eythay admireday
erhay anday ikedlay erhay, anday onouncedpray erhay otay ebay aay eetsway irlgay, anday oneay omwhay
eythay ouldshay otnay objectay otay owknay oremay ofay. Issmay Ennetbay asway ereforethay
establisheday asay aay eetsway irlgay; anday eirthay otherbray eltfay authorizeday byay uchsay
ommendationcay otay inkthay ofay erhay asay ehay osechay.




iLlustration[ay: opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay vay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ithinway aay ortshay alkway ofay Ongbournlay ivedlay aay amilyfay ithway omwhay ethay Ennetsbay
ereway articularlypay intimateay. Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay adhay eenbay ormerlyfay inay adetray
inay Erytonmay, erewhay ehay adhay ademay aay olerabletay ortunefay, anday isenray otay ethay
onourhay ofay ighthoodknay byay anay addressay otay ethay ingkay uringday ishay ayoraltymay. Ethay
istinctionday adhay, erhapspay, eenbay eltfay ootay onglystray. Itay adhay ivengay imhay aay
isgustday otay ishay usinessbay anday otay ishay esidenceray inay aay allsmay arketmay owntay;
anday, uittingqay emthay othbay, ehay adhay emovedray ithway ishay amilyfay otay aay ousehay aboutay
aay ilemay omfray Erytonmay, enominatedday omfray atthay eriodpay Ucaslay Odgelay; erewhay ehay
ouldcay inkthay ithway easureplay ofay ishay ownay importanceay, anday, unshackleday byay
usinessbay, occupyay imselfhay olelysay inay eingbay ivilcay otay allay ethay orldway. Orfay,
oughthay elateday byay ishay ankray, itay idday otnay enderray imhay upercilioussay; onay ethay
ontrarycay, ehay asway allay attentionay otay everybodyay. byay aturenay inoffensiveay,
iendlyfray, anday obligingay, ishay esentationpray atay stay. Ames’sjay adhay ademay imhay
ourteouscay.

Adylay Ucaslay asway aay eryvay oodgay indkay ofay omanway, otnay ootay everclay otay ebay aay
aluablevay eighbournay otay mrsay. Ennetbay. Eythay adhay everalsay ildrenchay. Ethay eldestay
ofay emthay, aay ensiblesay, intelligentay oungyay omanway, aboutay enty-seventway, asway
Elizabeth’say intimateay iendfray.

Atthay ethay Issmay Ucaseslay anday ethay Issmay Ennetsbay ouldshay eetmay otay alktay overay aay
allbay asway absolutelyay ecessarynay; anday ethay orningmay afteray ethay assemblyay
oughtbray ethay ormerfay otay Ongbournlay otay earhay anday otay ommunicatecay.

ou“_yay_ eganbay ethay eveningay ellway, Arlottechay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, ithway ivilcay
elf-commandsay, otay Issmay Ucaslay. ou“_yay_ ereway mray. Ingley’sbay irstfay oicechay.”

eS“yay; utbay ehay eemedsay otay ikelay ishay econdsay etterbay.”

oH“ay, ouyay eanmay Anejay, Iay upposesay, ecausebay ehay ancedday ithway erhay icetway. Otay ebay
uresay atthay id_day_ eemsay asay ifay ehay admireday er--indeedhay, Iay atherray elievebay ehay
id_--i_day eardhay omethingsay aboutay it--butay Iay ardlyhay owknay at--somethingwhay
aboutay mray. Obinsonray.”

eRhaps“pay ouyay eanmay atwhay Iay overhearday etweenbay imhay anday mray. Obinsonray: idday otnay
Iay entionmay itay otay ouyay? mray. Obinson’sray askingay imhay owhay ehay ikedlay ouray Erytonmay
assembliesay, anday etherwhay ehay idday otnay inkthay erethay ereway aay eatgray anymay ettypray
omenway inay ethay oomray, anday ich_whay_ ehay oughtthay ethay ettiestpray? anday ishay
answeringay immediatelyay otay ethay astlay uestionqay, oH‘ay, ethay eldestay Issmay Ennetbay,
eyondbay aay oubtday: erethay annotcay ebay otway opinionsay onay atthay ointpay.’”

uPon“ay myay ordway! Ellway, atthay asway eryvay ecidedday, indeed--thatay oesday eemsay asay
if--butay, oweverhay, itay aymay allay omecay otay othingnay, ouyay owknay.”

“_myay_ overhearingsay ereway oremay otay ethay urposepay anthay ours_yay_, Elizaay,” aidsay
Arlottechay. “mray. Arcyday isay otnay osay ellway orthway isteninglay otay asay ishay iendfray,
isay ehay? Oorpay Elizaay! otay ebay onlyay ustjay olerable_tay_.”

i“ay egbay ouyay illway otnay utpay itay intoay Izzy’slay eadhay otay ebay exedvay byay ishay
ill-treatmentay, orfay ehay isay uchsay aay isagreeableday anmay atthay itay ouldway ebay uiteqay
aay isfortunemay otay ebay ikedlay byay imhay. mrsay. Onglay oldtay emay astlay ightnay atthay ehay
atsay oseclay otay erhay orfay alfhay anay ourhay ithoutway onceay openingay ishay ipslay.”

iLlustration[ay: iThout“way onceay openingay ishay ipslay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

aRe“ay ouyay uiteqay uresay, a’ammay? Isay otnay erethay aay ittlelay istakemay?” aidsay Anejay.
i“ay ertainlycay awsay mray. Arcyday eakingspay otay erhay.”

aY“ay, ecausebay eshay askeday imhay atay astlay owhay ehay ikedlay Etherfieldnay, anday ehay
ouldcay otnay elphay answeringay erhay; utbay eshay aidsay ehay eemedsay eryvay angryay atay eingbay
okespay otay.”

iSs“may Ingleybay oldtay emay,” aidsay Anejay, at“thay ehay evernay eaksspay uchmay unlessay
amongay ishay intimateay acquaintanceay. Ithway em_thay_ ehay isay emarkablyray
agreeableay.”

i“ay oday otnay elievebay aay ordway ofay itay, myay earday. Ifay ehay adhay eenbay osay eryvay
agreeableay, ehay ouldway avehay alkedtay otay mrsay. Onglay. Utbay Iay ancay uessgay owhay itay
asway; everybodyay ayssay atthay ehay isay eatay upay ithway idepray, anday Iay areday aysay ehay adhay
eardhay omehowsay atthay mrsay. Onglay oesday otnay eepkay aay arriagecay, anday adhay otay omecay
otay ethay allbay inay aay ackhay aisechay.”

i“ay oday otnay indmay ishay otnay alkingtay otay mrsay. Onglay,” aidsay Issmay Ucaslay, ut“bay Iay
ishway ehay adhay ancedday ithway Elizaay.”

aNother“ay imetay, Izzylay,” aidsay erhay othermay, i“ay ouldway otnay anceday ithway im_hay_,
ifay Iay ereway ouyay.”

i“ay elievebay, a’ammay, Iay aymay afelysay omisepray ouyay ever_nay_ otay anceday ithway imhay.”

iS“hay idepray,” aidsay Issmay Ucaslay, oes“day otnay offenday e_may_ osay uchmay asay idepray
oftenay oesday, ecausebay erethay isay anay excuseay orfay itay. Oneay annotcay onderway atthay osay
eryvay inefay aay oungyay anmay, ithway amilyfay, ortunefay, everythingay inay ishay avourfay,
ouldshay inkthay ighlyhay ofay imselfhay. Ifay Iay aymay osay expressay itay, ehay ashay aay ight_ray_
otay ebay oudpray.”

aT“thay isay eryvay uetray,” epliedray Elizabethay, and“ay Iay ouldcay easilyay orgivefay
is_hay_ idepray, ifay ehay adhay otnay ortifiedmay ine_may_.”

iDe“pray,” observeday Arymay, owhay iquedpay erselfhay uponay ethay oliditysay ofay erhay
eflectionsray, is“ay aay eryvay ommoncay ailingfay, Iay elievebay. byay allay atthay Iay avehay
everay eadray, Iay amay onvincedcay atthay itay isay eryvay ommoncay indeeday; atthay umanhay
aturenay isay articularlypay onepray otay itay, anday atthay erethay areay eryvay ewfay ofay usay
owhay oday otnay erishchay aay eelingfay ofay elf-complacencysay onay ethay orescay ofay omesay
ualityqay oray otheray, ealray oray imaginaryay. Anityvay anday idepray areay ifferentday
ingsthay, oughthay ethay ordsway areay oftenay useday onymouslysynay. Aay ersonpay aymay ebay
oudpray ithoutway eingbay ainvay. Idepray elatesray oremay otay ouray opinionay ofay
ourselvesay; anityvay otay atwhay eway ouldway avehay othersay inkthay ofay usay.”

iF“ay Iay ereway asay ichray asay mray. Arcyday,” iedcray aay oungyay Ucaslay, owhay amecay ithway ishay
isterssay, i“ay ouldshay otnay arecay owhay oudpray Iay asway. Iay ouldway eepkay aay ackpay ofay
oxhoundsfay, anday inkdray aay ottlebay ofay ineway everyay ayday.”

eN“thay ouyay ouldway inkdray aay eatgray ealday oremay anthay ouyay oughtay,” aidsay mrsay.
Ennetbay; and“ay ifay Iay ereway otay eesay ouyay atay itay, Iay ouldshay aketay awayay ouryay ottlebay
irectlyday.”

Ethay oybay otestedpray atthay eshay ouldshay otnay; eshay ontinuedcay otay eclareday atthay eshay
ouldway; anday ethay argumentay endeday onlyay ithway ethay isitvay.

iLlustration[ay]




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay Ivay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay adieslay ofay Ongbournlay oonsay aitedway onay osethay ofay Etherfieldnay. Ethay isitvay
asway eturnedray inay ueday ormfay. Issmay Ennet’sbay easingplay annersmay ewgray onay ethay
ood-willgay ofay mrsay. Ursthay anday Issmay Ingleybay; anday oughthay ethay othermay asway
oundfay otay ebay intolerableay, anday ethay oungeryay isterssay otnay orthway eakingspay otay,
aay ishway ofay eingbay etterbay acquainteday ithway em_thay_ asway expresseday owardstay ethay
otway eldestay. byay Anejay isthay attentionay asway eceivedray ithway ethay eatestgray
easureplay; utbay Elizabethay illstay awsay uperciliousnesssay inay eirthay eatmenttray ofay
everybodyay, ardlyhay exceptingay evenay erhay istersay, anday ouldcay otnay ikelay emthay;
oughthay eirthay indnesskay otay Anejay, uchsay asay itay asway, adhay aay aluevay, asay arisingay,
inay allay obabilitypray, omfray ethay influenceay ofay eirthay other’sbray admirationay. Itay
asway enerallygay evidentay, eneverwhay eythay etmay, atthay ehay id_day_ admireay erhay; anday
otay er_hay_ itay asway equallyay evidentay atthay Anejay asway ieldingyay otay ethay eferencepray
ichwhay eshay adhay egunbay otay entertainay orfay imhay omfray ethay irstfay, anday asway inay aay
ayway otay ebay eryvay uchmay inay ovelay; utbay eshay onsideredcay ithway easureplay atthay itay
asway otnay ikelylay otay ebay iscoveredday byay ethay orldway inay eneralgay, incesay Anejay
uniteday ithway eatgray engthstray ofay eelingfay, aay omposurecay ofay empertay anday anay
uniformay eerfulnesschay ofay annermay, ichwhay ouldway uardgay erhay omfray ethay
uspicionssay ofay ethay impertinentay. Eshay entionedmay isthay otay erhay iendfray, Issmay
Ucaslay.

iT“ay aymay, erhapspay, ebay easantplay,” epliedray Arlottechay, o“tay ebay ableay otay imposeay
onay ethay ublicpay inay uchsay aay asecay; utbay itay isay ometimessay aay isadvantageday otay ebay
osay eryvay uardedgay. Ifay aay omanway oncealscay erhay affectionay ithway ethay amesay illskay
omfray ethay objectay ofay itay, eshay aymay oselay ethay opportunityay ofay ixingfay imhay; anday
itay illway enthay ebay utbay oorpay onsolationcay otay elievebay ethay orldway equallyay inay ethay
arkday. Erethay isay osay uchmay ofay atitudegray oray anityvay inay almostay everyay
attachmentay, atthay itay isay otnay afesay otay eavelay anyay otay itselfay. Eway ancay allay
egin_bay_ eely--afray ightslay eferencepray isay aturalnay enoughay; utbay erethay areay
eryvay ewfay ofay usay owhay avehay earthay enoughay otay ebay eallyray inay ovelay ithoutway
encouragementay. Inay inenay asescay outay ofay entay, aay omanway adhay etterbay owshay ore_may_
affectionay anthay eshay eelsfay. Ingleybay ikeslay ouryay istersay undoubtedlyay; utbay ehay
aymay evernay oday oremay anthay ikelay erhay, ifay eshay oesday otnay elphay imhay onay.”

uT“bay eshay oesday elphay imhay onay, asay uchmay asay erhay aturenay illway alloway. Ifay i_ay_ ancay
erceivepay erhay egardray orfay imhay, ehay ustmay ebay aay impletonsay indeeday otnay otay
iscoverday itay ootay.”

eMember“ray, Elizaay, atthay ehay oesday otnay owknay Ane’sjay ispositionday asay ouyay oday.”

uT“bay ifay aay omanway isay artialpay otay aay anmay, anday oesday otnay endeavoray otay oncealcay
itay, ehay ustmay indfay itay outay.”

eRhaps“pay ehay ustmay, ifay ehay eessay enoughay ofay erhay. Utbay oughthay Ingleybay anday Anejay
eetmay olerablytay oftenay, itay isay evernay orfay anymay ourshay ogethertay; anday asay eythay
alwaysay eesay eachay otheray inay argelay ixedmay artiespay, itay isay impossibleay atthay
everyay omentmay ouldshay ebay employeday inay onversingcay ogethertay. Anejay ouldshay
ereforethay akemay ethay ostmay ofay everyay alfhay ourhay inay ichwhay eshay ancay ommandcay ishay
attentionay. Enwhay eshay isay ecuresay ofay imhay, erethay illway ebay eisurelay orfay allingfay
inay ovelay asay uchmay asay eshay ooseschay.”

oUr“yay anplay isay aay oodgay oneay,” epliedray Elizabethay, ere“whay othingnay isay inay
