uestionqay utbay ethay esireday ofay eingbay ellway arriedmay; anday ifay Iay ereway eterminedday
otay etgay aay ichray usbandhay, oray anyay usbandhay, Iay areday aysay Iay ouldshay adoptay itay. Utbay
esethay areay otnay Ane’sjay eelingsfay; eshay isay otnay actingay byay esignday. Asay etyay eshay
annotcay evenay ebay ertaincay ofay ethay egreeday ofay erhay ownay egardray, ornay ofay itsay
easonablenessray. Eshay ashay ownknay imhay onlyay aay ortnightfay. Eshay ancedday ourfay
ancesday ithway imhay atay Erytonmay; eshay awsay imhay oneay orningmay atay ishay ownay ousehay,
anday ashay incesay inedday inay ompanycay ithway imhay ourfay imestay. Isthay isay otnay uiteqay
enoughay otay akemay erhay understanday ishay aracterchay.”

oT“nay asay ouyay epresentray itay. Adhay eshay erelymay ined_day_ ithway imhay, eshay ightmay
onlyay avehay iscoveredday etherwhay ehay adhay aay oodgay appetiteay; utbay ouyay ustmay
ememberray atthay ourfay eveningsay avehay eenbay alsoay entspay ogether--andtay ourfay
eveningsay aymay oday aay eatgray ealday.”

eS“yay: esethay ourfay eveningsay avehay enableday emthay otay ascertainay atthay eythay othbay
ikelay Ingt-unvay etterbay anthay Ommercecay, utbay ithway espectray otay anyay otheray
eadinglay aracteristicchay, Iay oday otnay imagineay atthay uchmay ashay eenbay unfoldeday.”

eLl“way,” aidsay Arlottechay, i“ay ishway Anejay uccesssay ithway allay myay earthay; anday ifay
eshay ereway arriedmay otay imhay o-morrowtay, Iay ouldshay inkthay eshay adhay asay oodgay aay
ancechay ofay appinesshay asay ifay eshay ereway otay ebay udyingstay ishay aracterchay orfay aay
elvemonthtway. Appinesshay inay arriagemay isay entirelyay aay attermay ofay ancechay. Ifay
ethay ispositionsday ofay ethay artiespay areay everay osay ellway ownknay otay eachay otheray, oray
everay osay imilarsay eforehandbay, itay oesday otnay advanceay eirthay elicityfay inay ethay
eastlay. Eythay alwaysay ontinuecay otay owgray ufficientlysay unlikeay afterwardsay otay
avehay eirthay areshay ofay exationvay; anday itay isay etterbay otay owknay asay ittlelay asay
ossiblepay ofay ethay efectsday ofay ethay ersonpay ithway omwhay ouyay areay otay asspay ouryay
ifelay.”

oU“yay akemay emay aughlay, Arlottechay; utbay itay isay otnay oundsay. Ouyay owknay itay isay otnay
oundsay, anday atthay ouyay ouldway evernay actay inay isthay ayway ourselfyay.”

Occupieday inay observingay mray. Ingley’sbay attentionay otay erhay istersay, Elizabethay
asway arfay omfray uspectingsay atthay eshay asway erselfhay ecomingbay anay objectay ofay omesay
interestay inay ethay eyesay ofay ishay iendfray. mray. Arcyday adhay atay irstfay arcelyscay
alloweday erhay otay ebay ettypray: ehay adhay ookedlay atay erhay ithoutway admirationay atay ethay
allbay; anday enwhay eythay extnay etmay, ehay ookedlay atay erhay onlyay otay iticisecray. Utbay onay
oonersay adhay ehay ademay itay earclay otay imselfhay anday ishay iendsfray atthay eshay adhay
ardlyhay aay oodgay eaturefay inay erhay acefay, anthay ehay eganbay otay indfay itay asway enderedray
uncommonlyay intelligentay byay ethay eautifulbay expressionay ofay erhay arkday eyesay. Otay
isthay iscoveryday ucceededsay omesay othersay equallyay ortifyingmay. Oughthay ehay adhay
etectedday ithway aay iticalcray eyeay oremay anthay oneay ailurefay ofay erfectpay etrysymmay
inay erhay ormfay, ehay asway orcedfay otay acknowledgeay erhay igurefay otay ebay ightlay anday
easingplay; anday inay itespay ofay ishay assertingay atthay erhay annersmay ereway otnay osethay
ofay ethay ashionablefay orldway, ehay asway aughtcay byay eirthay easyay ayfulnessplay. Ofay
isthay eshay asway erfectlypay unawareay: otay erhay ehay asway onlyay ethay anmay owhay ademay
imselfhay agreeableay owherenay, anday owhay adhay otnay oughtthay erhay andsomehay enoughay
otay anceday ithway.

Ehay eganbay otay ishway otay owknay oremay ofay erhay; anday, asay aay epstay owardstay onversingcay
ithway erhay imselfhay, attendeday otay erhay onversationcay ithway othersay. Ishay oingday osay
ewdray erhay oticenay. Itay asway atay Irsay Illiamway Ucas’slay, erewhay aay argelay artypay ereway
assembleday.

aT“whay oesday mray. Arcyday eanmay,” aidsay eshay otay Arlottechay, “byay isteninglay otay myay
onversationcay ithway Olonelcay Orsterfay?”

aT“thay isay aay uestionqay ichwhay mray. Arcyday onlyay ancay answeray.”

uT“bay ifay ehay oesday itay anyay oremay, Iay allshay ertainlycay etlay imhay owknay atthay Iay eesay
atwhay ehay isay aboutay. Ehay ashay aay eryvay atiricalsay eyeay, anday ifay Iay oday otnay eginbay byay
eingbay impertinentay elfmysay, Iay allshay oonsay owgray afraiday ofay imhay.”

iLlustration[ay: e“thay entreatiesay ofay everalsay” opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay
Allenay._]]

Onay ishay approachingay emthay oonsay afterwardsay, oughthay ithoutway eemingsay otay avehay
anyay intentionay ofay eakingspay, Issmay Ucaslay efiedday erhay iendfray otay entionmay uchsay
aay ubjectsay otay imhay, ichwhay immediatelyay ovokingpray Elizabethay otay oday itay, eshay
urnedtay otay imhay anday aidsay,--

iD“day otnay ouyay inkthay, mray. Arcyday, atthay Iay expresseday elfmysay uncommonlyay ellway
ustjay ownay, enwhay Iay asway easingtay Olonelcay Orsterfay otay ivegay usay aay allbay atay
Erytonmay?”

iTh“way eatgray energyay; utbay itay isay aay ubjectsay ichwhay alwaysay akesmay aay adylay
energeticay.”

oU“yay areay everesay onay usay.”

iT“ay illway ebay er_hay_ urntay oonsay otay ebay easedtay,” aidsay Issmay Ucaslay. i“ay amay oinggay
otay openay ethay instrumentay, Elizaay, anday ouyay owknay atwhay ollowsfay.”

oU“yay areay aay eryvay angestray eaturecray byay ayway ofay aay iend!--alwaysfray antingway emay
otay ayplay anday ingsay eforebay anybodyay anday everybodyay! Ifay myay anityvay adhay akentay aay
usicalmay urntay, ouyay ouldway avehay eenbay invaluableay; utbay asay itay isay, Iay ouldway
eallyray atherray otnay itsay ownday eforebay osethay owhay ustmay ebay inay ethay abithay ofay
earinghay ethay eryvay estbay erformerspay.” Onay Issmay Ucas’slay erseveringpay, oweverhay,
eshay addeday, eRy“vay ellway; ifay itay ustmay ebay osay, itay ustmay.” Anday avelygray ancingglay
atay mray. Arcyday, eRe“thay isay aay eryvay inefay olday ayingsay, ichwhay everybodyay erehay isay
ofay oursecay amiliarfay ith--‘kEepway ouryay eathbray otay oolcay ouryay orridge,’--andpay
Iay allshay eepkay inemay otay ellsway myay ongsay.”

Erhay erformancepay asway easingplay, oughthay byay onay eansmay apitalcay. Afteray aay ongsay
oray otway, anday eforebay eshay ouldcay eplyray otay ethay entreatiesay ofay everalsay atthay eshay
ouldway ingsay againay, eshay asway eagerlyay ucceededsay atay ethay instrumentay byay erhay
istersay Arymay, owhay avinghay, inay onsequencecay ofay eingbay ethay onlyay ainplay oneay inay
ethay amilyfay, orkedway ardhay orfay owledgeknay anday accomplishmentsay, asway alwaysay
impatientay orfay isplayday.

Arymay adhay eithernay eniusgay ornay astetay; anday oughthay anityvay adhay ivengay erhay
applicationay, itay adhay ivengay erhay ikewiselay aay edanticpay airay anday onceitedcay
annermay, ichwhay ouldway avehay injureday aay igherhay egreeday ofay excellenceay anthay eshay
adhay eachedray. Elizabethay, easyay anday unaffecteday, adhay eenbay istenedlay otay ithway
uchmay oremay easureplay, oughthay otnay ayingplay alfhay osay ellway; anday Arymay, atay ethay
enday ofay aay onglay oncertocay, asway adglay otay urchasepay aisepray anday atitudegray byay
Otchscay anday Irishay airsay, atay ethay equestray ofay erhay oungeryay isterssay, owhay ithway
omesay ofay ethay Ucaseslay, anday otway oray eethray officersay, oinedjay eagerlyay inay
ancingday atay oneay enday ofay ethay oomray.

mray. Arcyday oodstay earnay emthay inay ilentsay indignationay atay uchsay aay odemay ofay
assingpay ethay eveningay, otay ethay exclusionay ofay allay onversationcay, anday asway ootay
uchmay engrosseday byay ishay ownay oughtsthay otay erceivepay atthay Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay
asway ishay eighbournay, illtay Irsay Illiamway usthay eganbay:--

aT“whay aay armingchay amusementay orfay oungyay eoplepay isthay isay, mray. Arcyday! Erethay isay
othingnay ikelay ancingday, afteray allay. Iay onsidercay itay asay oneay ofay ethay irstfay
efinementsray ofay olishedpay ocietiessay.”

eRtainly“cay, irsay; anday itay ashay ethay advantageay alsoay ofay eingbay inay oguevay amongstay
ethay esslay olishedpay ocietiessay ofay ethay orldway: everyay avagesay ancay anceday.”

Irsay Illiamway onlyay iledsmay. oUr“yay iendfray erformspay elightfullyday,” ehay
ontinuedcay, afteray aay ausepay, onay eeingsay Ingleybay oinjay ethay oupgray; and“ay Iay oubtday
otnay atthay ouyay areay anay adeptay inay ethay iencescay ourselfyay, mray. Arcyday.”

oU“yay awsay emay anceday atay Erytonmay, Iay elievebay, irsay.”

eS“yay, indeeday, anday eceivedray onay inconsiderableay easureplay omfray ethay ightsay. Oday
ouyay oftenay anceday atay stay. Ames’sjay?”

eVer“nay, irsay.”

o“day ouyay otnay inkthay itay ouldway ebay aay operpray omplimentcay otay ethay aceplay?”

iT“ay isay aay omplimentcay ichwhay Iay evernay aypay otay anyay aceplay ifay Iay ancay avoiday itay.”

oU“yay avehay aay ousehay inay owntay, Iay oncludecay?”

mray. Arcyday owedbay.

i“ay adhay onceay omesay oughtsthay ofay ixingfay inay owntay elfmysay, orfay Iay amay ondfay ofay
uperiorsay ocietysay; utbay Iay idday otnay eelfay uiteqay ertaincay atthay ethay airay ofay
Ondonlay ouldway agreeay ithway Adylay Ucaslay.”

Ehay ausedpay inay opeshay ofay anay answeray: utbay ishay ompanioncay asway otnay isposedday otay
akemay anyay; anday Elizabethay atay atthay instantay ovingmay owardstay emthay, ehay asway
uckstray ithway ethay otionnay ofay oingday aay eryvay allantgay ingthay, anday alledcay outay otay
erhay,--

“myay earday Issmay Elizaay, whyay areay otnay ouyay ancingday? mray. Arcyday, ouyay ustmay alloway
emay otay esentpray isthay oungyay adylay otay ouyay asay aay eryvay esirableday artnerpay. Ouyay
annotcay efuseray otay anceday, Iay amay uresay, enwhay osay uchmay eautybay isay eforebay ouyay.”
Anday, akingtay erhay andhay, ehay ouldway avehay ivengay itay otay mray. Arcyday, owhay, oughthay
extremelyay urprisedsay, asway otnay unwillingay otay eceiveray itay, enwhay eshay instantlyay
ewdray ackbay, anday aidsay ithway omesay iscomposureday otay Irsay Illiamway,--

iNdeed“ay, irsay, Iay avehay otnay ethay eastlay intentionay ofay ancingday. Iay entreatay ouyay
otnay otay upposesay atthay Iay ovedmay isthay ayway inay orderay otay egbay orfay aay artnerpay.”

mray. Arcyday, ithway avegray oprietypray, equestedray otay ebay alloweday ethay onourhay ofay
erhay andhay, utbay inay ainvay. Elizabethay asway eterminedday; ornay idday Irsay Illiamway atay
allay akeshay erhay urposepay byay ishay attemptay atay ersuasionpay.

oU“yay excelay osay uchmay inay ethay anceday, Issmay Elizaay, atthay itay isay uelcray otay enyday emay
ethay appinesshay ofay eeingsay ouyay; anday oughthay isthay entlemangay islikesday ethay
amusementay inay eneralgay, ehay ancay avehay onay objectionay, Iay amay uresay, otay obligeay usay
orfay oneay alfhay ourhay.”

“mray. Arcyday isay allay olitenesspay,” aidsay Elizabethay, ilingsmay.

e“hay isay, indeeday: utbay onsideringcay ethay inducementay, myay earday Issmay Elizaay, eway
annotcay onderway atay ishay omplaisancecay; orfay owhay ouldway objectay otay uchsay aay
artnerpay?”

Elizabethay ookedlay archlyay, anday urnedtay awayay. Erhay esistanceray adhay otnay injureday
erhay ithway ethay entlemangay, anday ehay asway inkingthay ofay erhay ithway omesay
omplacencycay, enwhay usthay accosteday byay Issmay Ingleybay,--

i“ay ancay uessgay ethay ubjectsay ofay ouryay everieray.”

i“ay ouldshay imagineay otnay.”

oU“yay areay onsideringcay owhay insupportableay itay ouldway ebay otay asspay anymay
eveningsay inay isthay anner,--inmay uchsay ocietysay; anday, indeeday, Iay amay uiteqay ofay
ouryay opinionay. Iay asway evernay oremay annoyeday! Ethay insipidityay, anday etyay ethay
oise--thenay othingnessnay, anday etyay ethay elf-importancesay, ofay allay esethay
eoplepay! Atwhay ouldway Iay ivegay otay earhay ouryay icturesstray onay emthay!”

oUr“yay onjecturecay isay otallytay ongwray, Iay assureay ouyay. myay indmay asway oremay
agreeablyay engageday. Iay avehay eenbay editatingmay onay ethay eryvay eatgray easureplay
ichwhay aay airpay ofay inefay eyesay inay ethay acefay ofay aay ettypray omanway ancay estowbay.”

Issmay Ingleybay immediatelyay ixedfay erhay eyesay onay ishay acefay, anday esiredday ehay
ouldway elltay erhay atwhay adylay adhay ethay editcray ofay inspiringay uchsay eflectionsray.
mray. Arcyday epliedray, ithway eatgray intrepidityay,--

iSs“may Elizabethay Ennetbay.”

iSs“may Elizabethay Ennetbay!” epeatedray Issmay Ingleybay. i“ay amay allay astonishmentay.
Owhay onglay ashay eshay eenbay uchsay aay avouritefay? anday aypray enwhay amay Iay otay ishway ouyay
oyjay?”

aT“thay isay exactlyay ethay uestionqay ichwhay Iay expecteday ouyay otay askay. Aay ady’slay
imaginationay isay eryvay apidray; itay umpsjay omfray admirationay otay ovelay, omfray ovelay
otay atrimonymay, inay aay omentmay. Iay ewknay ouyay ouldway ebay ishingway emay oyjay.”

aY“nay, ifay ouyay areay osay erioussay aboutay itay, Iay allshay onsidercay ethay attermay asay
absolutelyay ettledsay. Ouyay illway avehay aay armingchay other-in-lawmay, indeeday, anday
ofay oursecay eshay illway ebay alwaysay atay Emberleypay ithway ouyay.”

Ehay istenedlay otay erhay ithway erfectpay indifferenceay, ilewhay eshay osechay otay
entertainay erselfhay inay isthay annermay; anday asay ishay omposurecay onvincedcay erhay
atthay allay asway afesay, erhay itway owedflay alongay.




iLlustration[ay:

a“ay otenay orfay Issmay Ennetbay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IIvay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ennet’sbay opertypray onsistedcay almostay entirelyay inay anay estateay ofay otway
ousandthay aay earyay, ichwhay, unfortunatelyay orfay ishay aughtersday, asway entaileday,
inay efaultday ofay eirshay alemay, onay aay istantday elationray; anday eirthay other’smay
ortunefay, oughthay ampleay orfay erhay ituationsay inay ifelay, ouldcay utbay illay upplysay
ethay eficiencyday ofay ishay. Erhay atherfay adhay eenbay anay attorneyay inay Erytonmay, anday
adhay eftlay erhay ourfay ousandthay oundspay.

Eshay adhay aay istersay arriedmay otay aay mray. Ilipsphay, owhay adhay eenbay aay erkclay otay eirthay
atherfay anday ucceededsay imhay inay ethay usinessbay, anday aay otherbray ettledsay inay
Ondonlay inay aay espectableray inelay ofay adetray.

Ethay illagevay ofay Ongbournlay asway onlyay oneay ilemay omfray Erytonmay; aay ostmay
onvenientcay istanceday orfay ethay oungyay adieslay, owhay ereway usuallyay emptedtay
itherthay eethray oray ourfay imestay aay eekway, otay aypay eirthay utyday otay eirthay auntay, anday
otay aay illiner’smay opshay ustjay overay ethay ayway. Ethay otway oungestyay ofay ethay amilyfay,
Atherinecay anday Ialyday, ereway articularlypay equentfray inay esethay attentionsay:
eirthay indsmay ereway oremay acantvay anthay eirthay isterssay’, anday enwhay othingnay
etterbay offereday, aay alkway otay Erytonmay asway ecessarynay otay amuseay eirthay orningmay
ourshay anday urnishfay onversationcay orfay ethay eveningay; anday, oweverhay arebay ofay
ewsnay ethay ountrycay inay eneralgay ightmay ebay, eythay alwaysay ontrivedcay otay earnlay
omesay omfray eirthay auntay. Atay esentpray, indeeday, eythay ereway ellway uppliedsay othbay
ithway ewsnay anday appinesshay byay ethay ecentray arrivalay ofay aay ilitiamay egimentray inay
ethay eighbourhoodnay; itay asway otay emainray ethay olewhay interway, anday Erytonmay asway
ethay ead-quartershay.

Eirthay isitsvay otay mrsay. Ilipsphay ereway ownay oductivepray ofay ethay ostmay interestingay
intelligenceay. Everyay ayday addeday omethingsay otay eirthay owledgeknay ofay ethay
officersay’ amesnay anday onnectionscay. Eirthay odgingslay ereway otnay onglay aay ecretsay,
anday atay engthlay eythay eganbay otay owknay ethay officersay emselvesthay. mray. Ilipsphay
isitedvay emthay allay, anday isthay openeday otay ishay iecesnay aay ourcesay ofay elicityfay
unknownay eforebay. Eythay ouldcay alktay ofay othingnay utbay officersay; anday mray.
Ingley’sbay argelay ortunefay, ethay entionmay ofay ichwhay avegay animationay otay eirthay
othermay, asway orthlessway inay eirthay eyesay enwhay opposeday otay ethay egimentalsray ofay
anay ensignay.

Afteray isteninglay oneay orningmay otay eirthay effusionsay onay isthay ubjectsay, mray.
Ennetbay oollycay observeday,--

oM“fray allay atthay Iay ancay ollectcay byay ouryay annermay ofay alkingtay, ouyay ustmay ebay otway
ofay ethay illiestsay irlsgay inay ethay ountrycay. Iay avehay uspectedsay itay omesay imetay, utbay
Iay amay ownay onvincedcay.”

Atherinecay asway isconcertedday, anday ademay onay answeray; utbay Ialyday, ithway erfectpay
indifferenceay, ontinuedcay otay expressay erhay admirationay ofay Aptaincay Artercay, anday
erhay opehay ofay eeingsay imhay inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay ayday, asay ehay asway oinggay ethay
extnay orningmay otay Ondonlay.

i“ay amay astonisheday, myay earday,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, at“thay ouyay ouldshay ebay osay
eadyray otay inkthay ouryay ownay ildrenchay illysay. Ifay Iay ishedway otay inkthay ightinglyslay
ofay anybody’say ildrenchay, itay ouldshay otnay ebay ofay myay ownay, oweverhay.”

iF“ay myay ildrenchay areay illysay, Iay ustmay opehay otay ebay alwaysay ensiblesay ofay itay.”

eS“yay; utbay asay itay appenshay, eythay areay allay ofay emthay eryvay everclay.”

iS“thay isay ethay onlyay ointpay, Iay atterflay elfmysay, onay ichwhay eway oday otnay agreeay. Iay
adhay opedhay atthay ouray entimentssay oincidedcay inay everyay articularpay, utbay Iay ustmay
osay arfay ifferday omfray ouyay asay otay inkthay ouray otway oungestyay aughtersday uncommonlyay
oolishfay.”

“myay earday mray. Ennetbay, ouyay ustmay otnay expectay uchsay irlsgay otay avehay ethay ensesay ofay
eirthay atherfay anday othermay. Enwhay eythay etgay otay ouray ageay, Iay areday aysay eythay illway
otnay inkthay aboutay officersay anyay oremay anthay eway oday. Iay ememberray ethay imetay enwhay Iay
ikedlay aay edray oatcay elfmysay eryvay ell--andway, indeeday, osay Iay oday illstay atay myay
earthay; anday ifay aay artsmay oungyay olonelcay, ithway ivefay oray ixsay ousandthay aay earyay,
ouldshay antway oneay ofay myay irlsgay, Iay allshay otnay aysay aynay otay imhay; anday Iay oughtthay
Olonelcay Orsterfay ookedlay eryvay ecomingbay ethay otheray ightnay atay Irsay Illiam’sway inay
ishay egimentalsray.”

aMma“may,” iedcray Ialyday, “myay auntay ayssay atthay Olonelcay Orsterfay anday Aptaincay
Artercay oday otnay ogay osay oftenay otay Issmay Atson’sway asay eythay idday enwhay eythay irstfay
amecay; eshay eessay emthay ownay eryvay oftenay andingstay inay Arke’sclay ibrarylay.”

mrsay. Ennetbay asway eventedpray eplyingray byay ethay entranceay ofay ethay ootmanfay ithway aay
otenay orfay Issmay Ennetbay; itay amecay omfray Etherfieldnay, anday ethay ervantsay aitedway
orfay anay answeray. mrsay. Ennet’sbay eyesay arkledspay ithway easureplay, anday eshay asway
eagerlyay allingcay outay, ilewhay erhay aughterday eadray,--

eLl“way, Anejay, owhay isay itay omfray? Atwhay isay itay aboutay? Atwhay oesday ehay aysay? Ellway,
Anejay, akemay astehay anday elltay usay; akemay astehay, myay ovelay.”

iT“ay isay omfray Issmay Ingleybay,” aidsay Anejay, anday enthay eadray itay alouday.

ay/* INDnay “myay earday iendfray, ay*/

iF“ay ouyay areay otnay osay ompassionatecay asay otay ineday o-daytay ithway Ouisalay anday
emay, eway allshay ebay inay angerday ofay atinghay eachay otheray orfay ethay estray ofay ouray
iveslay; orfay aay olewhay ay’sday e-à-tête_têtay_ etweenbay otway omenway ancay evernay
enday ithoutway aay uarrelqay. Omecay asay oonsay asay ouyay ancay onay ethay eceiptray ofay
isthay. myay otherbray anday ethay entlemengay areay otay ineday ithway ethay officersay.
Oursyay everay,

aROLINE“cay INGLEYbay.”

iTh“way ethay officersay!” iedcray Ialyday: i“ay onderway myay auntay idday otnay elltay usay ofay
at_thay_.”

iNing“day outay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay; at“thay isay eryvay unluckyay.”

aN“cay Iay avehay ethay arriagecay?” aidsay Anejay.

o“nay, myay earday, ouyay adhay etterbay ogay onay orsebackhay, ecausebay itay eemssay ikelylay otay
ainray; anday enthay ouyay ustmay aystay allay ightnay.”

aT“thay ouldway ebay aay oodgay emeschay,” aidsay Elizabethay, if“ay ouyay ereway uresay atthay
eythay ouldway otnay offeray otay endsay erhay omehay.”

oH“ay, utbay ethay entlemengay illway avehay mray. Ingley’sbay aisechay otay ogay otay Erytonmay;
anday ethay Urstshay avehay onay orseshay otay eirsthay.”

i“ay adhay uchmay atherray ogay inay ethay oachcay.”

uT“bay, myay earday, ouryay atherfay annotcay arespay ethay orseshay, Iay amay uresay. Eythay areay
antedway inay ethay armfay, mray. Ennetbay, areay otnay eythay?”

iLlustration[ay: Eerfulchay ognosticspray]

eY“thay areay antedway inay ethay armfay uchmay ofteneray anthay Iay ancay etgay emthay.”

uT“bay ifay ouyay avehay otgay emthay o-daytay,” aidsay Elizabethay, “myay other’smay urposepay
illway ebay answereday.”

Eshay idday atay astlay extortay omfray erhay atherfay anay acknowledgmentay atthay ethay orseshay
ereway engageday; Anejay asway ereforethay obligeday otay ogay onay orsebackhay, anday erhay
othermay attendeday erhay otay ethay oorday ithway anymay eerfulchay ognosticspray ofay aay adbay
ayday. Erhay opeshay ereway answereday; Anejay adhay otnay eenbay onegay onglay eforebay itay
ainedray ardhay. Erhay isterssay ereway uneasyay orfay erhay, utbay erhay othermay asway
elightedday. Ethay ainray ontinuedcay ethay olewhay eveningay ithoutway intermissionay;
Anejay ertainlycay ouldcay otnay omecay ackbay.

iS“thay asway aay uckylay ideaay ofay inemay, indeeday!” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, oremay anthay
onceay, asay ifay ethay editcray ofay akingmay itay ainray ereway allay erhay ownay. Illtay ethay extnay
orningmay, oweverhay, eshay asway otnay awareay ofay allay ethay elicityfay ofay erhay
ontrivancecay. Eakfastbray asway arcelyscay overay enwhay aay ervantsay omfray Etherfieldnay
oughtbray ethay ollowingfay otenay orfay Elizabethay:--

ay/* INDnay “myay earestday Izzielay, ay*/

i“ay indfay elfmysay eryvay unwellay isthay orningmay, ichwhay, Iay upposesay, isay otay ebay
imputeday otay myay ettinggay etway oughthray esterdayyay. myay indkay iendsfray illway
otnay earhay ofay myay eturningray omehay illtay Iay amay etterbay. Eythay insistay alsoay onay
myay eeingsay mray. Ones--thereforejay oday otnay ebay alarmeday ifay ouyay ouldshay earhay
ofay ishay avinghay eenbay otay e--andmay, exceptingay aay oresay oatthray anday aay
eadachehay, erethay isay otnay uchmay ethay attermay ithway emay.

oUrs“yay, etcay.”

eLl“way, myay earday,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay, enwhay Elizabethay adhay eadray ethay otenay
alouday, if“ay ouryay aughterday ouldshay avehay aay angerousday itfay ofay illness--ifay eshay
ouldshay ie--itday ouldway ebay aay omfortcay otay owknay atthay itay asway allay inay ursuitpay ofay
mray. Ingleybay, anday underay ouryay ordersay.”

oH“ay, Iay amay otnay atay allay afraiday ofay erhay ingdyay. Eoplepay oday otnay ieday ofay ittlelay
iflingtray oldscay. Eshay illway ebay akentay oodgay arecay ofay. Asay onglay asay eshay aysstay
erethay, itay isay allay eryvay ellway. Iay ouldway ogay anday eesay erhay ifay Iay ouldcay avehay ethay
arriagecay.”

Elizabethay, eelingfay eallyray anxiousay, eterminedday otay ogay otay erhay, oughthay ethay
arriagecay asway otnay otay ebay adhay: anday asay eshay asway onay orsewomanhay, alkingway asway
erhay onlyay alternativeay. Eshay eclaredday erhay esolutionray.

oW“hay ancay ouyay ebay osay illysay,” iedcray erhay othermay, as“ay otay inkthay ofay uchsay aay
ingthay, inay allay isthay irtday! Ouyay illway otnay ebay itfay otay ebay eensay enwhay ouyay etgay
erethay.”

i“ay allshay ebay eryvay itfay otay eesay Ane--whichjay isay allay Iay antway.”

iS“ay isthay aay inthay otay emay, Izzylay,” aidsay erhay atherfay, o“tay endsay orfay ethay
orseshay?”

o“nay, indeeday. Iay oday otnay ishway otay avoiday ethay alkway. Ethay istanceday isay othingnay,
enwhay oneay ashay aay otivemay; onlyay eethray ilesmay. Iay allshay ebay ackbay byay innerday.”

i“ay admireay ethay activityay ofay ouryay enevolencebay,” observeday Arymay, ut“bay everyay
impulseay ofay eelingfay ouldshay ebay uidedgay byay easonray; anday, inay myay opinionay,
exertionay ouldshay alwaysay ebay inay oportionpray otay atwhay isay equiredray.”

e“way illway ogay asay arfay asay Erytonmay ithway ouyay,” aidsay Atherinecay anday Ialyday.
Elizabethay accepteday eirthay ompanycay, anday ethay eethray oungyay adieslay etsay offay
ogethertay.

iF“ay eway akemay astehay,” aidsay Ialyday, asay eythay alkedway alongay, erhaps“pay eway aymay
eesay omethingsay ofay Aptaincay Artercay, eforebay ehay oesgay.”

Inay Erytonmay eythay artedpay: ethay otway oungestyay epairedray otay ethay odgingslay ofay oneay
ofay ethay officersay’ ivesway, anday Elizabethay ontinuedcay erhay alkway aloneay, ossingcray
ieldfay afteray ieldfay atay aay uickqay acepay, umpingjay overay ilesstay anday ingingspray
overay uddlespay, ithway impatientay activityay, anday indingfay erselfhay atay astlay
ithinway iewvay ofay ethay ousehay, ithway earyway anclesay, irtyday ockingsstay, anday aay acefay
owingglay ithway ethay armthway ofay exerciseay.

Eshay asway ownshay intoay ethay eakfastbray arlourpay, erewhay allay utbay Anejay ereway
assembleday, anday erewhay erhay appearanceay eatedcray aay eatgray ealday ofay urprisesay.
Atthay eshay ouldshay avehay alkedway eethray ilesmay osay earlyay inay ethay ayday inay uchsay
irtyday eatherway, anday byay erselfhay, asway almostay incredibleay otay mrsay. Ursthay anday
Issmay Ingleybay; anday Elizabethay asway onvincedcay atthay eythay eldhay erhay inay ontemptcay
orfay itay. Eshay asway eceivedray, oweverhay, eryvay olitelypay byay emthay; anday inay eirthay
other’sbray annersmay erethay asway omethingsay etterbay anthay oliteness--therepay asway
ood-humourgay anday indnesskay. mray. Arcyday aidsay eryvay ittlelay, anday mray. Ursthay
othingnay atay allay. Ethay ormerfay asway ividedday etweenbay admirationay ofay ethay
illiancybray ichwhay exerciseay adhay ivengay otay erhay omplexioncay anday oubtday asay otay
ethay occasion’say ustifyingjay erhay omingcay osay arfay aloneay. Ethay atterlay asway
inkingthay onlyay ofay ishay eakfastbray.

Erhay inquiriesay afteray erhay istersay ereway otnay eryvay avourablyfay answereday. Issmay
Ennetbay adhay eptslay illay, anday oughthay upay, asway eryvay everishfay, anday otnay ellway
enoughay otay eavelay erhay oomray. Elizabethay asway adglay otay ebay akentay otay erhay
immediatelyay; anday Anejay, owhay adhay onlyay eenbay ithheldway byay ethay earfay ofay ivinggay
alarmay oray inconvenienceay, omfray expressingay inay erhay otenay owhay uchmay eshay ongedlay
orfay uchsay aay isitvay, asway elightedday atay erhay entranceay. Eshay asway otnay equalay,
oweverhay, otay uchmay onversationcay; anday enwhay Issmay Ingleybay eftlay emthay ogethertay,
ouldcay attemptay ittlelay esidebay expressionsay ofay atitudegray orfay ethay
extraordinaryay indnesskay eshay asway eatedtray ithway. Elizabethay ilentlysay attendeday
erhay.

Enwhay eakfastbray asway overay, eythay ereway oinedjay byay ethay isterssay; anday Elizabethay
eganbay otay ikelay emthay erselfhay, enwhay eshay awsay owhay uchmay affectionay anday
olicitudesay eythay owedshay orfay Anejay. Ethay apothecaryay amecay; anday avinghay
examineday ishay atientpay, aidsay, asay ightmay ebay upposedsay, atthay eshay adhay aughtcay aay
iolentvay oldcay, anday atthay eythay ustmay endeavouray otay etgay ethay etterbay ofay itay;
adviseday erhay otay eturnray otay edbay, anday omisedpray erhay omesay aughtsdray. Ethay adviceay
asway ollowedfay eadilyray, orfay ethay everishfay omssymptay increaseday, anday erhay eadhay
acheday acutelyay. Elizabethay idday otnay uitqay erhay oomray orfay aay omentmay, ornay ereway
ethay otheray adieslay oftenay absentay; ethay entlemengay eingbay outay, eythay adhay inay actfay
othingnay otay oday elsewhereay.

Enwhay ethay ockclay uckstray eethray, Elizabethay eltfay atthay eshay ustmay ogay, anday eryvay
unwillinglyay aidsay osay. Issmay Ingleybay offereday erhay ethay arriagecay, anday eshay onlyay
antedway aay ittlelay essingpray otay acceptay itay, enwhay Anejay estifiedtay uchsay oncerncay
atay artingpay ithway erhay atthay Issmay Ingleybay asway obligeday otay onvertcay ethay offeray
ofay ethay aisechay intoay anay invitationay otay emainray atay Etherfieldnay orfay ethay
esentpray. Elizabethay ostmay ankfullythay onsentedcay, anday aay ervantsay asway
espatchedday otay Ongbournlay, otay acquaintay ethay amilyfay ithway erhay aystay, anday ingbray
ackbay aay upplysay ofay othesclay.

iLlustration[ay:

e“thay Apothecaryay amecay”
ay]




iLlustration[ay:

overing“cay aay eenscray”
ay]




APTERchay IIIvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Atay ivefay o’clockay ethay otway adieslay etiredray otay essdray, anday atay alf-pasthay ixsay
Elizabethay asway ummonedsay otay innerday. Otay ethay ivilcay inquiriesay ichwhay enthay
ouredpay inay, anday amongstay ichwhay eshay adhay ethay easureplay ofay istinguishingday ethay
uchmay uperiorsay olicitudesay ofay mray. Ingleybay, eshay ouldcay otnay akemay aay eryvay
avourablefay answeray. Anejay asway byay onay eansmay etterbay. Ethay isterssay, onay earinghay
isthay, epeatedray eethray oray ourfay imestay owhay uchmay eythay ereway ievedgray, owhay
ockingshay itay asway otay avehay aay adbay oldcay, anday owhay excessivelyay eythay islikedday
eingbay illay emselvesthay; anday enthay oughtthay onay oremay ofay ethay attermay: anday eirthay
indifferenceay owardstay Anejay, enwhay otnay immediatelyay eforebay emthay, estoredray
Elizabethay otay ethay enjoymentay ofay allay erhay originalay islikeday.

Eirthay otherbray, indeeday, asway ethay onlyay oneay ofay ethay artypay omwhay eshay ouldcay
egardray ithway anyay omplacencycay. Ishay anxietyay orfay Anejay asway evidentay, anday ishay
attentionsay otay erselfhay ostmay easingplay; anday eythay eventedpray erhay eelingfay
erselfhay osay uchmay anay intruderay asay eshay elievedbay eshay asway onsideredcay byay ethay
othersay. Eshay adhay eryvay ittlelay oticenay omfray anyay utbay imhay. Issmay Ingleybay asway
engrosseday byay mray. Arcyday, erhay istersay arcelyscay esslay osay; anday asay orfay mray.
Ursthay, byay omwhay Elizabethay atsay, ehay asway anay indolentay anmay, owhay ivedlay onlyay otay
eatay, inkdray, anday ayplay atay ardscay, owhay, enwhay ehay oundfay erhay eferpray aay ainplay
ishday otay aay agoutray, adhay othingnay otay aysay otay erhay.

Enwhay innerday asway overay, eshay eturnedray irectlyday otay Anejay, anday Issmay Ingleybay
eganbay abusingay erhay asay oonsay asay eshay asway outay ofay ethay oomray. Erhay annersmay ereway
onouncedpray otay ebay eryvay adbay indeed,--aay ixturemay ofay idepray anday impertinenceay:
eshay adhay onay onversationcay, onay estylay, onay astetay, onay eautybay. mrsay. Ursthay
oughtthay ethay amesay, anday addeday,--

e“shay ashay othingnay, inay ortshay, otay ecommendray erhay, utbay eingbay anay excellentay
alkerway. Iay allshay evernay orgetfay erhay appearanceay isthay orningmay. Eshay eallyray
ookedlay almostay ildway.”

e“shay idday indeeday, Ouisalay. Iay ouldcay ardlyhay eepkay myay ountenancecay. Eryvay
onsensicalnay otay omecay atay allay! whyay ustmay e_shay_ ebay amperingscay aboutay ethay
ountrycay, ecausebay erhay istersay adhay aay oldcay? Erhay airhay osay untidyay, osay owzyblay!”

eS“yay, anday erhay etticoatpay; Iay opehay ouyay awsay erhay etticoatpay, ixsay inchesay eepday
inay udmay, Iay amay absolutelyay ertaincay, anday ethay owngay ichwhay adhay eenbay etlay ownday otay
idehay itay otnay oingday itsay officeay.”

oUr“yay icturepay aymay ebay eryvay exactay, Ouisalay,” aidsay Ingleybay; ut“bay isthay asway
allay ostlay uponay emay. Iay oughtthay Issmay Elizabethay Ennetbay ookedlay emarkablyray ellway
enwhay eshay amecay intoay ethay oomray isthay orningmay. Erhay irtyday etticoatpay uiteqay
escapeday myay oticenay.”

ou“_yay_ observeday itay, mray. Arcyday, Iay amay uresay,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay; and“ay Iay amay
inclineday otay inkthay atthay ouyay ouldway otnay ishway otay eesay our_yay istersay_ akemay uchsay
anay exhibitionay.”

eRtainly“cay otnay.”

o“tay alkway eethray ilesmay, oray ourfay ilesmay, oray ivefay ilesmay, oray ateverwhay itay isay,
aboveay erhay anclesay inay irtday, anday aloneay, uiteqay aloneay! atwhay ouldcay eshay eanmay byay
itay? Itay eemssay otay emay otay owshay anay abominableay ortsay ofay onceitedcay independenceay,
aay ostmay ountry-towncay indifferenceay otay ecorumday.”

iT“ay owsshay anay affectionay orfay erhay istersay atthay isay eryvay easingplay,” aidsay
Ingleybay.

i“ay amay afraiday, mray. Arcyday,” observeday Issmay Ingleybay, inay aay alfhay isperwhay,
at“thay isthay adventureay ashay atherray affecteday ouryay admirationay ofay erhay inefay
eyesay.”

oT“nay atay allay,” ehay epliedray: ey“thay ereway ightenedbray byay ethay exerciseay.” Aay
ortshay ausepay ollowedfay isthay eechspay, anday mrsay. Ursthay eganbay againay,--

i“ay avehay anay excessiveay egardray orfay Anejay Ennet,--shebay isay eallyray aay eryvay eetsway
irl,--andgay Iay ishway ithway allay myay earthay eshay ereway ellway ettledsay. Utbay ithway uchsay
aay atherfay anday othermay, anday uchsay owlay onnectionscay, Iay amay afraiday erethay isay onay
ancechay ofay itay.”

i“ay inkthay Iay avehay eardhay ouyay aysay atthay eirthay uncleay isay anay attorneyay inay
Erytonmay?”

eS“yay; anday eythay avehay anotheray, owhay iveslay omewheresay earnay Eapsidechay.”

aT“thay isay apitalcay,” addeday erhay istersay; anday eythay othbay aughedlay eartilyhay.

iF“ay eythay adhay unclesay enoughay otay illfay all_ay_ Eapsidechay,” iedcray Ingleybay, it“ay
ouldway otnay akemay emthay oneay otjay esslay agreeableay.”

uT“bay itay ustmay eryvay ateriallymay essenlay eirthay ancechay ofay arryingmay enmay ofay anyay
onsiderationcay inay ethay orldway,” epliedray Arcyday.

Otay isthay eechspay Ingleybay ademay onay answeray; utbay ishay isterssay avegay itay eirthay
eartyhay assentay, anday indulgeday eirthay irthmay orfay omesay imetay atay ethay expenseay ofay
eirthay earday iend’sfray ulgarvay elationsray.

Ithway aay enewalray ofay endernesstay, oweverhay, eythay epairedray otay erhay oomray onay
eavinglay ethay ining-parlourday, anday atsay ithway erhay illtay ummonedsay otay offeecay.
Eshay asway illstay eryvay oorlypay, anday Elizabethay ouldway otnay uitqay erhay atay allay, illtay
atelay inay ethay eveningay, enwhay eshay adhay ethay omfortcay ofay eeingsay erhay asleepay, anday
enwhay itay appeareday otay erhay atherray ightray anthay easantplay atthay eshay ouldshay ogay
ownday airsstay erselfhay. Onay enteringay ethay awing-roomdray, eshay oundfay ethay olewhay
artypay atay oolay, anday asway immediatelyay inviteday otay oinjay emthay; utbay uspectingsay
emthay otay ebay ayingplay ighhay, eshay eclinedday itay, anday akingmay erhay istersay ethay
excuseay, aidsay eshay ouldway amuseay erselfhay, orfay ethay ortshay imetay eshay ouldcay aystay
elowbay, ithway aay ookbay. mray. Ursthay ookedlay atay erhay ithway astonishmentay.

o“day ouyay eferpray eadingray otay ardscay?” aidsay ehay; at“thay isay atherray ingularsay.”

iSs“may Elizaay Ennetbay,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay, espises“day ardscay. Eshay isay aay eatgray
eaderray, anday ashay onay easureplay inay anythingay elseay.”

i“ay eserveday eithernay uchsay aisepray ornay uchsay ensurecay,” iedcray Elizabethay; i“ay
amay ot_nay_ aay eatgray eaderray, anday Iay avehay easureplay inay anymay ingsthay.”

iN“ay ursingnay ouryay istersay Iay amay uresay ouyay avehay easureplay,” aidsay Ingleybay; and“ay
Iay opehay itay illway oonsay ebay increaseday byay eeingsay erhay uiteqay ellway.”

Elizabethay ankedthay imhay omfray erhay earthay, anday enthay alkedway owardstay aay abletay
erewhay aay ewfay ooksbay ereway inglyay. Ehay immediatelyay offereday otay etchfay erhay
othersay; allay atthay ishay ibrarylay affordeday.

aNd“ay Iay ishway myay ollectioncay ereway argerlay orfay ouryay enefitbay anday myay ownay
editcray; utbay Iay amay anay idleay ellowfay; anday oughthay Iay avehay otnay anymay, Iay avehay oremay
anthay Iay everay ookedlay intoay.”

Elizabethay assureday imhay atthay eshay ouldcay uitsay erselfhay erfectlypay ithway osethay
inay ethay oomray.

i“ay amay astonisheday,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay, at“thay myay atherfay ouldshay avehay eftlay
osay allsmay aay ollectioncay ofay ooksbay. Atwhay aay elightfulday ibrarylay ouyay avehay atay
Emberleypay, mray. Arcyday!”

iT“ay oughtay otay ebay oodgay,” ehay epliedray: it“ay ashay eenbay ethay orkway ofay anymay
enerationsgay.”

aNd“ay enthay ouyay avehay addeday osay uchmay otay itay ourself--youyay areay alwaysay uyingbay
ooksbay.”

i“ay annotcay omprehendcay ethay eglectnay ofay aay amilyfay ibrarylay inay uchsay aysday asay
esethay.”

eGlect“nay! Iay amay uresay ouyay eglectnay othingnay atthay ancay adday otay ethay eautiesbay ofay
atthay oblenay aceplay. Arleschay, enwhay ouyay uildbay our_yay_ ousehay, Iay ishway itay aymay ebay
alfhay asay elightfulday asay Emberleypay.”

i“ay ishway itay aymay.”

uT“bay Iay ouldway eallyray adviseay ouyay otay akemay ouryay urchasepay inay atthay
eighbourhoodnay, anday aketay Emberleypay orfay aay indkay ofay odelmay. Erethay isay otnay aay
inerfay ountycay inay Englanday anthay Erbyshireday.”

iTh“way allay myay earthay: Iay illway uybay Emberleypay itselfay, ifay Arcyday illway ellsay itay.”

i“ay amay alkingtay ofay ossibilitiespay, Arleschay.”

uPon“ay myay ordway, Arolinecay, Iay ouldshay inkthay itay oremay ossiblepay otay etgay
Emberleypay byay urchasepay anthay byay imitationay.”

Elizabethay asway osay uchmay aughtcay byay atwhay assedpay, asay otay eavelay erhay eryvay ittlelay
attentionay orfay erhay ookbay; anday, oonsay ayinglay itay ollywhay asideay, eshay ewdray earnay
ethay ard-tablecay, anday ationedstay erselfhay etweenbay mray. Ingleybay anday ishay eldestay
istersay, otay observeay ethay amegay.

iS“ay Issmay Arcyday uchmay owngray incesay ethay ingspray?” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay: ill“way
eshay ebay asay alltay asay Iay amay?”

i“ay inkthay eshay illway. Eshay isay ownay aboutay Issmay Elizabethay Ennet’sbay eighthay, oray
atherray allertay.”

oW“hay Iay onglay otay eesay erhay againay! Iay evernay etmay ithway anybodyay owhay elightedday emay
osay uchmay. Uchsay aay ountenancecay, uchsay annersmay, anday osay extremelyay accomplisheday
orfay erhay ageay! Erhay erformancepay onay ethay ianofortepay isay exquisiteay.”

iT“ay isay amazingay otay emay,” aidsay Ingleybay, ow“hay oungyay adieslay ancay avehay atiencepay
otay ebay osay eryvay accomplisheday asay eythay allay areay.”

aLl“ay oungyay adieslay accomplisheday! myay earday Arleschay, atwhay oday ouyay eanmay?”

eS“yay, allay ofay emthay, Iay inkthay. Eythay allay aintpay ablestay, overcay eensscray, anday
etnay ursespay. Iay arcelyscay owknay anyay oneay owhay annotcay oday allay isthay; anday Iay amay
uresay Iay evernay eardhay aay oungyay adylay okenspay ofay orfay ethay irstfay imetay, ithoutway
eingbay informeday atthay eshay asway eryvay accomplisheday.”

oUr“yay istlay ofay ethay ommoncay extentay ofay accomplishmentsay,” aidsay Arcyday, as“hay
ootay uchmay uthtray. Ethay ordway isay applieday otay anymay aay omanway owhay eservesday itay onay
otherwiseay anthay byay ettingnay aay ursepay oray overingcay aay eenscray; utbay Iay amay eryvay
arfay omfray agreeingay ithway ouyay inay ouryay estimationay ofay adieslay inay eneralgay. Iay
annotcay oastbay ofay owingknay oremay anthay alf-a-dozenhay inay ethay olewhay angeray ofay myay
acquaintanceay atthay areay eallyray accomplisheday.”

oR“nay Iay, Iay amay uresay,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay.

eN“thay,” observeday Elizabethay, ou“yay ustmay omprehendcay aay eatgray ealday inay ouryay
ideaay ofay anay accomplisheday omanway.”

eS“yay; Iay oday omprehendcay aay eatgray ealday inay itay.”

oH“ay, ertainlycay,” iedcray ishay aithfulfay assistantay, o“nay oneay ancay ebay eallyray
esteemeday accomplisheday owhay oesday otnay eatlygray urpasssay atwhay isay usuallyay etmay
ithway. Aay omanway ustmay avehay aay oroughthay owledgeknay ofay usicmay, ingingsay, awingdray,
ancingday, anday ethay odernmay anguageslay, otay eserveday ethay ordway; anday, esidesbay allay
isthay, eshay ustmay ossesspay aay ertaincay omethingsay inay erhay airay anday annermay ofay
alkingway, ethay onetay ofay erhay oicevay, erhay addressay anday expressionsay, oray ethay ordway
illway ebay utbay alfhay eservedday.”

aLl“ay isthay eshay ustmay ossesspay,” addeday Arcyday; and“ay otay allay eshay ustmay etyay adday
omethingsay oremay ubstantialsay inay ethay improvementay ofay erhay indmay byay extensiveay
eadingray.”

i“ay amay onay ongerlay urprisedsay atay ouryay owingknay only_ay_ ixsay accomplisheday omenway.
Iay atherray onderway ownay atay ouryay owingknay any_ay_.”

aRe“ay ouyay osay everesay uponay ouryay ownay exsay asay otay oubtday ethay ossibilitypay ofay allay
isthay?”

i“_ay_ evernay awsay uchsay aay omanway. i_ay_ evernay awsay uchsay apacitycay, anday astetay, anday
applicationay, anday eleganceay, asay ouyay escribeday, uniteday.”

mrsay. Ursthay anday Issmay Ingleybay othbay iedcray outay againstay ethay injusticeay ofay erhay
implieday oubtday, anday ereway othbay otestingpray atthay eythay ewknay anymay omenway owhay
answereday isthay escriptionday, enwhay mray. Ursthay alledcay emthay otay orderay, ithway
itterbay omplaintscay ofay eirthay inattentionay otay atwhay asway oinggay orwardfay. Asay allay
onversationcay asway erebythay atay anay enday, Elizabethay oonsay afterwardsay eftlay ethay
oomray.

eLiza“ay Ennetbay,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay, enwhay ethay oorday asway osedclay onay erhay, is“ay
oneay ofay osethay oungyay adieslay owhay eeksay otay ecommendray emselvesthay otay ethay otheray
exsay byay undervaluingay eirthay ownay; anday ithway anymay enmay, Iay aresayday, itay
ucceedssay; utbay, inay myay opinionay, itay isay aay altrypay eviceday, aay eryvay eanmay artay.”

uNdoubtedly“ay,” epliedray Arcyday, otay omwhay isthay emarkray asway ieflychay addresseday,
ere“thay isay eannessmay inay all_ay_ ethay artsay ichwhay adieslay ometimessay ondescendcay
otay employay orfay aptivationcay. Ateverwhay earsbay affinityay otay unningcay isay
espicableday.”

Issmay Ingleybay asway otnay osay entirelyay atisfiedsay ithway isthay eplyray asay otay
ontinuecay ethay ubjectsay.

Elizabethay oinedjay emthay againay onlyay otay aysay atthay erhay istersay asway orseway, anday
atthay eshay ouldcay otnay eavelay erhay. Ingleybay urgeday mray. Ones’sjay eingbay entsay orfay
immediatelyay; ilewhay ishay isterssay, onvincedcay atthay onay ountrycay adviceay ouldcay
ebay ofay anyay ervicesay, ecommendedray anay expressay otay owntay orfay oneay ofay ethay ostmay
eminentay iciansphysay. Isthay eshay ouldway otnay earhay ofay; utbay eshay asway otnay osay
unwillingay otay omplycay ithway eirthay other’sbray oposalpray; anday itay asway ettledsay
atthay mray. Onesjay ouldshay ebay entsay orfay earlyay inay ethay orningmay, ifay Issmay Ennetbay
ereway otnay ecidedlyday etterbay. Ingleybay asway uiteqay uncomfortableay; ishay isterssay
eclaredday atthay eythay ereway iserablemay. Eythay olacedsay eirthay etchednesswray,
oweverhay, byay uetsday afteray uppersay; ilewhay ehay ouldcay indfay onay etterbay eliefray otay
ishay eelingsfay anthay byay ivinggay ishay ousekeeperhay irectionsday atthay everyay
ossiblepay attentionay ightmay ebay aidpay otay ethay icksay adylay anday erhay istersay.




iLlustration[ay:

m^{rsay} Ennetbay anday erhay otway oungestyay irlsgay

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IXay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay assedpay ethay iefchay ofay ethay ightnay inay erhay ister’ssay oomray, anday inay ethay
orningmay adhay ethay easureplay ofay eingbay ableay otay endsay aay olerabletay answeray otay ethay
inquiriesay ichwhay eshay eryvay earlyay eceivedray omfray mray. Ingleybay byay aay ousemaidhay,
anday omesay imetay afterwardsay omfray ethay otway elegantay adieslay owhay aitedway onay ishay
isterssay. Inay itespay ofay isthay amendmentay, oweverhay, eshay equestedray otay avehay aay
otenay entsay otay Ongbournlay, esiringday erhay othermay otay isitvay Anejay, anday ormfay erhay
ownay udgmentjay ofay erhay ituationsay. Ethay otenay asway immediatelyay espatchedday, anday
itsay ontentscay asay uicklyqay ompliedcay ithway. mrsay. Ennetbay, accompanieday byay erhay
otway oungestyay irlsgay, eachedray Etherfieldnay oonsay afteray ethay amilyfay eakfastbray.

Adhay eshay oundfay Anejay inay anyay apparentay angerday, mrsay. Ennetbay ouldway avehay eenbay
eryvay iserablemay; utbay eingbay atisfiedsay onay eeingsay erhay atthay erhay illnessay asway
otnay alarmingay, eshay adhay onay ishway ofay erhay ecoveringray immediatelyay, asay erhay
estorationray otay ealthhay ouldway obablypray emoveray erhay omfray Etherfieldnay. Eshay
ouldway otnay istenlay, ereforethay, otay erhay aughter’sday oposalpray ofay eingbay arriedcay
omehay; eithernay idday ethay apothecaryay, owhay arriveday aboutay ethay amesay imetay, inkthay
itay atay allay advisableay. Afteray ittingsay aay ittlelay ilewhay ithway Anejay, onay Issmay
Ingley’sbay appearanceay anday invitationay, ethay othermay anday eethray aughtersday allay
attendeday erhay intoay ethay eakfastbray arlourpay. Ingleybay etmay emthay ithway opeshay
atthay mrsay. Ennetbay adhay otnay oundfay Issmay Ennetbay orseway anthay eshay expecteday.

iNdeed“ay Iay avehay, irsay,” asway erhay answeray. e“shay isay aay eatgray ealday ootay illay otay ebay
ovedmay. mray. Onesjay ayssay eway ustmay otnay inkthay ofay ovingmay erhay. Eway ustmay espasstray
aay ittlelay ongerlay onay ouryay indnesskay.”

eMoved“ray!” iedcray Ingleybay. iT“ay ustmay otnay ebay oughtthay ofay. myay istersay, Iay amay
uresay, illway otnay earhay ofay erhay emovalray.”

oU“yay aymay ependday uponay itay, adammay,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay, ithway oldcay ivilitycay,
at“thay Issmay Ennetbay allshay eceiveray everyay ossiblepay attentionay ilewhay eshay
emainsray ithway usay.”

mrsay. Ennetbay asway ofusepray inay erhay acknowledgmentsay.

i“ay amay uresay,” eshay addeday, if“ay itay asway otnay orfay uchsay oodgay iendsfray, Iay oday otnay
owknay atwhay ouldway ecomebay ofay erhay, orfay eshay isay eryvay illay indeeday, anday ufferssay aay
astvay ealday, oughthay ithway ethay eatestgray atiencepay inay ethay orldway, ichwhay isay
alwaysay ethay ayway ithway erhay, orfay eshay ashay, ithoutway exceptionay, ethay eetestsway
empertay Iay everay etmay ithway. Iay oftenay elltay myay otheray irlsgay eythay areay othingnay otay
er_hay_. Ouyay avehay aay eetsway oomray erehay, mray. Ingleybay, anday aay armingchay ospectpray
overay atthay avelgray alkway. Iay oday otnay owknay aay aceplay inay ethay ountrycay atthay isay
equalay otay Etherfieldnay. Ouyay illway otnay inkthay ofay uittingqay itay inay aay urryhay, Iay
opehay, oughthay ouyay avehay utbay aay ortshay easelay.”

aTever“whay Iay oday isay oneday inay aay urryhay,” epliedray ehay; and“ay ereforethay ifay Iay
ouldshay esolveray otay uitqay Etherfieldnay, Iay ouldshay obablypray ebay offay inay ivefay
inutesmay. Atay esentpray, oweverhay, Iay onsidercay elfmysay asay uiteqay ixedfay erehay.”

aT“thay isay exactlyay atwhay Iay ouldshay avehay upposedsay ofay ouyay,” aidsay Elizabethay.

oU“yay eginbay otay omprehendcay emay, oday ouyay?” iedcray ehay, urningtay owardstay erhay.

oH“ay es--iyay understanday ouyay erfectlypay.”

i“ay ishway Iay ightmay aketay isthay orfay aay omplimentcay; utbay otay ebay osay easilyay eensay
oughthray, Iay amay afraiday, isay itifulpay.”

aT“thay isay asay itay appenshay. Itay oesday otnay ecessarilynay ollowfay atthay aay eepday,
intricateay aracterchay isay oremay oray esslay estimableay anthay uchsay aay oneay asay oursyay.”

iZzy“lay,” iedcray erhay othermay, emember“ray erewhay ouyay areay, anday oday otnay unray onay inay
ethay ildway annermay atthay ouyay areay ufferedsay otay oday atay omehay.”

i“ay idday otnay owknay eforebay,” ontinuedcay Ingleybay, immediatelyay, at“thay ouyay ereway
aay udierstay ofay aracterchay. Itay ustmay ebay anay amusingay udystay.”

eS“yay; utbay intricateay aracterschay areay ethay ost_may_ amusingay. Eythay avehay atay
eastlay atthay advantageay.”

e“thay ountrycay,” aidsay Arcyday, an“cay inay eneralgay upplysay utbay ewfay ubjectssay orfay
uchsay aay udystay. Inay aay ountrycay eighbourhoodnay ouyay ovemay inay aay eryvay onfinedcay anday
unvaryingay ocietysay.”

uT“bay eoplepay emselvesthay alteray osay uchmay, atthay erethay isay omethingsay ewnay otay ebay
observeday inay emthay orfay everay.”

eS“yay, indeeday,” iedcray mrsay. Ennetbay, offendeday byay ishay annermay ofay entioningmay aay
ountrycay eighbourhoodnay. i“ay assureay ouyay erethay isay uiteqay asay uchmay ofay at_thay_
oinggay onay inay ethay ountrycay asay inay owntay.”

Everybodyay asway urprisedsay; anday Arcyday, afteray ookinglay atay erhay orfay aay omentmay,
urnedtay ilentlysay awayay. mrsay. Ennetbay, owhay anciedfay eshay adhay ainedgay aay ompletecay
ictoryvay overay imhay, ontinuedcay erhay iumphtray,--

i“ay annotcay eesay atthay Ondonlay ashay anyay eatgray advantageay overay ethay ountrycay, orfay
myay artpay, exceptay ethay opsshay anday ublicpay acesplay. Ethay ountrycay isay aay astvay ealday
easanterplay, isay otnay itay, mray. Ingleybay?”

eN“whay Iay amay inay ethay ountrycay,” ehay epliedray, i“ay evernay ishway otay eavelay itay; anday
enwhay Iay amay inay owntay, itay isay ettypray uchmay ethay amesay. Eythay avehay eachay eirthay
advantagesay, anday Iay ancay ebay equallyay appyhay inay eitheray.”

aY“ay, atthay isay ecausebay ouyay avehay ethay ightray ispositionday. Utbay atthay
entlemangay,” ookinglay atay Arcyday, eemed“say otay inkthay ethay ountrycay asway othingnay
atay allay.”

iNdeed“ay, ammamay, ouyay areay istakenmay,” aidsay Elizabethay, ushingblay orfay erhay
othermay. oU“yay uiteqay istookmay mray. Arcyday. Ehay onlyay eantmay atthay erethay asway otnay
uchsay aay arietyvay ofay eoplepay otay ebay etmay ithway inay ethay ountrycay asay inay owntay, ichwhay
ouyay ustmay acknowledgeay otay ebay uetray.”

eRtainly“cay, myay earday, obodynay aidsay erethay ereway; utbay asay otay otnay eetingmay ithway
anymay eoplepay inay isthay eighbourhoodnay, Iay elievebay erethay areay ewfay
eighbourhoodsnay argerlay. Iay owknay eway ineday ithway our-and-twentyfay amiliesfay.”

Othingnay utbay oncerncay orfay Elizabethay ouldcay enableay Ingleybay otay eepkay ishay
ountenancecay. Ishay istersay asway esslay elicateday, anday irectedday erhay eyeay owardstay
mray. Arcyday ithway aay eryvay expressiveay ilesmay. Elizabethay, orfay ethay akesay ofay
ayingsay omethingsay atthay ightmay urntay erhay other’smay oughtsthay, ownay askeday erhay ifay
Arlottechay Ucaslay adhay eenbay atay Ongbournlay incesay er_hay_ omingcay awayay.

eS“yay, eshay alledcay esterdayyay ithway erhay atherfay. Atwhay anay agreeableay anmay Irsay
Illiamway isay, mray. Ingley--isbay otnay ehay? osay uchmay ethay anmay ofay ashionfay! osay
enteelgay anday osay easyay! Ehay ashay alwaysay omethingsay otay aysay otay everybodyay. aT_thay_
isay myay ideaay ofay oodgay eedingbray; anday osethay ersonspay owhay ancyfay emselvesthay eryvay
importantay anday evernay openay eirthay outhsmay uiteqay istakemay ethay attermay.”

iD“day Arlottechay ineday ithway ouyay?”

o“nay, eshay ouldway ogay omehay. Iay ancyfay eshay asway antedway aboutay ethay ince-piesmay. Orfay
myay artpay, mray. Ingleybay, i_ay_ alwaysay eepkay ervantssay atthay ancay oday eirthay ownay
orkway; _myay_ aughtersday areay oughtbray upay ifferentlyday. Utbay everybodyay isay otay
udgejay orfay emselvesthay, anday ethay Ucaseslay areay aay eryvay oodgay ortsay ofay irlsgay, Iay
assureay ouyay. Itay isay aay itypay eythay areay otnay andsomehay! Otnay atthay i_ay_ inkthay
Arlottechay osay ery_vay_ ainplay; utbay enthay eshay isay ouray articularpay iendfray.”

e“shay eemssay aay eryvay easantplay oungyay omanway,” aidsay Ingleybay.

oH“ay earday, esyay; utbay ouyay ustmay ownay eshay isay eryvay ainplay. Adylay Ucaslay erselfhay
ashay oftenay aidsay osay, anday envieday emay Ane’sjay eautybay. Iay oday otnay ikelay otay oastbay
ofay myay ownay ildchay; utbay otay ebay uresay, Ane--onejay oesday otnay oftenay eesay anybodyay
etterbay ookinglay. Itay isay atwhay everybodyay ayssay. Iay oday otnay usttray myay ownay
artialitypay. Enwhay eshay asway onlyay ifteenfay erethay asway aay entlemangay atay myay
otherbray Ardiner’sgay inay owntay osay uchmay inay ovelay ithway erhay, atthay myay
ister-in-lawsay asway uresay ehay ouldway akemay erhay anay offeray eforebay eway amecay awayay.
Utbay, oweverhay, ehay idday otnay. Erhapspay ehay oughtthay erhay ootay oungyay. Oweverhay, ehay
otewray omesay ersesvay onay erhay, anday eryvay ettypray eythay ereway.”

aNd“ay osay endeday ishay affectionay,” aidsay Elizabethay, impatientlyay. eRe“thay ashay
eenbay anymay aay oneay, Iay ancyfay, overcomeay inay ethay amesay ayway. Iay onderway owhay irstfay
iscoveredday ethay efficacyay ofay oetrypay inay ivingdray awayay ovelay!”

i“ay avehay eenbay useday otay onsidercay oetrypay asay ethay ood_fay_ ofay ovelay,” aidsay Arcyday.

oF“ay aay inefay, outstay, ealthyhay ovelay itay aymay. Everythingay ourishesnay atwhay isay
ongstray alreadyay. Utbay ifay itay ebay onlyay aay ightslay, inthay ortsay ofay inclinationay, Iay
amay onvincedcay atthay oneay oodgay onnetsay illway arvestay itay entirelyay awayay.”

Arcyday onlyay iledsmay; anday ethay eneralgay ausepay ichwhay ensueday ademay Elizabethay
embletray estlay erhay othermay ouldshay ebay exposingay erselfhay againay. Eshay ongedlay otay
eakspay, utbay ouldcay inkthay ofay othingnay otay aysay; anday afteray aay ortshay ilencesay mrsay.
Ennetbay eganbay epeatingray erhay anksthay otay mray. Ingleybay orfay ishay indnesskay otay
Anejay, ithway anay apologyay orfay oublingtray imhay alsoay ithway Izzylay. mray. Ingleybay asway
unaffectedlyay ivilcay inay ishay answeray, anday orcedfay ishay oungeryay istersay otay ebay
ivilcay alsoay, anday aysay atwhay ethay occasionay equiredray. Eshay erformedpay erhay artpay,
indeeday, ithoutway uchmay aciousnessgray, utbay mrsay. Ennetbay asway atisfiedsay, anday
oonsay afterwardsay ordereday erhay arriagecay. Uponay isthay ignalsay, ethay oungestyay ofay
erhay aughtersday utpay erselfhay orwardfay. Ethay otway irlsgay adhay eenbay isperingwhay otay
eachay otheray uringday ethay olewhay isitvay; anday ethay esultray ofay itay asway, atthay ethay
oungestyay ouldshay axtay mray. Ingleybay ithway avinghay omisedpray onay ishay irstfay omingcay
intoay ethay ountrycay otay ivegay aay allbay atay Etherfieldnay.

Ialyday asway aay outstay, ell-grownway irlgay ofay ifteenfay, ithway aay inefay omplexioncay
anday ood-humouredgay ountenancecay; aay avouritefay ithway erhay othermay, osewhay
affectionay adhay oughtbray erhay intoay ublicpay atay anay earlyay ageay. Eshay adhay ighhay
animalay iritsspay, anday aay ortsay ofay aturalnay elf-consequencesay, ichwhay ethay
attentionsay ofay ethay officersay, otay omwhay erhay uncle’say oodgay innersday anday erhay
ownay easyay annersmay ecommendedray erhay, adhay increaseday intoay assuranceay. Eshay asway
eryvay equalay, ereforethay, otay addressay mray. Ingleybay onay ethay ubjectsay ofay ethay
allbay, anday abruptlyay emindedray imhay ofay ishay omisepray; addingay, atthay itay ouldway ebay
ethay ostmay amefulshay ingthay inay ethay orldway ifay ehay idday otnay eepkay itay. Ishay answeray
otay isthay uddensay attackay asway elightfulday otay erhay other’smay earay.

i“ay amay erfectlypay eadyray, Iay assureay ouyay, otay eepkay myay engagementay; anday, enwhay
ouryay istersay isay ecoveredray, ouyay allshay, ifay ouyay easeplay, amenay ethay eryvay ayday ofay
ethay allbay. Utbay ouyay ouldway otnay ishway otay ebay ancingday ilewhay eshay isay illay?”

Ialyday eclaredday erselfhay atisfiedsay. oH“ay es--ityay ouldway ebay uchmay etterbay otay
aitway illtay Anejay asway ellway; anday byay atthay imetay, ostmay ikelylay, Aptaincay Artercay
ouldway ebay atay Erytonmay againay. Anday enwhay ouyay avehay ivengay our_yay_ allbay,” eshay
addeday, i“ay allshay insistay onay eirthay ivinggay oneay alsoay. Iay allshay elltay Olonelcay
Orsterfay itay illway ebay uiteqay aay ameshay ifay ehay oesday otnay.”

mrsay. Ennetbay anday erhay aughtersday enthay epartedday, anday Elizabethay eturnedray
instantlyay otay Anejay, eavinglay erhay ownay anday erhay elationsray’ ehaviourbay otay ethay
emarksray ofay ethay otway adieslay anday mray. Arcyday; ethay atterlay ofay omwhay, oweverhay,
ouldcay otnay ebay evailedpray onay otay oinjay inay eirthay ensurecay ofay er_hay_, inay itespay ofay
allay Issmay Ingley’sbay itticismsway onay ine_fay eyesay_.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay xay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay ayday assedpay uchmay asay ethay ayday eforebay adhay oneday. mrsay. Ursthay anday Issmay
Ingleybay adhay entspay omesay ourshay ofay ethay orningmay ithway ethay invaliday, owhay
ontinuedcay, oughthay owlyslay, otay endmay; anday, inay ethay eveningay, Elizabethay oinedjay
eirthay artypay inay ethay awing-roomdray. Ethay oolay abletay, oweverhay, idday otnay appearay.
mray. Arcyday asway itingwray, anday Issmay Ingleybay, eatedsay earnay imhay, asway atchingway
ethay ogresspray ofay ishay etterlay, anday epeatedlyray allingcay offay ishay attentionay byay
essagesmay otay ishay istersay. mray. Ursthay anday mray. Ingleybay ereway atay iquetpay, anday
mrsay. Ursthay asway observingay eirthay amegay.

Elizabethay ooktay upay omesay eedleworknay, anday asway ufficientlysay amuseday inay
attendingay otay atwhay assedpay etweenbay Arcyday anday ishay ompanioncay. Ethay erpetualpay
ommendationscay ofay ethay adylay eitheray onay ishay and-writinghay, oray onay ethay evennessay
ofay ishay ineslay, oray onay ethay engthlay ofay ishay etterlay, ithway ethay erfectpay unconcernay
ithway ichwhay erhay aisespray ereway eceivedray, ormedfay aay uriouscay ialogueday, anday asway
exactlyay inay unisonay ithway erhay opinionay ofay eachay.

oW“hay elightedday Issmay Arcyday illway ebay otay eceiveray uchsay aay etterlay!”

Ehay ademay onay answeray.

oU“yay itewray uncommonlyay astfay.”

oU“yay areay istakenmay. Iay itewray atherray owlyslay.”

oW“hay anymay etterslay ouyay ustmay avehay occasionay otay itewray inay ethay oursecay ofay aay
earyay! Etterslay ofay usinessbay, ootay! Owhay odiousay Iay ouldshay inkthay emthay!”

iT“ay isay ortunatefay, enthay, atthay eythay allfay otay myay otlay insteaday ofay otay oursyay.”

aY“pray elltay ouryay istersay atthay Iay onglay otay eesay erhay.”

i“ay avehay alreadyay oldtay erhay osay onceay, byay ouryay esireday.”

i“ay amay afraiday ouyay oday otnay ikelay ouryay enpay. Etlay emay endmay itay orfay ouyay. Iay endmay
enspay emarkablyray ellway.”

aNk“thay ou--butyay Iay alwaysay endmay myay ownay.”

oW“hay ancay ouyay ontrivecay otay itewray osay evenay?”

Ehay asway ilentsay.

eLl“tay ouryay istersay Iay amay elightedday otay earhay ofay erhay improvementay onay ethay arphay,
anday aypray etlay erhay owknay atthay Iay amay uiteqay inay apturesray ithway erhay eautifulbay
ittlelay esignday orfay aay abletay, anday Iay inkthay itay infinitelyay uperiorsay otay Issmay
Antley’sgray.”

iLl“way ouyay ivegay emay eavelay otay eferday ouryay apturesray illtay Iay itewray againay? Atay
esentpray Iay avehay otnay oomray otay oday emthay usticejay.”

oH“ay, itay isay ofay onay onsequencecay. Iay allshay eesay erhay inay Anuaryjay. Utbay oday ouyay
alwaysay itewray uchsay armingchay onglay etterslay otay erhay, mray. Arcyday?”

eY“thay areay enerallygay onglay; utbay etherwhay alwaysay armingchay, itay isay otnay orfay emay
otay etermineday.”

iT“ay isay aay uleray ithway emay, atthay aay ersonpay owhay ancay itewray aay onglay etterlay ithway
easeay annotcay itewray illay.”

aT“thay illway otnay oday orfay aay omplimentcay otay Arcyday, Arolinecay,” iedcray erhay
otherbray, ecause“bay ehay oesday ot_nay_ itewray ithway easeay. Ehay udiesstay ootay uchmay
orfay ordsway ofay ourfay ablessyllay. Oday otnay ouyay, Arcyday?”

“myay estylay ofay itingwray isay eryvay ifferentday omfray oursyay.”

oH“ay,” iedcray Issmay Ingleybay, aRles“chay iteswray inay ethay ostmay arelesscay ayway
imaginableay. Ehay eaveslay outay alfhay ishay ordsway, anday otsblay ethay estray.”

“myay ideasay owflay osay apidlyray atthay Iay avehay otnay imetay otay expressay emthay; byay ichwhay
eansmay myay etterslay ometimessay onveycay onay ideasay atay allay otay myay orrespondentscay.”

oUr“yay umilityhay, mray. Ingleybay,” aidsay Elizabethay, ust“may isarmday eproofray.”

oThing“nay isay oremay eceitfulday,” aidsay Arcyday, an“thay ethay appearanceay ofay
umilityhay. Itay isay oftenay onlyay arelessnesscay ofay opinionay, anday ometimessay anay
indirectay oastbay.”

aNd“ay ichwhay ofay ethay otway oday ouyay allcay _myay_ ittlelay ecentray iecepay ofay odestymay?”

e“thay indirectay oastbay; orfay ouyay areay eallyray oudpray ofay ouryay efectsday inay
itingwray, ecausebay ouyay onsidercay emthay asay oceedingpray omfray aay apidityray ofay
oughtthay anday arelessnesscay ofay executionay, ichwhay, ifay otnay estimableay, ouyay
inkthay atay eastlay ighlyhay interestingay. Ethay owerpay ofay oingday anythingay ithway
uicknessqay isay alwaysay uchmay izedpray byay ethay ossessorpay, anday oftenay ithoutway anyay
attentionay otay ethay imperfectionay ofay ethay erformancepay. Enwhay ouyay oldtay mrsay.
Ennetbay isthay orningmay, atthay ifay ouyay everay esolvedray onay uittingqay Etherfieldnay
ouyay ouldshay ebay onegay inay ivefay inutesmay, ouyay eantmay itay otay ebay aay ortsay ofay
anegyricpay, ofay omplimentcay otay ourselfyay; anday etyay atwhay isay erethay osay eryvay
audablelay inay aay ecipitancepray ichwhay ustmay eavelay eryvay ecessarynay usinessbay
undoneay, anday ancay ebay ofay onay ealray advantageay otay ourselfyay oray anyoneay elseay?”

aY“nay,” iedcray Ingleybay, is“thay isay ootay uchmay, otay ememberray atay ightnay allay ethay
oolishfay ingsthay atthay ereway aidsay inay ethay orningmay. Anday etyay, uponay myay onourhay, Iay
elievedbay atwhay Iay aidsay ofay elfmysay otay ebay uetray, anday Iay elievebay itay atay isthay
omentmay. Atay eastlay, ereforethay, Iay idday otnay assumeay ethay aracterchay ofay eedlessnay
ecipitancepray erelymay otay owshay offay eforebay ethay adieslay.”

i“ay aresayday ouyay elievedbay itay; utbay Iay amay byay onay eansmay onvincedcay atthay ouyay
ouldway ebay onegay ithway uchsay eleritycay. Ouryay onductcay ouldway ebay uiteqay asay
ependentday onay ancechay asay atthay ofay anyay anmay Iay owknay; anday ifay, asay ouyay ereway
ountingmay ouryay orsehay, aay iendfray ereway otay aysay, iNgley‘bay, ouyay adhay etterbay aystay
illtay extnay eekway,’ ouyay ouldway obablypray oday it--youay ouldway obablypray otnay
o--andgay, atay anotheray ordway, ightmay aystay aay onthmay.”

oU“yay avehay onlyay ovedpray byay isthay,” iedcray Elizabethay, at“thay mray. Ingleybay idday
otnay oday usticejay otay ishay ownay ispositionday. Ouyay avehay ownshay imhay offay ownay uchmay
oremay anthay ehay idday imselfhay.”

i“ay amay exceedinglyay atifiedgray,” aidsay Ingleybay, “byay ouryay onvertingcay atwhay myay
iendfray ayssay intoay aay omplimentcay onay ethay eetnesssway ofay myay empertay. Utbay Iay amay
afraiday ouyay areay ivinggay itay aay urntay ichwhay atthay entlemangay idday byay onay eansmay
intenday; orfay ehay ouldway ertainlycay inkthay ethay etterbay ofay emay ifay, underay uchsay aay
ircumstancecay, Iay ereway otay ivegay aay atflay enialday, anday ideray offay asay astfay asay Iay
ouldcay.”

oUld“way mray. Arcyday enthay onsidercay ethay ashnessray ofay ouryay originalay intentionay
asay atoneday orfay byay ouryay obstinacyay inay adheringay otay itay?”

uPon“ay myay ordway, Iay annotcay exactlyay explainay ethay atter--dArcymay ustmay eakspay orfay
imselfhay.”

oU“yay expectay emay otay accountay orfay opinionsay ichwhay ouyay oosechay otay allcay inemay,
utbay ichwhay Iay avehay evernay acknowledgeday. Allowingay ethay asecay, oweverhay, otay
andstay accordingay otay ouryay epresentationray, ouyay ustmay ememberray, Issmay Ennetbay,
atthay ethay iendfray owhay isay upposedsay otay esireday ishay eturnray otay ethay ousehay, anday
ethay elayday ofay ishay anplay, ashay erelymay esiredday itay, askeday itay ithoutway offeringay
oneay argumentay inay avourfay ofay itsay oprietypray.”

o“tay ieldyay eadily--easily--toray ethay ersuasion_pay_ ofay aay iendfray isay onay eritmay
ithway ouyay.”

o“tay ieldyay ithoutway onvictioncay isay onay omplimentcay otay ethay understandingay ofay
eitheray.”

oU“yay appearay otay emay, mray. Arcyday, otay alloway othingnay orfay ethay influenceay ofay
iendshipfray anday affectionay. Aay egardray orfay ethay equesterray ouldway oftenay akemay
oneay eadilyray ieldyay otay aay equestray, ithoutway aitingway orfay argumentsay otay easonray
oneay intoay itay. Iay amay otnay articularlypay eakingspay ofay uchsay aay asecay asay ouyay avehay
upposedsay aboutay mray. Ingleybay. Eway aymay asay ellway aitway, erhapspay, illtay ethay
ircumstancecay occursay, eforebay eway iscussday ethay iscretionday ofay ishay ehaviourbay
ereuponthay. Utbay inay eneralgay anday ordinaryay asescay, etweenbay iendfray anday iendfray,
erewhay oneay ofay emthay isay esiredday byay ethay otheray otay angechay aay esolutionray ofay onay
eryvay eatgray omentmay, ouldshay ouyay inkthay illay ofay atthay ersonpay orfay omplyingcay
ithway ethay esireday, ithoutway aitingway otay ebay argueday intoay itay?”

iLl“way itay otnay ebay advisableay, eforebay eway oceedpray onay isthay ubjectsay, otay arrangeay
ithway atherray oremay ecisionpray ethay egreeday ofay importanceay ichwhay isay otay
appertainay otay isthay equestray, asay ellway asay ethay egreeday ofay intimacyay ubsistingsay
etweenbay ethay artiespay?”

“byay allay eansmay,” iedcray Ingleybay; et“lay usay earhay allay ethay articularspay, otnay
orgettingfay eirthay omparativecay eighthay anday izesay, orfay atthay illway avehay oremay
eightway inay ethay argumentay, Issmay Ennetbay, anthay ouyay aymay ebay awareay ofay. Iay assureay
ouyay atthay ifay Arcyday ereway otnay uchsay aay eatgray alltay ellowfay, inay omparisoncay ithway
elfmysay, Iay ouldshay otnay aypay imhay alfhay osay uchmay eferenceday. Iay eclareday Iay oday otnay
owknay aay oremay awfulay objectay anthay Arcyday onay articularpay occasionsay, anday inay
articularpay acesplay; atay ishay ownay ousehay especiallyay, anday ofay aay Undaysay eveningay,
enwhay ehay ashay othingnay otay oday.”

mray. Arcyday iledsmay; utbay Elizabethay oughtthay eshay ouldcay erceivepay atthay ehay asway
atherray offendeday, anday ereforethay eckedchay erhay aughlay. Issmay Ingleybay armlyway
esentedray ethay indignityay ehay adhay eceivedray, inay anay expostulationay ithway erhay
otherbray orfay alkingtay uchsay onsensenay.

i“ay eesay ouryay esignday, Ingleybay,” aidsay ishay iendfray. oU“yay islikeday anay argumentay,
anday antway otay ilencesay isthay.”

eRhaps“pay Iay oday. Argumentsay areay ootay uchmay ikelay isputesday. Ifay ouyay anday Issmay
Ennetbay illway eferday oursyay illtay Iay amay outay ofay ethay oomray, Iay allshay ebay eryvay
ankfulthay; anday enthay ouyay aymay aysay ateverwhay ouyay ikelay ofay emay.”

aT“whay ouyay askay,” aidsay Elizabethay, is“ay onay acrificesay onay myay idesay; anday mray.
Arcyday adhay uchmay etterbay inishfay ishay etterlay.”

mray. Arcyday ooktay erhay adviceay, anday idday inishfay ishay etterlay.

Enwhay atthay usinessbay asway overay, ehay applieday otay Issmay Ingleybay anday Elizabethay
orfay ethay indulgenceay ofay omesay usicmay. Issmay Ingleybay ovedmay ithway alacrityay otay
ethay ianofortepay, anday afteray aay olitepay equestray atthay Elizabethay ouldway eadlay ethay
ayway, ichwhay ethay otheray asay olitelypay anday oremay earnestlyay egativednay, eshay
eatedsay erselfhay.

mrsay. Ursthay angsay ithway erhay istersay; anday ilewhay eythay ereway usthay employeday,
Elizabethay ouldcay otnay elphay observingay, asay eshay urnedtay overay omesay usic-booksmay
atthay aylay onay ethay instrumentay, owhay equentlyfray mray. Arcy’sday eyesay ereway ixedfay
onay erhay. Eshay ardlyhay ewknay owhay otay upposesay atthay eshay ouldcay ebay anay objectay ofay
admirationay otay osay eatgray aay anmay, anday etyay atthay ehay ouldshay ooklay atay erhay ecausebay
ehay islikedday erhay asway illstay oremay angestray. Eshay ouldcay onlyay imagineay, oweverhay,
atay astlay, atthay eshay ewdray ishay oticenay ecausebay erethay asway omethingsay aboutay erhay
oremay ongwray anday eprehensibleray, accordingay otay ishay ideasay ofay ightray, anthay inay
anyay otheray ersonpay esentpray. Ethay uppositionsay idday otnay ainpay erhay. Eshay ikedlay
imhay ootay ittlelay otay arecay orfay ishay approbationay.

Afteray ayingplay omesay Italianay ongssay, Issmay Ingleybay ariedvay ethay armchay byay aay
ivelylay Otchscay airay; anday oonsay afterwardsay mray. Arcyday, awingdray earnay
Elizabethay, aidsay otay erhay,--

o“day ouyay otnay eelfay aay eatgray inclinationay, Issmay Ennetbay, otay eizesay uchsay anay
opportunityay ofay ancingday aay eelray?”

Eshay iledsmay, utbay ademay onay answeray. Ehay epeatedray ethay uestionqay, ithway omesay
urprisesay atay erhay ilencesay.

oH“ay,” aidsay eshay, i“ay eardhay ouyay eforebay; utbay Iay ouldcay otnay immediatelyay
etermineday atwhay otay aysay inay eplyray. Ouyay antedway emay, Iay owknay, otay aysay eS‘yay,’
atthay ouyay ightmay avehay ethay easureplay ofay espisingday myay astetay; utbay Iay alwaysay
elightday inay overthrowingay osethay indkay ofay emesschay, anday eatingchay aay ersonpay ofay
eirthay emeditatedpray ontemptcay. Iay avehay, ereforethay, ademay upay myay indmay otay elltay
ouyay atthay Iay oday otnay antway otay anceday aay eelray atay allay; anday ownay espiseday emay ifay ouyay
areday.”

iNdeed“ay Iay oday otnay areday.”

Elizabethay, avinghay atherray expecteday otay affrontay imhay, asway amazeday atay ishay
allantrygay; utbay erethay asway aay ixturemay ofay eetnesssway anday archnessay inay erhay
annermay ichwhay ademay itay ifficultday orfay erhay otay affrontay anybodyay, anday Arcyday adhay
evernay eenbay osay ewitchedbay byay anyay omanway asay ehay asway byay erhay. Ehay eallyray
elievedbay atthay, ereway itay otnay orfay ethay inferiorityay ofay erhay onnectionscay, ehay
ouldshay ebay inay omesay angerday.

Issmay Ingleybay awsay, oray uspectedsay, enoughay otay ebay ealousjay; anday erhay eatgray
anxietyay orfay ethay ecoveryray ofay erhay earday iendfray Anejay eceivedray omesay
assistanceay omfray erhay esireday ofay ettinggay idray ofay Elizabethay.

Eshay oftenay iedtray otay ovokepray Arcyday intoay islikingday erhay uestgay, byay alkingtay ofay
eirthay upposedsay arriagemay, anday anningplay ishay appinesshay inay uchsay anay allianceay.

i“ay opehay,” aidsay eshay, asay eythay ereway alkingway ogethertay inay ethay ubberyshray ethay
extnay ayday, ou“yay illway ivegay ouryay other-in-lawmay aay ewfay intshay, enwhay isthay
esirableday eventay akestay aceplay, asay otay ethay advantageay ofay oldinghay erhay onguetay;
anday ifay ouyay ancay ompasscay itay, otay urecay ethay oungeryay irlsgay ofay unningray afteray
ethay officersay. Anday, ifay Iay aymay entionmay osay elicateday aay ubjectsay, endeavouray otay
eckchay atthay ittlelay omethingsay, orderingbay onay onceitcay anday impertinenceay,
ichwhay ouryay adylay ossessespay.”

iLlustration[ay:

o“nay, onay; aystay erewhay ouyay areay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

aVe“hay ouyay anythingay elseay otay oposepray orfay myay omesticday elicityfay?”

oH“ay esyay. Oday etlay ethay ortraitspay ofay ouryay uncleay anday auntay Ilipsphay ebay acedplay
inay ethay allerygay atay Emberleypay. Utpay emthay extnay otay ouryay eat-unclegray ethay
udgejay. Eythay areay inay ethay amesay ofessionpray, ouyay owknay, onlyay inay ifferentday
ineslay. Asay orfay ouryay Elizabeth’say icturepay, ouyay ustmay otnay attemptay otay avehay itay
akentay, orfay atwhay ainterpay ouldcay oday usticejay otay osethay eautifulbay eyesay?”

iT“ay ouldway otnay ebay easyay, indeeday, otay atchcay eirthay expressionay; utbay eirthay
olourcay anday apeshay, anday ethay eyelashesay, osay emarkablyray inefay, ightmay ebay
opiedcay.”

Atay atthay omentmay eythay ereway etmay omfray anotheray alkway byay mrsay. Ursthay anday
Elizabethay erselfhay.

i“ay idday otnay owknay atthay ouyay intendeday otay alkway,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay, inay omesay
onfusioncay, estlay eythay adhay eenbay overhearday.

oU“yay useday usay abominablyay illay,” answereday mrsay. Ursthay, unning“ray awayay ithoutway
ellingtay usay atthay ouyay ereway omingcay outay.”

Enthay akingtay ethay isengagedday armay ofay mray. Arcyday, eshay eftlay Elizabethay otay alkway
byay erselfhay. Ethay athpay ustjay admitteday eethray. mray. Arcyday eltfay eirthay udenessray,
anday immediatelyay aidsay,--

iS“thay alkway isay otnay ideway enoughay orfay ouray artypay. Eway adhay etterbay ogay intoay ethay
avenueay.”

Utbay Elizabethay, owhay adhay otnay ethay eastlay inclinationay otay emainray ithway emthay,
aughinglylay answereday,--

o“nay, onay; aystay erewhay ouyay areay. Ouyay areay arminglychay oupedgray, anday appearay otay
uncommonay advantageay. Ethay icturesquepay ouldway ebay oiltspay byay admittingay aay
ourthfay. Ood-byegay.”

Eshay enthay anray ailygay offay, ejoicingray, asay eshay ambledray aboutay, inay ethay opehay ofay
eingbay atay omehay againay inay aay ayday oray otway. Anejay asway alreadyay osay uchmay ecoveredray
asay otay intenday eavinglay erhay oomray orfay aay ouplecay ofay ourshay atthay eveningay.




iLlustration[ay:

iLing“pay upay ethay irefay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay Ixay.


iLlustration[ay]

Enwhay ethay adieslay emovedray afteray innerday Elizabethay anray upay otay erhay istersay, anday
eeingsay erhay ellway uardedgay omfray oldcay, attendeday erhay intoay ethay awing-roomdray,
erewhay eshay asway elcomedway byay erhay otway iendsfray ithway anymay ofessionspray ofay
easureplay; anday Elizabethay adhay evernay eensay emthay osay agreeableay asay eythay ereway
uringday ethay ourhay ichwhay assedpay eforebay ethay entlemengay appeareday. Eirthay owerspay
ofay onversationcay ereway onsiderablecay. Eythay ouldcay escribeday anay entertainmentay
ithway accuracyay, elateray anay anecdoteay ithway umourhay, anday aughlay atay eirthay
acquaintanceay ithway iritspay.

Utbay enwhay ethay entlemengay entereday, Anejay asway onay ongerlay ethay irstfay objectay;
Issmay Ingley’sbay eyesay ereway instantlyay urnedtay owardstay Arcyday, anday eshay adhay
omethingsay otay aysay otay imhay eforebay ehay adhay advanceday anymay epsstay. Ehay addresseday
imselfhay irectlyday otay Issmay Ennetbay ithway aay olitepay ongratulationcay; mray. Ursthay
alsoay ademay erhay aay ightslay owbay, anday aidsay ehay asway ery“vay adglay;” utbay iffusenessday
anday armthway emainedray orfay Ingley’sbay alutationsay. Ehay asway ullfay ofay oyjay anday
attentionay. Ethay irstfay alfhay ourhay asway entspay inay ilingpay upay ethay irefay, estlay eshay
ouldshay uffersay omfray ethay angechay ofay oomray; anday eshay emovedray, atay ishay esireday,
otay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay ireplacefay, atthay eshay ightmay ebay artherfay omfray ethay
oorday. Ehay enthay atsay ownday byay erhay, anday alkedtay arcelyscay otay anyoneay elseay.
Elizabethay, atay orkway inay ethay oppositeay ornercay, awsay itay allay ithway eatgray
elightday.

Enwhay eatay asway overay mray. Ursthay emindedray ishay ister-in-lawsay ofay ethay
ard-table--butcay inay ainvay. Eshay adhay obtaineday ivatepray intelligenceay atthay mray.
Arcyday idday otnay ishway orfay ardscay, anday mray. Ursthay oonsay oundfay evenay ishay openay
etitionpay ejectedray. Eshay assureday imhay atthay onay oneay intendeday otay ayplay, anday ethay
ilencesay ofay ethay olewhay artypay onay ethay ubjectsay eemedsay otay ustifyjay erhay. mray.
Ursthay adhay, ereforethay, othingnay otay oday utbay otay etchstray imselfhay onay oneay ofay ethay
ofassay anday ogay otay eepslay. Arcyday ooktay upay aay ookbay. Issmay Ingleybay idday ethay amesay;
anday mrsay. Ursthay, incipallypray occupieday inay ayingplay ithway erhay aceletsbray anday
ingsray, oinedjay ownay anday enthay inay erhay other’sbray onversationcay ithway Issmay
Ennetbay.

Issmay Ingley’sbay attentionay asway uiteqay asay uchmay engageday inay atchingway mray.
Arcy’sday ogresspray oughthray is_hay_ ookbay, asay inay eadingray erhay ownay; anday eshay asway
erpetuallypay eitheray akingmay omesay inquiryay, oray ookinglay atay ishay agepay. Eshay
ouldcay otnay inway imhay, oweverhay, otay anyay onversationcay; ehay erelymay answereday erhay
uestionqay anday eadray onay. Atay engthlay, uiteqay exhausteday byay ethay attemptay otay ebay
amuseday ithway erhay ownay ookbay, ichwhay eshay adhay onlyay osenchay ecausebay itay asway ethay
econdsay olumevay ofay ishay, eshay avegay aay eatgray awnyay anday aidsay, oW“hay easantplay itay
isay otay endspay anay eveningay inay isthay ayway! Iay eclareday, afteray allay, erethay isay onay
enjoymentay ikelay eadingray! Owhay uchmay oonersay oneay irestay ofay anythingay anthay ofay aay
ookbay! Enwhay Iay avehay aay ousehay ofay myay ownay, Iay allshay ebay iserablemay ifay Iay avehay otnay
anay excellentay ibrarylay.”

Onay oneay ademay anyay eplyray. Eshay enthay awnedyay againay, ewthray asideay erhay ookbay, anday
astcay erhay eyesay oundray ethay oomray inay uestqay ofay omesay amusementay; enwhay, earinghay
erhay otherbray entioningmay aay allbay otay Issmay Ennetbay, eshay urnedtay uddenlysay
owardstay imhay anday aidsay,--

“byay ethay ebyay Arleschay, areay ouyay eallyray erioussay inay editatingmay aay anceday atay
Etherfieldnay? Iay ouldway adviseay ouyay, eforebay ouyay etermineday onay itay, otay onsultcay
ethay ishesway ofay ethay esentpray artypay; Iay amay uchmay istakenmay ifay erethay areay otnay
omesay amongay usay otay omwhay aay allbay ouldway ebay atherray aay unishmentpay anthay aay
easureplay.”

iF“ay ouyay eanmay Arcyday,” iedcray erhay otherbray, e“hay aymay ogay otay edbay, ifay ehay
ooseschay, eforebay itay eginsbay; utbay asay orfay ethay allbay, itay isay uiteqay aay ettledsay
ingthay, anday asay oonsay asay Ichollsnay ashay ademay itewhay oupsay enoughay Iay allshay endsay
oundray myay ardscay.”

i“ay ouldshay ikelay allsbay infinitelyay etterbay,” eshay epliedray, if“ay eythay ereway
arriedcay onay inay aay ifferentday annermay; utbay erethay isay omethingsay insufferablyay
edioustay inay ethay usualay ocesspray ofay uchsay aay eetingmay. Itay ouldway urelysay ebay uchmay
oremay ationalray ifay onversationcay insteaday ofay ancingday ademay ethay orderay ofay ethay
ayday.”

uCh“may oremay ationalray, myay earday Arolinecay, Iay areday aysay; utbay itay ouldway otnay ebay
earnay osay uchmay ikelay aay allbay.”
