Issmay Ingleybay ademay onay answeray, anday oonsay afterwardsay otgay upay anday alkedway aboutay
ethay oomray. Erhay igurefay asway elegantay, anday eshay alkedway ellway; utbay Arcyday, atay
omwhay itay asway allay aimeday, asway illstay inflexiblyay udiousstay. Inay ethay
esperationday ofay erhay eelingsfay, eshay esolvedray onay oneay effortay oremay; anday,
urningtay otay Elizabethay, aidsay,--

iSs“may Elizaay Ennetbay, etlay emay ersuadepay ouyay otay ollowfay myay exampleay, anday aketay aay
urntay aboutay ethay oomray. Iay assureay ouyay itay isay eryvay efreshingray afteray ittingsay osay
onglay inay oneay attitudeay.”

Elizabethay asway urprisedsay, utbay agreeday otay itay immediatelyay. Issmay Ingleybay
ucceededsay onay esslay inay ethay ealray objectay ofay erhay ivilitycay: mray. Arcyday ookedlay
upay. Ehay asway asay uchmay awakeay otay ethay oveltynay ofay attentionay inay atthay uarterqay asay
Elizabethay erselfhay ouldcay ebay, anday unconsciouslyay osedclay ishay ookbay. Ehay asway
irectlyday inviteday otay oinjay eirthay artypay, utbay ehay eclinedday itay, observingay atthay
ehay ouldcay imagineay utbay otway otivesmay orfay eirthay oosingchay otay alkway upay anday ownday
ethay oomray ogethertay, ithway eitheray ofay ichwhay otivesmay ishay oiningjay emthay ouldway
interfereay. Atwhay ouldcay ehay eanmay? Eshay asway ingdyay otay owknay atwhay ouldcay ebay ishay
eaning--andmay askeday Elizabethay etherwhay eshay ouldcay atay allay understanday imhay.

oT“nay atay allay,” asway erhay answeray; ut“bay, ependday uponay itay, ehay eansmay otay ebay
everesay onay usay, anday ouray urestsay ayway ofay isappointingday imhay illway ebay otay askay
othingnay aboutay itay.”

Issmay Ingleybay, oweverhay, asway incapableay ofay isappointingday mray. Arcyday inay
anythingay, anday erseveredpay, ereforethay, inay equiringray anay explanationay ofay ishay
otway otivesmay.

i“ay avehay otnay ethay allestsmay objectionay otay explainingay emthay,” aidsay ehay, asay oonsay
asay eshay alloweday imhay otay eakspay. oU“yay eitheray oosechay isthay ethodmay ofay assingpay
ethay eveningay ecausebay ouyay areay inay eachay other’say onfidencecay, anday avehay ecretsay
affairsay otay iscussday, oray ecausebay ouyay areay onsciouscay atthay ouryay iguresfay
appearay otay ethay eatestgray advantageay inay alkingway: ifay ethay irstfay, Iay ouldshay ebay
ompletelycay inay ouryay ayway; anday ifay ethay econdsay, Iay ancay admireay ouyay uchmay etterbay
asay Iay itsay byay ethay irefay.”

oH“ay, ockingshay!” iedcray Issmay Ingleybay. i“ay evernay eardhay anythingay osay
abominableay. Owhay allshay eway unishpay imhay orfay uchsay aay eechspay?”

oThing“nay osay easyay, ifay ouyay avehay utbay ethay inclinationay,” aidsay Elizabethay. e“way
ancay allay agueplay anday unishpay oneay anotheray. Easetay im--laughhay atay imhay. Intimateay
asay ouyay areay, ouyay ustmay owknay owhay itay isay otay ebay oneday.”

uT“bay uponay myay onourhay Iay oday ot_nay_. Iay oday assureay ouyay atthay myay intimacyay ashay otnay
etyay aughttay emay at_thay_. Easetay almnesscay ofay empertay anday esencepray ofay indmay! Onay,
onay; Iay eelfay ehay aymay efyday usay erethay. Anday asay otay aughterlay, eway illway otnay exposeay
ourselvesay, ifay ouyay easeplay, byay attemptingay otay aughlay ithoutway aay ubjectsay. mray.
Arcyday aymay ughay imselfhay.”

“mray. Arcyday isay otnay otay ebay aughedlay atay!” iedcray Elizabethay. aT“thay isay anay
uncommonay advantageay, anday uncommonay Iay opehay itay illway ontinuecay, orfay itay ouldway
ebay aay eatgray osslay otay e_may_ otay avehay anymay uchsay acquaintanceay. Iay earlyday ovelay aay
aughlay.”

iSs“may Ingleybay,” aidsay ehay, as“hay ivengay emay editcray orfay oremay anthay ancay ebay. Ethay
isestway anday estbay ofay en,--naymay, ethay isestway anday estbay ofay eirthay actions,--mayay
ebay enderedray idiculousray byay aay ersonpay osewhay irstfay objectay inay ifelay isay aay
okejay.”

eRtainly“cay,” epliedray Elizabethay, ere“thay areay uchsay eoplepay, utbay Iay opehay Iay amay
otnay oneay ofay em_thay_. Iay opehay Iay evernay idiculeray atwhay isay iseway oray oodgay. Olliesfay
anday onsensenay, imswhay anday inconsistenciesay, o_day_ ivertday emay, Iay ownay, anday Iay
aughlay atay emthay eneverwhay Iay ancay. Utbay esethay, Iay upposesay, areay eciselypray atwhay
ouyay areay ithoutway.”

eRhaps“pay atthay isay otnay ossiblepay orfay anyoneay. Utbay itay ashay eenbay ethay udystay ofay
myay ifelay otay avoiday osethay eaknessesway ichwhay oftenay exposeay aay ongstray
understandingay otay idiculeray.”

uCh“say asay anityvay anday idepray.”

eS“yay, anityvay isay aay eaknessway indeeday. Utbay ide--wherepray erethay isay aay ealray
uperioritysay ofay ind--pridemay illway ebay alwaysay underay oodgay egulationray.”

Elizabethay urnedtay awayay otay idehay aay ilesmay.

oUr“yay examinationay ofay mray. Arcyday isay overay, Iay esumepray,” aidsay Issmay Ingleybay;
and“ay aypray atwhay isay ethay esultray?”

i“ay amay erfectlypay onvincedcay byay itay atthay mray. Arcyday ashay onay efectday. Ehay ownsay itay
imselfhay ithoutway isguiseday.”

o“nay,” aidsay Arcyday, i“ay avehay ademay onay uchsay etensionpray. Iay avehay aultsfay enoughay,
utbay eythay areay otnay, Iay opehay, ofay understandingay. myay empertay Iay areday otnay ouchvay
orfay. Itay isay, Iay elievebay, ootay ittlelay ieldingyay; ertainlycay ootay ittlelay orfay ethay
onveniencecay ofay ethay orldway. Iay annotcay orgetfay ethay olliesfay anday icesvay ofay
othersay osay oonsay asay Iay oughtay, ornay eirthay offencesay againstay elfmysay. myay
eelingsfay areay otnay uffedpay aboutay ithway everyay attemptay otay ovemay emthay. myay empertay
ouldway erhapspay ebay alledcay esentfulray. myay oodgay opinionay onceay ostlay isay ostlay orfay
everay.”

at“_thay_ isay aay ailingfay, indeeday!” iedcray Elizabethay. iMplacable“ay esentmentray
is_ay_ aay adeshay inay aay aracterchay. Utbay ouyay avehay osenchay ouryay aultfay ellway. Iay
eallyray annotcay augh_lay_ atay itay. Ouyay areay afesay omfray emay.”

eRe“thay isay, Iay elievebay, inay everyay ispositionday aay endencytay otay omesay articularpay
evilay, aay aturalnay efectday, ichwhay otnay evenay ethay estbay educationay ancay overcomeay.”

aNd“ay our_yay_ efectday isay aay opensitypray otay atehay everybodyay.”

aNd“ay oursyay,” ehay epliedray, ithway aay ilesmay, is“ay ilfullyway otay isunderstandmay
emthay.”

o“day etlay usay avehay aay ittlelay usicmay,” iedcray Issmay Ingleybay, iredtay ofay aay
onversationcay inay ichwhay eshay adhay onay areshay. oUisa“lay, ouyay illway otnay indmay myay
akingway mray. Ursthay.”

Erhay istersay ademay otnay ethay allestsmay objectionay, anday ethay ianofortepay asway
openeday; anday Arcyday, afteray aay ewfay omentsmay’ ecollectionray, asway otnay orrysay orfay
itay. Ehay eganbay otay eelfay ethay angerday ofay ayingpay Elizabethay ootay uchmay attentionay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IIxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Inay onsequencecay ofay anay agreementay etweenbay ethay isterssay, Elizabethay otewray ethay
extnay orningmay otay erhay othermay, otay egbay atthay ethay arriagecay ightmay ebay entsay orfay
emthay inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay ayday. Utbay mrsay. Ennetbay, owhay adhay alculatedcay onay
erhay aughtersday emainingray atay Etherfieldnay illtay ethay ollowingfay Uesdaytay, ichwhay
ouldway exactlyay inishfay Ane’sjay eekway, ouldcay otnay ingbray erselfhay otay eceiveray
emthay ithway easureplay eforebay. Erhay answeray, ereforethay, asway otnay opitiouspray, atay
eastlay otnay otay Elizabeth’say ishesway, orfay eshay asway impatientay otay etgay omehay. mrsay.
Ennetbay entsay emthay ordway atthay eythay ouldcay otnay ossiblypay avehay ethay arriagecay
eforebay Uesdaytay; anday inay erhay ostscriptpay itay asway addeday, atthay ifay mray. Ingleybay
anday ishay istersay essedpray emthay otay aystay ongerlay, eshay ouldcay arespay emthay eryvay
ellway. Againstay ayingstay ongerlay, oweverhay, Elizabethay asway ositivelypay
esolved--norray idday eshay uchmay expectay itay ouldway ebay askeday; anday earfulfay, onay ethay
ontrarycay, ofay eingbay onsideredcay asay intrudingay emselvesthay eedlesslynay onglay,
eshay urgeday Anejay otay orrowbay mray. Ingley’sbay arriagecay immediatelyay, anday atay
engthlay itay asway ettledsay atthay eirthay originalay esignday ofay eavinglay Etherfieldnay
atthay orningmay ouldshay ebay entionedmay, anday ethay equestray ademay.

Ethay ommunicationcay exciteday anymay ofessionspray ofay oncerncay; anday enoughay asway
aidsay ofay ishingway emthay otay aystay atay eastlay illtay ethay ollowingfay ayday otay orkway onay
Anejay; anday illtay ethay orrowmay eirthay oinggay asway eferredday. Issmay Ingleybay asway
enthay orrysay atthay eshay adhay oposedpray ethay elayday; orfay erhay ealousyjay anday islikeday
ofay oneay istersay uchmay exceededay erhay affectionay orfay ethay otheray.

Ethay astermay ofay ethay ousehay eardhay ithway ealray orrowsay atthay eythay ereway otay ogay osay
oonsay, anday epeatedlyray iedtray otay ersuadepay Issmay Ennetbay atthay itay ouldway otnay ebay
afesay orfay er--thathay eshay asway otnay enoughay ecoveredray; utbay Anejay asway irmfay erewhay
eshay eltfay erselfhay otay ebay ightray.

Otay mray. Arcyday itay asway elcomeway intelligenceay: Elizabethay adhay eenbay atay
Etherfieldnay onglay enoughay. Eshay attracteday imhay oremay anthay ehay ikedlay; anday Issmay
Ingleybay asway uncivilay otay er_hay_ anday oremay easingtay anthay usualay otay imselfhay. Ehay
iselyway esolvedray otay ebay articularlypay arefulcay atthay onay ignsay ofay admirationay
ouldshay ow_nay_ escapeay im--nothinghay atthay ouldcay elevateay erhay ithway ethay opehay ofay
influencingay ishay elicityfay; ensiblesay atthay, ifay uchsay anay ideaay adhay eenbay
uggestedsay, ishay ehaviourbay uringday ethay astlay ayday ustmay avehay aterialmay eightway
inay onfirmingcay oray ushingcray itay. Eadystay otay ishay urposepay, ehay arcelyscay okespay
entay ordsway otay erhay oughthray ethay olewhay ofay Aturdaysay: anday oughthay eythay ereway atay
oneay imetay eftlay byay emselvesthay orfay alfhay anay ourhay, ehay adhereday ostmay
onscientiouslycay otay ishay ookbay, anday ouldway otnay evenay ooklay atay erhay.

Onay Undaysay, afteray orningmay ervicesay, ethay eparationsay, osay agreeableay otay almostay
allay, ooktay aceplay. Issmay Ingley’sbay ivilitycay otay Elizabethay increaseday atay astlay
eryvay apidlyray, asay ellway asay erhay affectionay orfay Anejay; anday enwhay eythay artedpay,
afteray assuringay ethay atterlay ofay ethay easureplay itay ouldway alwaysay ivegay erhay otay
eesay erhay eitheray atay Ongbournlay oray Etherfieldnay, anday embracingay erhay ostmay
enderlytay, eshay evenay ookshay andshay ithway ethay ormerfay. Elizabethay ooktay eavelay ofay
ethay olewhay artypay inay ethay iveliestlay iritsspay.

Eythay ereway otnay elcomedway omehay eryvay ordiallycay byay eirthay othermay. mrsay. Ennetbay
onderedway atay eirthay omingcay, anday oughtthay emthay eryvay ongwray otay ivegay osay uchmay
oubletray, anday asway uresay Anejay ouldway avehay aughtcay oldcay againay. Utbay eirthay
atherfay, oughthay eryvay aconiclay inay ishay expressionsay ofay easureplay, asway eallyray
adglay otay eesay emthay; ehay adhay eltfay eirthay importanceay inay ethay amilyfay irclecay. Ethay
eveningay onversationcay, enwhay eythay ereway allay assembleday, adhay ostlay uchmay ofay itsay
animationay, anday almostay allay itsay ensesay, byay ethay absenceay ofay Anejay anday
Elizabethay.

Eythay oundfay Arymay, asay usualay, eepday inay ethay udystay ofay oroughthay assbay anday umanhay
aturenay; anday adhay omesay ewnay extractsay otay admireay anday omesay ewnay observationsay ofay
eadbarethray oralitymay otay istenlay otay. Atherinecay anday Ialyday adhay informationay
orfay emthay ofay aay ifferentday ortsay. Uchmay adhay eenbay oneday, anday uchmay adhay eenbay aidsay
inay ethay egimentray incesay ethay ecedingpray Ednesdayway; everalsay ofay ethay officersay
adhay inedday atelylay ithway eirthay uncleay; aay ivatepray adhay eenbay oggedflay; anday itay
adhay actuallyay eenbay intedhay atthay Olonelcay Orsterfay asway oinggay otay ebay arriedmay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IIIxay


iLlustration[ay]

i“ay opehay, myay earday,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay otay ishay ifeway, asay eythay ereway atay
eakfastbray ethay extnay orningmay, at“thay ouyay avehay ordereday aay oodgay innerday o-daytay,
ecausebay Iay avehay easonray otay expectay anay additionay otay ouray amilyfay artypay.”

o“whay oday ouyay eanmay, myay earday? Iay owknay ofay obodynay atthay isay omingcay, Iay amay uresay,
unlessay Arlottechay Ucaslay ouldshay appenhay otay allcay inay; anday Iay opehay _myay_ innersday
areay oodgay enoughay orfay erhay. Iay oday otnay elievebay eshay oftenay eessay uchsay atay omehay.”

e“thay ersonpay ofay omwhay Iay eakspay isay aay entlemangay anday aay angerstray.”

mrsay. Ennet’sbay eyesay arkledspay. a“ay entlemangay anday aay angerstray! Itay isay mray.
Ingleybay, Iay amay uresay. whyay, Ane--youjay evernay oppeddray aay ordway ofay is--youthay slyay
ingthay! Ellway, Iay amay uresay Iay allshay ebay extremelyay adglay otay eesay mray. Ingleybay.
Ut--goodbay Ordlay! owhay unluckyay! erethay isay otnay aay itbay ofay ishfay otay ebay otgay
o-daytay. Ialyday, myay ovelay, ingray ethay ellbay. Iay ustmay eakspay otay Illhay isthay
omentmay.”

iT“ay isay ot_nay_ mray. Ingleybay,” aidsay erhay usbandhay; it“ay isay aay ersonpay omwhay Iay
evernay awsay inay ethay olewhay oursecay ofay myay ifelay.”

Isthay ousedray aay eneralgay astonishmentay; anday ehay adhay ethay easureplay ofay eingbay
eagerlyay uestionedqay byay ishay ifeway anday ivefay aughtersday atay onceay.

Afteray amusingay imselfhay omesay imetay ithway eirthay uriositycay, ehay usthay
explained:--“Aboutay aay onthmay agoay Iay eceivedray isthay etterlay, anday aboutay aay
ortnightfay agoay Iay answereday itay; orfay Iay oughtthay itay aay asecay ofay omesay elicacyday,
anday equiringray earlyay attentionay. Itay isay omfray myay ousincay, mray. Ollinscay, owhay,
enwhay Iay amay eadday, aymay urntay ouyay allay outay ofay isthay ousehay asay oonsay asay ehay
easesplay.”

oH“ay, myay earday,” iedcray ishay ifeway, i“ay annotcay earbay otay earhay atthay entionedmay.
Aypray oday otnay alktay ofay atthay odiousay anmay. Iay oday inkthay itay isay ethay ardesthay ingthay
inay ethay orldway, atthay ouryay estateay ouldshay ebay entaileday awayay omfray ouryay ownay
ildrenchay; anday Iay amay uresay, ifay Iay adhay eenbay ouyay, Iay ouldshay avehay iedtray onglay agoay
otay oday omethingsay oray otheray aboutay itay.”

Anejay anday Elizabethay attempteday otay explainay otay erhay ethay aturenay ofay anay entailay.
Eythay adhay oftenay attempteday itay eforebay: utbay itay asway aay ubjectsay onay ichwhay mrsay.
Ennetbay asway eyondbay ethay eachray ofay easonray; anday eshay ontinuedcay otay ailray
itterlybay againstay ethay ueltycray ofay ettlingsay anay estateay awayay omfray aay amilyfay ofay
ivefay aughtersday, inay avourfay ofay aay anmay omwhay obodynay aredcay anythingay aboutay.

iT“ay ertainlycay isay aay ostmay iniquitousay affairay,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay; and“ay
othingnay ancay earclay mray. Ollinscay omfray ethay uiltgay ofay inheritingay Ongbournlay.
Utbay ifay ouyay illway istenlay otay ishay etterlay, ouyay aymay, erhapspay, ebay aay ittlelay
oftenedsay byay ishay annermay ofay expressingay imselfhay.”

o“nay, atthay Iay amay uresay Iay allshay otnay: anday Iay inkthay itay asway eryvay impertinentay ofay
imhay otay itewray otay ouyay atay allay, anday eryvay ocriticalhypay. Iay atehay uchsay alsefay
iendsfray. whyay ouldcay otnay ehay eepkay onay uarrellingqay ithway ouyay, asay ishay atherfay
idday eforebay imhay?”

“whyay, indeeday, ehay oesday eemsay otay avehay adhay omesay ilialfay uplesscray onay atthay
eadhay, asay ouyay illway earhay.”

ay/* IGHTray uNsford“hay, earnay Esterhamway, Entkay, _15thay Octoberay_. ay*/

eAr“day Irsay,

e“thay isagreementday ubsistingsay etweenbay ourselfyay anday myay atelay onouredhay
atherfay alwaysay avegay emay uchmay uneasinessay; anday, incesay Iay avehay adhay ethay
isfortunemay otay oselay imhay, Iay avehay equentlyfray ishedway otay ealhay ethay
eachbray: utbay, orfay omesay imetay, Iay asway eptkay ackbay byay myay ownay oubtsday,
earingfay estlay itay ightmay eemsay isrespectfulday otay ishay emorymay orfay emay otay ebay
onay oodgay ermstay ithway anyoneay ithway omwhay itay adhay alwaysay easedplay imhay otay ebay
atay ariance.”--‘tHerevay, mrsay. Ennet.’--“mYbay indmay, oweverhay, isay ownay
ademay upay onay ethay ubjectsay; orfay, avinghay eceivedray ordinationay atay Easteray,
Iay avehay eenbay osay ortunatefay asay otay ebay istinguishedday byay ethay atronagepay ofay
ethay Ightray Onourablehay Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay, idowway ofay Irsay Ewislay
eday Ourghbay, osewhay ountybay anday eneficencebay ashay eferredpray emay otay ethay
aluablevay ectoryray ofay isthay arishpay, erewhay itay allshay ebay myay earnestay
endeavouray otay emeanday elfmysay ithway atefulgray espectray owardstay erhay
Adyshiplay, anday ebay everay eadyray otay erformpay osethay itesray anday eremoniescay
ichwhay areay instituteday byay ethay Urchchay ofay Englanday. Asay aay ergymanclay,
oreovermay, Iay eelfay itay myay utyday otay omotepray anday establishay ethay essingblay
ofay eacepay inay allay amiliesfay ithinway ethay eachray ofay myay influenceay; anday onay
esethay oundsgray Iay atterflay elfmysay atthay myay esentpray overturesay ofay
ood-willgay areay ighlyhay ommendablecay, anday atthay ethay ircumstancecay ofay myay
eingbay extnay inay ethay entailay ofay Ongbournlay estateay illway ebay indlykay
overlookeday onay ouryay idesay, anday otnay eadlay ouyay otay ejectray ethay offereday
oliveay anchbray. Iay annotcay ebay otherwiseay anthay oncernedcay atay eingbay ethay
eansmay ofay injuringay ouryay amiableay aughtersday, anday egbay eavelay otay
apologizeay orfay itay, asay ellway asay otay assureay ouyay ofay myay eadinessray otay akemay
emthay everyay ossiblepay amendsay; utbay ofay isthay ereafterhay. Ifay ouyay ouldshay
avehay onay objectionay otay eceiveray emay intoay ouryay ousehay, Iay oposepray elfmysay
ethay atisfactionsay ofay aitingway onay ouyay anday ouryay amilyfay, Ondaymay,
Ovembernay 18thay, byay ourfay o’clockay, anday allshay obablypray espasstray onay ouryay
ospitalityhay illtay ethay Aturdaysay e’nnightsay ollowingfay, ichwhay Iay ancay oday
ithoutway anyay inconvenienceay, asay Adylay Atherinecay isay arfay omfray objectingay
otay myay occasionalay absenceay onay aay Undaysay, ovidedpray atthay omesay otheray
ergymanclay isay engageday otay oday ethay utyday ofay ethay ayday. Iay emainray, earday irsay,
ithway espectfulray omplimentscay otay ouryay adylay anday aughtersday, ouryay
ell-wisherway anday iendfray,

iLLIAM“way OLLINScay.”

aT“ay ourfay o’clockay, ereforethay, eway aymay expectay isthay eace-makingpay entlemangay,”
aidsay mray. Ennetbay, asay ehay oldedfay upay ethay etterlay. e“hay eemssay otay ebay aay ostmay
onscientiouscay anday olitepay oungyay anmay, uponay myay ordway; anday, Iay oubtday otnay, illway
ovepray aay aluablevay acquaintanceay, especiallyay ifay Adylay Atherinecay ouldshay ebay osay
indulgentay asay otay etlay imhay omecay otay usay againay.”

eRe“thay isay omesay ensesay inay atwhay ehay ayssay aboutay ethay irlsgay, oweverhay; anday, ifay
ehay isay isposedday otay akemay emthay anyay amendsay, Iay allshay otnay ebay ethay ersonpay otay
iscourageday imhay.”

oUgh“thay itay isay ifficultday,” aidsay Anejay, o“tay uessgay inay atwhay ayway ehay ancay eanmay
otay akemay usay ethay atonementay ehay inksthay ouray ueday, ethay ishway isay ertainlycay otay ishay
editcray.”

Elizabethay asway ieflychay uckstray ithway ishay extraordinaryay eferenceday orfay Adylay
Atherinecay, anday ishay indkay intentionay ofay isteningchray, arryingmay, anday uryingbay
ishay arishionerspay eneverwhay itay ereway equiredray.

e“hay ustmay ebay anay oddityay, Iay inkthay,” aidsay eshay. i“ay annotcay akemay imhay outay. Erethay
isay omethingsay eryvay ompouspay inay ishay estylay. Anday atwhay ancay ehay eanmay byay
apologizingay orfay eingbay extnay inay ethay entailay? Eway annotcay upposesay ehay ouldway
elphay itay, ifay ehay ouldcay. Ancay ehay ebay aay ensiblesay anmay, irsay?”

o“nay, myay earday; Iay inkthay otnay. Iay avehay eatgray opeshay ofay indingfay imhay uiteqay ethay
everseray. Erethay isay aay ixturemay ofay ervilitysay anday elf-importancesay inay ishay
etterlay ichwhay omisespray ellway. Iay amay impatientay otay eesay imhay.”

iN“ay ointpay ofay ompositioncay,” aidsay Arymay, is“hay etterlay oesday otnay eemsay
efectiveday. Ethay ideaay ofay ethay oliveay anchbray erhapspay isay otnay ollywhay ewnay, etyay Iay
inkthay itay isay ellway expresseday.”

Otay Atherinecay anday Ialyday eithernay ethay etterlay ornay itsay iterwray ereway inay anyay
egreeday interestingay. Itay asway extnay otay impossibleay atthay eirthay ousincay ouldshay
omecay inay aay arletscay oatcay, anday itay asway ownay omesay eeksway incesay eythay adhay
eceivedray easureplay omfray ethay ocietysay ofay aay anmay inay anyay otheray olourcay. Asay orfay
eirthay othermay, mray. Ollins’scay etterlay adhay oneday awayay uchmay ofay erhay ill-willay,
anday eshay asway eparingpray otay eesay imhay ithway aay egreeday ofay omposurecay ichwhay
astonisheday erhay usbandhay anday aughtersday.

mray. Ollinscay asway unctualpay otay ishay imetay, anday asway eceivedray ithway eatgray
olitenesspay byay ethay olewhay amilyfay. mray. Ennetbay indeeday aidsay ittlelay; utbay ethay
adieslay ereway eadyray enoughay otay alktay, anday mray. Ollinscay eemedsay eithernay inay eednay
ofay encouragementay, ornay inclineday otay ebay ilentsay imselfhay. Ehay asway aay alltay,
eavy-lookinghay oungyay anmay ofay ive-and-twentyfay. Ishay airay asway avegray anday
atelystay, anday ishay annersmay ereway eryvay ormalfay. Ehay adhay otnay eenbay onglay eatedsay
eforebay ehay omplimentedcay mrsay. Ennetbay onay avinghay osay inefay aay amilyfay ofay
aughtersday, aidsay ehay adhay eardhay uchmay ofay eirthay eautybay, utbay atthay, inay isthay
instanceay, amefay adhay allenfay ortshay ofay ethay uthtray; anday addeday, atthay ehay idday otnay
oubtday erhay eeingsay emthay allay inay ueday imetay ellway isposedday ofay inay arriagemay. Isthay
allantrygay asway otnay uchmay otay ethay astetay ofay omesay ofay ishay earershay; utbay mrsay.
Ennetbay, owhay uarrelledqay ithway onay omplimentscay, answereday ostmay eadilyray,--

oU“yay areay eryvay indkay, irsay, Iay amay uresay; anday Iay ishway ithway allay myay earthay itay aymay
ovepray osay; orfay elseay eythay illway ebay estituteday enoughay. Ingsthay areay ettledsay osay
oddlyay.”

oU“yay alludeay, erhapspay, otay ethay entailay ofay isthay estateay.”

aH“ay, irsay, Iay oday indeeday. Itay isay aay ievousgray affairay otay myay oorpay irlsgay, ouyay
ustmay onfesscay. Otnay atthay Iay eanmay otay indfay aultfay ithway ou_yay_, orfay uchsay ingsthay,
Iay owknay, areay allay ancechay inay isthay orldway. Erethay isay onay owingknay owhay estatesay
illway ogay enwhay onceay eythay omecay otay ebay entaileday.”

i“ay amay eryvay ensiblesay, adammay, ofay ethay ardshiphay otay myay airfay ousinscay, anday
ouldcay aysay uchmay onay ethay ubjectsay, utbay atthay Iay amay autiouscay ofay appearingay
orwardfay anday ecipitatepray. Utbay Iay ancay assureay ethay oungyay adieslay atthay Iay omecay
eparedpray otay admireay emthay. Atay esentpray Iay illway otnay aysay oremay, utbay, erhapspay,
enwhay eway areay etterbay acquainteday----”

Ehay asway interrupteday byay aay ummonssay otay innerday; anday ethay irlsgay iledsmay onay eachay
otheray. Eythay ereway otnay ethay onlyay objectsay ofay mray. Ollins’scay admirationay. Ethay
allhay, ethay ining-roomday, anday allay itsay urniturefay, ereway examineday anday aisedpray;
anday ishay ommendationcay ofay everythingay ouldway avehay ouchedtay mrsay. Ennet’sbay
earthay, utbay orfay ethay ortifyingmay uppositionsay ofay ishay iewingvay itay allay asay ishay
ownay uturefay opertypray. Ethay innerday, ootay, inay itsay urntay, asway ighlyhay admireday;
anday ehay eggedbay otay owknay otay ichwhay ofay ishay airfay ousinscay ethay excellenceay ofay itsay
ookerycay asway owingay. Utbay erehay ehay asway etsay ightray byay mrsay. Ennetbay, owhay assureday
imhay, ithway omesay asperityay, atthay eythay ereway eryvay ellway ableay otay eepkay aay oodgay
ookcay, anday atthay erhay aughtersday adhay othingnay otay oday inay ethay itchenkay. Ehay eggedbay
ardonpay orfay avinghay ispleasedday erhay. Inay aay oftenedsay onetay eshay eclaredday
erselfhay otnay atay allay offendeday; utbay ehay ontinuedcay otay apologizeay orfay aboutay aay
uarterqay ofay anay ourhay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IVxay


iLlustration[ay]

Uringday innerday, mray. Ennetbay arcelyscay okespay atay allay; utbay enwhay ethay ervantssay
ereway ithdrawnway, ehay oughtthay itay imetay otay avehay omesay onversationcay ithway ishay
uestgay, anday ereforethay artedstay aay ubjectsay inay ichwhay ehay expecteday imhay otay
ineshay, byay observingay atthay ehay eemedsay eryvay ortunatefay inay ishay atronesspay. Adylay
Atherinecay eday Ourgh’sbay attentionay otay ishay ishesway, anday onsiderationcay orfay ishay
omfortcay, appeareday eryvay emarkableray. mray. Ennetbay ouldcay otnay avehay osenchay
etterbay. mray. Ollinscay asway eloquentay inay erhay aisepray. Ethay ubjectsay elevateday imhay
otay oremay anthay usualay olemnitysay ofay annermay; anday ithway aay ostmay importantay aspectay
ehay otestedpray atthay ehay adhay evernay inay ishay ifelay itnessedway uchsay ehaviourbay inay aay
ersonpay ofay ank--suchray affabilityay anday ondescensioncay, asay ehay adhay imselfhay
experienceday omfray Adylay Atherinecay. Eshay adhay eenbay aciouslygray easedplay otay
approveay ofay othbay ethay iscoursesday ichwhay ehay adhay alreadyay adhay ethay onourhay ofay
eachingpray eforebay erhay. Eshay adhay alsoay askeday imhay icetway otay ineday atay Osingsray,
anday adhay entsay orfay imhay onlyay ethay Aturdaysay eforebay, otay akemay upay erhay oolpay ofay
uadrilleqay inay ethay eveningay. Adylay Atherinecay asway eckonedray oudpray byay anymay
eoplepay, ehay ewknay, utbay e_hay_ adhay evernay eensay anythingay utbay affabilityay inay erhay.
Eshay adhay alwaysay okenspay otay imhay asay eshay ouldway otay anyay otheray entlemangay; eshay
ademay otnay ethay allestsmay objectionay otay ishay oiningjay inay ethay ocietysay ofay ethay
eighbourhoodnay, ornay otay ishay eavinglay ishay arishpay occasionallyay orfay aay eekway oray
otway otay isitvay ishay elationsray. Eshay adhay evenay ondescendedcay otay adviseay imhay otay
arrymay asay oonsay asay ehay ouldcay, ovidedpray ehay osechay ithway iscretionday; anday adhay
onceay aidpay imhay aay isitvay inay ishay umblehay arsonagepay, erewhay eshay adhay erfectlypay
approveday allay ethay alterationsay ehay adhay eenbay akingmay, anday adhay evenay ouchsafedvay
otay uggestsay omesay erself,--somehay elvesshay inay ethay osetsclay upstairsay.

aT“thay isay allay eryvay operpray anday ivilcay, Iay amay uresay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, and“ay Iay
areday aysay eshay isay aay eryvay agreeableay omanway. Itay isay aay itypay atthay eatgray adieslay
inay eneralgay areay otnay oremay ikelay erhay. Oesday eshay ivelay earnay ouyay, irsay?”

e“thay ardengay inay ichwhay andsstay myay umblehay abodeay isay eparatedsay onlyay byay aay anelay
omfray Osingsray Arkpay, erhay Adyship’slay esidenceray.”

i“ay inkthay ouyay aidsay eshay asway aay idowway, irsay? ashay eshay anyay amilyfay?”

e“shay ashay oneay onlyay aughterday, ethay eiresshay ofay Osingsray, anday ofay eryvay
extensiveay opertypray.”

aH“ay,” iedcray mrsay. Ennetbay, akingshay erhay eadhay, en“thay eshay isay etterbay offay anthay
anymay irlsgay. Anday atwhay ortsay ofay oungyay adylay isay eshay? Isay eshay andsomehay?”

e“shay isay aay ostmay armingchay oungyay adylay, indeeday. Adylay Atherinecay erselfhay ayssay
atthay, inay ointpay ofay uetray eautybay, Issmay eday Ourghbay isay arfay uperiorsay otay ethay
andsomesthay ofay erhay exsay; ecausebay erethay isay atthay inay erhay eaturesfay ichwhay arksmay
ethay oungyay omanway ofay istinguishedday irthbay. Eshay isay unfortunatelyay ofay aay icklysay
onstitutioncay, ichwhay ashay eventedpray erhay akingmay atthay ogresspray inay anymay
accomplishmentsay ichwhay eshay ouldcay otnay otherwiseay avehay ailedfay ofay, asay Iay amay
informeday byay ethay adylay owhay uperintendedsay erhay educationay, anday owhay illstay
esidesray ithway emthay. Utbay eshay isay erfectlypay amiableay, anday oftenay ondescendscay
otay ivedray byay myay umblehay abodeay inay erhay ittlelay aetonphay anday oniespay.”

aS“hay eshay eenbay esentedpray? Iay oday otnay ememberray erhay amenay amongay ethay adieslay atay
ourtcay.”

eR“hay indifferentay atestay ofay ealthhay unhappilyay eventspray erhay eingbay inay owntay;
anday byay atthay eansmay, asay Iay oldtay Adylay Atherinecay elfmysay oneay ayday, ashay eprivedday
ethay Itishbray Ourtcay ofay itsay ightestbray ornamentay. Erhay Adyshiplay eemedsay easedplay
ithway ethay ideaay; anday ouyay aymay imagineay atthay Iay amay appyhay onay everyay occasionay otay
offeray osethay ittlelay elicateday omplimentscay ichwhay areay alwaysay acceptableay otay
adieslay. Iay avehay oremay anthay onceay observeday otay Adylay Atherinecay, atthay erhay
armingchay aughterday eemedsay ornbay otay ebay aay uchessday; anday atthay ethay ostmay
elevateday ankray, insteaday ofay ivinggay erhay onsequencecay, ouldway ebay adorneday byay
erhay. Esethay areay ethay indkay ofay ittlelay ingsthay ichwhay easeplay erhay Adyshiplay, anday
itay isay aay ortsay ofay attentionay ichwhay Iay onceivecay elfmysay eculiarlypay oundbay otay
aypay.”

oU“yay udgejay eryvay operlypray,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay; and“ay itay isay appyhay orfay ouyay
atthay ouyay ossesspay ethay alenttay ofay atteringflay ithway elicacyday. Aymay Iay askay
etherwhay esethay easingplay attentionsay oceedpray omfray ethay impulseay ofay ethay
omentmay, oray areay ethay esultray ofay eviouspray udystay?”

eY“thay ariseay ieflychay omfray atwhay isay assingpay atay ethay imetay; anday oughthay Iay
ometimessay amuseay elfmysay ithway uggestingsay anday arrangingay uchsay ittlelay elegantay
omplimentscay asay aymay ebay adapteday otay ordinaryay occasionsay, Iay alwaysay ishway otay
ivegay emthay asay unstudieday anay airay asay ossiblepay.”

mray. Ennet’sbay expectationsay ereway ullyfay answereday. Ishay ousincay asway asay absurday
asay ehay adhay opedhay; anday ehay istenedlay otay imhay ithway ethay eenestkay enjoymentay,
aintainingmay atay ethay amesay imetay ethay ostmay esoluteray omposurecay ofay ountenancecay,
anday, exceptay inay anay occasionalay anceglay atay Elizabethay, equiringray onay artnerpay
inay ishay easureplay.

byay ea-timetay, oweverhay, ethay oseday adhay eenbay enoughay, anday mray. Ennetbay asway adglay
otay aketay ishay uestgay intoay ethay awing-roomdray againay, anday enwhay eatay asway overay,
adglay otay inviteay imhay

iLlustration[ay:

oTested“pray
atthay ehay evernay eadray ovelsnay” h.tay Ebfay ay94
ay]

otay eadray alouday otay ethay adieslay. mray. Ollinscay eadilyray assenteday, anday aay ookbay
asway oducedpray; utbay onay eholdingbay itay or(fay everythingay announceday itay otay ebay
omfray aay irculatingcay ibrarylay) ehay artedstay ackbay, anday, eggingbay ardonpay,
otestedpray atthay ehay evernay eadray ovelsnay. Ittykay aredstay atay imhay, anday Ialyday
exclaimeday. Otheray ooksbay ereway oducedpray, anday afteray omesay eliberationday ehay
osechay oRdyce’s“fay Ermonssay.” Ialyday apedgay asay ehay openeday ethay olumevay; anday
eforebay ehay adhay, ithway eryvay onotonousmay olemnitysay, eadray eethray agespay, eshay
interrupteday imhay ithway,--

o“day ouyay owknay, ammamay, atthay myay uncleay Ilipsphay alkstay ofay urningtay awayay
Ichardray? anday ifay ehay oesday, Olonelcay Orsterfay illway irehay imhay. myay auntay oldtay emay
osay erselfhay onay Aturdaysay. Iay allshay alkway otay Erytonmay o-morrowtay otay earhay oremay
aboutay itay, anday otay askay enwhay mray. Ennyday omescay ackbay omfray owntay.”

Ialyday asway idbay byay erhay otway eldestay isterssay otay oldhay erhay onguetay; utbay mray.
Ollinscay, uchmay offendeday, aidlay asideay ishay ookbay, anday aidsay,--

i“ay avehay oftenay observeday owhay ittlelay oungyay adieslay areay interesteday byay ooksbay
ofay aay erioussay ampstay, oughthay ittenwray olelysay orfay eirthay enefitbay. Itay amazesay
emay, Iay onfesscay; orfay ertainlycay erethay ancay ebay othingnay osay advantageousay otay
emthay asay instructionay. Utbay Iay illway onay ongerlay importuneay myay oungyay ousincay.”

Enthay, urningtay otay mray. Ennetbay, ehay offereday imselfhay asay ishay antagonistay atay
ackgammonbay. mray. Ennetbay accepteday ethay allengechay, observingay atthay ehay acteday
eryvay iselyway inay eavinglay ethay irlsgay otay eirthay ownay iflingtray amusementsay. mrsay.
Ennetbay anday erhay aughtersday apologizeday ostmay ivillycay orfay Ia’slyday
interruptionay, anday omisedpray atthay itay ouldshay otnay occuray againay, ifay ehay ouldway
esumeray ishay ookbay; utbay mray. Ollinscay, afteray assuringay emthay atthay ehay orebay ishay
oungyay ousincay onay ill-willay, anday ouldshay evernay esentray erhay ehaviourbay asay anyay
affrontay, eatedsay imselfhay atay anotheray abletay ithway mray. Ennetbay, anday eparedpray
orfay ackgammonbay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay xvay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ollinscay asway otnay aay ensiblesay anmay, anday ethay eficiencyday ofay aturenay adhay
eenbay utbay ittlelay assisteday byay educationay oray ocietysay; ethay eatestgray artpay ofay
ishay ifelay avinghay eenbay entspay underay ethay uidancegay ofay anay illiterateay anday
iserlymay atherfay; anday oughthay ehay elongedbay otay oneay ofay ethay universitiesay, ehay
adhay erelymay eptkay ethay ecessarynay ermstay ithoutway ormingfay atay itay anyay usefulay
acquaintanceay. Ethay ubjectionsay inay ichwhay ishay atherfay adhay oughtbray imhay upay adhay
ivengay imhay originallyay eatgray umilityhay ofay annermay; utbay itay asway ownay aay oodgay
ealday ounteractedcay byay ethay elf-conceitsay ofay aay eakway eadhay, ivinglay inay
etirementray, anday ethay onsequentialcay eelingsfay ofay earlyay anday unexpecteday
osperitypray. Aay ortunatefay ancechay adhay ecommendedray imhay otay Adylay Atherinecay eday
Ourghbay enwhay ethay ivinglay ofay Unsfordhay asway acantvay; anday ethay espectray ichwhay ehay
eltfay orfay erhay ighhay ankray, anday ishay enerationvay orfay erhay asay ishay atronesspay,
inglingmay ithway aay eryvay oodgay opinionay ofay imselfhay, ofay ishay authorityay asay aay
ergymanclay, anday ishay ightray asay aay ectorray, ademay imhay altogetheray aay ixturemay ofay
idepray anday obsequiousnessay, elf-importancesay anday umilityhay.

Avinghay ownay aay oodgay ousehay anday aay eryvay ufficientsay incomeay, ehay intendeday otay
arrymay; anday inay eekingsay aay econciliationray ithway ethay Ongbournlay amilyfay ehay adhay
aay ifeway inay iewvay, asay ehay eantmay otay oosechay oneay ofay ethay aughtersday, ifay ehay oundfay
emthay asay andsomehay anday amiableay asay eythay ereway epresentedray byay ommoncay eportray.
Isthay asway ishay anplay ofay amends--ofay atonement--foray inheritingay eirthay ather’sfay
estateay; anday ehay oughtthay itay anay excellentay oneay, ullfay ofay eligibilityay anday
uitablenesssay, anday excessivelyay enerousgay anday isinterestedday onay ishay ownay
artpay.

Ishay anplay idday otnay aryvay onay eeingsay emthay. Issmay Ennet’sbay ovelylay acefay
onfirmedcay ishay iewsvay, anday establisheday allay ishay icteststray otionsnay ofay atwhay
asway ueday otay enioritysay; anday orfay ethay irstfay eveningay e_shay_ asway ishay ettledsay
oicechay. Ethay extnay orningmay, oweverhay, ademay anay alterationay; orfay inay aay uarterqay
ofay anay our’shay e-à-tête_têtay_ ithway mrsay. Ennetbay eforebay eakfastbray, aay
onversationcay eginningbay ithway ishay arsonage-housepay, anday eadinglay aturallynay
otay ethay avowalay ofay ishay opeshay, atthay aay istressmay orfay itay ightmay ebay oundfay atay
Ongbournlay, oducedpray omfray erhay, amiday eryvay omplaisantcay ilessmay anday eneralgay
encouragementay, aay autioncay againstay ethay eryvay Anejay ehay adhay ixedfay onay. aS“ay otay
erhay ounger_yay_ aughtersday, eshay ouldcay otnay aketay uponay erhay otay ay--shesay ouldcay
otnay ositivelypay answer--butay eshay idday otnay ow_knay_ ofay anyay epossession;--herpray
eldest_ay_ aughterday eshay ustmay ustjay ention--shemay eltfay itay incumbentay onay erhay otay
inthay, asway ikelylay otay ebay eryvay oonsay engageday.”

mray. Ollinscay adhay onlyay otay angechay omfray Anejay otay Elizabeth--anday itay asway oonsay
one--doneday ilewhay mrsay. Ennetbay asway irringstay ethay irefay. Elizabethay, equallyay
extnay otay Anejay inay irthbay anday eautybay, ucceededsay erhay ofay oursecay.

mrsay. Ennetbay easuredtray upay ethay inthay, anday ustedtray atthay eshay ightmay oonsay avehay
otway aughtersday arriedmay; anday ethay anmay omwhay eshay ouldcay otnay earbay otay eakspay ofay
ethay ayday eforebay, asway ownay ighhay inay erhay oodgay acesgray.

Ia’slyday intentionay ofay alkingway otay Erytonmay asway otnay orgottenfay: everyay istersay
exceptay Arymay agreeday otay ogay ithway erhay; anday mray. Ollinscay asway otay attenday emthay,
atay ethay equestray ofay mray. Ennetbay, owhay asway ostmay anxiousay otay etgay idray ofay imhay,
anday avehay ishay ibrarylay otay imselfhay; orfay itherthay mray. Ollinscay adhay ollowedfay
imhay afteray eakfastbray, anday erethay ehay ouldway ontinuecay, ominallynay engageday ithway
oneay ofay ethay argestlay oliosfay inay ethay ollectioncay, utbay eallyray alkingtay otay mray.
Ennetbay, ithway ittlelay essationcay, ofay ishay ousehay anday ardengay atay Unsfordhay. Uchsay
oingsday iscomposedday mray. Ennetbay exceedinglyay. Inay ishay ibrarylay ehay adhay eenbay
alwaysay uresay ofay eisurelay anday anquillitytray; anday oughthay eparedpray, asay ehay oldtay
Elizabethay, otay eetmay ithway ollyfay anday onceitcay inay everyay otheray oomray inay ethay
ousehay, ehay asway useday otay ebay eefray omfray emthay erethay: ishay ivilitycay, ereforethay,
asway ostmay omptpray inay invitingay mray. Ollinscay otay oinjay ishay aughtersday inay eirthay
alkway; anday mray. Ollinscay, eingbay inay actfay uchmay etterbay ittedfay orfay aay alkerway
anthay aay eaderray, asway extremelyay ellway easedplay otay oseclay ishay argelay ookbay, anday
ogay.

Inay ompouspay othingsnay onay ishay idesay, anday ivilcay assentsay onay atthay ofay ishay
ousinscay, eirthay imetay assedpay illtay eythay entereday Erytonmay. Ethay attentionay ofay
ethay oungeryay onesay asway enthay onay ongerlay otay ebay ainedgay byay im_hay_. Eirthay eyesay
ereway immediatelyay anderingway upay ethay eetstray inay uestqay ofay ethay officersay, anday
othingnay esslay anthay aay eryvay artsmay onnetbay, indeeday, oray aay eallyray ewnay uslinmay inay
aay opshay indowway, ouldcay ecallray emthay.

Utbay ethay attentionay ofay everyay adylay asway oonsay aughtcay byay aay oungyay anmay, omwhay
eythay adhay evernay eensay eforebay, ofay ostmay entlemanlikegay appearanceay, alkingway
ithway anay officeray onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay ayway. Ethay officeray asway ethay eryvay
mray. Ennyday oncerningcay osewhay eturnray omfray Ondonlay Ialyday amecay otay inquireay, anday
ehay owedbay asay eythay assedpay. Allay ereway uckstray ithway ethay anger’sstray airay, allay
onderedway owhay ehay ouldcay ebay; anday Ittykay anday Ialyday, eterminedday ifay ossiblepay
otay indfay outay, edlay ethay ayway acrossay ethay eetstray, underay etencepray ofay antingway
omethingsay inay anay oppositeay opshay, anday ortunatelyfay adhay ustjay ainedgay ethay
avementpay, enwhay ethay otway entlemengay, urningtay ackbay, adhay eachedray ethay amesay
otspay. mray. Ennyday addresseday emthay irectlyday, anday entreateday ermissionpay otay
introduceay ishay iendfray, mray. Ickhamway, owhay adhay eturnedray ithway imhay ethay ayday
eforebay omfray owntay, anday, ehay asway appyhay otay aysay, adhay accepteday aay ommissioncay inay
eirthay orpscay. Isthay asway exactlyay asay itay ouldshay ebay; orfay ethay oungyay anmay antedway
onlyay egimentalsray otay akemay imhay ompletelycay armingchay. Ishay appearanceay asway
eatlygray inay ishay avourfay: ehay adhay allay ethay estbay artspay ofay eautybay, aay inefay
ountenancecay, aay oodgay igurefay, anday eryvay easingplay addressay. Ethay introductionay
asway ollowedfay upay onay ishay idesay byay aay appyhay eadinessray ofay onversation--acay
eadinessray atay ethay amesay imetay erfectlypay orrectcay anday unassumingay; anday ethay
olewhay artypay ereway illstay andingstay anday alkingtay ogethertay eryvay agreeablyay,
enwhay ethay oundsay ofay orseshay ewdray eirthay oticenay, anday Arcyday anday Ingleybay ereway
eensay idingray ownday ethay eetstray. Onay istinguishingday ethay adieslay ofay ethay oupgray
ethay otway entlemengay amecay irectlyday owardstay emthay, anday eganbay ethay usualay
ivilitiescay. Ingleybay asway ethay incipalpray okesmanspay, anday Issmay Ennetbay ethay
incipalpray objectay. Ehay asway enthay, ehay aidsay, onay ishay ayway otay Ongbournlay onay
urposepay otay inquireay afteray erhay. mray. Arcyday orroboratedcay itay ithway aay owbay, anday
asway eginningbay otay etermineday otnay otay ixfay ishay eyesay onay Elizabethay, enwhay eythay
ereway uddenlysay arresteday byay ethay ightsay ofay ethay angerstray; anday Elizabethay
appeninghay otay eesay ethay ountenancecay ofay othbay asay eythay ookedlay atay eachay otheray,
asway allay astonishmentay atay ethay effectay ofay ethay eetingmay. Othbay angedchay olourcay,
oneay ookedlay itewhay, ethay otheray edray. mray. Ickhamway, afteray aay ewfay omentsmay,
ouchedtay ishay at--ahay alutationsay ichwhay mray. Arcyday ustjay eignedday otay eturnray.
Atwhay ouldcay ebay ethay eaningmay ofay itay? Itay asway impossibleay otay imagineay; itay asway
impossibleay otnay otay onglay otay owknay.

Inay anotheray inutemay mray. Ingleybay, utbay ithoutway eemingsay otay avehay oticednay atwhay
assedpay, ooktay eavelay anday oderay onay ithway ishay iendfray.

mray. Ennyday anday mray. Ickhamway alkedway ithway ethay oungyay adieslay otay ethay oorday ofay
mray. Ilips’sphay ousehay, anday enthay ademay eirthay owsbay, inay itespay ofay Issmay Ia’slyday
essingpray entreatiesay atthay eythay ouldway omecay inay, anday evenay inay itespay ofay mrsay.
Ilips’sphay owingthray upay ethay arlourpay indowway, anday oudlylay econdingsay ethay
invitationay.

mrsay. Ilipsphay asway alwaysay adglay otay eesay erhay iecesnay; anday ethay otway eldestay, omfray
eirthay ecentray absenceay, ereway articularlypay elcomeway; anday eshay asway eagerlyay
expressingay erhay urprisesay atay eirthay uddensay eturnray omehay, ichwhay, asay eirthay ownay
arriagecay adhay otnay etchedfay emthay, eshay ouldshay avehay ownknay othingnay aboutay, ifay
eshay adhay otnay appenedhay otay eesay mray. Ones’sjay opboyshay inay ethay eetstray, owhay adhay
oldtay erhay atthay eythay ereway otnay otay endsay anyay oremay aughtsdray otay Etherfieldnay,
ecausebay ethay Issmay Ennetsbay ereway omecay awayay, enwhay erhay ivilitycay asway aimedclay
owardstay mray. Ollinscay byay Ane’sjay introductionay ofay imhay. Eshay eceivedray imhay ithway
erhay eryvay estbay olitenesspay, ichwhay ehay eturnedray ithway asay uchmay oremay,
apologizingay orfay ishay intrusionay, ithoutway anyay eviouspray acquaintanceay ithway
erhay, ichwhay ehay ouldcay otnay elphay atteringflay imselfhay, oweverhay, ightmay ebay
ustifiedjay byay ishay elationshipray otay ethay oungyay adieslay owhay introduceday imhay otay
erhay oticenay. mrsay. Ilipsphay asway uiteqay aweday byay uchsay anay excessay ofay oodgay
eedingbray; utbay erhay ontemplationcay ofay oneay angerstray asway oonsay utpay anay enday otay
byay exclamationsay anday inquiriesay aboutay ethay otheray, ofay omwhay, oweverhay, eshay
ouldcay onlyay elltay erhay iecesnay atwhay eythay alreadyay ewknay, atthay mray. Ennyday adhay
oughtbray imhay omfray Ondonlay, anday atthay ehay asway otay avehay aay ieutenant’slay
ommissioncay inay ethay ire----shay. Eshay adhay eenbay atchingway imhay ethay astlay ourhay,
eshay aidsay, asay ehay alkedway upay anday ownday ethay eet,--andstray adhay mray. Ickhamway
appeareday, Ittykay anday Ialyday ouldway ertainlycay avehay ontinuedcay ethay occupationay;
utbay unluckilyay onay oneay assedpay ethay indowsway ownay exceptay aay ewfay ofay ethay
officersay, owhay, inay omparisoncay ithway ethay angerstray, ereway ecomebay upid“stay,
isagreeableday ellowsfay.” Omesay ofay emthay ereway otay ineday ithway ethay Ilipsesphay ethay
extnay ayday, anday eirthay auntay omisedpray otay akemay erhay usbandhay allcay onay mray.
Ickhamway, anday ivegay imhay anay invitationay alsoay, ifay ethay amilyfay omfray Ongbournlay
ouldway omecay inay ethay eveningay. Isthay asway agreeday otay; anday mrsay. Ilipsphay
otestedpray atthay eythay ouldway avehay aay icenay omfortablecay oisynay amegay ofay otterylay
icketstay, anday aay ittlelay itbay ofay othay uppersay afterwardsay. Ethay ospectpray ofay uchsay
elightsday asway eryvay eeringchay, anday eythay artedpay inay utualmay oodgay iritsspay. mray.
Ollinscay epeatedray ishay apologiesay inay uittingqay ethay oomray, anday asway assureday,
ithway unwearyingay ivilitycay, atthay eythay ereway erfectlypay eedlessnay.

Asay eythay alkedway omehay, Elizabethay elatedray otay Anejay atwhay eshay adhay eensay asspay
etweenbay ethay otway entlemengay; utbay oughthay Anejay ouldway avehay efendedday eitheray oray
othbay, adhay eythay appeareday otay ebay ongwray, eshay ouldcay onay oremay explainay uchsay
ehaviourbay anthay erhay istersay.

mray. Ollinscay onay ishay eturnray ighlyhay atifiedgray mrsay. Ennetbay byay admiringay mrsay.
Ilips’sphay annersmay anday olitenesspay. Ehay otestedpray atthay, exceptay Adylay
Atherinecay anday erhay aughterday, ehay adhay evernay eensay aay oremay elegantay omanway; orfay
eshay adhay otnay onlyay eceivedray imhay ithway ethay utmostay ivilitycay, utbay adhay evenay
ointedlypay includeday imhay inay erhay invitationay orfay ethay extnay eveningay, althoughay
utterlyay unknownay otay erhay eforebay. Omethingsay, ehay upposedsay, ightmay ebay
attributeday otay ishay onnectioncay ithway emthay, utbay etyay ehay adhay evernay etmay ithway osay
uchmay attentionay inay ethay olewhay oursecay ofay ishay ifelay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay Ixvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Asay onay objectionay asway ademay otay ethay oungyay eople’spay engagementay ithway eirthay
auntay, anday allay mray. Ollins’scay uplesscray ofay eavinglay mray. anday mrsay. Ennetbay orfay
aay inglesay eveningay uringday ishay isitvay ereway ostmay eadilystay esistedray, ethay oachcay
onveyedcay imhay anday ishay ivefay ousinscay atay aay uitablesay ourhay otay Erytonmay; anday ethay
irlsgay adhay ethay easureplay ofay earinghay, asay eythay entereday ethay awing-roomdray,
atthay mray. Ickhamway adhay accepteday eirthay uncle’say invitationay, anday asway enthay inay
ethay ousehay.

Enwhay isthay informationay asway ivengay, anday eythay adhay allay akentay eirthay eatssay, mray.
Ollinscay asway atay eisurelay otay ooklay arounday imhay anday admireay, anday ehay asway osay uchmay
uckstray ithway ethay izesay anday urniturefay ofay ethay apartmentay, atthay ehay eclaredday ehay
ightmay almostay avehay upposedsay imselfhay inay ethay allsmay ummersay eakfastbray arlourpay
atay Osingsray; aay omparisoncay atthay idday otnay atay irstfay onveycay uchmay
atificationgray; utbay enwhay mrsay. Ilipsphay understooday omfray imhay atwhay Osingsray
asway, anday owhay asway itsay oprietorpray, enwhay eshay adhay istenedlay otay ethay
escriptionday ofay onlyay oneay ofay Adylay Atherine’scay awing-roomsdray, anday oundfay
atthay ethay imney-piecechay aloneay adhay ostcay eightay undredhay oundspay, eshay eltfay allay
ethay orcefay ofay ethay omplimentcay, anday ouldway ardlyhay avehay esentedray aay omparisoncay
ithway ethay ousekeeper’shay oomray.

Inay escribingday otay erhay allay ethay andeurgray ofay Adylay Atherinecay anday erhay ansionmay,
ithway occasionalay igressionsday inay aisepray ofay ishay ownay umblehay abodeay, anday ethay
improvementsay itay asway eceivingray, ehay asway appilyhay employeday untilay ethay
entlemengay oinedjay emthay; anday ehay oundfay inay mrsay. Ilipsphay aay eryvay attentiveay
istenerlay, osewhay opinionay ofay ishay onsequencecay increaseday ithway atwhay eshay
eardhay, anday owhay asway esolvingray otay etailray itay allay amongay erhay eighboursnay asay
oonsay asay eshay ouldcay. Otay ethay irlsgay, owhay ouldcay otnay istenlay otay eirthay ousincay,
anday owhay adhay othingnay otay oday utbay otay ishway orfay anay instrumentay, anday examineay
eirthay ownay indifferentay imitationsay ofay inachay onay ethay antel-piecemay, ethay
intervalay ofay aitingway appeareday eryvay onglay. Itay asway overay atay astlay, oweverhay.
Ethay entlemengay idday approachay: anday enwhay mray. Ickhamway alkedway intoay ethay oomray,
Elizabethay eltfay atthay eshay adhay eithernay eenbay eeingsay imhay eforebay, ornay inkingthay
ofay imhay incesay, ithway ethay allestsmay egreeday ofay unreasonableay admirationay. Ethay
officersay ofay ethay ire----shay ereway inay eneralgay aay eryvay editablecray,
entlemanlikegay etsay anday ethay estbay ofay emthay ereway ofay ethay esentpray artypay; utbay
mray, Ickhamway asway asay arfay eyondbay emthay allay inay ersonpay, ountenancecay, airay, anday
alkway, asay ey_thay_ ereway uperiorsay otay ethay oad-facedbray uffystay uncleay Ilipsphay,
eathingbray ortpay ineway, owhay ollowedfay emthay intoay ethay oomray.

iLlustration[ay:

e“thay officersay ofay ethay ire----shay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

mray. Ickhamway asway ethay appyhay anmay owardstay omwhay almostay everyay emalefay eyeay asway
urnedtay, anday Elizabethay asway ethay appyhay omanway byay omwhay ehay inallyfay eatedsay
imselfhay; anday ethay agreeableay annermay inay ichwhay ehay immediatelyay ellfay intoay
onversationcay, oughthay itay asway onlyay onay itsay eingbay aay etway ightnay, anday onay ethay
obabilitypray ofay aay ainyray easonsay, ademay erhay eelfay atthay ethay ommonestcay,
ullestday, ostmay eadbarethray opictay ightmay ebay enderedray interestingay byay ethay
illskay ofay ethay eakerspay.

Ithway uchsay ivalsray orfay ethay oticenay ofay ethay airfay asay mray. Ickhamway anday ethay
officersay, mray. Ollinscay eemedsay otay inksay intoay insignificanceay; otay ethay oungyay
adieslay ehay ertainlycay asway othingnay; utbay ehay adhay illstay atay intervalsay aay indkay
istenerlay inay mrsay. Ilipsphay, anday asway, byay erhay atchfulnessway, ostmay abundantlyay
uppliedsay ithway offeecay anday uffinmay.

Enwhay ethay ardcay ablestay ereway acedplay, ehay adhay anay opportunityay ofay obligingay erhay,
inay eturnray, byay ittingsay ownday otay istwhay.

i“ay owknay ittlelay ofay ethay amegay atay esentpray,” aidsay ehay, ut“bay Iay allshay ebay adglay otay
improveay elfmysay; orfay inay myay ituationsay ofay ifelay----” mrsay. Ilipsphay asway eryvay
ankfulthay orfay ishay ompliancecay, utbay ouldcay otnay aitway orfay ishay easonray.

mray. Ickhamway idday otnay ayplay atay istwhay, anday ithway eadyray elightday asway ehay
eceivedray atay ethay otheray abletay etweenbay Elizabethay anday Ialyday. Atay irstfay erethay
eemedsay angerday ofay Ia’slyday engrossingay imhay entirelyay, orfay eshay asway aay ostmay
eterminedday alkertay; utbay eingbay ikewiselay extremelyay ondfay ofay otterylay icketstay,
eshay oonsay ewgray ootay uchmay interesteday inay ethay amegay, ootay eageray inay akingmay etsbay
anday exclaimingay afteray izespray, otay avehay attentionay orfay anyoneay inay articularpay.
Allowingay orfay ethay ommoncay emandsday ofay ethay amegay, mray. Ickhamway asway ereforethay
atay eisurelay otay alktay otay Elizabethay, anday eshay asway eryvay illingway otay earhay imhay,
oughthay atwhay eshay ieflychay ishedway otay earhay eshay ouldcay otnay opehay otay ebay oldtay,
ethay istoryhay ofay ishay acquaintanceay ithway mray. Arcyday. Eshay aredday otnay evenay
entionmay atthay entlemangay. Erhay uriositycay, oweverhay, asway unexpectedlyay
elievedray. mray. Ickhamway eganbay ethay ubjectsay imselfhay. Ehay inquireday owhay arfay
Etherfieldnay asway omfray Erytonmay; anday, afteray eceivingray erhay answeray, askeday inay
aay esitatinghay annermay owhay onglay mray. Arcyday adhay eenbay ayingstay erethay.

aBout“ay aay onthmay,” aidsay Elizabethay; anday enthay, unwillingay otay etlay ethay ubjectsay
opdray, addeday, e“hay isay aay anmay ofay eryvay argelay opertypray inay Erbyshireday, Iay
understanday.”

eS“yay,” epliedray Ickhamway; is“hay estateay erethay isay aay oblenay oneay. Aay earclay entay
ousandthay erpay annumay. Ouyay ouldcay otnay avehay etmay ithway aay ersonpay oremay apablecay ofay
ivinggay ouyay ertaincay informationay onay atthay eadhay anthay elf--formysay Iay avehay eenbay
onnectedcay ithway ishay amilyfay, inay aay articularpay annermay, omfray myay infancyay.”

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay utbay ooklay urprisedsay.

oU“yay aymay ellway ebay urprisedsay, Issmay Ennetbay, atay uchsay anay assertionay, afteray
eeingsay, asay ouyay obablypray ightmay, ethay eryvay oldcay annermay ofay ouray eetingmay
esterdayyay. Areay ouyay uchmay acquainteday ithway mray. Arcyday?”

aS“ay uchmay asay Iay everay ishway otay ebay,” iedcray Elizabethay, armlyway. i“ay avehay entspay
ourfay aysday inay ethay amesay ousehay ithway imhay, anday Iay inkthay imhay eryvay
isagreeableday.”

i“ay avehay onay ightray otay ivegay _myay_ opinionay,” aidsay Ickhamway, as“ay otay ishay eingbay
agreeableay oray otherwiseay. Iay amay otnay ualifiedqay otay ormfay oneay. Iay avehay ownknay imhay
ootay onglay anday ootay ellway otay ebay aay airfay udgejay. Itay isay impossibleay orfay e_may_ otay
ebay impartialay. Utbay Iay elievebay ouryay opinionay ofay imhay ouldway inay eneralgay
astonish--anday, erhapspay, ouyay ouldway otnay expressay itay uiteqay osay onglystray
anywhereay elseay. Erehay ouyay areay inay ouryay ownay amilyfay.”

uPon“ay myay ordway Iay aysay onay oremay ere_hay_ anthay Iay ightmay aysay inay anyay ousehay inay ethay
eighbourhoodnay, exceptay Etherfieldnay. Ehay isay otnay atay allay ikedlay inay
Ertfordshirehay. Everybodyay isay isgustedday ithway ishay idepray. Ouyay illway otnay indfay
imhay oremay avourablyfay okenspay ofay byay anyoneay.”

i“ay annotcay etendpray otay ebay orrysay,” aidsay Ickhamway, afteray aay ortshay
interruptionay, at“thay ehay oray atthay anyay anmay ouldshay otnay ebay estimateday eyondbay
eirthay esertsday; utbay ithway im_hay_ Iay elievebay itay oesday otnay oftenay appenhay. Ethay
orldway isay indedblay byay ishay ortunefay anday onsequencecay, oray ightenedfray byay ishay
ighhay anday imposingay annersmay, anday eessay imhay onlyay asay ehay ooseschay otay ebay eensay.”

i“ay ouldshay aketay imhay, evenay onay _myay_ ightslay acquaintanceay, otay ebay anay
ill-tempereday anmay.”

Ickhamway onlyay ookshay ishay eadhay.

i“ay onderway,” aidsay ehay, atay ethay extnay opportunityay ofay eakingspay, ether“whay ehay isay
ikelylay otay ebay inay isthay ountrycay uchmay ongerlay.”

i“ay oday otnay atay allay owknay; utbay Iay eard_hay_ othingnay ofay ishay oinggay awayay enwhay Iay
asway atay Etherfieldnay. Iay opehay ouryay ansplay inay avourfay ofay ethay ire----shay illway
otnay ebay affecteday byay ishay eingbay inay ethay eighbourhoodnay.”

oH“ay o--itnay isay otnay orfay e_may_ otay ebay ivendray awayay byay mray. Arcyday. Ifay e_hay_
ishesway otay avoiday eeingsay e_may_ ehay ustmay ogay. Eway areay otnay onay iendlyfray ermstay,
anday itay alwaysay ivesgay emay ainpay otay eetmay imhay, utbay Iay avehay onay easonray orfay
avoidingay im_hay_ utbay atwhay Iay ightmay oclaimpray otay allay ethay orld--away ensesay ofay
eryvay eatgray ill-usageay, anday ostmay ainfulpay egretsray atay ishay eingbay atwhay ehay isay.
Ishay atherfay, Issmay Ennetbay, ethay atelay mray. Arcyday, asway oneay ofay ethay estbay enmay
atthay everay eathedbray, anday ethay uesttray iendfray Iay everay adhay; anday Iay ancay evernay ebay
inay ompanycay ithway isthay mray. Arcyday ithoutway eingbay ievedgray otay ethay oulsay byay aay
ousandthay endertay ecollectionsray. Ishay ehaviourbay otay elfmysay ashay eenbay
andalousscay; utbay Iay erilyvay elievebay Iay ouldcay orgivefay imhay anythingay anday
everythingay, atherray anthay ishay isappointingday ethay opeshay anday isgracingday ethay
emorymay ofay ishay atherfay.”

Elizabethay oundfay ethay interestay ofay ethay ubjectsay increaseay, anday istenedlay ithway
allay erhay earthay; utbay ethay elicacyday ofay itay eventedpray urtherfay inquiryay.

mray. Ickhamway eganbay otay eakspay onay oremay eneralgay opicstay, Erytonmay, ethay
eighbourhoodnay, ethay ocietysay, appearingay ighlyhay easedplay ithway allay atthay ehay
adhay etyay eensay, anday eakingspay ofay ethay atterlay, especiallyay, ithway entlegay utbay
eryvay intelligibleay allantrygay.

iT“ay asway ethay ospectpray ofay onstantcay ocietysay, anday oodgay ocietysay,” ehay addeday,
ich“whay asway myay iefchay inducementay otay enteray ethay ire----shay. Iay owknay itay otay ebay aay
ostmay espectableray, agreeableay orpscay; anday myay iendfray Ennyday emptedtay emay
urtherfay byay ishay accountay ofay eirthay esentpray uartersqay, anday ethay eryvay eatgray
attentionsay anday excellentay acquaintanceay Erytonmay adhay ocuredpray emthay.
Ocietysay, Iay ownay, isay ecessarynay otay emay. Iay avehay eenbay aay isappointedday anmay, anday
myay iritsspay illway otnay earbay olitudesay. Iay ust_may_ avehay employmentay anday ocietysay.
Aay ilitarymay ifelay isay otnay atwhay Iay asway intendeday orfay, utbay ircumstancescay avehay
ownay ademay itay eligibleay. Ethay urchchay ought_ay_ otay avehay eenbay myay ofession--ipray
asway oughtbray upay orfay ethay urchchay; anday Iay ouldshay atay isthay imetay avehay eenbay inay
ossessionpay ofay aay ostmay aluablevay ivinglay, adhay itay easedplay ethay entlemangay eway
ereway eakingspay ofay ustjay ownay.”

iNdeed“ay!”

eS--the“yay atelay mray. Arcyday equeathedbay emay ethay extnay esentationpray ofay ethay estbay
ivinglay inay ishay iftgay. Ehay asway myay odfathergay, anday excessivelyay attacheday otay emay.
Iay annotcay oday usticejay otay ishay indnesskay. Ehay eantmay otay ovidepray orfay emay amplyay,
anday oughtthay ehay adhay oneday itay; utbay enwhay ethay ivinglay ellfay, itay asway ivengay
elsewhereay.”

oOd“gay eavenshay!” iedcray Elizabethay; ut“bay owhay ouldcay at_thay_ ebay? Owhay ouldcay ishay
illway ebay isregardedday? whyay idday otnay ouyay eeksay egallay edressray?”

eRe“thay asway ustjay uchsay anay informalityay inay ethay ermstay ofay ethay equestbay asay otay
ivegay emay onay opehay omfray awlay. Aay anmay ofay onourhay ouldcay otnay avehay oubtedday ethay
intentionay, utbay mray. Arcyday osechay otay oubtday it--oray otay eattray itay asay aay erelymay
onditionalcay ecommendationray, anday otay assertay atthay Iay adhay orfeitedfay allay aimclay
otay itay byay extravaganceay, imprudenceay, inay ortshay, anythingay oray othingnay.
Ertaincay itay isay atthay ethay ivinglay ecamebay acantvay otway earsyay agoay, exactlyay asay Iay
asway ofay anay ageay otay oldhay itay, anday atthay itay asway ivengay otay anotheray anmay; anday onay
esslay ertaincay isay itay, atthay Iay annotcay accuseay elfmysay ofay avinghay eallyray oneday
anythingay otay eserveday otay oselay itay. Iay avehay aay armway unguardeday empertay, anday Iay
aymay erhapspay avehay ometimessay okenspay myay opinionay of_ay_ imhay, anday o_tay_ imhay, ootay
eelyfray. Iay ancay ecallray othingnay orseway. Utbay ethay actfay isay, atthay eway areay eryvay
ifferentday ortsay ofay enmay, anday atthay ehay ateshay emay.”

iS“thay isay uiteqay ockingshay! Ehay eservesday otay ebay ubliclypay isgracedday.”

oMe“say imetay oray otheray ehay ill_way_ e--butbay itay allshay otnay ebay byay e_may_. Illtay Iay
ancay orgetfay ishay atherfay, Iay ancay evernay efyday oray exposeay im_hay_.”

Elizabethay onouredhay imhay orfay uchsay eelingsfay, anday oughtthay imhay andsomerhay anthay
everay asay ehay expresseday emthay.

uT“bay atwhay,” aidsay eshay, afteray aay ausepay, an“cay avehay eenbay ishay otivemay? atwhay ancay
avehay induceday imhay otay ehavebay osay uellycray?”

a“ay oroughthay, eterminedday islikeday ofay e--amay islikeday ichwhay Iay annotcay utbay
attributeay inay omesay easuremay otay ealousyjay. Adhay ethay atelay mray. Arcyday ikedlay emay
esslay, ishay onsay ightmay avehay ornebay ithway emay etterbay; utbay ishay ather’sfay uncommonay
attachmentay otay emay irritateday imhay, Iay elievebay, eryvay earlyay inay ifelay. Ehay adhay
otnay aay empertay otay earbay ethay ortsay ofay ompetitioncay inay ichwhay eway ood--thestay ortsay
ofay eferencepray ichwhay asway oftenay ivengay emay.”

i“ay adhay otnay oughtthay mray. Arcyday osay adbay asay is--thoughthay Iay avehay evernay ikedlay
imhay, Iay adhay otnay oughtthay osay eryvay illay ofay im--ihay adhay upposedsay imhay otay ebay
espisingday ishay ellow-creaturesfay inay eneralgay, utbay idday otnay uspectsay imhay ofay
escendingday otay uchsay aliciousmay evengeray, uchsay injusticeay, uchsay inhumanityay asay
isthay!”

Afteray aay ewfay inutesmay’ eflectionray, oweverhay, eshay ontinuedcay, i“ay o_day_
ememberray ishay oastingbay oneay ayday, atay Etherfieldnay, ofay ethay implacabilityay ofay
ishay esentmentsray, ofay ishay avinghay anay unforgivingay empertay. Ishay ispositionday
ustmay ebay eadfuldray.”

i“ay illway otnay usttray elfmysay onay ethay ubjectsay,” epliedray Ickhamway; i“_ay_ ancay
ardlyhay ebay ustjay otay imhay.”

Elizabethay asway againay eepday inay oughtthay, anday afteray aay imetay exclaimeday, o“tay
eattray inay uchsay aay annermay ethay odsongay, ethay iendfray, ethay avouritefay ofay ishay
atherfay!” Eshay ouldcay avehay addeday, a“ay oungyay anmay, ootay, ikelay ou_yay_, osewhay eryvay
ountenancecay aymay ouchvay orfay ouryay eingbay amiableay.” Utbay eshay ontentedcay erselfhay
ith--“aNdway oneay, ootay, owhay adhay obablypray eenbay ishay ownay ompanioncay omfray
ildhoodchay, onnectedcay ogethertay, asay Iay inkthay ouyay aidsay, inay ethay osestclay
annermay.”

e“way ereway ornbay inay ethay amesay arishpay, ithinway ethay amesay arkpay; ethay eatestgray
artpay ofay ouray outhyay asway assedpay ogethertay: inmatesay ofay ethay amesay ousehay,
aringshay ethay amesay amusementsay, objectsay ofay ethay amesay arentalpay arecay. _myay_
atherfay eganbay ifelay inay ethay ofessionpray ichwhay ouryay uncleay, mray. Ilipsphay,
appearsay otay oday osay uchmay editcray otay; utbay ehay avegay upay everythingay otay ebay ofay useay
otay ethay atelay mray. Arcyday, anday evotedday allay ishay imetay otay ethay arecay ofay ethay
Emberleypay opertypray. Ehay asway ostmay ighlyhay esteemeday byay mray. Arcyday, aay ostmay
intimateay, onfidentialcay iendfray. mray. Arcyday oftenay acknowledgeday imselfhay otay
ebay underay ethay eatestgray obligationsay otay myay ather’sfay activeay uperintendencesay;
anday enwhay, immediatelyay eforebay myay ather’sfay eathday, mray. Arcyday avegay imhay aay
oluntaryvay omisepray ofay ovidingpray orfay emay, Iay amay onvincedcay atthay ehay eltfay itay
otay ebay asay uchmay aay ebtday ofay atitudegray otay im_hay_ asay ofay affectionay otay elfmysay.”

oW“hay angestray!” iedcray Elizabethay. oW“hay abominableay! Iay onderway atthay ethay eryvay
idepray ofay isthay mray. Arcyday ashay otnay ademay imhay ustjay otay ouyay. Ifay omfray onay etterbay
otivemay, atthay ehay ouldshay otnay avehay eenbay ootay oudpray otay ebay ishonest,--forday
ishonestyday Iay ustmay allcay itay.”

iT“ay is_ay_ onderfulway,” epliedray Ickhamway; or“fay almostay allay ishay actionsay aymay ebay
acedtray otay idepray; anday idepray ashay oftenay eenbay ishay estbay iendfray. Itay ashay
onnectedcay imhay earernay ithway irtuevay anthay anyay otheray eelingfay. Utbay eway areay onenay
ofay usay onsistentcay; anday inay ishay ehaviourbay otay emay erethay ereway ongerstray
impulsesay evenay anthay idepray.”

aN“cay uchsay abominableay idepray asay ishay avehay everay oneday imhay oodgay?”

eS“yay; itay ashay oftenay edlay imhay otay ebay iberallay anday enerousgay; otay ivegay ishay oneymay
eelyfray, otay isplayday ospitalityhay, otay assistay ishay enantstay, anday elieveray ethay
oorpay. Amilyfay idepray, anday ilial_fay_ idepray, orfay ehay isay eryvay oudpray ofay atwhay ishay
atherfay asway, avehay oneday isthay. Otnay otay appearay otay isgraceday ishay amilyfay, otay
egenerateday omfray ethay opularpay ualitiesqay, oray oselay ethay influenceay ofay ethay
Emberleypay Ousehay, isay aay owerfulpay otivemay. Ehay ashay alsoay otherly_bray_ idepray,
ichwhay, ithway ome_say_ otherlybray affectionay, akesmay imhay aay eryvay indkay anday
arefulcay uardiangay ofay ishay istersay; anday ouyay illway earhay imhay enerallygay iedcray upay
asay ethay ostmay attentiveay anday estbay ofay othersbray.”

aT“whay ortsay ofay aay irlgay isay Issmay Arcyday?”

Ehay ookshay ishay eadhay. i“ay ishway Iay ouldcay allcay erhay amiableay. Itay ivesgay emay ainpay otay
eakspay illay ofay aay Arcyday; utbay eshay isay ootay uchmay ikelay erhay other,--verybray, eryvay
oudpray. Asay aay ildchay, eshay asway affectionateay anday easingplay, anday extremelyay ondfay
ofay emay; anday Iay avehay evotedday ourshay anday ourshay otay erhay amusementay. Utbay eshay isay
othingnay otay emay ownay. Eshay isay aay andsomehay irlgay, aboutay ifteenfay oray ixteensay,
anday, Iay understanday, ighlyhay accomplisheday. Incesay erhay ather’sfay eathday erhay
omehay ashay eenbay Ondonlay, erewhay aay adylay iveslay ithway erhay, anday uperintendssay erhay
educationay.”

Afteray anymay ausespay anday anymay ialstray ofay otheray ubjectssay, Elizabethay ouldcay otnay
elphay evertingray onceay oremay otay ethay irstfay, anday ayingsay,--

i“ay amay astonisheday atay ishay intimacyay ithway mray. Ingleybay. Owhay ancay mray. Ingleybay,
owhay eemssay ood-humourgay itselfay, anday isay, Iay eallyray elievebay, ulytray amiableay,
ebay inay iendshipfray ithway uchsay aay anmay? Owhay ancay eythay uitsay eachay otheray? Oday ouyay
owknay mray. Ingleybay?”

oT“nay atay allay.”

e“hay isay aay eet-temperedsway, amiableay, armingchay anmay. Ehay annotcay owknay atwhay mray.
Arcyday isay.”

oBably“pray otnay; utbay mray. Arcyday ancay easeplay erewhay ehay ooseschay. Ehay oesday otnay
antway abilitiesay. Ehay ancay ebay aay onversiblecay ompanioncay ifay ehay inksthay itay orthway
ishay ilewhay. Amongay osethay owhay areay atay allay ishay equalsay inay onsequencecay, ehay isay aay
eryvay ifferentday anmay omfray atwhay ehay isay otay ethay esslay osperouspray. Ishay idepray
evernay esertsday imhay; utbay ithway ethay ichray ehay isay iberal-mindedlay, ustjay,
inceresay, ationalray, onourablehay, anday, erhapspay, agreeable,--allowingay
omethingsay orfay ortunefay anday igurefay.”

Ethay istwhay artypay oonsay afterwardsay eakingbray upay, ethay ayersplay atheredgay oundray
ethay otheray abletay, anday mray. Ollinscay ooktay ishay ationstay etweenbay ishay ousincay
Elizabethay anday mrsay. Ilipsphay. Ethay usualay inquiriesay asay otay ishay uccesssay ereway
ademay byay ethay atterlay. Itay adhay otnay eenbay eryvay eatgray; ehay adhay ostlay everyay ointpay;
utbay enwhay mrsay. Ilipsphay eganbay otay expressay erhay oncerncay ereuponthay, ehay assureday
erhay, ithway uchmay earnestay avitygray, atthay itay asway otnay ofay ethay eastlay importanceay;
atthay ehay onsideredcay ethay oneymay asay aay eremay ifletray, anday eggedbay eshay ouldway otnay
akemay erselfhay uneasyay.

i“ay owknay eryvay ellway, adammay,” aidsay ehay, at“thay enwhay ersonspay itsay ownday otay aay
ardcay abletay eythay ustmay aketay eirthay ancechay ofay esethay ings,--andthay appilyhay Iay
amay otnay inay uchsay ircumstancescay asay otay akemay ivefay illingsshay anyay objectay. Erethay
areay, undoubtedlyay, anymay owhay ouldcay otnay aysay ethay amesay; utbay, anksthay otay Adylay
Atherinecay eday Ourghbay, Iay amay emovedray arfay eyondbay ethay ecessitynay ofay egardingray
ittlelay attersmay.”

mray. Ickham’sway attentionay asway aughtcay; anday afteray observingay mray. Ollinscay orfay
aay ewfay omentsmay, ehay askeday Elizabethay inay aay owlay oicevay etherwhay erhay elationsray
ereway eryvay intimatelyay acquainteday ithway ethay amilyfay ofay Eday Ourghbay.

aDy“lay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay,” eshay epliedray, as“hay eryvay atelylay ivengay imhay aay
ivinglay. Iay ardlyhay owknay owhay mray. Ollinscay asway irstfay introduceday otay erhay
oticenay, utbay ehay ertainlycay ashay otnay ownknay erhay onglay.”

oU“yay owknay ofay oursecay atthay Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay anday Adylay Anneay Arcyday
ereway isterssay; onsequentlycay atthay eshay isay auntay otay ethay esentpray mray. Arcyday.”

o“nay, indeeday, Iay idday otnay. Iay ewknay othingnay atay allay ofay Adylay Atherine’scay
onnectionscay. Iay evernay eardhay ofay erhay existenceay illtay ethay ayday eforebay
esterdayyay.”

eR“hay aughterday, Issmay eday Ourghbay, illway avehay aay eryvay argelay ortunefay, anday itay isay
elievedbay atthay eshay anday erhay ousincay illway uniteay ethay otway estatesay.”

Isthay informationay ademay Elizabethay ilesmay, asay eshay oughtthay ofay oorpay Issmay
Ingleybay. Ainvay indeeday ustmay ebay allay erhay attentionsay, ainvay anday uselessay erhay
affectionay orfay ishay istersay anday erhay aisepray ofay imselfhay, ifay ehay ereway alreadyay
elf-destinedsay otay anotheray.

“mray. Ollinscay,” aidsay eshay, eaks“spay ighlyhay othbay ofay Adylay Atherinecay anday erhay
aughterday; utbay, omfray omesay articularspay atthay ehay ashay elatedray ofay erhay
Adyshiplay, Iay uspectsay ishay atitudegray isleadsmay imhay; anday atthay, inay itespay ofay
erhay eingbay ishay atronesspay, eshay isay anay arrogantay, onceitedcay omanway.”

i“ay elievebay erhay otay ebay othbay inay aay eatgray egreeday,” epliedray Ickhamway; i“ay avehay
otnay eensay erhay orfay anymay earsyay; utbay Iay eryvay ellway ememberray atthay Iay evernay ikedlay
erhay, anday atthay erhay annersmay ereway ictatorialday anday insolentay. Eshay ashay ethay
eputationray ofay eingbay emarkablyray ensiblesay anday everclay; utbay Iay atherray elievebay
eshay erivesday artpay ofay erhay abilitiesay omfray erhay ankray anday ortunefay, artpay omfray
erhay authoritativeay annermay, anday ethay estray omfray ethay idepray ofay erhay ephewnay, owhay
ooseschay atthay everyoneay onnectedcay ithway imhay ouldshay avehay anay understandingay ofay
ethay irstfay assclay.”

Elizabethay alloweday atthay ehay adhay ivengay aay eryvay ationalray accountay ofay itay, anday
eythay ontinuedcay alkingtay ogethertay ithway utualmay atisfactionsay illtay uppersay utpay
anay enday otay ardscay, anday avegay ethay estray ofay ethay adieslay eirthay areshay ofay mray.
Ickham’sway attentionsay. Erethay ouldcay ebay onay onversationcay inay ethay oisenay ofay
mrsay. Ilips’sphay uppersay artypay, utbay ishay annersmay ecommendedray imhay otay
everybodyay. Ateverwhay ehay aidsay, asway aidsay ellway; anday ateverwhay ehay idday, oneday
acefullygray. Elizabethay entway awayay ithway erhay eadhay ullfay ofay imhay. Eshay ouldcay
inkthay ofay othingnay utbay ofay mray. Ickhamway, anday ofay atwhay ehay adhay oldtay erhay, allay
ethay ayway omehay; utbay erethay asway otnay imetay orfay erhay evenay otay entionmay ishay amenay asay
eythay entway, orfay eithernay Ialyday ornay mray. Ollinscay ereway onceay ilentsay. Ialyday
alkedtay incessantlyay ofay otterylay icketstay, ofay ethay ishfay eshay adhay ostlay anday ethay
ishfay eshay adhay onway; anday mray. Ollinscay, inay escribingday ethay ivilitycay ofay mray. anday
mrsay. Ilipsphay, otestingpray atthay ehay idday otnay inay ethay eastlay egardray ishay osseslay
atay istwhay, enumeratingay allay ethay ishesday atay uppersay, anday epeatedlyray earingfay
atthay ehay owdedcray ishay ousinscay, adhay oremay otay aysay anthay ehay ouldcay ellway anagemay
eforebay ethay arriagecay oppedstay atay Ongbournlay Ousehay.




iLlustration[ay:

elighted“day otay eesay eirthay earday iendfray againay”
ay]




APTERchay IIxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay elatedray otay Anejay, ethay extnay ayday, atwhay adhay assedpay etweenbay mray.
Ickhamway anday erselfhay. Anejay istenedlay ithway astonishmentay anday oncerncay: eshay
ewknay otnay owhay otay elievebay atthay mray. Arcyday ouldcay ebay osay unworthyay ofay mray.
Ingley’sbay egardray; anday etyay itay asway otnay inay erhay aturenay otay uestionqay ethay
eracityvay ofay aay oungyay anmay ofay uchsay amiableay appearanceay asay Ickhamway. Ethay
ossibilitypay ofay ishay avinghay eallyray endureday uchsay unkindnessay asway enoughay otay
interestay allay erhay endertay eelingsfay; anday othingnay ereforethay emainedray otay ebay
oneday utbay otay inkthay ellway ofay emthay othbay, otay efendday ethay onductcay ofay eachay, anday
owthray intoay ethay accountay ofay accidentay oray istakemay ateverwhay ouldcay otnay ebay
otherwiseay explaineday.

eY“thay avehay othbay,” aidsay eshay, een“bay eceivedday, Iay areday aysay, inay omesay ayway oray
otheray, ofay ichwhay eway ancay ormfay onay ideaay. Interesteday eoplepay avehay erhapspay
isrepresentedmay eachay otay ethay otheray. Itay isay, inay ortshay, impossibleay orfay usay otay
onjecturecay ethay ausescay oray ircumstancescay ichwhay aymay avehay alienateday emthay,
ithoutway actualay ameblay onay eitheray idesay.”

eRy“vay uetray, indeeday; anday ownay, myay earday Anejay, atwhay avehay ouyay otgay otay aysay inay
ehalfbay ofay ethay interesteday eoplepay owhay avehay obablypray eenbay oncernedcay inay ethay
usinessbay? Oday earclay em_thay_, ootay, oray eway allshay ebay obligeday otay inkthay illay ofay
omebodysay.”

aUgh“lay asay uchmay asay ouyay oosechay, utbay ouyay illway otnay aughlay emay outay ofay myay
opinionay. myay earestday Izzylay, oday utbay onsidercay inay atwhay aay isgracefulday ightlay
itay acesplay mray. Arcyday, otay ebay eatingtray ishay ather’sfay avouritefay inay uchsay aay
anner,--onemay omwhay ishay atherfay adhay omisedpray otay ovidepray orfay. Itay isay
impossibleay. Onay anmay ofay ommoncay umanityhay, onay anmay owhay adhay anyay aluevay orfay ishay
aracterchay, ouldcay ebay apablecay ofay itay. Ancay ishay ostmay intimateay iendsfray ebay osay
excessivelyay eceivedday inay imhay? Ohay onay.”

i“ay ancay uchmay oremay easilyay elievebay mray. Ingley’sbay eingbay imposeday onay anthay atthay
mray. Ickhamway ouldshay inventay uchsay aay istoryhay ofay imselfhay asay ehay avegay emay astlay
ightnay; amesnay, actsfay, everythingay entionedmay ithoutway eremonycay. Ifay itay ebay otnay
osay, etlay mray. Arcyday ontradictcay itay. Esidesbay, erethay asway uthtray inay ishay ookslay.”

iT“ay isay ifficultday, indeed--itay isay istressingday. Oneay oesday otnay owknay atwhay otay
inkthay.”

i“ay egbay ouryay ardon;--onepay owsknay exactlyay atwhay otay inkthay.”

Utbay Anejay ouldcay inkthay ithway ertaintycay onay onlyay oneay oint,--thatpay mray.
Ingleybay, ifay ehay ad_hay eenbay_ imposeday onay, ouldway avehay uchmay otay uffersay enwhay
ethay affairay ecamebay ublicpay.

Ethay otway oungyay adieslay ereway ummonedsay omfray ethay ubberyshray, erewhay isthay
onversationcay assedpay, byay ethay arrivalay ofay omesay ofay ethay eryvay ersonspay ofay omwhay
eythay adhay eenbay eakingspay; mray. Ingleybay anday ishay isterssay amecay otay ivegay eirthay
ersonalpay invitationay orfay ethay onglay expecteday allbay atay Etherfieldnay, ichwhay asway
ixedfay orfay ethay ollowingfay Uesdaytay. Ethay otway adieslay ereway elightedday otay eesay
eirthay earday iendfray againay, alledcay itay anay ageay incesay eythay adhay etmay, anday
epeatedlyray askeday atwhay eshay adhay eenbay oingday ithway erselfhay incesay eirthay
eparationsay. Otay ethay estray ofay ethay amilyfay eythay aidpay ittlelay attentionay;
avoidingay mrsay. Ennetbay asay uchmay asay ossiblepay, ayingsay otnay uchmay otay Elizabethay,
anday othingnay atay allay otay ethay othersay. Eythay ereway oonsay onegay againay, isingray omfray
eirthay eatssay ithway anay activityay ichwhay ooktay eirthay otherbray byay urprisesay, anday
urryinghay offay asay ifay eageray otay escapeay omfray mrsay. Ennet’sbay ivilitiescay.

Ethay ospectpray ofay ethay Etherfieldnay allbay asway extremelyay agreeableay otay everyay
emalefay ofay ethay amilyfay. mrsay. Ennetbay osechay otay onsidercay itay asay ivengay inay
omplimentcay otay erhay eldestay aughterday, anday asway articularlypay atteredflay byay
eceivingray ethay invitationay omfray mray. Ingleybay imselfhay, insteaday ofay aay
eremoniouscay ardcay. Anejay icturedpay otay erselfhay aay appyhay eveningay inay ethay
ocietysay ofay erhay otway iendsfray, anday ethay attentionsay ofay eirthay otherbray; anday
Elizabethay oughtthay ithway easureplay ofay ancingday aay eatgray ealday ithway mray.
Ickhamway, anday ofay eeingsay aay onfirmationcay ofay everythingay inay mray. Arcy’sday ooklay
anday ehaviourbay. Ethay appinesshay anticipateday byay Atherinecay anday Ialyday ependedday
esslay onay anyay inglesay eventay, oray anyay articularpay ersonpay; orfay oughthay eythay
eachay, ikelay Elizabethay, eantmay otay anceday alfhay ethay eveningay ithway mray. Ickhamway,
ehay asway byay onay eansmay ethay onlyay artnerpay owhay ouldcay atisfysay emthay, anday aay allbay
asway, atay anyay ateray, aay allbay. Anday evenay Arymay ouldcay assureay erhay amilyfay atthay eshay
adhay onay isinclinationday orfay itay.

iLe“whay Iay ancay avehay myay orningsmay otay elfmysay,” aidsay eshay, it“ay isay enoughay. Iay
inkthay itay isay onay acrificesay otay oinjay occasionallyay inay eveningay engagementsay.
Ocietysay ashay aimsclay onay usay allay; anday Iay ofesspray elfmysay oneay ofay osethay owhay
onsidercay intervalsay ofay ecreationray anday amusementay asay esirableday orfay
everybodyay.”

Elizabeth’say iritsspay ereway osay ighhay onay ethay occasionay, atthay oughthay eshay idday
otnay oftenay eakspay unnecessarilyay otay mray. Ollinscay, eshay ouldcay otnay elphay askingay
imhay etherwhay ehay intendeday otay acceptay mray. Ingley’sbay invitationay, anday ifay ehay
idday, etherwhay ehay ouldway inkthay itay operpray otay oinjay inay ethay evening’say
amusementay; anday eshay asway atherray urprisedsay otay indfay atthay ehay entertaineday onay
uplescray ateverwhay onay atthay eadhay, anday asway eryvay arfay omfray eadingdray aay ebukeray,
eitheray omfray ethay Archbishopay oray Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay, byay enturingvay otay
anceday.

i“ay amay byay onay eansmay ofay opinionay, Iay assureay ouyay,” aidsay ehay, at“thay aay allbay ofay
isthay indkay, ivengay byay aay oungyay anmay ofay aracterchay, otay espectableray eoplepay, ancay
avehay anyay evilay endencytay; anday Iay amay osay arfay omfray objectingay otay ancingday
