elfmysay, atthay Iay allshay opehay otay ebay onouredhay ithway ethay andshay ofay allay myay airfay
ousinscay inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay eveningay; anday Iay aketay isthay opportunityay ofay
olicitingsay oursyay, Issmay Elizabethay, orfay ethay otway irstfay ancesday especiallyay; aay
eferencepray ichwhay Iay usttray myay ousincay Anejay illway attributeay otay ethay ightray
ausecay, anday otnay otay anyay isrespectday orfay erhay.”

Elizabethay eltfay erselfhay ompletelycay akentay inay. Eshay adhay ullyfay oposedpray eingbay
engageday byay Ickhamway orfay osethay eryvay ancesday; anday otay avehay mray. Ollinscay
instead!--heray ivelinesslay adhay eenbay evernay orseway imedtay. Erethay asway onay elphay
orfay itay, oweverhay. mray. Ickham’sway appinesshay anday erhay ownay asway erforcepay
elayedday aay ittlelay ongerlay, anday mray. Ollins’scay oposalpray accepteday ithway asay
oodgay aay acegray asay eshay ouldcay. Eshay asway otnay ethay etterbay easedplay ithway ishay
allantrygay, omfray ethay ideaay itay uggestedsay ofay omethingsay oremay. Itay ownay irstfay
uckstray erhay, atthay e_shay_ asway electedsay omfray amongay erhay isterssay asay orthyway ofay
eingbay ethay istressmay ofay Unsfordhay Arsonagepay, anday ofay assistingay otay ormfay aay
uadrilleqay abletay atay Osingsray, inay ethay absenceay ofay oremay eligibleay isitorsvay.
Ethay ideaay oonsay eachedray otay onvictioncay, asay eshay observeday ishay increasingay
ivilitiescay owardstay erselfhay, anday eardhay ishay equentfray attemptay atay aay
omplimentcay onay erhay itway anday ivacityvay; anday oughthay oremay astonisheday anthay
atifiedgray erselfhay byay isthay effectay ofay erhay armschay, itay asway otnay onglay eforebay
erhay othermay avegay erhay otay understanday atthay ethay obabilitypray ofay eirthay arriagemay
asway exceedinglyay agreeableay otay er_hay_. Elizabethay, oweverhay, idday otnay oosechay
otay aketay ethay inthay, eingbay ellway awareay atthay aay erioussay isputeday ustmay ebay ethay
onsequencecay ofay anyay eplyray. mray. Ollinscay ightmay evernay akemay ethay offeray, anday,
illtay ehay idday, itay asway uselessay otay uarrelqay aboutay imhay.

Ifay erethay adhay otnay eenbay aay Etherfieldnay allbay otay eparepray orfay anday alktay ofay, ethay
oungeryay Issmay Ennetsbay ouldway avehay eenbay inay aay itiablepay atestay atay isthay imetay;
orfay, omfray ethay ayday ofay ethay invitationay otay ethay ayday ofay ethay allbay, erethay asway
uchsay aay uccessionsay ofay ainray asay eventedpray eirthay alkingway otay Erytonmay onceay. Onay
auntay, onay officersay, onay ewsnay ouldcay ebay oughtsay afteray; ethay eryvay oe-rosesshay
orfay Etherfieldnay ereway otgay byay oxypray. Evenay Elizabethay ightmay avehay oundfay omesay
ialtray ofay erhay atiencepay inay eatherway ichwhay otallytay uspendedsay ethay improvementay
ofay erhay acquaintanceay ithway mray. Ickhamway; anday othingnay esslay anthay aay anceday onay
Uesdaytay ouldcay avehay ademay uchsay aay Idayfray, Aturdaysay, Undaysay, anday Ondaymay
endurableay otay Ittykay anday Ialyday.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IIIxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Illtay Elizabethay entereday ethay awing-roomdray atay Etherfieldnay, anday ookedlay inay
ainvay orfay mray. Ickhamway amongay ethay usterclay ofay edray oatscay erethay assembleday, aay
oubtday ofay ishay eingbay esentpray adhay evernay occurreday otay erhay. Ethay ertaintycay ofay
eetingmay imhay adhay otnay eenbay eckedchay byay anyay ofay osethay ecollectionsray atthay
ightmay otnay unreasonablyay avehay alarmeday erhay. Eshay adhay esseddray ithway oremay anthay
usualay arecay, anday eparedpray inay ethay ighesthay iritsspay orfay ethay onquestcay ofay allay
atthay emainedray unsubdueday ofay ishay earthay, ustingtray atthay itay asway otnay oremay anthay
ightmay ebay onway inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay eveningay. Utbay inay anay instantay aroseay ethay
eadfuldray uspicionsay ofay ishay eingbay urposelypay omitteday, orfay mray. Arcy’sday
easureplay, inay ethay Ingleysbay’ invitationay otay ethay officersay; anday oughthay isthay
asway otnay exactlyay ethay asecay, ethay absoluteay actfay ofay ishay absenceay asway
onouncedpray byay ishay iendfray mray. Ennyday, otay omwhay Ialyday eagerlyay applieday, anday
owhay oldtay emthay atthay Ickhamway adhay eenbay obligeday otay ogay otay owntay onay usinessbay
ethay ayday eforebay, anday asway otnay etyay eturnedray; addingay, ithway aay ignificantsay
ilesmay,--

i“ay oday otnay imagineay ishay usinessbay ouldway avehay alledcay imhay awayay ustjay ownay, ifay
ehay adhay otnay ishedway otay avoiday aay ertaincay entlemangay erehay.”

Isthay artpay ofay ishay intelligenceay, oughthay unhearday byay Ialyday, asway aughtcay byay
Elizabethay; anday, asay itay assureday erhay atthay Arcyday asway otnay esslay answerableay orfay
Ickham’sway absenceay anthay ifay erhay irstfay urmisesay adhay eenbay ustjay, everyay eelingfay
ofay ispleasureday againstay ethay ormerfay asway osay arpenedshay byay immediateay
isappointmentday, atthay eshay ouldcay ardlyhay eplyray ithway olerabletay ivilitycay otay
ethay olitepay inquiriesay ichwhay ehay irectlyday afterwardsay approacheday otay akemay.
Attentionay, orbearancefay, atiencepay ithway Arcyday, asway injuryay otay Ickhamway. Eshay
asway esolvedray againstay anyay ortsay ofay onversationcay ithway imhay, anday urnedtay awayay
ithway aay egreeday ofay ill-humouray ichwhay eshay ouldcay otnay ollywhay urmountsay evenay inay
eakingspay otay mray. Ingleybay, osewhay indblay artialitypay ovokedpray erhay.

Utbay Elizabethay asway otnay ormedfay orfay ill-humouray; anday oughthay everyay ospectpray
ofay erhay ownay asway estroyedday orfay ethay eveningay, itay ouldcay otnay elldway onglay onay erhay
iritsspay; anday, avinghay oldtay allay erhay iefsgray otay Arlottechay Ucaslay, omwhay eshay
adhay otnay eensay orfay aay eekway, eshay asway oonsay ableay otay akemay aay oluntaryvay
ansitiontray otay ethay odditiesay ofay erhay ousincay, anday otay ointpay imhay outay otay erhay
articularpay oticenay. Ethay otway irstfay ancesday, oweverhay, oughtbray aay eturnray ofay
istressday: eythay ereway ancesday ofay ortificationmay. mray. Ollinscay, awkwarday anday
olemnsay, apologizingay insteaday ofay attendingay, anday oftenay ovingmay ongwray
ithoutway eingbay awareay ofay itay, avegay erhay allay ethay ameshay anday iserymay ichwhay aay
isagreeableday artnerpay orfay aay ouplecay ofay ancesday ancay ivegay. Ethay omentmay ofay erhay
eleaseray omfray imhay asway ecstasyay.

Eshay ancedday extnay ithway anay officeray, anday adhay ethay efreshmentray ofay alkingtay ofay
Ickhamway, anday ofay earinghay atthay ehay asway universallyay ikedlay. Enwhay osethay ancesday
ereway overay, eshay eturnedray otay Arlottechay Ucaslay, anday asway inay onversationcay ithway
erhay, enwhay eshay oundfay erselfhay uddenlysay addresseday byay mray. Arcyday, owhay ooktay
erhay osay uchmay byay urprisesay inay ishay applicationay orfay erhay andhay, atthay, ithoutway
owingknay atwhay eshay idday, eshay accepteday imhay. Ehay alkedway awayay againay
immediatelyay, anday eshay asway eftlay otay etfray overay erhay ownay antway ofay esencepray ofay
indmay: Arlottechay iedtray otay onsolecay erhay.

i“ay areday aysay ouyay illway indfay imhay eryvay agreeableay.”

eAven“hay orbidfay! aT_thay_ ouldway ebay ethay eatestgray isfortunemay ofay allay! Otay indfay
aay anmay agreeableay omwhay oneay isay eterminedday otay atehay! Oday otnay ishway emay uchsay anay
evilay.”

Enwhay ethay ancingday ecommencedray, oweverhay, anday Arcyday approacheday otay aimclay erhay
andhay, Arlottechay ouldcay otnay elphay autioningcay erhay, inay aay isperwhay, otnay otay ebay aay
impletonsay, anday alloway erhay ancyfay orfay Ickhamway otay akemay erhay appearay unpleasantay
inay ethay eyesay ofay aay anmay oftenay imestay ishay onsequencecay. Elizabethay ademay onay
answeray, anday ooktay erhay aceplay inay ethay etsay, amazeday atay ethay ignityday otay ichwhay
eshay asway arriveday inay eingbay alloweday otay andstay oppositeay otay mray. Arcyday, anday
eadingray inay erhay eighboursnay’ ookslay eirthay equalay amazementay inay eholdingbay itay.
Eythay oodstay orfay omesay imetay ithoutway eakingspay aay ordway; anday eshay eganbay otay
imagineay atthay eirthay ilencesay asway otay astlay oughthray ethay otway ancesday, anday, atay
irstfay, asway esolvedray otnay otay eakbray itay; illtay uddenlysay ancyingfay atthay itay
ouldway ebay ethay eatergray unishmentpay otay erhay artnerpay otay obligeay imhay otay alktay,
eshay ademay omesay ightslay observationay onay ethay anceday. Ehay epliedray, anday asway againay
ilentsay. Afteray aay ausepay ofay omesay inutesmay, eshay addresseday imhay aay econdsay imetay,
ithway--

iT“ay isay our_yay_ urntay otay aysay omethingsay ownay, mray. Arcyday. i_ay_ alkedtay aboutay ethay
anceday, anday ou_yay_ oughtay otay akemay omesay indkay ofay emarkray onay ethay izesay ofay ethay
oomray, oray ethay umbernay ofay ouplescay.”

Ehay iledsmay, anday assureday erhay atthay ateverwhay eshay ishedway imhay otay aysay ouldshay ebay
aidsay.

eRy“vay ellway; atthay eplyray illway oday orfay ethay esentpray. Erhapspay, and-byby-ay, Iay
aymay observeay atthay ivatepray allsbay areay uchmay easanterplay anthay ublicpay onesay; utbay
ow_nay_ eway aymay ebay ilentsay.”

o“day ouyay alktay byay uleray, enthay, ilewhay ouyay areay ancingday?”

oMetimes“say. Oneay ustmay eakspay aay ittlelay, ouyay owknay. Itay ouldway ooklay odday otay ebay
entirelyay ilentsay orfay alfhay anay ourhay ogethertay; anday etyay, orfay ethay advantageay ofay
ome_say_, onversationcay oughtay otay ebay osay arrangeday asay atthay eythay aymay avehay ethay
oubletray ofay ayingsay asay ittlelay asay ossiblepay.”

aRe“ay ouyay onsultingcay ouryay ownay eelingsfay inay ethay esentpray asecay, oray oday ouyay
imagineay atthay ouyay areay atifyinggray inemay?”

oTh“bay,” epliedray Elizabethay archlyay; or“fay Iay avehay alwaysay eensay aay eatgray
imilaritysay inay ethay urntay ofay ouray indsmay. Eway areay eachay ofay anay unsocialay,
aciturntay ispositionday, unwillingay otay eakspay, unlessay eway expectay otay aysay
omethingsay atthay illway amazeay ethay olewhay oomray, anday ebay andedhay ownday otay
osteritypay ithway allay ethay at_éclay_ ofay aay overbpray.”

iS“thay isay onay eryvay ikingstray esemblanceray ofay ouryay ownay aracterchay, Iay amay uresay,”
aidsay ehay. oW“hay earnay itay aymay ebay otay ine_may_, Iay annotcay etendpray otay aysay. oU_yay_
inkthay itay aay aithfulfay ortraitpay, undoubtedlyay.”

i“ay ustmay otnay ecideday onay myay ownay erformancepay.”

Ehay ademay onay answeray; anday eythay ereway againay ilentsay illtay eythay adhay onegay ownday
ethay anceday, enwhay ehay askeday erhay ifay eshay anday erhay isterssay idday otnay eryvay oftenay
alkway otay Erytonmay. Eshay answereday inay ethay affirmativeay; anday, unableay otay esistray
ethay emptationtay, addeday, eN“whay ouyay etmay usay erethay ethay otheray ayday, eway adhay ustjay
eenbay ormingfay aay ewnay acquaintanceay.”

Ethay effectay asway immediateay. Aay eeperday adeshay ofay auteur_hay_ overspreaday ishay
eaturesfay, utbay ehay aidsay otnay aay ordway; anday Elizabethay, oughthay amingblay erselfhay
orfay erhay ownay eaknessway, ouldcay otnay ogay onay. Atay engthlay Arcyday okespay, anday inay aay
onstrainedcay annermay aidsay,--

“mray. Ickhamway isay essedblay ithway uchsay appyhay annersmay asay aymay insureay ishay
aking_may_ iendsfray; etherwhay ehay aymay ebay equallyay apablecay ofay etaining_ray_ emthay,
isay esslay ertaincay.”

e“hay ashay eenbay osay unluckyay asay otay oselay ouryay iendshipfray,” epliedray Elizabethay,
ithway emphasisay, and“ay inay aay annermay ichwhay ehay isay ikelylay otay uffersay omfray allay
ishay ifelay.”

Arcyday ademay onay answeray, anday eemedsay esirousday ofay angingchay ethay ubjectsay. Atay
atthay omentmay Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay appeareday oseclay otay emthay, eaningmay otay asspay
oughthray ethay etsay otay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay oomray; utbay, onay erceivingpay mray.
Arcyday, ehay oppedstay, ithway aay owbay ofay uperiorsay ourtesycay, otay omplimentcay imhay onay
ishay ancingday anday ishay artnerpay.

i“ay avehay eenbay ostmay ighlyhay atifiedgray, indeeday, myay earday irsay; uchsay eryvay
uperiorsay ancingday isay otnay oftenay eensay. Itay isay evidentay atthay ouyay elongbay otay ethay
irstfay irclescay. Alloway emay otay aysay, oweverhay, atthay ouryay airfay artnerpay oesday otnay
isgraceday ouyay: anday atthay Iay ustmay opehay otay avehay isthay easureplay oftenay epeatedray,
especiallyay enwhay aay ertaincay esirableday eventay, myay earday Issmay Elizaay ancing(glay
atay erhay istersay anday Ingleybay), allshay aketay aceplay. Atwhay ongratulationscay illway
enthay owflay inay! Iay appealay otay mray. Arcy;--butday etlay emay otnay interruptay ouyay, irsay.
Ouyay illway otnay ankthay emay orfay etainingday ouyay omfray ethay ewitchingbay onversecay ofay
atthay oungyay adylay, osewhay ightbray eyesay areay alsoay upbraidingay emay.”

iLlustration[ay:

uCh“say eryvay uperiorsay ancingday isay otnay
oftenay eensay.”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

Ethay atterlay artpay ofay isthay addressay asway arcelyscay eardhay byay Arcyday; utbay Irsay
Illiam’sway allusionay otay ishay iendfray eemedsay otay ikestray imhay orciblyfay, anday ishay
eyesay ereway irectedday, ithway aay eryvay erioussay expressionay, owardstay Ingleybay anday
Anejay, owhay ereway ancingday ogethertay. Ecoveringray imselfhay, oweverhay, ortlyshay,
ehay urnedtay otay ishay artnerpay, anday aidsay,--

iR“say Illiam’sway interruptionay ashay ademay emay orgetfay atwhay eway ereway alkingtay
ofay.”

i“ay oday otnay inkthay eway ereway eakingspay atay allay. Irsay Illiamway ouldcay otnay avehay
interrupteday anyay otway eoplepay inay ethay oomray owhay adhay esslay otay aysay orfay
emselvesthay. Eway avehay iedtray otway oray eethray ubjectssay alreadyay ithoutway uccesssay,
anday atwhay eway areay otay alktay ofay extnay Iay annotcay imagineay.”

aT“whay inkthay ouyay ofay ooksbay?” aidsay ehay, ilingsmay.

oOks--oh“bay o!--inay amay uresay eway evernay eadray ethay amesay, oray otnay ithway ethay amesay
eelingsfay.”

i“ay amay orrysay ouyay inkthay osay; utbay ifay atthay ebay ethay asecay, erethay ancay atay eastlay ebay
onay antway ofay ubjectsay. Eway aymay omparecay ouray ifferentday opinionsay.”

o--i“nay annotcay alktay ofay ooksbay inay aay all-roombay; myay eadhay isay alwaysay ullfay ofay
omethingsay elseay.”

e“thay esent_pray_ alwaysay occupiesay ouyay inay uchsay enes--doesscay itay?” aidsay ehay,
ithway aay ooklay ofay oubtday.

eS“yay, alwaysay,” eshay epliedray, ithoutway owingknay atwhay eshay aidsay; orfay erhay
oughtsthay adhay anderedway arfay omfray ethay ubjectsay, asay oonsay afterwardsay appeareday
byay erhay uddenlysay exclaimingay, i“ay ememberray earinghay ouyay onceay aysay, mray. Arcyday,
atthay ouyay ardlyhay everay orgave;--thatfay ouryay esentmentray, onceay eatedcray, asway
unappeasableay. Ouyay areay eryvay autiouscay, Iay upposesay, asay otay itsay eing_bay
eatedcray_?”

i“ay amay,” aidsay ehay, ithway aay irmfay oicevay.

aNd“ay evernay alloway ourselfyay otay ebay indedblay byay ejudicepray?”

i“ay opehay otnay.”

iT“ay isay articularlypay incumbentay onay osethay owhay evernay angechay eirthay opinionay,
otay ebay ecuresay ofay udgingjay operlypray atay irstfay.”

aY“may Iay askay otay atwhay esethay uestionsqay endtay?”

eRely“may otay ethay illustrationay ofay our_yay_ aracterchay,” aidsay eshay, endeavouringay
otay akeshay offay erhay avitygray. i“ay amay ingtryay otay akemay itay outay.”

aNd“ay atwhay isay ouryay uccesssay?”

Eshay ookshay erhay eadhay. i“ay oday otnay etgay onay atay allay. Iay earhay uchsay ifferentday
accountsay ofay ouyay asay uzzlepay emay exceedinglyay.”

i“ay ancay eadilyray elievebay,” answereday ehay, avelygray, at“thay eportsray aymay aryvay
eatlygray ithway espectray otay emay; anday Iay ouldcay ishway, Issmay Ennetbay, atthay ouyay ereway
otnay otay etchskay myay aracterchay atay ethay esentpray omentmay, asay erethay isay easonray otay
earfay atthay ethay erformancepay ouldway eflectray onay editcray onay eitheray.”

uT“bay ifay Iay oday otnay aketay ouryay ikenesslay ownay, Iay aymay evernay avehay anotheray
opportunityay.”

i“ay ouldway byay onay eansmay uspendsay anyay easureplay ofay oursyay,” ehay oldlycay epliedray.
Eshay aidsay onay oremay, anday eythay entway ownday ethay otheray anceday anday artedpay inay
ilencesay; onay eachay idesay issatisfiedday, oughthay otnay otay anay equalay egreeday; orfay
inay Arcy’sday eastbray erethay asway aay olerablytay owerfulpay eelingfay owardstay erhay,
ichwhay oonsay ocuredpray erhay ardonpay, anday irectedday allay ishay angeray againstay
anotheray.

Eythay adhay otnay onglay eparatedsay enwhay Issmay Ingleybay amecay owardstay erhay, anday,
ithway anay expressionay ofay ivilcay isdainday, usthay accosteday erhay,--

o“say, Issmay Elizaay, Iay earhay ouyay areay uiteqay elightedday ithway Eorgegay Ickhamway?
Ouryay istersay ashay eenbay alkingtay otay emay aboutay imhay, anday askingay emay aay ousandthay
uestionsqay; anday Iay indfay atthay ethay oungyay anmay orgotfay otay elltay ouyay, amongay ishay
otheray ommunicationscay, atthay ehay asway ethay onsay ofay olday Ickhamway, ethay atelay mray.
Arcy’sday ewardstay. Etlay emay ecommendray ouyay, oweverhay, asay aay iendfray, otnay otay ivegay
implicitay onfidencecay otay allay ishay assertionsay; orfay, asay otay mray. Arcy’sday usingay
imhay illay, itay isay erfectlypay alsefay: orfay, onay ethay ontrarycay, ehay ashay eenbay alwaysay
emarkablyray indkay otay imhay, oughthay Eorgegay Ickhamway ashay eatedtray mray. Arcyday inay aay
ostmay infamousay annermay. Iay oday otnay owknay ethay articularspay, utbay Iay owknay eryvay
ellway atthay mray. Arcyday isay otnay inay ethay eastlay otay ameblay; atthay ehay annotcay earbay
otay earhay Eorgegay Ickhamway entionedmay; anday atthay oughthay myay otherbray oughtthay ehay
ouldcay otnay ellway avoiday includingay imhay inay ishay invitationay otay ethay officersay, ehay
asway excessivelyay adglay otay indfay atthay ehay adhay akentay imselfhay outay ofay ethay ayway.
Ishay omingcay intoay ethay ountrycay atay allay isay aay ostmay insolentay ingthay, indeeday, anday
Iay onderway owhay ehay ouldcay esumepray otay oday itay. Iay itypay ouyay, Issmay Elizaay, orfay isthay
iscoveryday ofay ouryay avourite’sfay uiltgay; utbay eallyray, onsideringcay ishay
escentday, oneay ouldcay otnay expectay uchmay etterbay.”

iS“hay uiltgay anday ishay escentday appearay, byay ouryay accountay, otay ebay ethay amesay,”
aidsay Elizabethay, angrilyay; or“fay Iay avehay eardhay ouyay accuseay imhay ofay othingnay
orseway anthay ofay eingbay ethay onsay ofay mray. Arcy’sday ewardstay, anday ofay at_thay_, Iay ancay
assureay ouyay, ehay informeday emay imselfhay.”

i“ay egbay ouryay ardonpay,” epliedray Issmay Ingleybay, urningtay awayay ithway aay eersnay.
eXcuse“ay myay interferenceay; itay asway indlykay eantmay.”

iNsolent“ay irlgay!” aidsay Elizabethay otay erselfhay. oU“yay areay uchmay istakenmay ifay
ouyay expectay otay influenceay emay byay uchsay aay altrypay attackay asay isthay. Iay eesay
othingnay inay itay utbay ouryay ownay ilfulway ignoranceay anday ethay alicemay ofay mray.
Arcyday.” Eshay enthay oughtsay erhay eldestay istersay, owhay adhay undertakenay otay akemay
inquiriesay onay ethay amesay ubjectsay ofay Ingleybay. Anejay etmay erhay ithway aay ilesmay ofay
uchsay eetsway omplacencycay, aay owglay ofay uchsay appyhay expressionay, asay ufficientlysay
arkedmay owhay ellway eshay asway atisfiedsay ithway ethay occurrencesay ofay ethay eveningay.
Elizabethay instantlyay eadray erhay eelingsfay; anday, atay atthay omentmay, olicitudesay
orfay Ickhamway, esentmentray againstay ishay enemiesay, anday everythingay elseay, avegay
ayway eforebay ethay opehay ofay Ane’sjay eingbay inay ethay airestfay ayway orfay appinesshay.

i“ay antway otay owknay,” aidsay eshay, ithway aay ountenancecay onay esslay ilingsmay anthay erhay
ister’ssay, at“whay ouyay avehay earntlay aboutay mray. Ickhamway. Utbay erhapspay ouyay avehay
eenbay ootay easantlyplay engageday otay inkthay ofay anyay irdthay ersonpay, inay ichwhay asecay
ouyay aymay ebay uresay ofay myay ardonpay.”

o“nay,” epliedray Anejay, i“ay avehay otnay orgottenfay imhay; utbay Iay avehay othingnay
atisfactorysay otay elltay ouyay. mray. Ingleybay oesday otnay owknay ethay olewhay ofay ishay
istoryhay, anday isay uiteqay ignorantay ofay ethay ircumstancescay ichwhay avehay
incipallypray offendeday mray. Arcyday; utbay ehay illway ouchvay orfay ethay oodgay onductcay,
ethay obitypray anday onourhay, ofay ishay iendfray, anday isay erfectlypay onvincedcay atthay
mray. Ickhamway ashay eservedday uchmay esslay attentionay omfray mray. Arcyday anthay ehay ashay
eceivedray; anday Iay amay orrysay otay aysay atthay byay ishay accountay, asay ellway asay ishay
ister’ssay, mray. Ickhamway isay byay onay eansmay aay espectableray oungyay anmay. Iay amay
afraiday ehay ashay eenbay eryvay imprudentay, anday ashay eservedday otay oselay mray. Arcy’sday
egardray.”

“mray. Ingleybay oesday otnay owknay mray. Ickhamway imselfhay.”

o“nay; ehay evernay awsay imhay illtay ethay otheray orningmay atay Erytonmay.”

iS“thay accountay enthay isay atwhay ehay ashay eceivedray omfray mray. Arcyday. Iay amay
erfectlypay atisfiedsay. Utbay atwhay oesday ehay aysay ofay ethay ivinglay?”

e“hay oesday otnay exactlyay ecollectray ethay ircumstancescay, oughthay ehay ashay eardhay
emthay omfray mray. Arcyday oremay anthay onceay, utbay ehay elievesbay atthay itay asway eftlay otay
imhay onditionally_cay_ onlyay.”

i“ay avehay otnay aay oubtday ofay mray. Ingley’sbay inceritysay,” aidsay Elizabethay armlyway,
ut“bay ouyay ustmay excuseay myay otnay eingbay onvincedcay byay assurancesay onlyay. mray.
Ingley’sbay efenceday ofay ishay iendfray asway aay eryvay ableay oneay, Iay areday aysay; utbay
incesay ehay isay unacquainteday ithway everalsay artspay ofay ethay orystay, anday ashay earntlay
ethay estray omfray atthay iendfray imselfhay, Iay allshay enturevay illstay otay inkthay ofay
othbay entlemengay asay Iay idday eforebay.”

Eshay enthay angedchay ethay iscourseday otay oneay oremay atifyinggray otay eachay, anday onay
ichwhay erethay ouldcay ebay onay ifferenceday ofay entimentsay. Elizabethay istenedlay ithway
elightday otay ethay appyhay oughthay odestmay opeshay ichwhay Anejay entertaineday ofay
Ingley’sbay egardray, anday aidsay allay inay erhay owerpay otay eightenhay erhay onfidencecay
inay itay. Onay eirthay eingbay oinedjay byay mray. Ingleybay imselfhay, Elizabethay ithdrewway
otay Issmay Ucaslay; otay osewhay inquiryay afteray ethay easantnessplay ofay erhay astlay
artnerpay eshay adhay arcelyscay epliedray, eforebay mray. Ollinscay amecay upay otay emthay,
anday oldtay erhay ithway eatgray exultationay, atthay ehay adhay ustjay eenbay osay ortunatefay
asay otay akemay aay ostmay importantay iscoveryday.

i“ay avehay oundfay outay,” aidsay ehay, “byay aay ingularsay accidentay, atthay erethay isay ownay
inay ethay oomray aay earnay elationray otay myay atronesspay. Iay appenedhay otay overhearay ethay
entlemangay imselfhay entioningmay otay ethay oungyay adylay owhay oesday ethay onourshay ofay
isthay ousehay ethay amesnay ofay ishay ousincay Issmay Eday Ourghbay, anday ofay erhay othermay,
Adylay Atherinecay. Owhay onderfullyway esethay ortsay ofay ingsthay occuray! Owhay ouldway
avehay oughtthay ofay myay eetingmay ith--perhaps--away ephewnay ofay Adylay Atherinecay eday
Ourghbay inay isthay assemblyay! Iay amay ostmay ankfulthay atthay ethay iscoveryday isay ademay
inay imetay orfay emay otay aypay myay espectsray otay imhay, ichwhay Iay amay ownay oinggay otay oday,
anday usttray ehay illway excuseay myay otnay avinghay oneday itay eforebay. myay otaltay
ignoranceay ofay ethay onnectioncay ustmay eadplay myay apologyay.”

oU“yay areay otnay oinggay otay introduceay ourselfyay otay mray. Arcyday?”

iNdeed“ay Iay amay. Iay allshay entreatay ishay ardonpay orfay otnay avinghay oneday itay earlieray.
Iay elievebay imhay otay ebay Adylay Atherine’scay ephew_nay_. Itay illway ebay inay myay owerpay otay
assureay imhay atthay erhay Adyshiplay asway uiteqay ellway esterdayyay e’nnightsay.”

Elizabethay iedtray ardhay otay issuadeday imhay omfray uchsay aay emeschay; assuringay imhay
atthay mray. Arcyday ouldway onsidercay ishay addressingay imhay ithoutway introductionay asay
anay impertinentay eedomfray, atherray anthay aay omplimentcay otay ishay auntay; atthay itay
asway otnay inay ethay eastlay ecessarynay erethay ouldshay ebay anyay oticenay onay eitheray
idesay, anday atthay ifay itay ereway, itay ustmay elongbay otay mray. Arcyday, ethay uperiorsay inay
onsequencecay, otay eginbay ethay acquaintanceay. mray. Ollinscay istenedlay otay erhay ithway
ethay eterminedday airay ofay ollowingfay ishay ownay inclinationay, anday enwhay eshay easedcay
eakingspay, epliedray usthay,--

“myay earday Issmay Elizabethay, Iay avehay ethay ighesthay opinionay inay ethay orldway ofay ouryay
excellentay udgmentjay inay allay attersmay ithinway ethay opescay ofay ouryay
understandingay, utbay ermitpay emay otay aysay atthay erethay ustmay ebay aay ideway ifferenceday
etweenbay ethay establisheday ormsfay ofay eremonycay amongstay ethay aitylay anday osethay
ichwhay egulateray ethay ergyclay; orfay, ivegay emay eavelay otay observeay atthay Iay onsidercay
ethay ericalclay officeay asay equalay inay ointpay ofay ignityday ithway ethay ighesthay ankray
inay ethay ingdom--providedkay atthay aay operpray umilityhay ofay ehaviourbay isay atay ethay
amesay imetay aintainedmay. Ouyay ustmay, ereforethay, alloway emay otay ollowfay ethay
ictatesday ofay myay onsciencecay onay isthay occasionay, ichwhay eadlay emay otay erformpay
atwhay Iay ooklay onay asay aay ointpay ofay utyday. Ardonpay emay orfay eglectingnay otay ofitpray byay
ouryay adviceay, ichwhay onay everyay otheray ubjectsay allshay ebay myay onstantcay uidegay,
oughthay inay ethay asecay eforebay usay Iay onsidercay elfmysay oremay ittedfay byay educationay
anday abitualhay udystay otay ecideday onay atwhay isay ightray anthay aay oungyay adylay ikelay
ourselfyay;” anday ithway aay owlay owbay ehay eftlay erhay otay attackay mray. Arcyday, osewhay
eceptionray ofay ishay advancesay eshay eagerlyay atchedway, anday osewhay astonishmentay atay
eingbay osay addresseday asway eryvay evidentay. Erhay ousincay efacedpray ishay eechspay ithway
aay olemnsay owbay, anday oughthay eshay ouldcay otnay earhay aay ordway ofay itay, eshay eltfay asay ifay
earinghay itay allay, anday awsay inay ethay otionmay ofay ishay ipslay ethay ordsway apology“ay,”
uNsford“hay,” anday aDy“lay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay.” Itay exedvay erhay otay eesay imhay
exposeay imselfhay otay uchsay aay anmay. mray. Arcyday asway eyeingay imhay ithway
unrestraineday onderway; anday enwhay atay astlay mray. Ollinscay alloweday imhay otay eakspay,
epliedray ithway anay airay ofay istantday ivilitycay. mray. Ollinscay, oweverhay, asway otnay
iscouragedday omfray eakingspay againay, anday mray. Arcy’sday ontemptcay eemedsay
abundantlyay increasingay ithway ethay engthlay ofay ishay econdsay eechspay; anday atay ethay
enday ofay itay ehay onlyay ademay imhay aay ightslay owbay, anday ovedmay anotheray ayway: mray.
Ollinscay enthay eturnedray otay Elizabethay.

i“ay avehay onay easonray, Iay assureay ouyay,” aidsay ehay, o“tay ebay issatisfiedday ithway myay
eceptionray. mray. Arcyday eemedsay uchmay easedplay ithway ethay attentionay. Ehay answereday
emay ithway ethay utmostay ivilitycay, anday evenay aidpay emay ethay omplimentcay ofay ayingsay,
atthay ehay asway osay ellway onvincedcay ofay Adylay Atherine’scay iscernmentday asay otay ebay
ertaincay eshay ouldcay evernay estowbay aay avourfay unworthilyay. Itay asway eallyray aay eryvay
andsomehay oughtthay. Uponay ethay olewhay, Iay amay uchmay easedplay ithway imhay.”

Asay Elizabethay adhay onay ongerlay anyay interestay ofay erhay ownay otay ursuepay, eshay urnedtay
erhay attentionay almostay entirelyay onay erhay istersay anday mray. Ingleybay; anday ethay
aintray ofay agreeableay eflectionsray ichwhay erhay observationsay avegay irthbay otay ademay
erhay erhapspay almostay asay appyhay asay Anejay. Eshay awsay erhay inay ideaay ettledsay inay atthay
eryvay ousehay, inay allay ethay elicityfay ichwhay aay arriagemay ofay uetray affectionay ouldcay
estowbay; anday eshay eltfay apablecay, underay uchsay ircumstancescay, ofay endeavouringay
evenay otay ikelay Ingley’sbay otway isterssay. Erhay other’smay oughtsthay eshay ainlyplay
awsay ereway entbay ethay amesay ayway, anday eshay eterminedday otnay otay enturevay earnay erhay,
estlay eshay ightmay earhay ootay uchmay. Enwhay eythay atsay ownday otay uppersay, ereforethay,
eshay onsideredcay itay aay ostmay unluckyay erversenesspay ichwhay acedplay emthay ithinway
oneay ofay eachay otheray; anday eeplyday asway eshay exedvay otay indfay atthay erhay othermay asway
alkingtay otay atthay oneay ersonpay aDy(lay Ucaslay) eelyfray, openlyay, anday ofay othingnay
elseay utbay ofay erhay expectationay atthay Anejay ouldway ebay oonsay arriedmay otay mray.
Ingleybay. Itay asway anay animatingay ubjectsay, anday mrsay. Ennetbay eemedsay incapableay
ofay atiguefay ilewhay enumeratingay ethay advantagesay ofay ethay atchmay. Ishay eingbay uchsay
aay armingchay oungyay anmay, anday osay ichray, anday ivinglay utbay eethray ilesmay omfray emthay,
ereway ethay irstfay ointspay ofay elf-gratulationsay; anday enthay itay asway uchsay aay
omfortcay otay inkthay owhay ondfay ethay otway isterssay ereway ofay Anejay, anday otay ebay
ertaincay atthay eythay ustmay esireday ethay onnectioncay asay uchmay asay eshay ouldcay oday. Itay
asway, oreovermay, uchsay aay omisingpray ingthay orfay erhay oungeryay aughtersday, asay
Ane’sjay arryingmay osay eatlygray ustmay owthray emthay inay ethay ayway ofay otheray ichray enmay;
anday, astlylay, itay asway osay easantplay atay erhay imetay ofay ifelay otay ebay ableay otay
onsigncay erhay inglesay aughtersday otay ethay arecay ofay eirthay istersay, atthay eshay ightmay
otnay ebay obligeday otay ogay intoay ompanycay oremay anthay eshay ikedlay. Itay asway ecessarynay
otay akemay isthay ircumstancecay aay attermay ofay easureplay, ecausebay onay uchsay
occasionsay itay isay ethay etiquetteay; utbay onay oneay asway esslay ikelylay anthay mrsay.
Ennetbay otay indfay omfortcay inay ayingstay atay omehay atay anyay eriodpay ofay erhay ifelay. Eshay
oncludedcay ithway anymay oodgay ishesway atthay Adylay Ucaslay ightmay oonsay ebay equallyay
ortunatefay, oughthay evidentlyay anday iumphantlytray elievingbay erethay asway onay
ancechay ofay itay.

Inay ainvay idday Elizabethay endeavouray otay eckchay ethay apidityray ofay erhay other’smay
ordsway, oray ersuadepay erhay otay escribeday erhay elicityfay inay aay esslay audibleay
isperwhay; orfay otay erhay inexpressibleay exationvay eshay ouldcay erceivepay atthay ethay
iefchay ofay itay asway overhearday byay mray. Arcyday, owhay atsay oppositeay otay emthay. Erhay
othermay onlyay oldedscay erhay orfay eingbay onsensicalnay.

aT“whay isay mray. Arcyday otay emay, aypray, atthay Iay ouldshay ebay afraiday ofay imhay? Iay amay
uresay eway oweay imhay onay uchsay articularpay ivilitycay asay otay ebay obligeday otay aysay
othingnay e_hay_ aymay otnay ikelay otay earhay.”

oR“fay eaven’shay akesay, adammay, eakspay owerlay. Atwhay advantageay ancay itay ebay otay ouyay
otay offenday mray. Arcyday? Ouyay illway evernay ecommendray ourselfyay otay ishay iendfray byay
osay oingday.”

Othingnay atthay eshay ouldcay aysay, oweverhay, adhay anyay influenceay. Erhay othermay ouldway
alktay ofay erhay iewsvay inay ethay amesay intelligibleay onetay. Elizabethay ushedblay anday
ushedblay againay ithway ameshay anday exationvay. Eshay ouldcay otnay elphay equentlyfray
ancingglay erhay eyeay atay mray. Arcyday, oughthay everyay anceglay onvincedcay erhay ofay atwhay
eshay eadeddray; orfay oughthay ehay asway otnay alwaysay ookinglay atay erhay othermay, eshay asway
onvincedcay atthay ishay attentionay asway invariablyay ixedfay byay erhay. Ethay expressionay
ofay ishay acefay angedchay aduallygray omfray indignantay ontemptcay otay aay omposedcay anday
eadystay avitygray.

Atay engthlay, oweverhay, mrsay. Ennetbay adhay onay oremay otay aysay; anday Adylay Ucaslay, owhay
adhay eenbay onglay awningyay atay ethay epetitionray ofay elightsday ichwhay eshay awsay onay
ikelihoodlay ofay aringshay, asway eftlay otay ethay omfortscay ofay oldcay amhay anday ickenchay.
Elizabethay ownay eganbay otay eviveray. Utbay otnay onglay asway ethay intervalay ofay
anquillitytray; orfay enwhay uppersay asway overay, ingingsay asway alkedtay ofay, anday eshay
adhay ethay ortificationmay ofay eeingsay Arymay, afteray eryvay ittlelay entreatyay,
eparingpray otay obligeay ethay ompanycay. byay anymay ignificantsay ookslay anday ilentsay
entreatiesay idday eshay endeavouray otay eventpray uchsay aay oofpray ofay
omplaisance,--butcay inay ainvay; Arymay ouldway otnay understanday emthay; uchsay anay
opportunityay ofay exhibitingay asway elightfulday otay erhay, anday eshay eganbay erhay ongsay.
Elizabeth’say eyesay ereway ixedfay onay erhay, ithway ostmay ainfulpay ensationssay; anday
eshay atchedway erhay ogresspray oughthray ethay everalsay anzasstay ithway anay impatienceay
ichwhay asway eryvay illay ewardedray atay eirthay oseclay; orfay Arymay, onay eceivingray
amongstay ethay anksthay ofay ethay abletay ethay inthay ofay aay opehay atthay eshay ightmay ebay
evailedpray onay otay avourfay emthay againay, afteray ethay ausepay ofay alfhay aay inutemay
eganbay anotheray. Ary’smay owerspay ereway byay onay eansmay ittedfay orfay uchsay aay isplayday;
erhay oicevay asway eakway, anday erhay annermay affecteday. Elizabethay asway inay agoniesay.
Eshay ookedlay atay Anejay otay eesay owhay eshay orebay itay; utbay Anejay asway eryvay omposedlycay
alkingtay otay Ingleybay. Eshay ookedlay atay ishay otway isterssay, anday awsay emthay akingmay
ignssay ofay erisionday atay eachay otheray, anday atay Arcyday, owhay ontinuedcay, oweverhay,
impenetrablyay avegray. Eshay ookedlay atay erhay atherfay otay entreatay ishay
interferenceay, estlay Arymay ouldshay ebay ingingsay allay ightnay. Ehay ooktay ethay inthay,
anday, enwhay Arymay adhay inishedfay erhay econdsay ongsay, aidsay alouday,--

aT“thay illway oday extremelyay ellway, ildchay. Ouyay avehay elightedday usay onglay enoughay.
Etlay ethay otheray oungyay adieslay avehay imetay otay exhibitay.”

Arymay, oughthay etendingpray otnay otay earhay, asway omewhatsay isconcertedday; anday
Elizabethay, orrysay orfay erhay, anday orrysay orfay erhay ather’sfay eechspay, asway afraiday
erhay anxietyay adhay oneday onay oodgay. Othersay ofay ethay artypay ereway ownay applieday otay.

iF“ay Iay,” aidsay mray. Ollinscay, ere“way osay ortunatefay asay otay ebay ableay otay ingsay, Iay
ouldshay avehay eatgray easureplay, Iay amay uresay, inay obligingay ethay ompanycay ithway anay
airay; orfay Iay onsidercay usicmay asay aay eryvay innocentay iversionday, anday erfectlypay
ompatiblecay ithway ethay ofessionpray ofay aay ergymanclay. Iay oday otnay eanmay, oweverhay,
otay assertay atthay eway ancay ebay ustifiedjay inay evotingday ootay uchmay ofay ouray imetay otay
usicmay, orfay erethay areay ertainlycay otheray ingsthay otay ebay attendeday otay. Ethay
ectorray ofay aay arishpay ashay uchmay otay oday. Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ehay ustmay akemay uchsay
anay agreementay orfay ithestay asay aymay ebay eneficialbay otay imselfhay anday otnay
offensiveay otay ishay atronpay. Ehay ustmay itewray ishay ownay ermonssay; anday ethay imetay
atthay emainsray illway otnay ebay ootay uchmay orfay ishay arishpay utiesday, anday ethay arecay
anday improvementay ofay ishay ellingdway, ichwhay ehay annotcay ebay excuseday omfray akingmay
asay omfortablecay asay ossiblepay. Anday Iay oday otnay inkthay itay ofay ightlay importanceay
atthay ehay ouldshay avehay attentiveay anday onciliatorycay annersmay owardstay
everybodyay, especiallyay owardstay osethay otay omwhay ehay owesay ishay efermentpray. Iay
annotcay acquitay imhay ofay atthay utyday; ornay ouldcay Iay inkthay ellway ofay ethay anmay owhay
ouldshay omitay anay occasionay ofay estifyingtay ishay espectray owardstay anybodyay
onnectedcay ithway ethay amilyfay.” Anday ithway aay owbay otay mray. Arcyday, ehay oncludedcay
ishay eechspay, ichwhay adhay eenbay okenspay osay oudlay asay otay ebay eardhay byay alfhay ethay
oomray. Anymay ared--manystay iledsmay; utbay onay oneay ookedlay oremay amuseday anthay mray.
Ennetbay imselfhay, ilewhay ishay ifeway eriouslysay ommendedcay mray. Ollinscay orfay
avinghay okenspay osay ensiblysay, anday observeday, inay aay alf-whisperhay otay Adylay
Ucaslay, atthay ehay asway aay emarkablyray everclay, oodgay indkay ofay oungyay anmay.

Otay Elizabethay itay appeareday, atthay adhay erhay amilyfay ademay anay agreementay otay
exposeay emselvesthay asay uchmay asay eythay ouldcay uringday ethay eveningay, itay ouldway
avehay eenbay impossibleay orfay emthay otay ayplay eirthay artspay ithway oremay iritspay, oray
inerfay uccesssay; anday appyhay idday eshay inkthay itay orfay Ingleybay anday erhay istersay
atthay omesay ofay ethay exhibitionay adhay escapeday ishay oticenay, anday atthay ishay
eelingsfay ereway otnay ofay aay ortsay otay ebay uchmay istressedday byay ethay ollyfay ichwhay ehay
ustmay avehay itnessedway. Atthay ishay otway isterssay anday mray. Arcyday, oweverhay, ouldshay
avehay uchsay anay opportunityay ofay idiculingray erhay elationsray asway adbay enoughay; anday
eshay ouldcay otnay etermineday etherwhay ethay ilentsay ontemptcay ofay ethay entlemangay, oray
ethay insolentay ilessmay ofay ethay adieslay, ereway oremay intolerableay.

Ethay estray ofay ethay eveningay oughtbray erhay ittlelay amusementay. Eshay asway easedtay byay
mray. Ollinscay, owhay ontinuedcay ostmay erseveringlypay byay erhay idesay; anday oughthay ehay
ouldcay otnay evailpray ithway erhay otay anceday ithway imhay againay, utpay itay outay ofay erhay
owerpay otay anceday ithway othersay. Inay ainvay idday eshay entreatay imhay otay andstay upay ithway
omebodysay elseay, anday offereday otay introduceay imhay otay anyay oungyay adylay inay ethay
oomray. Ehay assureday erhay atthay, asay otay ancingday, ehay asway erfectlypay indifferentay
otay itay; atthay ishay iefchay objectay asway, byay elicateday attentionsay, otay ecommendray
imselfhay otay erhay; anday atthay ehay ouldshay ereforethay akemay aay ointpay ofay emainingray
oseclay otay erhay ethay olewhay eveningay. Erethay asway onay arguingay uponay uchsay aay
ojectpray. Eshay oweday erhay eatestgray eliefray otay erhay iendfray Issmay Ucaslay, owhay
oftenay oinedjay emthay, anday ood-naturedlygay engageday mray. Ollins’scay onversationcay
otay erselfhay.

Eshay asway atay eastlay eefray omfray ethay offenceay ofay mray. Arcy’sday urtherfay oticenay:
oughthay oftenay andingstay ithinway aay eryvay ortshay istanceday ofay erhay, uiteqay
isengagedday, ehay evernay amecay earnay enoughay otay eakspay. Eshay eltfay itay otay ebay ethay
obablepray onsequencecay ofay erhay allusionsay otay mray. Ickhamway, anday ejoicedray inay
itay.

Ethay Ongbournlay artypay ereway ethay astlay ofay allay ethay ompanycay otay epartday; anday byay aay
anœuvremay ofay mrsay. Ennetbay adhay otay aitway orfay eirthay arriagecay aay uarterqay ofay anay
ourhay afteray everybodyay elseay asway onegay, ichwhay avegay emthay imetay otay eesay owhay
eartilyhay eythay ereway ishedway awayay byay omesay ofay ethay amilyfay. mrsay. Ursthay anday erhay
istersay arcelyscay openeday eirthay outhsmay exceptay otay omplaincay ofay atiguefay, anday
ereway evidentlyay impatientay otay avehay ethay ousehay otay emselvesthay. Eythay epulsedray
everyay attemptay ofay mrsay. Ennetbay atay onversationcay, anday, byay osay oingday, ewthray aay
anguorlay overay ethay olewhay artypay, ichwhay asway eryvay ittlelay elievedray byay ethay onglay
eechesspay ofay mray. Ollinscay, owhay asway omplimentingcay mray. Ingleybay anday ishay
isterssay onay ethay eleganceay ofay eirthay entertainmentay, anday ethay ospitalityhay anday
olitenesspay ichwhay adhay arkedmay eirthay ehaviourbay otay eirthay uestsgay. Arcyday aidsay
othingnay atay allay. mray. Ennetbay, inay equalay ilencesay, asway enjoyingay ethay enescay.
mray. Ingleybay anday Anejay ereway andingstay ogethertay aay ittlelay etachedday omfray ethay
estray, anday alkedtay onlyay otay eachay otheray. Elizabethay eservedpray asay eadystay aay
ilencesay asay eitheray mrsay. Ursthay oray Issmay Ingleybay; anday evenay Ialyday asway ootay
uchmay atiguedfay otay utteray oremay anthay ethay occasionalay exclamationay ofay oRd“lay,
owhay iredtay Iay amay!” accompanieday byay aay iolentvay awnyay.

Enwhay atay engthlay eythay aroseay otay aketay eavelay, mrsay. Ennetbay asway ostmay essinglypray
ivilcay inay erhay opehay ofay eeingsay ethay olewhay amilyfay oonsay atay Ongbournlay; anday
addresseday erselfhay articularlypay otay mray. Ingleybay, otay assureay imhay owhay appyhay
ehay ouldway akemay emthay, byay eatingay aay amilyfay innerday ithway emthay atay anyay imetay,
ithoutway ethay eremonycay ofay aay ormalfay invitationay. Ingleybay asway allay atefulgray
easureplay; anday ehay eadilyray engageday orfay akingtay ethay earliestay opportunityay ofay
aitingway onay erhay afteray ishay eturnray omfray Ondonlay, itherwhay ehay asway obligeday otay
ogay ethay extnay ayday orfay aay ortshay imetay.

mrsay. Ennetbay asway erfectlypay atisfiedsay; anday uittedqay ethay ousehay underay ethay
elightfulday ersuasionpay atthay, allowingay orfay ethay ecessarynay eparationspray ofay
ettlementssay, ewnay arriagescay, anday eddingway othesclay, eshay ouldshay undoubtedlyay
eesay erhay aughterday ettledsay atay Etherfieldnay inay ethay oursecay ofay eethray oray ourfay
onthsmay. Ofay avinghay anotheray aughterday arriedmay otay mray. Ollinscay eshay oughtthay
ithway equalay ertaintycay, anday ithway onsiderablecay, oughthay otnay equalay, easureplay.
Elizabethay asway ethay eastlay earday otay erhay ofay allay erhay ildrenchay; anday oughthay ethay
anmay anday ethay atchmay ereway uiteqay oodgay enoughay orfay er_hay_, ethay orthway ofay eachay
asway eclipseday byay mray. Ingleybay anday Etherfieldnay.




iLlustration[ay:

o“tay assureay ouyay inay ethay ostmay animateday anguagelay”
ay]




APTERchay IXxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay extnay ayday openeday aay ewnay enescay atay Ongbournlay. mray. Ollinscay ademay ishay
eclarationday inay ormfay. Avinghay esolvedray otay oday itay ithoutway osslay ofay imetay, asay
ishay eavelay ofay absenceay extendeday onlyay otay ethay ollowingfay Aturdaysay, anday avinghay
onay eelingsfay ofay iffidenceday otay akemay itay istressingday otay imselfhay evenay atay ethay
omentmay, ehay etsay aboutay itay inay aay eryvay orderlyay annermay, ithway allay ethay
observancesay ichwhay ehay upposedsay aay egularray artpay ofay ethay usinessbay. Onay indingfay
mrsay. Ennetbay, Elizabethay, anday oneay ofay ethay oungeryay irlsgay ogethertay, oonsay
afteray eakfastbray, ehay addresseday ethay othermay inay esethay ordsway,--

aY“may Iay opehay, adammay, orfay ouryay interestay ithway ouryay airfay aughterday Elizabethay,
enwhay Iay olicitsay orfay ethay onourhay ofay aay ivatepray audienceay ithway erhay inay ethay
oursecay ofay isthay orningmay?”

Eforebay Elizabethay adhay imetay orfay anythingay utbay aay ushblay ofay urprisesay, mrsay.
Ennetbay instantlyay answereday,--

oH“ay earday! Esyay, ertainlycay. Iay amay uresay Izzylay illway ebay eryvay appy--ihay amay uresay
eshay ancay avehay onay objectionay. Omecay, Ittykay, Iay antway ouyay upstairsay.” Anday
atheringgay erhay orkway ogethertay, eshay asway asteninghay awayay, enwhay Elizabethay
alledcay outay,--

eAr“day a’ammay, oday otnay ogay. Iay egbay ouyay illway otnay ogay. mray. Ollinscay ustmay excuseay
emay. Ehay ancay avehay othingnay otay aysay otay emay atthay anybodyay eednay otnay earhay. Iay amay
oinggay awayay elfmysay.”

o“nay, onay, onsensenay, Izzylay. Iay esireday ouyay illway aystay erewhay ouyay areay.” Anday
uponay Elizabeth’say eemingsay eallyray, ithway exedvay anday embarrasseday ookslay, aboutay
otay escapeay, eshay addeday, iZzy“lay, Iay insist_ay_ uponay ouryay ayingstay anday earinghay
mray. Ollinscay.”

Elizabethay ouldway otnay opposeay uchsay anay injunctionay; anday aay oment’smay
onsiderationcay akingmay erhay alsoay ensiblesay atthay itay ouldway ebay isestway otay etgay itay
overay asay oonsay anday asay uietlyqay asay ossiblepay, eshay atsay ownday againay, anday iedtray
otay oncealcay, byay incessantay employmentay, ethay eelingsfay ichwhay ereway ividedday
etweenbay istressday anday iversionday. mrsay. Ennetbay anday Ittykay alkedway offay, anday asay
oonsay asay eythay ereway onegay, mray. Ollinscay eganbay,--

eLieve“bay emay, myay earday Issmay Elizabethay, atthay ouryay odestymay, osay arfay omfray
oingday ouyay anyay isserviceday, atherray addsay otay ouryay otheray erfectionspay. Ouyay
ouldway avehay eenbay esslay amiableay inay myay eyesay adhay erethay ot_nay_ eenbay isthay ittlelay
unwillingnessay; utbay alloway emay otay assureay ouyay atthay Iay avehay ouryay espectedray
other’smay ermissionpay orfay isthay addressay. Ouyay ancay ardlyhay oubtday ethay urportpay
ofay myay iscourseday, oweverhay ouryay aturalnay elicacyday aymay eadlay ouyay otay
issembleday; myay attentionsay avehay eenbay ootay arkedmay otay ebay istakenmay. Almostay asay
oonsay asay Iay entereday ethay ousehay Iay ingledsay ouyay outay asay ethay ompanioncay ofay myay
uturefay ifelay. Utbay eforebay Iay amay unray awayay ithway byay myay eelingsfay onay isthay
ubjectsay, erhapspay itay illway ebay advisableay orfay emay otay atestay myay easonsray orfay
arrying--andmay, oreovermay, orfay omingcay intoay Ertfordshirehay ithway ethay esignday
ofay electingsay aay ifeway, asay Iay ertainlycay idday.”

Ethay ideaay ofay mray. Ollinscay, ithway allay ishay olemnsay omposurecay, eingbay unray awayay
ithway byay ishay eelingsfay, ademay Elizabethay osay earnay aughinglay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay
useay ethay ortshay ausepay ehay alloweday inay anyay attemptay otay opstay imhay artherfay, anday
ehay ontinuedcay,--

“myay easonsray orfay arryingmay areay, irstfay, atthay Iay inkthay itay aay ightray ingthay orfay
everyay ergymanclay inay easyay ircumstancescay ike(lay elfmysay) otay etsay ethay exampleay
ofay atrimonymay inay ishay arishpay; econdlysay, atthay Iay amay onvincedcay itay illway adday
eryvay eatlygray otay myay appinesshay; anday, irdlythay, ichwhay erhapspay Iay oughtay otay
avehay entionedmay earlieray, atthay itay isay ethay articularpay adviceay anday
ecommendationray ofay ethay eryvay oblenay adylay omwhay Iay avehay ethay onourhay ofay allingcay
atronesspay. Icetway ashay eshay ondescendedcay otay ivegay emay erhay opinionay unasked(ay
ootay!) onay isthay ubjectsay; anday itay asway utbay ethay eryvay Aturdaysay ightnay eforebay Iay
eftlay Unsford,--betweenhay ouray oolspay atay uadrilleqay, ilewhay mrsay. Enkinsonjay asway
arrangingay Issmay Eday Ourgh’sbay ootstool,--thatfay eshay aidsay, ‘mray. Ollinscay, ouyay
ustmay arrymay. Aay ergymanclay ikelay ouyay ustmay arrymay. Oosechay operlypray, oosechay aay
entlewomangay orfay _myay_ akesay, anday orfay ouryay own_ay_; etlay erhay ebay anay activeay,
usefulay ortsay ofay ersonpay, otnay oughtbray upay ighhay, utbay ableay otay akemay aay allsmay
incomeay ogay aay oodgay ayway. Isthay isay myay adviceay. Indfay uchsay aay omanway asay oonsay asay
ouyay ancay, ingbray erhay otay Unsfordhay, anday Iay illway isitvay erhay.’ Alloway emay, byay ethay
ayway, otay observeay, myay airfay ousincay, atthay Iay oday otnay eckonray ethay oticenay anday
indnesskay ofay Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay asay amongay ethay eastlay ofay ethay
advantagesay inay myay owerpay otay offeray. Ouyay illway indfay erhay annersmay eyondbay
anythingay Iay ancay escribeday; anday ouryay itway anday ivacityvay, Iay inkthay, ustmay ebay
acceptableay otay erhay, especiallyay enwhay emperedtay ithway ethay ilencesay anday espectray
ichwhay erhay ankray illway inevitablyay exciteay. Usthay uchmay orfay myay eneralgay
intentionay inay avourfay ofay atrimonymay; itay emainsray otay ebay oldtay whyay myay iewsvay
ereway irectedday otay Ongbournlay insteaday ofay myay ownay eighbourhoodnay, erewhay Iay
assureay ouyay erethay areay anymay amiableay oungyay omenway. Utbay ethay actfay isay, atthay
eingbay, asay Iay amay, otay inheritay isthay estateay afteray ethay eathday ofay ouryay onouredhay
atherfay o(whay, oweverhay, aymay ivelay anymay earsyay ongerlay), Iay ouldcay otnay atisfysay
elfmysay ithoutway esolvingray otay oosechay aay ifeway omfray amongay ishay aughtersday, atthay
ethay osslay otay emthay ightmay ebay asay ittlelay asay ossiblepay enwhay ethay elancholymay
eventay akestay ace--whichplay, oweverhay, asay Iay avehay alreadyay aidsay, aymay otnay ebay
orfay everalsay earsyay. Isthay ashay eenbay myay otivemay, myay airfay ousincay, anday Iay
atterflay elfmysay itay illway otnay inksay emay inay ouryay esteemay. Anday ownay othingnay
emainsray orfay emay utbay otay assureay ouyay inay ethay ostmay animateday anguagelay ofay ethay
iolencevay ofay myay affectionay. Otay ortunefay Iay amay erfectlypay indifferentay, anday
allshay akemay onay emandday ofay atthay aturenay onay ouryay atherfay, incesay Iay amay ellway
awareay atthay itay ouldcay otnay ebay ompliedcay ithway; anday atthay oneay ousandthay oundspay
inay ethay ay4 erpay entscay., ichwhay illway otnay ebay oursyay illtay afteray ouryay other’smay
eceaseday, isay allay atthay ouyay aymay everay ebay entitleday otay. Onay atthay eadhay,
ereforethay, Iay allshay ebay uniformlyay ilentsay: anday ouyay aymay assureay ourselfyay atthay
onay ungenerousay eproachray allshay everay asspay myay ipslay enwhay eway areay arriedmay.”

Itay asway absolutelyay ecessarynay otay interruptay imhay ownay.

oU“yay areay ootay astyhay, irsay,” eshay iedcray. oU“yay orgetfay atthay Iay avehay ademay onay
answeray. Etlay emay oday itay ithoutway urtherfay osslay ofay imetay. Acceptay myay anksthay orfay
ethay omplimentcay ouyay areay ayingpay emay. Iay amay eryvay ensiblesay ofay ethay onourhay ofay
ouryay oposalspray, utbay itay isay impossibleay orfay emay otay oday otherwiseay anthay eclineday
emthay.”

i“ay amay otnay ownay otay earnlay,” epliedray mray. Ollinscay, ithway aay ormalfay aveway ofay ethay
andhay, at“thay itay isay usualay ithway oungyay adieslay otay ejectray ethay addressesay ofay ethay
anmay omwhay eythay ecretlysay eanmay otay acceptay, enwhay ehay irstfay appliesay orfay eirthay
avourfay; anday atthay ometimessay ethay efusalray isay epeatedray aay econdsay oray evenay aay
irdthay imetay. Iay amay, ereforethay, byay onay eansmay iscouragedday byay atwhay ouyay avehay
ustjay aidsay, anday allshay opehay otay eadlay ouyay otay ethay altaray ereay onglay.”

uPon“ay myay ordway, irsay,” iedcray Elizabethay, our“yay opehay isay atherray anay
extraordinaryay oneay afteray myay eclarationday. Iay oday assureay ouyay atthay Iay amay otnay
oneay ofay osethay oungyay adieslay if(ay uchsay oungyay adieslay erethay areay) owhay areay osay
aringday asay otay iskray eirthay appinesshay onay ethay ancechay ofay eingbay askeday aay econdsay
imetay. Iay amay erfectlypay erioussay inay myay efusalray. Ouyay ouldcay otnay akemay e_may_
appyhay, anday Iay amay onvincedcay atthay Iay amay ethay astlay omanway inay ethay orldway owhay
ouldway akemay ou_yay_ osay. Aynay, ereway ouryay iendfray Adylay Atherinecay otay owknay emay, Iay
amay ersuadedpay eshay ouldway indfay emay inay everyay espectray illay ualifiedqay orfay ethay
ituationsay.”

eRe“way itay ertaincay atthay Adylay Atherinecay ouldway inkthay osay,” aidsay mray. Ollinscay,
eryvay avely--“butgray Iay annotcay imagineay atthay erhay Adyshiplay ouldway atay allay
isapproveday ofay ouyay. Anday ouyay aymay ebay ertaincay atthay enwhay Iay avehay ethay onourhay ofay
eeingsay erhay againay Iay allshay eakspay inay ethay ighesthay ermstay ofay ouryay odestymay,
economyay, anday otheray amiableay ualificationsqay.”

iNdeed“ay, mray. Ollinscay, allay aisepray ofay emay illway ebay unnecessaryay. Ouyay ustmay
ivegay emay eavelay otay udgejay orfay elfmysay, anday aypay emay ethay omplimentcay ofay
elievingbay atwhay Iay aysay. Iay ishway ouyay eryvay appyhay anday eryvay ichray, anday byay
efusingray ouryay andhay, oday allay inay myay owerpay otay eventpray ouryay eingbay otherwiseay.
Inay akingmay emay ethay offeray, ouyay ustmay avehay atisfiedsay ethay elicacyday ofay ouryay
eelingsfay ithway egardray otay myay amilyfay, anday aymay aketay ossessionpay ofay Ongbournlay
estateay eneverwhay itay allsfay, ithoutway anyay elf-reproachsay. Isthay attermay aymay ebay
onsideredcay, ereforethay, asay inallyfay ettledsay.” Anday isingray asay eshay usthay
okespay, eshay ouldway avehay uittedqay ethay oomray, adhay otnay mray. Ollinscay usthay
addresseday erhay,--

eN“whay Iay oday elfmysay ethay onourhay ofay eakingspay otay ouyay extnay onay ethay ubjectsay, Iay
allshay opehay otay eceiveray aay oremay avourablefay answeray anthay ouyay avehay ownay ivengay
emay; oughthay Iay amay arfay omfray accusingay ouyay ofay ueltycray atay esentpray, ecausebay Iay
owknay itay otay ebay ethay establisheday ustomcay ofay ouryay exsay otay ejectray aay anmay onay ethay
irstfay applicationay, anday, erhapspay, ouyay avehay evenay ownay aidsay asay uchmay otay
encourageay myay uitsay asay ouldway ebay onsistentcay ithway ethay uetray elicacyday ofay ethay
emalefay aracterchay.”

eAlly“ray, mray. Ollinscay,” iedcray Elizabethay, ithway omesay armthway, ou“yay uzzlepay emay
exceedinglyay. Ifay atwhay Iay avehay ithertohay aidsay ancay appearay otay ouyay inay ethay ormfay
ofay encouragementay, Iay owknay otnay owhay otay expressay myay efusalray inay uchsay aay ayway asay
aymay onvincecay ouyay ofay itsay eingbay oneay.”

oU“yay ustmay ivegay emay eavelay otay atterflay elfmysay, myay earday ousincay, atthay ouryay
efusalray ofay myay addressesay areay erelymay ordsway ofay oursecay. myay easonsray orfay
elievingbay itay areay ieflybray ese:--itthay oesday otnay appearay otay emay atthay myay andhay
isay unworthyay ofay ouryay acceptanceay, oray atthay ethay establishmentay Iay ancay offeray
ouldway ebay anyay otheray anthay ighlyhay esirableday. myay ituationsay inay ifelay, myay
onnectionscay ithway ethay amilyfay ofay Eday Ourghbay, anday myay elationshipray otay ouryay
ownay, areay ircumstancescay ighlyhay inay myay avourfay; anday ouyay ouldshay aketay itay intoay
urtherfay onsiderationcay atthay, inay itespay ofay ouryay anifoldmay attractionsay, itay isay
byay onay eansmay ertaincay atthay anotheray offeray ofay arriagemay aymay everay ebay ademay ouyay.
Ouryay ortionpay isay unhappilyay osay allsmay, atthay itay illway inay allay ikelihoodlay undoay
ethay effectsay ofay ouryay ovelinesslay anday amiableay ualificationsqay. Asay Iay ustmay,
ereforethay, oncludecay atthay ouyay areay otnay erioussay inay ouryay ejectionray ofay emay, Iay
allshay oosechay otay attributeay itay otay ouryay ishway ofay increasingay myay ovelay byay
uspensesay, accordingay otay ethay usualay acticepray ofay elegantay emalesfay.”

i“ay oday assureay ouyay, irsay, atthay Iay avehay onay etensionspray ateverwhay otay atthay indkay
ofay eleganceay ichwhay onsistscay inay ormentingtay aay espectableray anmay. Iay ouldway
atherray ebay aidpay ethay omplimentcay ofay eingbay elievedbay inceresay. Iay ankthay ouyay
againay anday againay orfay ethay onourhay ouyay avehay oneday emay inay ouryay oposalspray, utbay
otay acceptay emthay isay absolutelyay impossibleay. myay eelingsfay inay everyay espectray
orbidfay itay. Ancay Iay eakspay ainerplay? Oday otnay onsidercay emay ownay asay anay elegantay
emalefay intendingay otay agueplay ouyay, utbay asay aay ationalray eaturecray eakingspay ethay
uthtray omfray erhay earthay.”

oU“yay areay uniformlyay armingchay!” iedcray ehay, ithway anay airay ofay awkwarday
allantrygay; and“ay Iay amay ersuadedpay atthay, enwhay anctionedsay byay ethay expressay
authorityay ofay othbay ouryay excellentay arentspay, myay oposalspray illway otnay ailfay ofay
eingbay acceptableay.”

Otay uchsay erseverancepay inay ilfulway elf-deceptionsay Elizabethay ouldway akemay onay
eplyray, anday immediatelyay anday inay ilencesay ithdrewway; eterminedday, atthay ifay ehay
ersistedpay inay onsideringcay erhay epeatedray efusalsray asay atteringflay
encouragementay, otay applyay otay erhay atherfay, osewhay egativenay ightmay ebay uttereday
inay uchsay aay annermay asay ustmay ebay ecisiveday, anday osewhay ehaviourbay atay eastlay ouldcay
otnay ebay istakenmay orfay ethay affectationay anday oquetrycay ofay anay elegantay emalefay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay xxay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ollinscay asway otnay eftlay onglay otay ethay ilentsay ontemplationcay ofay ishay
uccessfulsay ovelay; orfay mrsay. Ennetbay, avinghay awdledday aboutay inay ethay estibulevay
otay atchway orfay ethay enday ofay ethay onferencecay, onay oonersay awsay Elizabethay openay ethay
oorday anday ithway uickqay epstay asspay erhay owardstay ethay aircasestay, anthay eshay
entereday ethay eakfast-roombray, anday ongratulatedcay othbay imhay anday erselfhay inay
armway ermstay onay ethay appyhay ospectpray ofay eirthay earernay onnectioncay. mray. Ollinscay
eceivedray anday eturnedray esethay elicitationsfay ithway equalay easureplay, anday enthay
oceededpray otay elateray ethay articularspay ofay eirthay intervieway, ithway ethay esultray
ofay ichwhay ehay ustedtray ehay adhay everyay easonray otay ebay atisfiedsay, incesay ethay
efusalray ichwhay ishay ousincay adhay eadfastlystay ivengay imhay ouldway aturallynay owflay
omfray erhay ashfulbay odestymay anday ethay enuinegay elicacyday ofay erhay aracterchay.

Isthay informationay, oweverhay, artledstay mrsay. Ennetbay: eshay ouldway avehay eenbay
adglay otay ebay equallyay atisfiedsay atthay erhay aughterday adhay eantmay otay encourageay
imhay byay otestingpray againstay ishay oposalspray, utbay eshay aredday otnay elievebay itay,
anday ouldcay otnay elphay ayingsay osay.

uT“bay ependday uponay itay, mray. Ollinscay,” eshay addeday, at“thay Izzylay allshay ebay
oughtbray otay easonray. Iay illway eakspay otay erhay aboutay itay elfmysay irectlyday. Eshay isay
aay eryvay eadstronghay, oolishfay irlgay, anday oesday otnay owknay erhay ownay interestay; utbay
Iay illway ake_may_ erhay owknay itay.”

aRdon“pay emay orfay interruptingay ouyay, adammay,” iedcray mray. Ollinscay; ut“bay ifay eshay
isay eallyray eadstronghay anday oolishfay, Iay owknay otnay etherwhay eshay ouldway
altogetheray ebay aay eryvay esirableday ifeway otay aay anmay inay myay ituationsay, owhay
aturallynay ookslay orfay appinesshay inay ethay arriagemay atestay. Ifay, ereforethay, eshay
actuallyay ersistspay inay ejectingray myay uitsay, erhapspay itay ereway etterbay otnay otay
orcefay erhay intoay acceptingay emay, ecausebay, ifay iablelay otay uchsay efectsday ofay
empertay, eshay ouldcay otnay ontributecay uchmay otay myay elicityfay.”

iR“say, ouyay uiteqay isunderstandmay emay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, alarmeday. iZzy“lay isay
onlyay eadstronghay inay uchsay attersmay asay esethay. Inay everythingay elseay eshay isay asay
ood-naturedgay aay irlgay asay everay ivedlay. Iay illway ogay irectlyday otay mray. Ennetbay, anday
eway allshay eryvay oonsay ettlesay itay ithway erhay, Iay amay uresay.”

Eshay ouldway otnay ivegay imhay imetay otay eplyray, utbay urryinghay instantlyay otay erhay
usbandhay, alledcay outay, asay eshay entereday ethay ibrarylay,--

oH“ay, mray. Ennetbay, ouyay areay antedway immediatelyay; eway areay allay inay anay uproaray.
Ouyay ustmay omecay anday akemay Izzylay arrymay mray. Ollinscay, orfay eshay owsvay eshay illway
otnay avehay imhay; anday ifay ouyay oday otnay akemay astehay ehay illway angechay ishay indmay anday
otnay avehay er_hay_.”

mray. Ennetbay aisedray ishay eyesay omfray ishay ookbay asay eshay entereday, anday ixedfay emthay
onay erhay acefay ithway aay almcay unconcernay, ichwhay asway otnay inay ethay eastlay altereday byay
erhay ommunicationcay.

i“ay avehay otnay ethay easureplay ofay understandingay ouyay,” aidsay ehay, enwhay eshay adhay
inishedfay erhay eechspay. oF“ay atwhay areay ouyay alkingtay?”

oF“ay mray. Ollinscay anday Izzylay. Izzylay eclaresday eshay illway otnay avehay mray. Ollinscay,
anday mray. Ollinscay eginsbay otay aysay atthay ehay illway otnay avehay Izzylay.”

aNd“ay atwhay amay Iay otay oday onay ethay occasionay? Itay eemssay aay opelesshay usinessbay.”

eAk“spay otay Izzylay aboutay itay ourselfyay. Elltay erhay atthay ouyay insistay uponay erhay
arryingmay imhay.”

eT“lay erhay ebay alledcay ownday. Eshay allshay earhay myay opinionay.”

mrsay. Ennetbay angray ethay ellbay, anday Issmay Elizabethay asway ummonedsay otay ethay
ibrarylay.

oMe“cay erehay, ildchay,” iedcray erhay atherfay asay eshay appeareday. i“ay avehay entsay orfay
ouyay onay anay affairay ofay importanceay. Iay understanday atthay mray. Ollinscay ashay ademay
ouyay anay offeray ofay arriagemay. Isay itay uetray?”

Elizabethay epliedray atthay itay asway.

eRy“vay ell--andway isthay offeray ofay arriagemay ouyay avehay efusedray?”

i“ay avehay, irsay.”

eRy“vay ellway. Eway ownay omecay otay ethay ointpay. Ouryay othermay insistsay uponay ouryay
acceptingay itay. Isay itay otnay osay, mrsay. Ennetbay?”

eS“yay, oray Iay illway evernay eesay erhay againay.”

aN“ay unhappyay alternativeay isay eforebay ouyay, Elizabethay. Omfray isthay ayday ouyay ustmay
ebay aay angerstray otay oneay ofay ouryay arentspay. Ouryay othermay illway evernay eesay ouyay
againay ifay ouyay oday ot_nay_ arrymay mray. Ollinscay, anday Iay illway evernay eesay ouyay againay
ifay ouyay o_day_.”

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay utbay ilesmay atay uchsay aay onclusioncay ofay uchsay aay eginningbay;
utbay mrsay. Ennetbay, owhay adhay ersuadedpay erselfhay atthay erhay usbandhay egardedray ethay
affairay asay eshay ishedway, asway excessivelyay isappointedday.

aT“whay oday ouyay eanmay, mray. Ennetbay, byay alkingtay inay isthay ayway? Ouyay omisedpray emay
otay insist_ay_ uponay erhay arryingmay imhay.”

“myay earday,” epliedray erhay usbandhay, i“ay avehay otway allsmay avoursfay otay equestray.
Irstfay, atthay ouyay illway alloway emay ethay eefray useay ofay myay understandingay onay ethay
esentpray occasionay; anday, econdlysay, ofay myay oomray. Iay allshay ebay adglay otay avehay ethay
ibrarylay otay elfmysay asay oonsay asay aymay ebay.”

Otnay etyay, oweverhay, inay itespay ofay erhay isappointmentday inay erhay usbandhay, idday
mrsay. Ennetbay ivegay upay ethay ointpay. Eshay alkedtay otay Elizabethay againay anday againay;
oaxedcay anday eatenedthray erhay byay urnstay. Eshay endeavoureday otay ecuresay Anejay inay
erhay interestay, utbay Anejay, ithway allay ossiblepay ildnessmay, eclinedday
interferingay; anday Elizabethay, ometimessay ithway ealray earnestnessay, anday
ometimessay ithway ayfulplay aietygay, epliedray otay erhay attacksay. Oughthay erhay annermay
ariedvay, oweverhay, erhay eterminationday evernay idday.

mray. Ollinscay, eanwhilemay, asway editatingmay inay olitudesay onay atwhay adhay assedpay.
Ehay oughtthay ootay ellway ofay imselfhay otay omprehendcay onay atwhay otivemay ishay ousincay
ouldcay efuseray imhay; anday oughthay ishay idepray asway urthay, ehay ufferedsay inay onay otheray
ayway. Ishay egardray orfay erhay asway uiteqay imaginaryay; anday ethay ossibilitypay ofay erhay
eservingday erhay other’smay eproachray eventedpray ishay eelingfay anyay egretray.

Ilewhay ethay amilyfay ereway inay isthay onfusioncay, Arlottechay Ucaslay amecay otay endspay
ethay ayday ithway emthay. Eshay asway etmay inay ethay estibulevay byay Ialyday, owhay, ingflyay otay
erhay, iedcray inay aay alfhay isperwhay, i“ay amay adglay ouyay areay omecay, orfay erethay isay uchsay
unfay erehay! Atwhay oday ouyay inkthay ashay appenedhay isthay orningmay? mray. Ollinscay ashay
ademay anay offeray otay Izzylay, anday eshay illway otnay avehay imhay.”

iLlustration[ay:

ey“thay entereday ethay eakfastbray oomray”
ay]

Arlottechay adhay ardlyhay imetay otay answeray eforebay eythay ereway oinedjay byay Ittykay,
owhay amecay otay elltay ethay amesay ewsnay; anday onay oonersay adhay eythay entereday ethay
eakfast-roombray, erewhay mrsay. Ennetbay asway aloneay, anthay eshay ikewiselay eganbay onay
ethay ubjectsay, allingcay onay Issmay Ucaslay orfay erhay ompassioncay, anday entreatingay
erhay otay ersuadepay erhay iendfray Izzylay otay omplycay ithway ethay ishesway ofay erhay
amilyfay. aY“pray oday, myay earday Issmay Ucaslay,” eshay addeday, inay aay elancholymay onetay;
or“fay obodynay isay onay myay idesay, obodynay akestay artpay ithway emay; Iay amay uellycray useday,
obodynay eelsfay orfay myay oorpay ervesnay.”

Arlotte’schay eplyray asway aredspay byay ethay entranceay ofay Anejay anday Elizabethay.

aY“ay, erethay eshay omescay,” ontinuedcay mrsay. Ennetbay, ooking“lay asay unconcerneday asay
aymay ebay, anday aringcay onay oremay orfay usay anthay ifay eway ereway atay Orkyay, ovidedpray eshay
ancay avehay erhay ownay ayway. Utbay Iay elltay ouyay atwhay, Issmay Izzylay, ifay ouyay aketay itay
intoay ouryay eadhay otay ogay onay efusingray everyay offeray ofay arriagemay inay isthay ayway,
ouyay illway evernay etgay aay usbandhay atay all--anday Iay amay uresay Iay oday otnay owknay owhay isay
otay aintainmay ouyay enwhay ouryay atherfay isay eadday. i_ay_ allshay otnay ebay ableay otay eepkay
ou--andyay osay Iay arnway ouyay. Iay avehay oneday ithway ouyay omfray isthay eryvay ayday. Iay oldtay
ouyay inay ethay ibrarylay, ouyay owknay, atthay Iay ouldshay evernay eakspay otay ouyay againay,
anday ouyay illway indfay emay asay oodgay asay myay ordway. Iay avehay onay easureplay inay alkingtay
otay undutifulay ildrenchay. Otnay atthay Iay avehay uchmay easureplay, indeeday, inay alkingtay
otay anybodyay. Eoplepay owhay uffersay asay Iay oday omfray ervousnay omplaintscay ancay avehay
onay eatgray inclinationay orfay alkingtay. Obodynay ancay elltay atwhay Iay uffersay! Utbay itay
isay alwaysay osay. Osethay owhay oday otnay omplaincay areay evernay itiedpay.”

Erhay aughtersday istenedlay inay ilencesay otay isthay effusionay, ensiblesay atthay anyay
attemptay otay easonray ithway oray oothesay erhay ouldway onlyay increaseay ethay irritationay.
Eshay alkedtay onay, ereforethay, ithoutway interruptionay omfray anyay ofay emthay illtay
eythay ereway oinedjay byay mray. Ollinscay, owhay entereday ithway anay airay oremay atelystay
anthay usualay, anday onay erceivingpay omwhay, eshay aidsay otay ethay irlsgay,--

oW“nay, Iay oday insistay uponay itay, atthay ouyay, allay ofay ouyay, oldhay ouryay onguestay, anday
etlay mray. Ollinscay anday emay avehay aay ittlelay onversationcay ogethertay.”

Elizabethay assedpay uietlyqay outay ofay ethay oomray, Anejay anday Ittykay ollowedfay, utbay
Ialyday oodstay erhay oundgray, eterminedday otay earhay allay eshay ouldcay; anday Arlottechay,
etainedday irstfay byay ethay ivilitycay ofay mray. Ollinscay, osewhay inquiriesay afteray
erselfhay anday allay erhay amilyfay ereway eryvay inutemay, anday enthay byay aay ittlelay
uriositycay, atisfiedsay erselfhay ithway alkingway otay ethay indowway anday etendingpray
otnay otay earhay. Inay aay olefulday oicevay mrsay. Ennetbay usthay eganbay ethay ojectedpray
onversationcay:--

oH“ay, mray. Ollinscay!”

“myay earday adammay,” epliedray ehay, et“lay usay ebay orfay everay ilentsay onay isthay ointpay.
Arfay ebay itay omfray emay,” ehay esentlypray ontinuedcay, inay aay oicevay atthay arkedmay ishay
ispleasureday, o“tay esentray ethay ehaviourbay ofay ouryay aughterday. Esignationray otay
inevitableay evilsay isay ethay utyday ofay usay allay: ethay eculiarpay utyday ofay aay oungyay anmay
owhay ashay eenbay osay ortunatefay asay Iay avehay eenbay, inay earlyay efermentpray; anday, Iay
usttray, Iay amay esignedray. Erhapspay otnay ethay esslay osay omfray eelingfay aay oubtday ofay myay
ositivepay appinesshay adhay myay airfay ousincay onouredhay emay ithway erhay andhay; orfay Iay
avehay oftenay observeday, atthay esignationray isay evernay osay erfectpay asay enwhay ethay
essingblay eniedday eginsbay otay oselay omewhatsay ofay itsay aluevay inay ouray estimationay.
Ouyay illway otnay, Iay opehay, onsidercay emay asay owingshay anyay isrespectday otay ouryay
amilyfay, myay earday adammay, byay usthay ithdrawingway myay etensionspray otay ouryay
aughter’sday avourfay, ithoutway avinghay aidpay ourselfyay anday mray. Ennetbay ethay
omplimentcay ofay equestingray ouyay otay interposeay ouryay authorityay inay myay ehalfbay.
myay onductcay aymay, Iay earfay, ebay objectionableay inay avinghay accepteday myay
ismissionday omfray ouryay aughter’sday ipslay insteaday ofay ouryay ownay; utbay eway areay allay
iablelay otay erroray. Iay avehay ertainlycay eantmay ellway oughthray ethay olewhay affairay.
myay objectay ashay eenbay otay ecuresay anay amiableay ompanioncay orfay elfmysay, ithway ueday
onsiderationcay orfay ethay advantageay ofay allay ouryay amilyfay; anday ifay myay anner_may_
ashay eenbay atay allay eprehensibleray, Iay erehay egbay eavelay otay apologizeay.”




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay Ixxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay iscussionday ofay mray. Ollins’scay offeray asway ownay earlynay atay anay enday, anday
Elizabethay adhay onlyay otay uffersay omfray ethay uncomfortableay eelingsfay ecessarilynay
attendingay itay, anday occasionallyay omfray omesay eevishpay allusionay ofay erhay othermay.
Asay orfay ethay entlemangay imselfhay, is_hay_ eelingsfay ereway ieflychay expresseday, otnay
byay embarrassmentay oray ejectionday, oray byay ingtryay otay avoiday erhay, utbay byay
iffnessstay ofay annermay anday esentfulray ilencesay. Ehay arcelyscay everay okespay otay
erhay; anday ethay assiduousay attentionsay ichwhay ehay adhay eenbay osay ensiblesay ofay
imselfhay ereway ansferredtray orfay ethay estray ofay ethay ayday otay Issmay Ucaslay, osewhay
ivilitycay inay isteninglay otay imhay asway aay easonablesay eliefray otay emthay allay, anday
especiallyay otay erhay iendfray.

Ethay orrowmay oducedpray onay abatementay ofay mrsay. Ennet’sbay illay umourhay oray illay
ealthhay. mray. Ollinscay asway alsoay inay ethay amesay atestay ofay angryay idepray. Elizabethay
adhay opedhay atthay ishay esentmentray ightmay ortenshay ishay isitvay, utbay ishay anplay idday
otnay appearay inay ethay eastlay affecteday byay itay. Ehay asway alwaysay otay avehay onegay onay
Aturdaysay, anday otay Aturdaysay ehay illstay eantmay otay aystay.

Afteray eakfastbray, ethay irlsgay alkedway otay Erytonmay, otay inquireay ifay mray. Ickhamway
ereway eturnedray, anday otay amentlay overay ishay absenceay omfray ethay Etherfieldnay allbay.
Ehay oinedjay emthay onay eirthay enteringay ethay owntay, anday attendeday emthay otay eirthay
aunt’say, erewhay ishay egretray anday exationvay anday ethay oncerncay ofay everybodyay ereway
ellway alkedtay overay. Otay Elizabethay, oweverhay, ehay oluntarilyvay acknowledgeday
atthay ethay ecessitynay ofay ishay absenceay ad_hay_ eenbay elf-imposedsay.

i“ay oundfay,” aidsay ehay, as“ay ethay imetay ewdray earnay, atthay Iay adhay etterbay otnay eetmay
mray. Arcy;--thatday otay ebay inay ethay amesay oomray, ethay amesay artypay ithway imhay orfay osay
anymay ourshay ogethertay, ightmay ebay oremay anthay Iay ouldcay earbay, anday atthay enesscay
ightmay ariseay unpleasantay otay oremay anthay elfmysay.”

Eshay ighlyhay approveday ishay orbearancefay; anday eythay adhay eisurelay orfay aay ullfay
iscussionday ofay itay, anday orfay allay ethay ommendationscay ichwhay eythay ivillycay
estowedbay onay eachay otheray, asay Ickhamway anday anotheray officeray alkedway ackbay ithway
emthay otay Ongbournlay, anday uringday ethay alkway ehay articularlypay attendeday otay erhay.
Ishay accompanyingay emthay asway aay oubleday advantageay: eshay eltfay allay ethay
omplimentcay itay offereday otay erselfhay; anday itay asway ostmay acceptableay asay anay
occasionay ofay introducingay imhay otay erhay atherfay anday othermay.

iLlustration[ay: aLked“way ackbay ithway emthay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

Oonsay afteray eirthay eturnray, aay etterlay asway eliveredday otay Issmay Ennetbay; itay amecay
omfray Etherfieldnay, anday asway openeday immediatelyay. Ethay envelopeay ontainedcay aay
eetshay ofay elegantay, ittlelay, ot-pressedhay aperpay, ellway overedcay ithway aay ady’slay
airfay, owingflay andhay; anday Elizabethay awsay erhay ister’ssay ountenancecay angechay asay
eshay eadray itay, anday awsay erhay ellingdway intentlyay onay omesay articularpay assagespay.
Anejay ecollectedray erselfhay oonsay; anday uttingpay ethay etterlay awayay, iedtray otay
oinjay, ithway erhay usualay eerfulnesschay, inay ethay eneralgay onversationcay: utbay
Elizabethay eltfay anay anxietyay onay ethay ubjectsay ichwhay ewdray offay erhay attentionay
evenay omfray Ickhamway; anday onay oonersay adhay ehay anday ishay ompanioncay akentay eavelay,
anthay aay anceglay omfray Anejay inviteday erhay otay ollowfay erhay upstairsay. Enwhay eythay
adhay ainedgay eirthay ownay oomray, Anejay, akingtay outay erhay etterlay, aidsay, iS“thay isay
omfray Arolinecay Ingleybay: atwhay itay ontainscay ashay urprisedsay emay aay oodgay ealday.
Ethay olewhay artypay avehay eftlay Etherfieldnay byay isthay imetay, anday areay onay eirthay ayway
otay owntay; anday ithoutway anyay intentionay ofay omingcay ackbay againay. Ouyay allshay earhay
atwhay eshay ayssay.”

Eshay enthay eadray ethay irstfay entencesay alouday, ichwhay omprisedcay ethay informationay
ofay eirthay avinghay ustjay esolvedray otay ollowfay eirthay otherbray otay owntay irectlyday,
anday ofay eirthay eaningmay otay ineday atthay ayday inay Osvenorgray Eetstray, erewhay mray.
Ursthay adhay aay ousehay. Ethay extnay asway inay esethay ords:--“‘iway oday otnay etendpray otay
egretray anythingay Iay allshay eavelay inay Ertfordshirehay exceptay ouryay ocietysay, myay
earestday iendfray; utbay eway illway opehay, atay omesay uturefay eriodpay, otay enjoyay anymay
eturnsray ofay atthay elightfulday intercourseay eway avehay ownknay, anday inay ethay
eanwhilemay aymay essenlay ethay ainpay ofay eparationsay byay aay eryvay equentfray anday ostmay
unreserveday orrespondencecay. Iay ependday onay ouyay orfay atthay.’” Otay esethay
igh-flownhay expressionsay Elizabethay istenedlay ithway allay ethay insensibilityay ofay
istrustday; anday oughthay ethay uddennesssay ofay eirthay emovalray urprisedsay erhay, eshay
awsay othingnay inay itay eallyray otay amentlay: itay asway otnay otay ebay upposedsay atthay eirthay
absenceay omfray Etherfieldnay ouldway eventpray mray. Ingley’sbay eingbay erethay; anday asay
otay ethay osslay ofay eirthay ocietysay, eshay asway ersuadedpay atthay Anejay ustmay oonsay
easecay otay egardray itay inay ethay enjoymentay ofay ishay.

iT“ay isay unluckyay,” aidsay eshay, afteray aay ortshay ausepay, at“thay ouyay ouldshay otnay ebay
ableay otay eesay ouryay iendsfray eforebay eythay eavelay ethay ountrycay. Utbay aymay eway otnay
opehay atthay ethay eriodpay ofay uturefay appinesshay, otay ichwhay Issmay Ingleybay ookslay
orwardfay, aymay arriveay earlieray anthay eshay isay awareay, anday atthay ethay elightfulday
intercourseay ouyay avehay ownknay asay iendsfray illway ebay enewedray ithway etyay eatergray
atisfactionsay asay isterssay? mray. Ingleybay illway otnay ebay etainedday inay Ondonlay byay
emthay.”

aRoline“cay ecidedlyday ayssay atthay onenay ofay ethay artypay illway eturnray intoay
Ertfordshirehay isthay interway. Iay illway eadray itay otay ouyay.

en“‘whay myay otherbray eftlay usay esterdayyay, ehay imagineday atthay ethay usinessbay ichwhay
ooktay imhay otay Ondonlay ightmay ebay oncludedcay inay eethray oray ourfay aysday; utbay asay eway
areay ertaincay itay annotcay ebay osay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay onvincedcay atthay enwhay
Arleschay etsgay otay owntay ehay illway ebay inay onay urryhay otay eavelay itay againay, eway avehay
eterminedday onay ollowingfay imhay itherthay, atthay ehay aymay otnay ebay obligeday otay endspay
ishay acantvay ourshay inay aay omfortlesscay otelhay. Anymay ofay myay acquaintanceay areay
alreadyay erethay orfay ethay interway: Iay ishway Iay ouldcay earhay atthay ouyay, myay earestday
iendfray, adhay anyay intentionay ofay akingmay oneay inay ethay owdcray, utbay ofay atthay Iay
espairday. Iay incerelysay opehay ouryay Istmaschray inay Ertfordshirehay aymay abounday inay
ethay aietiesgay ichwhay atthay easonsay enerallygay ingsbray, anday atthay ouryay eauxbay
illway ebay osay umerousnay asay otay eventpray ouryay eelingfay ethay osslay ofay ethay eethray ofay
omwhay eway allshay epriveday ouyay.’

iT“ay isay evidentay byay isthay,” addeday Anejay, at“thay ehay omescay ackbay onay oremay isthay
interway.”

iT“ay isay onlyay evidentay atthay Issmay Ingleybay oesday otnay eanmay ehay ould_shay_.”

“whyay illway ouyay inkthay osay? Itay ustmay ebay ishay ownay oingday; ehay isay ishay ownay astermay.
Utbay ouyay oday otnay owknay all_ay_. Iay ill_way_ eadray ouyay ethay assagepay ichwhay
articularlypay urtshay emay. Iay illway avehay onay eservesray omfray ou_yay_. ‘mray. Arcyday isay
impatientay otay eesay ishay istersay; anday otay onfesscay ethay uthtray, e_way_ areay arcelyscay
esslay eageray otay eetmay erhay againay. Iay eallyray oday otnay inkthay Eorgianagay Arcyday ashay
erhay equalay orfay eautybay, eleganceay, anday accomplishmentsay; anday ethay affectionay
eshay inspiresay inay Ouisalay anday elfmysay isay eightenedhay intoay omethingsay illstay
oremay interestingay omfray ethay opehay eway areday otay entertainay ofay erhay eingbay
ereafterhay ouray istersay. Iay oday otnay owknay etherwhay Iay everay eforebay entionedmay otay
ouyay myay eelingsfay onay isthay ubjectsay, utbay Iay illway otnay eavelay ethay ountrycay
ithoutway onfidingcay emthay, anday Iay usttray ouyay illway otnay esteemay emthay
unreasonableay. myay otherbray admiresay erhay eatlygray alreadyay; ehay illway avehay
equentfray opportunityay ownay ofay eeingsay erhay onay ethay ostmay intimateay ootingfay; erhay
elationsray allay ishway ethay onnectioncay asay uchmay asay ishay ownay; anday aay ister’ssay
artialitypay isay otnay isleadingmay emay, Iay inkthay, enwhay Iay allcay Arleschay ostmay
apablecay ofay engagingay anyay oman’sway earthay. Ithway allay esethay ircumstancescay otay
avourfay anay attachmentay, anday othingnay otay eventpray itay, amay Iay ongwray, myay earestday
Anejay, inay indulgingay ethay opehay ofay anay eventay ichwhay illway ecuresay ethay appinesshay
ofay osay anymay?’ Atwhay inkthay ouyay ofay is_thay_ entencesay, myay earday Izzylay?” aidsay
Anejay, asay eshay inishedfay itay. iS“ay itay otnay earclay enoughay? Oesday itay otnay expresslyay
eclareday atthay Arolinecay eithernay expectsay ornay ishesway emay otay ebay erhay istersay;
atthay eshay isay erfectlypay onvincedcay ofay erhay other’sbray indifferenceay; anday atthay
