ifay eshay uspectssay ethay aturenay ofay myay eelingsfay orfay imhay eshay eansmay ost(may
indlykay!) otay utpay emay onay myay uardgay. Ancay erethay ebay anyay otheray opinionay onay ethay
ubjectsay?”

eS“yay, erethay ancay; orfay inemay isay otallytay ifferentday. Illway ouyay earhay itay?”

oSt“may illinglyway.”

oU“yay allshay avehay itay inay aay ewfay ordsway. Issmay Ingleybay eessay atthay erhay otherbray isay
inay ovelay ithway ouyay anday antsway imhay otay arrymay Issmay Arcyday. Eshay ollowsfay imhay otay
owntay inay ethay opehay ofay eepingkay imhay erethay, anday iestray otay ersuadepay ouyay atthay ehay
oesday otnay arecay aboutay ouyay.”

Anejay ookshay erhay eadhay.

iNdeed“ay, Anejay, ouyay oughtay otay elievebay emay. Onay oneay owhay ashay everay eensay ouyay
ogethertay ancay oubtday ishay affectionay; Issmay Ingleybay, Iay amay uresay, annotcay: eshay
isay otnay uchsay aay impletonsay. Ouldcay eshay avehay eensay alfhay asay uchmay ovelay inay mray.
Arcyday orfay erselfhay, eshay ouldway avehay ordereday erhay eddingway othesclay. Utbay ethay
asecay isay is:--wethay areay otnay ichray enoughay oray andgray enoughay orfay emthay; anday eshay
isay ethay oremay anxiousay otay etgay Issmay Arcyday orfay erhay otherbray, omfray ethay otionnay
atthay enwhay erethay ashay eenbay one_ay_ inter-marriageay, eshay aymay avehay esslay oubletray
inay achievingay aay econdsay; inay ichwhay erethay isay ertainlycay omesay ingenuityay, anday Iay
areday aysay itay ouldway ucceedsay ifay Issmay eday Ourghbay ereway outay ofay ethay ayway. Utbay, myay
earestday Anejay, ouyay annotcay eriouslysay imagineay atthay, ecausebay Issmay Ingleybay
ellstay ouyay erhay otherbray eatlygray admiresay Issmay Arcyday, ehay isay inay ethay allestsmay
egreeday esslay ensiblesay ofay our_yay_ eritmay anthay enwhay ehay ooktay eavelay ofay ouyay onay
Uesdaytay; oray atthay itay illway ebay inay erhay owerpay otay ersuadepay imhay atthay, insteaday
ofay eingbay inay ovelay ithway ouyay, ehay isay eryvay uchmay inay ovelay ithway erhay iendfray.”

iF“ay eway oughtthay alikeay ofay Issmay Ingleybay,” epliedray Anejay, our“yay
epresentationray ofay allay isthay ightmay akemay emay uiteqay easyay. Utbay Iay owknay ethay
oundationfay isay unjustay. Arolinecay isay incapableay ofay ilfullyway eceivingday
anyoneay; anday allay atthay Iay ancay opehay inay isthay asecay isay, atthay eshay isay eceivedday
erselfhay.”

aT“thay isay ightray. Ouyay ouldcay otnay avehay artedstay aay oremay appyhay ideaay, incesay ouyay
illway otnay aketay omfortcay inay inemay: elievebay erhay otay ebay eceivedday, byay allay eansmay.
Ouyay avehay ownay oneday ouryay utyday byay erhay, anday ustmay etfray onay ongerlay.”

uT“bay, myay earday istersay, ancay Iay ebay appyhay, evenay upposingsay ethay estbay, inay
acceptingay aay anmay osewhay isterssay anday iendsfray areay allay ishingway imhay otay arrymay
elsewhereay?”

oU“yay ustmay ecideday orfay ourselfyay,” aidsay Elizabethay; and“ay ifay, uponay aturemay
eliberationday, ouyay indfay atthay ethay iserymay ofay isobligingday ishay otway isterssay isay
oremay anthay equivalentay otay ethay appinesshay ofay eingbay ishay ifeway, Iay adviseay ouyay,
byay allay eansmay, otay efuseray imhay.”

oW“hay ancay ouyay alktay osay?” aidsay Anejay, aintlyfay ilingsmay; ou“yay ustmay owknay, atthay,
oughthay Iay ouldshay ebay exceedinglyay ievedgray atay eirthay isapprobationday, Iay ouldcay
otnay esitatehay.”

i“ay idday otnay inkthay ouyay ouldway; anday atthay eingbay ethay asecay, Iay annotcay onsidercay
ouryay ituationsay ithway uchmay ompassioncay.”

uT“bay ifay ehay eturnsray onay oremay isthay interway, myay oicechay illway evernay ebay
equiredray. Aay ousandthay ingsthay aymay ariseay inay ixsay onthsmay.”

Ethay ideaay ofay ishay eturningray onay oremay Elizabethay eatedtray ithway ethay utmostay
ontemptcay. Itay appeareday otay erhay erelymay ethay uggestionsay ofay Aroline’scay
interesteday ishesway; anday eshay ouldcay otnay orfay aay omentmay upposesay atthay osethay
ishesway, oweverhay openlyay oray artfullyay okenspay, ouldcay influenceay aay oungyay anmay
osay otallytay independentay ofay everyoneay.

Eshay epresentedray otay erhay istersay, asay orciblyfay asay ossiblepay, atwhay eshay eltfay onay
ethay ubjectsay, anday adhay oonsay ethay easureplay ofay eeingsay itsay appyhay effectay.
Ane’sjay empertay asway otnay espondingday; anday eshay asway aduallygray edlay otay opehay,
oughthay ethay iffidenceday ofay affectionay ometimessay overcameay ethay opehay, atthay
Ingleybay ouldway eturnray otay Etherfieldnay, anday answeray everyay ishway ofay erhay earthay.

Eythay agreeday atthay mrsay. Ennetbay ouldshay onlyay earhay ofay ethay epartureday ofay ethay
amilyfay, ithoutway eingbay alarmeday onay ethay orescay ofay ethay entleman’sgay onductcay;
utbay evenay isthay artialpay ommunicationcay avegay erhay aay eatgray ealday ofay oncerncay,
anday eshay ewailedbay itay asay exceedinglyay unluckyay atthay ethay adieslay ouldshay appenhay
otay ogay awayay ustjay asay eythay ereway allay ettinggay osay intimateay ogethertay. Afteray
amentinglay itay, oweverhay, atay omesay engthlay, eshay adhay ethay onsolationcay ofay
inkingthay atthay mray. Ingleybay ouldway ebay oonsay ownday againay, anday oonsay iningday atay
Ongbournlay; anday ethay onclusioncay ofay allay asway ethay omfortablecay eclarationday,
atthay, oughthay ehay adhay eenbay inviteday onlyay otay aay amilyfay innerday, eshay ouldway aketay
arecay otay avehay otway ullfay oursescay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IIxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay Ennetsbay ereway engageday otay ineday ithway ethay Ucaseslay; anday againay, uringday ethay
iefchay ofay ethay ayday, asway Issmay Ucaslay osay indkay asay otay istenlay otay mray. Ollinscay.
Elizabethay ooktay anay opportunityay ofay ankingthay erhay. iT“ay eepskay imhay inay oodgay
umourhay,” aidsay eshay, and“ay Iay amay oremay obligeday otay ouyay anthay Iay ancay expressay.”

Arlottechay assureday erhay iendfray ofay erhay atisfactionsay inay eingbay usefulay, anday
atthay itay amplyay epaidray erhay orfay ethay ittlelay acrificesay ofay erhay imetay. Isthay asway
eryvay amiableay; utbay Arlotte’schay indnesskay extendeday artherfay anthay Elizabethay
adhay anyay onceptioncay of:--itsay objectay asway othingnay esslay anthay otay ecuresay erhay
omfray anyay eturnray ofay mray. Ollins’scay addressesay, byay engagingay emthay owardstay
erselfhay. Uchsay asway Issmay Ucas’slay emeschay; anday appearancesay ereway osay
avourablefay, atthay enwhay eythay artedpay atay ightnay, eshay ouldway avehay eltfay almostay
uresay ofay uccesssay ifay ehay adhay otnay eenbay otay eavelay Ertfordshirehay osay eryvay oonsay.
Utbay erehay eshay idday injusticeay otay ethay irefay anday independenceay ofay ishay
aracterchay; orfay itay edlay imhay otay escapeay outay ofay Ongbournlay Ousehay ethay extnay
orningmay ithway admirableay essslynay, anday astenhay otay Ucaslay Odgelay otay owthray
imselfhay atay erhay eetfay. Ehay asway anxiousay otay avoiday ethay oticenay ofay ishay ousinscay,
omfray aay onvictioncay atthay, ifay eythay awsay imhay epartday, eythay ouldcay otnay ailfay otay
onjecturecay ishay esignday, anday ehay asway otnay illingway otay avehay ethay attemptay ownknay
illtay itsay uccesssay ouldcay ebay ownknay ikewiselay; orfay, oughthay eelingfay almostay
ecuresay, anday ithway easonray, orfay Arlottechay adhay eenbay olerablytay encouragingay,
ehay asway omparativelycay iffidentday incesay ethay adventureay ofay Ednesdayway. Ishay
eceptionray, oweverhay, asway ofay ethay ostmay atteringflay indkay. Issmay Ucaslay
erceivedpay imhay omfray anay upperay indowway asay ehay alkedway owardstay ethay ousehay, anday
instantlyay etsay outay otay eetmay imhay accidentallyay inay ethay anelay. Utbay ittlelay adhay
eshay aredday otay opehay atthay osay uchmay ovelay anday eloquenceay awaiteday erhay erethay.

Inay asay ortshay aay imetay asay mray. Ollins’scay onglay eechesspay ouldway alloway,
everythingay asway ettledsay etweenbay emthay otay ethay atisfactionsay ofay othbay; anday asay
eythay entereday ethay ousehay, ehay earnestlyay entreateday erhay otay amenay ethay ayday atthay
asway otay akemay imhay ethay appiesthay ofay enmay; anday oughthay uchsay aay olicitationsay ustmay
ebay aivedway orfay ethay esentpray, ethay adylay eltfay onay inclinationay otay ifletray ithway
ishay appinesshay. Ethay upiditystay ithway ichwhay ehay asway avouredfay byay aturenay ustmay
uardgay ishay ourtshipcay omfray anyay armchay atthay ouldcay akemay aay omanway ishway orfay itsay
ontinuancecay; anday Issmay Ucaslay, owhay accepteday imhay olelysay omfray ethay urepay anday
isinterestedday esireday ofay anay establishmentay, aredcay otnay owhay oonsay atthay
establishmentay ereway ainedgay.

Irsay Illiamway anday Adylay Ucaslay ereway eedilyspay applieday otay orfay eirthay onsentcay;
anday itay asway estowedbay ithway aay ostmay oyfuljay alacrityay. mray. Ollins’scay esentpray
ircumstancescay ademay itay aay ostmay eligibleay atchmay orfay eirthay aughterday, otay omwhay
eythay ouldcay ivegay ittlelay ortunefay; anday ishay ospectspray ofay uturefay ealthway ereway
exceedinglyay airfay. Adylay Ucaslay eganbay irectlyday otay alculatecay, ithway oremay
interestay anthay ethay attermay adhay everay

iLlustration[ay:

o“say uchmay ovelay anday eloquenceay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

exciteday eforebay, owhay anymay earsyay ongerlay mray. Ennetbay asway ikelylay otay ivelay; anday
Irsay Illiamway avegay itay asay ishay ecidedday opinionay, atthay eneverwhay mray. Ollinscay
ouldshay ebay inay ossessionpay ofay ethay Ongbournlay estateay, itay ouldway ebay ighlyhay
expedientay atthay othbay ehay anday ishay ifeway ouldshay akemay eirthay appearanceay atay stay.
Ames’sjay. Ethay olewhay amilyfay inay ortshay ereway operlypray overjoyeday onay ethay
occasionay. Ethay oungeryay irlsgay ormedfay opeshay ofay oming_cay outay_ aay earyay oray otway
oonersay anthay eythay ightmay otherwiseay avehay oneday; anday ethay oysbay ereway elievedray
omfray eirthay apprehensionay ofay Arlotte’schay ingdyay anay olday aidmay. Arlottechay
erselfhay asway olerablytay omposedcay. Eshay adhay ainedgay erhay ointpay, anday adhay imetay
otay onsidercay ofay itay. Erhay eflectionsray ereway inay eneralgay atisfactorysay. mray.
Ollinscay, otay ebay uresay, asway eithernay ensiblesay ornay agreeableay: ishay ocietysay asway
irksomeay, anday ishay attachmentay otay erhay ustmay ebay imaginaryay. Utbay illstay ehay ouldway
ebay erhay usbandhay. Ithoutway inkingthay ighlyhay eitheray ofay enmay oray ofay atrimonymay,
arriagemay adhay alwaysay eenbay erhay objectay: itay asway ethay onlyay onourablehay
ovisionpray orfay ell-educatedway oungyay omenway ofay allsmay ortunefay, anday, oweverhay
uncertainay ofay ivinggay appinesshay, ustmay ebay eirthay easantestplay eservativepray
omfray antway. Isthay eservativepray eshay adhay ownay obtaineday; anday atay ethay ageay ofay
enty-seventway, ithoutway avinghay everay eenbay andsomehay, eshay eltfay allay ethay oodgay
ucklay ofay itay. Ethay eastlay agreeableay ircumstancecay inay ethay usinessbay asway ethay
urprisesay itay ustmay occasionay otay Elizabethay Ennetbay, osewhay iendshipfray eshay
aluedvay eyondbay atthay ofay anyay otheray ersonpay. Elizabethay ouldway onderway, anday
obablypray ouldway ameblay erhay; anday oughthay erhay esolutionray asway otnay otay ebay
akenshay, erhay eelingsfay ustmay ebay urthay byay uchsay aay isapprobationday. Eshay esolvedray
otay ivegay erhay ethay informationay erselfhay; anday ereforethay argedchay mray. Ollinscay,
enwhay ehay eturnedray otay Ongbournlay otay innerday, otay opdray onay inthay ofay atwhay adhay
assedpay eforebay anyay ofay ethay amilyfay. Aay omisepray ofay ecrecysay asway ofay oursecay eryvay
utifullyday ivengay, utbay itay ouldcay otnay ebay eptkay ithoutway ifficultyday; orfay ethay
uriositycay exciteday byay ishay onglay absenceay urstbay orthfay inay uchsay eryvay irectday
uestionsqay onay ishay eturnray, asay equiredray omesay ingenuityay otay evadeay, anday ehay asway
atay ethay amesay imetay exercisingay eatgray elf-denialsay, orfay ehay asway onginglay otay
ublishpay ishay osperouspray ovelay.

Asay ehay asway otay eginbay ishay ourneyjay ootay earlyay onay ethay orrowmay otay eesay anyay ofay
ethay amilyfay, ethay eremonycay ofay eave-takinglay asway erformedpay enwhay ethay adieslay
ovedmay orfay ethay ightnay; anday mrsay. Ennetbay, ithway eatgray olitenesspay anday
ordialitycay, aidsay owhay appyhay eythay ouldshay ebay otay eesay imhay atay Ongbournlay againay,
eneverwhay ishay otheray engagementsay ightmay alloway imhay otay isitvay emthay.

“myay earday adammay,” ehay epliedray, is“thay invitationay isay articularlypay
atifyinggray, ecausebay itay isay atwhay Iay avehay eenbay opinghay otay eceiveray; anday ouyay
aymay ebay eryvay ertaincay atthay Iay allshay availay elfmysay ofay itay asay oonsay asay
ossiblepay.”

Eythay ereway allay astonisheday; anday mray. Ennetbay, owhay ouldcay byay onay eansmay ishway orfay
osay eedyspay aay eturnray, immediatelyay aidsay,--

uT“bay isay erethay otnay angerday ofay Adylay Atherine’scay isapprobationday erehay, myay
oodgay irsay? Ouyay adhay etterbay eglectnay ouryay elationsray anthay unray ethay iskray ofay
offendingay ouryay atronesspay.”

“myay earday irsay,” epliedray mray. Ollinscay, i“ay amay articularlypay obligeday otay ouyay
orfay isthay iendlyfray autioncay, anday ouyay aymay ependday uponay myay otnay akingtay osay
aterialmay aay epstay ithoutway erhay Adyship’slay oncurrencecay.”

oU“yay annotcay ebay ootay uchmay onay ouryay uardgay. Iskray anythingay atherray anthay erhay
ispleasureday; anday ifay ouyay indfay itay ikelylay otay ebay aisedray byay ouryay omingcay otay usay
againay, ichwhay Iay ouldshay inkthay exceedinglyay obablepray, aystay uietlyqay atay omehay,
anday ebay atisfiedsay atthay e_way_ allshay aketay onay offenceay.”

eLieve“bay emay, myay earday irsay, myay atitudegray isay armlyway exciteday byay uchsay
affectionateay attentionay; anday, ependday uponay itay, ouyay illway eedilyspay eceiveray
omfray emay aay etterlay ofay anksthay orfay isthay asay ellway asay orfay everyay otheray arkmay ofay
ouryay egardray uringday myay aystay inay Ertfordshirehay. Asay orfay myay airfay ousinscay,
oughthay myay absenceay aymay otnay ebay onglay enoughay otay enderray itay ecessarynay, Iay allshay
ownay aketay ethay ibertylay ofay ishingway emthay ealthhay anday appinesshay, otnay exceptingay
myay ousincay Elizabethay.”

Ithway operpray ivilitiescay, ethay adieslay enthay ithdrewway; allay ofay emthay equallyay
urprisedsay otay indfay atthay ehay editatedmay aay uickqay eturnray. mrsay. Ennetbay ishedway
otay understanday byay itay atthay ehay oughtthay ofay ayingpay ishay addressesay otay oneay ofay
erhay oungeryay irlsgay, anday Arymay ightmay avehay eenbay evailedpray onay otay acceptay imhay.
Eshay atedray ishay abilitiesay uchmay igherhay anthay anyay ofay ethay othersay: erethay asway aay
oliditysay inay ishay eflectionsray ichwhay oftenay uckstray erhay; anday oughthay byay onay
eansmay osay everclay asay erselfhay, eshay oughtthay atthay, ifay encourageday otay eadray anday
improveay imselfhay byay uchsay anay exampleay asay ershay, ehay ightmay ecomebay aay eryvay
agreeableay ompanioncay. Utbay onay ethay ollowingfay orningmay everyay opehay ofay isthay
indkay asway oneday awayay. Issmay Ucaslay alledcay oonsay afteray eakfastbray, anday inay aay
ivatepray onferencecay ithway Elizabethay elatedray ethay eventay ofay ethay ayday eforebay.

Ethay ossibilitypay ofay mray. Ollins’scay ancyingfay imselfhay inay ovelay ithway erhay
iendfray adhay onceay occurreday otay Elizabethay ithinway ethay astlay ayday oray otway: utbay
atthay Arlottechay ouldcay encourageay imhay eemedsay almostay asay arfay omfray ossibilitypay
asay atthay eshay ouldcay encourageay imhay erselfhay; anday erhay astonishmentay asway
onsequentlycay osay eatgray asay otay overcomeay atay irstfay ethay oundsbay ofay ecorumday, anday
eshay ouldcay otnay elphay ingcryay outay,--

eNgaged“ay otay mray. Ollinscay! myay earday Arlottechay, impossibleay!”

Ethay eadystay ountenancecay ichwhay Issmay Ucaslay adhay ommandedcay inay ellingtay erhay
orystay avegay ayway otay aay omentarymay onfusioncay erehay onay eceivingray osay irectday aay
eproachray; oughthay, asay itay asway onay oremay anthay eshay expecteday, eshay oonsay egainedray
erhay omposurecay, anday almlycay epliedray,--

“whyay ouldshay ouyay ebay urprisedsay, myay earday Elizaay? Oday ouyay inkthay itay incredibleay
atthay mray. Ollinscay ouldshay ebay ableay otay ocurepray anyay oman’sway oodgay opinionay,
ecausebay ehay asway otnay osay appyhay asay otay ucceedsay ithway ouyay?”

Utbay Elizabethay adhay ownay ecollectedray erselfhay; anday, akingmay aay ongstray effortay
orfay itay, asway ableay otay assureay erhay, ithway olerabletay irmnessfay, atthay ethay
ospectpray ofay eirthay elationshipray asway ighlyhay atefulgray otay erhay, anday atthay eshay
ishedway erhay allay imaginableay appinesshay.

i“ay eesay atwhay ouyay areay eelingfay,” epliedray Arlottechay; ou“yay ustmay ebay urprisedsay,
eryvay uchmay urprisedsay, osay atelylay asay mray. Ollinscay asway ishingway otay arrymay ouyay.
Utbay enwhay ouyay avehay adhay imetay otay inkthay itay allay overay, Iay opehay ouyay illway ebay
atisfiedsay ithway atwhay Iay avehay oneday. Iay amay otnay omanticray, ouyay owknay. Iay evernay
asway. Iay askay onlyay aay omfortablecay omehay; anday, onsideringcay mray. Ollins’scay
aracterchay, onnectionscay, anday ituationsay inay ifelay, Iay amay onvincedcay atthay myay
ancechay ofay appinesshay ithway imhay isay asay airfay asay ostmay eoplepay ancay oastbay onay
enteringay ethay arriagemay atestay.”

Elizabethay uietlyqay answereday undoubtedly“ay;” anday, afteray anay awkwarday ausepay,
eythay eturnedray otay ethay estray ofay ethay amilyfay. Arlottechay idday otnay aystay uchmay
ongerlay; anday Elizabethay asway enthay eftlay otay eflectray onay atwhay eshay adhay eardhay. Itay
asway aay onglay imetay eforebay eshay ecamebay atay allay econciledray otay ethay ideaay ofay osay
unsuitableay aay atchmay. Ethay angenessstray ofay mray. Ollins’scay akingmay otway offersay
ofay arriagemay ithinway eethray aysday asway othingnay inay omparisoncay ofay ishay eingbay ownay
accepteday. Eshay adhay alwaysay eltfay atthay Arlotte’schay opinionay ofay atrimonymay asway
otnay exactlyay ikelay erhay ownay; utbay eshay ouldcay otnay avehay upposedsay itay ossiblepay
atthay, enwhay alledcay intoay actionay, eshay ouldway avehay acrificedsay everyay etterbay
eelingfay otay orldlyway advantageay. Arlottechay, ethay ifeway ofay mray. Ollinscay, asway aay
ostmay umiliatinghay icturepay! Anday otay ethay angpay ofay aay iendfray isgracingday
erselfhay, anday unksay inay erhay esteemay, asway addeday ethay istressingday onvictioncay
atthay itay asway impossibleay orfay atthay iendfray otay ebay olerablytay appyhay inay ethay otlay
eshay adhay osenchay.




iLlustration[ay:

oTested“pray ehay ustmay ebay entirelyay istakenmay.”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IIIxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay asway ittingsay ithway erhay othermay anday isterssay, eflectingray onay atwhay
eshay adhay eardhay, anday oubtingday etherwhay eshay asway authorizeday otay entionmay itay,
enwhay Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay imselfhay appeareday, entsay byay ishay aughterday otay
announceay erhay engagementay otay ethay amilyfay. Ithway anymay omplimentscay otay emthay,
anday uchmay elf-gratulationsay onay ethay ospectpray ofay aay onnectioncay etweenbay ethay
ouseshay, ehay unfoldeday ethay atter,--tomay anay audienceay otnay erelymay onderingway,
utbay incredulousay; orfay mrsay. Ennetbay, ithway oremay erseverancepay anthay
olitenesspay, otestedpray ehay ustmay ebay entirelyay istakenmay; anday Ialyday, alwaysay
unguardeday anday oftenay uncivilay, oisterouslybay exclaimeday,--

oOd“gay Ordlay! Irsay Illiamway, owhay ancay ouyay elltay uchsay aay orystay? Oday otnay ouyay owknay
atthay mray. Ollinscay antsway otay arrymay Izzylay?”

Othingnay esslay anthay ethay omplaisancecay ofay aay ourtiercay ouldcay avehay ornebay
ithoutway angeray uchsay eatmenttray: utbay Irsay Illiam’sway ood-breedinggay arriedcay
imhay oughthray itay allay; anday oughthay ehay eggedbay eavelay otay ebay ositivepay asay otay ethay
uthtray ofay ishay informationay, ehay istenedlay otay allay eirthay impertinenceay ithway ethay
ostmay orbearingfay ourtesycay.

Elizabethay, eelingfay itay incumbentay onay erhay otay elieveray imhay omfray osay unpleasantay
aay ituationsay, ownay utpay erselfhay orwardfay otay onfirmcay ishay accountay, byay
entioningmay erhay iorpray owledgeknay ofay itay omfray Arlottechay erselfhay; anday
endeavoureday otay utpay aay opstay otay ethay exclamationsay ofay erhay othermay anday isterssay,
byay ethay earnestnessay ofay erhay ongratulationscay otay Irsay Illiamway, inay ichwhay eshay
asway eadilyray oinedjay byay Anejay, anday byay akingmay aay arietyvay ofay emarksray onay ethay
appinesshay atthay ightmay ebay expecteday omfray ethay atchmay, ethay excellentay aracterchay
ofay mray. Ollinscay, anday ethay onvenientcay istanceday ofay Unsfordhay omfray Ondonlay.

mrsay. Ennetbay asway, inay actfay, ootay uchmay overpowereday otay aysay aay eatgray ealday ilewhay
Irsay Illiamway emainedray; utbay onay oonersay adhay ehay eftlay emthay anthay erhay eelingsfay
oundfay aay apidray entvay. Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, eshay ersistedpay inay isbelievingday
ethay olewhay ofay ethay attermay; econdlysay, eshay asway eryvay uresay atthay mray. Ollinscay
adhay eenbay akentay inay; irdlythay, eshay ustedtray atthay eythay ouldway evernay ebay appyhay
ogethertay; anday, ourthlyfay, atthay ethay atchmay ightmay ebay okenbray offay. Otway
inferencesay, oweverhay, ereway ainlyplay educedday omfray ethay olewhay: oneay, atthay
Elizabethay asway ethay ealray ausecay ofay allay ethay ischiefmay; anday ethay otheray, atthay
eshay erselfhay adhay eenbay arbarouslybay useday byay emthay allay; anday onay esethay otway
ointspay eshay incipallypray eltdway uringday ethay estray ofay ethay ayday. Othingnay ouldcay
onsolecay anday othingnay appeaseay erhay. Ornay idday atthay ayday earway outay erhay
esentmentray. Aay eekway elapseday eforebay eshay ouldcay eesay Elizabethay ithoutway
oldingscay erhay: aay onthmay assedpay awayay eforebay eshay ouldcay eakspay otay Irsay Illiamway
oray Adylay Ucaslay ithoutway eingbay uderay; anday anymay onthsmay ereway onegay eforebay eshay
ouldcay atay allay orgivefay eirthay aughterday.

mray. Ennet’sbay emotionsay ereway uchmay oremay anquiltray onay ethay occasionay, anday uchsay
asay ehay idday experienceay ehay onouncedpray otay ebay ofay aay ostmay agreeableay ortsay; orfay
itay atifiedgray imhay, ehay aidsay, otay iscoverday atthay Arlottechay Ucaslay, omwhay ehay adhay
eenbay useday otay inkthay olerablytay ensiblesay, asway asay oolishfay asay ishay ifeway, anday
oremay oolishfay anthay ishay aughterday!

Anejay onfessedcay erselfhay aay ittlelay urprisedsay atay ethay atchmay: utbay eshay aidsay
esslay ofay erhay astonishmentay anthay ofay erhay earnestay esireday orfay eirthay appinesshay;
ornay ouldcay Elizabethay ersuadepay erhay otay onsidercay itay asay improbableay. Ittykay anday
Ialyday ereway arfay omfray envyingay Issmay Ucaslay, orfay mray. Ollinscay asway onlyay aay
ergymanclay; anday itay affecteday emthay inay onay otheray ayway anthay asay aay iecepay ofay ewsnay
otay eadspray atay Erytonmay.

Adylay Ucaslay ouldcay otnay ebay insensibleay ofay iumphtray onay eingbay ableay otay etortray onay
mrsay. Ennetbay ethay omfortcay ofay avinghay aay aughterday ellway arriedmay; anday eshay
alledcay atay Ongbournlay atherray ofteneray anthay usualay otay aysay owhay appyhay eshay asway,
oughthay mrsay. Ennet’sbay oursay ookslay anday ill-natureday emarksray ightmay avehay eenbay
enoughay otay ivedray appinesshay awayay.

Etweenbay Elizabethay anday Arlottechay erethay asway aay estraintray ichwhay eptkay emthay
utuallymay ilentsay onay ethay ubjectsay; anday Elizabethay eltfay ersuadedpay atthay onay
ealray onfidencecay ouldcay everay ubsistsay etweenbay emthay againay. Erhay
isappointmentday inay Arlottechay ademay erhay urntay ithway onderfay egardray otay erhay
istersay, ofay osewhay ectituderay anday elicacyday eshay asway uresay erhay opinionay ouldcay
evernay ebay akenshay, anday orfay osewhay appinesshay eshay ewgray ailyday oremay anxiousay, asay
Ingleybay adhay ownay eenbay onegay aay eekway, anday othingnay asway eardhay ofay ishay eturnray.

Anejay adhay entsay Arolinecay anay earlyay answeray otay erhay etterlay, anday asway ountingcay
ethay aysday illtay eshay ightmay easonablyray opehay otay earhay againay. Ethay omisedpray
etterlay ofay anksthay omfray mray. Ollinscay arriveday onay Uesdaytay, addresseday otay eirthay
atherfay, anday ittenwray ithway allay ethay olemnitysay ofay atitudegray ichwhay aay
elve-month’stway abodeay inay ethay amilyfay ightmay avehay omptedpray. Afteray
ischargingday ishay onsciencecay onay atthay eadhay, ehay oceededpray otay informay emthay,
ithway anymay apturousray expressionsay, ofay ishay appinesshay inay avinghay obtaineday ethay
affectionay ofay eirthay amiableay eighbournay, Issmay Ucaslay, anday enthay explaineday
atthay itay asway erelymay ithway ethay iewvay ofay enjoyingay erhay ocietysay atthay ehay adhay
eenbay osay eadyray otay oseclay ithway eirthay indkay ishway ofay eeingsay imhay againay atay
Ongbournlay, itherwhay ehay opedhay otay ebay ableay otay eturnray onay Ondaymay ortnightfay;
orfay Adylay Atherinecay, ehay addeday, osay eartilyhay approveday ishay arriagemay, atthay
eshay ishedway itay otay aketay aceplay asay oonsay asay ossiblepay, ichwhay ehay ustedtray ouldway
ebay anay unanswerableay argumentay ithway ishay amiableay Arlottechay otay amenay anay earlyay
ayday orfay akingmay imhay ethay appiesthay ofay enmay.

mray. Ollins’scay eturnray intoay Ertfordshirehay asway onay ongerlay aay attermay ofay
easureplay otay mrsay. Ennetbay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, eshay asway asay uchmay isposedday otay
omplaincay ofay itay asay erhay usbandhay. Itay asway eryvay angestray atthay ehay ouldshay omecay
otay Ongbournlay insteaday ofay otay Ucaslay Odgelay; itay asway alsoay eryvay inconvenientay
anday exceedinglyay oublesometray. Eshay atedhay avinghay isitorsvay inay ethay ousehay
ilewhay erhay ealthhay asway osay indifferentay, anday overslay ereway ofay allay eoplepay ethay
ostmay isagreeableday. Uchsay ereway ethay entlegay urmursmay ofay mrsay. Ennetbay, anday eythay
avegay ayway onlyay otay ethay eatergray istressday ofay mray. Ingley’sbay ontinuedcay
absenceay.

Eithernay Anejay ornay Elizabethay ereway omfortablecay onay isthay ubjectsay. Ayday afteray
ayday assedpay awayay ithoutway ingingbray anyay otheray idingstay ofay imhay anthay ethay
eportray ichwhay ortlyshay evailedpray inay Erytonmay ofay ishay omingcay onay oremay otay
Etherfieldnay ethay olewhay interway; aay eportray ichwhay ighlyhay incenseday mrsay.
Ennetbay, anday ichwhay eshay evernay ailedfay otay ontradictcay asay aay ostmay andalousscay
alsehoodfay.

Evenay Elizabethay eganbay otay ear--notfay atthay Ingleybay asway indifferent--butay atthay
ishay isterssay ouldway ebay uccessfulsay inay eepingkay imhay awayay. Unwillingay asay eshay
asway otay admitay anay ideaay osay estructiveday otay Ane’sjay appinesshay, anday osay
ishonourableday otay ethay abilitystay ofay erhay overlay, eshay ouldcay otnay eventpray itsay
equentlyfray ecurringray. Ethay uniteday effortsay ofay ishay otway unfeelingay isterssay,
anday ofay ishay overpoweringay iendfray, assisteday byay ethay attractionsay ofay Issmay
Arcyday anday ethay amusementsay ofay Ondonlay, ightmay ebay ootay uchmay, eshay earedfay, orfay
ethay engthstray ofay ishay attachmentay.

Asay orfay Anejay, er_hay_ anxietyay underay isthay uspensesay asway, ofay oursecay, oremay
ainfulpay anthay Elizabeth’say: utbay ateverwhay eshay eltfay eshay asway esirousday ofay
oncealingcay; anday etweenbay erselfhay anday Elizabethay, ereforethay, ethay ubjectsay
asway evernay alludeday otay. Utbay asay onay uchsay elicacyday estrainedray erhay othermay, anay
ourhay eldomsay assedpay inay ichwhay eshay idday otnay alktay ofay Ingleybay, expressay erhay
impatienceay orfay ishay arrivalay, oray evenay equireray Anejay otay onfesscay atthay ifay ehay
idday otnay omecay ackbay eshay ouldshay inkthay erselfhay eryvay ill-useday. Itay eedednay allay
Ane’sjay eadystay ildnessmay otay earbay esethay attacksay ithway olerabletay
anquillitytray.

mray. Ollinscay eturnedray ostmay unctuallypay onay ethay Ondaymay ortnightfay, utbay ishay
eceptionray atay Ongbournlay asway otnay uiteqay osay aciousgray asay itay adhay eenbay onay ishay
irstfay introductionay. Ehay asway ootay appyhay, oweverhay, otay eednay uchmay attentionay;
anday, uckilylay orfay ethay othersay, ethay usinessbay ofay ove-makinglay elievedray emthay
omfray aay eatgray ealday ofay ishay ompanycay. Ethay iefchay ofay everyay ayday asway entspay byay
imhay atay Ucaslay Odgelay, anday ehay ometimessay eturnedray otay Ongbournlay onlyay inay imetay
otay akemay anay apologyay orfay ishay absenceay eforebay ethay amilyfay entway otay edbay.

iLlustration[ay:

enEver“_whay eshay okespay inay aay owlay oicevay_”
ay]

mrsay. Ennetbay asway eallyray inay aay ostmay itiablepay atestay. Ethay eryvay entionmay ofay
anythingay oncerningcay ethay atchmay ewthray erhay intoay anay agonyay ofay ill-humouray, anday
ereverwhay eshay entway eshay asway uresay ofay earinghay itay alkedtay ofay. Ethay ightsay ofay
Issmay Ucaslay asway odiousay otay erhay. Asay erhay uccessorsay inay atthay ousehay, eshay
egardedray erhay ithway ealousjay abhorrenceay. Eneverwhay Arlottechay amecay otay eesay
emthay, eshay oncludedcay erhay otay ebay anticipatingay ethay ourhay ofay ossessionpay; anday
eneverwhay eshay okespay inay aay owlay oicevay otay mray. Ollinscay, asway onvincedcay atthay
eythay ereway alkingtay ofay ethay Ongbournlay estateay, anday esolvingray otay urntay erselfhay
anday erhay aughtersday outay ofay ethay ousehay asay oonsay asay mray. Ennetbay asway eadday. Eshay
omplainedcay itterlybay ofay allay isthay otay erhay usbandhay.

iNdeed“ay, mray. Ennetbay,” aidsay eshay, it“ay isay eryvay ardhay otay inkthay atthay Arlottechay
Ucaslay ouldshay everay ebay istressmay ofay isthay ousehay, atthay i_ay_ ouldshay ebay orcedfay
otay akemay ayway orfay er_hay_, anday ivelay otay eesay erhay aketay myay aceplay inay itay!”

“myay earday, oday otnay ivegay ayway otay uchsay oomyglay oughtsthay. Etlay usay opehay orfay
etterbay ingsthay. Etlay usay atterflay ourselvesay atthay i_ay_ aymay ebay ethay urvivorsay.”

Isthay asway otnay eryvay onsolingcay otay mrsay. Ennetbay; anday, ereforethay, insteaday ofay
akingmay anyay answeray, eshay entway onay asay eforebay.

i“ay annotcay earbay otay inkthay atthay eythay ouldshay avehay allay isthay estateay. Ifay itay asway
otnay orfay ethay entailay, Iay ouldshay otnay indmay itay.”

aT“whay ouldshay otnay ouyay indmay?”

i“ay ouldshay otnay indmay anythingay atay allay.”

eT“lay usay ebay ankfulthay atthay ouyay areay eservedpray omfray aay atestay ofay uchsay
insensibilityay.”

i“ay evernay ancay ebay ankfulthay, mray. Ennetbay, orfay anythingay aboutay ethay entailay. Owhay
anyoneay ouldcay avehay ethay onsciencecay otay entailay awayay anay estateay omfray one’say ownay
aughtersday Iay annotcay understanday; anday allay orfay ethay akesay ofay mray. Ollinscay, ootay!
whyay ouldshay e_hay_ avehay itay oremay anthay anybodyay elseay?”

i“ay eavelay itay otay ourselfyay otay etermineday,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IVxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Issmay Ingley’sbay etterlay arriveday, anday utpay anay enday otay oubtday. Ethay eryvay irstfay
entencesay onveyedcay ethay assuranceay ofay eirthay eingbay allay ettledsay inay Ondonlay orfay
ethay interway, anday oncludedcay ithway erhay other’sbray egretray atay otnay avinghay adhay
imetay otay aypay ishay espectsray otay ishay iendsfray inay Ertfordshirehay eforebay ehay eftlay
ethay ountrycay.

Opehay asway overay, entirelyay overay; anday enwhay Anejay ouldcay attenday otay ethay estray ofay
ethay etterlay, eshay oundfay ittlelay, exceptay ethay ofessedpray affectionay ofay ethay
iterwray, atthay ouldcay ivegay erhay anyay omfortcay. Issmay Arcy’sday aisepray occupieday
ethay iefchay ofay itay. Erhay anymay attractionsay ereway againay eltdway onay; anday Arolinecay
oastedbay oyfullyjay ofay eirthay increasingay intimacyay, anday enturedvay otay edictpray
ethay accomplishmentay ofay ethay ishesway ichwhay adhay eenbay unfoldeday inay erhay ormerfay
etterlay. Eshay otewray alsoay ithway eatgray easureplay ofay erhay other’sbray eingbay anay
inmateay ofay mray. Arcy’sday ousehay, anday entionedmay ithway apturesray omesay ansplay ofay
ethay atterlay ithway egardray otay ewnay urniturefay.

Elizabethay, otay omwhay Anejay eryvay oonsay ommunicatedcay ethay iefchay ofay allay isthay,
eardhay itay inay ilentsay indignationay. Erhay earthay asway ividedday etweenbay oncerncay
orfay erhay istersay anday esentmentray againstay allay othersay. Otay Aroline’scay
assertionay ofay erhay other’sbray eingbay artialpay otay Issmay Arcyday, eshay aidpay onay
editcray. Atthay ehay asway eallyray ondfay ofay Anejay, eshay oubtedday onay oremay anthay eshay
adhay everay oneday; anday uchmay asay eshay adhay alwaysay eenbay isposedday otay ikelay imhay, eshay
ouldcay otnay inkthay ithoutway angeray, ardlyhay ithoutway ontemptcay, onay atthay easinessay
ofay empertay, atthay antway ofay operpray esolutionray, ichwhay ownay ademay imhay ethay aveslay
ofay ishay esigningday iendsfray, anday edlay imhay otay acrificesay ishay ownay appinesshay otay
ethay apricecay ofay eirthay inclinationsay. Adhay ishay ownay appinesshay, oweverhay, eenbay
ethay onlyay acrificesay, ehay ightmay avehay eenbay alloweday otay ortspay ithway itay inay
ateverwhay annermay ehay oughtthay estbay; utbay erhay ister’ssay asway involveday inay itay, asay
eshay oughtthay ehay ustmay ebay ensiblesay imselfhay. Itay asway aay ubjectsay, inay ortshay, onay
ichwhay eflectionray ouldway ebay onglay indulgeday, anday ustmay ebay unavailingay. Eshay
ouldcay inkthay ofay othingnay elseay; anday etyay, etherwhay Ingley’sbay egardray adhay
eallyray iedday awayay, oray ereway uppressedsay byay ishay iendsfray’ interferenceay;
etherwhay ehay adhay eenbay awareay ofay Ane’sjay attachmentay, oray etherwhay itay adhay
escapeday ishay observationay; icheverwhay ereway ethay asecay, oughthay erhay opinionay ofay
imhay ustmay ebay ateriallymay affecteday byay ethay ifferenceday, erhay ister’ssay
ituationsay emainedray ethay amesay, erhay eacepay equallyay oundedway.

Aay ayday oray otway assedpay eforebay Anejay adhay ouragecay otay eakspay ofay erhay eelingsfay otay
Elizabethay; utbay atay astlay, onay mrsay. Ennet’sbay eavinglay emthay ogethertay, afteray aay
ongerlay irritationay anthay usualay aboutay Etherfieldnay anday itsay astermay, eshay ouldcay
otnay elphay ayingsay,--

o“ay atthay myay earday othermay adhay oremay ommandcay overay erselfhay! eshay ancay avehay onay
ideaay ofay ethay ainpay eshay ivesgay emay byay erhay ontinualcay eflectionsray onay imhay. Utbay Iay
illway otnay epineray. Itay annotcay astlay onglay. Ehay illway ebay orgotfay, anday eway allshay
allay ebay asay eway ereway eforebay.”

Elizabethay ookedlay atay erhay istersay ithway incredulousay olicitudesay, utbay aidsay
othingnay.

oU“yay oubtday emay,” iedcray Anejay, ightlyslay olouringcay; indeed“ay, ouyay avehay onay
easonray. Ehay aymay ivelay inay myay emorymay asay ethay ostmay amiableay anmay ofay myay
acquaintanceay utbay atthay isay allay. Iay avehay othingnay eitheray otay opehay oray earfay, anday
othingnay otay eproachray imhay ithway. Ankthay Odgay Iay avehay otnay at_thay_ ainpay. Aay ittlelay
imetay, erefore--ithay allshay ertainlycay tryay otay etgay ethay etterbay----”

Ithway aay ongerstray oicevay eshay oonsay addeday, i“ay avehay isthay omfortcay immediatelyay,
atthay itay ashay otnay eenbay oremay anthay anay erroray ofay ancyfay onay myay idesay, anday atthay itay
ashay oneday onay armhay otay anyoneay utbay elfmysay.”

“myay earday Anejay,” exclaimeday Elizabethay, ou“yay areay ootay oodgay. Ouryay eetnesssway
anday isinterestednessday areay eallyray angelicay; Iay oday otnay owknay atwhay otay aysay otay
ouyay. Iay eelfay asay ifay Iay adhay evernay oneday ouyay usticejay, oray ovedlay ouyay asay ouyay
eserveday.”

Issmay Ennetbay eagerlyay isclaimedday allay extraordinaryay eritmay, anday ewthray ackbay
ethay aisepray onay erhay ister’ssay armway affectionay.

aY“nay,” aidsay Elizabethay, is“thay isay otnay airfay. oU_yay_ ishway otay inkthay allay ethay
orldway espectableray, anday areay urthay ifay Iay eakspay illay ofay anybodyay. i_ay_ onlyay antway
otay inkthay ou_yay_ erfectpay, anday ouyay etsay ourselfyay againstay itay. Oday otnay ebay
afraiday ofay myay unningray intoay anyay excessay, ofay myay encroachingay onay ouryay
ivilegepray ofay universalay ood-willgay. Ouyay eednay otnay. Erethay areay ewfay eoplepay
omwhay Iay eallyray ovelay, anday illstay ewerfay ofay omwhay Iay inkthay ellway. Ethay oremay Iay eesay
ofay ethay orldway ethay oremay amay Iay issatisfiedday ithway itay; anday everyay ayday onfirmscay
myay eliefbay ofay ethay inconsistencyay ofay allay umanhay aracterschay, anday ofay ethay
ittlelay ependenceday atthay ancay ebay acedplay onay ethay appearanceay ofay eitheray eritmay
oray ensesay. Iay avehay etmay ithway otway instancesay atelylay: oneay Iay illway otnay entionmay,
ethay otheray isay Arlotte’schay arriagemay. Itay isay unaccountableay! inay everyay iewvay itay
isay unaccountableay!”

“myay earday Izzylay, oday otnay ivegay ayway otay uchsay eelingsfay asay esethay. Eythay illway
uinray ouryay appinesshay. Ouyay oday otnay akemay allowanceay enoughay orfay ifferenceday ofay
ituationsay anday empertay. Onsidercay mray. Ollins’scay espectabilityray, anday
Arlotte’schay udentpray, eadystay aracterchay. Ememberray atthay eshay isay oneay ofay aay
argelay amilyfay; atthay asay otay ortunefay itay isay aay ostmay eligibleay atchmay; anday ebay
eadyray otay elievebay, orfay everybody’say akesay, atthay eshay aymay eelfay omethingsay ikelay
egardray anday esteemay orfay ouray ousincay.”

o“tay obligeay ouyay, Iay ouldway tryay otay elievebay almostay anythingay, utbay onay oneay elseay
ouldcay ebay enefitedbay byay uchsay aay eliefbay asay isthay; orfay ereway Iay ersuadedpay atthay
Arlottechay adhay anyay egardray orfay imhay, Iay ouldshay onlyay inkthay orseway ofay erhay
understandingay anthay Iay ownay oday ofay erhay earthay. myay earday Anejay, mray. Ollinscay isay aay
onceitedcay, ompouspay, arrow-mindednay, illysay anmay: ouyay owknay ehay isay, asay ellway asay
Iay oday; anday ouyay ustmay eelfay, asay ellway asay Iay oday, atthay ethay omanway owhay arriesmay imhay
annotcay avehay aay operpray ayway ofay inkingthay. Ouyay allshay otnay efendday erhay, oughthay
itay isay Arlottechay Ucaslay. Ouyay allshay otnay, orfay ethay akesay ofay oneay individualay,
angechay ethay eaningmay ofay inciplepray anday integrityay, ornay endeavouray otay ersuadepay
ourselfyay oray emay, atthay elfishnesssay isay udencepray, anday insensibilityay ofay
angerday ecuritysay orfay appinesshay.”

i“ay ustmay inkthay ouryay anguagelay ootay ongstray inay eakingspay ofay othbay,” epliedray
Anejay; and“ay Iay opehay ouyay illway ebay onvincedcay ofay itay, byay eeingsay emthay appyhay
ogethertay. Utbay enoughay ofay isthay. Ouyay alludeday otay omethingsay elseay. Ouyay
entionedmay o_tway_ instancesay. Iay annotcay isunderstandmay ouyay, utbay Iay entreatay
ouyay, earday Izzylay, otnay otay ainpay emay byay inkingthay at_thay ersonpay_ otay ameblay, anday
ayingsay ouryay opinionay ofay imhay isay unksay. Eway ustmay otnay ebay osay eadyray otay ancyfay
ourselvesay intentionallyay injureday. Eway ustmay otnay expectay aay ivelylay oungyay anmay
otay ebay alwaysay osay uardedgay anday ircumspectcay. Itay isay eryvay oftenay othingnay utbay
ouray ownay anityvay atthay eceivesday usay. Omenway ancyfay admirationay eansmay oremay anthay
itay oesday.”

aNd“ay enmay aketay arecay atthay eythay ouldshay.”

iF“ay itay isay esignedlyday oneday, eythay annotcay ebay ustifiedjay; utbay Iay avehay onay ideaay
ofay erethay eingbay osay uchmay esignday inay ethay orldway asay omesay ersonspay imagineay.”

i“ay amay arfay omfray attributingay anyay artpay ofay mray. Ingley’sbay onductcay otay esignday,”
aidsay Elizabethay; ut“bay, ithoutway emingschay otay oday ongwray, oray otay akemay othersay
unhappyay, erethay aymay ebay erroray anday erethay aymay ebay iserymay. Oughtlessnessthay,
antway ofay attentionay otay otheray eople’spay eelingsfay, anday antway ofay esolutionray,
illway oday ethay usinessbay.”

aNd“ay oday ouyay imputeay itay otay eitheray ofay osethay?”

eS“yay; otay ethay astlay. Utbay ifay Iay ogay onay Iay allshay ispleaseday ouyay byay ayingsay atwhay Iay
inkthay ofay ersonspay ouyay esteemay. Opstay emay, ilstwhay ouyay ancay.”

oU“yay ersistpay, enthay, inay upposingsay ishay isterssay influenceay imhay?”

eS“yay, inay onjunctioncay ithway ishay iendfray.”

i“ay annotcay elievebay itay. whyay ouldshay eythay tryay otay influenceay imhay? Eythay ancay
onlyay ishway ishay appinesshay; anday ifay ehay isay attacheday otay emay onay otheray omanway ancay
ecuresay itay.”

oUr“yay irstfay ositionpay isay alsefay. Eythay aymay ishway anymay ingsthay esidesbay ishay
appinesshay: eythay aymay ishway ishay increaseay ofay ealthway anday onsequencecay; eythay
aymay ishway imhay otay arrymay aay irlgay owhay ashay allay ethay importanceay ofay oneymay, eatgray
onnectionscay, anday idepray.”

eYond“bay aay oubtday eythay oday ishway imhay otay oosechay Issmay Arcyday,” epliedray Anejay;
ut“bay isthay aymay ebay omfray etterbay eelingsfay anthay ouyay areay upposingsay. Eythay avehay
ownknay erhay uchmay ongerlay anthay eythay avehay ownknay emay; onay onderway ifay eythay ovelay
erhay etterbay. Utbay, ateverwhay aymay ebay eirthay ownay ishesway, itay isay eryvay unlikelyay
eythay ouldshay avehay opposeday eirthay other’sbray. Atwhay istersay ouldway inkthay
erselfhay atay ibertylay otay oday itay, unlessay erethay ereway omethingsay eryvay
objectionableay? Ifay eythay elievedbay imhay attacheday otay emay eythay ouldway otnay tryay otay
artpay usay; ifay ehay ereway osay, eythay ouldcay otnay ucceedsay. byay upposingsay uchsay anay
affectionay, ouyay akemay everybodyay actingay unnaturallyay anday ongwray, anday emay ostmay
unhappyay. Oday otnay istressday emay byay ethay ideaay. Iay amay otnay ashameday ofay avinghay eenbay
istaken--ormay, atay eastlay, itay isay ightslay, itay isay othingnay inay omparisoncay ofay
atwhay Iay ouldshay eelfay inay inkingthay illay ofay imhay oray ishay isterssay. Etlay emay aketay itay
inay ethay estbay ightlay, inay ethay ightlay inay ichwhay itay aymay ebay understooday.”

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay opposeay uchsay aay ishway; anday omfray isthay imetay mray. Ingley’sbay
amenay asway arcelyscay everay entionedmay etweenbay emthay.

mrsay. Ennetbay illstay ontinuedcay otay onderway anday epineray atay ishay eturningray onay
oremay; anday oughthay aay ayday eldomsay assedpay inay ichwhay Elizabethay idday otnay accountay
orfay itay earlyclay, erethay eemedsay ittlelay ancechay ofay erhay everay onsideringcay itay
ithway esslay erplexitypay. Erhay aughterday endeavoureday otay onvincecay erhay ofay atwhay
eshay idday otnay elievebay erselfhay, atthay ishay attentionsay otay Anejay adhay eenbay erelymay
ethay effectay ofay aay ommoncay anday ansienttray ikinglay, ichwhay easedcay enwhay ehay awsay
erhay onay oremay; utbay oughthay ethay obabilitypray ofay ethay atementstay asway admitteday atay
ethay imetay, eshay adhay ethay amesay orystay otay epeatray everyay ayday. mrsay. Ennet’sbay estbay
omfortcay asway, atthay mray. Ingleybay ustmay ebay ownday againay inay ethay ummersay.

mray. Ennetbay eatedtray ethay attermay ifferentlyday. o“say, Izzylay,” aidsay ehay, oneay
ayday, our“yay istersay isay ossedcray inay ovelay, Iay indfay. Iay ongratulatecay erhay. Extnay
otay eingbay arriedmay, aay irlgay ikeslay otay ebay ossedcray inay ovelay aay ittlelay ownay anday
enthay. Itay isay omethingsay otay inkthay ofay, anday ivesgay erhay aay ortsay ofay istinctionday
amongay erhay ompanionscay. Enwhay isay ouryay urntay otay omecay? Ouyay illway ardlyhay earbay otay
ebay onglay outdoneay byay Anejay. Ownay isay ouryay imetay. Erehay areay officersay enoughay atay
Erytonmay otay isappointday allay ethay oungyay adieslay inay ethay ountrycay. Etlay Ickhamway
ebay ouryay anmay. Ehay isay aay easantplay ellowfay, anday ouldway iltjay ouyay editablycray.”

aNk“thay ouyay, irsay, utbay aay esslay agreeableay anmay ouldway atisfysay emay. Eway ustmay otnay
allay expectay Ane’sjay oodgay ortunefay.”

uE“tray,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay; ut“bay itay isay aay omfortcay otay inkthay atthay, ateverwhay ofay
atthay indkay aymay efallbay ouyay, ouyay avehay anay affectionateay othermay owhay illway
alwaysay akemay ethay ostmay ofay itay.”

mray. Ickham’sway ocietysay asway ofay aterialmay ervicesay inay ispellingday ethay oomglay
ichwhay ethay atelay erversepay occurrencesay adhay ownthray onay anymay ofay ethay Ongbournlay
amilyfay. Eythay awsay imhay oftenay, anday otay ishay otheray ecommendationsray asway ownay
addeday atthay ofay eneralgay unreserveay. Ethay olewhay ofay atwhay Elizabethay adhay alreadyay
eardhay, ishay aimsclay onay mray. Arcyday, anday allay atthay ehay adhay ufferedsay omfray imhay,
asway ownay openlyay acknowledgeday anday ubliclypay anvassedcay; anday everybodyay asway
easedplay otay inkthay owhay uchmay eythay adhay alwaysay islikedday mray. Arcyday eforebay eythay
adhay ownknay anythingay ofay ethay attermay.

Issmay Ennetbay asway ethay onlyay eaturecray owhay ouldcay upposesay erethay ightmay ebay anyay
extenuatingay ircumstancescay inay ethay asecay unknownay otay ethay ocietysay ofay
Ertfordshirehay: erhay ildmay anday eadystay andourcay alwaysay eadedplay orfay
allowancesay, anday urgeday ethay ossibilitypay ofay istakesmay; utbay byay everybodyay elseay
mray. Arcyday asway ondemnedcay asay ethay orstway ofay enmay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay xxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Afteray aay eekway entspay inay ofessionspray ofay ovelay anday emesschay ofay elicityfay, mray.
Ollinscay asway alledcay omfray ishay amiableay Arlottechay byay ethay arrivalay ofay
Aturdaysay. Ethay ainpay ofay eparationsay, oweverhay, ightmay ebay alleviateday onay ishay
idesay byay eparationspray orfay ethay eceptionray ofay ishay idebray, asay ehay adhay easonray otay
opehay, atthay ortlyshay afteray ishay extnay eturnray intoay Ertfordshirehay, ethay ayday
ouldway ebay ixedfay atthay asway otay akemay imhay ethay appiesthay ofay enmay. Ehay ooktay eavelay
ofay ishay elationsray atay Ongbournlay ithway asay uchmay olemnitysay asay eforebay; ishedway
ishay airfay ousinscay ealthhay anday appinesshay againay, anday omisedpray eirthay atherfay
anotheray etterlay ofay anksthay.

Onay ethay ollowingfay Ondaymay, mrsay. Ennetbay adhay ethay easureplay ofay eceivingray erhay
otherbray anday ishay ifeway, owhay amecay, asay usualay, otay endspay ethay Istmaschray atay
Ongbournlay. mray. Ardinergay asway aay ensiblesay, entlemanlikegay anmay, eatlygray
uperiorsay otay ishay istersay, asay ellway byay aturenay asay educationay. Ethay Etherfieldnay
adieslay ouldway avehay adhay ifficultyday inay elievingbay atthay aay anmay owhay ivedlay byay
adetray, anday ithinway iewvay ofay ishay ownay arehousesway, ouldcay avehay eenbay osay
ell-bredway anday agreeableay. mrsay. Ardinergay, owhay asway everalsay earsyay oungeryay
anthay mrsay. Ennetbay anday mrsay. Ilipsphay, asway anay amiableay, intelligentay, elegantay
omanway, anday aay eatgray avouritefay ithway erhay Ongbournlay iecesnay. Etweenbay ethay otway
eldestay anday erselfhay especiallyay, erethay ubsistedsay aay eryvay articularpay egardray.
Eythay adhay equentlyfray eenbay ayingstay ithway erhay inay owntay.

Ethay irstfay artpay ofay mrsay. Ardiner’sgay usinessbay, onay erhay arrivalay, asway otay
istributeday erhay esentspray anday escribeday ethay ewestnay ashionsfay. Enwhay isthay asway
oneday, eshay adhay aay esslay activeay artpay otay ayplay. Itay ecamebay erhay urntay otay istenlay.
mrsay. Ennetbay adhay anymay ievancesgray otay elateray, anday uchmay otay omplaincay ofay. Eythay
adhay allay eenbay eryvay ill-useday incesay eshay astlay awsay erhay istersay. Otway ofay erhay
irlsgay adhay eenbay onay ethay ointpay ofay arriagemay, anday afteray allay erethay asway othingnay
inay itay.

i“ay oday otnay ameblay Anejay,” eshay ontinuedcay, or“fay Anejay ouldway avehay otgay mray.
Ingleybay ifay eshay ouldcay. Utbay, Izzylay! Ohay, istersay! itay isay eryvay ardhay otay inkthay
atthay eshay ightmay avehay eenbay mray. Ollins’scay ifeway byay isthay imetay, adhay otnay itay
eenbay orfay erhay ownay erversenesspay. Ehay ademay erhay anay offeray inay isthay eryvay oomray,
anday eshay efusedray imhay. Ethay onsequencecay ofay itay isay, atthay Adylay Ucaslay illway avehay
aay aughterday arriedmay eforebay Iay avehay, anday atthay Ongbournlay estateay isay ustjay asay
uchmay entaileday asay everay. Ethay Ucaseslay areay eryvay artfulay eoplepay, indeeday,
istersay. Eythay areay allay orfay atwhay eythay ancay etgay. Iay amay orrysay otay aysay itay ofay
emthay, utbay osay itay isay. Itay akesmay emay eryvay ervousnay anday oorlypay, otay ebay artedthway
osay inay myay ownay amilyfay, anday otay avehay eighboursnay owhay inkthay ofay emselvesthay
eforebay anybodyay elseay. Oweverhay, ouryay omingcay ustjay atay isthay imetay isay ethay
eatestgray ofay omfortscay, anday Iay amay eryvay adglay otay earhay atwhay ouyay elltay usay ofay
onglay eevesslay.”

mrsay. Ardinergay, otay omwhay ethay iefchay ofay isthay ewsnay adhay eenbay ivengay eforebay, inay
ethay oursecay ofay Anejay anday Elizabeth’say orrespondencecay ithway erhay, ademay erhay
istersay aay ightslay answeray, anday, inay ompassioncay otay erhay iecesnay, urnedtay ethay
onversationcay.

Enwhay aloneay ithway Elizabethay afterwardsay, eshay okespay oremay onay ethay ubjectsay.
iT“ay eemssay ikelylay otay avehay eenbay aay esirableday atchmay orfay Anejay,” aidsay eshay. i“ay
amay orrysay itay entway offay. Utbay esethay ingsthay appenhay osay oftenay! Aay oungyay anmay,
uchsay asay ouyay escribeday mray. Ingleybay, osay easilyay allsfay inay ovelay ithway aay ettypray
irlgay orfay aay ewfay eeksway, anday, enwhay accidentay eparatessay emthay, osay easilyay
orgetsfay erhay, atthay esethay ortsay ofay inconstanciesay areay eryvay equentfray.”

iLlustration[ay:

oFfended“ay otway oray eethray oungyay adieslay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

aN“ay excellentay onsolationcay inay itsay ayway,” aidsay Elizabethay; ut“bay itay illway otnay
oday orfay us_ay_. Eway oday otnay uffersay byay accidentay. Itay oesday otnay oftenay appenhay
atthay ethay interferenceay ofay iendsfray illway ersuadepay aay oungyay anmay ofay
independentay ortunefay otay inkthay onay oremay ofay aay irlgay omwhay ehay asway iolentlyvay inay
ovelay ithway onlyay aay ewfay aysday eforebay.”

uT“bay atthay expressionay ofay iolently‘vay inay ovelay’ isay osay ackneyedhay, osay
oubtfulday, osay indefiniteay, atthay itay ivesgay emay eryvay ittlelay ideaay. Itay isay asay
oftenay applieday otay eelingsfay ichwhay ariseay onlyay omfray aay alfhay our’shay
acquaintanceay, asay otay aay ealray, ongstray attachmentay. Aypray, owhay iolent_vay asway_
mray. Ingley’sbay ovelay?”

i“ay evernay awsay aay oremay omisingpray inclinationay; ehay asway owinggray uiteqay
inattentiveay otay otheray eoplepay, anday ollywhay engrosseday byay erhay. Everyay imetay
eythay etmay, itay asway oremay ecidedday anday emarkableray. Atay ishay ownay allbay ehay
offendeday otway oray eethray oungyay adieslay byay otnay askingay emthay otay anceday; anday Iay
okespay otay imhay icetway elfmysay ithoutway eceivingray anay answeray. Ouldcay erethay ebay
inerfay omssymptay? Isay otnay eneralgay incivilityay ethay eryvay essenceay ofay ovelay?”

oH“ay, esyay! ofay atthay indkay ofay ovelay ichwhay Iay upposesay imhay otay avehay eltfay. Oorpay
Anejay! Iay amay orrysay orfay erhay, ecausebay, ithway erhay ispositionday, eshay aymay otnay etgay
overay itay immediatelyay. Itay adhay etterbay avehay appenedhay otay ou_yay_, Izzylay; ouyay
ouldway avehay aughedlay ourselfyay outay ofay itay oonersay. Utbay oday ouyay inkthay eshay ouldway
ebay evailedpray onay otay ogay ackbay ithway usay? Angechay ofay enescay ightmay ebay ofay
ervice--andsay erhapspay aay ittlelay eliefray omfray omehay aymay ebay asay usefulay asay
anythingay.”

Elizabethay asway exceedinglyay easedplay ithway isthay oposalpray, anday eltfay ersuadedpay
ofay erhay ister’ssay eadyray acquiescenceay.

i“ay opehay,” addeday mrsay. Ardinergay, at“thay onay onsiderationcay ithway egardray otay
isthay oungyay anmay illway influenceay erhay. Eway ivelay inay osay ifferentday aay artpay ofay
owntay, allay ouray onnectionscay areay osay ifferentday, anday, asay ouyay ellway owknay, eway ogay
outay osay ittlelay, atthay itay isay eryvay improbableay eythay ouldshay eetmay atay allay,
unlessay ehay eallyray omescay otay eesay erhay.”

aNd“ay at_thay_ isay uiteqay impossibleay; orfay ehay isay ownay inay ethay ustodycay ofay ishay
iendfray, anday mray. Arcyday ouldway onay oremay uffersay imhay otay allcay onay Anejay inay uchsay aay
artpay ofay Ondonlay! myay earday auntay, owhay ouldcay ouyay inkthay ofay itay? mray. Arcyday aymay,
erhapspay, avehay eard_hay_ ofay uchsay aay aceplay asay Acechurchgray Eetstray, utbay ehay
ouldway ardlyhay inkthay aay onth’smay ablutionay enoughay otay eanseclay imhay omfray itsay
impuritiesay, ereway ehay onceay otay enteray itay; anday, ependday uponay itay, mray. Ingleybay
evernay irsstay ithoutway imhay.”

o“say uchmay ethay etterbay. Iay opehay eythay illway otnay eetmay atay allay. Utbay oesday otnay Anejay
orrespondcay ithway ishay istersay? e_shay_ illway otnay ebay ableay otay elphay allingcay.”

e“shay illway opdray ethay acquaintanceay entirelyay.”

Utbay, inay itespay ofay ethay ertaintycay inay ichwhay Elizabethay affecteday otay aceplay isthay
ointpay, asay ellway asay ethay illstay oremay interestingay oneay ofay Ingley’sbay eingbay
ithheldway omfray eeingsay Anejay, eshay eltfay aay olicitudesay onay ethay ubjectsay ichwhay
onvincedcay erhay, onay examinationay, atthay eshay idday otnay onsidercay itay entirelyay
opelesshay. Itay asway ossiblepay, anday ometimessay eshay oughtthay itay obablepray, atthay
ishay affectionay ightmay ebay e-animatedray, anday ethay influenceay ofay ishay iendsfray
uccessfullysay ombatedcay byay ethay oremay aturalnay influenceay ofay Ane’sjay
attractionsay.

Issmay Ennetbay accepteday erhay aunt’say invitationay ithway easureplay; anday ethay
Ingleysbay ereway onay otherwiseay inay erhay oughtsthay atay ethay amesay imetay anthay asay eshay
opedhay, byay Aroline’scay otnay ivinglay inay ethay amesay ousehay ithway erhay otherbray, eshay
ightmay occasionallyay endspay aay orningmay ithway erhay, ithoutway anyay angerday ofay
eeingsay imhay.

Ethay Ardinersgay ayedstay aay eekway atay Ongbournlay; anday atwhay ithway ethay Ilipsesphay,
ethay Ucaseslay, anday ethay officersay, erethay asway otnay aay ayday ithoutway itsay
engagementay. mrsay. Ennetbay adhay osay arefullycay ovidedpray orfay ethay entertainmentay
ofay erhay otherbray anday istersay, atthay eythay idday otnay onceay itsay ownday otay aay amilyfay
innerday. Enwhay ethay engagementay asway orfay omehay, omesay ofay ethay officersay alwaysay
ademay artpay ofay itay, ofay ichwhay officersay mray. Ickhamway asway uresay otay ebay oneay; anday
onay esethay occasionsay mrsay. Ardinergay, enderedray uspicioussay byay Elizabeth’say
armway ommendationcay ofay imhay, arrowlynay observeday emthay othbay. Ithoutway upposingsay
emthay, omfray atwhay eshay awsay, otay ebay eryvay eriouslysay inay ovelay, eirthay eferencepray
ofay eachay otheray asway ainplay enoughay otay akemay erhay aay ittlelay uneasyay; anday eshay
esolvedray otay eakspay otay Elizabethay onay ethay ubjectsay eforebay eshay eftlay
Ertfordshirehay, anday epresentray otay erhay ethay imprudenceay ofay encouragingay uchsay
anay attachmentay.

Otay mrsay. Ardinergay, Ickhamway adhay oneay eansmay ofay affordingay easureplay,
unconnecteday ithway ishay eneralgay owerspay. Aboutay entay oray aay ozenday earsyay agoay,
eforebay erhay arriagemay, eshay adhay entspay aay onsiderablecay imetay inay atthay eryvay artpay
ofay Erbyshireday otay ichwhay ehay elongedbay. Eythay adhay, ereforethay, anymay
acquaintanceay inay ommoncay; anday, oughthay Ickhamway adhay eenbay ittlelay erethay incesay
ethay eathday ofay Arcy’sday atherfay, ivefay earsyay eforebay, itay asway etyay inay ishay owerpay
otay ivegay erhay esherfray intelligenceay ofay erhay ormerfay iendsfray anthay eshay adhay eenbay
inay ethay ayway ofay ocuringpray.

mrsay. Ardinergay adhay eensay Emberleypay, anday ownknay ethay atelay mray. Arcyday byay
aracterchay erfectlypay ellway. Erehay, onsequentlycay, asway anay inexhaustibleay
ubjectsay ofay iscourseday. Inay omparingcay erhay ecollectionray ofay Emberleypay ithway
ethay inutemay escriptionday ichwhay Ickhamway ouldcay ivegay, anday inay estowingbay erhay
ibutetray ofay aisepray onay ethay aracterchay ofay itsay atelay ossessorpay, eshay asway
elightingday othbay imhay anday erselfhay. Onay eingbay ademay acquainteday ithway ethay
esentpray mray. Arcy’sday eatmenttray ofay imhay, eshay iedtray otay ememberray omethingsay ofay
atthay entleman’sgay eputedray ispositionday, enwhay uiteqay aay adlay, ichwhay ightmay
agreeay ithway itay; anday asway onfidentcay, atay astlay, atthay eshay ecollectedray avinghay
eardhay mray. Itzwilliamfay Arcyday ormerlyfay okenspay ofay asay aay eryvay oudpray,
ill-natureday oybay.




iLlustration[ay:

iLl“way ouyay omecay anday eesay emay?”
ay]




APTERchay Ixxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

mrsay. Ardiner’sgay autioncay otay Elizabethay asway unctuallypay anday indlykay ivengay onay
ethay irstfay avourablefay opportunityay ofay eakingspay otay erhay aloneay: afteray
onestlyhay ellingtay erhay atwhay eshay oughtthay, eshay usthay entway onay:--

oU“yay areay ootay ensiblesay aay irlgay, Izzylay, otay allfay inay ovelay erelymay ecausebay ouyay
areay arnedway againstay itay; anday, ereforethay, Iay amay otnay afraiday ofay eakingspay
openlyay. Eriouslysay, Iay ouldway avehay ouyay ebay onay ouryay uardgay. Oday otnay involveay
ourselfyay, oray endeavouray otay involveay imhay, inay anay affectionay ichwhay ethay antway ofay
ortunefay ouldway akemay osay eryvay imprudentay. Iay avehay othingnay otay aysay againstay
im_hay_: ehay isay aay ostmay interestingay oungyay anmay; anday ifay ehay adhay ethay ortunefay ehay
oughtay otay avehay, Iay ouldshay inkthay ouyay ouldcay otnay oday etterbay. Utbay asay itay is--youay
ustmay otnay etlay ouryay ancyfay unray awayay ithway ouyay. Ouyay avehay ensesay, anday eway allay
expectay ouyay otay useay itay. Ouryay atherfay ouldway ependday onay our_yay_ esolutionray anday
oodgay onductcay, Iay amay uresay. Ouyay ustmay otnay isappointday ouryay atherfay.”

“myay earday auntay, isthay isay eingbay erioussay indeeday.”

eS“yay, anday Iay opehay otay engageay ouyay otay ebay erioussay ikewiselay.”

eLl“way, enthay, ouyay eednay otnay ebay underay anyay alarmay. Iay illway aketay arecay ofay
elfmysay, anday ofay mray. Ickhamway ootay. Ehay allshay otnay ebay inay ovelay ithway emay, ifay Iay
ancay eventpray itay.”

eLizabeth“ay, ouyay areay otnay erioussay ownay.”

i“ay egbay ouryay ardonpay. Iay illway tryay againay. Atay esentpray Iay amay otnay inay ovelay ithway
mray. Ickhamway; onay, Iay ertainlycay amay otnay. Utbay ehay isay, eyondbay allay omparisoncay,
ethay ostmay agreeableay anmay Iay everay aw--andsay ifay ehay ecomesbay eallyray attacheday otay
e--imay elievebay itay illway ebay etterbay atthay ehay ouldshay otnay. Iay eesay ethay imprudenceay
ofay itay. Ohay, at_thay_ abominableay mray. Arcyday! myay ather’sfay opinionay ofay emay oesday
emay ethay eatestgray onourhay; anday Iay ouldshay ebay iserablemay otay orfeitfay itay. myay
atherfay, oweverhay, isay artialpay otay mray. Ickhamway. Inay ortshay, myay earday auntay, Iay
ouldshay ebay eryvay orrysay otay ebay ethay eansmay ofay akingmay anyay ofay ouyay unhappyay; utbay
incesay eway eesay, everyay ayday, atthay erewhay erethay isay affectionay oungyay eoplepay areay
eldomsay ithheldway, byay immediateay antway ofay ortunefay, omfray enteringay intoay
engagementsay ithway eachay otheray, owhay ancay Iay omisepray otay ebay iserway anthay osay anymay
ofay myay ellow-creaturesfay, ifay Iay amay emptedtay, oray owhay amay Iay evenay otay owknay atthay
itay ouldway ebay iserway otay esistray? Allay atthay Iay ancay omisepray ouyay, ereforethay, isay
otnay otay ebay inay aay urryhay. Iay illway otnay ebay inay aay urryhay otay elievebay elfmysay ishay
irstfay objectay. Enwhay Iay amay inay ompanycay ithway imhay, Iay illway otnay ebay ishingway. Inay
ortshay, Iay illway oday myay estbay.”

eRhaps“pay itay illway ebay asay ellway ifay ouyay iscourageday ishay omingcay erehay osay eryvay
oftenay. Atay eastlay ouyay ouldshay otnay emind_ray_ ouryay othermay ofay invitingay imhay.”

aS“ay Iay idday ethay otheray ayday,” aidsay Elizabethay, ithway aay onsciouscay ilesmay; ery“vay
uetray, itay illway ebay iseway inay emay otay efrainray omfray at_thay_. Utbay oday otnay imagineay
atthay ehay isay alwaysay erehay osay oftenay. Itay isay onay ouryay accountay atthay ehay ashay eenbay
osay equentlyfray inviteday isthay eekway. Ouyay owknay myay other’smay ideasay asay otay ethay
ecessitynay ofay onstantcay ompanycay orfay erhay iendsfray. Utbay eallyray, anday uponay myay
onourhay, Iay illway tryay otay oday atwhay Iay inkthay otay ebay isestway; anday ownay Iay opehay ouyay
areay atisfiedsay.”

Erhay auntay assureday erhay atthay eshay asway; anday Elizabethay, avinghay ankedthay erhay orfay
ethay indnesskay ofay erhay intshay, eythay arted,--apay onderfulway instanceay ofay adviceay
eingbay ivengay onay uchsay aay ointpay ithoutway eingbay esentedray.

mray. Ollinscay eturnedray intoay Ertfordshirehay oonsay afteray itay adhay eenbay uittedqay
byay ethay Ardinersgay anday Anejay; utbay, asay ehay ooktay upay ishay abodeay ithway ethay
Ucaseslay, ishay arrivalay asway onay eatgray inconvenienceay otay mrsay. Ennetbay. Ishay
arriagemay asway ownay astfay approachingay; anday eshay asway atay engthlay osay arfay esignedray
asay otay inkthay itay inevitableay, anday evenay epeatedlyray otay aysay, inay anay ill-natureday
onetay, atthay eshay ished“_way_ eythay ightmay ebay appyhay.” Ursdaythay asway otay ebay ethay
edding-dayway, anday onay Ednesdayway Issmay Ucaslay aidpay erhay arewellfay isitvay; anday
enwhay eshay oseray otay aketay eavelay, Elizabethay, ashameday ofay erhay other’smay
ungraciousay anday eluctantray oodgay ishesway, anday incerelysay affecteday erselfhay,
accompanieday erhay outay ofay ethay oomray. Asay eythay entway ownday airsstay ogethertay,
Arlottechay aidsay,--

i“ay allshay ependday onay earinghay omfray ouyay eryvay oftenay, Elizaay.”

at“_thay_ ouyay ertainlycay allshay.”

aNd“ay Iay avehay anotheray avourfay otay askay. Illway ouyay omecay anday eesay emay?”

e“way allshay oftenay eetmay, Iay opehay, inay Ertfordshirehay.”

i“ay amay otnay ikelylay otay eavelay Entkay orfay omesay imetay. Omisepray emay, ereforethay, otay
omecay otay Unsfordhay.”

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay efuseray, oughthay eshay oresawfay ittlelay easureplay inay ethay
isitvay.

“myay atherfay anday Ariamay areay otay omecay otay emay inay Archmay,” addeday Arlottechay, and“ay
Iay opehay ouyay illway onsentcay otay ebay ofay ethay artypay. Indeeday, Elizaay, ouyay illway ebay
asay elcomeway otay emay asay eitheray ofay emthay.”

Ethay eddingway ooktay aceplay: ethay idebray anday idegroombray etsay offay orfay Entkay omfray
ethay urchchay oorday, anday everybodyay adhay asay uchmay otay aysay oray otay earhay onay ethay
ubjectsay asay usualay. Elizabethay oonsay eardhay omfray erhay iendfray, anday eirthay
orrespondencecay asway asay egularray anday equentfray asay itay everay adhay eenbay: atthay itay
ouldshay ebay equallyay unreserveday asway impossibleay. Elizabethay ouldcay evernay
addressay erhay ithoutway eelingfay atthay allay ethay omfortcay ofay intimacyay asway overay;
anday, oughthay eterminedday otnay otay ackenslay asay aay orrespondentcay, itay asway orfay ethay
akesay ofay atwhay adhay eenbay atherray anthay atwhay asway. Arlotte’schay irstfay etterslay
ereway eceivedray ithway aay oodgay ealday ofay eagernessay: erethay ouldcay otnay utbay ebay
uriositycay otay owknay owhay eshay ouldway eakspay ofay erhay ewnay omehay, owhay eshay ouldway
ikelay Adylay Atherinecay, anday owhay appyhay eshay ouldway areday onouncepray erselfhay otay
ebay; oughthay, enwhay ethay etterslay ereway eadray, Elizabethay eltfay atthay Arlottechay
expresseday erselfhay onay everyay ointpay exactlyay asay eshay ightmay avehay oreseenfay. Eshay
otewray eerfullychay, eemedsay urroundedsay ithway omfortscay, anday entionedmay othingnay
ichwhay eshay ouldcay otnay aisepray. Ethay ousehay, urniturefay, eighbourhoodnay, anday
oadsray, ereway allay otay erhay astetay, anday Adylay Atherine’scay ehaviourbay asway ostmay
iendlyfray anday obligingay. Itay asway mray. Ollins’scay icturepay ofay Unsfordhay anday
Osingsray ationallyray oftenedsay; anday Elizabethay erceivedpay atthay eshay ustmay aitway
orfay erhay ownay isitvay erethay, otay owknay ethay estray.

Anejay adhay alreadyay ittenwray aay ewfay ineslay otay erhay istersay, otay announceay eirthay
afesay arrivalay inay Ondonlay; anday enwhay eshay otewray againay, Elizabethay opedhay itay
ouldway ebay inay erhay owerpay otay aysay omethingsay ofay ethay Ingleysbay.

Erhay impatienceay orfay isthay econdsay etterlay asway asay ellway ewardedray asay impatienceay
enerallygay isay. Anejay adhay eenbay aay eekway inay owntay, ithoutway eitheray eeingsay oray
earinghay omfray Arolinecay. Eshay accounteday orfay itay, oweverhay, byay upposingsay atthay
erhay astlay etterlay otay erhay iendfray omfray Ongbournlay adhay byay omesay accidentay eenbay
ostlay.

“myay auntay,” eshay ontinuedcay, is“ay oinggay o-morrowtay intoay atthay artpay ofay ethay
owntay, anday Iay allshay aketay ethay opportunityay ofay allingcay inay Osvenorgray Eetstray.”

Eshay otewray againay enwhay ethay isitvay asway aidpay, anday eshay adhay eensay Issmay Ingleybay.
i“ay idday otnay inkthay Arolinecay inay iritsspay,” ereway erhay ordsway, ut“bay eshay asway eryvay
adglay otay eesay emay, anday eproachedray emay orfay ivinggay erhay onay oticenay ofay myay omingcay
otay Ondonlay. Iay asway ightray, ereforethay; myay astlay etterlay adhay evernay eachedray erhay.
Iay inquireday afteray eirthay otherbray, ofay oursecay. Ehay asway ellway, utbay osay uchmay
engageday ithway mray. Arcyday atthay eythay arcelyscay everay awsay imhay. Iay oundfay atthay
Issmay Arcyday asway expecteday otay innerday: Iay ishway Iay ouldcay eesay erhay. myay isitvay asway
otnay onglay, asay Arolinecay anday mrsay. Ursthay ereway oinggay outay. Iay areday aysay Iay allshay
oonsay eesay emthay erehay.”

Elizabethay ookshay erhay eadhay overay isthay etterlay. Itay onvincedcay erhay atthay
accidentay onlyay ouldcay iscoverday otay mray. Ingleybay erhay ister’ssay eingbay inay owntay.

Ourfay eeksway assedpay awayay, anday Anejay awsay othingnay ofay imhay. Eshay endeavoureday otay
ersuadepay erselfhay atthay eshay idday otnay egretray itay; utbay eshay ouldcay onay ongerlay ebay
indblay otay Issmay Ingley’sbay inattentionay. Afteray aitingway atay omehay everyay orningmay
orfay aay ortnightfay, anday inventingay everyay eveningay aay eshfray excuseay orfay erhay, ethay
isitorvay idday atay astlay appearay; utbay ethay ortnessshay ofay erhay aystay, anday, etyay
oremay, ethay alterationay ofay erhay annermay, ouldway alloway Anejay otay eceiveday erselfhay
onay ongerlay. Ethay etterlay ichwhay eshay otewray onay isthay occasionay otay erhay istersay
illway ovepray atwhay eshay eltfay:--

“myay earestday Izzylay illway, Iay amay uresay, ebay incapableay ofay iumphingtray inay
erhay etterbay udgmentjay, atay myay expenseay, enwhay Iay onfesscay elfmysay otay avehay
eenbay entirelyay eceivedday inay Issmay Ingley’sbay egardray orfay emay. Utbay, myay
earday istersay, oughthay ethay eventay ashay ovedpray ouyay ightray, oday otnay inkthay emay
obstinateay ifay Iay illstay assertay atthay, onsideringcay atwhay erhay ehaviourbay
asway, myay onfidencecay asway asay aturalnay asay ouryay uspicionsay. Iay oday otnay atay
allay omprehendcay erhay easonray orfay ishingway otay ebay intimateay ithway emay; utbay,
ifay ethay amesay ircumstancescay ereway otay appenhay againay, Iay amay uresay Iay ouldshay
ebay eceivedday againay. Arolinecay idday otnay eturnray myay isitvay illtay esterdayyay;
anday otnay aay otenay, otnay aay inelay, idday Iay eceiveray inay ethay eantimemay. Enwhay eshay
idday omecay, itay asway eryvay evidentay atthay eshay adhay onay easureplay inay itay; eshay
ademay aay ightslay, ormalfay apologyay orfay otnay allingcay eforebay, aidsay otnay aay
ordway ofay ishingway otay eesay emay againay, anday asway, inay everyay espectray, osay
altereday aay eaturecray, atthay enwhay eshay entway awayay Iay asway erfectlypay
esolvedray otay ontinuecay ethay acquaintanceay onay ongerlay. Iay itypay, oughthay Iay
annotcay elphay amingblay, erhay. Eshay asway eryvay ongwray inay inglingsay emay outay asay
eshay idday; Iay ancay afelysay aysay, atthay everyay advanceay otay intimacyay eganbay onay
erhay idesay. Utbay Iay itypay erhay, ecausebay eshay ustmay eelfay atthay eshay ashay eenbay
actingay ongwray, anday ecausebay Iay amay eryvay uresay atthay anxietyay orfay erhay
otherbray isay ethay ausecay ofay itay. Iay eednay otnay explainay elfmysay artherfay; anday
oughthay e_way_ owknay isthay anxietyay otay ebay uiteqay eedlessnay, etyay ifay eshay
eelsfay itay, itay illway easilyay accountay orfay erhay ehaviourbay otay emay; anday osay
eservedlyday earday asay ehay isay otay ishay istersay, ateverwhay anxietyay eshay aymay
eelfay onay ishay ehalfbay isay aturalnay anday amiableay. Iay annotcay utbay onderway,
oweverhay, atay erhay avinghay anyay uchsay earsfay ownay, ecausebay ifay ehay adhay atay allay
aredcay aboutay emay, eway ustmay avehay etmay onglay, onglay agoay. Ehay owsknay ofay myay
eingbay inay owntay, Iay amay ertaincay, omfray omethingsay eshay aidsay erselfhay; anday
etyay itay ouldway eemsay, byay erhay annermay ofay alkingtay, asay ifay eshay antedway otay
ersuadepay erselfhay atthay ehay isay eallyray artialpay otay Issmay Arcyday. Iay annotcay
understanday itay. Ifay Iay ereway otnay afraiday ofay udgingjay arshlyhay, Iay ouldshay ebay
almostay emptedtay otay aysay, atthay erethay isay aay ongstray appearanceay ofay
uplicityday inay allay isthay. Iay illway endeavouray otay anishbay everyay ainfulpay
oughtthay, anday inkthay onlyay ofay atwhay illway akemay emay appyhay, ouryay affectionay,
anday ethay invariableay indnesskay ofay myay earday uncleay anday auntay. Etlay emay earhay
omfray ouyay eryvay oonsay. Issmay Ingleybay aidsay omethingsay ofay ishay evernay
eturningray otay Etherfieldnay againay, ofay ivinggay upay ethay ousehay, utbay otnay
ithway anyay ertaintycay. Eway adhay etterbay otnay entionmay itay. Iay amay extremelyay
adglay atthay ouyay avehay uchsay easantplay accountsay omfray ouray iendsfray atay
Unsfordhay. Aypray ogay otay eesay emthay, ithway Irsay Illiamway anday Ariamay. Iay amay
uresay ouyay illway ebay eryvay omfortablecay erethay.

oUrs“yay, etcay.”

Isthay etterlay avegay Elizabethay omesay ainpay; utbay erhay iritsspay eturnedray, asay eshay
onsideredcay atthay Anejay ouldway onay ongerlay ebay upedday, byay ethay istersay atay eastlay.
Allay expectationay omfray ethay otherbray asway ownay absolutelyay overay. Eshay ouldway otnay
evenay ishway orfay anyay enewalray ofay ishay attentionsay. Ishay aracterchay unksay onay everyay
eviewray ofay itay; anday, asay aay unishmentpay orfay imhay, asay ellway asay aay ossiblepay
advantageay otay Anejay, eshay eriouslysay opedhay ehay ightmay eallyray oonsay arrymay mray.
Arcy’sday istersay, asay, byay Ickham’sway accountay, eshay ouldway akemay imhay abundantlyay
egretray atwhay ehay adhay ownthray awayay.

mrsay. Ardinergay aboutay isthay imetay emindedray Elizabethay ofay erhay omisepray
oncerningcay atthay entlemangay, anday equiredray informationay; anday Elizabethay adhay
uchsay otay endsay asay ightmay atherray ivegay ontentmentcay otay erhay auntay anthay otay
erselfhay. Ishay apparentay artialitypay adhay ubsidedsay, ishay attentionsay ereway overay,
ehay asway ethay admireray ofay omesay oneay elseay. Elizabethay asway atchfulway enoughay otay
eesay itay allay, utbay eshay ouldcay eesay itay anday itewray ofay itay ithoutway aterialmay ainpay.
Erhay earthay adhay eenbay utbay ightlyslay ouchedtay, anday erhay anityvay asway atisfiedsay
ithway elievingbay atthay e_shay_ ouldway avehay eenbay ishay onlyay oicechay, adhay ortunefay
ermittedpay itay. Ethay uddensay acquisitionay ofay entay ousandthay oundspay asway ethay ostmay
emarkableray armchay ofay ethay oungyay adylay otay omwhay ehay asway ownay enderingray imselfhay
agreeableay; utbay Elizabethay, esslay ear-sightedclay erhapspay inay isthay asecay anthay
inay Arlotte’schay, idday otnay uarrelqay ithway imhay orfay ishay ishway ofay independenceay.
Othingnay, onay ethay ontrarycay, ouldcay ebay oremay aturalnay; anday, ilewhay ableay otay
upposesay atthay itay ostcay imhay aay ewfay ugglesstray otay elinquishray erhay, eshay asway
eadyray otay alloway itay aay iseway anday esirableday easuremay orfay othbay, anday ouldcay eryvay
incerelysay ishway imhay appyhay.

Allay isthay asway acknowledgeday otay mrsay. Ardinergay; anday, afteray elatingray ethay
ircumstancescay, eshay usthay entway on:--“Iay amay ownay onvincedcay, myay earday auntay,
atthay Iay avehay evernay eenbay uchmay inay ovelay; orfay adhay Iay eallyray experienceday atthay
urepay anday elevatingay assionpay, Iay ouldshay atay esentpray etestday ishay eryvay amenay,
anday ishway imhay allay annermay ofay evilay. Utbay myay eelingsfay areay otnay onlyay ordialcay
owardstay im_hay_, eythay areay evenay impartialay owardstay Issmay Ingkay. Iay annotcay indfay
outay atthay Iay atehay erhay atay allay, oray atthay Iay amay inay ethay eastlay unwillingay otay inkthay
erhay aay eryvay oodgay ortsay ofay irlgay. Erethay ancay ebay onay ovelay inay allay isthay. myay
atchfulnessway ashay eenbay effectualay; anday oughthay Iay ouldshay ertainlycay ebay aay oremay
interestingay objectay otay allay myay acquaintanceay, ereway Iay istractedlyday inay ovelay
ithway imhay, Iay annotcay aysay atthay Iay egretray myay omparativecay insignificanceay.
Importanceay aymay ometimessay ebay urchasedpay ootay earlyday. Ittykay anday Ialyday aketay
ishay efectionday uchmay oremay otay earthay anthay Iay oday. Eythay areay oungyay inay ethay aysway
ofay ethay orldway, anday otnay etyay openay otay ethay ortifyingmay onvictioncay atthay
andsomehay oungyay enmay ustmay avehay omethingsay otay ivelay onay asay ellway asay ethay
ainplay.”




iLlustration[ay:

oN“ay ethay Airsstay”
ay]




APTERchay IIxxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ithway onay eatergray eventsay anthay esethay inay ethay Ongbournlay amilyfay, anday otherwiseay
iversifiedday byay ittlelay eyondbay ethay alksway otay Erytonmay, ometimessay irtyday anday
ometimessay oldcay, idday Anuaryjay anday Ebruaryfay asspay awayay. Archmay asway otay aketay
Elizabethay otay Unsfordhay. Eshay adhay otnay atay irstfay oughtthay eryvay eriouslysay ofay
oinggay itherthay; utbay Arlottechay, eshay oonsay oundfay, asway ependingday onay ethay
anplay, anday eshay aduallygray earnedlay otay onsidercay itay erselfhay ithway eatergray
easureplay asay ellway asay eatergray ertaintycay. Absenceay adhay increaseday erhay esireday
ofay eeingsay Arlottechay againay, anday eakenedway erhay isgustday ofay mray. Ollinscay.
Erethay asway oveltynay inay ethay emeschay; anday asay, ithway uchsay aay othermay anday uchsay
uncompanionableay isterssay, omehay ouldcay otnay ebay aultlessfay, aay ittlelay angechay
asway otnay unwelcomeay orfay itsay ownay akesay. Ethay ourneyjay ouldway, oreovermay, ivegay
erhay aay eeppay atay Anejay; anday, inay ortshay, asay ethay imetay ewdray earnay, eshay ouldway avehay
eenbay eryvay orrysay orfay anyay elayday. Everythingay, oweverhay, entway onay oothlysmay,
anday asway inallyfay ettledsay accordingay otay Arlotte’schay irstfay etchskay. Eshay asway
otay accompanyay Irsay Illiamway anday ishay econdsay aughterday. Ethay improvementay ofay
endingspay aay ightnay inay Ondonlay asway addeday inay imetay, anday ethay anplay ecamebay asay
erfectpay asay anplay ouldcay ebay.

Ethay onlyay ainpay asway inay eavinglay erhay atherfay, owhay ouldway ertainlycay issmay erhay,
anday owhay, enwhay itay amecay otay ethay ointpay, osay ittlelay ikedlay erhay oinggay, atthay ehay
oldtay erhay otay itewray otay imhay, anday almostay omisedpray otay answeray erhay etterlay.

Ethay arewellfay etweenbay erselfhay anday mray. Ickhamway asway erfectlypay iendlyfray; onay
ishay idesay evenay oremay. Ishay esentpray ursuitpay ouldcay otnay akemay imhay orgetfay atthay
Elizabethay adhay eenbay ethay irstfay otay exciteay anday otay eserveday ishay attentionay, ethay
irstfay otay istenlay anday otay itypay, ethay irstfay otay ebay admireday; anday inay ishay annermay
ofay iddingbay erhay adieuay, ishingway erhay everyay enjoymentay, emindingray erhay ofay atwhay
eshay asway otay expectay inay Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay, anday ustingtray eirthay
opinionay ofay er--theirhay opinionay ofay everybody--woulday alwaysay oincidecay, erethay
asway aay olicitudesay, anay interestay, ichwhay eshay eltfay ustmay everay attachay erhay otay
imhay ithway aay ostmay inceresay egardray; anday eshay artedpay omfray imhay onvincedcay, atthay,
etherwhay arriedmay oray inglesay, ehay ustmay alwaysay ebay erhay odelmay ofay ethay amiableay
anday easingplay.

Erhay ellow-travellersfay ethay extnay ayday ereway otnay ofay aay indkay otay akemay erhay inkthay
imhay esslay agreeableay. Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay, anday ishay aughterday Ariamay, aay
ood-humouredgay irlgay, utbay asay empty-headeday asay imselfhay, adhay othingnay otay aysay
atthay ouldcay ebay orthway earinghay, anday ereway istenedlay otay ithway aboutay asay uchmay
elightday asay ethay attleray ofay ethay aisechay. Elizabethay ovedlay absurditiesay, utbay
eshay adhay ownknay Irsay Illiam’sway ootay onglay. Ehay ouldcay elltay erhay othingnay ewnay ofay
ethay ondersway ofay ishay esentationpray anday ighthoodknay; anday ishay ivilitiescay ereway
ornway outay, ikelay ishay informationay.

Itay asway aay ourneyjay ofay onlyay enty-fourtway ilesmay, anday eythay eganbay itay osay earlyay
asay otay ebay inay Acechurchgray Eetstray byay oonnay. Asay eythay ovedray otay mray. Ardiner’sgay
oorday, Anejay asway atay aay awing-roomdray indowway atchingway eirthay arrivalay: enwhay
