eythay entereday ethay assagepay, eshay asway erethay otay elcomeway emthay, anday Elizabethay,
ookinglay earnestlyay inay erhay acefay, asway easedplay otay eesay itay ealthfulhay anday
ovelylay asay everay. Onay ethay airsstay ereway aay ooptray ofay ittlelay oysbay anday irlsgay,
osewhay eagernessay orfay eirthay ousin’scay appearanceay ouldway otnay alloway emthay otay
aitway inay ethay awing-roomdray, anday osewhay essshynay, asay eythay adhay otnay eensay erhay
orfay aay elvemonthtway, eventedpray eirthay omingcay owerlay. Allay asway oyjay anday
indnesskay. Ethay ayday assedpay ostmay easantlyplay awayay; ethay orningmay inay ustlebay anday
oppingshay, anday ethay eveningay atay oneay ofay ethay eatresthay.

Elizabethay enthay ontrivedcay otay itsay byay erhay auntay. Eirthay irstfay ubjectsay asway erhay
istersay; anday eshay asway oremay ievedgray anthay astonisheday otay earhay, inay eplyray otay
erhay inutemay inquiriesay, atthay oughthay Anejay alwaysay uggledstray otay upportsay erhay
iritsspay, erethay ereway eriodspay ofay ejectionday. Itay asway easonableray, oweverhay, otay
opehay atthay eythay ouldway otnay ontinuecay onglay. mrsay. Ardinergay avegay erhay ethay
articularspay alsoay ofay Issmay Ingley’sbay isitvay inay Acechurchgray Eetstray, anday
epeatedray onversationscay occurringay atay ifferentday imestay etweenbay Anejay anday
erselfhay, ichwhay ovedpray atthay ethay ormerfay adhay, omfray erhay earthay, ivengay upay ethay
acquaintanceay.

mrsay. Ardinergay enthay alliedray erhay iecenay onay Ickham’sway esertionday, anday
omplimentedcay erhay onay earingbay itay osay ellway.

uT“bay, myay earday Elizabethay,” eshay addeday, at“whay ortsay ofay irlgay isay Issmay Ingkay? Iay
ouldshay ebay orrysay otay inkthay ouray iendfray ercenarymay.”

aY“pray, myay earday auntay, atwhay isay ethay ifferenceday inay atrimonialmay affairsay,
etweenbay ethay ercenarymay anday ethay udentpray otivemay? Erewhay oesday iscretionday enday,
anday avariceay eginbay? Astlay Istmaschray ouyay ereway afraiday ofay ishay arryingmay emay,
ecausebay itay ouldway ebay imprudentay; anday ownay, ecausebay ehay isay ingtryay otay etgay aay
irlgay ithway onlyay entay ousandthay oundspay, ouyay antway otay indfay outay atthay ehay isay
ercenarymay.”

iF“ay ouyay illway onlyay elltay emay atwhay ortsay ofay irlgay Issmay Ingkay isay, Iay allshay owknay
atwhay otay inkthay.”

e“shay isay aay eryvay oodgay indkay ofay irlgay, Iay elievebay. Iay owknay onay armhay ofay erhay.”

uT“bay ehay aidpay erhay otnay ethay allestsmay attentionay illtay erhay andfather’sgray eathday
ademay erhay istressmay ofay isthay ortunefay?”

o--why“nay ouldshay ehay? Ifay itay ereway otnay allowableay orfay imhay otay aingay _myay_
affectionsay, ecausebay Iay adhay onay oneymay, atwhay occasionay ouldcay erethay ebay orfay
akingmay ovelay otay aay irlgay omwhay ehay idday otnay arecay aboutay, anday owhay asway equallyay
oorpay?”

uT“bay erethay eemssay indelicacyay inay irectingday ishay attentionsay owardstay erhay osay
oonsay afteray isthay eventay.”

a“ay anmay inay istressedday ircumstancescay ashay otnay imetay orfay allay osethay elegantay
ecorumsday ichwhay otheray eoplepay aymay observeay. Ifay e_shay_ oesday otnay objectay otay itay,
whyay ouldshay e_way_?”

er“_hay_ otnay objectingay oesday otnay ustifyjay im_hay_. Itay onlyay owsshay erhay eingbay
eficientday inay omethingsay erself--sensehay oray eelingfay.”

eLl“way,” iedcray Elizabethay, ave“hay itay asay ouyay oosechay. e_hay_ allshay ebay
ercenarymay, anday e_shay_ allshay ebay oolishfay.”

o“nay, Izzylay, atthay isay atwhay Iay oday ot_nay_ oosechay. Iay ouldshay ebay orrysay, ouyay owknay,
otay inkthay illay ofay aay oungyay anmay owhay ashay ivedlay osay onglay inay Erbyshireday.”

oH“ay, ifay atthay isay allay, Iay avehay aay eryvay oorpay opinionay ofay oungyay enmay owhay ivelay inay
Erbyshireday; anday eirthay intimateay iendsfray owhay ivelay inay Ertfordshirehay areay otnay
uchmay etterbay. Iay amay icksay ofay emthay allay. Ankthay eavenhay! Iay amay oinggay o-morrowtay
erewhay Iay allshay indfay aay anmay owhay ashay otnay oneay agreeableay ualityqay, owhay ashay
eithernay annersmay ornay ensesay otay ecommendray imhay. Upidstay enmay areay ethay onlyay onesay
orthway owingknay, afteray allay.”

aKe“tay arecay, Izzylay; atthay eechspay avourssay onglystray ofay isappointmentday.”

Eforebay eythay ereway eparatedsay byay ethay onclusioncay ofay ethay ayplay, eshay adhay ethay
unexpecteday appinesshay ofay anay invitationay otay accompanyay erhay uncleay anday auntay inay
aay ourtay ofay easureplay ichwhay eythay oposedpray akingtay inay ethay ummersay.

e“way avehay otnay uiteqay eterminedday owhay arfay itay allshay arrycay usay,” aidsay mrsay.
Ardinergay; ut“bay erhapspay, otay ethay Akeslay.”

Onay emeschay ouldcay avehay eenbay oremay agreeableay otay Elizabethay, anday erhay
acceptanceay ofay ethay invitationay asway ostmay eadyray anday atefulgray. “myay earday, earday
auntay,” eshay apturouslyray iedcray, at“whay elightday! atwhay elicityfay! Ouyay ivegay emay
eshfray ifelay anday igourvay. Adieuay otay isappointmentday anday eensplay. Atwhay areay enmay
otay ocksray anday ountainsmay? Ohay, atwhay ourshay ofay ansporttray eway allshay endspay! Anday
enwhay eway o_day_ eturnray, itay allshay otnay ebay ikelay otheray avellerstray, ithoutway
eingbay ableay otay ivegay oneay accurateay ideaay ofay anythingay. Eway ill_way_ owknay erewhay
eway avehay one--wegay ill_way_ ecollectray atwhay eway avehay eensay. Akeslay, ountainsmay,
anday iversray, allshay otnay ebay umbledjay ogethertay inay ouray imaginationsay; ornay, enwhay
eway attemptay otay escribeday anyay articularpay enescay, illway eway eginbay uarrellingqay
aboutay itsay elativeray ituationsay. Etlay our_ay_ irstfay effusionsay ebay esslay
insupportableay anthay osethay ofay ethay eneralitygay ofay avellerstray.”




iLlustration[ay:

aT“ay ethay oorday”
ay]




APTERchay IIIxxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Everyay objectay inay ethay extnay ay’sday ourneyjay asway ewnay anday interestingay otay
Elizabethay; anday erhay iritsspay ereway inay aay atestay ofay enjoymentay; orfay eshay adhay
eensay erhay istersay ookinglay osay ellway asay otay anishbay allay earfay orfay erhay ealthhay,
anday ethay ospectpray ofay erhay orthernnay ourtay asway aay onstantcay ourcesay ofay elightday.

Enwhay eythay eftlay ethay ighhay oadray orfay ethay anelay otay Unsfordhay, everyay eyeay asway inay
earchsay ofay ethay Arsonagepay, anday everyay urningtay expecteday otay ingbray itay inay iewvay.
Ethay alingpay ofay Osingsray arkpay asway eirthay oundarybay onay oneay idesay. Elizabethay
iledsmay atay ethay ecollectionray ofay allay atthay eshay adhay eardhay ofay itsay inhabitantsay.

Atay engthlay ethay Arsonagepay asway iscernibleday. Ethay ardengay opingslay otay ethay
oadray, ethay ousehay andingstay inay itay, ethay eengray alespay anday ethay aurellay edgehay,
everythingay eclaredday eythay ereway arrivingay. mray. Ollinscay anday Arlottechay
appeareday atay ethay oorday, anday ethay arriagecay oppedstay atay ethay allsmay ategay, ichwhay
edlay byay aay ortshay avelgray alkway otay ethay ousehay, amidstay ethay odsnay anday ilessmay ofay
ethay olewhay artypay. Inay aay omentmay eythay ereway allay outay ofay ethay aisechay, ejoicingray
atay ethay ightsay ofay eachay otheray. mrsay. Ollinscay elcomedway erhay iendfray ithway ethay
iveliestlay easureplay, anday Elizabethay asway oremay anday oremay atisfiedsay ithway
omingcay, enwhay eshay oundfay erselfhay osay affectionatelyay eceivedray. Eshay awsay
instantlyay atthay erhay ousin’scay annersmay ereway otnay altereday byay ishay arriagemay:
ishay ormalfay ivilitycay asway ustjay atwhay itay adhay eenbay; anday ehay etainedday erhay omesay
inutesmay atay ethay ategay otay earhay anday atisfysay ishay inquiriesay afteray allay erhay
amilyfay. Eythay ereway enthay, ithway onay otheray elayday anthay ishay ointingpay outay ethay
eatnessnay ofay ethay entranceay, akentay intoay ethay ousehay; anday asay oonsay asay eythay ereway
inay ethay arlourpay, ehay elcomedway emthay aay econdsay imetay, ithway ostentatiousay
ormalityfay, otay ishay umblehay abodeay, anday unctuallypay epeatedray allay ishay ife’sway
offersay ofay efreshmentray.

Elizabethay asway eparedpray otay eesay imhay inay ishay oryglay; anday eshay ouldcay otnay elphay
ancyingfay atthay inay isplayingday ethay oodgay oportionpray ofay ethay oomray, itsay aspectay,
anday itsay urniturefay, ehay addresseday imselfhay articularlypay otay erhay, asay ifay
ishingway otay akemay erhay eelfay atwhay eshay adhay ostlay inay efusingray imhay. Utbay oughthay
everythingay eemedsay eatnay anday omfortablecay, eshay asway otnay ableay otay atifygray imhay
byay anyay ighsay ofay epentanceray; anday atherray ookedlay ithway onderway atay erhay iendfray,
atthay eshay ouldcay avehay osay eerfulchay anay airay ithway uchsay aay ompanioncay. Enwhay mray.
Ollinscay aidsay anythingay ofay ichwhay ishay ifeway ightmay easonablyray ebay ashameday,
ichwhay ertainlycay asway otnay eldomsay, eshay involuntarilyay urnedtay erhay eyeay onay
Arlottechay. Onceay oray icetway eshay ouldcay iscernday aay aintfay ushblay; utbay inay eneralgay
Arlottechay iselyway idday otnay earhay. Afteray ittingsay onglay enoughay otay admireay
everyay articleay ofay urniturefay inay ethay oomray, omfray ethay ideboardsay otay ethay
enderfay, otay ivegay anay accountay ofay eirthay ourneyjay, anday ofay allay atthay adhay
appenedhay inay Ondonlay, mray. Ollinscay inviteday emthay otay aketay aay ollstray inay ethay
ardengay, ichwhay asway argelay anday ellway aidlay outay, anday otay ethay ultivationcay ofay
ichwhay ehay attendeday imselfhay. Otay orkway inay ishay ardengay asway oneay ofay ishay ostmay
espectableray easuresplay; anday Elizabethay admireday ethay ommandcay ofay ountenancecay
ithway ichwhay Arlottechay alkedtay ofay ethay ealthfulnesshay ofay ethay exerciseay, anday
owneday eshay encourageday itay asay uchmay asay ossiblepay. Erehay, eadinglay ethay ayway
oughthray everyay alkway anday osscray alkway, anday arcelyscay allowingay emthay anay
intervalay otay utteray ethay aisespray ehay askeday orfay, everyay iewvay asway ointedpay outay
ithway aay inutenessmay ichwhay eftlay eautybay entirelyay ehindbay. Ehay ouldcay umbernay ethay
ieldsfay inay everyay irectionday, anday ouldcay elltay owhay anymay eestray erethay ereway inay
ethay ostmay istantday umpclay. Utbay ofay allay ethay iewsvay ichwhay ishay ardengay, oray ichwhay
ethay ountrycay oray ethay ingdomkay ouldcay oastbay, onenay ereway otay ebay omparedcay ithway
ethay ospectpray ofay Osingsray, affordeday byay anay openingay inay ethay eestray atthay
orderedbay ethay arkpay earlynay oppositeay ethay ontfray ofay ishay ousehay. Itay asway aay
andsomehay odernmay uildingbay, ellway ituatedsay onay isingray oundgray.

Omfray ishay ardengay, mray. Ollinscay ouldway avehay edlay emthay oundray ishay otway eadowsmay;
utbay ethay adieslay, otnay avinghay oesshay otay encounteray ethay emainsray ofay aay itewhay
ostfray, urnedtay ackbay; anday ilewhay Irsay Illiamway accompanieday imhay, Arlottechay
ooktay erhay istersay anday iendfray overay ethay ousehay, extremelyay ellway easedplay,
obablypray, otay avehay ethay opportunityay ofay owingshay itay ithoutway erhay usband’shay
elphay. Itay asway atherray allsmay, utbay ellway uiltbay anday onvenientcay; anday everythingay
asway ittedfay upay anday arrangeday ithway aay eatnessnay anday onsistencycay, ofay ichwhay
Elizabethay avegay Arlottechay allay ethay editcray. Enwhay mray. Ollinscay ouldcay ebay
orgottenfay, erethay asway eallyray aay eatgray airay ofay omfortcay oughoutthray, anday byay
Arlotte’schay evidentay enjoymentay ofay itay, Elizabethay upposedsay ehay ustmay ebay oftenay
orgottenfay.

Eshay adhay alreadyay earntlay atthay Adylay Atherinecay asway illstay inay ethay ountrycay. Itay
asway okenspay ofay againay ilewhay eythay ereway atay innerday, enwhay mray. Ollinscay oiningjay
inay, observeday,--

eS“yay, Issmay Elizabethay, ouyay illway avehay ethay onourhay ofay eeingsay Adylay Atherinecay
eday Ourghbay onay ethay ensuingay Undaysay atay urchchay, anday Iay eednay otnay aysay ouyay illway
ebay elightedday ithway erhay. Eshay isay allay affabilityay anday ondescensioncay, anday Iay
oubtday otnay utbay ouyay illway ebay onouredhay ithway omesay ortionpay ofay erhay oticenay enwhay
ervicesay isay overay. Iay avehay arcelyscay anyay esitationhay inay ayingsay atthay eshay illway
includeay ouyay anday myay istersay Ariamay inay everyay invitationay ithway ichwhay eshay
onourshay usay uringday ouryay aystay erehay. Erhay ehaviourbay otay myay earday Arlottechay isay
armingchay. Eway ineday atay Osingsray icetway everyay eekway, anday areay evernay alloweday otay
alkway omehay. Erhay Adyship’slay arriagecay isay egularlyray ordereday orfay usay. Iay
ould_shay_ aysay, oneay ofay erhay Adyship’slay arriagescay, orfay eshay ashay everalsay.”

aDy“lay Atherinecay isay aay eryvay espectableray, ensiblesay omanway, indeeday,” addeday
Arlottechay, and“ay aay ostmay attentiveay eighbournay.”

eRy“vay uetray, myay earday, atthay isay exactlyay atwhay Iay aysay. Eshay isay ethay ortsay ofay
omanway omwhay oneay annotcay egardray ithway ootay uchmay eferenceday.”

Ethay eveningay asway entspay ieflychay inay alkingtay overay Ertfordshirehay ewsnay, anday
ellingtay againay atwhay adhay eenbay alreadyay ittenwray; anday enwhay itay osedclay,
Elizabethay, inay ethay olitudesay ofay erhay amberchay, adhay otay editatemay uponay
Arlotte’schay egreeday ofay ontentmentcay, otay understanday erhay addressay inay uidinggay,
anday omposurecay inay earingbay ithway, erhay usbandhay, anday otay acknowledgeay atthay itay
asway allay oneday eryvay ellway. Eshay adhay alsoay otay anticipateay owhay erhay isitvay ouldway
asspay, ethay uietqay enourtay ofay eirthay usualay employmentsay, ethay exatiousvay
interruptionsay ofay mray. Ollinscay, anday ethay aietiesgay ofay eirthay intercourseay
ithway Osingsray. Aay ivelylay imaginationay oonsay ettledsay itay allay.

Aboutay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay extnay ayday, asay eshay asway inay erhay oomray ettinggay eadyray
orfay aay alkway, aay uddensay oisenay elowbay eemedsay otay eakspay ethay olewhay ousehay inay
onfusioncay; anday, afteray isteninglay aay omentmay, eshay eardhay omebodysay unningray
upstairsay inay aay iolentvay urryhay, anday allingcay oudlylay afteray erhay. Eshay openeday
ethay oorday, anday etmay Ariamay inay ethay anding-placelay, owhay, eathlessbray ithway
agitationay, iedcray outay,--

iLlustration[ay:

iN“ay Onversationcay ithway ethay adieslay”

oPyright[cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay.]]

oH“ay, myay earday Elizaay! aypray akemay astehay anday omecay intoay ethay ining-roomday, orfay
erethay isay uchsay aay ightsay otay ebay eensay! Iay illway otnay elltay ouyay atwhay itay isay. Akemay
astehay, anday omecay ownday isthay omentmay.”

Elizabethay askeday uestionsqay inay ainvay; Ariamay ouldway elltay erhay othingnay oremay;
anday ownday eythay anray intoay ethay ining-roomday ichwhay ontedfray ethay anelay, inay uestqay
ofay isthay onderway; itay asway otway adieslay, oppingstay inay aay owlay aetonphay atay ethay
ardengay ategay.

aNd“ay isay isthay allay?” iedcray Elizabethay. i“ay expecteday atay eastlay atthay ethay igspay
ereway otgay intoay ethay ardengay, anday erehay isay othingnay utbay Adylay Atherinecay anday erhay
aughterday!”

a“lay! myay earday,” aidsay Ariamay, uiteqay ockedshay atay ethay istakemay, it“ay isay otnay Adylay
Atherinecay. Ethay olday adylay isay mrsay. Enkinsonjay, owhay iveslay ithway emthay. Ethay
otheray isay Issmay Eday Ourghbay. Onlyay ooklay atay erhay. Eshay isay uiteqay aay ittlelay
eaturecray. Owhay ouldway avehay oughtthay eshay ouldcay ebay osay inthay anday allsmay!”

e“shay isay abominablyay uderay otay eepkay Arlottechay outay ofay oorsday inay allay isthay indway.
whyay oesday eshay otnay omecay inay?”

oH“ay, Arlottechay ayssay eshay ardlyhay everay oesday. Itay isay ethay eatestgray ofay avoursfay
enwhay Issmay Eday Ourghbay omescay inay.”

i“ay ikelay erhay appearanceay,” aidsay Elizabethay, uckstray ithway otheray ideasay. e“shay
ookslay icklysay anday osscray. Esyay, eshay illway oday orfay imhay eryvay ellway. Eshay illway
akemay imhay aay eryvay operpray ifeway.”

mray. Ollinscay anday Arlottechay ereway othbay andingstay atay ethay ategay inay onversationcay
ithway ethay adieslay; anday Irsay Illiamway, otay Elizabeth’say ighhay iversionday, asway
ationedstay inay ethay oorwayday, inay earnestay ontemplationcay ofay ethay eatnessgray
eforebay imhay, anday onstantlycay owingbay eneverwhay Issmay Eday Ourghbay ookedlay atthay
ayway.

Atay engthlay erethay asway othingnay oremay otay ebay aidsay; ethay adieslay ovedray onay, anday
ethay othersay eturnedray intoay ethay ousehay. mray. Ollinscay onay oonersay awsay ethay otway
irlsgay anthay ehay eganbay otay ongratulatecay emthay onay eirthay oodgay ortunefay, ichwhay
Arlottechay explaineday byay ettinglay emthay owknay atthay ethay olewhay artypay asway askeday
otay ineday atay Osingsray ethay extnay ayday.




iLlustration[ay:

aDy‘lay Atherinecay, aidsay eshay, ouyay avehay ivengay emay aay easuretray.’

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IXxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ollins’scay iumphtray, inay onsequencecay ofay isthay invitationay, asway ompletecay.
Ethay owerpay ofay isplayingday ethay andeurgray ofay ishay atronesspay otay ishay onderingway
isitorsvay, anday ofay ettinglay emthay eesay erhay ivilitycay owardstay imselfhay anday ishay
ifeway, asway exactlyay atwhay ehay adhay ishedway orfay; anday atthay anay opportunityay ofay
oingday itay ouldshay ebay ivengay osay oonsay asway uchsay anay instanceay ofay Adylay
Atherine’scay ondescensioncay asay ehay ewknay otnay owhay otay admireay enoughay.

i“ay onfesscay,” aidsay ehay, at“thay Iay ouldshay otnay avehay eenbay atay allay urprisedsay byay
erhay Adyship’slay askingay usay onay Undaysay otay inkdray eatay anday endspay ethay eveningay
atay Osingsray. Iay atherray expecteday, omfray myay owledgeknay ofay erhay affabilityay, atthay
itay ouldway appenhay. Utbay owhay ouldcay avehay oreseenfay uchsay anay attentionay asay isthay?
Owhay ouldcay avehay imagineday atthay eway ouldshay eceiveray anay invitationay otay ineday
erethay an(ay invitationay, oreovermay, includingay ethay olewhay artypay) osay
immediatelyay afteray ouryay arrivalay?”

i“ay amay ethay esslay urprisedsay atay atwhay ashay appenedhay,” epliedray Irsay Illiamway,
om“fray atthay owledgeknay ofay atwhay ethay annersmay ofay ethay eatgray eallyray areay, ichwhay
myay ituationsay inay ifelay ashay alloweday emay otay acquireay. Aboutay ethay ourtcay, uchsay
instancesay ofay elegantay eedingbray areay otnay uncommonay.”

Arcelyscay anythingay asway alkedtay ofay ethay olewhay ayday oray extnay orningmay utbay eirthay
isitvay otay Osingsray. mray. Ollinscay asway arefullycay instructingay emthay inay atwhay
eythay ereway otay expectay, atthay ethay ightsay ofay uchsay oomsray, osay anymay ervantssay, anday
osay endidsplay aay innerday, ightmay otnay ollywhay overpoweray emthay.

Enwhay ethay adieslay ereway eparatingsay orfay ethay oilettetay, ehay aidsay otay
Elizabethay,--

o“day otnay akemay ourselfyay uneasyay, myay earday ousincay, aboutay ouryay apparelay. Adylay
Atherinecay isay arfay omfray equiringray atthay eleganceay ofay essdray inay usay ichwhay
ecomesbay erselfhay anday aughterday. Iay ouldway adviseay ouyay erelymay otay utpay onay
ateverwhay ofay ouryay othesclay isay uperiorsay otay ethay est--thereray isay onay occasionay
orfay anythingay oremay. Adylay Atherinecay illway otnay inkthay ethay orseway ofay ouyay orfay
eingbay implysay esseddray. Eshay ikeslay otay avehay ethay istinctionday ofay ankray
eservedpray.”

Ilewhay eythay ereway essingdray, ehay amecay otway oray eethray imestay otay eirthay ifferentday
oorsday, otay ecommendray eirthay eingbay uickqay, asay Adylay Atherinecay eryvay uchmay
objecteday otay ebay eptkay aitingway orfay erhay innerday. Uchsay ormidablefay accountsay ofay
erhay Adyshiplay, anday erhay annermay ofay ivinglay, uiteqay ightenedfray Ariamay Ucaslay,
owhay adhay eenbay ittlelay useday otay ompanycay; anday eshay ookedlay orwardfay otay erhay
introductionay atay Osingsray ithway asay uchmay apprehensionay asay erhay atherfay adhay oneday
otay ishay esentationpray atay stay. Ames’sjay.

Asay ethay eatherway asway inefay, eythay adhay aay easantplay alkway ofay aboutay alfhay aay ilemay
acrossay ethay arkpay. Everyay arkpay ashay itsay eautybay anday itsay ospectspray; anday
Elizabethay awsay uchmay otay ebay easedplay ithway, oughthay eshay ouldcay otnay ebay inay uchsay
apturesray asay mray. Ollinscay expecteday ethay enescay otay inspireay, anday asway utbay
ightlyslay affecteday byay ishay enumerationay ofay ethay indowsway inay ontfray ofay ethay
ousehay, anday ishay elationray ofay atwhay ethay azingglay altogetheray adhay originallyay
ostcay Irsay Ewislay eday Ourghbay.

Enwhay eythay ascendeday ethay epsstay otay ethay allhay, Aria’smay alarmay asway everyay omentmay
increasingay, anday evenay Irsay Illiamway idday otnay ooklay erfectlypay almcay.
Elizabeth’say ouragecay idday otnay ailfay erhay. Eshay adhay eardhay othingnay ofay Adylay
Atherinecay atthay okespay erhay awfulay omfray anyay extraordinaryay alentstay oray
iraculousmay irtuevay, anday ethay eremay atelinessstay ofay oneymay anday ankray eshay
oughtthay eshay ouldcay itnessway ithoutway epidationtray.

Omfray ethay entranceay allhay, ofay ichwhay mray. Ollinscay ointedpay outay, ithway aay
apturousray airay, ethay inefay oportionpray anday inishedfay ornamentsay, eythay ollowedfay
ethay ervantssay oughthray anay antechamberay otay ethay oomray erewhay Adylay Atherinecay,
erhay aughterday, anday mrsay. Enkinsonjay ereway ittingsay. Erhay Adyshiplay, ithway eatgray
ondescensioncay, aroseay otay eceiveray emthay; anday asay mrsay. Ollinscay adhay ettledsay itay
ithway erhay usbandhay atthay ethay officeay ofay introductionay ouldshay ebay ershay, itay asway
erformedpay inay aay operpray annermay, ithoutway anyay ofay osethay apologiesay anday anksthay
ichwhay ehay ouldway avehay oughtthay ecessarynay.

Inay itespay ofay avinghay eenbay atay stay. Ames’sjay, Irsay Illiamway asway osay ompletelycay
aweday byay ethay andeurgray urroundingsay imhay, atthay ehay adhay utbay ustjay ouragecay
enoughay otay akemay aay eryvay owlay owbay, anday aketay ishay eatsay ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway;
anday ishay aughterday, ightenedfray almostay outay ofay erhay ensessay, atsay onay ethay edgeay
ofay erhay airchay, otnay owingknay ichwhay ayway otay ooklay. Elizabethay oundfay erselfhay
uiteqay equalay otay ethay enescay, anday ouldcay observeay ethay eethray adieslay eforebay erhay
omposedlycay. Adylay Atherinecay asway aay alltay, argelay omanway, ithway ongly-markedstray
eaturesfay, ichwhay ightmay onceay avehay eenbay andsomehay. Erhay airay asway otnay
onciliatingcay, ornay asway erhay annermay ofay eceivingray emthay uchsay asay otay akemay erhay
isitorsvay orgetfay eirthay inferioray ankray. Eshay asway otnay enderedray ormidablefay byay
ilencesay: utbay ateverwhay eshay aidsay asway okenspay inay osay authoritativeay aay onetay asay
arkedmay erhay elf-importancesay, anday oughtbray mray. Ickhamway immediatelyay otay
Elizabeth’say indmay; anday, omfray ethay observationay ofay ethay ayday altogetheray, eshay
elievedbay Adylay Atherinecay otay ebay exactlyay atwhay ehay adhay epresentedray.

Enwhay, afteray examiningay ethay othermay, inay osewhay ountenancecay anday eportmentday
eshay oonsay oundfay omesay esemblanceray ofay mray. Arcyday, eshay urnedtay erhay eyesay onay ethay
aughterday, eshay ouldcay almostay avehay oinedjay inay Aria’smay astonishmentay atay erhay
eingbay osay inthay anday osay allsmay. Erethay asway eithernay inay igurefay ornay acefay anyay
ikenesslay etweenbay ethay adieslay. Issmay eday Ourghbay asway alepay anday icklysay: erhay
eaturesfay, oughthay otnay ainplay, ereway insignificantay; anday eshay okespay eryvay
ittlelay, exceptay inay aay owlay oicevay, otay mrsay. Enkinsonjay, inay osewhay appearanceay
erethay asway othingnay emarkableray, anday owhay asway entirelyay engageday inay isteninglay
otay atwhay eshay aidsay, anday acingplay aay eenscray inay ethay operpray irectionday eforebay
erhay eyesay.

Afteray ittingsay aay ewfay inutesmay, eythay ereway allay entsay otay oneay ofay ethay indowsway otay
admireay ethay iewvay, mray. Ollinscay attendingay emthay otay ointpay outay itsay eautiesbay,
anday Adylay Atherinecay indlykay informingay emthay atthay itay asway uchmay etterbay orthway
ookinglay atay inay ethay ummersay.

Ethay innerday asway exceedinglyay andsomehay, anday erethay ereway allay ethay ervantssay,
anday allay ethay articlesay ofay ateplay ichwhay mray. Ollinscay adhay omisedpray; anday, asay ehay
adhay ikewiselay oretoldfay, ehay ooktay ishay eatsay atay ethay ottombay ofay ethay abletay, byay
erhay Adyship’slay esireday, anday ookedlay asay ifay ehay eltfay atthay ifelay ouldcay urnishfay
othingnay eatergray. Ehay arvedcay anday ateay anday aisedpray ithway elightedday alacrityay;
anday everyay ishday asway ommendedcay irstfay byay imhay, anday enthay byay Irsay Illiamway, owhay
asway ownay enoughay ecoveredray otay echoay ateverwhay ishay on-in-lawsay aidsay, inay aay
annermay ichwhay Elizabethay onderedway Adylay Atherinecay ouldcay earbay. Utbay Adylay
Atherinecay eemedsay atifiedgray byay eirthay excessiveay admirationay, anday avegay ostmay
aciousgray ilessmay, especiallyay enwhay anyay ishday onay ethay abletay ovedpray aay oveltynay
otay emthay. Ethay artypay idday otnay upplysay uchmay onversationcay. Elizabethay asway eadyray
otay eakspay eneverwhay erethay asway anay openingay, utbay eshay asway eatedsay etweenbay
Arlottechay anday Issmay eday Ourgh--thebay ormerfay ofay omwhay asway engageday inay
isteninglay otay Adylay Atherinecay, anday ethay atterlay aidsay otnay aay ordway otay erhay allay
ethay innertimeday. mrsay. Enkinsonjay asway ieflychay employeday inay atchingway owhay
ittlelay Issmay eday Ourghbay ateay, essingpray erhay otay tryay omesay otheray ishday anday
earingfay eshay asway indisposeday. Ariamay oughtthay eakingspay outay ofay ethay uestionqay,
anday ethay entlemengay idday othingnay utbay eatay anday admireay.

Enwhay ethay adieslay eturnedray otay ethay awing-roomdray, erethay asway ittlelay otay ebay
oneday utbay otay earhay Adylay Atherinecay alktay, ichwhay eshay idday ithoutway anyay
intermissionay illtay offeecay amecay inay, eliveringday erhay opinionay onay everyay
ubjectsay inay osay ecisiveday aay annermay asay ovedpray atthay eshay asway otnay useday otay avehay
erhay udgmentjay ontrovertedcay. Eshay inquireday intoay Arlotte’schay omesticday
oncernscay amiliarlyfay anday inutelymay, anday avegay erhay aay eatgray ealday ofay adviceay asay
otay ethay anagementmay ofay emthay allay; oldtay erhay owhay everythingay oughtay otay ebay
egulatedray inay osay allsmay aay amilyfay asay ershay, anday instructeday erhay asay otay ethay
arecay ofay erhay owscay anday erhay oultrypay. Elizabethay oundfay atthay othingnay asway
eneathbay isthay eatgray ady’slay attentionay ichwhay ouldcay urnishfay erhay ithway anay
occasionay orfay ictatingday otay othersay. Inay ethay intervalsay ofay erhay iscourseday ithway
mrsay. Ollinscay, eshay addresseday aay arietyvay ofay uestionsqay otay Ariamay anday
Elizabethay, utbay especiallyay otay ethay atterlay, ofay osewhay onnectionscay eshay ewknay
ethay eastlay, anday owhay, eshay observeday otay mrsay. Ollinscay, asway aay eryvay enteelgay,
ettypray indkay ofay irlgay. Eshay askeday erhay atay ifferentday imestay owhay anymay isterssay
eshay adhay, etherwhay eythay ereway olderay oray oungeryay anthay erselfhay, etherwhay anyay ofay
emthay ereway ikelylay otay ebay arriedmay, etherwhay eythay ereway andsomehay, erewhay eythay
adhay eenbay educateday, atwhay arriagecay erhay atherfay eptkay, anday atwhay adhay eenbay erhay
other’smay aidenmay amenay? Elizabethay eltfay allay ethay impertinenceay ofay erhay
uestionsqay, utbay answereday emthay eryvay omposedlycay. Adylay Atherinecay enthay
observeday,--

oUr“yay ather’sfay estateay isay entaileday onay mray. Ollinscay, Iay inkthay? Orfay ouryay
akesay,” urningtay otay Arlottechay, i“ay amay adglay ofay itay; utbay otherwiseay Iay eesay onay
occasionay orfay entailingay estatesay omfray ethay emalefay inelay. Itay asway otnay oughtthay
ecessarynay inay Irsay Ewislay eday Ourgh’sbay amilyfay. Oday ouyay ayplay anday ingsay, Issmay
Ennetbay?”

a“ay ittlelay.”

oH“ay en--somethay imetay oray otheray eway allshay ebay appyhay otay earhay ouyay. Ouray
instrumentay isay aay apitalcay oneay, obablypray uperiorsay otay ay---- ouyay allshay tryay itay
omesay ayday. Oday ouryay isterssay ayplay anday ingsay?”

oNe“ay ofay emthay oesday.”

“whyay idday otnay ouyay allay earnlay? Ouyay oughtay allay otay avehay earnedlay. Ethay Issmay
Ebbsway allay ayplay, anday eirthay atherfay ashay otnay osay oodgay anay incomeay asay oursyay. Oday
ouyay awdray?”

o“nay, otnay atay allay.”

aT“whay, onenay ofay ouyay?”

oT“nay oneay.”

aT“thay isay eryvay angestray. Utbay Iay upposesay ouyay adhay onay opportunityay. Ouryay othermay
ouldshay avehay akentay ouyay otay owntay everyay ingspray orfay ethay enefitbay ofay astersmay.”

“myay othermay ouldway avehay onay objectionay, utbay myay atherfay ateshay Ondonlay.”

aS“hay ouryay overnessgay eftlay ouyay?”

e“way evernay adhay anyay overnessgay.”

o“nay overnessgay! Owhay asway atthay ossiblepay? Ivefay aughtersday oughtbray upay atay omehay
ithoutway aay overnessgay! Iay evernay eardhay ofay uchsay aay ingthay. Ouryay othermay ustmay
avehay eenbay uiteqay aay aveslay otay ouryay educationay.”

Elizabethay ouldcay ardlyhay elphay ilingsmay, asay eshay assureday erhay atthay adhay otnay
eenbay ethay asecay.

eN“thay owhay aughttay ouyay? owhay attendeday otay ouyay? Ithoutway aay overnessgay, ouyay ustmay
avehay eenbay eglectednay.”

oMpared“cay ithway omesay amiliesfay, Iay elievebay eway ereway; utbay uchsay ofay usay asay
ishedway otay earnlay evernay antedway ethay eansmay. Eway ereway alwaysay encourageday otay
eadray, anday adhay allay ethay astersmay atthay ereway ecessarynay. Osethay owhay osechay otay ebay
idleay ertainlycay ightmay.”

aY“ay, onay oubtday: utbay atthay isay atwhay aay overnessgay illway eventpray; anday ifay Iay adhay
ownknay ouryay othermay, Iay ouldshay avehay adviseday erhay ostmay enuouslystray otay engageay
oneay. Iay alwaysay aysay atthay othingnay isay otay ebay oneday inay educationay ithoutway eadystay
anday egularray instructionay, anday obodynay utbay aay overnessgay ancay ivegay itay. Itay isay
onderfulway owhay anymay amiliesfay Iay avehay eenbay ethay eansmay ofay upplyingsay inay atthay
ayway. Iay amay alwaysay adglay otay etgay aay oungyay ersonpay ellway acedplay outay. Ourfay iecesnay
ofay mrsay. Enkinsonjay areay ostmay elightfullyday ituatedsay oughthray myay eansmay; anday
itay asway utbay ethay otheray ayday atthay Iay ecommendedray anotheray oungyay ersonpay, owhay
asway erelymay accidentallyay entionedmay otay emay, anday ethay amilyfay areay uiteqay
elightedday ithway erhay. mrsay. Ollinscay, idday Iay elltay ouyay ofay Adylay Etcalfe’smay
allingcay esterdayyay otay ankthay emay? Eshay indsfay Issmay Opepay aay easuretray. aDy‘lay
Atherinecay,’ aidsay eshay, ou‘yay avehay ivengay emay aay easuretray.’ Areay anyay ofay ouryay
oungeryay isterssay outay, Issmay Ennetbay?”

eS“yay, a’ammay, allay.”

aLl“ay! Atwhay, allay ivefay outay atay onceay? Eryvay odday! Anday ouyay onlyay ethay econdsay. Ethay
oungeryay onesay outay eforebay ethay elderay areay arriedmay! Ouryay oungeryay isterssay ustmay
ebay eryvay oungyay?”

eS“yay, myay oungestyay isay otnay ixteensay. Erhapspay e_shay_ isay ullfay oungyay otay ebay uchmay
inay ompanycay. Utbay eallyray, a’ammay, Iay inkthay itay ouldway ebay eryvay ardhay uponay
oungeryay isterssay atthay eythay ouldshay otnay avehay eirthay areshay ofay ocietysay anday
amusementay, ecausebay ethay elderay aymay otnay avehay ethay eansmay oray inclinationay otay
arrymay earlyay. Ethay astlay ornbay ashay asay oodgay aay ightray otay ethay easuresplay ofay outhyay
asay ethay irstfay. Anday otay ebay eptkay ackbay onay uch_say_ aay otivemay! Iay inkthay itay ouldway
otnay ebay eryvay ikelylay otay omotepray isterlysay affectionay oray elicacyday ofay indmay.”

uPon“ay myay ordway,” aidsay erhay Adyshiplay, ou“yay ivegay ouryay opinionay eryvay ecidedlyday
orfay osay oungyay aay ersonpay. Aypray, atwhay isay ouryay ageay?”

iTh“way eethray oungeryay isterssay owngray upay,” epliedray Elizabethay, ilingsmay, our“yay
Adyshiplay ancay ardlyhay expectay emay otay ownay itay.”

Adylay Atherinecay eemedsay uiteqay astonisheday atay otnay eceivingray aay irectday answeray;
anday Elizabethay uspectedsay erselfhay otay ebay ethay irstfay eaturecray owhay adhay everay
aredday otay ifletray ithway osay uchmay ignifiedday impertinenceay.

oU“yay annotcay ebay oremay anthay entytway, Iay amay ure,--thereforesay ouyay eednay otnay
oncealcay ouryay ageay.”

i“ay amay otnay one-and-twentyay.”

Enwhay ethay entlemengay adhay oinedjay emthay, anday eatay asway overay, ethay ardcay ablestay
ereway acedplay. Adylay Atherinecay, Irsay Illiamway, anday mray. anday mrsay. Ollinscay atsay
ownday otay uadrilleqay; anday asay Issmay Eday Ourghbay osechay otay ayplay atay assinocay, ethay
otway irlsgay adhay ethay onourhay ofay assistingay mrsay. Enkinsonjay otay akemay upay erhay
artypay. Eirthay abletay asway uperlativelysay upidstay. Arcelyscay aay ablesyllay asway
uttereday atthay idday otnay elateray otay ethay amegay, exceptay enwhay mrsay. Enkinsonjay
expresseday erhay earsfay ofay Issmay Eday Ourgh’sbay eingbay ootay othay oray ootay oldcay, oray
avinghay ootay uchmay oray ootay ittlelay ightlay. Aay eatgray ealday oremay assedpay atay ethay
otheray abletay. Adylay Atherinecay asway enerallygay eaking--statingspay ethay istakesmay
ofay ethay eethray othersay, oray elatingray omesay anecdoteay ofay erselfhay. mray. Ollinscay
asway employeday inay agreeingay otay everythingay erhay Adyshiplay aidsay, ankingthay erhay
orfay everyay ishfay ehay onway, anday apologizingay ifay ehay oughtthay ehay onway ootay anymay.
Irsay Illiamway idday otnay aysay uchmay. Ehay asway oringstay ishay emorymay ithway anecdotesay
anday oblenay amesnay.

Enwhay Adylay Atherinecay anday erhay aughterday adhay ayedplay asay onglay asay eythay osechay,
ethay ablestay ereway okenbray upay, ethay arriagecay asway offereday otay mrsay. Ollinscay,
atefullygray accepteday, anday immediatelyay ordereday. Ethay artypay enthay atheredgay
oundray ethay irefay otay earhay Adylay Atherinecay etermineday atwhay eatherway eythay ereway
otay avehay onay ethay orrowmay. Omfray esethay instructionsay eythay ereway ummonedsay byay ethay
arrivalay ofay ethay oachcay; anday ithway anymay eechesspay ofay ankfulnessthay onay mray.
Ollins’scay idesay, anday asay anymay owsbay onay Irsay Illiam’sway, eythay epartedday. Asay
oonsay asay eythay adhay ivendray omfray ethay oorday, Elizabethay asway alledcay onay byay erhay
ousincay otay ivegay erhay opinionay ofay allay atthay eshay adhay eensay atay Osingsray, ichwhay,
orfay Arlotte’schay akesay, eshay ademay oremay avourablefay anthay itay eallyray asway. Utbay
erhay ommendationcay, oughthay ostingcay erhay omesay oubletray, ouldcay byay onay eansmay
atisfysay mray. Ollinscay, anday ehay asway eryvay oonsay obligeday otay aketay erhay Adyship’slay
aisepray intoay ishay ownay andshay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay xxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Irsay Illiamway ayedstay onlyay aay eekway atay Unsfordhay; utbay ishay isitvay asway onglay
enoughay otay onvincecay imhay ofay ishay aughter’sday eingbay ostmay omfortablycay ettledsay,
anday ofay erhay ossessingpay uchsay aay usbandhay anday uchsay aay eighbournay asay ereway otnay
oftenay etmay ithway. Ilewhay Irsay Illiamway asway ithway emthay, mray. Ollinscay evotedday ishay
orningsmay otay ivingdray imhay outay inay ishay iggay, anday owingshay imhay ethay ountrycay: utbay
enwhay ehay entway awayay, ethay olewhay amilyfay eturnedray otay eirthay usualay employmentsay,
anday Elizabethay asway ankfulthay otay indfay atthay eythay idday otnay eesay oremay ofay erhay
ousincay byay ethay alterationay; orfay ethay iefchay ofay ethay imetay etweenbay eakfastbray
anday innerday asway ownay assedpay byay imhay eitheray atay orkway inay ethay ardengay, oray inay
eadingray anday itingwray, anday ookinglay outay ofay indowway inay ishay ownay ookbay oomray,
ichwhay ontedfray ethay oadray. Ethay oomray inay ichwhay ethay adieslay atsay asway ackwardsbay.
Elizabethay atay irstfay adhay atherray onderedway atthay Arlottechay ouldshay otnay eferpray
ethay iningday arlourpay orfay ommoncay useay; itay asway aay etterbay izedsay oomray, anday adhay aay
easanterplay aspectay: utbay eshay oonsay awsay atthay erhay iendfray adhay anay excellentay
easonray orfay atwhay eshay idday, orfay mray. Ollinscay ouldway undoubtedlyay avehay eenbay
uchmay esslay inay ishay ownay apartmentay adhay eythay atsay inay oneay equallyay ivelylay; anday
eshay avegay Arlottechay editcray orfay ethay arrangementay.

Omfray ethay awing-roomdray eythay ouldcay istinguishday othingnay inay ethay anelay, anday
ereway indebteday otay mray. Ollinscay orfay ethay owledgeknay ofay atwhay arriagescay entway
alongay, anday owhay oftenay especiallyay Issmay Eday Ourghbay ovedray byay inay erhay aetonphay,
ichwhay ehay evernay ailedfay omingcay otay informay emthay ofay, oughthay itay appenedhay
almostay everyay ayday. Eshay otnay unfrequentlyay oppedstay atay ethay Arsonagepay, anday adhay
aay ewfay inutesmay’ onversationcay ithway Arlottechay, utbay asway arcelyscay everay
evailedpray onay otay etgay outay.

Eryvay ewfay aysday assedpay inay ichwhay mray. Ollinscay idday otnay alkway otay Osingsray, anday
otnay anymay inay ichwhay ishay ifeway idday otnay inkthay itay ecessarynay otay ogay ikewiselay;
anday illtay Elizabethay ecollectedray atthay erethay ightmay ebay otheray amilyfay ivingslay
otay ebay isposedday ofay, eshay ouldcay otnay understanday ethay acrificesay ofay osay anymay
ourshay. Ownay anday enthay eythay ereway onouredhay ithway aay allcay omfray erhay Adyshiplay,
anday othingnay escapeday erhay observationay atthay asway assingpay inay ethay oomray uringday
esethay isitsvay. Eshay examineday intoay eirthay employmentsay, ookedlay atay eirthay orkway,
anday adviseday emthay otay oday itay ifferentlyday; oundfay aultfay ithway ethay arrangementay
ofay ethay urniturefay, oray etectedday ethay ousemaidhay inay egligencenay; anday ifay eshay
accepteday anyay efreshmentray, eemedsay otay oday itay onlyay orfay ethay akesay ofay indingfay
outay atthay mrsay. Ollins’scay ointsjay ofay eatmay ereway ootay argelay orfay erhay amilyfay.

Elizabethay oonsay erceivedpay, atthay oughthay isthay eatgray adylay asway otnay inay ethay
ommissioncay ofay ethay eacepay orfay ethay ountycay, eshay asway aay ostmay activeay agistratemay
inay erhay ownay arishpay, ethay inutestmay oncernscay ofay ichwhay ereway arriedcay otay erhay byay
mray. Ollinscay; anday eneverwhay anyay ofay ethay ottagerscay ereway isposedday otay ebay
uarrelsomeqay, iscontentedday, oray ootay oorpay, eshay alliedsay orthfay intoay ethay
illagevay otay ettlesay eirthay ifferencesday, ilencesay eirthay omplaintscay, anday oldscay
emthay intoay armonyhay anday entyplay.

iLlustration[ay:

e“hay evernay ailedfay otay informay emthay”
ay]

Ethay entertainmentay ofay iningday atay Osingsray asway epeatedray aboutay icetway aay eekway;
anday, allowingay orfay ethay osslay ofay Irsay Illiamway, anday erethay eingbay onlyay oneay
ard-tablecay inay ethay eveningay, everyay uchsay entertainmentay asway ethay ounterpartcay
ofay ethay irstfay. Eirthay otheray engagementsay ereway ewfay, asay ethay estylay ofay ivinglay
ofay ethay eighbourhoodnay inay eneralgay asway eyondbay ethay Ollinsescay’ eachray. Isthay,
oweverhay, asway onay evilay otay Elizabethay, anday uponay ethay olewhay eshay entspay erhay imetay
omfortablycay enoughay: erethay ereway alfhay ourshay ofay easantplay onversationcay ithway
Arlottechay, anday ethay eatherway asway osay inefay orfay ethay imetay ofay earyay, atthay eshay
adhay oftenay eatgray enjoymentay outay ofay oorsday. Erhay avouritefay alkway, anday erewhay
eshay equentlyfray entway ilewhay ethay othersay ereway allingcay onay Adylay Atherinecay, asway
alongay ethay openay ovegray ichwhay edgeday atthay idesay ofay ethay arkpay, erewhay erethay asway
aay icenay elteredshay athpay, ichwhay onay oneay eemedsay otay aluevay utbay erselfhay, anday
erewhay eshay eltfay eyondbay ethay eachray ofay Adylay Atherine’scay uriositycay.

Inay isthay uietqay ayway ethay irstfay ortnightfay ofay erhay isitvay oonsay assedpay awayay.
Easteray asway approachingay, anday ethay eekway ecedingpray itay asway otay ingbray anay
additionay otay ethay amilyfay atay Osingsray, ichwhay inay osay allsmay aay irclecay ustmay ebay
importantay. Elizabethay adhay eardhay, oonsay afteray erhay arrivalay, atthay mray. Arcyday
asway expecteday erethay inay ethay oursecay ofay aay ewfay eeksway; anday oughthay erethay ereway
otnay anymay ofay erhay acquaintanceay omwhay eshay idday otnay eferpray, ishay omingcay ouldway
urnishfay oneay omparativelycay ewnay otay ooklay atay inay eirthay Osingsray artiespay, anday
eshay ightmay ebay amuseday inay eeingsay owhay opelesshay Issmay Ingley’sbay esignsday onay imhay
ereway, byay ishay ehaviourbay otay ishay ousincay, orfay omwhay ehay asway evidentlyay estinedday
byay Adylay Atherinecay, owhay alkedtay ofay ishay omingcay ithway ethay eatestgray
atisfactionsay, okespay ofay imhay inay ermstay ofay ethay ighesthay admirationay, anday
eemedsay almostay angryay otay indfay atthay ehay adhay alreadyay eenbay equentlyfray eensay byay
Issmay Ucaslay anday erselfhay.

Ishay arrivalay asway oonsay ownknay atay ethay Arsonagepay; orfay mray. Ollinscay asway alkingway
ethay olewhay orningmay ithinway iewvay ofay ethay odgeslay openingay intoay Unsfordhay Anelay,
inay orderay otay avehay

iLlustration[ay:

e“thay entlemengay accompanieday imhay.”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

ethay earliestay assuranceay ofay itay; anday, afteray akingmay ishay owbay asay ethay arriagecay
urnedtay intoay ethay arkpay, urriedhay omehay ithway ethay eatgray intelligenceay. Onay ethay
ollowingfay orningmay ehay astenedhay otay Osingsray otay aypay ishay espectsray. Erethay ereway
otway ephewsnay ofay Adylay Atherinecay otay equireray emthay, orfay mray. Arcyday adhay oughtbray
ithway imhay aay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay, ethay oungeryay onsay ofay ishay uncleay, Ordlay ay----;
anday, otay ethay eatgray urprisesay ofay allay ethay artypay, enwhay mray. Ollinscay eturnedray,
ethay entlemengay accompanieday imhay. Arlottechay adhay eensay emthay omfray erhay
usband’shay oomray, ossingcray ethay oadray, anday immediatelyay unningray intoay ethay
otheray, oldtay ethay irlsgay atwhay anay onourhay eythay ightmay expectay, addingay,--

i“ay aymay ankthay ouyay, Elizaay, orfay isthay iecepay ofay ivilitycay. mray. Arcyday ouldway
evernay avehay omecay osay oonsay otay aitway uponay emay.”

Elizabethay adhay arcelyscay imetay otay isclaimday allay ightray otay ethay omplimentcay
eforebay eirthay approachay asway announceday byay ethay oor-bellday, anday ortlyshay
afterwardsay ethay eethray entlemengay entereday ethay oomray. Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay,
owhay edlay ethay ayway, asway aboutay irtythay, otnay andsomehay, utbay inay ersonpay anday
addressay ostmay ulytray ethay entlemangay. mray. Arcyday ookedlay ustjay asay ehay adhay eenbay
useday otay ooklay inay Ertfordshirehay, aidpay ishay omplimentscay, ithway ishay usualay
eserveray, otay mrsay. Ollinscay; anday ateverwhay ightmay ebay ishay eelingsfay owardstay erhay
iendfray, etmay erhay ithway everyay appearanceay ofay omposurecay. Elizabethay erelymay
ourtesiedcay otay imhay, ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway.

Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay entereday intoay onversationcay irectlyday, ithway ethay
eadinessray anday easeay ofay aay ell-bredway anmay, anday alkedtay eryvay easantlyplay; utbay
ishay ousincay, afteray avinghay addresseday aay ightslay observationay onay ethay ousehay anday
ardengay otay mrsay. Ollinscay, atsay orfay omesay imetay ithoutway eakingspay otay anybodyay.
Atay engthlay, oweverhay, ishay ivilitycay asway osay arfay awakeneday asay otay inquireay ofay
Elizabethay afteray ethay ealthhay ofay erhay amilyfay. Eshay answereday imhay inay ethay usualay
ayway; anday, afteray aay oment’smay ausepay, addeday,--

“myay eldestay istersay ashay eenbay inay owntay esethay eethray onthsmay. Avehay ouyay evernay
appenedhay otay eesay erhay erethay?”

Eshay asway erfectlypay ensiblesay atthay ehay evernay adhay: utbay eshay ishedway otay eesay
etherwhay ehay ouldway etraybay anyay onsciousnesscay ofay atwhay adhay assedpay etweenbay ethay
Ingleysbay anday Anejay; anday eshay oughtthay ehay ookedlay aay ittlelay onfusedcay asay ehay
answereday atthay ehay adhay evernay eenbay osay ortunatefay asay otay eetmay Issmay Ennetbay. Ethay
ubjectsay asway ursuedpay onay urtherfay, anday ethay entlemengay oonsay afterwardsay entway
awayay.




iLlustration[ay:

aT“ay Urchchay”
ay]




APTERchay Ixxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Olonelcay Itzwilliam’sfay annersmay ereway eryvay uchmay admireday atay ethay Arsonagepay,
anday ethay adieslay allay eltfay atthay ehay ustmay adday onsiderablycay otay ethay easureplay ofay
eirthay engagementsay atay Osingsray. Itay asway omesay aysday, oweverhay, eforebay eythay
eceivedray anyay invitationay itherthay, orfay ilewhay erethay ereway isitorsvay inay ethay
ousehay eythay ouldcay otnay ebay ecessarynay; anday itay asway otnay illtay Easter-dayay,
almostay aay eekway afteray ethay entlemen’sgay arrivalay, atthay eythay ereway onouredhay byay
uchsay anay attentionay, anday enthay eythay ereway erelymay askeday onay eavinglay urchchay otay
omecay erethay inay ethay eveningay. Orfay ethay astlay eekway eythay adhay eensay eryvay ittlelay
ofay eitheray Adylay Atherinecay oray erhay aughterday. Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay adhay alledcay
atay ethay Arsonagepay oremay anthay onceay uringday ethay imetay, utbay mray. Arcyday eythay adhay
onlyay eensay atay urchchay.

Ethay invitationay asway accepteday, ofay oursecay, anday atay aay operpray ourhay eythay oinedjay
ethay artypay inay Adylay Atherine’scay awing-roomdray. Erhay Adyshiplay eceivedray emthay
ivillycay, utbay itay asway ainplay atthay eirthay ompanycay asway byay onay eansmay osay
acceptableay asay enwhay eshay ouldcay etgay obodynay elseay; anday eshay asway, inay actfay,
almostay engrosseday byay erhay ephewsnay, eakingspay otay emthay, especiallyay otay Arcyday,
uchmay oremay anthay otay anyay otheray ersonpay inay ethay oomray.

Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay eemedsay eallyray adglay otay eesay emthay: anythingay asway aay
elcomeway eliefray otay imhay atay Osingsray; anday mrsay. Ollins’scay ettypray iendfray adhay,
oreovermay, aughtcay ishay ancyfay eryvay uchmay. Ehay ownay eatedsay imselfhay byay erhay, anday
alkedtay osay agreeablyay ofay Entkay anday Ertfordshirehay, ofay avellingtray anday ayingstay
atay omehay, ofay ewnay ooksbay anday usicmay, atthay Elizabethay adhay evernay eenbay alfhay osay
ellway entertaineday inay atthay oomray eforebay; anday eythay onversedcay ithway osay uchmay
iritspay anday owflay asay otay awdray ethay attentionay ofay Adylay Atherinecay erselfhay, asay
ellway asay ofay mray. Arcyday. iS_hay_ eyesay adhay eenbay oonsay anday epeatedlyray urnedtay
owardstay emthay ithway aay ooklay ofay uriositycay; anday atthay erhay Adyshiplay, afteray aay
ilewhay, aredshay ethay eelingfay, asway oremay openlyay acknowledgeday, orfay eshay idday otnay
uplescray otay allcay outay,--

aT“whay isay atthay ouyay areay ayingsay, Itzwilliamfay? Atwhay isay itay ouyay areay alkingtay
ofay? Atwhay areay ouyay ellingtay Issmay Ennetbay? Etlay emay earhay atwhay itay isay.”

e“way ereway alkingtay ofay usicmay, adammay,” aidsay ehay, enwhay onay ongerlay ableay otay avoiday
aay eplyray.

oF“ay usicmay! Enthay aypray eakspay alouday. Itay isay ofay allay ubjectssay myay elightday. Iay
ustmay avehay myay areshay inay ethay onversationcay, ifay ouyay areay eakingspay ofay usicmay.
Erethay areay ewfay eoplepay inay Englanday, Iay upposesay, owhay avehay oremay uetray
enjoymentay ofay usicmay anthay elfmysay, oray aay etterbay aturalnay astetay. Ifay Iay adhay everay
earntlay, Iay ouldshay avehay eenbay aay eatgray oficientpray. Anday osay ouldway Anneay, ifay erhay
ealthhay adhay alloweday erhay otay applyay. Iay amay onfidentcay atthay eshay ouldway avehay
erformedpay elightfullyday. Owhay oesday Eorgianagay etgay onay, Arcyday?”

mray. Arcyday okespay ithway affectionateay aisepray ofay ishay ister’ssay oficiencypray.

i“ay amay eryvay adglay otay earhay uchsay aay oodgay accountay ofay erhay,” aidsay Adylay
Atherinecay; and“ay aypray elltay erhay omfray emay, atthay eshay annotcay expectay otay excelay,
ifay eshay oesday otnay actisepray aay eatgray ealday.”

i“ay assureay ouyay, adammay,” ehay epliedray, at“thay eshay oesday otnay eednay uchsay adviceay.
Eshay actisespray eryvay onstantlycay.”

o“say uchmay ethay etterbay. Itay annotcay ebay oneday ootay uchmay; anday enwhay Iay extnay itewray
otay erhay, Iay allshay argechay erhay otnay otay eglectnay itay onay anyay accountay. Iay oftenay
elltay oungyay adieslay, atthay onay excellenceay inay usicmay isay otay ebay acquireday ithoutway
onstantcay acticepray. Iay avehay oldtay Issmay Ennetbay everalsay imestay, atthay eshay illway
evernay ayplay eallyray ellway, unlessay eshay actisespray oremay; anday oughthay mrsay.
Ollinscay ashay onay instrumentay, eshay isay eryvay elcomeway, asay Iay avehay oftenay oldtay
erhay, otay omecay otay Osingsray everyay ayday, anday ayplay onay ethay ianofortepay inay mrsay.
Enkinson’sjay oomray. Eshay ouldway ebay inay obody’snay ayway, ouyay owknay, inay atthay artpay
ofay ethay ousehay.”

mray. Arcyday ookedlay aay ittlelay ashameday ofay ishay aunt’say ill-breedingay, anday ademay
onay answeray.

Enwhay offeecay asway overay, Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay emindedray Elizabethay ofay avinghay
omisedpray otay ayplay otay imhay; anday eshay atsay ownday irectlyday otay ethay instrumentay. Ehay
ewdray aay airchay earnay erhay. Adylay Atherinecay istenedlay otay alfhay aay ongsay, anday enthay
alkedtay, asay eforebay, otay erhay otheray ephewnay; illtay ethay atterlay alkedway awayay omfray
erhay, anday ovingmay ithway ishay usualay eliberationday owardstay ethay ianofortepay,
ationedstay imselfhay osay asay otay ommandcay aay ullfay iewvay ofay ethay airfay erformer’spay
ountenancecay. Elizabethay awsay atwhay ehay asway oingday, anday atay ethay irstfay
onvenientcay ausepay urnedtay otay imhay ithway anay archay ilesmay, anday aidsay,--

oU“yay eanmay otay ightenfray emay, mray. Arcyday, byay omingcay inay allay isthay atestay otay earhay
emay. Utbay Iay illway otnay ebay alarmeday, oughthay ouryay istersay oes_day_ ayplay osay ellway.
Erethay isay aay ubbornnessstay aboutay emay atthay evernay ancay earbay otay ebay ightenedfray atay
ethay illway ofay othersay. myay ouragecay alwaysay isesray ithway everyay attemptay otay
intimidateay emay.”

i“ay allshay otnay aysay atthay ouyay areay istakenmay,” ehay epliedray, ecause“bay ouyay ouldcay
otnay eallyray elievebay emay otay entertainay anyay esignday ofay alarmingay ouyay; anday Iay
avehay adhay ethay easureplay ofay ouryay acquaintanceay onglay enoughay otay owknay, atthay ouyay
indfay eatgray enjoymentay inay occasionallyay ofessingpray opinionsay ichwhay, inay actfay,
areay otnay ouryay ownay.”

Elizabethay aughedlay eartilyhay atay isthay icturepay ofay erselfhay, anday aidsay otay
Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay, oUr“yay ousincay illway ivegay ouyay aay eryvay ettypray otionnay ofay
emay, anday eachtay ouyay otnay otay elievebay aay ordway Iay aysay. Iay amay articularlypay unluckyay
inay eetingmay ithway aay ersonpay osay ellway ableay otay exposeay myay ealray aracterchay, inay aay
artpay ofay ethay orldway erewhay Iay adhay opedhay otay asspay elfmysay offay ithway omesay egreeday
ofay editcray. Indeeday, mray. Arcyday, itay isay eryvay ungenerousay inay ouyay otay entionmay
allay atthay ouyay ewknay otay myay isadvantageday inay Ertfordshire--andhay, ivegay emay
eavelay otay aysay, eryvay impoliticay oo--fortay itay isay ovokingpray emay otay etaliateray,
anday uchsay ingsthay aymay omecay outay asay illway ockshay ouryay elationsray otay earhay.”

i“ay amay otnay afraiday ofay ouyay,” aidsay ehay, ilinglysmay.

aY“pray etlay emay earhay atwhay ouyay avehay otay accuseay imhay ofay,” iedcray Olonelcay
Itzwilliamfay. i“ay ouldshay ikelay otay owknay owhay ehay ehavesbay amongay angersstray.”

oU“yay allshay earhay, en--butthay eparepray orfay omethingsay eryvay eadfuldray. Ethay
irstfay imetay ofay myay everay eeingsay imhay inay Ertfordshirehay, ouyay ustmay owknay, asway atay
aay all--andbay atay isthay allbay, atwhay oday ouyay inkthay ehay idday? Ehay ancedday onlyay ourfay
ancesday! Iay amay orrysay otay ainpay ouyay, utbay osay itay asway. Ehay ancedday onlyay ourfay
ancesday, oughthay entlemengay ereway arcescay; anday, otay myay ertaincay owledgeknay, oremay
anthay oneay oungyay adylay asway ittingsay ownday inay antway ofay aay artnerpay. mray. Arcyday,
ouyay annotcay enyday ethay actfay.”

i“ay adhay otnay atay atthay imetay ethay onourhay ofay owingknay anyay adylay inay ethay assemblyay
eyondbay myay ownay artypay.”

uE“tray; anday obodynay ancay everay ebay introduceday inay aay all-roombay. Ellway, Olonelcay
Itzwilliamfay, atwhay oday Iay ayplay extnay? myay ingersfay aitway ouryay ordersay.”

eRhaps“pay,” aidsay Arcyday, i“ay ouldshay avehay udgedjay etterbay adhay Iay oughtsay anay
introductionay, utbay Iay amay ill-qualifieday otay ecommendray elfmysay otay angersstray.”

aLl“shay eway askay ouryay ousincay ethay easonray ofay isthay?” aidsay Elizabethay, illstay
addressingay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay. aLl“shay eway askay imhay whyay aay anmay ofay ensesay anday
educationay, anday owhay ashay ivedlay inay ethay orldway, isay ill-qualifieday otay ecommendray
imselfhay otay angersstray?”

i“ay ancay answeray ouryay uestionqay,” aidsay Itzwilliamfay, ithout“way applyingay otay
imhay. Itay isay ecausebay ehay illway otnay ivegay imselfhay ethay oubletray.”

i“ay ertainlycay avehay otnay ethay alenttay ichwhay omesay eoplepay ossesspay,” aidsay Arcyday,
of“ay onversingcay easilyay ithway osethay Iay avehay evernay eensay eforebay. Iay annotcay
atchcay eirthay onetay ofay onversationcay, oray appearay interesteday inay eirthay
oncernscay, asay Iay oftenay eesay oneday.”

“myay ingersfay,” aidsay Elizabethay, o“day otnay ovemay overay isthay instrumentay inay ethay
asterlymay annermay ichwhay Iay eesay osay anymay omen’sway oday. Eythay avehay otnay ethay amesay
orcefay oray apidityray, anday oday otnay oducepray ethay amesay expressionay. Utbay enthay Iay
avehay alwaysay upposedsay itay otay ebay myay ownay ault--becausefay Iay ouldway otnay aketay
ethay oubletray ofay actisingpray. Itay isay otnay atthay Iay oday otnay elievebay _myay_ ingersfay
asay apablecay asay anyay otheray oman’sway ofay uperiorsay executionay.”

Arcyday iledsmay anday aidsay, oU“yay areay erfectlypay ightray. Ouyay avehay employeday ouryay
imetay uchmay etterbay. Onay oneay admitteday otay ethay ivilegepray ofay earinghay ouyay ancay
inkthay anythingay antingway. Eway eithernay ofay usay erformpay otay angersstray.”

Erehay eythay ereway interrupteday byay Adylay Atherinecay, owhay alledcay outay otay owknay
atwhay eythay ereway alkingtay ofay. Elizabethay immediatelyay eganbay ayingplay againay.
Adylay Atherinecay approacheday, anday, afteray isteninglay orfay aay ewfay inutesmay, aidsay
otay Arcyday,--

iSs“may Ennetbay ouldway otnay ayplay atay allay amissay ifay eshay actisedpray oremay, anday
ouldcay avehay ethay advantageay ofay aay Ondonlay astermay. Eshay ashay aay eryvay oodgay otionnay
ofay ingeringfay, oughthay erhay astetay isay otnay equalay otay Anne’say. Anneay ouldway avehay
eenbay aay elightfulday erformerpay, adhay erhay ealthhay alloweday erhay otay earnlay.”

Elizabethay ookedlay atay Arcyday, otay eesay owhay ordiallycay ehay assenteday otay ishay
ousin’scay aisepray: utbay eithernay atay atthay omentmay ornay atay anyay otheray ouldcay eshay
iscernday anyay omsymptay ofay ovelay; anday omfray ethay olewhay ofay ishay ehaviourbay otay Issmay
Eday Ourghbay eshay erivedday isthay omfortcay orfay Issmay Ingleybay, atthay ehay ightmay avehay
eenbay ustjay asay ikelylay otay arrymay er_hay_, adhay eshay eenbay ishay elationray.

Adylay Atherinecay ontinuedcay erhay emarksray onay Elizabeth’say erformancepay, ixingmay
ithway emthay anymay instructionsay onay executionay anday astetay. Elizabethay eceivedray
emthay ithway allay ethay orbearancefay ofay ivilitycay; anday atay ethay equestray ofay ethay
entlemengay emainedray atay ethay instrumentay illtay erhay Adyship’slay arriagecay asway
eadyray otay aketay emthay allay omehay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IIxxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay asway ittingsay byay erselfhay ethay extnay orningmay, anday itingwray otay Anejay,
ilewhay mrsay. Ollinscay anday Ariamay ereway onegay onay usinessbay intoay ethay illagevay,
enwhay eshay asway artledstay byay aay ingray atay ethay oorday, ethay ertaincay ignalsay ofay aay
isitorvay. Asay eshay adhay eardhay onay arriagecay, eshay oughtthay itay otnay unlikelyay otay ebay
Adylay Atherinecay; anday underay atthay apprehensionay asway uttingpay awayay erhay
alf-finishedhay etterlay, atthay eshay ightmay escapeay allay impertinentay uestionsqay,
enwhay ethay oorday openeday, anday otay erhay eryvay eatgray urprisesay mray. Arcyday, anday mray.
Arcyday onlyay, entereday ethay oomray.

Ehay eemedsay astonisheday ootay onay indingfay erhay aloneay, anday apologizeday orfay ishay
intrusionay, byay ettinglay erhay owknay atthay ehay adhay understooday allay ethay adieslay otay
ebay ithinway.

Eythay enthay atsay ownday, anday enwhay erhay inquiriesay afteray Osingsray ereway ademay,
eemedsay inay angerday ofay inkingsay intoay otaltay ilencesay. Itay asway absolutelyay
ecessarynay, ereforethay, otay inkthay ofay omethingsay; anday inay isthay emergencyay
ecollectingray en_whay_ eshay adhay eensay imhay astlay inay Ertfordshirehay, anday eelingfay
uriouscay otay owknay atwhay ehay ouldway aysay onay ethay ubjectsay ofay eirthay astyhay
epartureday, eshay observeday,--

oW“hay eryvay uddenlysay ouyay allay uittedqay Etherfieldnay astlay Ovembernay, mray. Arcyday!
Itay ustmay avehay eenbay aay ostmay agreeableay urprisesay otay mray. Ingleybay otay eesay ouyay
allay afteray imhay osay oonsay; orfay, ifay Iay ecollectray ightray, ehay entway utbay ethay ayday
eforebay. Ehay anday ishay isterssay ereway ellway, Iay opehay, enwhay ouyay eftlay Ondonlay?”

eRfectly“pay osay, Iay ankthay ouyay.”

Eshay oundfay atthay eshay asway otay eceiveray onay otheray answeray; anday, afteray aay ortshay
ausepay, addeday,--

i“ay inkthay Iay avehay understooday atthay mray. Ingleybay ashay otnay uchmay ideaay ofay everay
eturningray otay Etherfieldnay againay?”

i“ay avehay evernay eardhay imhay aysay osay; utbay itay isay obablepray atthay ehay aymay endspay
eryvay ittlelay ofay ishay imetay erethay inay uturefay. Ehay ashay anymay iendsfray, anday ehay isay
atay aay imetay ofay ifelay enwhay iendsfray anday engagementsay areay ontinuallycay
increasingay.”

iF“ay ehay eansmay otay ebay utbay ittlelay atay Etherfieldnay, itay ouldway ebay etterbay orfay ethay
eighbourhoodnay atthay ehay ouldshay ivegay upay ethay aceplay entirelyay, orfay enthay eway
ightmay ossiblypay etgay aay ettledsay amilyfay erethay. Utbay, erhapspay, mray. Ingleybay idday
otnay aketay ethay ousehay osay uchmay orfay ethay onveniencecay ofay ethay eighbourhoodnay asay
orfay ishay ownay, anday eway ustmay expectay imhay otay eepkay oray uitqay itay onay ethay amesay
inciplepray.”

i“ay ouldshay otnay ebay urprisedsay,” aidsay Arcyday, if“ay ehay ereway otay ivegay itay upay asay
oonsay asay anyay eligibleay urchasepay offersay.”

Elizabethay ademay onay answeray. Eshay asway afraiday ofay alkingtay ongerlay ofay ishay
iendfray; anday, avinghay othingnay elseay otay aysay, asway ownay eterminedday otay eavelay ethay
oubletray ofay indingfay aay ubjectsay otay imhay.

Ehay ooktay ethay inthay anday oonsay eganbay ithway, iS“thay eemssay aay eryvay omfortablecay
ousehay. Adylay Atherinecay, Iay elievebay, idday aay eatgray ealday otay itay enwhay mray.
Ollinscay irstfay amecay otay Unsfordhay.”

i“ay elievebay eshay id--andday Iay amay uresay eshay ouldcay otnay avehay estowedbay erhay
indnesskay onay aay oremay atefulgray objectay.”

“mray. Ollinscay appearsay eryvay ortunatefay inay ishay oicechay ofay aay ifeway.”

eS“yay, indeeday; ishay iendsfray aymay ellway ejoiceray inay ishay avinghay etmay ithway oneay ofay
ethay eryvay ewfay ensiblesay omenway owhay ouldway avehay accepteday imhay, oray avehay ademay
imhay appyhay ifay eythay adhay. myay iendfray ashay anay excellentay understanding--thoughay
Iay amay otnay ertaincay atthay Iay onsidercay erhay arryingmay mray. Ollinscay asay ethay isestway
ingthay eshay everay idday. Eshay eemssay erfectlypay appyhay, oweverhay; anday, inay aay
udentialpray ightlay, itay isay ertainlycay aay eryvay oodgay atchmay orfay erhay.”

iT“ay ustmay ebay eryvay agreeableay otay erhay otay ebay ettledsay ithinway osay easyay aay
istanceday ofay erhay ownay amilyfay anday iendsfray.”

aN“ay easyay istanceday oday ouyay allcay itay? Itay isay earlynay iftyfay ilesmay.”

aNd“ay atwhay isay iftyfay ilesmay ofay oodgay oadray? Ittlelay oremay anthay alfhay aay ay’sday
ourneyjay. Esyay, Iay allcay itay aay eryvay easyay istanceday.”

i“ay ouldshay evernay avehay onsideredcay ethay istanceday asay oneay ofay ethay advantages_ay_
ofay ethay atchmay,” iedcray Elizabethay. i“ay ouldshay evernay avehay aidsay mrsay. Ollinscay
asway ettledsay ear_nay_ erhay amilyfay.”

iT“ay isay aay oofpray ofay ouryay ownay attachmentay otay Ertfordshirehay. Anythingay eyondbay
ethay eryvay eighbourhoodnay ofay Ongbournlay, Iay upposesay, ouldway appearay arfay.”

Asay ehay okespay erethay asway aay ortsay ofay ilesmay, ichwhay Elizabethay anciedfay eshay
understooday; ehay ustmay ebay upposingsay erhay otay ebay inkingthay ofay Anejay anday
Etherfieldnay, anday eshay ushedblay asay eshay answereday,--

i“ay oday otnay eanmay otay aysay atthay aay omanway aymay otnay ebay ettledsay ootay earnay erhay
amilyfay. Ethay arfay anday ethay earnay ustmay ebay elativeray, anday ependday onay anymay
aryingvay ircumstancescay. Erewhay erethay isay ortunefay otay akemay ethay expenseay ofay
avellingtray unimportantay, istanceday ecomesbay onay evilay. Utbay atthay isay otnay ethay
asecay ere_hay_. mray. anday mrsay. Ollinscay avehay aay omfortablecay incomeay, utbay otnay
uchsay aay oneay asay illway alloway ofay equentfray ourneys--andjay Iay amay ersuadedpay myay
iendfray ouldway otnay allcay erselfhay ear_nay_ erhay amilyfay underay esslay anthay alf_hay_
ethay esentpray istanceday.”

mray. Arcyday ewdray ishay airchay aay ittlelay owardstay erhay, anday aidsay, ou“_yay_ annotcay
avehay aay ightray otay uchsay eryvay ongstray ocallay attachmentay. oU_yay_ annotcay avehay
eenbay alwaysay atay Ongbournlay.”

Elizabethay ookedlay urprisedsay. Ethay entlemangay experienceday omesay angechay ofay
eelingfay; ehay ewdray ackbay ishay airchay, ooktay aay ewspapernay omfray ethay abletay, anday,
ancingglay overay itay, aidsay, inay aay oldercay oicevay,--

aRe“ay ouyay easedplay ithway Entkay?”

Aay ortshay ialogueday onay ethay ubjectsay ofay ethay ountrycay ensueday, onay eitheray idesay
almcay anday oncise--andcay oonsay utpay anay enday otay byay ethay entranceay ofay Arlottechay
anday erhay istersay, ustjay eturnedray omfray eirthay alkway. Ethay e-à-tête_têtay_
urprisedsay emthay. mray. Arcyday elatedray ethay istakemay ichwhay adhay occasioneday ishay
intrudingay onay Issmay Ennetbay, anday, afteray ittingsay aay ewfay inutesmay ongerlay,
ithoutway ayingsay uchmay otay anybodyay, entway awayay.

iLlustration[ay: aCcompanied“ay byay eirthay auntay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

aT“whay ancay ebay ethay eaningmay ofay isthay?” aidsay Arlottechay, asay oonsay asay ehay asway
onegay. “myay earday Elizaay, ehay ustmay ebay inay ovelay ithway ouyay, oray ehay ouldway evernay
avehay alledcay onay usay inay isthay amiliarfay ayway.”

Utbay enwhay Elizabethay oldtay ofay ishay ilencesay, itay idday otnay eemsay eryvay ikelylay,
evenay otay Arlotte’schay ishesway, otay ebay ethay asecay; anday, afteray ariousvay
onjecturescay, eythay ouldcay atay astlay onlyay upposesay ishay isitvay otay oceedpray omfray
ethay ifficultyday ofay indingfay anythingay otay oday, ichwhay asway ethay oremay obablepray
omfray ethay imetay ofay earyay. Allay ieldfay ortsspay ereway overay. Ithinway oorsday erethay
asway Adylay Atherinecay, ooksbay, anday aay illiardbay abletay, utbay entlemengay annotcay ebay
alwaysay ithinway oorsday; anday inay ethay earnessnay ofay ethay Arsonagepay, oray ethay
easantnessplay ofay ethay alkway otay itay, oray ofay ethay eoplepay owhay ivedlay inay itay, ethay
otway ousinscay oundfay aay emptationtay omfray isthay eriodpay ofay alkingway itherthay
almostay everyay ayday. Eythay alledcay atay ariousvay imestay ofay ethay orningmay, ometimessay
eparatelysay, ometimessay ogethertay, anday ownay anday enthay accompanieday byay eirthay
auntay. Itay asway ainplay otay emthay allay atthay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay amecay ecausebay ehay
adhay easureplay inay eirthay ocietysay, aay ersuasionpay ichwhay ofay oursecay ecommendedray
imhay illstay oremay; anday Elizabethay asway emindedray byay erhay ownay atisfactionsay inay
eingbay ithway imhay, asay ellway asay byay ishay evidentay admirationay, ofay erhay ormerfay
avouritefay, Eorgegay Ickhamway; anday oughthay, inay omparingcay emthay, eshay awsay erethay
asway esslay aptivatingcay oftnesssay inay Olonelcay Itzwilliam’sfay annersmay, eshay
elievedbay ehay ightmay avehay ethay estbay informeday indmay.

Utbay whyay mray. Arcyday amecay osay oftenay otay ethay Arsonagepay itay asway oremay ifficultday
otay understanday. Itay ouldcay otnay ebay orfay ocietysay, asay ehay equentlyfray atsay erethay
entay inutesmay ogethertay ithoutway openingay ishay ipslay; anday enwhay ehay idday eakspay, itay
eemedsay ethay effectay ofay ecessitynay atherray anthay ofay oice--achay acrificesay otay
oprietypray, otnay aay easureplay otay imselfhay. Ehay eldomsay appeareday eallyray
animateday. mrsay. Ollinscay ewknay otnay atwhay otay akemay ofay imhay. Olonelcay
Itzwilliam’sfay occasionallyay aughinglay atay ishay upiditystay ovedpray atthay ehay asway
enerallygay ifferentday, ichwhay erhay ownay owledgeknay ofay imhay ouldcay otnay avehay oldtay
erhay; anday asay eshay ouldway avehay ikedlay otay elievebay isthay angechay ethay effectay ofay
ovelay, anday ethay objectay ofay atthay ovelay erhay iendfray Elizaay, eshay etsay erselfhay
eriouslysay otay orkway otay indfay itay outay: eshay atchedway imhay eneverwhay eythay ereway atay
Osingsray, anday eneverwhay ehay amecay otay Unsfordhay; utbay ithoutway uchmay uccesssay. Ehay
ertainlycay ookedlay atay erhay iendfray aay eatgray ealday, utbay ethay expressionay ofay atthay
ooklay asway isputableday. Itay asway anay earnestay, eadfaststay azegay, utbay eshay oftenay
oubtedday etherwhay erethay ereway uchmay admirationay inay itay, anday ometimessay itay
eemedsay othingnay utbay absenceay ofay indmay.

Eshay adhay onceay oray icetway uggestedsay otay Elizabethay ethay ossibilitypay ofay ishay
eingbay artialpay otay erhay, utbay Elizabethay alwaysay aughedlay atay ethay ideaay; anday mrsay.
Ollinscay idday otnay inkthay itay ightray otay esspray ethay ubjectsay, omfray ethay angerday ofay
aisingray expectationsay ichwhay ightmay onlyay enday inay isappointmentday; orfay inay erhay
opinionay itay admitteday otnay ofay aay oubtday, atthay allay erhay iend’sfray islikeday ouldway
anishvay, ifay eshay ouldcay upposesay imhay otay ebay inay erhay owerpay.

Inay erhay indkay emesschay orfay Elizabethay, eshay ometimessay annedplay erhay arryingmay
Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay. Ehay asway, eyondbay omparisoncay, ethay easantestplay anmay: ehay
ertainlycay admireday erhay, anday ishay ituationsay inay ifelay asway ostmay eligibleay; utbay,
otay ounterbalancecay esethay advantagesay, mray. Arcyday adhay onsiderablecay atronagepay
inay ethay urchchay, anday ishay ousincay ouldcay avehay onenay atay allay.




iLlustration[ay: oN“ay ookinglay upay”]




APTERchay IIIxxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Oremay anthay onceay idday Elizabethay, inay erhay ambleray ithinway ethay arkpay,
unexpectedlyay eetmay mray. Arcyday. Eshay eltfay allay ethay erversenesspay ofay ethay
ischancemay atthay ouldshay ingbray imhay erewhay onay oneay elseay asway oughtbray; anday, otay
eventpray itsay everay appeninghay againay, ooktay arecay otay informay imhay, atay irstfay,
atthay itay asway aay avouritefay aunthay ofay ershay. Owhay itay ouldcay occuray aay econdsay imetay,
ereforethay, asway eryvay odday! Etyay itay idday, anday evenay ethay irdthay. Itay eemedsay ikelay
ilfulway ill-natureay, oray aay oluntaryvay enancepay; orfay onay esethay occasionsay itay asway
otnay erelymay aay ewfay ormalfay inquiriesay anday anay awkwarday ausepay anday enthay awayay,
utbay ehay actuallyay oughtthay itay ecessarynay otay urntay ackbay anday alkway ithway erhay. Ehay
evernay aidsay aay eatgray ealday, ornay idday eshay ivegay erselfhay ethay oubletray ofay alkingtay
oray ofay isteninglay uchmay; utbay itay uckstray erhay inay ethay oursecay ofay eirthay irdthay
encounteray atthay ehay asway askingay omesay odday unconnecteday uestions--aboutqay erhay
easureplay inay eingbay atay Unsfordhay, erhay ovelay ofay olitarysay alksway, anday erhay
opinionay ofay mray. anday mrsay. Ollins’scay appinesshay; anday atthay inay eakingspay ofay
Osingsray, anday erhay otnay erfectlypay understandingay ethay ousehay, ehay eemedsay otay
expectay atthay eneverwhay eshay amecay intoay Entkay againay eshay ouldway ebay ayingstay
ere_thay_ ootay. Ishay ordsway eemedsay otay implyay itay. Ouldcay ehay avehay Olonelcay
Itzwilliamfay inay ishay oughtsthay? Eshay upposedsay, ifay ehay eantmay anythingay, ehay ustmay
eanmay anay allusionay otay atwhay ightmay ariseay inay atthay uarterqay. Itay istressedday erhay
aay ittlelay, anday eshay asway uiteqay adglay otay indfay erselfhay atay ethay ategay inay ethay
alespay oppositeay ethay Arsonagepay.

Eshay asway engageday oneay ayday, asay eshay alkedway, inay e-perusingray Ane’sjay astlay
etterlay, anday ellingdway onay omesay assagespay ichwhay ovedpray atthay Anejay adhay otnay
ittenwray inay iritsspay, enwhay, insteaday ofay eingbay againay urprisedsay byay mray. Arcyday,
eshay awsay, onay ookinglay upay, atthay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay asway eetingmay erhay.
Uttingpay awayay ethay etterlay immediatelyay, anday orcingfay aay ilesmay, eshay aidsay,--

i“ay idday otnay owknay eforebay atthay ouyay everay alkedway isthay ayway.”

i“ay avehay eenbay akingmay ethay ourtay ofay ethay arkpay,” ehay epliedray, as“ay Iay enerallygay
oday everyay earyay, anday intendeday otay oseclay itay ithway aay allcay atay ethay Arsonagepay.
Areay ouyay oinggay uchmay artherfay?”

o“nay, Iay ouldshay avehay urnedtay inay aay omentmay.”

Anday accordinglyay eshay idday urntay, anday eythay alkedway owardstay ethay Arsonagepay
ogethertay.

o“day ouyay ertainlycay eavelay Entkay onay Aturdaysay?” aidsay eshay.

eS--if“yay Arcyday oesday otnay utpay itay offay againay. Utbay Iay amay atay ishay isposalday. Ehay
arrangesay ethay usinessbay ustjay asay ehay easesplay.”

aNd“ay ifay otnay ableay otay easeplay imselfhay inay ethay arrangementay, ehay ashay atay eastlay
eatgray easureplay inay ethay owerpay ofay oicechay. Iay oday otnay owknay anybodyay owhay eemssay
oremay otay enjoyay ethay owerpay ofay oingday atwhay ehay ikeslay anthay mray. Arcyday.”

e“hay ikeslay otay avehay ishay ownay ayway eryvay ellway,” epliedray Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay.
uT“bay osay eway allay oday. Itay isay onlyay atthay ehay ashay etterbay eansmay ofay avinghay itay anthay
anymay othersay, ecausebay ehay isay ichray, anday anymay othersay areay oorpay. Iay eakspay
eelinglyfay. Aay oungeryay onsay, ouyay owknay, ustmay ebay inureday otay elf-denialsay anday
ependenceday.”

iN“ay myay opinionay, ethay oungeryay onsay ofay anay earlay ancay owknay eryvay ittlelay ofay
eitheray. Ownay, eriouslysay, atwhay avehay ouyay everay ownknay ofay elf-denialsay anday
ependenceday? Enwhay avehay ouyay eenbay eventedpray byay antway ofay oneymay omfray oinggay
ereverwhay ouyay osechay oray ocuringpray anythingay ouyay adhay aay ancyfay orfay?”

eSe“thay areay omehay uestions--andqay erhapspay Iay annotcay aysay atthay Iay avehay
experienceday anymay ardshipshay ofay atthay aturenay. Utbay inay attersmay ofay eatergray
eightway, Iay aymay uffersay omfray ethay antway ofay oneymay. Oungeryay onssay annotcay arrymay
erewhay eythay ikelay.”

uNless“ay erewhay eythay ikelay omenway ofay ortunefay, ichwhay Iay inkthay eythay eryvay oftenay
oday.”

oUr“ay abitshay ofay expenseay akemay usay ootay ependentday, anday erethay areay otnay anymay inay
myay ankray ofay ifelay owhay ancay afforday otay arrymay ithoutway omesay attentionay otay
oneymay.”

iS“ay isthay,” oughtthay Elizabethay, eant“may orfay emay?” anday eshay olouredcay atay ethay
ideaay; utbay, ecoveringray erselfhay, aidsay inay aay ivelylay onetay, aNd“ay aypray, atwhay isay
ethay usualay icepray ofay anay earl’say oungeryay onsay? Unlessay ethay elderay otherbray isay
eryvay icklysay, Iay upposesay ouyay ouldway otnay askay aboveay iftyfay ousandthay oundspay.”

Ehay answereday erhay inay ethay amesay estylay, anday ethay ubjectsay oppeddray. Otay interruptay
aay ilencesay ichwhay ightmay akemay imhay ancyfay erhay affecteday ithway atwhay adhay assedpay,
eshay oonsay afterwardsay aidsay,--

i“ay imagineay ouryay ousincay oughtbray ouyay ownday ithway imhay ieflychay orfay ethay akesay ofay
avinghay omebodysay atay ishay isposalday. Iay onderway ehay oesday otnay arrymay, otay ecuresay aay
astinglay onveniencecay ofay atthay indkay. Utbay, erhapspay, ishay istersay oesday asay ellway
orfay ethay esentpray; anday, asay eshay isay underay ishay olesay arecay, ehay aymay oday atwhay ehay
ikeslay ithway erhay.”

o“nay,” aidsay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay, at“thay isay anay advantageay ichwhay ehay ustmay
ivideday ithway emay. Iay amay oinedjay ithway imhay inay ethay uardianshipgay ofay Issmay Arcyday.”

aRe“ay ouyay, indeeday? Anday aypray atwhay ortsay ofay aay uardiangay oday ouyay akemay? Oesday
ouryay argechay ivegay ouyay uchmay oubletray? Oungyay adieslay ofay erhay ageay areay ometimessay
aay ittlelay ifficultday otay anagemay; anday ifay eshay ashay ethay uetray Arcyday iritspay, eshay
aymay ikelay otay avehay erhay ownay ayway.”

Asay eshay okespay, eshay observeday imhay ookinglay atay erhay earnestlyay; anday ethay annermay
inay ichwhay ehay immediatelyay askeday erhay whyay eshay upposedsay Issmay Arcyday ikelylay otay
ivegay emthay anyay uneasinessay, onvincedcay erhay atthay eshay adhay omehowsay oray otheray
otgay ettypray earnay ethay uthtray. Eshay irectlyday epliedray,--

oU“yay eednay otnay ebay ightenedfray. Iay evernay eardhay anyay armhay ofay erhay; anday Iay areday
aysay eshay isay oneay ofay ethay ostmay actabletray eaturescray inay ethay orldway. Eshay isay aay
eryvay eatgray avouritefay ithway omesay adieslay ofay myay acquaintanceay, mrsay. Ursthay anday
Issmay Ingleybay. Iay inkthay Iay avehay eardhay ouyay aysay atthay ouyay owknay emthay.”

i“ay owknay emthay aay ittlelay. Eirthay otherbray isay aay easantplay, entlemanlikegay
an--hemay isay aay eatgray iendfray ofay Arcy’sday.”

oH“ay esyay,” aidsay Elizabethay ily--“mrdray. Arcyday isay uncommonlyay indkay otay mray.
Ingleybay, anday akestay aay odigiouspray ealday ofay arecay ofay imhay.”

aRe“cay ofay imhay! Esyay, Iay eallyray elievebay Arcyday oes_day_ aketay arecay ofay imhay inay
osethay ointspay erewhay ehay ostmay antsway arecay. Omfray omethingsay atthay ehay oldtay emay
inay ouray ourneyjay itherhay, Iay avehay easonray otay inkthay Ingleybay eryvay uchmay indebteday
otay imhay. Utbay Iay oughtay otay egbay ishay ardonpay, orfay Iay avehay onay ightray otay upposesay
atthay Ingleybay asway ethay ersonpay eantmay. Itay asway allay onjecturecay.”

aT“whay isay itay ouyay eanmay?”

iT“ay isay aay ircumstancecay ichwhay Arcyday ofay oursecay ouldcay otnay ishway otay ebay
enerallygay ownknay, ecausebay ifay itay ereway otay etgay oundray otay ethay ady’slay amilyfay itay
ouldway ebay anay unpleasantay ingthay.”

oU“yay aymay ependday uponay myay otnay entioningmay itay.”

aNd“ay ememberray atthay Iay avehay otnay uchmay easonray orfay upposingsay itay otay ebay
Ingleybay. Atwhay ehay oldtay emay asway erelymay isthay: atthay ehay ongratulatedcay imselfhay
onay avinghay atelylay avedsay aay iendfray omfray ethay inconveniencesay ofay aay ostmay
imprudentay arriagemay, utbay ithoutway entioningmay amesnay oray anyay otheray
articularspay; anday Iay onlyay uspectedsay itay otay ebay Ingleybay omfray elievingbay imhay
ethay indkay ofay oungyay anmay otay etgay intoay aay apescray ofay atthay ortsay, anday omfray
owingknay emthay otay avehay eenbay ogethertay ethay olewhay ofay astlay ummersay.”

iD“day mray. Arcyday ivegay ouyay ishay easonsray orfay isthay interferenceay?”

i“ay understooday atthay erethay ereway omesay eryvay ongstray objectionsay againstay ethay
adylay.”

aNd“ay atwhay artsay idday ehay useay otay eparatesay emthay?”

e“hay idday otnay alktay otay emay ofay ishay ownay artsay,” aidsay Itzwilliamfay, ilingsmay. e“hay
onlyay oldtay emay atwhay Iay avehay ownay oldtay ouyay.”

Elizabethay ademay onay answeray, anday alkedway onay, erhay earthay ellingsway ithway
indignationay. Afteray atchingway erhay aay ittlelay, Itzwilliamfay askeday erhay whyay eshay
asway osay oughtfulthay.

i“ay amay inkingthay ofay atwhay ouyay avehay eenbay ellingtay emay,” aidsay eshay. oUr“yay
ousin’scay onductcay oesday otnay uitsay myay eelingsfay. whyay asway ehay otay ebay ethay
udgejay?”

oU“yay areay atherray isposedday otay allcay ishay interferenceay officiousay?”

i“ay oday otnay eesay atwhay ightray mray. Arcyday adhay otay ecideday onay ethay oprietypray ofay ishay
iend’sfray inclinationay; oray whyay, uponay ishay ownay udgmentjay aloneay, ehay asway otay
etermineday anday irectday inay atwhay annermay atthay iendfray asway otay ebay appyhay. Utbay,”
eshay ontinuedcay, ecollectingray erselfhay, as“ay eway owknay onenay ofay ethay
articularspay, itay isay otnay airfay otay ondemncay imhay. Itay isay otnay otay ebay upposedsay
atthay erethay asway uchmay affectionay inay ethay asecay.”

aT“thay isay otnay anay unnaturalay urmisesay,” aidsay Itzwilliamfay; ut“bay itay isay
esseninglay ethay onourhay ofay myay ousin’scay iumphtray eryvay adlysay.”

Isthay asway okenspay estinglyjay, utbay itay appeareday otay erhay osay ustjay aay icturepay ofay
mray. Arcyday, atthay eshay ouldway otnay usttray erselfhay ithway anay answeray; anday,
