ereforethay, abruptlyay angingchay ethay onversationcay, alkedtay onay indifferentay
attersmay illtay eythay eachedray ethay Arsonagepay. Erethay, utshay intoay erhay ownay oomray,
asay oonsay asay eirthay isitorvay eftlay emthay, eshay ouldcay inkthay ithoutway interruptionay
ofay allay atthay eshay adhay eardhay. Itay asway otnay otay ebay upposedsay atthay anyay otheray
eoplepay ouldcay ebay eantmay anthay osethay ithway omwhay eshay asway onnectedcay. Erethay
ouldcay otnay existay inay ethay orldway o_tway_ enmay overay omwhay mray. Arcyday ouldcay avehay
uchsay oundlessbay influenceay. Atthay ehay adhay eenbay oncernedcay inay ethay easuresmay
akentay otay eparatesay mray. Ingleybay anday Anejay, eshay adhay evernay oubtedday; utbay eshay
adhay alwaysay attributeday otay Issmay Ingleybay ethay incipalpray esignday anday
arrangementay ofay emthay. Ifay ishay ownay anityvay, oweverhay, idday otnay isleadmay imhay,
e_hay_ asway ethay ause--hiscay idepray anday apricecay ereway ethay ause--ofcay allay atthay
Anejay adhay ufferedsay, anday illstay ontinuedcay otay uffersay. Ehay adhay uinedray orfay aay
ilewhay everyay opehay ofay appinesshay orfay ethay ostmay affectionateay, enerousgay earthay
inay ethay orldway; anday onay oneay ouldcay aysay owhay astinglay anay evilay ehay ightmay avehay
inflicteday.

eRe“thay ereway omesay eryvay ongstray objectionsay againstay ethay adylay,” ereway Olonelcay
Itzwilliam’sfay ordsway; anday esethay ongstray objectionsay obablypray ereway, erhay
avinghay oneay uncleay owhay asway aay ountrycay attorneyay, anday anotheray owhay asway inay
usinessbay inay Ondonlay.

o“tay Anejay erselfhay,” eshay exclaimeday, ere“thay ouldcay ebay onay ossibilitypay ofay
objection,--allay ovelinesslay anday oodnessgay asay eshay isay! Erhay understandingay
excellentay, erhay indmay improveday, anday erhay annersmay aptivatingcay. Eithernay ouldcay
anythingay ebay urgeday againstay myay atherfay, owhay, oughthay ithway omesay
eculiaritiespay, ashay abilitiesay ichwhay mray. Arcyday imselfhay eednay otnay isdainday,
anday espectabilityray ichwhay ehay illway obablypray evernay eachray.” Enwhay eshay oughtthay
ofay erhay othermay, indeeday, erhay onfidencecay avegay ayway aay ittlelay; utbay eshay ouldway
otnay alloway atthay anyay objectionsay ere_thay_ adhay aterialmay eightway ithway mray.
Arcyday, osewhay idepray, eshay asway onvincedcay, ouldway eceiveray aay eeperday oundway omfray
ethay antway ofay importanceay inay ishay iend’sfray onnectionscay anthay omfray eirthay antway
ofay ensesay; anday eshay asway uiteqay ecidedday, atay astlay, atthay ehay adhay eenbay artlypay
overnedgay byay isthay orstway indkay ofay idepray, anday artlypay byay ethay ishway ofay
etainingray mray. Ingleybay orfay ishay istersay.

Ethay agitationay anday earstay ichwhay ethay ubjectsay occasioneday oughtbray onay aay
eadachehay; anday itay ewgray osay uchmay orseway owardstay ethay eveningay atthay, addeday otay
erhay unwillingnessay otay eesay mray. Arcyday, itay eterminedday erhay otnay otay attenday erhay
ousinscay otay Osingsray, erewhay eythay ereway engageday otay inkdray eatay. mrsay. Ollinscay,
eeingsay atthay eshay asway eallyray unwellay, idday otnay esspray erhay otay ogay, anday asay uchmay
asay ossiblepay eventedpray erhay usbandhay omfray essingpray erhay; utbay mray. Ollinscay
ouldcay otnay oncealcay ishay apprehensionay ofay Adylay Atherine’scay eingbay atherray
ispleasedday byay erhay ayingstay atay omehay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IVxxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Enwhay eythay ereway onegay, Elizabethay, asay ifay intendingay otay exasperateay erselfhay asay
uchmay asay ossiblepay againstay mray. Arcyday, osechay orfay erhay employmentay ethay
examinationay ofay allay ethay etterslay ichwhay Anejay adhay ittenwray otay erhay incesay erhay
eingbay inay Entkay. Eythay ontainedcay onay actualay omplaintcay, ornay asway erethay anyay
evivalray ofay astpay occurrencesay, oray anyay ommunicationcay ofay esentpray ufferingsay.
Utbay inay allay, anday inay almostay everyay inelay ofay eachay, erethay asway aay antway ofay atthay
eerfulnesschay ichwhay adhay eenbay useday otay aracterizechay erhay estylay, anday ichwhay,
oceedingpray omfray ethay erenitysay ofay aay indmay atay easeay ithway itselfay, anday indlykay
isposedday owardstay everyoneay, adhay eenbay arcelyscay everay oudedclay. Elizabethay
oticednay everyay entencesay onveyingcay ethay ideaay ofay uneasinessay, ithway anay
attentionay ichwhay itay adhay ardlyhay eceivedray onay ethay irstfay erusalpay. mray. Arcy’sday
amefulshay oastbay ofay atwhay iserymay ehay adhay eenbay ableay otay inflictay avegay erhay aay
eenerkay ensesay ofay erhay ister’ssay ufferingssay. Itay asway omesay onsolationcay otay
inkthay atthay ishay isitvay otay Osingsray asway otay enday onay ethay ayday afteray ethay extnay,
anday aay illstay eatergray atthay inay esslay anthay aay ortnightfay eshay ouldshay erselfhay ebay
ithway Anejay againay, anday enableday otay ontributecay otay ethay ecoveryray ofay erhay
iritsspay, byay allay atthay affectionay ouldcay oday.

Eshay ouldcay otnay inkthay ofay Arcy’sday eavinglay Entkay ithoutway ememberingray atthay ishay
ousincay asway otay ogay ithway imhay; utbay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay adhay ademay itay earclay
atthay ehay adhay onay intentionsay atay allay, anday, agreeableay asay ehay asway, eshay idday otnay
eanmay otay ebay unhappyay aboutay imhay.

Ilewhay ettlingsay isthay ointpay, eshay asway uddenlysay ousedray byay ethay oundsay ofay ethay
oor-bellday; anday erhay iritsspay ereway aay ittlelay utteredflay byay ethay ideaay ofay itsay
eingbay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay imselfhay, owhay adhay onceay eforebay alledcay atelay inay
ethay eveningay, anday ightmay ownay omecay otay inquireay articularlypay afteray erhay. Utbay
isthay ideaay asway oonsay anishedbay, anday erhay iritsspay ereway eryvay ifferentlyday
affecteday, enwhay, otay erhay utteray amazementay, eshay awsay mray. Arcyday alkway intoay ethay
oomray. Inay aay urriedhay annermay ehay immediatelyay eganbay anay inquiryay afteray erhay
ealthhay, imputingay ishay isitvay otay aay ishway ofay earinghay atthay eshay ereway etterbay.
Eshay answereday imhay ithway oldcay ivilitycay. Ehay atsay ownday orfay aay ewfay omentsmay, anday
enthay ettinggay upay alkedway aboutay ethay oomray. Elizabethay asway urprisedsay, utbay
aidsay otnay aay ordway. Afteray aay ilencesay ofay everalsay inutesmay, ehay amecay owardstay erhay
inay anay agitateday annermay, anday usthay eganbay:--

iN“ay ainvay avehay Iay uggledstray. Itay illway otnay oday. myay eelingsfay illway otnay ebay
epressedray. Ouyay ustmay alloway emay otay elltay ouyay owhay ardentlyay Iay admireay anday ovelay
ouyay.”

Elizabeth’say astonishmentay asway eyondbay expressionay. Eshay aredstay, olouredcay,
oubtedday, anday asway ilentsay. Isthay ehay onsideredcay ufficientsay encouragementay,
anday ethay avowalay ofay allay atthay ehay eltfay anday adhay onglay eltfay orfay erhay immediatelyay
ollowedfay. Ehay okespay ellway; utbay erethay ereway eelingsfay esidesbay osethay ofay ethay
earthay otay ebay etailedday, anday ehay asway otnay oremay eloquentay onay ethay ubjectsay ofay
endernesstay anthay ofay idepray. Ishay ensesay ofay erhay inferiorityay, ofay itsay eingbay aay
egradationday, ofay ethay amilyfay obstaclesay ichwhay udgmentjay adhay alwaysay opposeday
otay inclinationay, ereway eltdway onay ithway aay armthway ichwhay eemedsay ueday otay ethay
onsequencecay ehay asway oundingway, utbay asway eryvay unlikelyay otay ecommendray ishay
uitsay.

Inay itespay ofay erhay eeply-rootedday islikeday, eshay ouldcay otnay ebay insensibleay otay
ethay omplimentcay ofay uchsay aay an’smay affectionay, anday oughthay erhay intentionsay idday
otnay aryvay orfay anay instantay, eshay asway atay irstfay orrysay orfay ethay ainpay ehay asway otay
eceiveray; illtay ousedray otay esentmentray byay ishay ubsequentsay anguagelay, eshay ostlay
allay ompassioncay inay angeray. Eshay iedtray, oweverhay, otay omposecay erselfhay otay
answeray imhay ithway atiencepay, enwhay ehay ouldshay avehay oneday. Ehay oncludedcay ithway
epresentingray otay erhay ethay engthstray ofay atthay attachmentay ichwhay inay itespay ofay
allay ishay endeavoursay ehay adhay oundfay impossibleay otay onquercay; anday ithway
expressingay ishay opehay atthay itay ouldway ownay ebay ewardedray byay erhay acceptanceay ofay
ishay andhay. Asay ehay aidsay isthay eshay ouldcay easilyay eesay atthay ehay adhay onay oubtday ofay aay
avourablefay answeray. Ehay oke_spay_ ofay apprehensionay anday anxietyay, utbay ishay
ountenancecay expresseday ealray ecuritysay. Uchsay aay ircumstancecay ouldcay onlyay
exasperateay artherfay; anday enwhay ehay easedcay ethay olourcay oseray intoay erhay eekschay
anday eshay aidsay,--

iN“ay uchsay asescay asay isthay, itay isay, Iay elievebay, ethay establisheday odemay otay
expressay aay ensesay ofay obligationay orfay ethay entimentssay avoweday, oweverhay
unequallyay eythay aymay ebay eturnedray. Itay isay aturalnay atthay obligationay ouldshay ebay
eltfay, anday ifay Iay ouldcay eel_fay_ atitudegray, Iay ouldway ownay ankthay ouyay. Utbay Iay
annot--icay avehay evernay esiredday ouryay oodgay opinionay, anday ouyay avehay ertainlycay
estowedbay itay ostmay unwillinglyay. Iay amay orrysay otay avehay occasioneday ainpay otay
anyoneay. Itay ashay eenbay ostmay unconsciouslyay oneday, oweverhay, anday Iay opehay illway ebay
ofay ortshay urationday. Ethay eelingsfay ichwhay ouyay elltay emay avehay onglay eventedpray
ethay acknowledgmentay ofay ouryay egardray ancay avehay ittlelay ifficultyday inay
overcomingay itay afteray isthay explanationay.”

mray. Arcyday, owhay asway eaninglay againstay ethay antel-piecemay ithway ishay eyesay ixedfay
onay erhay acefay, eemedsay otay atchcay erhay ordsway ithway onay esslay esentmentray anthay
urprisesay. Ishay omplexioncay ecamebay alepay ithway angeray, anday ethay isturbanceday ofay
ishay indmay asway isiblevay inay everyay eaturefay. Ehay asway ugglingstray orfay ethay
appearanceay ofay omposurecay, anday ouldway otnay openay ishay ipslay illtay ehay elievedbay
imselfhay otay avehay attaineday itay. Ethay ausepay asway otay Elizabeth’say eelingsfay
eadfuldray. Atay engthlay, inay aay oicevay ofay orcedfay almnesscay, ehay aidsay,--

aNd“ay isthay isay allay ethay eplyray ichwhay Iay amay otay avehay ethay onourhay ofay expectingay! Iay
ightmay, erhapspay, ishway otay ebay informeday whyay, ithway osay ittlelay endeavour_ay_ atay
ivilitycay, Iay amay usthay ejectedray. Utbay itay isay ofay allsmay importanceay.”

i“ay ightmay asay ellway inquireay,” epliedray eshay, “whyay, ithway osay evidentay aay esignday
ofay offendingay anday insultingay emay, ouyay osechay otay elltay emay atthay ouyay ikedlay emay
againstay ouryay illway, againstay ouryay easonray, anday evenay againstay ouryay aracterchay?
Asway otnay isthay omesay excuseay orfay incivilityay, ifay Iay as_way_ uncivilay? Utbay Iay avehay
otheray ovocationspray. Ouyay owknay Iay avehay. Adhay otnay myay ownay eelingsfay ecidedday
againstay ouyay, adhay eythay eenbay indifferentay, oray adhay eythay evenay eenbay
avourablefay, oday ouyay inkthay atthay anyay onsiderationcay ouldway empttay emay otay acceptay
ethay anmay owhay ashay eenbay ethay eansmay ofay uiningray, erhapspay orfay everay, ethay
appinesshay ofay aay ostmay elovedbay istersay?”

Asay eshay onouncedpray esethay ordsway, mray. Arcyday angedchay olourcay; utbay ethay emotionay
asway ortshay, anday ehay istenedlay ithoutway attemptingay otay interruptay erhay ilewhay eshay
ontinuedcay,--

i“ay avehay everyay easonray inay ethay orldway otay inkthay illay ofay ouyay. Onay otivemay ancay
excuseay ethay unjustay anday ungenerousay artpay ouyay acteday ere_thay_. Ouyay areday otnay,
ouyay annotcay enyday atthay ouyay avehay eenbay ethay incipalpray, ifay otnay ethay onlyay eansmay
ofay ividingday emthay omfray eachay otheray, ofay exposingay oneay otay ethay ensurecay ofay ethay
orldway orfay apricecay anday instabilityay, ethay otheray otay itsay erisionday orfay
isappointedday opeshay, anday involvingay emthay othbay inay iserymay ofay ethay acutestay
indkay.”

Eshay ausedpay, anday awsay ithway onay ightslay indignationay atthay ehay asway isteninglay
ithway anay airay ichwhay ovedpray imhay ollywhay unmoveday byay anyay eelingfay ofay emorseray.
Ehay evenay ookedlay atay erhay ithway aay ilesmay ofay affecteday incredulityay.

aN“cay ouyay enyday atthay ouyay avehay oneday itay?” eshay epeatedray.

Ithway assumeday anquillitytray ehay enthay epliedray, i“ay avehay onay ishway ofay enyingday
atthay Iay idday everythingay inay myay owerpay otay eparatesay myay iendfray omfray ouryay
istersay, oray atthay Iay ejoiceray inay myay uccesssay. Owardstay im_hay_ Iay avehay eenbay
inderkay anthay owardstay elfmysay.”

Elizabethay isdainedday ethay appearanceay ofay oticingnay isthay ivilcay eflectionray,
utbay itsay eaningmay idday otnay escapeay, ornay asway itay ikelylay otay onciliatecay erhay.

uT“bay itay isay otnay erelymay isthay affairay,” eshay ontinuedcay, on“ay ichwhay myay islikeday
isay oundedfay. Onglay eforebay itay adhay akentay aceplay, myay opinionay ofay ouyay asway
ecidedday. Ouryay aracterchay asway unfoldeday inay ethay ecitalray ichwhay Iay eceivedray
anymay onthsmay agoay omfray mray. Ickhamway. Onay isthay ubjectsay, atwhay ancay ouyay avehay otay
aysay? Inay atwhay imaginaryay actay ofay iendshipfray ancay ouyay erehay efendday ourselfyay?
oray underay atwhay isrepresentationmay ancay ouyay erehay imposeay uponay othersay?”

oU“yay aketay anay eageray interestay inay atthay entleman’sgay oncernscay,” aidsay Arcyday,
inay aay esslay anquiltray onetay, anday ithway aay eightenedhay olourcay.

o“whay atthay owsknay atwhay ishay isfortunesmay avehay eenbay ancay elphay eelingfay anay
interestay inay imhay?”

iS“hay isfortunesmay!” epeatedray Arcyday, ontemptuously,--“yescay, ishay
isfortunesmay avehay eenbay eatgray indeeday.”

aNd“ay ofay ouryay inflictionay,” iedcray Elizabethay, ithway energyay; oU“yay avehay
educedray imhay otay ishay esentpray atestay ofay overty--comparativepay overtypay. Ouyay
avehay ithheldway ethay advantagesay ichwhay ouyay ustmay owknay otay avehay eenbay esignedday
orfay imhay. Ouyay avehay eprivedday ethay estbay earsyay ofay ishay ifelay ofay atthay
independenceay ichwhay asway onay esslay ishay ueday anthay ishay esertday. Ouyay avehay oneday
allay isthay! anday etyay ouyay ancay eattray ethay entionmay ofay ishay isfortunesmay ithway
ontemptcay anday idiculeray.”

aNd“ay isthay,” iedcray Arcyday, asay ehay alkedway ithway uickqay epsstay acrossay ethay oomray,
is“ay ouryay opinionay ofay emay! Isthay isay ethay estimationay inay ichwhay ouyay oldhay emay! Iay
ankthay ouyay orfay explainingay itay osay ullyfay. myay aultsfay, accordingay otay isthay
alculationcay, areay eavyhay indeeday! Utbay, erhapspay,” addeday ehay, oppingstay inay ishay
alkway, anday urningtay owardstay erhay, ese“thay offencesay ightmay avehay eenbay
overlookeday, adhay otnay ouryay idepray eenbay urthay byay myay onesthay onfessioncay ofay ethay
uplesscray atthay adhay onglay eventedpray myay ormingfay anyay erioussay esignday. Esethay
itterbay accusationsay ightmay avehay eenbay uppressedsay, adhay Iay, ithway eatergray
olicypay, oncealedcay myay ugglesstray, anday atteredflay ouyay intoay ethay eliefbay ofay myay
eingbay impelleday byay unqualifieday, unalloyeday inclinationay; byay easonray, byay
eflectionray, byay everythingay. Utbay isguiseday ofay everyay ortsay isay myay abhorrenceay.
Ornay amay Iay ashameday ofay ethay eelingsfay Iay elatedray. Eythay ereway aturalnay anday ustjay.
Ouldcay ouyay expectay emay otay ejoiceray inay ethay inferiorityay ofay ouryay
onnections?--tocay ongratulatecay elfmysay onay ethay opehay ofay elationsray osewhay
onditioncay inay ifelay isay osay ecidedlyday eneathbay myay ownay?”

Elizabethay eltfay erselfhay owinggray oremay angryay everyay omentmay; etyay eshay iedtray otay
ethay utmostay otay eakspay ithway omposurecay enwhay eshay aidsay,--

oU“yay areay istakenmay, mray. Arcyday, ifay ouyay upposesay atthay ethay odemay ofay ouryay
eclarationday affecteday emay inay anyay otheray ayway anthay asay itay aredspay emay ethay
oncerncay ichwhay Iay ightmay avehay eltfay inay efusingray ouyay, adhay ouyay ehavedbay inay aay
oremay entlemanlikegay annermay.”

Eshay awsay imhay artstay atay isthay; utbay ehay aidsay othingnay, anday eshay ontinuedcay,--

oU“yay ouldcay otnay avehay ademay emay ethay offeray ofay ouryay andhay inay anyay ossiblepay ayway
atthay ouldway avehay emptedtay emay otay acceptay itay.”

Againay ishay astonishmentay asway obviousay; anday ehay ookedlay atay erhay ithway anay
expressionay ofay ingledmay incredulityay anday ortificationmay. Eshay entway onay,--

oM“fray ethay eryvay eginningbay, omfray ethay irstfay omentmay, Iay aymay almostay aysay, ofay myay
acquaintanceay ithway ouyay, ouryay annersmay impressingay emay ithway ethay ullestfay
eliefbay ofay ouryay arroganceay, ouryay onceitcay, anday ouryay elfishsay isdainday ofay ethay
eelingsfay ofay othersay, ereway uchsay asay otay ormfay atthay oundworkgray ofay
isapprobationday, onay ichwhay ucceedingsay eventsay avehay uiltbay osay immovableay aay
islikeday; anday Iay adhay otnay ownknay ouyay aay onthmay eforebay Iay eltfay atthay ouyay ereway ethay
astlay anmay inay ethay orldway omwhay Iay ouldcay everay ebay evailedpray onay otay arrymay.”

oU“yay avehay aidsay uiteqay enoughay, adammay. Iay erfectlypay omprehendcay ouryay
eelingsfay, anday avehay ownay onlyay otay ebay ashameday ofay atwhay myay ownay avehay eenbay.
Orgivefay emay orfay avinghay akentay upay osay uchmay ofay ouryay imetay, anday acceptay myay estbay
ishesway orfay ouryay ealthhay anday appinesshay.”

Anday ithway esethay ordsway ehay astilyhay eftlay ethay oomray, anday Elizabethay eardhay imhay
ethay extnay omentmay openay ethay ontfray oorday anday uitqay ethay ousehay. Ethay umulttay ofay
erhay indmay asway ownay ainfullypay eatgray. Eshay ewknay otnay owhay otay upportsay erselfhay,
anday, omfray actualay eaknessway, atsay ownday anday iedcray orfay alfhay anay ourhay. Erhay
astonishmentay, asay eshay eflectedray onay atwhay adhay assedpay, asway increaseday byay
everyay eviewray ofay itay. Atthay eshay ouldshay eceiveray anay offeray ofay arriagemay omfray
mray. Arcyday! atthay ehay ouldshay avehay eenbay inay ovelay ithway erhay orfay osay anymay onthsmay!
osay uchmay inay ovelay asay otay ishway otay arrymay erhay inay itespay ofay allay ethay objectionsay
ichwhay adhay ademay imhay eventpray ishay iend’sfray arryingmay erhay istersay, anday ichwhay
ustmay appearay atay eastlay ithway equalay orcefay inay ishay ownay asecay, asway almostay
incredibleay! itay asway atifyinggray otay avehay inspireday unconsciouslyay osay ongstray
anay affectionay. Utbay ishay idepray, ishay abominableay idepray, ishay amelessshay avowalay
ofay atwhay ehay adhay oneday ithway espectray otay Anejay, ishay unpardonableay assuranceay inay
acknowledgingay, oughthay ehay ouldcay otnay ustifyjay itay, anday ethay unfeelingay annermay
ichwhay ehay adhay entionedmay mray. Ickhamway, ishay ueltycray owardstay omwhay ehay adhay otnay
attempteday otay enyday, oonsay overcameay ethay itypay ichwhay ethay onsiderationcay ofay ishay
attachmentay adhay orfay aay omentmay exciteday.

Eshay ontinuedcay inay eryvay agitatingay eflectionsray illtay ethay oundsay ofay Adylay
Atherine’scay arriagecay ademay erhay eelfay owhay unequalay eshay asway otay encounteray
Arlotte’schay observationay, anday urriedhay erhay awayay otay erhay oomray.




iLlustration[ay:

eAring“hay erselfhay alledcay”
ay]




APTERchay xxxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay awokeay ethay extnay orningmay otay ethay amesay oughtsthay anday editationsmay
ichwhay adhay atay engthlay osedclay erhay eyesay. Eshay ouldcay otnay etyay ecoverray omfray ethay
urprisesay ofay atwhay adhay appenedhay: itay asway impossibleay otay inkthay ofay anythingay
elseay; anday, otallytay indisposeday orfay employmentay, eshay esolvedray oonsay afteray
eakfastbray otay indulgeay erselfhay inay airay anday exerciseay. Eshay asway oceedingpray
irectlyday otay erhay avouritefay alkway, enwhay ethay ecollectionray ofay mray. Arcy’sday
ometimessay omingcay erethay oppedstay erhay, anday insteaday ofay enteringay ethay arkpay,
eshay urnedtay upay ethay anelay ichwhay edlay erhay artherfay omfray ethay urnpiketay oadray. Ethay
arkpay alingpay asway illstay ethay oundarybay onay oneay idesay, anday eshay oonsay assedpay oneay
ofay ethay atesgay intoay ethay oundgray.

Afteray alkingway otway oray eethray imestay alongay atthay artpay ofay ethay anelay, eshay asway
emptedtay, byay ethay easantnessplay ofay ethay orningmay, otay opstay atay ethay atesgay anday
ooklay intoay ethay arkpay. Ethay ivefay eeksway ichwhay eshay adhay ownay assedpay inay Entkay adhay
ademay aay eatgray ifferenceday inay ethay ountrycay, anday everyay ayday asway addingay otay ethay
erdurevay ofay ethay earlyay eestray. Eshay asway onay ethay ointpay ofay ontinuingcay erhay
alkway, enwhay eshay aughtcay aay impseglay ofay aay entlemangay ithinway ethay ortsay ofay ovegray
ichwhay edgeday ethay arkpay: ehay asway ovingmay atthay ayway; anday earfulfay ofay itsay eingbay
mray. Arcyday, eshay asway irectlyday etreatingray. Utbay ethay ersonpay owhay advanceday asway
ownay earnay enoughay otay eesay erhay, anday eppingstay orwardfay ithway eagernessay,
onouncedpray erhay amenay. Eshay adhay urnedtay awayay; utbay onay earinghay erselfhay alledcay,
oughthay inay aay oicevay ichwhay ovedpray itay otay ebay mray. Arcyday, eshay ovedmay againay
owardstay ethay ategay. Ehay adhay byay atthay imetay eachedray itay alsoay; anday, oldinghay outay
aay etterlay, ichwhay eshay instinctivelyay ooktay, aidsay, ithway aay ooklay ofay aughtyhay
omposurecay, i“ay avehay eenbay alkingway inay ethay ovegray omesay imetay, inay ethay opehay ofay
eetingmay ouyay. Illway ouyay oday emay ethay onourhay ofay eadingray atthay etterlay?” anday
enthay, ithway aay ightslay owbay, urnedtay againay intoay ethay antationplay, anday asway oonsay
outay ofay ightsay.

Ithway onay expectationay ofay easureplay, utbay ithway ethay ongeststray uriositycay,
Elizabethay openeday ethay etterlay, anday otay erhay illstay increasingay onderway,
erceivedpay anay envelopeay ontainingcay otway eetsshay ofay etterlay aperpay, ittenwray
uiteqay oughthray, inay aay eryvay oseclay andhay. Ethay envelopeay itselfay asway ikewiselay
ullfay. Ursuingpay erhay ayway alongay ethay anelay, eshay enthay eganbay itay. Itay asway atedday
omfray Osingsray, atay eightay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay, anday asway asay ollowsfay:--

e“bay otnay alarmeday, adammay, onay eceivingray isthay etterlay, byay ethay apprehensionay ofay
itsay ontainingcay anyay epetitionray ofay osethay entimentssay, oray enewalray ofay osethay
offersay, ichwhay ereway astlay ightnay osay isgustingday otay ouyay. Iay itewray ithoutway anyay
intentionay ofay ainingpay ouyay, oray umblinghay elfmysay, byay ellingdway onay ishesway,
ichwhay, orfay ethay appinesshay ofay othbay, annotcay ebay ootay oonsay orgottenfay; anday ethay
effortay ichwhay ethay ormationfay anday ethay erusalpay ofay isthay etterlay ustmay occasionay,
ouldshay avehay eenbay aredspay, adhay otnay myay aracterchay equiredray itay otay ebay ittenwray
anday eadray. Ouyay ustmay, ereforethay, ardonpay ethay eedomfray ithway ichwhay Iay emandday
ouryay attentionay; ouryay eelingsfay, Iay owknay, illway estowbay itay unwillinglyay, utbay Iay
emandday itay ofay ouryay usticejay.

o“tway offencesay ofay aay eryvay ifferentday aturenay, anday byay onay eansmay ofay equalay
agnitudemay, ouyay astlay ightnay aidlay otay myay argechay. Ethay irstfay entionedmay asway,
atthay, egardlessray ofay ethay entimentssay ofay eitheray, Iay adhay etachedday mray. Ingleybay
omfray ouryay ister,--andsay ethay otheray, atthay Iay adhay, inay efianceday ofay ariousvay
aimsclay, inay efianceday ofay onourhay anday umanityhay, uinedray ethay immediateay
osperitypray anday astedblay ethay ospectspray ofay mray. Ickhamway. Ilfullyway anday
antonlyway otay avehay ownthray offay ethay ompanioncay ofay myay outhyay, ethay acknowledgeday
avouritefay ofay myay atherfay, aay oungyay anmay owhay adhay arcelyscay anyay otheray
ependenceday anthay onay ouray atronagepay, anday owhay adhay eenbay oughtbray upay otay expectay
itsay exertionay, ouldway ebay aay epravityday, otay ichwhay ethay eparationsay ofay otway oungyay
ersonspay osewhay affectionay ouldcay ebay ethay owthgray ofay onlyay aay ewfay eeksway, ouldcay
earbay onay omparisoncay. Utbay omfray ethay everitysay ofay atthay ameblay ichwhay asway astlay
ightnay osay iberallylay estowedbay, espectingray eachay ircumstancecay, Iay allshay opehay
otay ebay inay uturefay ecuredsay, enwhay ethay ollowingfay accountay ofay myay actionsay anday
eirthay otivesmay ashay eenbay eadray. Ifay, inay ethay explanationay ofay emthay ichwhay isay ueday
otay elfmysay, Iay amay underay ethay ecessitynay ofay elatingray eelingsfay ichwhay aymay ebay
offensiveay otay oursyay, Iay ancay onlyay aysay atthay Iay amay orrysay. Ethay ecessitynay ustmay
ebay obeyeday, anday urtherfay apologyay ouldway ebay absurday. Iay adhay otnay eenbay onglay inay
Ertfordshirehay eforebay Iay awsay, inay ommoncay ithway othersay, atthay Ingleybay
eferredpray ouryay elderay istersay otay anyay otheray oungyay omanway inay ethay ountrycay. Utbay
itay asway otnay illtay ethay eveningay ofay ethay anceday atay Etherfieldnay atthay Iay adhay anyay
apprehensionay ofay ishay eelingfay aay erioussay attachmentay. Iay adhay oftenay eensay imhay
inay ovelay eforebay. Atay atthay allbay, ilewhay Iay adhay ethay onourhay ofay ancingday ithway
ouyay, Iay asway irstfay ademay acquainteday, byay Irsay Illiamway Ucas’slay accidentalay
informationay, atthay Ingley’sbay attentionsay otay ouryay istersay adhay ivengay iseray otay
aay eneralgay expectationay ofay eirthay arriagemay. Ehay okespay ofay itay asay aay ertaincay
eventay, ofay ichwhay ethay imetay aloneay ouldcay ebay undecideday. Omfray atthay omentmay Iay
observeday myay iend’sfray ehaviourbay attentivelyay; anday Iay ouldcay enthay erceivepay
atthay ishay artialitypay orfay Issmay Ennetbay asway eyondbay atwhay Iay adhay everay itnessedway
inay imhay. Ouryay istersay Iay alsoay atchedway. Erhay ooklay anday annersmay ereway openay,
eerfulchay, anday engagingay asay everay, utbay ithoutway anyay omsymptay ofay eculiarpay
egardray; anday Iay emainedray onvincedcay, omfray ethay evening’say utinyscray, atthay
oughthay eshay eceivedray ishay attentionsay ithway easureplay, eshay idday otnay inviteay
emthay byay anyay articipationpay ofay entimentsay. Ifay ou_yay_ avehay otnay eenbay istakenmay
erehay, i_ay_ ustmay avehay eenbay inay anay erroray. Ouryay uperiorsay owledgeknay ofay ouryay
istersay ustmay akemay ethay atterlay obablepray. Ifay itay ebay osay, ifay Iay avehay eenbay isledmay
byay uchsay erroray otay inflictay ainpay onay erhay, ouryay esentmentray ashay otnay eenbay
unreasonableay. Utbay Iay allshay otnay uplescray otay assertay, atthay ethay erenitysay ofay
ouryay ister’ssay ountenancecay anday airay asway uchsay asay ightmay avehay ivengay ethay ostmay
acuteay observeray aay onvictioncay atthay, oweverhay amiableay erhay empertay, erhay earthay
asway otnay ikelylay otay ebay easilyay ouchedtay. Atthay Iay asway esirousday ofay elievingbay
erhay indifferentay isay ertaincay; utbay Iay illway enturevay otay aysay atthay myay
investigationsay anday ecisionsday areay otnay usuallyay influenceday byay myay opeshay oray
earsfay. Iay idday otnay elievebay erhay otay ebay indifferentay ecausebay Iay ishedway itay; Iay
elievedbay itay onay impartialay onvictioncay, asay ulytray asay Iay ishedway itay inay easonray.
myay objectionsay otay ethay arriagemay ereway otnay erelymay osethay ichwhay Iay astlay ightnay
acknowledgeday otay avehay equiredray ethay utmostay orcefay ofay assionpay otay utpay asideay
inay myay ownay asecay; ethay antway ofay onnectioncay ouldcay otnay ebay osay eatgray anay evilay otay
myay iendfray asay otay emay. Utbay erethay ereway otheray ausescay ofay epugnanceray; ausescay
ichwhay, oughthay illstay existingay, anday existingay otay anay equalay egreeday inay othbay
instancesay, Iay adhay elfmysay endeavoureday otay orgetfay, ecausebay eythay ereway otnay
immediatelyay eforebay emay. Esethay ausescay ustmay ebay atedstay, oughthay ieflybray. Ethay
ituationsay ofay ouryay other’smay amilyfay, oughthay objectionableay, asway othingnay inay
omparisoncay ofay atthay otaltay antway ofay oprietypray osay equentlyfray, osay almostay
uniformlyay etrayedbay byay erselfhay, byay ouryay eethray oungeryay isterssay, anday
occasionallyay evenay byay ouryay ather:--pardonfay e,--itmay ainspay emay otay offenday
ouyay. Utbay amidstay ouryay oncerncay orfay ethay efectsday ofay ouryay earestnay elationsray,
anday ouryay ispleasureday atay isthay epresentationray ofay emthay, etlay itay ivegay ouyay
onsolationcay otay onsidercay atthay otay avehay onductedcay ourselvesyay osay asay otay avoiday
anyay areshay ofay ethay ikelay ensurecay isay aisepray onay esslay enerallygay estowedbay onay
ouyay anday ouryay eldestay istersay anthay itay isay onourablehay otay ethay ensesay anday
ispositionday ofay othbay. Iay illway onlyay aysay, artherfay, atthay omfray atwhay assedpay
atthay eveningay myay opinionay ofay allay artiespay asway onfirmedcay, anday everyay
inducementay eightenedhay, ichwhay ouldcay avehay edlay emay eforebay otay eservepray myay
iendfray omfray atwhay Iay esteemeday aay ostmay unhappyay onnectioncay. Ehay eftlay
Etherfieldnay orfay Ondonlay onay ethay ayday ollowingfay, asay ouyay, Iay amay ertaincay,
ememberray, ithway ethay esignday ofay oonsay eturningray. Ethay artpay ichwhay Iay acteday isay
ownay otay ebay explaineday. Ishay isterssay’ uneasinessay adhay eenbay equallyay exciteday
ithway myay ownay: ouray oincidencecay ofay eelingfay asway oonsay iscoveredday; anday, alikeay
ensiblesay atthay onay imetay asway otay ebay ostlay inay etachingday eirthay otherbray, eway
ortlyshay esolvedray onay oiningjay imhay irectlyday inay Ondonlay. Eway accordinglyay
ent--andway erethay Iay eadilyray engageday inay ethay officeay ofay ointingpay outay otay myay
iendfray ethay ertaincay evilsay ofay uchsay aay oicechay. Iay escribedday anday enforceday emthay
earnestlyay. Utbay oweverhay isthay emonstranceray ightmay avehay aggeredstay oray elayedday
ishay eterminationday, Iay oday otnay upposesay atthay itay ouldway ultimatelyay avehay
eventedpray ethay arriagemay, adhay itay otnay eenbay econdedsay byay ethay assuranceay, ichwhay
Iay esitatedhay otnay inay ivinggay, ofay ouryay ister’ssay indifferenceay. Ehay adhay eforebay
elievedbay erhay otay eturnray ishay affectionay ithway inceresay, ifay otnay ithway equalay,
egardray. Utbay Ingleybay ashay eatgray aturalnay odestymay, ithway aay ongerstray
ependenceday onay myay udgmentjay anthay onay ishay ownay. Otay onvincecay imhay, ereforethay,
atthay ehay adhay eceivedday imselfhay asway onay eryvay ifficultday ointpay. Otay ersuadepay
imhay againstay eturningray intoay Ertfordshirehay, enwhay atthay onvictioncay adhay eenbay
ivengay, asway arcelyscay ethay orkway ofay aay omentmay. Iay annotcay ameblay elfmysay orfay
avinghay oneday usthay uchmay. Erethay isay utbay oneay artpay ofay myay onductcay, inay ethay olewhay
affairay, onay ichwhay Iay oday otnay eflectray ithway atisfactionsay; itay isay atthay Iay
ondescendedcay otay adoptay ethay easuresmay ofay artay osay arfay asay otay oncealcay omfray imhay
ouryay ister’ssay eingbay inay owntay. Iay ewknay itay elfmysay, asay itay asway ownknay otay Issmay
Ingleybay; utbay erhay otherbray isay evenay etyay ignorantay ofay itay. Atthay eythay ightmay
avehay etmay ithoutway illay onsequencecay isay, erhapspay, obablepray; utbay ishay egardray
idday otnay appearay otay emay enoughay extinguisheday orfay imhay otay eesay erhay ithoutway omesay
angerday. Erhapspay isthay oncealmentcay, isthay isguiseday, asway eneathbay emay. Itay isay
oneday, oweverhay, anday itay asway oneday orfay ethay estbay. Onay isthay ubjectsay Iay avehay
othingnay oremay otay aysay, onay otheray apologyay otay offeray. Ifay Iay avehay oundedway ouryay
ister’ssay eelingsfay, itay asway unknowinglyay oneday; anday oughthay ethay otivesmay ichwhay
overnedgay emay aymay otay ouyay eryvay aturallynay appearay insufficientay, Iay avehay otnay
etyay earntlay otay ondemncay em.--wiThthay espectray otay atthay otheray, oremay eightyway
accusationay, ofay avinghay injureday mray. Ickhamway, Iay ancay onlyay efuteray itay byay
ayinglay eforebay ouyay ethay olewhay ofay ishay onnectioncay ithway myay amilyfay. Ofay atwhay ehay
ashay articularly_pay_ accuseday emay Iay amay ignorantay; utbay ofay ethay uthtray ofay atwhay Iay
allshay elateray Iay ancay ummonsay oremay anthay oneay itnessway ofay undoubteday eracityvay.
mray. Ickhamway isay ethay onsay ofay aay eryvay espectableray anmay, owhay adhay orfay anymay earsyay
ethay anagementmay ofay allay ethay Emberleypay estatesay, anday osewhay oodgay onductcay inay
ethay ischargeday ofay ishay usttray aturallynay inclineday myay atherfay otay ebay ofay ervicesay
otay imhay; anday onay Eorgegay Ickhamway, owhay asway ishay odsongay, ishay indnesskay asway
ereforethay iberallylay estowedbay. myay atherfay upportedsay imhay atay oolschay, anday
afterwardsay atay Ambridgecay; ostmay importantay assistanceay, asay ishay ownay atherfay,
alwaysay oorpay omfray ethay extravaganceay ofay ishay ifeway, ouldway avehay eenbay unableay otay
ivegay imhay aay entleman’sgay educationay. myay atherfay asway otnay onlyay ondfay ofay isthay
oungyay an’smay ocietysay, osewhay annersmay ereway alwaysay engagingay, ehay adhay alsoay ethay
ighesthay opinionay ofay imhay, anday opinghay ethay urchchay ouldway ebay ishay ofessionpray,
intendeday otay ovidepray orfay imhay inay itay. Asay orfay elfmysay, itay isay anymay, anymay earsyay
incesay Iay irstfay eganbay otay inkthay ofay imhay inay aay eryvay ifferentday annermay. Ethay
iciousvay opensitiespray, ethay antway ofay inciplepray, ichwhay ehay asway arefulcay otay
uardgay omfray ethay owledgeknay ofay ishay estbay iendfray, ouldcay otnay escapeay ethay
observationay ofay aay oungyay anmay ofay earlynay ethay amesay ageay ithway imselfhay, anday owhay
adhay opportunitiesay ofay eeingsay imhay inay unguardeday omentsmay, ichwhay mray. Arcyday
ouldcay otnay avehay. Erehay againay Iay allshay ivegay ouyay ain--topay atwhay egreeday ouyay
onlyay ancay elltay. Utbay ateverwhay aymay ebay ethay entimentssay ichwhay mray. Ickhamway ashay
eatedcray, aay uspicionsay ofay eirthay aturenay allshay otnay eventpray emay omfray unfoldingay
ishay ealray aracterchay. Itay addsay evenay anotheray otivemay. myay excellentay atherfay
iedday aboutay ivefay earsyay agoay; anday ishay attachmentay otay mray. Ickhamway asway otay ethay
astlay osay eadystay, atthay inay ishay illway ehay articularlypay ecommendedray itay otay emay otay
omotepray ishay advancementay inay ethay estbay annermay atthay ishay ofessionpray ightmay
alloway, anday ifay ehay ooktay ordersay, esiredday atthay aay aluablevay amilyfay ivinglay
ightmay ebay ishay asay oonsay asay itay ecamebay acantvay. Erethay asway alsoay aay egacylay ofay
oneay ousandthay oundspay. Ishay ownay atherfay idday otnay onglay urvivesay inemay; anday
ithinway alfhay aay earyay omfray esethay eventsay mray. Ickhamway otewray otay informay emay
atthay, avinghay inallyfay esolvedray againstay akingtay ordersay, ehay opedhay Iay ouldshay
otnay inkthay itay unreasonableay orfay imhay otay expectay omesay oremay immediateay
ecuniarypay advantageay, inay ieulay ofay ethay efermentpray, byay ichwhay ehay ouldcay otnay ebay
enefitedbay. Ehay adhay omesay intentionay, ehay addeday, ofay udyingstay ethay awlay, anday Iay
ustmay ebay awareay atthay ethay interestay ofay oneay ousandthay oundspay ouldway ebay aay eryvay
insufficientay upportsay ereinthay. Iay atherray ishedway anthay elievedbay imhay otay ebay
inceresay; utbay, atay anyay ateray, asway erfectlypay eadyray otay accedeay otay ishay
oposalpray. Iay ewknay atthay mray. Ickhamway oughtay otnay otay ebay aay ergymanclay. Ethay
usinessbay asway ereforethay oonsay ettledsay. Ehay esignedray allay aimclay otay assistanceay
inay ethay urchchay, ereway itay ossiblepay atthay ehay ouldcay everay ebay inay aay ituationsay otay
eceiveray itay, anday accepteday inay eturnray eethray ousandthay oundspay. Allay onnectioncay
etweenbay usay eemedsay ownay issolvedday. Iay oughtthay ootay illay ofay imhay otay inviteay imhay
otay Emberleypay, oray admitay ishay ocietysay inay owntay. Inay owntay, Iay elievebay, ehay
ieflychay ivedlay, utbay ishay udyingstay ethay awlay asway aay eremay etencepray; anday eingbay
ownay eefray omfray allay estraintray, ishay ifelay asway aay ifelay ofay idlenessay anday
issipationday. Orfay aboutay eethray earsyay Iay eardhay ittlelay ofay imhay; utbay onay ethay
eceaseday ofay ethay incumbentay ofay ethay ivinglay ichwhay adhay eenbay esignedday orfay imhay,
ehay applieday otay emay againay byay etterlay orfay ethay esentationpray. Ishay
ircumstancescay, ehay assureday emay, anday Iay adhay onay ifficultyday inay elievingbay itay,
ereway exceedinglyay adbay. Ehay adhay oundfay ethay awlay aay ostmay unprofitableay udystay,
anday asway ownay absolutelyay esolvedray onay eingbay ordaineday, ifay Iay ouldway esentpray
imhay otay ethay ivinglay inay uestion--ofqay ichwhay ehay ustedtray erethay ouldcay ebay ittlelay
oubtday, asay ehay asway ellway assureday atthay Iay adhay onay otheray ersonpay otay ovidepray orfay,
anday Iay ouldcay otnay avehay orgottenfay myay everedray ather’sfay intentionsay. Ouyay illway
ardlyhay ameblay emay orfay efusingray otay omplycay ithway isthay entreatyay, oray orfay
esistingray everyay epetitionray ofay itay. Ishay esentmentray asway inay oportionpray otay
ethay istressday ofay ishay ircumstances--andcay ehay asway oubtlessday asay iolentvay inay
ishay abuseay ofay emay otay othersay asay inay ishay eproachesray otay elfmysay. Afteray isthay
eriodpay, everyay appearanceay ofay acquaintanceay asway oppeddray. Owhay ehay ivedlay, Iay
owknay otnay. Utbay astlay ummersay ehay asway againay ostmay ainfullypay obtrudeday onay myay
oticenay. Iay ustmay ownay entionmay aay ircumstancecay ichwhay Iay ouldway ishway otay orgetfay
elfmysay, anday ichwhay onay obligationay esslay anthay ethay esentpray ouldshay induceay emay
otay unfolday otay anyay umanhay eingbay. Avinghay aidsay usthay uchmay, Iay eelfay onay oubtday ofay
ouryay ecrecysay. myay istersay, owhay isay oremay anthay entay earsyay myay uniorjay, asway eftlay
otay ethay uardianshipgay ofay myay other’smay ephewnay, Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay, anday
elfmysay. Aboutay aay earyay agoay, eshay asway akentay omfray oolschay, anday anay
establishmentay ormedfay orfay erhay inay Ondonlay; anday astlay ummersay eshay entway ithway
ethay adylay owhay esidedpray overay itay otay Amsgateray; anday itherthay alsoay entway mray.
Ickhamway, undoubtedlyay byay esignday; orfay erethay ovedpray otay avehay eenbay aay iorpray
acquaintanceay etweenbay imhay anday mrsay. Oungeyay, inay osewhay aracterchay eway ereway
ostmay unhappilyay eceivedday; anday byay erhay onnivancecay anday aiday ehay osay arfay
ecommendedray imselfhay otay Eorgianagay, osewhay affectionateay earthay etainedray aay
ongstray impressionay ofay ishay indnesskay otay erhay asay aay ildchay, atthay eshay asway
ersuadedpay otay elievebay erselfhay inay ovelay anday otay onsentcay otay anay elopementay. Eshay
asway enthay utbay ifteenfay, ichwhay ustmay ebay erhay excuseay; anday afteray atingstay erhay
imprudenceay, Iay amay appyhay otay adday, atthay Iay oweday ethay owledgeknay ofay itay otay
erselfhay. Iay oinedjay emthay unexpectedlyay aay ayday oray otway eforebay ethay intendeday
elopementay; anday enthay Eorgianagay, unableay otay upportsay ethay ideaay ofay ievinggray
anday offendingay aay otherbray omwhay eshay almostay ookedlay upay otay asay aay atherfay,
acknowledgeday ethay olewhay otay emay. Ouyay aymay imagineay atwhay Iay eltfay anday owhay Iay
acteday. Egardray orfay myay ister’ssay editcray anday eelingsfay eventedpray anyay ublicpay
exposureay; utbay Iay otewray otay mray. Ickhamway, owhay eftlay ethay aceplay immediatelyay,
anday mrsay. Oungeyay asway ofay oursecay emovedray omfray erhay argechay. mray. Ickham’sway
iefchay objectay asway unquestionablyay myay ister’ssay ortunefay, ichwhay isay irtythay
ousandthay oundspay; utbay Iay annotcay elphay upposingsay atthay ethay opehay ofay evengingray
imselfhay onay emay asway aay ongstray inducementay. Ishay evengeray ouldway avehay eenbay
ompletecay indeeday. Isthay, adammay, isay aay aithfulfay arrativenay ofay everyay eventay inay
ichwhay eway avehay eenbay oncernedcay ogethertay; anday ifay ouyay oday otnay absolutelyay
ejectray itay asay alsefay, ouyay illway, Iay opehay, acquitay emay enceforthhay ofay ueltycray
owardstay mray. Ickhamway. Iay owknay otnay inay atwhay annermay, underay atwhay ormfay ofay
alsehoodfay, ehay ashay imposeday onay ouyay; utbay ishay uccesssay isay otnay erhapspay otay ebay
onderedway atay, ignorantay asay ouyay eviouslypray ereway ofay everythingay oncerningcay
eitheray. Etectionday ouldcay otnay ebay inay ouryay owerpay, anday uspicionsay ertainlycay
otnay inay ouryay inclinationay. Ouyay aymay ossiblypay onderway whyay allay isthay asway otnay
oldtay ouyay astlay ightnay. Utbay Iay asway otnay enthay astermay enoughay ofay elfmysay otay owknay
atwhay ouldcay oray oughtay otay ebay evealedray. Orfay ethay uthtray ofay everythingay erehay
elatedray, Iay ancay appealay oremay articularlypay otay ethay estimonytay ofay Olonelcay
Itzwilliamfay, owhay, omfray ouray earnay elationshipray anday onstantcay intimacyay, anday
illstay oremay asay oneay ofay ethay executorsay ofay myay ather’sfay illway, ashay eenbay
unavoidablyay acquainteday ithway everyay articularpay ofay esethay ansactionstray. Ifay
ouryay abhorrenceay ofay e_may_ ouldshay akemay _myay_ assertionsay aluelessvay, ouyay
annotcay ebay eventedpray byay ethay amesay ausecay omfray onfidingcay inay myay ousincay; anday
atthay erethay aymay ebay ethay ossibilitypay ofay onsultingcay imhay, Iay allshay endeavouray
otay indfay omesay opportunityay ofay uttingpay isthay etterlay inay ouryay andshay inay ethay
oursecay ofay ethay orningmay. Iay illway onlyay adday, Odgay essblay ouyay.

iTZWILLIAM“fay ARCYday.”




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay Ixxxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay, enwhay mray. Arcyday avegay erhay ethay etterlay, idday otnay expectay itay otay
ontaincay aay enewalray ofay ishay offersay, eshay adhay ormedfay onay expectationay atay allay ofay
itsay ontentscay. Utbay uchsay asay eythay ereway, itay aymay ebay ellway upposedsay owhay eagerlyay
eshay entway oughthray emthay, anday atwhay aay ontrarietycay ofay emotionay eythay exciteday.
Erhay eelingsfay asay eshay eadray ereway arcelyscay otay ebay efinedday. Ithway amazementay idday
eshay irstfay understanday atthay ehay elievedbay anyay apologyay otay ebay inay ishay owerpay;
anday eadfastlystay asway eshay ersuadedpay, atthay ehay ouldcay avehay onay explanationay otay
ivegay, ichwhay aay ustjay ensesay ofay ameshay ouldway otnay oncealcay. Ithway aay ongstray
ejudicepray againstay everythingay ehay ightmay aysay, eshay eganbay ishay accountay ofay
atwhay adhay appenedhay atay Etherfieldnay. Eshay eadray ithway anay eagernessay ichwhay
ardlyhay eftlay erhay owerpay ofay omprehensioncay; anday omfray impatienceay ofay owingknay
atwhay ethay extnay entencesay ightmay ingbray, asway incapableay ofay attendingay otay ethay
ensesay ofay ethay oneay eforebay erhay eyesay. Ishay eliefbay ofay erhay ister’ssay
insensibilityay eshay instantlyay esolvedray otay ebay alsefay; anday ishay accountay ofay ethay
ealray, ethay orstway objectionsay otay ethay atchmay, ademay erhay ootay angryay otay avehay anyay
ishway ofay oingday imhay usticejay. Ehay expresseday onay egretray orfay atwhay ehay adhay oneday
ichwhay atisfiedsay erhay; ishay estylay asway otnay enitentpay, utbay aughtyhay. Itay asway allay
idepray anday insolenceay.

Utbay enwhay isthay ubjectsay asway ucceededsay byay ishay accountay ofay mray. Ickham--whenway
eshay eadray, ithway omewhatsay earerclay attentionay, aay elationray ofay eventsay ichwhay,
ifay uetray, ustmay overthroway everyay erishedchay opinionay ofay ishay orthway, anday ichwhay
orebay osay alarmingay anay affinityay otay ishay ownay istoryhay ofay imself--herhay eelingsfay
ereway etyay oremay acutelyay ainfulpay anday oremay ifficultday ofay efinitionday.
Astonishmentay, apprehensionay, anday evenay orrorhay, oppresseday erhay. Eshay ishedway
otay iscreditday itay entirelyay, epeatedlyray exclaimingay, iS“thay ustmay ebay alsefay!
Isthay annotcay ebay! Isthay ustmay ebay ethay ossestgray alsehood!”--andfay enwhay eshay adhay
onegay oughthray ethay olewhay etterlay, oughthay arcelyscay owingknay anythingay ofay ethay
astlay agepay oray otway, utpay itay astilyhay awayay, otestingpray atthay eshay ouldway otnay
egardray itay, atthay eshay ouldway evernay ooklay inay itay againay.

Inay isthay erturbedpay atestay ofay indmay, ithway oughtsthay atthay ouldcay estray onay
othingnay, eshay alkedway onay; utbay itay ouldway otnay oday: inay alfhay aay inutemay ethay etterlay
asway unfoldeday againay; anday ollectingcay erselfhay asay ellway asay eshay ouldcay, eshay
againay eganbay ethay ortifyingmay erusalpay ofay allay atthay elatedray otay Ickhamway, anday
ommandedcay erselfhay osay arfay asay otay examineay ethay eaningmay ofay everyay entencesay.
Ethay accountay ofay ishay onnectioncay ithway ethay Emberleypay amilyfay asway exactlyay
atwhay ehay adhay elatedray imselfhay; anday ethay indnesskay ofay ethay atelay mray. Arcyday,
oughthay eshay adhay otnay eforebay ownknay itsay extentay, agreeday equallyay ellway ithway ishay
ownay ordsway. Osay arfay eachay ecitalray onfirmedcay ethay otheray; utbay enwhay eshay amecay otay
ethay illway, ethay ifferenceday asway eatgray. Atwhay Ickhamway adhay aidsay ofay ethay ivinglay
asway eshfray inay erhay emorymay; anday asay eshay ecalledray ishay eryvay ordsway, itay asway
impossibleay otnay otay eelfay atthay erethay asway ossgray uplicityday onay oneay idesay oray ethay
otheray, anday, orfay aay ewfay omentsmay, eshay atteredflay erselfhay atthay erhay ishesway idday
otnay erray. Utbay enwhay eshay eadray anday e-readray, ithway ethay osestclay attentionay, ethay
articularspay immediatelyay ollowingfay ofay Ickham’sway esigningray allay etensionspray
otay ethay ivinglay, ofay ishay eceivingray inay ieulay osay onsiderablecay aay umsay asay eethray
ousandthay oundspay, againay asway eshay orcedfay otay esitatehay. Eshay utpay ownday ethay
etterlay, eighedway everyay ircumstancecay ithway atwhay eshay eantmay otay ebay
impartiality--deliberateday onay ethay obabilitypray ofay eachay atement--butstay ithway
ittlelay uccesssay. Onay othbay idessay itay asway onlyay assertionay. Againay eshay eadray onay.
Utbay everyay inelay ovedpray oremay earlyclay atthay ethay affairay, ichwhay eshay adhay
elievedbay itay impossibleay atthay anyay ontrivancecay ouldcay osay epresentray asay otay
enderray mray. Arcy’sday onductcay inay itay esslay anthay infamousay, asway apablecay ofay aay
urntay ichwhay ustmay akemay imhay entirelyay amelessblay oughoutthray ethay olewhay.

Ethay extravaganceay anday eneralgay ofligacypray ichwhay ehay upledscray otnay otay aylay otay
mray. Ickham’sway argechay exceedinglyay ockedshay erhay; ethay oremay osay, asay eshay ouldcay
ingbray onay oofpray ofay itsay injusticeay. Eshay adhay evernay eardhay ofay imhay eforebay ishay
entranceay intoay ethay ire----shay ilitiamay, inay ichwhay ehay adhay engageday atay ethay
ersuasionpay ofay ethay oungyay anmay, owhay, onay eetingmay imhay accidentallyay inay owntay,
adhay erethay enewedray aay ightslay acquaintanceay. Ofay ishay ormerfay ayway ofay ifelay,
othingnay adhay eenbay ownknay inay Ertfordshirehay utbay atwhay ehay oldtay

iLlustration[ay:

eEting“may accidentallyay inay Owntay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

imselfhay. Asay otay ishay ealray aracterchay, adhay informationay eenbay inay erhay owerpay,
eshay adhay evernay eltfay aay ishway ofay inquiringay. Ishay ountenancecay, oicevay, anday
annermay, adhay establisheday imhay atay onceay inay ethay ossessionpay ofay everyay irtuevay.
Eshay iedtray otay ecollectray omesay instanceay ofay oodnessgay, omesay istinguishedday
aittray ofay integrityay oray enevolencebay, atthay ightmay escueray imhay omfray ethay
attacksay ofay mray. Arcyday; oray atay eastlay, byay ethay edominancepray ofay irtuevay, atoneay
orfay osethay asualcay errorsay, underay ichwhay eshay ouldway endeavouray otay assclay atwhay
mray. Arcyday adhay escribedday asay ethay idlenessay anday icevay ofay anymay earsyay’
ontinuancecay. Utbay onay uchsay ecollectionray efriendedbay erhay. Eshay ouldcay eesay imhay
instantlyay eforebay erhay, inay everyay armchay ofay airay anday addressay, utbay eshay ouldcay
ememberray onay oremay ubstantialsay oodgay anthay ethay eneralgay approbationay ofay ethay
eighbourhoodnay, anday ethay egardray ichwhay ishay ocialsay owerspay adhay ainedgay imhay inay
ethay essmay. Afteray ausingpay onay isthay ointpay aay onsiderablecay ilewhay, eshay onceay
oremay ontinuedcay otay eadray. Utbay, alasay! ethay orystay ichwhay ollowedfay, ofay ishay
esignsday onay Issmay Arcyday, eceivedray omesay onfirmationcay omfray atwhay adhay assedpay
etweenbay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay anday erselfhay onlyay ethay orningmay eforebay; anday atay
astlay eshay asway eferredray orfay ethay uthtray ofay everyay articularpay otay Olonelcay
Itzwilliamfay imself--fromhay omwhay eshay adhay eviouslypray eceivedray ethay
informationay ofay ishay earnay oncerncay inay allay ishay ousin’scay affairsay anday osewhay
aracterchay eshay adhay onay easonray otay uestionqay. Atay oneay imetay eshay adhay almostay
esolvedray onay applyingay otay imhay, utbay ethay ideaay asway eckedchay byay ethay awkwardnessay
ofay ethay applicationay, anday atay engthlay ollywhay anishedbay byay ethay onvictioncay atthay
mray. Arcyday ouldway evernay avehay azardedhay uchsay aay oposalpray, ifay ehay adhay otnay eenbay
ellway assureday ofay ishay ousin’scay orroborationcay.

Eshay erfectlypay ememberedray everythingay atthay adhay assedpay inay onversationcay
etweenbay Ickhamway anday erselfhay inay eirthay irstfay eveningay atay mray. Ilips’sphay.
Anymay ofay ishay expressionsay ereway illstay eshfray inay erhay emorymay. Eshay asway ow_nay_
uckstray ithway ethay improprietyay ofay uchsay ommunicationscay otay aay angerstray, anday
onderedway itay adhay escapeday erhay eforebay. Eshay awsay ethay indelicacyay ofay uttingpay
imselfhay orwardfay asay ehay adhay oneday, anday ethay inconsistencyay ofay ishay ofessionspray
ithway ishay onductcay. Eshay ememberedray atthay ehay adhay oastedbay ofay avinghay onay earfay
ofay eeingsay mray. Arcy--thatday mray. Arcyday ightmay eavelay ethay ountrycay, utbay atthay
e_hay_ ouldshay andstay ishay oundgray; etyay ehay adhay avoideday ethay Etherfieldnay allbay
ethay eryvay extnay eekway. Eshay ememberedray, alsoay, atthay illtay ethay Etherfieldnay
amilyfay adhay uittedqay ethay ountrycay, ehay adhay oldtay ishay orystay otay onay oneay utbay
erselfhay; utbay atthay afteray eirthay emovalray, itay adhay eenbay everywhereay iscussedday;
atthay ehay adhay enthay onay eservesray, onay uplesscray inay inkingsay mray. Arcy’sday
aracterchay, oughthay ehay adhay assureday erhay atthay espectray orfay ethay atherfay ouldway
alwaysay eventpray ishay exposingay ethay onsay.

Owhay ifferentlyday idday everythingay ownay appearay inay ichwhay ehay asway oncernedcay! Ishay
attentionsay otay Issmay Ingkay ereway ownay ethay onsequencecay ofay iewsvay olelysay anday
atefullyhay ercenarymay; anday ethay ediocritymay ofay erhay ortunefay ovedpray onay ongerlay
ethay oderationmay ofay ishay ishesway, utbay ishay eagernessay otay aspgray atay anythingay.
Ishay ehaviourbay otay erselfhay ouldcay ownay avehay adhay onay olerabletay otivemay: ehay adhay
eitheray eenbay eceivedday ithway egardray otay erhay ortunefay, oray adhay eenbay atifyinggray
ishay anityvay byay encouragingay ethay eferencepray ichwhay eshay elievedbay eshay adhay ostmay
incautiouslyay ownshay. Everyay ingeringlay ugglestray inay ishay avourfay ewgray ainterfay
anday ainterfay; anday inay urtherfay ustificationjay ofay mray. Arcyday, eshay ouldcay otnay
utbay alloway atthay mray. Ingleybay, enwhay uestionedqay byay Anejay, adhay onglay agoay
asserteday ishay amelessnessblay inay ethay affair;--thatay, oudpray anday epulsiveray asay
ereway ishay annersmay, eshay adhay evernay, inay ethay olewhay oursecay ofay eirthay
acquaintance--anay acquaintanceay ichwhay adhay atterlylay oughtbray emthay uchmay
ogethertay, anday ivengay erhay aay ortsay ofay intimacyay ithway ishay ays--seenway anythingay
atthay etrayedbay imhay otay ebay unprincipleday oray unjust--anythingay atthay okespay imhay
ofay irreligiousay oray immoralay abits;--thathay amongay ishay ownay onnectionscay ehay asway
esteemeday anday alued;--thatvay evenay Ickhamway adhay alloweday imhay eritmay asay aay
otherbray, anday atthay eshay adhay oftenay eardhay imhay eakspay osay affectionatelyay ofay ishay
istersay asay otay ovepray imhay apablecay ofay omesay amiableay eeling;--thatfay adhay ishay
actionsay eenbay atwhay Ickhamway epresentedray emthay, osay ossgray aay iolationvay ofay
everythingay ightray ouldcay ardlyhay avehay eenbay oncealedcay omfray ethay orldway; anday
atthay iendshipfray etweenbay aay ersonpay apablecay ofay itay anday uchsay anay amiableay anmay
asay mray. Ingleybay asway incomprehensibleay.

Eshay ewgray absolutelyay ashameday ofay erselfhay. Ofay eithernay Arcyday ornay Ickhamway
ouldcay eshay inkthay, ithoutway eelingfay atthay eshay adhay eenbay indblay, artialpay,
ejudicedpray, absurday.

oW“hay espicablyday avehay Iay acteday!” eshay iedcray. i“ay, owhay avehay idedpray elfmysay onay
myay iscernmentday! Iay, owhay avehay aluedvay elfmysay onay myay abilitiesay! owhay avehay
oftenay isdainedday ethay enerousgay andourcay ofay myay istersay, anday atifiedgray myay
anityvay inay uselessay oray amelessblay istrustday. Owhay umiliatinghay isay isthay
iscoveryday! Etyay, owhay ustjay aay umiliationhay! Adhay Iay eenbay inay ovelay, Iay ouldcay otnay
avehay eenbay oremay etchedlywray indblay. Utbay anityvay, otnay ovelay, ashay eenbay myay
ollyfay. Easedplay ithway ethay eferencepray ofay oneay, anday offendeday byay ethay eglectnay
ofay ethay otheray, onay ethay eryvay eginningbay ofay ouray acquaintanceay, Iay avehay ourtedcay
epossessionpray anday ignoranceay, anday ivendray easonray awayay erewhay eitheray ereway
oncernedcay. Illtay isthay omentmay, Iay evernay ewknay elfmysay.”

Omfray erselfhay otay Anejay, omfray Anejay otay Ingleybay, erhay oughtsthay ereway inay aay inelay
ichwhay oonsay oughtbray otay erhay ecollectionray atthay mray. Arcy’sday explanationay
ere_thay_ adhay appeareday eryvay insufficientay; anday eshay eadray itay againay. Idelyway
ifferentday asway ethay effectay ofay aay econdsay erusalpay. Owhay ouldcay eshay enyday atthay
editcray otay ishay assertionsay, inay oneay instanceay, ichwhay eshay adhay eenbay obligeday otay
ivegay inay ethay otheray? Ehay eclaredday imselfhay otay avehay eenbay otallytay unsuspiciousay
ofay erhay ister’ssay attachmentay; anday eshay ouldcay otnay elphay ememberingray atwhay
Arlotte’schay opinionay adhay alwaysay eenbay. Eithernay ouldcay eshay enyday ethay usticejay
ofay ishay escriptionday ofay Anejay. Eshay eltfay atthay Ane’sjay eelingsfay, oughthay
erventfay, ereway ittlelay isplayedday, anday atthay erethay asway aay onstantcay
omplacencycay inay erhay airay anday annermay, otnay oftenay uniteday ithway eatgray
ensibilitysay.

Enwhay eshay amecay otay atthay artpay ofay ethay etterlay inay ichwhay erhay amilyfay ereway
entionedmay, inay onestay ofay uchsay ortifyingmay, etyay eritedmay, eproachray, erhay ensesay
ofay ameshay asway everesay. Ethay usticejay ofay ethay argechay uckstray erhay ootay orciblyfay
orfay enialday; anday ethay ircumstancescay otay ichwhay ehay articularlypay alludeday, asay
avinghay assedpay atay ethay Etherfieldnay allbay, anday asay onfirmingcay allay ishay irstfay
isapprobationday, ouldcay otnay avehay ademay aay ongerstray impressionay onay ishay indmay
anthay onay ershay.

Ethay omplimentcay otay erselfhay anday erhay istersay asway otnay unfeltay. Itay oothedsay, utbay
itay ouldcay otnay onsolecay erhay orfay ethay ontemptcay ichwhay adhay eenbay usthay
elf-attractedsay byay ethay estray ofay erhay amilyfay; anday asay eshay onsideredcay atthay
Ane’sjay isappointmentday adhay, inay actfay, eenbay ethay orkway ofay erhay earestnay
elationsray, anday eflectedray owhay ateriallymay ethay editcray ofay othbay ustmay ebay urthay
byay uchsay improprietyay ofay onductcay, eshay eltfay epressedday eyondbay anythingay eshay
adhay everay ownknay eforebay.

Afteray anderingway alongay ethay anelay orfay otway ourshay, ivinggay ayway otay everyay
arietyvay ofay oughtthay, econsideringray eventsay, eterminingday obabilitiespray, anday
econcilingray erselfhay, asay ellway asay eshay ouldcay, otay aay angechay osay uddensay anday osay
importantay, atiguefay, anday aay ecollectionray ofay erhay onglay absenceay, ademay erhay atay
engthlay eturnray omehay; anday eshay entereday ethay ousehay ithway ethay ishway ofay appearingay
eerfulchay asay usualay, anday ethay esolutionray ofay epressingray uchsay eflectionsray asay
ustmay akemay erhay unfitay orfay onversationcay.

Eshay asway immediatelyay oldtay, atthay ethay otway entlemengay omfray Osingsray adhay eachay
alledcay uringday erhay absenceay; mray. Arcyday, onlyay orfay aay ewfay inutesmay, otay aketay
eavelay, utbay atthay Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay adhay eenbay ittingsay ithway emthay atay eastlay
anay ourhay, opinghay orfay erhay eturnray, anday almostay esolvingray otay alkway afteray erhay
illtay eshay ouldcay ebay oundfay. Elizabethay ouldcay utbay ustjay affect_ay_ oncerncay inay
issingmay imhay; eshay eallyray ejoicedray atay itay. Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay asway onay
ongerlay anay objectay. Eshay ouldcay inkthay onlyay ofay erhay etterlay.




iLlustration[ay:

iS“hay artingpay obeisanceay”
ay]




APTERchay IIxxxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay otway entlemengay eftlay Osingsray ethay extnay orningmay; anday mray. Ollinscay avinghay
eenbay inay aitingway earnay ethay odgeslay, otay akemay emthay ishay artingpay obeisanceay, asway
ableay otay ingbray omehay ethay easingplay intelligenceay ofay eirthay appearingay inay eryvay
oodgay ealthhay, anday inay asay olerabletay iritsspay asay ouldcay ebay expecteday, afteray ethay
elancholymay enescay osay atelylay onegay oughthray atay Osingsray. Otay Osingsray ehay enthay
astenedhay otay onsolecay Adylay Atherinecay anday erhay aughterday; anday onay ishay eturnray
oughtbray ackbay, ithway eatgray atisfactionsay, aay essagemay omfray erhay Adyshiplay,
importingay atthay eshay eltfay erselfhay osay ullday asay otay akemay erhay eryvay esirousday ofay
avinghay emthay allay otay ineday ithway erhay.

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay eesay Adylay Atherinecay ithoutway ecollectingray atthay, adhay
eshay osenchay itay, eshay ightmay byay isthay imetay avehay eenbay esentedpray otay erhay asay erhay
uturefay iecenay; ornay ouldcay eshay inkthay, ithoutway aay ilesmay, ofay atwhay erhay
Adyship’slay indignationay ouldway avehay eenbay. aT“whay ouldway eshay avehay aidsay? owhay
ouldway eshay avehay ehavedbay?” ereway ethay uestionsqay ithway ichwhay eshay amuseday
erselfhay.

Eirthay irstfay ubjectsay asway ethay iminutionday ofay ethay Osingsray’ artypay. i“ay assureay
ouyay, Iay eelfay itay exceedinglyay,” aidsay Adylay Atherinecay; i“ay elievebay obodynay
eelsfay ethay osslay ofay iendsfray osay uchmay asay Iay oday. Utbay Iay amay articularlypay
attacheday otay esethay oungyay enmay; anday owknay emthay otay ebay osay uchmay attacheday otay emay!
Eythay ereway excessivelyay orrysay otay ogay! Utbay osay eythay alwaysay areay. Ethay earday
Olonelcay alliedray ishay iritsspay olerablytay illtay ustjay atay astlay; utbay Arcyday
eemedsay otay eelfay itay ostmay acutely--moreay, Iay inkthay, anthay astlay earyay. Ishay
attachmentay otay Osingsray ertainlycay increasesay.”

mray. Ollinscay adhay aay omplimentcay anday anay allusionay otay owthray inay erehay, ichwhay
ereway indlykay iledsmay onay byay ethay othermay anday aughterday.

Adylay Atherinecay observeday, afteray innerday, atthay Issmay Ennetbay eemedsay outay ofay
iritsspay; anday immediatelyay accountingay orfay itay erselfhay, byay upposingsay atthay
eshay idday otnay ikelay otay ogay omehay againay osay oonsay, eshay addeday,--

uT“bay ifay atthay isay ethay asecay, ouyay ustmay itewray otay ouryay othermay otay egbay atthay ouyay
aymay aystay aay ittlelay ongerlay. mrsay. Ollinscay illway ebay eryvay adglay ofay ouryay
ompanycay, Iay amay uresay.”

i“ay amay uchmay obligeday otay ouryay Adyshiplay orfay ouryay indkay invitationay,” epliedray
Elizabethay; ut“bay itay isay otnay inay myay owerpay otay acceptay itay. Iay ustmay ebay inay owntay
extnay Aturdaysay.”

“whyay, atay atthay ateray, ouyay illway avehay eenbay erehay onlyay ixsay eeksway. Iay expecteday
ouyay otay aystay otway onthsmay. Iay oldtay mrsay. Ollinscay osay eforebay ouyay amecay. Erethay
ancay ebay onay occasionay orfay ouryay oinggay osay oonsay. mrsay. Ennetbay ouldcay ertainlycay
arespay ouyay orfay anotheray ortnightfay.”

uT“bay myay atherfay annotcay. Ehay otewray astlay eekway otay urryhay myay eturnray.”

iLlustration[ay:

aWson“day”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

oH“ay, ouryay atherfay, ofay oursecay, aymay arespay ouyay, ifay ouryay othermay ancay.
Aughtersday areay evernay ofay osay uchmay onsequencecay otay aay atherfay. Anday ifay ouyay illway
aystay anotheray onth_may_ ompletecay, itay illway ebay inay myay owerpay otay aketay oneay ofay ouyay
asay arfay asay Ondonlay, orfay Iay amay oinggay erethay earlyay inay Unejay, orfay aay eekway; anday
asay Awsonday oesday otnay objectay otay ethay arouche-boxbay, erethay illway ebay eryvay oodgay
oomray orfay oneay ofay ou--andyay, indeeday, ifay ethay eatherway ouldshay appenhay otay ebay
oolcay, Iay ouldshay otnay objectay otay akingtay ouyay othbay, asay ouyay areay eithernay ofay ouyay
argelay.”

oU“yay areay allay indnesskay, adammay; utbay Iay elievebay eway ustmay abideay byay ouray
originalay anplay.”

Adylay Atherinecay eemedsay esignedray. “mrsay. Ollinscay, ouyay ustmay endsay aay ervantsay
ithway emthay. Ouyay owknay Iay alwaysay eakspay myay indmay, anday Iay annotcay earbay ethay ideaay
ofay otway oungyay omenway avellingtray ostpay byay emselvesthay. Itay isay ighlyhay improperay.
Ouyay ustmay ontrivecay otay endsay omebodysay. Iay avehay ethay eatestgray islikeday inay ethay
orldway otay atthay ortsay ofay ingthay. Oungyay omenway ouldshay alwaysay ebay operlypray
uardedgay anday attendeday, accordingay otay eirthay ituationsay inay ifelay. Enwhay myay
iecenay Eorgianagay entway otay Amsgateray astlay ummersay, Iay ademay aay ointpay ofay erhay
avinghay otway en-servantsmay ogay ithway erhay. Issmay Arcyday, ethay aughterday ofay mray.
Arcyday ofay Emberleypay, anday Adylay Anneay, ouldcay otnay avehay appeareday ithway
oprietypray inay aay ifferentday annermay. Iay amay excessivelyay attentiveay otay allay osethay
ingsthay. Ouyay ustmay endsay Ohnjay ithway ethay oungyay adieslay, mrsay. Ollinscay. Iay amay
adglay itay occurreday otay emay otay entionmay itay; orfay itay ouldway eallyray ebay
iscreditableday otay ou_yay_ otay etlay emthay ogay aloneay.”

“myay uncleay isay otay endsay aay ervantsay orfay usay.”

oH“ay! Ouryay uncleay! Ehay eepskay aay an-servantmay, oesday ehay? Iay amay eryvay adglay ouyay
avehay omebodysay owhay inksthay ofay osethay ingsthay. Erewhay allshay ouyay angechay orseshay?
Ohay, Omleybray, ofay oursecay. Ifay ouyay entionmay myay amenay atay ethay Ellbay, ouyay illway ebay
attendeday otay.”

Adylay Atherinecay adhay anymay otheray uestionsqay otay askay espectingray eirthay ourneyjay;
anday asay eshay idday otnay answeray emthay allay erselfhay attentionay asway
ecessary--whichnay Elizabethay elievedbay otay ebay uckylay orfay erhay; oray, ithway aay
indmay osay occupieday, eshay ightmay avehay orgottenfay erewhay eshay asway. Eflectionray
ustmay ebay eservedray orfay olitarysay ourshay: eneverwhay eshay asway aloneay, eshay avegay
ayway otay itay asay ethay eatestgray eliefray; anday otnay aay ayday entway byay ithoutway aay
olitarysay alkway, inay ichwhay eshay ightmay indulgeay inay allay ethay elightday ofay
unpleasantay ecollectionsray.

mray. Arcy’sday etterlay eshay asway inay aay airfay ayway ofay oonsay owingknay byay earthay. Eshay
udiedstay everyay entencesay; anday erhay eelingsfay owardstay itsay iterwray ereway atay
imestay idelyway ifferentday. Enwhay eshay ememberedray ethay estylay ofay ishay addressay,
eshay asway illstay ullfay ofay indignationay: utbay enwhay eshay onsideredcay owhay unjustlyay
eshay adhay ondemnedcay anday upbraideday imhay, erhay angeray asway urnedtay againstay
erselfhay; anday ishay isappointedday eelingsfay ecamebay ethay objectay ofay ompassioncay.
Ishay attachmentay exciteday atitudegray, ishay eneralgay aracterchay espectray: utbay eshay
ouldcay otnay approveay imhay; ornay ouldcay eshay orfay aay omentmay epentray erhay efusalray, oray
eelfay ethay ightestslay inclinationay everay otay eesay imhay againay. Inay erhay ownay astpay
ehaviourbay, erethay asway aay onstantcay ourcesay ofay exationvay anday egretray: anday inay
ethay unhappyay efectsday ofay erhay amilyfay, aay ubjectsay ofay etyay eavierhay agrinchay.
Eythay ereway opelesshay ofay emedyray. Erhay atherfay, ontentedcay ithway aughinglay atay
emthay, ouldway evernay exertay imselfhay otay estrainray ethay ildway iddinessgay ofay ishay
oungestyay aughtersday; anday erhay othermay, ithway annersmay osay arfay omfray ightray
erselfhay, asway entirelyay insensibleay ofay ethay evilay. Elizabethay adhay equentlyfray
uniteday ithway Anejay inay anay endeavouray otay eckchay ethay imprudenceay ofay Atherinecay
anday Ialyday; utbay ilewhay eythay ereway upportedsay byay eirthay other’smay indulgenceay,
atwhay ancechay ouldcay erethay ebay ofay improvementay? Atherinecay, eak-spiritedway,
irritableay, anday ompletelycay underay Ia’slyday uidancegay, adhay eenbay alwaysay
affronteday byay eirthay adviceay; anday Ialyday, elf-willedsay anday arelesscay, ouldway
arcelyscay ivegay emthay aay earinghay. Eythay ereway ignorantay, idleay, anday ainvay. Ilewhay
erethay asway anay officeray inay Erytonmay, eythay ouldway irtflay ithway imhay; anday ilewhay
Erytonmay asway ithinway aay alkway ofay Ongbournlay, eythay ouldway ebay oinggay erethay orfay
everay.

Anxietyay onay Ane’sjay ehalfbay asway anotheray evailingpray oncerncay; anday mray. Arcy’sday
explanationay, byay estoringray Ingleybay otay allay erhay ormerfay oodgay opinionay,
eightenedhay ethay ensesay ofay atwhay Anejay adhay ostlay. Ishay affectionay asway ovedpray otay
avehay eenbay inceresay, anday ishay onductcay earedclay ofay allay ameblay, unlessay anyay
ouldcay attachay otay ethay implicitnessay ofay ishay onfidencecay inay ishay iendfray. Owhay
ievousgray enthay asway ethay oughtthay atthay, ofay aay ituationsay osay esirableday inay everyay
espectray, osay epleteray ithway advantageay, osay omisingpray orfay appinesshay, Anejay adhay
eenbay eprivedday, byay ethay ollyfay anday indecorumay ofay erhay ownay amilyfay!

Enwhay otay esethay ecollectionsray asway addeday ethay evelopmentday ofay Ickham’sway
aracterchay, itay aymay ebay easilyay elievedbay atthay ethay appyhay iritsspay ichwhay adhay
eldomsay eenbay epressedday eforebay ereway ownay osay uchmay affecteday asay otay akemay itay
almostay impossibleay orfay erhay otay appearay olerablytay eerfulchay.

Eirthay engagementsay atay Osingsray ereway asay equentfray uringday ethay astlay eekway ofay
erhay aystay asay eythay adhay eenbay atay irstfay. Ethay eryvay astlay eveningay asway entspay
erethay; anday erhay Adyshiplay againay inquireday inutelymay intoay ethay articularspay ofay
eirthay ourneyjay, avegay emthay irectionsday asay otay ethay estbay ethodmay ofay ackingpay,
anday asway osay urgentay onay ethay ecessitynay ofay acingplay ownsgay inay ethay onlyay ightray
ayway, atthay Ariamay oughtthay erselfhay obligeday, onay erhay eturnray, otay undoay allay ethay
orkway ofay ethay orningmay, anday ackpay erhay unktray afreshay.

Enwhay eythay artedpay, Adylay Atherinecay, ithway eatgray ondescensioncay, ishedway emthay
aay oodgay ourneyjay, anday inviteday emthay otay omecay otay Unsfordhay againay extnay earyay;
anday Issmay eday Ourghbay exerteday erselfhay osay arfay asay otay ourtesycay anday oldhay outay
erhay andhay otay othbay.




iLlustration[ay:

e“thay elevationay ofay ishay eelingsfay.”
ay]




APTERchay IIIxxxvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Onay Aturdaysay orningmay Elizabethay anday mray. Ollinscay etmay orfay eakfastbray aay ewfay
inutesmay eforebay ethay othersay appeareday; anday ehay ooktay ethay opportunityay ofay
ayingpay ethay artingpay ivilitiescay ichwhay ehay eemedday indispensablyay ecessarynay.

i“ay owknay otnay, Issmay Elizabethay,” aidsay ehay, ether“whay mrsay. Ollinscay ashay etyay
expresseday erhay ensesay ofay ouryay indnesskay inay omingcay otay usay; utbay Iay amay eryvay
ertaincay ouyay illway otnay eavelay ethay ousehay ithoutway eceivingray erhay anksthay orfay
itay. Ethay avourfay ofay ouryay ompanycay ashay eenbay uchmay eltfay, Iay assureay ouyay. Eway owknay
owhay ittlelay erethay isay otay empttay anyoneay otay ouray umblehay abodeay. Ouray ainplay
annermay ofay ivinglay, ouray allsmay oomsray, anday ewfay omesticsday, anday ethay ittlelay eway
eesay ofay ethay orldway, ustmay akemay Unsfordhay extremelyay ullday otay aay oungyay adylay ikelay
ourselfyay; utbay Iay opehay ouyay illway elievebay usay atefulgray orfay ethay ondescensioncay,
anday atthay eway avehay oneday everythingay inay ouray owerpay otay eventpray ouyay endingspay
ouryay imetay unpleasantlyay.”

Elizabethay asway eageray ithway erhay anksthay anday assurancesay ofay appinesshay. Eshay adhay
entspay ixsay eeksway ithway eatgray enjoymentay; anday ethay easureplay ofay eingbay ithway
Arlottechay, anday ethay indkay attentionay eshay adhay eceivedray, ustmay akemay er_hay_ eelfay
ethay obligeday. mray. Ollinscay asway atifiedgray; anday ithway aay oremay ilingsmay
olemnitysay epliedray,--

iT“ay ivesgay emay ethay eatestgray easureplay otay earhay atthay ouyay avehay assedpay ouryay
imetay otnay isagreeablyday. Eway avehay ertainlycay oneday ouray estbay; anday ostmay
ortunatelyfay avinghay itay inay ouray owerpay otay introduceay ouyay otay eryvay uperiorsay
ocietysay, anday omfray ouray onnectioncay ithway Osingsray, ethay equentfray eansmay ofay
aryingvay ethay umblehay omehay enescay, Iay inkthay eway aymay atterflay ourselvesay atthay
ouryay Unsfordhay isitvay annotcay avehay eenbay entirelyay irksomeay. Ouray ituationsay
ithway egardray otay Adylay Atherine’scay amilyfay isay, indeeday, ethay ortsay ofay
extraordinaryay advantageay anday essingblay ichwhay ewfay ancay oastbay. Ouyay eesay onay
atwhay aay ootingfay eway areay. Ouyay eesay owhay ontinuallycay eway areay engageday erethay. Inay
uthtray, Iay ustmay acknowledgeay, atthay, ithway allay ethay isadvantagesday ofay isthay
umblehay arsonagepay, Iay ouldshay otnay inkthay anyoneay abidingay inay itay anay objectay ofay
ompassioncay, ilewhay eythay areay arersshay ofay ouray intimacyay atay Osingsray.”

Ordsway ereway insufficientay orfay ethay elevationay ofay ishay eelingsfay; anday ehay asway
obligeday otay alkway aboutay ethay oomray, ilewhay Elizabethay iedtray otay uniteay ivilitycay
anday uthtray inay aay ewfay ortshay entencessay.

oU“yay aymay, inay actfay, arrycay aay eryvay avourablefay eportray ofay usay intoay
Ertfordshirehay, myay earday ousincay. Iay atterflay elfmysay, atay eastlay, atthay ouyay illway
ebay ableay otay oday osay. Adylay Atherine’scay eatgray attentionsay otay mrsay. Ollinscay ouyay
avehay eenbay aay ailyday itnessway ofay; anday altogetheray Iay usttray itay oesday otnay appearay
atthay ouryay iendfray ashay awndray anay unfortunate--butay onay isthay ointpay itay illway ebay
asay ellway otay ebay ilentsay. Onlyay etlay emay assureay ouyay, myay earday Issmay Elizabethay,
atthay Iay ancay omfray myay earthay ostmay ordiallycay ishway ouyay equalay elicityfay inay
arriagemay. myay earday Arlottechay anday Iay avehay utbay oneay indmay anday oneay ayway ofay
inkingthay. Erethay isay inay everythingay aay ostmay emarkableray esemblanceray ofay
aracterchay anday ideasay etweenbay usay. Eway eemsay otay avehay eenbay esignedday orfay eachay
otheray.”

Elizabethay ouldcay afelysay aysay atthay itay asway aay eatgray appinesshay erewhay atthay asway
ethay asecay, anday ithway equalay inceritysay ouldcay adday, atthay eshay irmlyfay elievedbay
anday ejoicedray inay ishay omesticday omfortscay. Eshay asway otnay orrysay, oweverhay, otay
avehay ethay ecitalray ofay emthay interrupteday byay ethay entranceay ofay ethay adylay omfray
omwhay eythay angspray. Oorpay Arlottechay! itay asway elancholymay otay eavelay erhay otay uchsay
ocietysay! Utbay eshay adhay osenchay itay ithway erhay eyesay openay; anday oughthay evidentlyay
egrettingray atthay erhay isitorsvay ereway otay ogay, eshay idday otnay eemsay otay askay orfay
ompassioncay. Erhay omehay anday erhay ousekeepinghay, erhay arishpay anday erhay oultrypay,
anday allay eirthay ependentday oncernscay, adhay otnay etyay ostlay eirthay armschay.

Atay engthlay ethay aisechay arriveday, ethay unkstray ereway astenedfay onay, ethay arcelspay
acedplay ithinway, anday itay asway onouncedpray otay ebay eadyray. Afteray anay affectionateay
artingpay etweenbay ethay iendsfray, Elizabethay asway attendeday otay ethay arriagecay byay
mray. Ollinscay; anday asay eythay alkedway ownday ethay ardengay, ehay asway ommissioningcay
erhay ithway ishay estbay espectsray otay allay erhay amilyfay, otnay orgettingfay ishay anksthay
orfay ethay indnesskay ehay adhay eceivedray atay Ongbournlay inay ethay interway, anday ishay
omplimentscay otay mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay, oughthay unknownay. Ehay enthay andedhay
erhay inay, Ariamay ollowedfay, anday ethay oorday asway onay ethay ointpay ofay eingbay osedclay,
enwhay ehay uddenlysay emindedray emthay, ithway omesay onsternationcay, atthay eythay adhay
ithertohay orgottenfay otay eavelay anyay essagemay orfay ethay adieslay ofay Osingsray.

iLlustration[ay:

eY“thay adhay orgottenfay otay eavelay anyay essagemay”
ay]

uT“bay,” ehay addeday, ou“yay illway ofay oursecay ishway otay avehay ouryay umblehay espectsray
eliveredday otay emthay, ithway ouryay atefulgray anksthay orfay eirthay indnesskay otay ouyay
ilewhay ouyay avehay eenbay erehay.”

Elizabethay ademay onay objectionay: ethay oorday asway enthay alloweday otay ebay utshay, anday
ethay arriagecay ovedray offay.

oOd“gay aciousgray!” iedcray Ariamay, afteray aay ewfay inutesmay’ ilencesay, it“ay eemssay
utbay aay ayday oray otway incesay eway irstfay amecay! anday etyay owhay anymay ingsthay avehay
appenedhay!”

a“ay eatgray anymay indeeday,” aidsay erhay ompanioncay, ithway aay ighsay.

e“way avehay inedday inenay imestay atay Osingsray, esidesbay inkingdray eatay erethay icetway!
Owhay uchmay Iay allshay avehay otay elltay!”

Elizabethay ivatelypray addeday, aNd“ay owhay uchmay Iay allshay avehay otay oncealcay!”

Eirthay ourneyjay asway erformedpay ithoutway uchmay onversationcay, oray anyay alarmay; anday
ithinway ourfay ourshay ofay eirthay eavinglay Unsfordhay eythay eachedray mray. Ardiner’sgay
ousehay, erewhay eythay ereway otay emainray aay ewfay aysday.

Anejay ookedlay ellway, anday Elizabethay adhay ittlelay opportunityay ofay udyingstay erhay
iritsspay, amidstay ethay ariousvay engagementsay ichwhay ethay indnesskay ofay erhay auntay
adhay eservedray orfay emthay. Utbay Anejay asway otay ogay omehay ithway erhay, anday atay
Ongbournlay erethay ouldway ebay eisurelay enoughay orfay observationay.

Itay asway otnay ithoutway anay effortay, eanwhilemay, atthay eshay ouldcay aitway evenay orfay
Ongbournlay, eforebay eshay oldtay erhay istersay ofay mray. Arcy’sday oposalspray. Otay owknay
atthay eshay adhay ethay owerpay ofay evealingray atwhay ouldway osay exceedinglyay astonishay
Anejay, anday ustmay, atay ethay amesay imetay, osay ighlyhay atifygray ateverwhay ofay erhay ownay
anityvay eshay adhay otnay etyay eenbay ableay otay easonray awayay, asway uchsay aay emptationtay
otay opennessay asay othingnay ouldcay avehay onqueredcay, utbay ethay atestay ofay indecisionay
inay ichwhay eshay emainedray asay otay ethay extentay ofay atwhay eshay ouldshay ommunicatecay,
anday erhay earfay, ifay eshay onceay entereday onay ethay ubjectsay, ofay eingbay urriedhay intoay
epeatingray omethingsay ofay Ingleybay, ichwhay ightmay onlyay ievegray erhay istersay
urtherfay.




iLlustration[ay:

oW“hay icelynay eway areay ammedcray inay”
ay]




APTERchay IXxxxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Itay asway ethay econdsay eekway inay Aymay, inay ichwhay ethay eethray oungyay adieslay etsay outay
ogethertay omfray Acechurchgray Eetstray orfay ethay owntay ofay ay----, inay Ertfordshirehay;
anday, asay eythay ewdray earnay ethay appointeday innay erewhay mray. Ennet’sbay arriagecay asway
otay eetmay emthay, eythay uicklyqay erceivedpay, inay okentay ofay ethay oachman’scay
unctualitypay, othbay Ittykay anday Ialyday ookinglay outay ofay aay ining-roomday upstairsay.
Esethay otway irlsgay adhay eenbay aboveay anay ourhay inay ethay aceplay, appilyhay employeday
inay isitingvay anay oppositeay illinermay, atchingway ethay entinelsay onay uardgay, anday
essingdray aay aladsay anday ucumbercay.

Afteray elcomingway eirthay isterssay, eythay iumphantlytray isplayedday aay abletay etsay
outay ithway uchsay oldcay eatmay asay anay innay arderlay usuallyay affordsay, exclaimingay,
iS“ay otnay isthay icenay? isay otnay isthay anay agreeableay urprisesay?”

aNd“ay eway eanmay otay eattray ouyay allay,” addeday Ialyday; ut“bay ouyay ustmay endlay usay ethay
oneymay, orfay eway avehay ustjay entspay oursay atay ethay opshay outay erethay.” Enthay owingshay
erhay urchases,--“lOokpay erehay, Iay avehay oughtbay isthay onnetbay. Iay oday otnay inkthay itay
isay eryvay ettypray; utbay Iay oughtthay Iay ightmay asay ellway uybay itay asay otnay. Iay allshay
ullpay itay otay iecespay asay oonsay asay Iay etgay omehay, anday eesay ifay Iay ancay akemay itay upay anyay
etterbay.”

Anday enwhay erhay isterssay abuseday itay asay uglyay, eshay addeday, ithway erfectpay
unconcernay, oH“ay, utbay erethay ereway otway oray eethray uchmay uglieray inay ethay opshay; anday
enwhay Iay avehay oughtbay omesay ettier-colouredpray atinsay otay imtray itay ithway eshfray, Iay
inkthay itay illway ebay eryvay olerabletay. Esidesbay, itay illway otnay uchmay ignifysay atwhay
oneay earsway isthay ummersay, afteray ethay ire----shay avehay eftlay Erytonmay, anday eythay
areay oinggay inay aay ortnightfay.”

aRe“ay eythay, indeeday?” iedcray Elizabethay, ithway ethay eatestgray atisfactionsay.
