eY“thay areay oinggay otay ebay encampeday earnay Ightonbray; anday Iay oday osay antway apapay otay
aketay usay allay erethay orfay ethay ummersay! Itay ouldway ebay uchsay aay eliciousday emeschay,
anday Iay areday aysay ouldway ardlyhay ostcay anythingay atay allay. Ammamay ouldway ikelay otay
ogay, ootay, ofay allay ingsthay! Onlyay inkthay atwhay aay iserablemay ummersay elseay eway allshay
avehay!”

eS“yay,” oughtthay Elizabethay; at“_thay_ ouldway ebay aay elightfulday emeschay, indeeday,
anday ompletelycay oday orfay usay atay onceay. Oodgay Eavenhay! Ightonbray anday aay olewhay
ampfulcay ofay oldierssay, otay usay, owhay avehay eenbay oversetay alreadyay byay oneay oorpay
egimentray ofay ilitiamay, anday ethay onthlymay allsbay ofay Erytonmay!”

oW“nay Iay avehay otgay omesay ewsnay orfay ouyay,” aidsay Ialyday, asay eythay atsay ownday otay
abletay. aT“whay oday ouyay inkthay? Itay isay excellentay ewsnay, apitalcay ewsnay, anday aboutay
aay ertaincay ersonpay atthay eway allay ikelay.”

Anejay anday Elizabethay ookedlay atay eachay otheray, anday ethay aiterway asway oldtay atthay ehay
eednay otnay aystay. Ialyday aughedlay, anday aidsay,--

aY“ay, atthay isay ustjay ikelay ouryay ormalityfay anday iscretionday. Ouyay oughtthay ethay
aiterway ustmay otnay earhay, asay ifay ehay aredcay! Iay areday aysay ehay oftenay earshay orseway
ingsthay aidsay anthay Iay amay oinggay otay aysay. Utbay ehay isay anay uglyay ellowfay! Iay amay adglay
ehay isay onegay. Iay evernay awsay uchsay aay onglay inchay inay myay ifelay. Ellway, utbay ownay orfay
myay ewsnay: itay isay aboutay earday Ickhamway; ootay oodgay orfay ethay aiterway, isay otnay itay?
Erethay isay onay angerday ofay Ickham’sway arryingmay Arymay Ing--there’skay orfay ouyay! Eshay
isay onegay ownday otay erhay uncleay atay Iverpoollay; onegay otay aystay. Ickhamway isay afesay.”

aNd“ay Arymay Ingkay isay afesay!” addeday Elizabethay; afe“say omfray aay onnectioncay
imprudentay asay otay ortunefay.”

e“shay isay aay eatgray oolfay orfay oinggay awayay, ifay eshay ikedlay imhay.”

uT“bay Iay opehay erethay isay onay ongstray attachmentay onay eitheray idesay,” aidsay Anejay.

i“ay amay uresay erethay isay otnay onay is_hay_. Iay illway answeray orfay itay, ehay evernay aredcay
eethray awsstray aboutay erhay. Owhay ould_cay_ aboutay uchsay aay astynay ittlelay eckledfray
ingthay?”

Elizabethay asway ockedshay otay inkthay atthay, oweverhay incapableay ofay uchsay
oarsenesscay ofay expression_ay_ erselfhay, ethay oarsenesscay ofay ethay entiment_say_
asway ittlelay otheray anthay erhay ownay eastbray adhay ormerlyfay arbouredhay anday anciedfay
iberallay!

Asay oonsay asay allay adhay ateay, anday ethay elderay onesay aidpay, ethay arriagecay asway
ordereday; anday, afteray omesay ontrivancecay, ethay olewhay artypay, ithway allay eirthay
oxesbay, orkbagsway, anday arcelspay, anday ethay unwelcomeay additionay ofay Itty’skay anday
Ia’slyday urchasespay, ereway eatedsay inay itay.

oW“hay icelynay eway areay ammedcray inay!” iedcray Ialyday. i“ay amay adglay Iay oughtbray myay
onnetbay, ifay itay isay onlyay orfay ethay unfay ofay avinghay anotheray and-boxbay! Ellway, ownay
etlay usay ebay uiteqay omfortablecay anday ugsnay, anday alktay anday aughlay allay ethay ayway
omehay. Anday inay ethay irstfay aceplay, etlay usay earhay atwhay ashay appenedhay otay ouyay allay
incesay ouyay entway awayay. Avehay ouyay eensay anyay easantplay enmay? Avehay ouyay adhay anyay
irtingflay? Iay asway inay eatgray opeshay atthay oneay ofay ouyay ouldway avehay otgay aay usbandhay
eforebay ouyay amecay ackbay. Anejay illway ebay uiteqay anay olday aidmay oonsay, Iay eclareday.
Eshay isay almostay ee-and-twentythray! Ordlay! owhay ashameday Iay ouldshay ebay ofay otnay
eingbay arriedmay eforebay ee-and-twentythray! myay auntay Ilipsphay antsway ouyay osay otay
etgay usbandshay ouyay an’tcay inkthay. Eshay ayssay Izzylay adhay etterbay avehay akentay mray.
Ollinscay; utbay i_ay_ oday otnay inkthay erethay ouldway avehay eenbay anyay unfay inay itay. Ordlay!
owhay Iay ouldshay ikelay otay ebay arriedmay eforebay anyay ofay ouyay! anday enthay Iay ouldway
aperon_chay_ ouyay aboutay otay allay ethay allsbay. Earday emay! eway adhay uchsay aay oodgay iecepay
ofay unfay ethay otheray ayday atay Olonelcay Orster’sfay! Ittykay anday emay ereway otay endspay
ethay ayday erethay, anday mrsay. Orsterfay omisedpray otay avehay aay ittlelay anceday inay ethay
eveningay; e-bye(by-thay, mrsay. Orsterfay anday emay areay uch_say_ iendsfray!) anday osay
eshay askeday ethay otway Arringtonshay otay omecay: utbay Arriethay asway illay, anday osay Enpay
asway orcedfay otay omecay byay erselfhay; anday enthay, atwhay oday ouyay inkthay eway idday? Eway
esseddray upay Amberlaynechay inay oman’sway othesclay, onay urposepay otay asspay orfay aay
ady,--onlylay inkthay atwhay unfay! Otnay aay oulsay ewknay ofay itay, utbay Olonelcay anday mrsay.
Orsterfay, anday Ittykay anday emay, exceptay myay auntay, orfay eway ereway orcedfay otay orrowbay
oneay ofay erhay ownsgay; anday ouyay annotcay imagineay owhay ellway ehay ookedlay! Enwhay Ennyday,
anday Ickhamway, anday Attpray, anday otway oray eethray oremay ofay ethay enmay amecay inay, eythay
idday otnay owknay imhay inay ethay eastlay. Ordlay! owhay Iay aughedlay! anday osay idday mrsay.
Orsterfay. Iay oughtthay Iay ouldshay avehay iedday. Anday at_thay_ ademay ethay enmay uspectsay
omethingsay, anday enthay eythay oonsay oundfay outay atwhay asway ethay attermay.”

Ithway uchsay indkay ofay istorieshay ofay eirthay artiespay anday oodgay okesjay idday Ialyday,
assisteday byay Itty’skay intshay anday additionsay, endeavouray otay amuseay erhay
ompanionscay allay ethay ayway otay Ongbournlay. Elizabethay istenedlay asay ittlelay asay eshay
ouldcay, utbay erethay asway onay escapingay ethay equentfray entionmay ofay Ickham’sway amenay.

Eirthay eceptionray atay omehay asway ostmay indkay. mrsay. Ennetbay ejoicedray otay eesay Anejay
inay undiminisheday eautybay; anday oremay anthay onceay uringday innerday idday mray. Ennetbay
aysay oluntarilyvay otay Elizabethay,----

i“ay amay adglay ouyay areay omecay ackbay, Izzylay.”

Eirthay artypay inay ethay ining-roomday asway argelay, orfay almostay allay ethay Ucaseslay
amecay otay eetmay Ariamay anday earhay ethay ewsnay; anday ariousvay ereway ethay ubjectssay
ichwhay occupieday emthay: Adylay Ucaslay asway inquiringay ofay Ariamay, acrossay ethay
abletay, afteray ethay elfareway anday oultrypay ofay erhay eldestay aughterday; mrsay. Ennetbay
asway oublyday engageday, onay oneay andhay ollectingcay anay accountay ofay ethay esentpray
ashionsfay omfray Anejay, owhay atsay omesay ayway elowbay erhay, anday onay ethay otheray,
etailingray emthay allay otay ethay oungeryay Issmay Ucaseslay; anday Ialyday, inay aay oicevay
atherray ouderlay anthay anyay otheray erson’spay, asway enumeratingay ethay ariousvay
easuresplay ofay ethay orningmay otay anybodyay owhay ouldway earhay erhay.

oH“ay, Arymay,” aidsay eshay, i“ay ishway ouyay adhay onegay ithway usay, orfay eway adhay uchsay unfay!
asay eway entway alongay Ittykay anday emay ewdray upay allay ethay indsblay, anday etendedpray
erethay asway obodynay inay ethay oachcay; anday Iay ouldshay avehay onegay osay allay ethay ayway, ifay
Ittykay adhay otnay eenbay icksay; anday enwhay eway otgay otay ethay Eorgegay, Iay oday inkthay eway
ehavedbay eryvay andsomelyhay, orfay eway eatedtray ethay otheray eethray ithway ethay icestnay
oldcay uncheonlay inay ethay orldway, anday ifay ouyay ouldway avehay onegay, eway ouldway avehay
eatedtray ouyay ootay. Anday enthay enwhay eway amecay awayay itay asway uchsay unfay! Iay oughtthay
eway evernay ouldshay avehay otgay intoay ethay oachcay. Iay asway eadyray otay ieday ofay aughterlay.
Anday enthay eway ereway osay errymay allay ethay ayway omehay! eway alkedtay anday aughedlay osay
oudlay, atthay anybodyay ightmay avehay eardhay usay entay ilesmay offay!”

Otay isthay, Arymay eryvay avelygray epliedray, aR“fay ebay itay omfray emay, myay earday istersay,
otay epreciateday uchsay easuresplay. Eythay ouldway oubtlessday ebay ongenialcay ithway ethay
eneralitygay ofay emalefay indsmay. Utbay Iay onfesscay eythay ouldway avehay onay armschay orfay
e_may_. Iay ouldshay infinitelyay eferpray aay ookbay.”

Utbay ofay isthay answeray Ialyday eardhay otnay aay ordway. Eshay eldomsay istenedlay otay
anybodyay orfay oremay anthay alfhay aay inutemay, anday evernay attendeday otay Arymay atay allay.

Inay ethay afternoonay Ialyday asway urgentay ithway ethay estray ofay ethay irlsgay otay alkway otay
Erytonmay, anday eesay owhay everybodyay entway onay; utbay Elizabethay eadilystay opposeday
ethay emeschay. Itay ouldshay otnay ebay aidsay, atthay ethay Issmay Ennetsbay ouldcay otnay ebay atay
omehay alfhay aay ayday eforebay eythay ereway inay ursuitpay ofay ethay officersay. Erethay asway
anotheray easonray, ootay, orfay erhay oppositionay. Eshay eadeddray eeingsay Ickhamway
againay, anday asway esolvedray otay avoiday itay asay onglay asay ossiblepay. Ethay omfortcay otay
er_hay_, ofay ethay egiment’sray approachingay emovalray, asway indeeday eyondbay
expressionay. Inay aay ortnightfay eythay ereway otay ogay, anday onceay onegay, eshay opedhay
erethay ouldcay ebay othingnay oremay otay agueplay erhay onay ishay accountay.

Eshay adhay otnay eenbay anymay ourshay atay omehay, eforebay eshay oundfay atthay ethay Ightonbray
emeschay, ofay ichwhay Ialyday adhay ivengay emthay aay inthay atay ethay innay, asway underay
equentfray iscussionday etweenbay erhay arentspay. Elizabethay awsay irectlyday atthay erhay
atherfay adhay otnay ethay allestsmay intentionay ofay ieldingyay; utbay ishay answersay ereway
atay ethay amesay imetay osay aguevay anday equivocalay, atthay erhay othermay, oughthay oftenay
isheartenedday, adhay evernay etyay espairedday ofay ucceedingsay atay astlay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay xlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabeth’say impatienceay otay acquaintay Anejay ithway atwhay adhay appenedhay ouldcay onay
ongerlay ebay overcomeay; anday atay engthlay esolvingray otay uppresssay everyay articularpay
inay ichwhay erhay istersay asway oncernedcay, anday eparingpray erhay otay ebay urprisedsay,
eshay elatedray otay erhay ethay extnay orningmay ethay iefchay ofay ethay enescay etweenbay mray.
Arcyday anday erselfhay.

Issmay Ennet’sbay astonishmentay asway oonsay essenedlay byay ethay ongstray isterlysay
artialitypay ichwhay ademay anyay admirationay ofay Elizabethay appearay erfectlypay
aturalnay; anday allay urprisesay asway ortlyshay ostlay inay otheray eelingsfay. Eshay asway
orrysay atthay mray. Arcyday ouldshay avehay eliveredday ishay entimentssay inay aay annermay osay
ittlelay uitedsay otay ecommendray emthay; utbay illstay oremay asway eshay ievedgray orfay ethay
unhappinessay ichwhay erhay ister’ssay efusalray ustmay avehay ivengay imhay.

iS“hay eingbay osay uresay ofay ucceedingsay asway ongwray,” aidsay eshay, and“ay ertainlycay
oughtay otnay otay avehay appeareday; utbay onsidercay owhay uchmay itay ustmay increaseay ishay
isappointmentday.”

iNdeed“ay,” epliedray Elizabethay, i“ay amay eartilyhay orrysay orfay imhay; utbay ehay ashay
otheray eelingsfay ichwhay illway obablypray oonsay ivedray awayay ishay egardray orfay emay.
Ouyay oday otnay ameblay emay, oweverhay, orfay efusingray imhay?”

aMe“blay ouyay! Ohay, onay.”

uT“bay ouyay ameblay emay orfay avinghay okenspay osay armlyway ofay Ickhamway?”

o--i“nay oday otnay owknay atthay ouyay ereway ongwray inay ayingsay atwhay ouyay idday.”

uT“bay ouyay ill_way_ owknay itay, enwhay Iay avehay oldtay ouyay atwhay appenedhay ethay eryvay
extnay ayday.”

Eshay enthay okespay ofay ethay etterlay, epeatingray ethay olewhay ofay itsay ontentscay asay arfay
asay eythay oncernedcay Eorgegay Ickhamway. Atwhay aay okestray asway isthay orfay oorpay Anejay,
owhay ouldway illinglyway avehay onegay oughthray ethay orldway ithoutway elievingbay atthay
osay uchmay ickednessway existeday inay ethay olewhay aceray ofay ankindmay asay asway erehay
ollectedcay inay oneay individualay! Ornay asway Arcy’sday indicationvay, oughthay
atefulgray otay erhay eelingsfay, apablecay ofay onsolingcay erhay orfay uchsay iscoveryday.
Ostmay earnestlyay idday eshay abourlay otay ovepray ethay obabilitypray ofay erroray, anday
eeksay otay earclay oneay, ithoutway involvingay ethay otheray.

iS“thay illway otnay oday,” aidsay Elizabethay; ou“yay evernay illway ebay ableay otay akemay othbay
ofay emthay oodgay orfay anythingay. Aketay ouryay oicechay, utbay ouyay ustmay ebay atisfiedsay
ithway onlyay oneay. Erethay isay utbay uchsay aay uantityqay ofay eritmay etweenbay emthay; ustjay
enoughay otay akemay oneay oodgay ortsay ofay anmay; anday ofay atelay itay ashay eenbay iftingshay
aboutay ettypray uchmay. Orfay myay artpay, Iay amay inclineday otay elievebay itay allay mray.
Arcy’sday, utbay ouyay allshay oday asay ouyay oosechay.”

Itay asway omesay imetay, oweverhay, eforebay aay ilesmay ouldcay ebay extorteday omfray Anejay.

i“ay oday otnay owknay enwhay Iay avehay eenbay oremay ockedshay,” aidsay eshay. iCkham“way osay
eryvay adbay! Itay isay almostay astpay eliefbay. Anday oorpay mray. Arcyday! earday Izzylay,
onlyay onsidercay atwhay ehay ustmay avehay ufferedsay. Uchsay aay isappointmentday! anday
ithway ethay owledgeknay ofay ouryay illay opinionay ootay! anday avinghay otay elateray uchsay aay
ingthay ofay ishay istersay! Itay isay eallyray ootay istressingday, Iay amay uresay ouyay ustmay
eelfay itay osay.”

oH“ay onay, myay egretray anday ompassioncay areay allay oneday awayay byay eeingsay ouyay osay ullfay
ofay othbay. Iay owknay ouyay illway oday imhay uchsay ampleay usticejay, atthay Iay amay owinggray
everyay omentmay oremay unconcerneday anday indifferentay. Ouryay ofusionpray akesmay emay
avingsay; anday ifay ouyay amentlay overay imhay uchmay ongerlay, myay earthay illway ebay asay
ightlay asay aay eatherfay.”

oOr“pay Ickhamway! erethay isay uchsay anay expressionay ofay oodnessgay inay ishay
ountenancecay! uchsay anay opennessay anday entlenessgay inay ishay annermay.”

eRe“thay ertainlycay asway omesay eatgray ismanagementmay inay ethay educationay ofay osethay
otway oungyay enmay. Oneay ashay otgay allay ethay oodnessgay, anday ethay otheray allay ethay
appearanceay ofay itay.”

i“ay evernay oughtthay mray. Arcyday osay eficientday inay ethay appearance_ay_ ofay itay asay ouyay
useday otay oday.”

aNd“ay etyay Iay eantmay otay ebay uncommonlyay everclay inay akingtay osay ecidedday aay islikeday
otay imhay, ithoutway anyay easonray. Itay isay uchsay aay urspay otay one’say eniusgay, uchsay anay
openingay orfay itway, otay avehay aay islikeday ofay atthay indkay. Oneay aymay ebay ontinuallycay
abusiveay ithoutway ayingsay anythingay ustjay; utbay oneay annotcay ebay alwaysay aughinglay
atay aay anmay ithoutway ownay anday enthay umblingstay onay omethingsay ittyway.”

iZzy“lay, enwhay ouyay irstfay eadray atthay etterlay, Iay amay uresay ouyay ouldcay otnay eattray
ethay attermay asay ouyay oday ownay.”

iNdeed“ay, Iay ouldcay otnay. Iay asway uncomfortableay enoughay, Iay asway eryvay
uncomfortable--Iay aymay aysay unhappyay. Anday ithway onay oneay otay eakspay otay ofay atwhay Iay
eltfay, onay Anejay otay omfortcay emay, anday aysay atthay Iay adhay otnay eenbay osay eryvay eakway,
anday ainvay, anday onsensicalnay, asay Iay ewknay Iay adhay! Ohay, owhay Iay antedway ouyay!”

oW“hay unfortunateay atthay ouyay ouldshay avehay useday uchsay eryvay ongstray expressionsay
inay eakingspay ofay Ickhamway otay mray. Arcyday, orfay ownay eythay o_day_ appearay ollywhay
undeserveday.”

eRtainly“cay. Utbay ethay isfortunemay ofay eakingspay ithway itternessbay isay aay ostmay
aturalnay onsequencecay ofay ethay ejudicespray Iay adhay eenbay encouragingay. Erethay isay
oneay ointpay onay ichwhay Iay antway ouryay adviceay. Iay antway otay ebay oldtay etherwhay Iay
oughtay, oray oughtay otnay, otay akemay ouray acquaintanceay inay eneralgay understanday
Ickham’sway aracterchay.”

Issmay Ennetbay ausedpay aay ittlelay, anday enthay epliedray, uRely“say erethay ancay ebay onay
occasionay orfay exposingay imhay osay eadfullydray. Atwhay isay ouryay ownay opinionay?”

aT“thay itay oughtay otnay otay ebay attempteday. mray. Arcyday ashay otnay authorizeday emay otay
akemay ishay ommunicationcay ublicpay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, everyay articularpay
elativeray otay ishay istersay asway eantmay otay ebay eptkay asay uchmay asay ossiblepay otay
elfmysay; anday ifay Iay endeavouray otay undeceiveay eoplepay asay otay ethay estray ofay ishay
onductcay, owhay illway elievebay emay? Ethay eneralgay ejudicepray againstay mray. Arcyday isay
osay iolentvay, atthay itay ouldway ebay ethay eathday ofay alfhay ethay oodgay eoplepay inay
Erytonmay, otay attemptay otay aceplay imhay inay anay amiableay ightlay. Iay amay otnay equalay otay
itay. Ickhamway illway oonsay ebay onegay; anday, ereforethay, itay illway otnay ignifysay otay
anybodyay erehay atwhay ehay eallyray isay. Omesay imetay encehay itay illway ebay allay oundfay
outay, anday enthay eway aymay aughlay atay eirthay upiditystay inay otnay owingknay itay eforebay.
Atay esentpray Iay illway aysay othingnay aboutay itay.”

oU“yay areay uiteqay ightray. Otay avehay ishay errorsay ademay ublicpay ightmay uinray imhay orfay
everay. Ehay isay ownay, erhapspay, orrysay orfay atwhay ehay ashay oneday, anday anxiousay otay
e-establishray aay aracterchay. Eway ustmay otnay akemay imhay esperateday.”

Ethay umulttay ofay Elizabeth’say indmay asway allayeday byay isthay onversationcay. Eshay
adhay otgay idray ofay otway ofay ethay ecretssay ichwhay adhay eighedway onay erhay orfay aay
ortnightfay, anday asway ertaincay ofay aay illingway istenerlay inay Anejay, eneverwhay eshay
ightmay ishway otay alktay againay ofay eitheray. Utbay erethay asway illstay omethingsay
urkinglay ehindbay, ofay ichwhay udencepray orbadefay ethay isclosureday. Eshay aredday otnay
elateray ethay otheray alfhay ofay mray. Arcy’sday etterlay, ornay explainay otay erhay istersay
owhay incerelysay eshay adhay eenbay aluedvay byay ishay iendfray. Erehay asway owledgeknay inay
ichwhay onay oneay ouldcay artakepay; anday eshay asway ensiblesay atthay othingnay esslay anthay
aay erfectpay understandingay etweenbay ethay artiespay ouldcay ustifyjay erhay inay
owingthray offay isthay astlay encumbranceay ofay erymystay. aNd“ay enthay,” aidsay eshay, if“ay
atthay eryvay improbableay eventay ouldshay everay aketay aceplay, Iay allshay erelymay ebay
ableay otay elltay atwhay Ingleybay aymay elltay inay aay uchmay oremay agreeableay annermay
imselfhay. Ethay ibertylay ofay ommunicationcay annotcay ebay inemay illtay itay ashay ostlay
allay itsay aluevay!”

Eshay asway ownay, onay eingbay ettledsay atay omehay, atay eisurelay otay observeay ethay ealray
atestay ofay erhay ister’ssay iritsspay. Anejay asway otnay appyhay. Eshay illstay erishedchay aay
eryvay endertay affectionay orfay Ingleybay. Avinghay evernay evenay anciedfay erselfhay inay
ovelay eforebay, erhay egardray adhay allay ethay armthway ofay irstfay attachmentay, anday omfray
erhay ageay anday ispositionday, eatergray eadinessstay anthay irstfay attachmentsay oftenay
oastbay; anday osay erventlyfay idday eshay aluevay ishay emembranceray, anday eferpray imhay otay
everyay otheray anmay, atthay allay erhay oodgay ensesay, anday allay erhay attentionay otay ethay
eelingsfay ofay erhay iendsfray, ereway equisiteray otay eckchay ethay indulgenceay ofay osethay
egretsray ichwhay ustmay avehay eenbay injuriousay otay erhay ownay ealthhay anday eirthay
anquillitytray.

eLl“way, Izzylay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, oneay ayday, at“whay isay ouryay opinionay ow_nay_ ofay
isthay adsay usinessbay ofay Ane’sjay? Orfay myay artpay, Iay amay eterminedday evernay otay eakspay
ofay itay againay otay anybodyay. Iay oldtay myay istersay Ilipsphay osay ethay otheray ayday. Utbay Iay
annotcay indfay outay atthay Anejay awsay anythingay ofay imhay inay Ondonlay. Ellway, ehay isay aay
eryvay undeservingay oungyay an--andmay Iay oday otnay upposesay erethay isay ethay eastlay
ancechay inay ethay orldway ofay erhay everay ettinggay imhay ownay. Erethay isay onay alktay ofay ishay
omingcay otay Etherfieldnay againay inay ethay ummersay; anday Iay avehay inquireday ofay
everybodyay, ootay, owhay isay ikelylay otay owknay.”

iLlustration[ay:

i“ay amay eterminedday evernay otay eakspay ofay itay againay”
ay]

i“ay oday otnay elievebay atthay ehay illway everay ivelay atay Etherfieldnay anyay oremay.”

oH“ay, ellway! itay isay ustjay asay ehay ooseschay. Obodynay antsway imhay otay omecay; oughthay Iay
allshay alwaysay aysay atthay ehay useday myay aughterday extremelyay illay; anday, ifay Iay asway
erhay, Iay ouldway otnay avehay utpay upay ithway itay. Ellway, myay omfortcay isay, Iay amay uresay
Anejay illway ieday ofay aay okenbray earthay, anday enthay ehay illway ebay orrysay orfay atwhay ehay
ashay oneday.”

Utbay asay Elizabethay ouldcay otnay eceiveray omfortcay omfray anyay uchsay expectationay eshay
ademay onay answeray.

eLl“way, Izzylay,” ontinuedcay erhay othermay, oonsay afterwardsay, and“ay osay ethay
Ollinsescay ivelay eryvay omfortablecay, oday eythay? Ellway, ellway, Iay onlyay opehay itay
illway astlay. Anday atwhay ortsay ofay abletay oday eythay eepkay? Arlottechay isay anay
excellentay anagermay, Iay areday aysay. Ifay eshay isay alfhay asay arpshay asay erhay othermay,
eshay isay avingsay enoughay. Erethay isay othingnay extravagantay inay eir_thay_
ousekeepinghay, Iay areday aysay.”

o“nay, othingnay atay allay.”

a“ay eatgray ealday ofay oodgay anagementmay, ependday uponay itay. Esyay, esyay. eY_thay_ illway
aketay arecay otnay otay outrunay eirthay incomeay. eY_thay_ illway evernay ebay istressedday
orfay oneymay. Ellway, uchmay oodgay aymay itay oday emthay! Anday osay, Iay upposesay, eythay oftenay
alktay ofay avinghay Ongbournlay enwhay ouryay atherfay isay eadday. Eythay ooklay uponay itay
uiteqay asay eirthay ownay, Iay areday aysay, eneverwhay atthay appenshay.”

iT“ay asway aay ubjectsay ichwhay eythay ouldcay otnay entionmay eforebay emay.”

o“nay; itay ouldway avehay eenbay angestray ifay eythay adhay. Utbay Iay akemay onay oubtday eythay
oftenay alktay ofay itay etweenbay emselvesthay. Ellway, ifay eythay ancay ebay easyay ithway anay
estateay atthay isay otnay awfullylay eirthay ownay, osay uchmay ethay etterbay. i_ay_ ouldshay ebay
ashameday ofay avinghay oneay atthay asway onlyay entaileday onay emay.”




iLlustration[ay:

eN“whay Olonelcay Iller’smay egimentray entway awayay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay Ixlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay irstfay eekway ofay eirthay eturnray asway oonsay onegay. Ethay econdsay eganbay. Itay asway
ethay astlay ofay ethay egiment’sray aystay inay Erytonmay, anday allay ethay oungyay adieslay inay
ethay eighbourhoodnay ereway oopingdray apaceay. Ethay ejectionday asway almostay
universalay. Ethay elderay Issmay Ennetsbay aloneay ereway illstay ableay otay eatay, inkdray,
anday eepslay, anday ursuepay ethay usualay oursecay ofay eirthay employmentsay. Eryvay
equentlyfray ereway eythay eproachedray orfay isthay insensibilityay byay Ittykay anday
Ialyday, osewhay ownay iserymay asway extremeay, anday owhay ouldcay otnay omprehendcay uchsay
ard-heartednesshay inay anyay ofay ethay amilyfay.

oOd“gay Eavenhay! Atwhay isay otay ecomebay ofay usay? Atwhay areay eway otay oday?” ouldway eythay
oftenay exclaimay inay ethay itternessbay ofay oeway. oW“hay ancay ouyay ebay ilingsmay osay,
Izzylay?”

Eirthay affectionateay othermay aredshay allay eirthay iefgray; eshay ememberedray atwhay
eshay adhay erselfhay endureday onay aay imilarsay occasionay ive-and-twentyfay earsyay agoay.

i“ay amay uresay,” aidsay eshay, i“ay iedcray orfay otway aysday ogethertay enwhay Olonelcay
Iller’smay egimentray entway awayay. Iay oughtthay Iay ouldshay avehay okebray myay earthay.”

i“ay amay uresay Iay allshay eakbray ine_may_,” aidsay Ialyday.

iF“ay oneay ouldcay utbay ogay otay Ightonbray!” observeday mrsay. Ennetbay.

oH“ay es!--ifyay oneay ouldcay utbay ogay otay Ightonbray! Utbay apapay isay osay isagreeableday.”

a“ay ittlelay ea-bathingsay ouldway etsay emay upay orfay everay.”

aNd“ay myay auntay Ilipsphay isay uresay itay ouldway oday e_may_ aay eatgray ealday ofay oodgay,”
addeday Ittykay.

Uchsay ereway ethay indkay ofay amentationslay esoundingray erpetuallypay oughthray
Ongbournlay Ousehay. Elizabethay iedtray otay ebay ivertedday byay emthay; utbay allay ensesay
ofay easureplay asway ostlay inay ameshay. Eshay eltfay aneway ethay usticejay ofay mray. Arcy’sday
objectionsay; anday evernay adhay eshay eforebay eenbay osay uchmay isposedday otay ardonpay ishay
interferenceay inay ethay iewsvay ofay ishay iendfray.

Utbay ethay oomglay ofay Ia’slyday ospectpray asway ortlyshay earedclay awayay; orfay eshay
eceivedray anay invitationay omfray mrsay. Orsterfay, ethay ifeway ofay ethay olonelcay ofay ethay
egimentray, otay accompanyay erhay otay Ightonbray. Isthay invaluableay iendfray asway aay
eryvay oungyay omanway, anday eryvay atelylay arriedmay. Aay esemblanceray inay ood-humourgay
anday oodgay iritsspay adhay ecommendedray erhay anday Ialyday otay eachay otheray, anday outay ofay
eirthay ee_thray_ onthsmay’ acquaintanceay eythay adhay eenbay intimateay o_tway_.

Ethay aptureray ofay Ialyday onay isthay occasionay, erhay adorationay ofay mrsay. Orsterfay,
ethay elightday ofay mrsay. Ennetbay, anday ethay ortificationmay ofay Ittykay, areay arcelyscay
otay ebay escribedday. Ollywhay inattentiveay otay erhay ister’ssay eelingsfay, Ialyday ewflay
aboutay ethay ousehay inay estlessray ecstasyay, allingcay orfay everyone’say
ongratulationscay, anday aughinglay anday alkingtay ithway oremay iolencevay anthay everay;
ilstwhay ethay ucklesslay Ittykay ontinuedcay inay ethay arlourpay epiningray atay erhay atefay
inay ermstay asay unreasonableay asay erhay accentay asway eevishpay.

i“ay annotcay eesay whyay mrsay. Orsterfay ouldshay otnay askay e_may_ asay ellway asay Ialyday,”
aidsay eshay, ough“thay Iay amay ot_nay_ erhay articularpay iendfray. Iay avehay ustjay asay uchmay
ightray otay ebay askeday asay eshay ashay, anday oremay ootay, orfay Iay amay otway earsyay olderay.”

Inay ainvay idday Elizabethay attemptay otay akemay erhay easonableray, anday Anejay otay akemay
erhay esignedray. Asay orfay Elizabethay erselfhay, isthay invitationay asway osay arfay omfray
excitingay inay erhay ethay amesay eelingsfay asay inay erhay othermay anday Ialyday, atthay eshay
onsideredcay itay asay ethay eath-warrantday ofay allay ossibilitypay ofay ommoncay ensesay
orfay ethay atterlay; anday etestableday asay uchsay aay epstay ustmay akemay erhay, ereway itay
ownknay, eshay ouldcay otnay elphay ecretlysay advisingay erhay atherfay otnay otay etlay erhay
ogay. Eshay epresentedray otay imhay allay ethay improprietiesay ofay Ia’slyday eneralgay
ehaviourbay, ethay ittlelay advantageay eshay ouldcay eriveday omfray ethay iendshipfray ofay
uchsay aay omanway asay mrsay. Orsterfay, anday ethay obabilitypray ofay erhay eingbay etyay oremay
imprudentay ithway uchsay aay ompanioncay atay Ightonbray, erewhay ethay emptationstay ustmay
ebay eatergray anthay atay omehay. Ehay eardhay erhay attentivelyay, anday enthay aidsay,--

iA“lyday illway evernay ebay easyay illtay eshay ashay exposeday erselfhay inay omesay ublicpay
aceplay oray otheray, anday eway ancay evernay expectay erhay otay oday itay ithway osay ittlelay
expenseay oray inconvenienceay otay erhay amilyfay asay underay ethay esentpray
ircumstancescay.”

iF“ay ouyay ereway awareay,” aidsay Elizabethay, of“ay ethay eryvay eatgray isadvantageday otay
usay allay, ichwhay ustmay ariseay omfray ethay ublicpay oticenay ofay Ia’slyday unguardeday anday
imprudentay annermay, aynay, ichwhay ashay alreadyay arisenay omfray itay, Iay amay uresay ouyay
ouldway udgejay ifferentlyday inay ethay affairay.”

aLready“ay arisenay!” epeatedray mray. Ennetbay. aT“whay! ashay eshay ightenedfray awayay
omesay ofay ouryay overslay? Oorpay ittlelay Izzylay! Utbay oday otnay ebay astcay ownday. Uchsay
ueamishsqay outhsyay asay annotcay earbay otay ebay onnectedcay ithway aay ittlelay absurdityay
areay otnay orthway aay egretray. Omecay, etlay emay eesay ethay istlay ofay ethay itifulpay ellowsfay
owhay avehay eenbay eptkay aloofay byay Ia’slyday ollyfay.”

iNdeed“ay, ouyay areay istakenmay. Iay avehay onay uchsay injuriesay otay esentray. Itay isay otnay
ofay eculiarpay, utbay ofay eneralgay evilsay, ichwhay Iay amay ownay omplainingcay. Ouray
importanceay, ouray espectabilityray inay ethay orldway, ustmay ebay affecteday byay ethay
ildway olatilityvay, ethay assuranceay anday isdainday ofay allay estraintray ichwhay arkmay
Ia’slyday aracterchay. Excuseay e,--formay Iay ustmay eakspay ainlyplay. Ifay ouyay, myay earday
atherfay, illway otnay aketay ethay oubletray ofay eckingchay erhay exuberantay iritsspay, anday
ofay eachingtay erhay atthay erhay esentpray ursuitspay areay otnay otay ebay ethay usinessbay ofay
erhay ifelay, eshay illway oonsay ebay eyondbay ethay eachray ofay amendmentay. Erhay aracterchay
illway ebay ixedfay; anday eshay illway, atay ixteensay, ebay ethay ostmay eterminedday irtflay
atthay everay ademay erselfhay anday erhay amilyfay idiculous;--aray irtflay, ootay, inay ethay
orstway anday eanestmay egreeday ofay irtationflay; ithoutway anyay attractionay eyondbay
outhyay anday aay olerabletay ersonpay; anday, omfray ethay ignoranceay anday emptinessay ofay
erhay indmay, ollywhay unableay otay ardway offay anyay ortionpay ofay atthay universalay
ontemptcay ichwhay erhay ageray orfay admirationay illway exciteay. Inay isthay angerday Ittykay
isay alsoay omprehendedcay. Eshay illway ollowfay ereverwhay Ialyday eadslay. Ainvay,
ignorantay, idleay, anday absolutelyay uncontrolleday! Ohay, myay earday atherfay, ancay ouyay
upposesay itay ossiblepay atthay eythay illway otnay ebay ensuredcay anday espisedday ereverwhay
eythay areay ownknay, anday atthay eirthay isterssay illway otnay ebay oftenay involveday inay ethay
isgraceday?”

mray. Ennetbay awsay atthay erhay olewhay earthay asway inay ethay ubjectsay; anday,
affectionatelyay akingtay erhay andhay, aidsay, inay eplyray,--

o“day otnay akemay ourselfyay uneasyay, myay ovelay. Ereverwhay ouyay anday Anejay areay ownknay,
ouyay ustmay ebay espectedray anday aluedvay; anday ouyay illway otnay appearay otay esslay
advantageay orfay avinghay aay ouplecay of--oray Iay aymay aysay, ee--verythray illysay
isterssay. Eway allshay avehay onay eacepay atay Ongbournlay ifay Ialyday oesday otnay ogay otay
Ightonbray. Etlay erhay ogay, enthay. Olonelcay Orsterfay isay aay ensiblesay anmay, anday illway
eepkay erhay outay ofay anyay ealray ischiefmay; anday eshay isay uckilylay ootay oorpay otay ebay anay
objectay ofay eypray otay anybodyay. Atay Ightonbray eshay illway ebay ofay esslay importanceay
evenay asay aay ommoncay irtflay anthay eshay ashay eenbay erehay. Ethay officersay illway indfay
omenway etterbay orthway eirthay oticenay. Etlay usay opehay, ereforethay, atthay erhay eingbay
erethay aymay eachtay erhay erhay ownay insignificanceay. Atay anyay ateray, eshay annotcay owgray
anymay egreesday orseway, ithoutway authorizingay usay otay ocklay erhay upay orfay ethay estray
ofay erhay ifelay.”

Ithway isthay answeray Elizabethay asway orcedfay otay ebay ontentcay; utbay erhay ownay opinionay
ontinuedcay ethay amesay, anday eshay eftlay imhay isappointedday anday orrysay. Itay asway otnay
inay erhay aturenay, oweverhay, otay increaseay erhay exationsvay byay ellingdway onay emthay.
Eshay asway onfidentcay ofay avinghay erformedpay erhay utyday; anday otay etfray overay
unavoidableay evilsay, oray augmentay emthay byay anxietyay, asway onay artpay ofay erhay
ispositionday.

Adhay Ialyday anday erhay othermay ownknay ethay ubstancesay ofay erhay onferencecay ithway erhay
atherfay, eirthay indignationay ouldway ardlyhay avehay oundfay expressionay inay eirthay
uniteday olubilityvay. Inay Ia’slyday imaginationay, aay isitvay otay Ightonbray omprisedcay
everyay ossibilitypay ofay earthlyay appinesshay. Eshay awsay, ithway ethay eativecray eyeay
ofay ancyfay, ethay eetsstray ofay atthay aygay athing-placebay overedcay ithway officersay.
Eshay awsay erselfhay ethay objectay ofay attentionay otay enstay anday otay oresscay ofay emthay atay
esentpray unknownay. Eshay awsay allay ethay oriesglay ofay ethay ampcay: itsay entstay
etchedstray orthfay inay eauteousbay uniformityay ofay ineslay, owdedcray ithway ethay oungyay
anday ethay aygay, anday azzlingday ithway arletscay; anday, otay ompletecay ethay iewvay, eshay
awsay erselfhay eatedsay eneathbay aay enttay, enderlytay irtingflay ithway atay eastlay ixsay
officersay atay onceay.

iLlustration[ay:

eNderly“tay irtingflay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

Adhay eshay ownknay atthay erhay istersay oughtsay otay eartay erhay omfray uchsay ospectspray anday
uchsay ealitiesray asay esethay, atwhay ouldway avehay eenbay erhay ensationssay? Eythay ouldcay
avehay eenbay understooday onlyay byay erhay othermay, owhay ightmay avehay eltfay earlynay ethay
amesay. Ia’slyday oinggay otay Ightonbray asway allay atthay onsoledcay erhay orfay ethay
elancholymay onvictioncay ofay erhay usband’shay evernay intendingay otay ogay erethay
imselfhay.

Utbay eythay ereway entirelyay ignorantay ofay atwhay adhay assedpay; anday eirthay apturesray
ontinuedcay, ithway ittlelay intermissionay, otay ethay eryvay ayday ofay Ia’slyday eavinglay
omehay.

Elizabethay asway ownay otay eesay mray. Ickhamway orfay ethay astlay imetay. Avinghay eenbay
equentlyfray inay ompanycay ithway imhay incesay erhay eturnray, agitationay asway ettypray
ellway overay; ethay agitationsay ofay ormerfay artialitypay entirelyay osay. Eshay adhay evenay
earntlay otay etectday, inay ethay eryvay entlenessgay ichwhay adhay irstfay elightedday erhay,
anay affectationay anday aay amenesssay otay isgustday anday earyway. Inay ishay esentpray
ehaviourbay otay erselfhay, oreovermay, eshay adhay aay eshfray ourcesay ofay ispleasureday;
orfay ethay inclinationay ehay oonsay estifiedtay ofay enewingray osethay attentionsay ichwhay
adhay arkedmay ethay earlyay artpay ofay eirthay acquaintanceay ouldcay onlyay ervesay, afteray
atwhay adhay incesay assedpay, otay ovokepray erhay. Eshay ostlay allay oncerncay orfay imhay inay
indingfay erselfhay usthay electedsay asay ethay objectay ofay uchsay idleay anday ivolousfray
allantrygay; anday ilewhay eshay eadilystay epressedray itay, ouldcay otnay utbay eelfay ethay
eproofray ontainedcay inay ishay elievingbay, atthay oweverhay onglay, anday orfay ateverwhay
ausecay, ishay attentionsay adhay eenbay ithdrawnway, erhay anityvay ouldway ebay atifiedgray,
anday erhay eferencepray ecuredsay, atay anyay imetay, byay eirthay enewalray.

Onay ethay eryvay astlay ayday ofay ethay egiment’sray emainingray inay Erytonmay, ehay inedday,
ithway othersay ofay ethay officersay, atay Ongbournlay; anday osay ittlelay asway Elizabethay
isposedday otay artpay omfray imhay inay ood-humourgay, atthay, onay ishay akingmay omesay
inquiryay asay otay ethay annermay inay ichwhay erhay imetay adhay assedpay atay Unsfordhay, eshay
entionedmay Olonelcay Itzwilliam’sfay anday mray. Arcy’sday avinghay othbay entspay eethray
eeksway atay Osingsray, anday askeday imhay ifay ehay ereway acquainteday ithway ethay ormerfay.

Ehay ookedlay urprisedsay, ispleasedday, alarmeday; utbay, ithway aay oment’smay
ecollectionray, anday aay eturningray ilesmay, epliedray, atthay ehay adhay ormerlyfay eensay
imhay oftenay; anday, afteray observingay atthay ehay asway aay eryvay entlemanlikegay anmay,
askeday erhay owhay eshay adhay ikedlay imhay. Erhay answeray asway armlyway inay ishay avourfay.
Ithway anay airay ofay indifferenceay, ehay oonsay afterwardsay addeday, oW“hay onglay idday ouyay
aysay atthay ehay asway atay Osingsray?”

eArly“nay eethray eeksway.”

aNd“ay ouyay awsay imhay equentlyfray?”

eS“yay, almostay everyay ayday.”

iS“hay annersmay areay eryvay ifferentday omfray ishay ousin’scay.”

eS“yay, eryvay ifferentday; utbay Iay inkthay mray. Arcyday improvesay onay acquaintanceay.”

iNdeed“ay!” iedcray Ickhamway, ithway aay ooklay ichwhay idday otnay escapeay erhay. aNd“ay aypray
aymay Iay askay--” utbay eckingchay imselfhay, ehay addeday, inay aay ayergay onetay, iS“ay itay inay
addressay atthay ehay improvesay? Ashay ehay eignedday otay adday aughtay ofay ivilitycay otay ishay
ordinaryay estylay? orfay Iay areday otnay opehay,” ehay ontinuedcay, inay aay owerlay anday oremay
erioussay onetay, at“thay ehay isay improveday inay essentialsay.”

oH“ay, onay!” aidsay Elizabethay. iN“ay essentialsay, Iay elievebay, ehay isay eryvay uchmay
atwhay ehay everay asway.”

Ilewhay eshay okespay, Ickhamway ookedlay asay ifay arcelyscay owingknay etherwhay otay
ejoiceray overay erhay ordsway oray otay istrustday eirthay eaningmay. Erethay asway aay
omethingsay inay erhay ountenancecay ichwhay ademay imhay istenlay ithway anay apprehensiveay
anday anxiousay attentionay, ilewhay eshay addeday,--

eN“whay Iay aidsay atthay ehay improveday onay acquaintanceay, Iay idday otnay eanmay atthay
eitheray ishay indmay oray annersmay ereway inay aay atestay ofay improvementay; utbay atthay,
omfray owingknay imhay etterbay, ishay ispositionday asway etterbay understooday.”

Ickham’sway alarmay ownay appeareday inay aay eightenedhay omplexioncay anday agitateday
ooklay; orfay aay ewfay inutesmay ehay asway ilentsay; illtay, akingshay offay ishay
embarrassmentay, ehay urnedtay otay erhay againay, anday aidsay inay ethay entlestgay ofay
accentsay,--

oU“yay, owhay osay ellway owknay myay eelingsfay owardstay mray. Arcyday, illway eadilyray
omprehendcay owhay incerelysay Iay ustmay ejoiceray atthay ehay isay iseway enoughay otay assumeay
evenay ethay appearance_ay_ ofay atwhay isay ightray. Ishay idepray, inay atthay irectionday,
aymay ebay ofay ervicesay, ifay otnay otay imselfhay, otay anymay othersay, orfay itay ustmay eterday
imhay omfray uchsay oulfay isconductmay asay Iay avehay ufferedsay byay. Iay onlyay earfay atthay
ethay ortsay ofay autiousnesscay otay ichwhay ouyay, Iay imagineay, avehay eenbay alludingay, isay
erelymay adopteday onay ishay isitsvay otay ishay auntay, ofay osewhay oodgay opinionay anday
udgmentjay ehay andsstay uchmay inay aweay. Ishay earfay ofay erhay ashay alwaysay operateday, Iay
owknay, enwhay eythay ereway ogethertay; anday aay oodgay ealday isay otay ebay imputeday otay ishay
ishway ofay orwardingfay ethay atchmay ithway Issmay eday Ourghbay, ichwhay Iay amay ertaincay ehay
ashay eryvay uchmay atay earthay.”

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay epressray aay ilesmay atay isthay, utbay eshay answereday onlyay byay aay
ightslay inclinationay ofay ethay eadhay. Eshay awsay atthay ehay antedway otay engageay erhay onay
ethay olday ubjectsay ofay ishay ievancesgray, anday eshay asway inay onay umourhay otay indulgeay
imhay. Ethay estray ofay ethay eveningay assedpay ithway ethay appearance_ay_, onay ishay idesay,
ofay usualay eerfulnesschay, utbay ithway onay urtherfay attemptay otay istinguishday
Elizabethay; anday eythay artedpay atay astlay ithway utualmay ivilitycay, anday ossiblypay aay
utualmay esireday ofay evernay eetingmay againay.

Enwhay ethay artypay okebray upay, Ialyday eturnedray ithway mrsay. Orsterfay otay Erytonmay,
omfray encewhay eythay ereway otay etsay outay earlyay ethay extnay orningmay. Ethay eparationsay
etweenbay erhay anday erhay amilyfay asway atherray oisynay anthay atheticpay. Ittykay asway ethay
onlyay oneay owhay edshay earstay; utbay eshay idday eepway omfray exationvay anday envyay. mrsay.
Ennetbay asway iffuseday inay erhay oodgay ishesway orfay ethay elicityfay ofay erhay aughterday,
anday impressiveay inay erhay injunctionsay atthay eshay ouldway otnay issmay ethay
opportunityay ofay enjoyingay erselfhay asay uchmay asay ossible,--advicepay ichwhay erethay
asway everyay easonray otay elievebay ouldway ebay attendeday otay; anday, inay ethay amorousclay
appinesshay ofay Ialyday erselfhay inay iddingbay arewellfay, ethay oremay entlegay adieusay
ofay erhay isterssay ereway uttereday ithoutway eingbay eardhay.




iLlustration[ay:

Ethay arrivalay ofay ethay
Ardinersgay
ay]




APTERchay IIxlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Adhay Elizabeth’say opinionay eenbay allay awndray omfray erhay ownay amilyfay, eshay ouldcay
otnay avehay ormedfay aay eryvay easingplay icturepay ofay onjugalcay elicityfay oray omesticday
omfortcay. Erhay atherfay, aptivatedcay byay outhyay anday eautybay, anday atthay appearanceay
ofay ood-humourgay ichwhay outhyay anday eautybay enerallygay ivegay, adhay arriedmay aay
omanway osewhay eakway understandingay anday illiberalay indmay adhay eryvay earlyay inay
eirthay arriagemay utpay anay enday otay allay ealray affectionay orfay erhay. Espectray,
esteemay, anday onfidencecay adhay anishedvay orfay everay; anday allay ishay iewsvay ofay
omesticday appinesshay ereway overthrownay. Utbay mray. Ennetbay asway otnay ofay aay
ispositionday otay eeksay omfortcay orfay ethay isappointmentday ichwhay ishay ownay
imprudenceay adhay oughtbray onay inay anyay ofay osethay easuresplay ichwhay ootay oftenay
onsolecay ethay unfortunateay orfay eirthay ollyfay oray eirthay icevay. Ehay asway ondfay ofay
ethay ountrycay anday ofay ooksbay; anday omfray esethay astestay adhay arisenay ishay incipalpray
enjoymentsay. Otay ishay ifeway ehay asway eryvay ittlelay otherwiseay indebteday anthay asay
erhay ignoranceay anday ollyfay adhay ontributedcay otay ishay amusementay. Isthay isay otnay
ethay ortsay ofay appinesshay ichwhay aay anmay ouldway inay eneralgay ishway otay oweay otay ishay
ifeway; utbay erewhay otheray owerspay ofay entertainmentay areay antingway, ethay uetray
ilosopherphay illway eriveday enefitbay omfray uchsay asay areay ivengay.

Elizabethay, oweverhay, adhay evernay eenbay indblay otay ethay improprietyay ofay erhay
ather’sfay ehaviourbay asay aay usbandhay. Eshay adhay alwaysay eensay itay ithway ainpay; utbay
espectingray ishay abilitiesay, anday atefulgray orfay ishay affectionateay eatmenttray ofay
erselfhay, eshay endeavoureday otay orgetfay atwhay eshay ouldcay otnay overlookay, anday otay
anishbay omfray erhay oughtsthay atthay ontinualcay eachbray ofay onjugalcay obligationay
anday ecorumday ichwhay, inay exposingay ishay ifeway otay ethay ontemptcay ofay erhay ownay
ildrenchay, asway osay ighlyhay eprehensibleray. Utbay eshay adhay evernay eltfay osay
onglystray asay ownay ethay isadvantagesday ichwhay ustmay attenday ethay ildrenchay ofay osay
unsuitableay aay arriagemay, ornay everay eenbay osay ullyfay awareay ofay ethay evilsay arisingay
omfray osay ill-judgeday aay irectionday ofay alents--talentstay ichwhay, ightlyray useday,
ightmay atay eastlay avehay eservedpray ethay espectabilityray ofay ishay aughtersday, evenay
ifay incapableay ofay enlargingay ethay indmay ofay ishay ifeway.

Enwhay Elizabethay adhay ejoicedray overay Ickham’sway epartureday, eshay oundfay ittlelay
otheray ausecay orfay atisfactionsay inay ethay osslay ofay ethay egimentray. Eirthay artiespay
abroaday ereway esslay ariedvay anthay eforebay; anday atay omehay eshay adhay aay othermay anday
istersay, osewhay onstantcay epiningsray atay ethay ulnessday ofay everythingay arounday
emthay ewthray aay ealray oomglay overay eirthay omesticday irclecay; anday, oughthay Ittykay
ightmay inay imetay egainray erhay aturalnay egreeday ofay ensesay, incesay ethay isturbersday
ofay erhay ainbray ereway emovedray, erhay otheray istersay, omfray osewhay ispositionday
eatergray evilay ightmay ebay apprehendeday, asway ikelylay otay ebay ardenedhay inay allay erhay
ollyfay anday assuranceay, byay aay ituationsay ofay uchsay oubleday angerday asay aay
atering-placeway anday aay ampcay. Uponay ethay olewhay, ereforethay, eshay oundfay, atwhay
ashay eenbay ometimessay oundfay eforebay, atthay anay eventay otay ichwhay eshay adhay ookedlay
orwardfay ithway impatientay esireday, idday otnay, inay akingtay aceplay, ingbray allay ethay
atisfactionsay eshay adhay omisedpray erselfhay. Itay asway onsequentlycay ecessarynay otay
amenay omesay otheray eriodpay orfay ethay ommencementcay ofay actualay elicityfay; otay avehay
omesay otheray ointpay onay ichwhay erhay ishesway anday opeshay ightmay ebay ixedfay, anday byay
againay enjoyingay ethay easureplay ofay anticipationay, onsolecay erselfhay orfay ethay
esentpray, anday eparepray orfay anotheray isappointmentday. Erhay ourtay otay ethay Akeslay
asway ownay ethay objectay ofay erhay appiesthay oughtsthay: itay asway erhay estbay onsolationcay
orfay allay ethay uncomfortableay ourshay ichwhay ethay iscontentednessday ofay erhay othermay
anday Ittykay ademay inevitableay; anday ouldcay eshay avehay includeday Anejay inay ethay
emeschay, everyay artpay ofay itay ouldway avehay eenbay erfectpay.

uT“bay itay isay ortunatefay,” oughtthay eshay, at“thay Iay avehay omethingsay otay ishway orfay.
Ereway ethay olewhay arrangementay ompletecay, myay isappointmentday ouldway ebay ertaincay.
Utbay erehay, byay arryingcay ithway emay oneay easelesscay ourcesay ofay egretray inay myay
ister’ssay absenceay, Iay aymay easonablyray opehay otay avehay allay myay expectationsay ofay
easureplay ealizedray. Aay emeschay ofay ichwhay everyay artpay omisespray elightday ancay
evernay ebay uccessfulsay; anday eneralgay isappointmentday isay onlyay ardedway offay byay
ethay efenceday ofay omesay ittlelay eculiarpay exationvay.”

Enwhay Ialyday entway awayay eshay omisedpray otay itewray eryvay oftenay anday eryvay inutelymay
otay erhay othermay anday Ittykay; utbay erhay etterslay ereway alwaysay onglay expecteday, anday
alwaysay eryvay ortshay. Osethay otay erhay othermay ontainedcay ittlelay elseay anthay atthay
eythay ereway ustjay eturnedray omfray ethay ibrarylay, erewhay uchsay anday uchsay officersay
adhay attendeday emthay, anday erewhay eshay adhay eensay uchsay eautifulbay ornamentsay asay
ademay erhay uiteqay ildway; atthay eshay adhay aay ewnay owngay, oray aay ewnay arasolpay, ichwhay
eshay ouldway avehay escribedday oremay ullyfay, utbay asway obligeday otay eavelay offay inay aay
iolentvay urryhay, asay mrsay. Orsterfay alledcay erhay, anday eythay ereway oinggay otay ethay
ampcay; anday omfray erhay orrespondencecay ithway erhay istersay erethay asway illstay esslay
otay ebay earntlay, orfay erhay etterslay otay Ittykay, oughthay atherray ongerlay, ereway uchmay
ootay ullfay ofay ineslay underay ethay ordsway otay ebay ademay ublicpay.

Afteray ethay irstfay ortnightfay oray eethray eeksway ofay erhay absenceay, ealthhay,
ood-humourgay, anday eerfulnesschay eganbay otay eappearray atay Ongbournlay. Everythingay
oreway aay appierhay aspectay. Ethay amiliesfay owhay adhay eenbay inay owntay orfay ethay interway
amecay ackbay againay, anday ummersay ineryfay anday ummersay engagementsay aroseay. mrsay.
Ennetbay asway estoredray otay erhay usualay uerulousqay erenitysay; anday byay ethay iddlemay
ofay Unejay Ittykay asway osay uchmay ecoveredray asay otay ebay ableay otay enteray Erytonmay
ithoutway ears,--antay eventay ofay uchsay appyhay omisepray asay otay akemay Elizabethay
opehay, atthay byay ethay ollowingfay Istmaschray eshay ightmay ebay osay olerablytay
easonableray asay otnay otay entionmay anay officeray aboveay onceay aay ayday, unlessay, byay
omesay uelcray anday aliciousmay arrangementay atay ethay Arway Officeay, anotheray egimentray
ouldshay ebay uarteredqay inay Erytonmay.

Ethay imetay ixedfay orfay ethay eginningbay ofay eirthay orthernnay ourtay asway ownay astfay
approachingay; anday aay ortnightfay onlyay asway antingway ofay itay, enwhay aay etterlay
arriveday omfray mrsay. Ardinergay, ichwhay atay onceay elayedday itsay ommencementcay anday
urtailedcay itsay extentay. mray. Ardinergay ouldway ebay eventedpray byay usinessbay omfray
ettingsay outay illtay aay ortnightfay aterlay inay Ulyjay, anday ustmay ebay inay Ondonlay againay
ithinway aay onthmay; anday asay atthay eftlay ootay ortshay aay eriodpay orfay emthay otay ogay osay
arfay, anday eesay osay uchmay asay eythay adhay oposedpray, oray atay eastlay otay eesay itay ithway
ethay eisurelay anday omfortcay eythay adhay uiltbay onay, eythay ereway obligeday otay ivegay upay
ethay Akeslay, anday ubstitutesay aay oremay ontractedcay ourtay; anday, accordingay otay ethay
esentpray anplay, ereway otay ogay onay artherfay orthwardnay anthay Erbyshireday. Inay atthay
ountycay erethay asway enoughay otay ebay eensay otay occupyay ethay iefchay ofay eirthay eethray
eeksway; anday otay mrsay. Ardinergay itay adhay aay eculiarlypay ongstray attractionay. Ethay
owntay erewhay eshay adhay ormerlyfay assedpay omesay earsyay ofay erhay ifelay, anday erewhay
eythay ereway ownay otay endspay aay ewfay aysday, asway obablypray asay eatgray anay objectay ofay
erhay uriositycay asay allay ethay elebratedcay eautiesbay ofay Atlockmay, Atsworthchay,
Ovedaleday, oray ethay Eakpay.

Elizabethay asway excessivelyay isappointedday: eshay adhay etsay erhay earthay onay eeingsay
ethay Akeslay; anday illstay oughtthay erethay ightmay avehay eenbay imetay enoughay. Utbay itay
asway erhay usinessbay otay ebay atisfied--andsay ertainlycay erhay empertay otay ebay appyhay;
anday allay asway oonsay ightray againay.

Ithway ethay entionmay ofay Erbyshireday, erethay ereway anymay ideasay onnectedcay. Itay asway
impossibleay orfay erhay otay eesay ethay ordway ithoutway inkingthay ofay Emberleypay anday itsay
owneray. uT“bay urelysay,” aidsay eshay, i“ay aymay enteray ishay ountycay ithway impunityay,
anday obray itay ofay aay ewfay etrifiedpay arsspay, ithoutway ishay erceivingpay emay.”

Ethay eriodpay ofay expectationay asway ownay oubledday. Ourfay eeksway ereway otay asspay awayay
eforebay erhay uncleay anday aunt’say arrivalay. Utbay eythay idday asspay awayay, anday mray. anday
mrsay. Ardinergay, ithway eirthay ourfay ildrenchay, idday atay engthlay appearay atay
Ongbournlay. Ethay ildrenchay, otway irlsgay ofay ixsay anday eightay earsyay olday, anday otway
oungeryay oysbay, ereway otay ebay eftlay underay ethay articularpay arecay ofay eirthay ousincay
Anejay, owhay asway ethay eneralgay avouritefay, anday osewhay eadystay ensesay anday
eetnesssway ofay empertay exactlyay adapteday erhay orfay attendingay otay emthay inay everyay
ay--teachingway emthay, ayingplay ithway emthay, anday ovinglay emthay.

Ethay Ardinersgay ayedstay onlyay oneay ightnay atay Ongbournlay, anday etsay offay ethay extnay
orningmay ithway Elizabethay inay ursuitpay ofay oveltynay anday amusementay. Oneay
enjoymentay asway ertain--thatcay ofay uitablenesssay asay ompanionscay; aay
uitablenesssay ichwhay omprehendedcay ealthhay anday empertay otay earbay
inconveniences--cheerfulnessay otay enhanceay everyay easure--andplay affectionay
anday intelligenceay, ichwhay ightmay upplysay itay amongay emselvesthay ifay erethay ereway
isappointmentsday abroaday.

Itay isay otnay ethay objectay ofay isthay orkway otay ivegay aay escriptionday ofay Erbyshireday,
ornay ofay anyay ofay ethay emarkableray acesplay oughthray ichwhay eirthay outeray itherthay
ay--oXfordlay, Enheimblay, Arwickway, Enilworthkay, Irminghambay, etcay., areay
ufficientlysay ownknay. Aay allsmay artpay ofay Erbyshireday isay allay ethay esentpray
oncerncay. Otay ethay ittlelay owntay ofay Ambtonlay, ethay enescay ofay mrsay. Ardiner’sgay
ormerfay esidenceray, anday erewhay eshay adhay atelylay earnedlay atthay omesay
acquaintanceay illstay emainedray, eythay entbay eirthay epsstay, afteray avinghay eensay
allay ethay incipalpray ondersway ofay ethay ountrycay; anday ithinway ivefay ilesmay ofay
Ambtonlay, Elizabethay oundfay, omfray erhay auntay, atthay Emberleypay asway ituatedsay. Itay
asway otnay inay eirthay irectday oadray; ornay oremay anthay aay ilemay oray otway outay ofay itay. Inay
alkingtay overay eirthay outeray ethay eveningay eforebay, mrsay. Ardinergay expresseday anay
inclinationay otay eesay ethay aceplay againay. mray. Ardinergay eclaredday ishay
illingnessway, anday Elizabethay asway applieday otay orfay erhay approbationay.

“myay ovelay, ouldshay otnay ouyay ikelay otay eesay aay aceplay ofay ichwhay ouyay avehay eardhay osay
uchmay?” aidsay erhay auntay. a“ay aceplay, ootay, ithway ichwhay osay anymay ofay ouryay
acquaintanceay areay onnectedcay. Ickhamway assedpay allay ishay outhyay erethay, ouyay
owknay.”

Elizabethay asway istressedday. Eshay eltfay atthay eshay adhay onay usinessbay atay
Emberleypay, anday asway obligeday otay assumeay aay isinclinationday orfay eeingsay itay. Eshay
ustmay ownay atthay eshay asway iredtay ofay eatgray ouseshay: afteray oinggay overay osay anymay,
eshay eallyray adhay onay easureplay inay inefay arpetscay oray atinsay urtainscay.

mrsay. Ardinergay abuseday erhay upiditystay. iF“ay itay ereway erelymay aay inefay ousehay
ichlyray urnishedfay,” aidsay eshay, i“ay ouldshay otnay arecay aboutay itay elfmysay; utbay ethay
oundsgray areay elightfulday. Eythay avehay omesay ofay ethay inestfay oodsway inay ethay
ountrycay.”

Elizabethay aidsay onay oremay; utbay erhay indmay ouldcay otnay acquiesceay. Ethay
ossibilitypay ofay eetingmay mray. Arcyday, ilewhay iewingvay ethay aceplay, instantlyay
occurreday. Itay ouldway ebay eadfuldray! Eshay ushedblay atay ethay eryvay ideaay; anday
oughtthay itay ouldway ebay etterbay otay eakspay openlyay otay erhay auntay, anthay otay unray uchsay
aay iskray. Utbay againstay isthay erethay ereway objectionsay; anday eshay inallyfay esolvedray
atthay itay ouldcay ebay ethay astlay esourceray, ifay erhay ivatepray inquiriesay asay otay ethay
absenceay ofay ethay amilyfay ereway unfavourablyay answereday.

Accordinglyay, enwhay eshay etiredray atay ightnay, eshay askeday ethay ambermaidchay
etherwhay Emberleypay ereway otnay aay eryvay inefay aceplay, atwhay asway ethay amenay ofay itsay
oprietorpray, anday, ithway onay ittlelay alarmay, etherwhay ethay amilyfay ereway ownday orfay
ethay ummersay? Aay ostmay elcomeway egativenay ollowedfay ethay astlay uestionqay; anday erhay
alarmsay eingbay ownay emovedray, eshay asway atay eisurelay otay eelfay aay eatgray ealday ofay
uriositycay otay eesay ethay ousehay erselfhay; anday enwhay ethay ubjectsay asway evivedray ethay
extnay orningmay, anday eshay asway againay applieday otay, ouldcay eadilyray answeray, anday
ithway aay operpray airay ofay indifferenceay, atthay eshay adhay otnay eallyray anyay islikeday
otay ethay emeschay.

Otay Emberleypay, ereforethay, eythay ereway otay ogay.




iLlustration[ay:

oNjecturing“cay asay otay ethay ateday”
ay]




APTERchay IIIxlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay, asay eythay ovedray alongay, atchedway orfay ethay irstfay appearanceay ofay
Emberleypay Oodsway ithway omesay erturbationpay; anday enwhay atay engthlay eythay urnedtay
inay atay ethay odgelay, erhay iritsspay ereway inay aay ighhay utterflay.

Ethay arkpay asway eryvay argelay, anday ontainedcay eatgray arietyvay ofay oundgray. Eythay
entereday itay inay oneay ofay itsay owestlay ointspay, anday ovedray orfay omesay imetay oughthray
aay eautifulbay oodway etchingstray overay aay ideway extentay.

Elizabeth’say indmay asway ootay ullfay orfay onversationcay, utbay eshay awsay anday admireday
everyay emarkableray otspay anday ointpay ofay iewvay. Eythay aduallygray ascendeday orfay
alfhay aay ilemay, anday enthay oundfay emselvesthay atay ethay optay ofay aay onsiderablecay
eminenceay, erewhay ethay oodway easedcay, anday ethay eyeay asway instantlyay aughtcay byay
Emberleypay Ousehay, ituatedsay onay ethay oppositeay idesay ofay ethay alleyvay, intoay ichwhay
ethay oadray ithway omesay abruptnessay oundway. Itay asway aay argelay, andsomehay onestay
uildingbay, andingstay ellway onay isingray oundgray, anday ackedbay byay aay idgeray ofay ighhay
oodyway illshay; anday inay ontfray aay eamstray ofay omesay aturalnay importanceay asway
elledsway intoay eatergray, utbay ithoutway anyay artificialay appearanceay. Itsay anksbay
ereway eithernay ormalfay ornay alselyfay adorneday. Elizabethay asway elightedday. Eshay
adhay evernay eensay aay aceplay orfay ichwhay aturenay adhay oneday oremay, oray erewhay aturalnay
eautybay adhay eenbay osay ittlelay ounteractedcay byay anay awkwarday astetay. Eythay ereway
allay ofay emthay armway inay eirthay admirationay; anday atay atthay omentmay eshay eltfay atthay
otay ebay istressmay ofay Emberleypay ightmay ebay omethingsay!

Eythay escendedday ethay illhay, ossedcray ethay idgebray, anday ovedray otay ethay oorday; anday,
ilewhay examiningay ethay earernay aspectay ofay ethay ousehay, allay erhay apprehensionay ofay
eetingmay itsay owneray eturnedray. Eshay eadeddray estlay ethay ambermaidchay adhay eenbay
istakenmay. Onay applyingay otay eesay ethay aceplay, eythay ereway admitteday intoay ethay
allhay; anday Elizabethay, asay eythay aitedway orfay ethay ousekeeperhay, adhay eisurelay otay
onderway atay erhay eingbay erewhay eshay asway.

Ethay ousekeeperhay amecay; aay espectableray ookinglay elderlyay omanway, uchmay esslay
inefay, anday oremay ivilcay, anthay eshay adhay anyay otionnay ofay indingfay erhay. Eythay
ollowedfay erhay intoay ethay ining-parlourday. Itay asway aay argelay, ell-proportionedway
oomray, andsomelyhay ittedfay upay. Elizabethay, afteray ightlyslay urveyingsay itay, entway
otay aay indowway otay enjoyay itsay ospectpray. Ethay illhay, ownedcray ithway oodway, omfray
ichwhay eythay adhay escendedday, eceivingray increaseday abruptnessay omfray ethay
istanceday, asway aay eautifulbay objectay. Everyay ispositionday ofay ethay oundgray asway
oodgay; anday eshay ookedlay onay ethay olewhay enescay, ethay iverray, ethay eestray atteredscay
onay itsay anksbay, anday ethay indingway ofay ethay alleyvay, asay arfay asay eshay ouldcay acetray
itay, ithway elightday. Asay eythay assedpay intoay otheray oomsray, esethay objectsay ereway
akingtay ifferentday ositionspay; utbay omfray everyay indowway erethay ereway eautiesbay
otay ebay eensay. Ethay oomsray ereway oftylay anday andsomehay, anday eirthay urniturefay
uitablesay otay ethay ortunefay ofay eirthay oprietorpray; utbay Elizabethay awsay, ithway
admirationay ofay ishay astetay, atthay itay asway eithernay audygay ornay uselesslyay
ine,--withfay esslay ofay endoursplay, anday oremay ealray eleganceay, anthay ethay
urniturefay ofay Osingsray.

aNd“ay ofay isthay aceplay,” oughtthay eshay, i“ay ightmay avehay eenbay istressmay! Ithway
esethay oomsray Iay ightmay avehay ownay eenbay amiliarlyfay acquainteday! Insteaday ofay
iewingvay emthay asay aay angerstray, Iay ightmay avehay ejoicedray inay emthay asay myay ownay, anday
elcomedway otay emthay asay isitorsvay myay uncleay anday auntay. Utbay, onay,” ecollectingray
erselfhay, at“thay ouldcay evernay ebay; myay uncleay anday auntay ouldway avehay eenbay ostlay otay
emay; Iay ouldshay otnay avehay eenbay alloweday otay inviteay emthay.”

Isthay asway aay uckylay ecollection--itray avedsay erhay omfray omethingsay ikelay egretray.

Eshay ongedlay otay inquireay ofay ethay ousekeeperhay etherwhay erhay astermay ereway eallyray
absentay, utbay adhay otnay ouragecay orfay itay. Atay engthlay, oweverhay, ethay uestionqay asway
askeday byay erhay uncleay; anday eshay urnedtay awayay ithway alarmay, ilewhay mrsay. Eynoldsray
epliedray, atthay ehay asway; addingay, uT“bay eway expectay imhay o-morrowtay, ithway aay argelay
artypay ofay iendsfray.” Owhay ejoicedray asway Elizabethay atthay eirthay ownay ourneyjay adhay
otnay byay anyay ircumstancecay eenbay elayedday aay ayday!

Erhay auntay ownay alledcay erhay otay ooklay atay aay icturepay. Eshay approacheday, anday awsay
ethay ikenesslay ofay mray. Ickhamway, uspendedsay, amongstay everalsay otheray
iniaturesmay, overay ethay antel-piecemay. Erhay auntay askeday erhay, ilinglysmay, owhay
eshay ikedlay itay. Ethay ousekeeperhay amecay orwardfay, anday oldtay emthay itay asway ethay
icturepay ofay aay oungyay entlemangay, ethay onsay ofay erhay atelay aster’smay ewardstay, owhay
adhay eenbay oughtbray upay byay imhay atay ishay ownay expenseay. e“hay isay ownay onegay intoay ethay
armyay,” eshay addeday; ut“bay Iay amay afraiday ehay ashay urnedtay outay eryvay ildway.”

mrsay. Ardinergay ookedlay atay erhay iecenay ithway aay ilesmay, utbay Elizabethay ouldcay otnay
eturnray itay.

aNd“ay atthay,” aidsay mrsay. Eynoldsray, ointingpay otay anotheray ofay ethay iniaturesmay,
is“ay myay aster--andmay eryvay ikelay imhay. Itay asway awndray atay ethay amesay imetay asay ethay
other--aboutay eightay earsyay agoay.”

i“ay avehay eardhay uchmay ofay ouryay aster’smay inefay ersonpay,” aidsay mrsay. Ardinergay,
ookinglay atay ethay icturepay; it“ay isay aay andsomehay acefay. Utbay, Izzylay, ouyay ancay elltay
usay etherwhay itay isay ikelay oray otnay.”

mrsay. Eynoldsray’ espectray orfay Elizabethay eemedsay otay increaseay onay isthay
intimationay ofay erhay owingknay erhay astermay.

oEs“day atthay oungyay adylay owknay mray. Arcyday?”

Elizabethay olouredcay, anday aidsay, a“ay ittlelay.”

aNd“ay oday otnay ouyay inkthay imhay aay eryvay andsomehay entlemangay, a’ammay?”

eS“yay, eryvay andsomehay.”

i“ay amay uresay i_ay_ owknay onenay osay andsomehay; utbay inay ethay allerygay upstairsay ouyay
illway eesay aay inerfay, argerlay icturepay ofay imhay anthay isthay. Isthay oomray asway myay atelay
aster’smay avouritefay oomray, anday esethay iniaturesmay areay ustjay asay eythay useday otay
ebay enthay. Ehay asway eryvay ondfay ofay emthay.”

Isthay accounteday otay Elizabethay orfay mray. Ickham’sway eingbay amongay emthay.

mrsay. Eynoldsray enthay irectedday eirthay attentionay otay oneay ofay Issmay Arcyday, awndray
enwhay eshay asway onlyay eightay earsyay olday.

aNd“ay isay Issmay Arcyday asay andsomehay asay erhay otherbray?” aidsay mray. Ardinergay.

oH“ay, es--theyay andsomesthay oungyay adylay atthay everay asway eensay; anday osay
accomplisheday! Eshay aysplay anday ingssay allay ayday onglay. Inay ethay extnay oomray isay aay
ewnay instrumentay ustjay omecay ownday orfay er--ahay esentpray omfray myay astermay: eshay
omescay erehay o-morrowtay ithway imhay.”

mray. Ardinergay, osewhay annersmay ereway easyay anday easantplay, encourageday erhay
ommunicativenesscay byay ishay uestionsqay anday emarksray: mrsay. Eynoldsray, eitheray
omfray idepray oray attachmentay, adhay evidentlyay eatgray easureplay inay alkingtay ofay erhay
astermay anday ishay istersay.

iS“ay ouryay astermay uchmay atay Emberleypay inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay earyay?”

oT“nay osay uchmay asay Iay ouldcay ishway, irsay: utbay Iay areday aysay ehay aymay endspay alfhay ishay
imetay erehay; anday Issmay Arcyday isay alwaysay ownday orfay ethay ummersay onthsmay.”

eXcept“ay,” oughtthay Elizabethay, en“whay eshay oesgay otay Amsgateray.”

iF“ay ouryay astermay ouldway arrymay, ouyay ightmay eesay oremay ofay imhay.”

eS“yay, irsay; utbay Iay oday otnay owknay enwhay at_thay_ illway ebay. Iay oday otnay owknay owhay isay
oodgay enoughay orfay imhay.”

mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay iledsmay. Elizabethay ouldcay otnay elphay ayingsay, iT“ay isay
eryvay uchmay otay ishay editcray, Iay amay uresay, atthay ouyay ouldshay inkthay osay.”

i“ay aysay onay oremay anthay ethay uthtray, anday atwhay everybodyay illway aysay atthay owsknay
imhay,” epliedray ethay otheray. Elizabethay oughtthay isthay asway oinggay ettypray arfay;
anday eshay istenedlay ithway increasingay astonishmentay asay ethay ousekeeperhay addeday,
i“ay avehay evernay adhay aay osscray ordway omfray imhay inay myay ifelay, anday Iay avehay ownknay imhay
everay incesay ehay asway ourfay earsyay olday.”

Isthay asway aisepray ofay allay othersay ostmay extraordinaryay, ostmay oppositeay otay erhay
ideasay. Atthay ehay asway otnay aay ood-temperedgay anmay adhay eenbay erhay irmestfay opinionay.
Erhay eenestkay attentionay asway awakeneday: eshay ongedlay otay earhay oremay; anday asway
atefulgray otay erhay uncleay orfay ayingsay,--

eRe“thay areay eryvay ewfay eoplepay ofay omwhay osay uchmay ancay ebay aidsay. Ouyay areay uckylay inay
avinghay uchsay aay astermay.”

eS“yay, irsay, Iay owknay Iay amay. Ifay Iay ereway otay ogay oughthray ethay orldway, Iay ouldcay otnay
eetmay ithway aay etterbay. Utbay Iay avehay alwaysay observeday, atthay eythay owhay areay
ood-naturedgay enwhay ildrenchay, areay ood-naturedgay enwhay eythay owgray upay; anday ehay
asway alwaysay ethay eetestsway emperedtay, ostmay enerous-heartedgay oybay inay ethay
orldway.”

Elizabethay almostay aredstay atay erhay. aN“cay isthay ebay mray. Arcyday?” oughtthay eshay.

iS“hay atherfay asway anay excellentay anmay,” aidsay mrsay. Ardinergay.

eS“yay, a’ammay, atthay ehay asway indeeday; anday ishay onsay illway ebay ustjay ikelay im--justhay
asay affableay otay ethay oorpay.”

Elizabethay istenedlay, onderedway, oubtedday, anday asway impatientay orfay oremay. mrsay.
Eynoldsray ouldcay interestay erhay onay onay otheray ointpay. Eshay elatedray ethay ubjectssay
ofay ethay icturespay, ethay imensionsday ofay ethay oomsray, anday ethay icepray ofay ethay
urniturefay inay ainvay. mray. Ardinergay, ighlyhay amuseday byay ethay indkay ofay amilyfay
ejudicepray, otay ichwhay ehay attributeday erhay excessiveay ommendationcay ofay erhay
astermay, oonsay edlay againay otay ethay ubjectsay; anday eshay eltdway ithway energyay onay ishay
anymay eritsmay, asay eythay oceededpray ogethertay upay ethay eatgray aircasestay.

e“hay isay ethay estbay andlordlay, anday ethay estbay astermay,” aidsay eshay, at“thay everay
ivedlay. Otnay ikelay ethay ildway oungyay enmay ow-a-daysnay, owhay inkthay ofay othingnay utbay
emselvesthay. Erethay isay otnay oneay ofay ishay enantstay oray ervantssay utbay atwhay illway
ivegay imhay aay oodgay amenay. Omesay eoplepay allcay imhay oudpray; utbay Iay amay uresay Iay evernay
awsay anythingay ofay itay. Otay myay ancyfay, itay isay onlyay ecausebay ehay oesday otnay attleray
awayay ikelay otheray oungyay enmay.”

iN“ay atwhay anay amiableay ightlay oesday isthay aceplay imhay!” oughtthay Elizabethay.

iS“thay inefay accountay ofay imhay,” isperedwhay erhay auntay asay eythay alkedway, is“ay otnay
uiteqay onsistentcay ithway ishay ehaviourbay otay ouray oorpay iendfray.”

eRhaps“pay eway ightmay ebay eceivedday.”

aT“thay isay otnay eryvay ikelylay; ouray authorityay asway ootay oodgay.”

Onay eachingray ethay aciousspay obbylay aboveay, eythay ereway ownshay intoay aay eryvay ettypray
itting-roomsay, atelylay ittedfay upay ithway eatergray eleganceay anday ightnesslay anthay
ethay apartmentsay elowbay; anday ereway informeday atthay itay asway utbay ustjay oneday otay
ivegay easureplay otay Issmay Arcyday, owhay adhay akentay aay ikinglay otay ethay oomray, enwhay
astlay atay Emberleypay.

e“hay isay ertainlycay aay oodgay otherbray,” aidsay Elizabethay, asay eshay alkedway owardstay
oneay ofay ethay indowsway.

mrsay. Eynoldsray anticipateday Issmay Arcy’sday elightday, enwhay eshay ouldshay enteray
ethay oomray. aNd“ay isthay isay alwaysay ethay ayway ithway imhay,” eshay addeday. aTever“whay
ancay ivegay ishay istersay anyay easureplay, isay uresay otay ebay oneday inay aay omentmay. Erethay
isay othingnay ehay ouldway otnay oday orfay erhay.”

Ethay icturepay allerygay, anday otway oray eethray ofay ethay incipalpray ed-roomsbay, ereway
allay atthay emainedray otay ebay ownshay. Inay ethay ormerfay ereway anymay oodgay aintingspay:
utbay Elizabethay ewknay othingnay ofay ethay artay; anday omfray uchsay asay adhay eenbay alreadyay
isiblevay elowbay, eshay adhay illinglyway urnedtay otay ooklay atay omesay awingsdray ofay Issmay
Arcy’sday, inay ayonscray, osewhay ubjectssay ereway usuallyay oremay interestingay, anday
alsoay oremay intelligibleay.

Inay ethay allerygay erethay ereway anymay amilyfay ortraitspay, utbay eythay ouldcay avehay
ittlelay otay ixfay ethay attentionay ofay aay angerstray. Elizabethay alkedway onay inay uestqay
ofay ethay onlyay acefay osewhay eaturesfay ouldway ebay ownknay otay erhay. Atay astlay itay
arresteday er--andhay eshay eheldbay aay ikingstray esemblanceray ofay mray. Arcyday, ithway
uchsay aay ilesmay overay ethay acefay, asay eshay ememberedray otay avehay ometimessay eensay,
enwhay ehay ookedlay atay erhay. Eshay oodstay everalsay inutesmay eforebay ethay icturepay, inay
earnestay ontemplationcay, anday eturnedray otay itay againay eforebay eythay uittedqay ethay
allerygay. mrsay. Eynoldsray informeday emthay, atthay itay adhay eenbay akentay inay ishay
ather’sfay ifetimelay.

Erethay asway ertainlycay atay isthay omentmay, inay Elizabeth’say indmay, aay oremay entlegay
ensationsay owardstay ethay originalay anthay eshay adhay everay eltfay inay ethay eighthay ofay
eirthay acquaintanceay. Ethay ommendationcay estowedbay onay imhay byay mrsay. Eynoldsray
asway ofay onay iflingtray aturenay. Atwhay aisepray isay oremay aluablevay anthay ethay aisepray
ofay anay intelligentay ervantsay? Asay aay otherbray, aay andlordlay, aay astermay, eshay
onsideredcay owhay anymay eople’spay appinesshay ereway inay ishay uardianshipgay! Owhay
uchmay ofay easureplay oray ainpay itay asway inay ishay owerpay otay estowbay! Owhay uchmay ofay oodgay
oray evilay ustmay ebay oneday byay imhay! Everyay ideaay atthay adhay eenbay oughtbray orwardfay byay
ethay ousekeeperhay asway avourablefay otay ishay aracterchay; anday asay eshay oodstay eforebay
ethay anvascay, onay ichwhay ehay asway epresentedray, anday ixedfay ishay eyesay uponay
erselfhay, eshay oughtthay ofay ishay egardray ithway aay eeperday entimentsay ofay atitudegray
anthay itay adhay everay aisedray eforebay: eshay ememberedray itsay armthway, anday oftenedsay
itsay improprietyay ofay expressionay.

Enwhay allay ofay ethay ousehay atthay asway openay otay eneralgay inspectionay adhay eenbay eensay,
eythay eturnedray ownday airsstay; anday, akingtay eavelay ofay ethay ousekeeperhay, ereway
onsignedcay overay otay ethay ardenergay, owhay etmay emthay atay ethay allhay oorday.

Asay eythay alkedway acrossay ethay awnlay owardstay ethay iverray, Elizabethay urnedtay ackbay
otay ooklay againay; erhay uncleay anday auntay oppedstay alsoay; anday ilewhay ethay ormerfay asway
onjecturingcay asay otay ethay ateday ofay ethay uildingbay, ethay owneray ofay itay imselfhay
uddenlysay amecay orwardfay omfray ethay oadray ichwhay edlay ehindbay itay otay ethay ablesstay.

Eythay ereway ithinway entytway ardsyay ofay eachay otheray; anday osay abruptay asway ishay
appearanceay, atthay itay asway impossibleay otay avoiday ishay ightsay. Eirthay eyesay
instantlyay etmay, anday ethay eekschay ofay eachay ereway overspreaday ithway ethay eepestday
ushblay. Ehay absolutelyay artedstay, anday orfay aay omentmay eemedsay immovableay omfray
urprisesay; utbay ortlyshay ecoveringray imselfhay, advanceday owardstay ethay artypay,
anday okespay otay Elizabethay, ifay otnay inay ermstay ofay erfectpay omposurecay, atay eastlay
ofay erfectpay ivilitycay.

Eshay adhay instinctivelyay urnedtay awayay; utbay oppingstay onay ishay approachay,
eceivedray ishay omplimentscay ithway anay embarrassmentay impossibleay otay ebay
overcomeay. Adhay ishay irstfay appearanceay, oray ishay esemblanceray otay ethay icturepay
eythay adhay ustjay eenbay examiningay, eenbay insufficientay otay assureay ethay otheray otway
atthay eythay ownay awsay mray. Arcyday, ethay ardener’sgay expressionay ofay urprisesay, onay
eholdingbay ishay astermay, ustmay immediatelyay avehay oldtay itay. Eythay oodstay aay ittlelay
aloofay ilewhay ehay asway alkingtay otay eirthay iecenay, owhay, astonisheday anday onfusedcay,
arcelyscay aredday iftlay erhay eyesay otay ishay acefay, anday ewknay otnay atwhay answeray eshay
eturnedray otay ishay ivilcay inquiriesay afteray erhay amilyfay. Amazeday atay ethay
alterationay ofay ishay annermay incesay eythay astlay artedpay, everyay entencesay atthay ehay
uttereday asway increasingay erhay embarrassmentay; anday everyay ideaay ofay ethay
improprietyay ofay erhay eingbay oundfay erethay ecurringray otay erhay indmay, ethay ewfay
inutesmay inay ichwhay eythay ontinuedcay ogethertay ereway omesay ofay ethay ostmay
uncomfortableay ofay erhay ifelay. Ornay idday ehay eemsay uchmay oremay atay easeay; enwhay ehay
okespay, ishay accentay adhay onenay ofay itsay usualay edatenesssay; anday ehay epeatedray ishay
inquiriesay asay otay ethay imetay ofay erhay avinghay eftlay Ongbournlay, anday ofay erhay aystay
inay Erbyshireday, osay oftenay, anday inay osay urriedhay aay ayway, asay ainlyplay okespay ethay
istractionday ofay ishay oughtsthay.

Atay engthlay, everyay ideaay eemedsay otay ailfay imhay; anday afteray andingstay aay ewfay
omentsmay ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway, ehay uddenlysay ecollectedray imselfhay, anday ooktay
eavelay.

Ethay othersay enthay oinedjay erhay, anday expresseday eirthay admirationay ofay ishay
igurefay; utbay Elizabethay eardhay otnay aay ordway, anday, ollywhay engrosseday byay erhay ownay
eelingsfay, ollowedfay emthay inay ilencesay. Eshay asway overpowereday byay ameshay anday
exationvay. Erhay omingcay erethay asway ethay ostmay unfortunateay, ethay ostmay ill-judgeday
ingthay inay ethay orldway! Owhay angestray ustmay itay appearay otay imhay! Inay atwhay aay
isgracefulday ightlay ightmay itay otnay ikestray osay ainvay aay anmay! Itay ightmay eemsay asay ifay
eshay adhay urposelypay ownthray erselfhay inay ishay ayway againay! Ohay! whyay idday eshay omecay?
oray, whyay idday ehay usthay omecay aay ayday eforebay ehay asway expecteday? Adhay eythay eenbay
onlyay entay inutesmay oonersay, eythay ouldshay avehay eenbay eyondbay ethay eachray ofay ishay
iscriminationday; orfay itay asway ainplay atthay ehay asway atthay omentmay arriveday, atthay
omentmay alighteday omfray ishay orsehay oray ishay arriagecay. Eshay ushedblay againay anday
againay overay ethay erversenesspay ofay ethay eetingmay. Anday ishay ehaviourbay, osay
ikinglystray altered,--whatay ouldcay itay eanmay? Atthay ehay ouldshay evenay eakspay otay
erhay asway amazing!--butay otay eakspay ithway uchsay ivilitycay, otay inquireay afteray erhay
amilyfay! Evernay inay erhay ifelay adhay eshay eensay ishay annersmay osay ittlelay ignifiedday,
evernay adhay ehay okenspay ithway uchsay entlenessgay asay onay isthay unexpecteday eetingmay.
Atwhay aay ontrastcay idday itay offeray otay ishay astlay addressay inay Osingsray Arkpay, enwhay
ehay utpay ishay etterlay intoay erhay andhay! Eshay ewknay otnay atwhay otay inkthay, oray owhay otay
accountay orfay itay.

Eythay adhay ownay entereday aay eautifulbay alkway byay ethay idesay ofay ethay aterway, anday
everyay epstay asway ingingbray orwardfay aay oblernay allfay ofay oundgray, oray aay inerfay
eachray ofay ethay oodsway otay ichwhay eythay ereway approachingay: utbay itay asway omesay imetay
eforebay Elizabethay asway ensiblesay ofay anyay ofay itay; anday, oughthay eshay answereday
echanicallymay otay ethay epeatedray appealsay ofay erhay uncleay anday auntay, anday eemedsay
otay irectday erhay eyesay otay uchsay objectsay asay eythay ointedpay outay, eshay
istinguishedday onay artpay ofay ethay enescay. Erhay oughtsthay ereway allay ixedfay onay atthay
oneay otspay ofay Emberleypay Ousehay, icheverwhay itay ightmay ebay, erewhay mray. Arcyday enthay
asway. Eshay ongedlay otay owknay atwhay atay atthay omentmay asway assingpay inay ishay indmay; inay
atwhay annermay ehay oughtthay ofay erhay, anday etherwhay, inay efianceday ofay everythingay,
eshay asway illstay earday otay imhay. Erhapspay ehay adhay eenbay ivilcay onlyay ecausebay ehay
eltfay imselfhay atay easeay; etyay erethay adhay eenbay at_thay_ inay ishay oicevay, ichwhay asway
otnay ikelay easeay. Etherwhay ehay adhay eltfay oremay ofay ainpay oray ofay easureplay inay eeingsay
erhay, eshay ouldcay otnay elltay, utbay ehay ertainlycay adhay otnay eensay erhay ithway
omposurecay.

Atay engthlay, oweverhay, ethay emarksray ofay erhay ompanionscay onay erhay absenceay ofay indmay
ousedray erhay, anday eshay eltfay ethay ecessitynay ofay appearingay oremay ikelay erselfhay.

Eythay entereday ethay oodsway, anday, iddingbay adieuay otay ethay iverray orfay aay ilewhay,
ascendeday omesay ofay ethay igherhay oundsgray; encewhay, inay otsspay erewhay ethay openingay
ofay ethay eestray avegay ethay eyeay owerpay otay anderway, ereway anymay armingchay iewsvay ofay
ethay alleyvay, ethay oppositeay illshay, ithway ethay onglay angeray ofay oodsway
overspreadingay anymay, anday occasionallyay artpay ofay ethay eamstray. mray. Ardinergay
expresseday aay ishway ofay oinggay oundray ethay olewhay arkpay, utbay earedfay itay ightmay ebay
eyondbay aay alkway. Ithway aay iumphanttray ilesmay, eythay ereway oldtay, atthay itay asway entay
ilesmay oundray. Itay ettledsay ethay attermay; anday eythay ursuedpay ethay accustomeday
ircuitcay; ichwhay oughtbray emthay againay, afteray omesay imetay, inay aay escentday amongay
anginghay oodsway, otay ethay edgeay ofay ethay aterway, anday oneay ofay itsay arrowestnay artspay.
Eythay ossedcray itay byay aay implesay idgebray, inay aracterchay ithway ethay eneralgay airay ofay
ethay enescay: itay asway aay otspay esslay adorneday anthay anyay eythay adhay etyay isitedvay; anday
ethay alleyvay, erehay ontractedcay intoay aay englay, alloweday oomray onlyay orfay ethay
eamstray, anday aay arrownay alkway amidstay ethay oughray oppice-woodcay ichwhay orderedbay
itay. Elizabethay ongedlay otay exploreay itsay indingsway; utbay enwhay eythay adhay ossedcray
ethay idgebray, anday erceivedpay eirthay istanceday omfray ethay ousehay, mrsay. Ardinergay,
owhay asway otnay aay eatgray alkerway, ouldcay ogay onay artherfay, anday oughtthay onlyay ofay
eturningray otay ethay arriagecay asay uicklyqay asay ossiblepay. Erhay iecenay asway,
ereforethay, obligeday otay ubmitsay, anday eythay ooktay eirthay ayway owardstay ethay ousehay
onay ethay oppositeay idesay ofay ethay iverray, inay ethay earestnay irectionday; utbay eirthay
ogresspray asway owslay, orfay mray. Ardinergay, oughthay eldomsay ableay otay indulgeay ethay
astetay, asway eryvay ondfay ofay ishingfay, anday asway osay uchmay engageday inay atchingway ethay
occasionalay appearanceay ofay omesay outtray inay ethay aterway, anday alkingtay otay ethay anmay
aboutay emthay, atthay ehay advanceday utbay ittlelay. Ilstwhay anderingway onay inay isthay
owslay annermay, eythay ereway againay urprisedsay, anday Elizabeth’say astonishmentay asway
uiteqay equalay otay atwhay itay adhay eenbay atay irstfay, byay ethay ightsay ofay mray. Arcyday
approachingay emthay, anday atay onay eatgray istanceday. Ethay alkway eingbay erehay esslay
elteredshay anthay onay ethay otheray idesay, alloweday emthay otay eesay imhay eforebay eythay
etmay. Elizabethay, oweverhay astonisheday, asway atay eastlay oremay eparedpray orfay anay
intervieway anthay eforebay, anday esolvedray otay appearay anday otay eakspay ithway
almnesscay, ifay ehay eallyray intendeday otay eetmay emthay. Orfay aay ewfay omentsmay, indeeday,
eshay eltfay atthay ehay ouldway obablypray ikestray intoay omesay otheray athpay. Ethay ideaay
astedlay ilewhay aay urningtay inay ethay alkway oncealedcay imhay omfray eirthay iewvay; ethay
urningtay astpay, ehay asway immediatelyay eforebay emthay. Ithway aay anceglay eshay awsay atthay
ehay adhay ostlay onenay ofay ishay ecentray ivilitycay; anday, otay imitateay ishay olitenesspay,
eshay eganbay asay eythay etmay otay admireay ethay eautybay ofay ethay aceplay; utbay eshay adhay otnay
otgay eyondbay ethay ordsway elightful“day,” anday arming“chay,” enwhay omesay unluckyay
