ecollectionsray obtrudeday, anday eshay anciedfay atthay aisepray ofay Emberleypay omfray
erhay ightmay ebay ischievouslymay onstruedcay. Erhay olourcay angedchay, anday eshay aidsay
onay oremay.

mrsay. Ardinergay asway andingstay aay ittlelay ehindbay; anday onay erhay ausingpay, ehay askeday
erhay ifay eshay ouldway oday imhay ethay onourhay ofay introducingay imhay otay erhay iendsfray.
Isthay asway aay okestray ofay ivilitycay orfay ichwhay eshay asway uiteqay unprepareday; anday
eshay ouldcay ardlyhay uppresssay aay ilesmay atay ishay eingbay ownay eekingsay ethay
acquaintanceay ofay omesay ofay osethay eryvay eoplepay, againstay omwhay ishay idepray adhay
evoltedray, inay ishay offeray otay erselfhay. aT“whay illway ebay ishay urprisesay,” oughtthay
eshay, en“whay ehay owsknay owhay eythay areay! Ehay akestay emthay ownay orfay eoplepay ofay
ashionfay.”

Ethay introductionay, oweverhay, asway immediatelyay ademay; anday asay eshay amednay eirthay
elationshipray otay erselfhay, eshay olestay aay slyay ooklay atay imhay, otay eesay owhay ehay orebay
itay; anday asway otnay ithoutway ethay expectationay ofay ishay ecampingday asay astfay asay ehay
ouldcay omfray uchsay isgracefulday ompanionscay. Atthay ehay asway urprised_say_ byay ethay
onnectioncay asway evidentay: ehay ustainedsay itay, oweverhay, ithway ortitudefay: anday,
osay arfay omfray oinggay awayay, urnedtay ackbay ithway emthay, anday entereday intoay
onversationcay ithway mray. Ardinergay. Elizabethay ouldcay otnay utbay ebay easedplay,
ouldcay otnay utbay iumphtray. Itay asway onsolingcay atthay ehay ouldshay owknay eshay adhay omesay
elationsray orfay omwhay erethay asway onay eednay otay ushblay. Eshay istenedlay ostmay
attentivelyay otay allay atthay assedpay etweenbay emthay, anday oriedglay inay everyay
expressionay, everyay entencesay ofay erhay uncleay, ichwhay arkedmay ishay intelligenceay,
ishay astetay, oray ishay oodgay annersmay.

Ethay onversationcay oonsay urnedtay uponay ishingfay; anday eshay eardhay mray. Arcyday
inviteay imhay, ithway ethay eatestgray ivilitycay, otay ishfay erethay asay oftenay asay ehay
osechay, ilewhay ehay ontinuedcay inay ethay eighbourhoodnay, offeringay atay ethay amesay
imetay otay upplysay imhay ithway ishingfay ackletay, anday ointingpay outay osethay artspay ofay
ethay eamstray erewhay erethay asway usuallyay ostmay ortspay. mrsay. Ardinergay, owhay asway
alkingway armay inay armay ithway Elizabethay, avegay erhay aay ooklay expressiveay ofay erhay
onderway. Elizabethay aidsay othingnay, utbay itay atifiedgray erhay exceedinglyay; ethay
omplimentcay ustmay ebay allay orfay erselfhay. Erhay astonishmentay, oweverhay, asway
extremeay; anday ontinuallycay asway eshay epeatingray, “whyay isay ehay osay altereday? Omfray
atwhay ancay itay oceedpray? Itay annotcay ebay orfay e_may_, itay annotcay ebay orfay _myay_ akesay
atthay ishay annersmay areay usthay oftenedsay. myay eproofsray atay Unsfordhay ouldcay otnay
orkway uchsay aay angechay asay isthay. Itay isay impossibleay atthay ehay ouldshay illstay ovelay
emay.”

Afteray alkingway omesay imetay inay isthay ayway, ethay otway adieslay inay ontfray, ethay otway
entlemengay ehindbay, onay esumingray eirthay acesplay, afteray escendingday otay ethay
inkbray ofay ethay iverray orfay ethay etterbay inspectionay ofay omesay uriouscay
ater-plantway, erethay ancedchay otay ebay aay ittlelay alterationay. Itay originateday inay
mrsay. Ardinergay, owhay, atiguedfay byay ethay exerciseay ofay ethay orningmay, oundfay
Elizabeth’say armay inadequateay otay erhay upportsay, anday onsequentlycay eferredpray
erhay usband’shay. mray. Arcyday ooktay erhay aceplay byay erhay iecenay, anday eythay alkedway onay
ogethertay. Afteray aay ortshay ilencesay ethay adylay irstfay okespay. Eshay ishedway imhay otay
owknay atthay eshay adhay eenbay assureday ofay ishay absenceay eforebay eshay amecay otay ethay
aceplay, anday accordinglyay eganbay byay observingay, atthay ishay arrivalay adhay eenbay
eryvay unexpected--“foray ouryay ousekeeperhay,” eshay addeday, informed“ay usay atthay
ouyay ouldway ertainlycay otnay ebay erehay illtay o-morrowtay; anday, indeeday, eforebay eway
eftlay Akewellbay, eway understooday atthay ouyay ereway otnay immediatelyay expecteday inay
ethay ountrycay.” Ehay acknowledgeday ethay uthtray ofay itay allay; anday aidsay atthay
usinessbay ithway ishay ewardstay adhay occasioneday ishay omingcay orwardfay aay ewfay ourshay
eforebay ethay estray ofay ethay artypay ithway omwhay ehay adhay eenbay avellingtray. eY“thay
illway oinjay emay earlyay o-morrowtay,” ehay ontinuedcay, and“ay amongay emthay areay omesay
owhay illway aimclay anay acquaintanceay ithway ou,--mRyay. Ingleybay anday ishay isterssay.”

Elizabethay answereday onlyay byay aay ightslay owbay. Erhay oughtsthay ereway instantlyay
ivendray ackbay otay ethay imetay enwhay mray. Ingley’sbay amenay adhay eenbay astlay entionedmay
etweenbay emthay; anday ifay eshay ightmay udgejay omfray ishay omplexioncay, is_hay_ indmay asway
otnay eryvay ifferentlyday engageday.

eRe“thay isay alsoay oneay otheray ersonpay inay ethay artypay,” ehay ontinuedcay afteray aay
ausepay, o“whay oremay articularlypay ishesway otay ebay ownknay otay ouyay. Illway ouyay alloway
emay, oray oday Iay askay ootay uchmay, otay introduceay myay istersay otay ouryay acquaintanceay
uringday ouryay aystay atay Ambtonlay?”

Ethay urprisesay ofay uchsay anay applicationay asway eatgray indeeday; itay asway ootay eatgray
orfay erhay otay owknay inay atwhay annermay eshay accededay otay itay. Eshay immediatelyay eltfay
atthay ateverwhay esireday Issmay Arcyday ightmay avehay ofay eingbay acquainteday ithway erhay,
ustmay ebay ethay orkway ofay erhay otherbray, anday ithoutway ookinglay artherfay, itay asway
atisfactorysay; itay asway atifyinggray otay owknay atthay ishay esentmentray adhay otnay ademay
imhay inkthay eallyray illay ofay erhay.

Eythay ownay alkedway onay inay ilencesay; eachay ofay emthay eepday inay oughtthay. Elizabethay
asway otnay omfortablecay; atthay asway impossibleay; utbay eshay asway atteredflay anday
easedplay. Ishay ishway ofay introducingay ishay istersay otay erhay asway aay omplimentcay ofay
ethay ighesthay indkay. Eythay oonsay outstrippeday ethay othersay; anday enwhay eythay adhay
eachedray ethay arriagecay, mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay ereway alfhay aay uarterqay ofay aay
ilemay ehindbay.

Ehay enthay askeday erhay otay alkway intoay ethay ouse--buthay eshay eclaredday erselfhay otnay
iredtay, anday eythay oodstay ogethertay onay ethay awnlay. Atay uchsay aay imetay uchmay ightmay
avehay eenbay aidsay, anday ilencesay asway eryvay awkwarday. Eshay antedway otay alktay, utbay
erethay eemedsay anay embargoay onay everyay ubjectsay. Atay astlay eshay ecollectedray atthay
eshay adhay eenbay avellingtray, anday eythay alkedtay ofay Atlockmay anday Ovedaleday ithway
eatgray erseverancepay. Etyay imetay anday erhay auntay ovedmay owly--andslay erhay atiencepay
anday erhay ideasay ereway earlynay ornway outay eforebay ethay e-à-tête_têtay_ asway overay.

Onay mray. anday mrsay. Ardiner’sgay omingcay upay eythay ereway allay essedpray otay ogay intoay
ethay ousehay anday aketay omesay efreshmentray; utbay isthay asway eclinedday, anday eythay
artedpay onay eachay idesay ithway ethay utmostay olitenesspay. mray. Arcyday andedhay ethay
adieslay intoay ethay arriagecay; anday enwhay itay ovedray offay, Elizabethay awsay imhay
alkingway owlyslay owardstay ethay ousehay.

Ethay observationsay ofay erhay uncleay anday auntay ownay eganbay; anday eachay ofay emthay
onouncedpray imhay otay ebay infinitelyay uperiorsay otay anythingay eythay adhay expecteday.

e“hay isay erfectlypay ell-behavedway, olitepay, anday unassumingay,” aidsay erhay uncleay.

eRe“thay is_ay_ omethingsay aay ittlelay atelystay inay imhay, otay ebay uresay,” epliedray erhay
auntay; ut“bay itay isay onfinedcay otay ishay airay, anday isay otnay unbecomingay. Iay ancay ownay
aysay ithway ethay ousekeeperhay, atthay oughthay omesay eoplepay aymay allcay imhay oudpray,
i_ay_ avehay eensay othingnay ofay itay.”

i“ay asway evernay oremay urprisedsay anthay byay ishay ehaviourbay otay usay. Itay asway oremay
anthay ivilcay; itay asway eallyray attentiveay; anday erethay asway onay ecessitynay orfay uchsay
attentionay. Ishay acquaintanceay ithway Elizabethay asway eryvay iflingtray.”

o“tay ebay uresay, Izzylay,” aidsay erhay auntay, e“hay isay otnay osay andsomehay asay Ickhamway;
oray atherray ehay ashay otnay Ickham’sway ountenancecay, orfay ishay eaturesfay areay
erfectlypay oodgay. Utbay owhay amecay ouyay otay elltay usay atthay ehay asway osay
isagreeableday?”

Elizabethay excuseday erselfhay asay ellway asay eshay ouldcay: aidsay atthay eshay adhay ikedlay
imhay etterbay enwhay eythay etmay inay Entkay anthay eforebay, anday atthay eshay adhay evernay
eensay imhay osay easantplay asay isthay orningmay.

uT“bay erhapspay ehay aymay ebay aay ittlelay imsicalwhay inay ishay ivilitiescay,” epliedray
erhay uncleay. oUr“yay eatgray enmay oftenay areay; anday ereforethay Iay allshay otnay aketay imhay
atay ishay ordway aboutay ishingfay, asay ehay ightmay angechay ishay indmay anotheray ayday, anday
arnway emay offay ishay oundsgray.”

Elizabethay eltfay atthay eythay adhay entirelyay istakenmay ishay aracterchay, utbay aidsay
othingnay.

oM“fray atwhay eway avehay eensay ofay imhay,” ontinuedcay mrsay. Ardinergay, i“ay eallyray
ouldshay otnay avehay oughtthay atthay ehay ouldcay avehay ehavedbay inay osay uelcray aay ayway byay
anybodyay asay ehay ashay oneday byay oorpay Ickhamway. Ehay ashay otnay anay ill-natureday ooklay.
Onay ethay ontrarycay, erethay isay omethingsay easingplay aboutay ishay outhmay enwhay ehay
eaksspay. Anday erethay isay omethingsay ofay ignityday inay ishay ountenancecay, atthay ouldway
otnay ivegay oneay anay unfavourableay ideaay ofay ishay earthay. Utbay, otay ebay uresay, ethay
oodgay adylay owhay owedshay usay ethay ousehay idday ivegay imhay aay ostmay amingflay aracterchay!
Iay ouldcay ardlyhay elphay aughinglay alouday ometimessay. Utbay ehay isay aay iberallay
astermay, Iay upposesay, anday at_thay_, inay ethay eyeay ofay aay ervantsay, omprehendscay
everyay irtuevay.”

Elizabethay erehay eltfay erselfhay alledcay onay otay aysay omethingsay inay indicationvay ofay
ishay ehaviourbay otay Ickhamway; anday, ereforethay, avegay emthay otay understanday, inay asay
uardedgay aay annermay asay eshay ouldcay, atthay byay atwhay eshay adhay eardhay omfray ishay
elationsray inay Entkay, ishay actionsay ereway apablecay ofay aay eryvay ifferentday
onstructioncay; anday atthay ishay aracterchay asway byay onay eansmay osay aultyfay, ornay
Ickham’sway osay amiableay, asay eythay adhay eenbay onsideredcay inay Ertfordshirehay. Inay
onfirmationcay ofay isthay, eshay elatedray ethay articularspay ofay allay ethay ecuniarypay
ansactionstray inay ichwhay eythay adhay eenbay onnectedcay, ithoutway actuallyay amingnay
erhay authorityay, utbay atingstay itay otay ebay uchsay asay ightmay ebay eliedray onay.

mrsay. Ardinergay asway urprisedsay anday oncernedcay: utbay asay eythay ereway ownay
approachingay ethay enescay ofay erhay ormerfay easuresplay, everyay ideaay avegay ayway otay
ethay armchay ofay ecollectionray; anday eshay asway ootay uchmay engageday inay ointingpay outay
otay erhay usbandhay allay ethay interestingay otsspay inay itsay environsay, otay inkthay ofay
anythingay elseay. Atiguedfay asay eshay adhay eenbay byay ethay orning’smay alkway, eythay adhay
onay oonersay inedday anthay eshay etsay offay againay inay uestqay ofay erhay ormerfay
acquaintanceay, anday ethay eveningay asway entspay inay ethay atisfactionssay ofay anay
intercourseay enewedray afteray anymay earsyay’ iscontinuanceday.

Ethay occurrencesay ofay ethay ayday ereway ootay ullfay ofay interestay otay eavelay Elizabethay
uchmay attentionay orfay anyay ofay esethay ewnay iendsfray; anday eshay ouldcay oday othingnay
utbay inkthay, anday inkthay ithway onderway, ofay mray. Arcy’sday ivilitycay, anday, aboveay
allay, ofay ishay ishingway erhay otay ebay acquainteday ithway ishay istersay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IVxlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay adhay ettledsay itay atthay mray. Arcyday ouldway ingbray ishay istersay otay isitvay
erhay ethay eryvay ayday afteray erhay eachingray Emberleypay; anday asway, onsequentlycay,
esolvedray otnay otay ebay outay ofay ightsay ofay ethay innay ethay olewhay ofay atthay orningmay.
Utbay erhay onclusioncay asway alsefay; orfay onay ethay eryvay orningmay afteray eirthay ownay
arrivalay atay Ambtonlay esethay isitorsvay amecay. Eythay adhay eenbay alkingway aboutay ethay
aceplay ithway omesay ofay eirthay ewnay iendsfray, anday ereway ustjay eturnedray otay ethay innay
otay essdray emselvesthay orfay iningday ithway ethay amesay amilyfay, enwhay ethay oundsay ofay aay
arriagecay ewdray emthay otay aay indowway, anday eythay awsay aay entlemangay anday adylay inay aay
urriclecay ivingdray upay ethay eetstray. Elizabethay, immediatelyay ecognizingray ethay
iverylay, uessedgay atwhay itay eantmay, anday imparteday onay allsmay egreeday ofay urprisesay
otay erhay elationsray, byay acquaintingay emthay ithway ethay onourhay ichwhay eshay
expecteday. Erhay uncleay anday auntay ereway allay amazementay; anday ethay embarrassmentay
ofay erhay annermay asay eshay okespay, oinedjay otay ethay ircumstancecay itselfay, anday anymay
ofay ethay ircumstancescay ofay ethay ecedingpray ayday, openeday otay emthay aay ewnay ideaay onay
ethay usinessbay. Othingnay adhay everay uggestedsay itay eforebay, utbay eythay ownay eltfay
atthay erethay asway onay otheray ayway ofay accountingay orfay uchsay attentionsay omfray uchsay
aay uarterqay anthay byay upposingsay aay artialitypay orfay eirthay iecenay. Ilewhay esethay
ewly-bornnay otionsnay ereway assingpay inay eirthay eadshay, ethay erturbationpay ofay
Elizabeth’say eelingsfay asway everyay omentmay increasingay. Eshay asway uiteqay amazeday
atay erhay ownay iscomposureday; utbay, amongstay otheray ausescay ofay isquietday, eshay
eadeddray estlay ethay artialitypay ofay ethay otherbray ouldshay avehay aidsay ootay uchmay inay
erhay avourfay; anday, oremay anthay ommonlycay anxiousay otay easeplay, eshay aturallynay
uspectedsay atthay everyay owerpay ofay easingplay ouldway ailfay erhay.

Eshay etreatedray omfray ethay indowway, earfulfay ofay eingbay eensay; anday asay eshay alkedway
upay anday ownday ethay oomray, endeavouringay otay omposecay erselfhay, awsay uchsay ookslay ofay
inquiringay urprisesay inay erhay uncleay anday auntay asay ademay everythingay orseway.

Issmay Arcyday anday erhay otherbray appeareday, anday isthay ormidablefay introductionay
ooktay aceplay. Ithway astonishmentay idday Elizabethay eesay atthay erhay ewnay
acquaintanceay asway atay eastlay asay uchmay embarrasseday asay erselfhay. Incesay erhay
eingbay atay Ambtonlay, eshay adhay eardhay atthay Issmay Arcyday asway exceedinglyay oudpray;
utbay ethay observationay ofay aay eryvay ewfay inutesmay onvincedcay erhay atthay eshay asway
onlyay exceedinglyay shyay. Eshay oundfay itay ifficultday otay obtainay evenay aay ordway omfray
erhay eyondbay aay onosyllablemay.

Issmay Arcyday asway alltay, anday onay aay argerlay alescay anthay Elizabethay; anday, oughthay
ittlelay oremay anthay ixteensay, erhay igurefay asway ormedfay, anday erhay appearanceay
omanlyway anday acefulgray. Eshay asway esslay andsomehay anthay erhay otherbray, utbay erethay
asway ensesay anday ood-humourgay inay erhay acefay, anday erhay annersmay ereway erfectlypay
unassumingay anday entlegay. Elizabethay, owhay adhay expecteday otay indfay inay erhay asay
acuteay anday unembarrasseday anay observeray asay everay mray. Arcyday adhay eenbay, asway uchmay
elievedray byay iscerningday uchsay ifferentday eelingsfay.

Eythay adhay otnay eenbay onglay ogethertay eforebay Arcyday oldtay erhay atthay Ingleybay asway
alsoay omingcay otay aitway onay erhay; anday eshay adhay arelybay imetay otay expressay erhay
atisfactionsay, anday eparepray orfay uchsay aay isitorvay, enwhay Ingley’sbay uickqay epstay
asway eardhay onay ethay airsstay, anday inay aay omentmay ehay entereday ethay oomray. Allay
Elizabeth’say angeray againstay imhay adhay eenbay onglay oneday awayay; utbay adhay eshay illstay
eltfay anyay, itay ouldcay ardlyhay avehay oodstay itsay oundgray againstay ethay unaffecteday
ordialitycay ithway ichwhay ehay expresseday imselfhay onay eeingsay erhay againay. Ehay
inquireday inay aay iendlyfray, oughthay eneralgay, ayway, afteray erhay amilyfay, anday
ookedlay anday okespay ithway ethay amesay ood-humouredgay easeay atthay ehay adhay everay oneday.

Otay mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay ehay asway arcelyscay aay esslay interestingay ersonagepay
anthay otay erselfhay. Eythay adhay onglay ishedway otay eesay imhay. Ethay olewhay artypay eforebay
emthay, indeeday, exciteday aay ivelylay attentionay. Ethay uspicionssay ichwhay adhay ustjay
arisenay ofay mray. Arcyday anday eirthay iecenay, irectedday eirthay observationay owardstay
eachay ithway anay earnestay, oughthay uardedgay, inquiryay; anday eythay oonsay ewdray omfray
osethay inquiriesay ethay ullfay onvictioncay atthay oneay ofay emthay atay eastlay ewknay atwhay
itay asway otay ovelay. Ofay ethay ady’slay ensationssay eythay emainedray aay ittlelay inay
oubtday; utbay atthay ethay entlemangay asway overflowingay ithway admirationay asway
evidentay enoughay.

Elizabethay, onay erhay idesay, adhay uchmay otay oday. Eshay antedway otay ascertainay ethay
eelingsfay ofay eachay ofay erhay isitorsvay, eshay antedway otay omposecay erhay ownay, anday otay
akemay erselfhay agreeableay otay allay; anday inay ethay atterlay objectay, erewhay eshay
earedfay ostmay otay ailfay, eshay asway ostmay uresay ofay uccesssay, orfay osethay otay omwhay
eshay endeavoureday otay ivegay easureplay ereway e-possessedpray inay erhay avourfay.
Ingleybay asway eadyray, Eorgianagay asway eageray, anday Arcyday eterminedday, otay ebay
easedplay.

iLlustration[ay:

o“tay akemay erselfhay agreeableay otay allay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

Inay eeingsay Ingleybay, erhay oughtsthay aturallynay ewflay otay erhay istersay; anday ohay!
owhay ardentlyay idday eshay onglay otay owknay etherwhay anyay ofay ishay ereway irectedday inay aay
ikelay annermay. Ometimessay eshay ouldcay ancyfay atthay ehay alkedtay esslay anthay onay
ormerfay occasionsay, anday onceay oray icetway easedplay erselfhay ithway ethay otionnay
atthay, asay ehay ookedlay atay erhay, ehay asway ingtryay otay acetray aay esemblanceray. Utbay,
oughthay isthay ightmay ebay imaginaryay, eshay ouldcay otnay ebay eceivedday asay otay ishay
ehaviourbay otay Issmay Arcyday, owhay adhay eenbay etsay upay asay aay ivalray otay Anejay. Onay
ooklay appeareday onay eitheray idesay atthay okespay articularpay egardray. Othingnay
occurreday etweenbay emthay atthay ouldcay ustifyjay ethay opeshay ofay ishay istersay. Onay
isthay ointpay eshay asway oonsay atisfiedsay; anday otway oray eethray ittlelay ircumstancescay
occurreday ereay eythay artedpay, ichwhay, inay erhay anxiousay interpretationay, enotedday
aay ecollectionray ofay Anejay, otnay untinctureday byay endernesstay, anday aay ishway ofay
ayingsay oremay atthay ightmay eadlay otay ethay entionmay ofay erhay, adhay ehay aredday. Ehay
observeday otay erhay, atay aay omentmay enwhay ethay othersay ereway alkingtay ogethertay, anday
inay aay onetay ichwhay adhay omethingsay ofay ealray egretray, atthay itay as“way aay eryvay onglay
imetay incesay ehay adhay adhay ethay easureplay ofay eeingsay erhay;” anday, eforebay eshay ouldcay
eplyray, ehay addeday, iT“ay isay aboveay eightay onthsmay. Eway avehay otnay etmay incesay ethay
26thay ofay Ovembernay, enwhay eway ereway allay ancingday ogethertay atay Etherfieldnay.”

Elizabethay asway easedplay otay indfay ishay emorymay osay exactay; anday ehay afterwardsay
ooktay occasionay otay askay erhay, enwhay unattendeday otay byay anyay ofay ethay estray, etherwhay
all_ay_ erhay isterssay ereway atay Ongbournlay. Erethay asway otnay uchmay inay ethay uestionqay,
ornay inay ethay ecedingpray emarkray; utbay erethay asway aay ooklay anday aay annermay ichwhay
avegay emthay eaningmay.

Itay asway otnay oftenay atthay eshay ouldcay urntay erhay eyesay onay mray. Arcyday imselfhay; utbay
eneverwhay eshay idday atchcay aay impseglay eshay awsay anay expressionay ofay eneralgay
omplaisancecay, anday inay allay atthay ehay aidsay, eshay eardhay anay accentay osay arfay
emovedray omfray auteur_hay_ oray isdainday ofay ishay ompanionscay, asay onvincedcay erhay
atthay ethay improvementay ofay annersmay ichwhay eshay adhay esterdayyay itnessedway,
oweverhay emporarytay itsay existenceay ightmay ovepray, adhay atay eastlay outliveday oneay
ayday. Enwhay eshay awsay imhay usthay eekingsay ethay acquaintanceay, anday ourtingcay ethay
oodgay opinionay ofay eoplepay ithway omwhay anyay intercourseay aay ewfay onthsmay agoay ouldway
avehay eenbay aay isgraceday; enwhay eshay awsay imhay usthay ivilcay, otnay onlyay otay erselfhay,
utbay otay ethay eryvay elationsray omwhay ehay adhay openlyay isdainedday, anday ecollectedray
eirthay astlay ivelylay enescay inay Unsfordhay Arsonagepay, ethay ifferenceday, ethay
angechay asway osay eatgray, anday uckstray osay orciblyfay onay erhay indmay, atthay eshay ouldcay
ardlyhay estrainray erhay astonishmentay omfray eingbay isiblevay. Evernay, evenay inay ethay
ompanycay ofay ishay earday iendsfray atay Etherfieldnay, oray ishay ignifiedday elationsray
atay Osingsray, adhay eshay eensay imhay osay esirousday otay easeplay, osay eefray omfray
elf-consequencesay oray unbendingay eserveray, asay ownay, enwhay onay importanceay ouldcay
esultray omfray ethay uccesssay ofay ishay endeavoursay, anday enwhay evenay ethay
acquaintanceay ofay osethay otay omwhay ishay attentionsay ereway addresseday, ouldway awdray
ownday ethay idiculeray anday ensurecay ofay ethay adieslay othbay ofay Etherfieldnay anday
Osingsray.

Eirthay isitorsvay ayedstay ithway emthay aboveay alfhay anay ourhay; anday enwhay eythay aroseay
otay epartday, mray. Arcyday alledcay onay ishay istersay otay oinjay imhay inay expressingay
eirthay ishway ofay eeingsay mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay, anday Issmay Ennetbay, otay innerday
atay Emberleypay, eforebay eythay eftlay ethay ountrycay. Issmay Arcyday, oughthay ithway aay
iffidenceday ichwhay arkedmay erhay ittlelay inay ethay abithay ofay ivinggay invitationsay,
eadilyray obeyeday. mrsay. Ardinergay ookedlay atay erhay iecenay, esirousday ofay owingknay
owhay e_shay_, omwhay ethay invitationay ostmay oncernedcay, eltfay isposedday asay otay itsay
acceptanceay, utbay Elizabethay adhay urnedtay awayay erhay eadhay. Esumingpray, oweverhay,
atthay isthay udiedstay avoidanceay okespay atherray aay omentarymay embarrassmentay anthay
anyay islikeday ofay ethay oposalpray, anday eeingsay inay erhay usbandhay, owhay asway ondfay ofay
ocietysay, aay erfectpay illingnessway otay acceptay itay, eshay enturedvay otay engageay orfay
erhay attendanceay, anday ethay ayday afteray ethay extnay asway ixedfay onay.

Ingleybay expresseday eatgray easureplay inay ethay ertaintycay ofay eeingsay Elizabethay
againay, avinghay illstay aay eatgray ealday otay aysay otay erhay, anday anymay inquiriesay otay
akemay afteray allay eirthay Ertfordshirehay iendsfray. Elizabethay, onstruingcay allay
isthay intoay aay ishway ofay earinghay erhay eakspay ofay erhay istersay, asway easedplay; anday
onay isthay accountay, asay ellway asay omesay othersay, oundfay erselfhay, enwhay eirthay
isitorsvay eftlay emthay, apablecay ofay onsideringcay ethay astlay alfhay ourhay ithway omesay
atisfactionsay, oughthay ilewhay itay asway assingpay ethay enjoymentay ofay itay adhay eenbay
ittlelay. Eageray otay ebay aloneay, anday earfulfay ofay inquiriesay oray intshay omfray erhay
uncleay anday auntay, eshay ayedstay ithway emthay onlyay onglay enoughay otay earhay eirthay
avourablefay opinionay ofay Ingleybay, anday enthay urriedhay awayay otay essdray.

Utbay eshay adhay onay easonray otay earfay mray. anday mrsay. Ardiner’sgay uriositycay; itay asway
otnay eirthay ishway otay orcefay erhay ommunicationcay. Itay asway evidentay atthay eshay asway
uchmay etterbay acquainteday ithway mray. Arcyday anthay eythay adhay eforebay anyay ideaay ofay;
itay asway evidentay atthay ehay asway eryvay uchmay inay ovelay ithway erhay. Eythay awsay uchmay otay
interestay, utbay othingnay otay ustifyjay inquiryay.

Ofay mray. Arcyday itay asway ownay aay attermay ofay anxietyay otay inkthay ellway; anday, asay arfay
asay eirthay acquaintanceay eachedray, erethay asway onay aultfay otay indfay. Eythay ouldcay
otnay ebay untoucheday byay ishay olitenesspay; anday adhay eythay awndray ishay aracterchay
omfray eirthay ownay eelingsfay anday ishay ervant’ssay eportray, ithoutway anyay eferenceray
otay anyay otheray accountay, ethay irclecay inay Ertfordshirehay otay ichwhay ehay asway ownknay
ouldway otnay avehay ecognizedray itay orfay mray. Arcyday. Erethay asway ownay anay interestay,
oweverhay, inay elievingbay ethay ousekeeperhay; anday eythay oonsay ecamebay ensiblesay
atthay ethay authorityay ofay aay ervantsay, owhay adhay ownknay imhay incesay ehay asway ourfay
earsyay olday, anday osewhay ownay annersmay indicateday espectabilityray, asway otnay otay ebay
astilyhay ejectedray. Eithernay adhay anythingay occurreday inay ethay intelligenceay ofay
eirthay Ambtonlay iendsfray atthay ouldcay ateriallymay essenlay itsay eightway. Eythay adhay
othingnay otay accuseay imhay ofay utbay idepray; idepray ehay obablypray adhay, anday ifay otnay,
itay ouldway ertainlycay ebay imputeday byay ethay inhabitantsay ofay aay allsmay arketmay owntay
erewhay ethay amilyfay idday otnay isitvay. Itay asway acknowledgeday, oweverhay, atthay ehay
asway aay iberallay anmay, anday idday uchmay oodgay amongay ethay oorpay.

Ithway espectray otay Ickhamway, ethay avellerstray oonsay oundfay atthay ehay asway otnay eldhay
erethay inay uchmay estimationay; orfay oughthay ethay iefchay ofay ishay oncernscay ithway ethay
onsay ofay ishay atronpay ereway imperfectlyay understooday, itay asway etyay aay ell-knownway
actfay atthay, onay ishay uittingqay Erbyshireday, ehay adhay eftlay anymay ebtsday ehindbay
imhay, ichwhay mray. Arcyday afterwardsay ischargedday.

Asay orfay Elizabethay, erhay oughtsthay ereway atay Emberleypay isthay eveningay oremay anthay
ethay astlay; anday ethay eveningay, oughthay asay itay assedpay itay eemedsay onglay, asway otnay
onglay enoughay otay etermineday erhay eelingsfay owardstay one_ay_ inay atthay ansionmay; anday
eshay aylay awakeay otway olewhay ourshay, endeavouringay otay akemay emthay outay. Eshay
ertainlycay idday otnay atehay imhay. Onay; atredhay adhay anishedvay onglay agoay, anday eshay
adhay almostay asay onglay eenbay ashameday ofay everay eelingfay aay islikeday againstay imhay,
atthay ouldcay ebay osay alledcay. Ethay espectray eatedcray byay ethay onvictioncay ofay ishay
aluablevay ualitiesqay, oughthay atay irstfay unwillinglyay admitteday, adhay orfay omesay
imetay easedcay otay ebay epugnantray otay erhay eelingsfay; anday itay asway ownay eightenedhay
intoay omewhatsay ofay aay iendlierfray aturenay byay ethay estimonytay osay ighlyhay inay ishay
avourfay, anday ingingbray orwardfay ishay ispositionday inay osay amiableay aay ightlay,
ichwhay esterdayyay adhay oducedpray. Utbay aboveay allay, aboveay espectray anday esteemay,
erethay asway aay otivemay ithinway erhay ofay ood-willgay ichwhay ouldcay otnay ebay
overlookeday. Itay asway atitude;--gratitudegray, otnay erelymay orfay avinghay onceay
ovedlay erhay, utbay orfay ovinglay erhay illstay ellway enoughay otay orgivefay allay ethay
etulancepay anday acrimonyay ofay erhay annermay inay ejectingray imhay, anday allay ethay
unjustay accusationsay accompanyingay erhay ejectionray. Ehay owhay, eshay adhay eenbay
ersuadedpay, ouldway avoiday erhay asay ishay eatestgray enemyay, eemedsay, onay isthay
accidentalay eetingmay, ostmay eageray otay eservepray ethay acquaintanceay; anday
ithoutway anyay indelicateay isplayday ofay egardray, oray anyay eculiaritypay ofay annermay,
erewhay eirthay otway elvessay onlyay ereway oncernedcay, asway olicitingsay ethay oodgay
opinionay ofay erhay iendsfray, anday entbay onay akingmay erhay ownknay otay ishay istersay. Uchsay
aay angechay inay aay anmay ofay osay uchmay idepray exciteday otnay onlyay astonishmentay utbay
atitude--forgray otay ovelay, ardentay ovelay, itay ustmay ebay attributeday; anday, asay
uchsay, itsay impressionay onay erhay asway ofay aay ortsay otay ebay encourageday, asay byay onay
eansmay unpleasingay, oughthay itay ouldcay otnay ebay exactlyay efinedday. Eshay espectedray,
eshay esteemeday, eshay asway atefulgray otay imhay, eshay eltfay aay ealray interestay inay ishay
elfareway; anday eshay onlyay antedway otay owknay owhay arfay eshay ishedway atthay elfareway otay
ependday uponay erselfhay, anday owhay arfay itay ouldway ebay orfay ethay appinesshay ofay othbay
atthay eshay ouldshay employay ethay owerpay, ichwhay erhay ancyfay oldtay erhay eshay illstay
ossessedpay, ofay ingingbray onay ethay enewalray ofay ishay addressesay.

Itay adhay eenbay ettledsay inay ethay eveningay, etweenbay ethay auntay anday iecenay, atthay
uchsay aay ikingstray ivilitycay asay Issmay Arcy’sday, inay omingcay otay emthay onay ethay eryvay
ayday ofay erhay arrivalay atay Emberley--forpay eshay adhay eachedray itay onlyay otay aay atelay
eakfast--oughtbray otay ebay imitateday, oughthay itay ouldcay otnay ebay equalleday, byay
omesay exertionay ofay olitenesspay onay eirthay idesay; anday, onsequentlycay, atthay itay
ouldway ebay ighlyhay expedientay otay aitway onay erhay atay Emberleypay ethay ollowingfay
orningmay. Eythay ereway, ereforethay, otay ogay. Elizabethay asway easedplay; oughthay enwhay
eshay askeday erselfhay ethay easonray, eshay adhay eryvay ittlelay otay aysay inay eplyray.

mray. Ardinergay eftlay emthay oonsay afteray eakfastbray. Ethay ishingfay emeschay adhay eenbay
enewedray ethay ayday eforebay, anday aay ositivepay engagementay ademay ofay ishay eetingmay
omesay ofay ethay entlemengay atay Emberleypay byay oonnay.




iLlustration[ay:

eNgaged“ay byay ethay iverray”
ay]




APTERchay xlvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Onvincedcay asay Elizabethay ownay asway atthay Issmay Ingley’sbay islikeday ofay erhay adhay
originateday inay ealousyjay, eshay ouldcay otnay elphay eelingfay owhay eryvay unwelcomeay
erhay appearanceay atay Emberleypay ustmay ebay otay erhay, anday asway uriouscay otay owknay
ithway owhay uchmay ivilitycay onay atthay ady’slay idesay ethay acquaintanceay ouldway ownay
ebay enewedray.

Onay eachingray ethay ousehay, eythay ereway ownshay oughthray ethay allhay intoay ethay aloonsay,
osewhay orthernnay aspectay enderedray itay elightfulday orfay ummersay. Itsay indowsway,
openingay otay ethay oundgray, admitteday aay ostmay efreshingray iewvay ofay ethay ighhay oodyway
illshay ehindbay ethay ousehay, anday ofay ethay eautifulbay oaksay anday Anishspay estnutschay
ichwhay ereway atteredscay overay ethay intermediateay awnlay.

Inay isthay oomray eythay ereway eceivedray byay Issmay Arcyday, owhay asway ittingsay erethay
ithway mrsay. Ursthay anday Issmay Ingleybay, anday ethay adylay ithway omwhay eshay ivedlay inay
Ondonlay. Eorgiana’sgay eceptionray ofay emthay asway eryvay ivilcay, utbay attendeday ithway
allay atthay embarrassmentay ichwhay, oughthay oceedingpray omfray essshynay anday ethay
earfay ofay oingday ongwray, ouldway easilyay ivegay otay osethay owhay eltfay emselvesthay
inferioray ethay eliefbay ofay erhay eingbay oudpray anday eservedray. mrsay. Ardinergay anday
erhay iecenay, oweverhay, idday erhay usticejay, anday itiedpay erhay.

byay mrsay. Ursthay anday Issmay Ingleybay eythay ereway oticednay onlyay byay aay ourtesycay; anday
onay eirthay eingbay eatedsay, aay ausepay, awkwarday asay uchsay ausespay ustmay alwaysay ebay,
ucceededsay orfay aay ewfay omentsmay. Itay asway irstfay okenbray byay mrsay. Annesleyay, aay
enteelgay, agreeable-lookingay omanway, osewhay endeavouray otay introduceay omesay indkay
ofay iscourseday ovedpray erhay otay ebay oremay ulytray ell-bredway anthay eitheray ofay ethay
othersay; anday etweenbay erhay anday mrsay. Ardinergay, ithway occasionalay elphay omfray
Elizabethay, ethay onversationcay asway arriedcay onay. Issmay Arcyday ookedlay asay ifay eshay
ishedway orfay ouragecay enoughay otay oinjay inay itay; anday ometimessay idday enturevay aay
ortshay entencesay, enwhay erethay asway eastlay angerday ofay itsay eingbay eardhay.

Elizabethay oonsay awsay atthay eshay asway erselfhay oselyclay atchedway byay Issmay Ingleybay,
anday atthay eshay ouldcay otnay eakspay aay ordway, especiallyay otay Issmay Arcyday, ithoutway
allingcay erhay attentionay. Isthay observationay ouldway otnay avehay eventedpray erhay
omfray ingtryay otay alktay otay ethay atterlay, adhay eythay otnay eenbay eatedsay atay anay
inconvenientay istanceday; utbay eshay asway otnay orrysay otay ebay aredspay ethay ecessitynay
ofay ayingsay uchmay: erhay ownay oughtsthay ereway employingay erhay. Eshay expecteday everyay
omentmay atthay omesay ofay ethay entlemengay ouldway enteray ethay oomray: eshay ishedway, eshay
earedfay, atthay ethay astermay ofay ethay ousehay ightmay ebay amongstay emthay; anday etherwhay
eshay ishedway oray earedfay itay ostmay, eshay ouldcay arcelyscay etermineday. Afteray
ittingsay inay isthay annermay aay uarterqay ofay anay ourhay, ithoutway earinghay Issmay
Ingley’sbay oicevay, Elizabethay asway ousedray byay eceivingray omfray erhay aay oldcay
inquiryay afteray ethay ealthhay ofay erhay amilyfay. Eshay answereday ithway equalay
indifferenceay anday evitybray, anday ethay otheray aidsay onay oremay.

Ethay extnay ariationvay ichwhay eirthay isitvay affordeday asway oducedpray byay ethay
entranceay ofay ervantssay ithway oldcay eatmay, akecay, anday aay arietyvay ofay allay ethay
inestfay uitsfray inay easonsay; utbay isthay idday otnay aketay aceplay illtay afteray anymay aay
ignificantsay ooklay anday ilesmay omfray mrsay. Annesleyay otay Issmay Arcyday adhay eenbay
ivengay, otay emindray erhay ofay erhay ostpay. Erethay asway ownay employmentay orfay ethay olewhay
artypay; orfay oughthay eythay ouldcay otnay allay alktay, eythay ouldcay allay eatay; anday ethay
eautifulbay amidspyray ofay apesgray, ectarinesnay, anday eachespay, oonsay ollectedcay
emthay oundray ethay abletay.

Ilewhay usthay engageday, Elizabethay adhay aay airfay opportunityay ofay ecidingday etherwhay
eshay ostmay earedfay oray ishedway orfay ethay appearanceay ofay mray. Arcyday, byay ethay
eelingsfay ichwhay evailedpray onay ishay enteringay ethay oomray; anday enthay, oughthay utbay
aay omentmay eforebay eshay adhay elievedbay erhay ishesway otay edominatepray, eshay eganbay otay
egretray atthay ehay amecay.

Ehay adhay eenbay omesay imetay ithway mray. Ardinergay, owhay, ithway otway oray eethray otheray
entlemengay omfray ethay ousehay, asway engageday byay ethay iverray; anday adhay eftlay imhay
onlyay onay earninglay atthay ethay adieslay ofay ethay amilyfay intendeday aay isitvay otay
Eorgianagay atthay orningmay. Onay oonersay idday ehay appearay, anthay Elizabethay iselyway
esolvedray otay ebay erfectlypay easyay anday unembarrassed;--aay esolutionray ethay oremay
ecessarynay otay ebay ademay, utbay erhapspay otnay ethay oremay easilyay eptkay, ecausebay eshay
awsay atthay ethay uspicionssay ofay ethay olewhay artypay ereway awakeneday againstay emthay,
anday atthay erethay asway arcelyscay anay eyeay ichwhay idday otnay atchway ishay ehaviourbay
enwhay ehay irstfay amecay intoay ethay oomray. Inay onay ountenancecay asway attentiveay
uriositycay osay onglystray arkedmay asay inay Issmay Ingley’sbay, inay itespay ofay ethay
ilessmay ichwhay overspreaday erhay acefay eneverwhay eshay okespay otay oneay ofay itsay
objectsay; orfay ealousyjay adhay otnay etyay ademay erhay esperateday, anday erhay attentionsay
otay mray. Arcyday ereway byay onay eansmay overay. Issmay Arcyday, onay erhay other’sbray
entranceay, exerteday erselfhay uchmay oremay otay alktay; anday Elizabethay awsay atthay ehay
asway anxiousay orfay ishay istersay anday erselfhay otay etgay acquainteday, anday orwardedfay,
asay uchmay asay ossiblepay, everyay attemptay atay onversationcay onay eitheray idesay. Issmay
Ingleybay awsay allay isthay ikewiselay; anday, inay ethay imprudenceay ofay angeray, ooktay ethay
irstfay opportunityay ofay ayingsay, ithway eeringsnay ivilitycay,--

aY“pray, Issmay Elizaay, areay otnay ethay ire----shay ilitiamay emovedray omfray Erytonmay?
Eythay ustmay ebay aay eatgray osslay otay our_yay_ amilyfay.”

Inay Arcy’sday esencepray eshay aredday otnay entionmay Ickham’sway amenay: utbay Elizabethay
instantlyay omprehendedcay atthay ehay asway uppermostay inay erhay oughtsthay; anday ethay
ariousvay ecollectionsray onnectedcay ithway imhay avegay erhay aay oment’smay istressday;
utbay, exertingay erselfhay igorouslyvay otay epelray ethay ill-natureday attackay, eshay
esentlypray answereday ethay uestionqay inay aay olerablytay isengagedday onetay. Ilewhay
eshay okespay, anay involuntaryay anceglay owedshay erhay Arcyday ithway aay eightenedhay
omplexioncay, earnestlyay ookinglay atay erhay, anday ishay istersay overcomeay ithway
onfusioncay, anday unableay otay iftlay upay erhay eyesay. Adhay Issmay Ingleybay ownknay atwhay
ainpay eshay asway enthay ivinggay erhay elovedbay iendfray, eshay undoubtedlyay ouldway avehay
efrainedray omfray ethay inthay; utbay eshay adhay erelymay intendeday otay iscomposeday
Elizabethay, byay ingingbray orwardfay ethay ideaay ofay aay anmay otay omwhay eshay elievedbay
erhay artialpay, otay akemay erhay etraybay aay ensibilitysay ichwhay ightmay injureay erhay inay
Arcy’sday opinionay, anday, erhapspay, otay emindray ethay atterlay ofay allay ethay olliesfay
anday absurditiesay byay ichwhay omesay artpay ofay erhay amilyfay ereway onnectedcay ithway
atthay orpscay. Otnay aay ablesyllay adhay everay eachedray erhay ofay Issmay Arcy’sday
editatedmay elopementay. Otay onay eaturecray adhay itay eenbay evealedray, erewhay ecrecysay
asway ossiblepay, exceptay otay Elizabethay; anday omfray allay Ingley’sbay onnectionscay
erhay otherbray asway articularlypay anxiousay otay oncealcay itay, omfray atthay eryvay ishway
ichwhay Elizabethay adhay onglay agoay attributeday otay imhay, ofay eirthay ecomingbay
ereafterhay erhay ownay. Ehay adhay ertainlycay ormedfay uchsay aay anplay; anday ithoutway
eaningmay atthay itay ouldshay affectay ishay endeavouray otay eparatesay imhay omfray Issmay
Ennetbay, itay isay obablepray atthay itay ightmay adday omethingsay otay ishay ivelylay oncerncay
orfay ethay elfareway ofay ishay iendfray.

Elizabeth’say ollectedcay ehaviourbay, oweverhay, oonsay uietedqay ishay emotionay; anday
asay Issmay Ingleybay, exedvay anday isappointedday, aredday otnay approachay earernay otay
Ickhamway, Eorgianagay alsoay ecoveredray inay imetay, oughthay otnay enoughay otay ebay ableay
otay eakspay anyay oremay. Erhay otherbray, osewhay eyeay eshay earedfay otay eetmay, arcelyscay
ecollectedray erhay interestay inay ethay affairay; anday ethay eryvay ircumstancecay ichwhay
adhay eenbay esignedday otay urntay ishay oughtsthay omfray Elizabethay, eemedsay otay avehay
ixedfay emthay onay erhay oremay anday oremay eerfullychay.

Eirthay isitvay idday otnay ontinuecay onglay afteray ethay uestionqay anday answeray aboveay
entionedmay; anday ilewhay mray. Arcyday asway attendingay emthay otay eirthay arriagecay,
Issmay Ingleybay asway entingvay erhay eelingsfay inay iticismscray onay Elizabeth’say
ersonpay, ehaviourbay, anday essdray. Utbay Eorgianagay ouldway otnay oinjay erhay. Erhay
other’sbray ecommendationray asway enoughay otay insureay erhay avourfay: ishay udgmentjay
ouldcay otnay erray; anday ehay adhay okenspay inay uchsay ermstay ofay Elizabethay, asay otay eavelay
Eorgianagay ithoutway ethay owerpay ofay indingfay erhay otherwiseay anthay ovelylay anday
amiableay. Enwhay Arcyday eturnedray otay ethay aloonsay, Issmay Ingleybay ouldcay otnay elphay
epeatingray otay imhay omesay artpay ofay atwhay eshay adhay eenbay ayingsay otay ishay istersay.

oW“hay eryvay illay Elizaay Ennetbay ookslay isthay orningmay, mray. Arcyday,” eshay iedcray: i“ay
evernay inay myay ifelay awsay anyoneay osay uchmay altereday asay eshay isay incesay ethay interway.
Eshay isay owngray osay ownbray anday oarsecay! Ouisalay anday Iay ereway agreeingay atthay eway
ouldshay otnay avehay ownknay erhay againay.”

Oweverhay ittlelay mray. Arcyday ightmay avehay ikedlay uchsay anay addressay, ehay ontentedcay
imselfhay ithway oollycay eplyingray, atthay ehay erceivedpay onay otheray alterationay anthay
erhay eingbay atherray anned,--notay iraculousmay onsequencecay ofay avellingtray inay ethay
ummersay.

oR“fay myay ownay artpay,” eshay ejoinedray, i“ay ustmay onfesscay atthay Iay evernay ouldcay eesay
anyay eautybay inay erhay. Erhay acefay isay ootay inthay; erhay omplexioncay ashay onay
illiancybray; anday erhay eaturesfay areay otnay atay allay andsomehay. Erhay osenay antsway
aracterchay; erethay isay othingnay arkedmay inay itsay ineslay. Erhay eethtay areay
olerabletay, utbay otnay outay ofay ethay ommoncay ayway; anday asay orfay erhay eyesay, ichwhay
avehay ometimessay eenbay alledcay osay inefay, Iay evernay ouldcay erceivepay anythingay
extraordinaryay inay emthay. Eythay avehay aay arpshay, ewishshray ooklay, ichwhay Iay oday otnay
ikelay atay allay; anday inay erhay airay altogetheray, erethay isay aay elf-sufficiencysay
ithoutway ashionfay, ichwhay isay intolerableay.”

Ersuadedpay asay Issmay Ingleybay asway atthay Arcyday admireday Elizabethay, isthay asway otnay
ethay estbay ethodmay ofay ecommendingray erselfhay; utbay angryay eoplepay areay otnay alwaysay
iseway; anday inay eeingsay imhay atay astlay ooklay omewhatsay ettlednay, eshay adhay allay ethay
uccesssay eshay expecteday. Ehay asway esolutelyray ilentsay, oweverhay; anday, omfray aay
eterminationday ofay akingmay imhay eakspay, eshay ontinuedcay,--

i“ay ememberray, enwhay eway irstfay ewknay erhay inay Ertfordshirehay, owhay amazeday eway allay
ereway otay indfay atthay eshay asway aay eputedray eautybay; anday Iay articularlypay ecollectray
ouryay ayingsay oneay ightnay, afteray eythay adhay eenbay iningday atay Etherfieldnay, e‘_shay_
aay eautybay! Iay ouldshay asay oonsay allcay erhay othermay aay itway.’ Utbay afterwardsay eshay
eemedsay otay improveay onay ouyay, anday Iay elievebay ouyay oughtthay erhay atherray ettypray atay
oneay imetay.”

eS“yay,” epliedray Arcyday, owhay ouldcay ontaincay imselfhay onay ongerlay, ut“bay at_thay_
asway onlyay enwhay Iay irstfay ewknay erhay; orfay itay isay anymay onthsmay incesay Iay avehay
onsideredcay erhay asay oneay ofay ethay andsomesthay omenway ofay myay acquaintanceay.”

Ehay enthay entway awayay, anday Issmay Ingleybay asway eftlay otay allay ethay atisfactionsay ofay
avinghay orcedfay imhay otay aysay atwhay avegay onay oneay anyay ainpay utbay erselfhay.

mrsay. Ardinergay anday Elizabethay alkedtay ofay allay atthay adhay occurreday uringday eirthay
isitvay, asay eythay eturnedray, exceptay atwhay adhay articularlypay interesteday emthay
othbay. Ethay ookslay anday ehaviourbay ofay everybodyay eythay adhay eensay ereway iscussedday,
exceptay ofay ethay ersonpay owhay adhay ostlymay engageday eirthay attentionay. Eythay alkedtay
ofay ishay istersay, ishay iendsfray, ishay ousehay, ishay uitfray, ofay everythingay utbay
imselfhay; etyay Elizabethay asway onginglay otay owknay atwhay mrsay. Ardinergay oughtthay ofay
imhay, anday mrsay. Ardinergay ouldway avehay eenbay ighlyhay atifiedgray byay erhay iece’snay
eginningbay ethay ubjectsay.




iLlustration[ay]




Apterchay Ixlvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay adhay eenbay aay oodgay ealday isappointedday inay otnay indingfay aay etterlay omfray
Anejay onay eirthay irstfay arrivalay atay Ambtonlay; anday isthay isappointmentday adhay eenbay
enewedray onay eachay ofay ethay orningsmay atthay adhay ownay eenbay entspay erethay; utbay onay
ethay irdthay erhay epiningray asway overay, anday erhay istersay ustifiedjay, byay ethay
eceiptray ofay otway etterslay omfray erhay atay onceay, onay oneay ofay ichwhay asway arkedmay atthay
itay adhay eenbay is-sentmay elsewhereay. Elizabethay asway otnay urprisedsay atay itay, asay
Anejay adhay ittenwray ethay irectionday emarkablyray illay.

Eythay adhay ustjay eenbay eparingpray otay alkway asay ethay etterslay amecay inay; anday erhay
uncleay anday auntay, eavinglay erhay otay enjoyay emthay inay uietqay, etsay offay byay
emselvesthay. Ethay oneay is-sentmay ustmay ebay irstfay attendeday otay; itay adhay eenbay
ittenwray ivefay aysday agoay. Ethay eginningbay ontainedcay anay accountay ofay allay eirthay
ittlelay artiespay anday engagementsay, ithway uchsay ewsnay asay ethay ountrycay affordeday;
utbay ethay atterlay alfhay, ichwhay asway atedday aay ayday aterlay, anday ittenwray inay evidentay
agitationay, avegay oremay importantay intelligenceay. Itay asway otay isthay effectay:--

iNce“say itingwray ethay aboveay, earestday Izzylay, omethingsay ashay occurreday ofay aay
ostmay unexpecteday anday erioussay aturenay; utbay Iay amay afraiday ofay alarmingay ou--beyay
assureday atthay eway areay allay ellway. Atwhay Iay avehay otay aysay elatesray otay oorpay Ialyday.
Anay expressay amecay atay elvetway astlay ightnay, ustjay asay eway ereway allay onegay otay edbay,
omfray Olonelcay Orsterfay, otay informay usay atthay eshay asway onegay offay otay Otlandscay
ithway oneay ofay ishay officersay; otay ownay ethay uthtray, ithway Ickhamway! Imagineay ouray
urprisesay. Otay Ittykay, oweverhay, itay oesday otnay eemsay osay ollywhay unexpecteday. Iay amay
eryvay, eryvay orrysay. Osay imprudentay aay atchmay onay othbay idessay! Utbay Iay amay illingway
otay opehay ethay estbay, anday atthay ishay aracterchay ashay eenbay isunderstoodmay.
Oughtlessthay anday indiscreetay Iay ancay easilyay elievebay imhay, utbay isthay epstay and(ay
etlay usay ejoiceray overay itay) arksmay othingnay adbay atay earthay. Ishay oicechay isay
isinterestedday atay eastlay, orfay ehay ustmay owknay myay atherfay ancay ivegay erhay othingnay.
Ouray oorpay othermay isay adlysay ievedgray. myay atherfay earsbay itay etterbay. Owhay
ankfulthay amay Iay, atthay eway evernay etlay emthay owknay atwhay ashay eenbay aidsay againstay
imhay; eway ustmay orgetfay itay ourselvesay. Eythay ereway offay Aturdaysay ightnay aboutay
elvetway, asay isay onjecturedcay, utbay ereway otnay issedmay illtay esterdayyay orningmay atay
eightay. Ethay expressay asway entsay offay irectlyday. myay earday Izzylay, eythay ustmay avehay
assedpay ithinway entay ilesmay ofay usay. Olonelcay Orsterfay ivesgay usay easonray otay expectay
imhay erehay oonsay. Ialyday eftlay aay ewfay ineslay orfay ishay ifeway, informingay erhay ofay
eirthay intentionay. Iay ustmay oncludecay, orfay Iay annotcay ebay onglay omfray myay oorpay
othermay. Iay amay afraiday ouyay illway otnay ebay ableay otay akemay itay outay, utbay Iay ardlyhay
owknay atwhay Iay avehay ittenwray.”

Ithoutway allowingay erselfhay imetay orfay onsiderationcay, anday arcelyscay owingknay
atwhay eshay eltfay, Elizabethay, onay inishingfay isthay etterlay, instantlyay eizedsay ethay
otheray, anday openingay itay ithway ethay utmostay impatienceay, eadray asay ollowsfay: itay
adhay eenbay ittenwray aay ayday aterlay anthay ethay onclusioncay ofay ethay irstfay.

“byay isthay imetay, myay earestday istersay, ouyay avehay eceivedray myay urriedhay etterlay; Iay
ishway isthay aymay ebay oremay intelligibleay, utbay oughthay otnay onfinedcay orfay imetay, myay
eadhay isay osay ewilderedbay atthay Iay annotcay answeray orfay eingbay oherentcay. Earestday
Izzylay, Iay ardlyhay owknay atwhay Iay ouldway itewray, utbay Iay avehay adbay ewsnay orfay ouyay,
anday itay annotcay ebay elayedday. Imprudentay asay aay arriagemay etweenbay mray. Ickhamway
anday ouray oorpay Ialyday ouldway ebay, eway areay ownay anxiousay otay ebay assureday itay ashay
akentay aceplay, orfay erethay isay utbay ootay uchmay easonray otay earfay eythay areay otnay onegay
otay Otlandscay. Olonelcay Orsterfay amecay esterdayyay, avinghay eftlay Ightonbray ethay
ayday eforebay, otnay anymay ourshay afteray ethay expressay. Oughthay Ia’slyday ortshay
etterlay otay mrsay. fay. avegay emthay otay understanday atthay eythay ereway oinggay otay Etnagray
Eengray, omethingsay asway oppeddray byay Ennyday expressingay ishay eliefbay atthay way.
evernay intendeday otay ogay erethay, oray otay arrymay Ialyday atay allay, ichwhay asway epeatedray
otay Olonelcay fay., owhay, instantlyay akingtay ethay alarmay, etsay offay omfray bay.,
intendingay otay acetray eirthay outeray. Ehay idday acetray emthay easilyay otay Aphamclay, utbay
onay artherfay; orfay onay enteringay atthay aceplay, eythay emovedray intoay aay
ackney-coachhay, anday ismissedday ethay aisechay atthay oughtbray emthay omfray Epsomay.
Allay atthay isay ownknay afteray isthay isay, atthay eythay ereway eensay otay ontinuecay ethay
Ondonlay oadray. Iay owknay otnay atwhay otay inkthay. Afteray akingmay everyay ossiblepay
inquiryay onay atthay idesay ofay Ondonlay, Olonelcay fay. amecay onay intoay Ertfordshirehay,
anxiouslyay enewingray emthay atay allay ethay urnpikestay, anday atay ethay innsay inay Arnetbay
anday Atfieldhay, utbay ithoutway anyay uccess,--nosay uchsay eoplepay adhay eenbay eensay otay
asspay oughthray. Ithway ethay indestkay oncerncay ehay amecay onay otay Ongbournlay, anday
okebray ishay apprehensionsay otay usay inay aay annermay ostmay editablecray otay ishay earthay.
Iay amay incerelysay ievedgray orfay imhay anday mrsay. fay.; utbay onay oneay ancay owthray anyay
ameblay onay emthay. Ouray istressday, myay earday Izzylay, isay eryvay eatgray. myay atherfay anday
othermay elievebay ethay orstway, utbay Iay annotcay inkthay osay illay ofay imhay. Anymay
ircumstancescay ightmay akemay itay oremay eligibleay orfay emthay otay ebay arriedmay
ivatelypray inay owntay anthay otay ursuepay eirthay irstfay anplay; anday evenay ifay e_hay_
ouldcay ormfay uchsay aay esignday againstay aay oungyay omanway ofay Ia’slyday onnectionscay,
ichwhay isay otnay ikelylay, ancay Iay upposesay erhay osay ostlay otay everythingay?
Impossibleay! Iay ievegray otay indfay, oweverhay, atthay Olonelcay fay. isay otnay isposedday
otay ependday uponay eirthay arriagemay: ehay ookshay ishay eadhay enwhay Iay expresseday myay
opeshay, anday aidsay ehay earedfay way. asway otnay aay anmay otay ebay ustedtray. myay oorpay othermay
isay eallyray illay, anday eepskay erhay oomray. Ouldcay eshay exertay erselfhay, itay ouldway ebay
etterbay, utbay isthay isay otnay otay ebay expecteday; anday asay otay myay atherfay, Iay evernay inay
myay ifelay awsay imhay osay affecteday. Oorpay Ittykay ashay angeray orfay avinghay oncealedcay
eirthay attachmentay; utbay asay itay asway aay attermay ofay onfidencecay, oneay annotcay
onderway. Iay amay ulytray adglay, earestday Izzylay, atthay ouyay avehay eenbay aredspay
omethingsay ofay esethay istressingday enesscay; utbay ownay, asay ethay irstfay ockshay isay
overay, allshay Iay ownay atthay Iay onglay orfay ouryay eturnray? Iay amay otnay osay elfishsay,
oweverhay, asay otay esspray orfay itay, ifay inconvenientay. Adieuay! Iay aketay upay myay enpay
againay otay oday, atwhay Iay avehay ustjay oldtay ouyay Iay ouldway otnay; utbay ircumstancescay
areay uchsay, atthay Iay annotcay elphay earnestlyay eggingbay ouyay allay otay omecay erehay asay
oonsay asay ossiblepay. Iay owknay myay earday uncleay anday auntay osay ellway, atthay Iay amay otnay
afraiday ofay equestingray itay, oughthay Iay avehay illstay omethingsay oremay otay askay ofay
ethay ormerfay. myay atherfay isay oinggay otay Ondonlay ithway Olonelcay Orsterfay instantlyay,
otay tryay otay iscoverday erhay. Atwhay ehay eansmay otay oday, Iay amay uresay Iay owknay otnay; utbay
ishay excessiveay istressday illway otnay alloway imhay otay ursuepay anyay easuremay inay ethay
estbay anday afestsay ayway, anday Olonelcay Orsterfay isay obligeday otay ebay atay Ightonbray
againay o-morrowtay eveningay. Inay uchsay anay exigenceay myay uncle’say adviceay anday
assistanceay ouldway ebay everythingay inay ethay orldway; ehay illway immediatelyay
omprehendcay atwhay Iay ustmay eelfay, anday Iay elyray uponay ishay oodnessgay.”

oH“ay! erewhay, erewhay isay myay uncleay?” iedcray Elizabethay, artingday omfray erhay eatsay
asay eshay inishedfay ethay etterlay, inay eagernessay otay ollowfay imhay, ithoutway osinglay aay
omentmay ofay ethay imetay osay eciouspray; utbay asay eshay eachedray ethay oorday, itay asway
openeday byay aay ervantsay, anday mray. Arcyday appeareday. Erhay alepay acefay anday
impetuousay annermay ademay imhay artstay, anday eforebay ehay ouldcay ecoverray imselfhay
enoughay otay eakspay, eshay, inay osewhay indmay everyay ideaay asway upersededsay byay Ia’slyday
ituationsay, astilyhay exclaimeday, i“ay egbay ouryay ardonpay, utbay Iay ustmay eavelay ouyay.
Iay ustmay indfay mray. Ardinergay isthay omentmay onay usinessbay atthay annotcay ebay elayedday;
Iay avehay otnay anay instantay otay oselay.”

oOd“gay Odgay! atwhay isay ethay attermay?” iedcray ehay, ithway oremay eelingfay anthay
olitenesspay; enthay ecollectingray imselfhay, i“ay illway otnay etainday ouyay aay inutemay;
utbay etlay emay, oray etlay ethay ervantsay, ogay afteray mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay. Ouyay areay
otnay ellway enoughay; ouyay annotcay ogay ourselfyay.”

Elizabethay esitatedhay; utbay erhay eesknay embledtray underay erhay, anday eshay eltfay owhay
ittlelay ouldway ebay ainedgay byay erhay attemptingay otay ursuepay emthay. Allingcay ackbay
ethay ervantsay, ereforethay, eshay ommissionedcay imhay, oughthay inay osay eathlessbray anay
accentay asay ademay erhay almostay unintelligibleay, otay etchfay ishay astermay anday
istressmay omehay instantlyay.

Onay ishay uittingqay ethay oomray, eshay atsay ownday, unableay otay upportsay erselfhay, anday
ookinglay osay iserablymay illay, atthay itay asway impossibleay orfay Arcyday otay eavelay erhay,
oray otay efrainray omfray ayingsay, inay aay onetay ofay entlenessgay anday ommiserationcay,
eT“lay emay allcay ouryay aidmay. Isay erethay othingnay ouyay ouldcay aketay otay ivegay ouyay
esentpray eliefray? Aay assglay ofay ineway; allshay Iay etgay ouyay oneay? Ouyay areay eryvay illay.”

o“nay, Iay ankthay ouyay,” eshay epliedray, endeavouringay otay ecoverray erselfhay. eRe“thay
isay othingnay ethay attermay ithway emay. Iay amay uiteqay ellway, Iay amay onlyay istressedday byay
omesay eadfuldray ewsnay ichwhay Iay avehay ustjay eceivedray omfray Ongbournlay.”

Eshay urstbay intoay earstay asay eshay alludeday otay itay, anday orfay aay ewfay inutesmay ouldcay
otnay eakspay anotheray ordway. Arcyday, inay etchedwray uspensesay, ouldcay onlyay aysay
omethingsay indistinctlyay ofay ishay

iLlustration[ay:

i“ay avehay otnay anay instantay otay oselay”
ay]

oncerncay, anday observeay erhay inay ompassionatecay ilencesay. Atay engthlay eshay okespay
againay. i“ay avehay ustjay adhay aay etterlay omfray Anejay, ithway uchsay eadfuldray ewsnay. Itay
annotcay ebay oncealedcay omfray anyoneay. myay oungestyay istersay ashay eftlay allay erhay
iends--hasfray elopeday; ashay ownthray erselfhay intoay ethay owerpay of--ofay mray.
Ickhamway. Eythay areay onegay offay ogethertay omfray Ightonbray. oU_yay_ owknay imhay ootay
ellway otay oubtday ethay estray. Eshay ashay onay oneymay, onay onnectionscay, othingnay atthay
ancay empttay imhay o--shetay isay ostlay orfay everay.”

Arcyday asway ixedfay inay astonishmentay.

eN“whay Iay onsidercay,” eshay addeday, inay aay etyay oremay agitateday oicevay, at“thay i_ay_
ightmay avehay eventedpray itay! i_ay_ owhay ewknay atwhay ehay asway. Adhay Iay utbay explaineday
omesay artpay ofay itay only--someay artpay ofay atwhay Iay earntlay, otay myay ownay amilyfay! Adhay
ishay aracterchay eenbay ownknay, isthay ouldcay otnay avehay appenedhay. Utbay itay isay allay,
allay ootay atelay ownay.”

i“ay amay ievedgray, indeeday,” iedcray Arcyday: ieved--shocked“gray. Utbay isay itay
ertaincay, absolutelyay ertaincay?”

oH“ay, esyay! Eythay eftlay Ightonbray ogethertay onay Undaysay ightnay, anday ereway acedtray
almostay otay Ondonlay, utbay otnay eyondbay: eythay areay ertainlycay otnay onegay otay
Otlandscay.”

aNd“ay atwhay ashay eenbay oneday, atwhay ashay eenbay attempteday, otay ecoverray erhay?”

“myay atherfay ashay onegay otay Ondonlay, anday Anejay ashay ittenwray otay egbay myay uncle’say
immediateay assistanceay, anday eway allshay ebay offay, Iay opehay, inay alfhay anay ourhay. Utbay
othingnay ancay ebay oneday; Iay owknay eryvay ellway atthay othingnay ancay ebay oneday. Owhay isay
uchsay aay anmay otay ebay orkedway onay? Owhay areay eythay evenay otay ebay iscoveredday? Iay avehay
otnay ethay allestsmay opehay. Itay isay everyay ayway orriblehay!”

Arcyday ookshay ishay eadhay inay ilentsay acquiescenceay.

eN“whay _myay_ eyesay ereway openeday otay ishay ealray aracterchay, ohay! adhay Iay ownknay atwhay
Iay oughtay, atwhay Iay aredday otay oday! Utbay Iay ewknay ot--inay asway afraiday ofay oingday ootay
uchmay. Etchedwray, etchedwray istakemay!”

Arcyday ademay onay answeray. Ehay eemedsay arcelyscay otay earhay erhay, anday asway alkingway upay
anday ownday ethay oomray inay earnestay editationmay; ishay owbray ontractedcay, ishay airay
oomyglay. Elizabethay oonsay observeday, anday instantlyay understooday itay. Erhay owerpay
asway inkingsay; everythingay ust_may_ inksay underay uchsay aay oofpray ofay amilyfay
eaknessway, uchsay anay assuranceay ofay ethay eepestday isgraceday. Eshay ouldcay eithernay
onderway ornay ondemncay; utbay ethay eliefbay ofay ishay elf-conquestsay oughtbray othingnay
onsolatorycay otay erhay osombay, affordeday onay alliationpay ofay erhay istressday. Itay
asway, onay ethay ontrarycay, exactlyay alculatedcay otay akemay erhay understanday erhay ownay
ishesway; anday evernay adhay eshay osay onestlyhay eltfay atthay eshay ouldcay avehay ovedlay
imhay, asay ownay, enwhay allay ovelay ustmay ebay ainvay.

Utbay elfsay, oughthay itay ouldway intrudeay, ouldcay otnay engrossay erhay. Ia--thelyday
umiliationhay, ethay iserymay eshay asway ingingbray onay emthay all--soonay allowedsway upay
everyay ivatepray arecay; anday overingcay erhay acefay ithway erhay andkerchiefhay,
Elizabethay asway oonsay ostlay otay everythingay elseay; anday, afteray aay ausepay ofay
everalsay inutesmay, asway onlyay ecalledray otay aay ensesay ofay erhay ituationsay byay ethay
oicevay ofay erhay ompanioncay, owhay, inay aay annermay ichwhay, oughthay itay okespay
ompassioncay, okespay ikewiselay estraintray, aidsay,--

i“ay amay afraiday ouyay avehay eenbay onglay esiringday myay absenceay, ornay avehay Iay anythingay
otay eadplay inay excuseay ofay myay aystay, utbay ealray, oughthay unavailingay oncerncay.
Ouldway otay Eavenhay atthay anythingay ouldcay ebay eitheray aidsay oray oneday onay myay artpay,
atthay ightmay offeray onsolationcay otay uchsay istressday! Utbay Iay illway otnay ormenttay
ouyay ithway ainvay ishesway, ichwhay aymay eemsay urposelypay otay askay orfay ouryay anksthay.
Isthay unfortunateay affairay illway, Iay earfay, eventpray myay ister’ssay avinghay ethay
easureplay ofay eeingsay ouyay atay Emberleypay o-daytay.”

oH“ay, esyay! Ebay osay indkay asay otay apologizeay orfay usay otay Issmay Arcyday. Aysay atthay
urgentay usinessbay allscay usay omehay immediatelyay. Oncealcay ethay unhappyay uthtray asay
onglay asay itay isay ossiblepay. Iay owknay itay annotcay ebay onglay.”

Ehay eadilyray assureday erhay ofay ishay ecrecysay, againay expresseday ishay orrowsay orfay
erhay istressday, ishedway itay aay appierhay onclusioncay anthay erethay asway atay esentpray
easonray otay opehay, anday, eavinglay ishay omplimentscay orfay erhay elationsray, ithway
onlyay oneay erioussay artingpay ooklay, entway awayay.

Asay ehay uittedqay ethay oomray, Elizabethay eltfay owhay improbableay itay asway atthay eythay
ouldshay everay eesay eachay otheray againay onay uchsay ermstay ofay ordialitycay asay adhay
arkedmay eirthay everalsay eetingsmay inay Erbyshireday; anday asay eshay ewthray aay
etrospectiveray anceglay overay ethay olewhay ofay eirthay acquaintanceay, osay ullfay ofay
ontradictionscay anday arietiesvay, ighedsay atay ethay erversenesspay ofay osethay
eelingsfay ichwhay ouldway ownay avehay omotedpray itsay ontinuancecay, anday ouldway
ormerlyfay avehay ejoicedray inay itsay erminationtay.

Ifay atitudegray anday esteemay areay oodgay oundationsfay ofay affectionay, Elizabeth’say
angechay ofay entimentsay illway ebay eithernay improbableay ornay aultyfay. Utbay ifay
otherwiseay, ifay ethay egardray ingingspray omfray uchsay ourcessay isay unreasonableay oray
unnaturalay, inay omparisoncay ofay atwhay isay osay oftenay escribedday asay arisingay onay aay
irstfay intervieway ithway itsay objectay, anday evenay eforebay otway ordsway avehay eenbay
exchangeday, othingnay ancay ebay aidsay inay erhay efenceday, exceptay atthay eshay adhay ivengay
omewhatsay ofay aay ialtray otay ethay atterlay ethodmay, inay erhay artialitypay orfay Ickhamway,
anday atthay itsay illay uccesssay ightmay, erhapspay, authorizeay erhay otay eeksay ethay otheray
esslay interestingay odemay ofay attachmentay. Ebay atthay asay itay aymay, eshay awsay imhay ogay
ithway egretray; anday inay isthay earlyay exampleay ofay atwhay Ia’slyday infamyay ustmay
oducepray, oundfay additionalay anguishay asay eshay eflectedray onay atthay etchedwray
usinessbay. Evernay incesay eadingray Ane’sjay econdsay etterlay adhay eshay entertaineday aay
opehay ofay Ickham’sway eaningmay otay arrymay erhay. Onay oneay utbay Anejay, eshay oughtthay,
ouldcay atterflay erselfhay ithway uchsay anay expectationay. Urprisesay asway ethay eastlay
ofay allay erhay eelingsfay onay isthay evelopmentday. Ilewhay ethay ontentscay ofay ethay irstfay
etterlay emainedray onay erhay indmay, eshay asway allay urprisesay, allay astonishmentay,
atthay Ickhamway ouldshay arrymay aay irlgay omwhay itay asway impossibleay ehay ouldcay arrymay
orfay oneymay; anday owhay Ialyday ouldcay everay avehay attacheday imhay adhay appeareday
incomprehensibleay. Utbay ownay itay asway allay ootay aturalnay. Orfay uchsay anay attachmentay
asay isthay, eshay ightmay avehay ufficientsay armschay; anday oughthay eshay idday otnay
upposesay Ialyday otay ebay eliberatelyday engagingay inay anay elopementay, ithoutway ethay
intentionay ofay arriagemay, eshay adhay onay ifficultyday inay elievingbay atthay eithernay
erhay irtuevay ornay erhay understandingay ouldway eservepray erhay omfray allingfay anay easyay
eypray.

Eshay adhay evernay erceivedpay, ilewhay ethay egimentray asway inay Ertfordshirehay, atthay
Ialyday adhay anyay artialitypay orfay imhay; utbay eshay asway onvincedcay atthay Ialyday adhay
antedway onlyay encouragementay otay attachay erselfhay otay anybodyay. Ometimessay oneay
officeray, ometimessay anotheray, adhay eenbay erhay avouritefay, asay eirthay attentionsay
aisedray emthay inay erhay opinionay. Erhay affectionsay adhay eenbay ontinuallycay
uctuatingflay, utbay evernay ithoutway anay objectay. Ethay ischiefmay ofay eglectnay anday
istakenmay indulgenceay owardstay uchsay aay irl--ohgay! owhay acutelyay idday eshay ownay
eelfay itay!

Eshay asway ildway otay ebay atay ome--tohay earhay, otay eesay, otay ebay uponay ethay otspay otay
areshay ithway Anejay inay ethay arescay atthay ustmay ownay allfay ollywhay uponay erhay, inay aay
amilyfay osay erangedday; aay atherfay absentay, aay othermay incapableay ofay exertionay, anday
equiringray onstantcay attendanceay; anday oughthay almostay ersuadedpay atthay othingnay
ouldcay ebay oneday orfay Ialyday, erhay uncle’say interferenceay eemedsay ofay ethay utmostay
importanceay, anday illtay ehay entereday ethay oomray ethay iserymay ofay erhay impatienceay
asway everesay. mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay adhay urriedhay ackbay inay alarmay, upposingsay,
byay ethay ervant’ssay accountay, atthay eirthay iecenay asway akentay uddenlysay illay; utbay
atisfyingsay emthay instantlyay onay atthay eadhay, eshay eagerlyay ommunicatedcay ethay
ausecay ofay eirthay ummonssay, eadingray ethay otway etterslay alouday, anday ellingdway onay
ethay ostscriptpay ofay ethay astlay ithway emblingtray energyay. Oughthay Ialyday adhay evernay
eenbay aay avouritefay ithway emthay, mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay ouldcay otnay utbay ebay
eeplyday affecteday. Otnay Ialyday onlyay, utbay allay ereway oncernedcay inay itay; anday afteray
ethay irstfay exclamationsay ofay urprisesay anday orrorhay, mray. Ardinergay eadilyray
omisedpray everyay assistanceay inay ishay owerpay. Elizabethay, oughthay expectingay onay
esslay, ankedthay imhay ithway earstay ofay atitudegray; anday allay eethray eingbay actuateday
byay oneay iritspay, everythingay elatingray otay eirthay ourneyjay asway eedilyspay
ettledsay. Eythay ereway otay ebay offay asay oonsay asay ossiblepay. uT“bay atwhay isay otay ebay
oneday aboutay Emberleypay?” iedcray mrsay. Ardinergay. oHn“jay oldtay usay mray. Arcyday asway
erehay enwhay ouyay entsay orfay us;--wasay itay osay?”

eS“yay; anday Iay oldtay imhay eway ouldshay otnay ebay ableay otay eepkay ouray engagementay.
aT_thay_ isay allay ettledsay.”

aT“whay isay allay ettledsay?” epeatedray ethay otheray, asay eshay anray intoay erhay oomray otay
eparepray. aNd“ay areay eythay uponay uchsay ermstay asay orfay erhay otay iscloseday ethay ealray
uthtray? Ohay, atthay Iay ewknay owhay itay asway!”

Utbay ishesway ereway ainvay; oray, atay estbay, ouldcay ervesay onlyay otay amuseay erhay inay ethay
urryhay anday onfusioncay ofay ethay ollowingfay ourhay. Adhay Elizabethay eenbay atay eisurelay
otay ebay idleay, eshay ouldway avehay emainedray ertaincay atthay allay employmentay asway
impossibleay otay oneay osay etchedwray asay erselfhay; utbay eshay adhay erhay areshay ofay
usinessbay asay ellway asay erhay auntay, anday amongstay ethay estray erethay ereway otesnay otay
ebay ittenwray otay allay eirthay iendsfray atay Ambtonlay, ithway alsefay excusesay orfay eirthay
uddensay epartureday. Anay ourhay, oweverhay, awsay ethay olewhay ompletedcay; anday mray.
Ardinergay, eanwhilemay, avinghay ettledsay ishay accountay atay ethay innay, othingnay
emainedray otay ebay oneday utbay otay ogay; anday Elizabethay, afteray allay ethay iserymay ofay
ethay orningmay, oundfay erselfhay, inay aay ortershay acespay ofay imetay anthay eshay ouldcay
avehay upposedsay, eatedsay inay ethay arriagecay, anday onay ethay oadray otay Ongbournlay.




iLlustration[ay:

e“thay irstfay easingplay earnestay ofay eirthay elcomeway”
ay]




APTERchay IIxlvay.


iLlustration[ay]

i“ay avehay eenbay inkingthay itay overay againay, Elizabethay,” aidsay erhay uncleay, asay eythay
ovedray omfray ethay owntay; and“ay eallyray, uponay erioussay onsiderationcay, Iay amay uchmay
oremay inclineday anthay Iay asway otay udgejay asay ouryay eldestay istersay oesday ofay ethay
attermay. Itay appearsay otay emay osay eryvay unlikelyay atthay anyay oungyay anmay ouldshay ormfay
uchsay aay esignday againstay aay irlgay owhay isay byay onay eansmay unprotecteday oray
iendlessfray, anday owhay asway actuallyay ayingstay inay ishay Olonel’scay amilyfay, atthay Iay
amay onglystray inclineday otay opehay ethay estbay. Ouldcay ehay expectay atthay erhay iendsfray
ouldway otnay epstay orwardfay? Ouldcay ehay expectay otay ebay oticednay againay byay ethay
egimentray, afteray uchsay anay affrontay otay Olonelcay Orsterfay? Ishay emptationtay isay
otnay adequateay otay ethay iskray.”

o“day ouyay eallyray inkthay osay?” iedcray Elizabethay, ighteningbray upay orfay aay omentmay.

uPon“ay myay ordway,” aidsay mrsay. Ardinergay, i“ay eginbay otay ebay ofay ouryay uncle’say
opinionay. Itay isay eallyray ootay eatgray aay iolationvay ofay ecencyday, onourhay, anday
interestay, orfay imhay otay ebay uiltygay ofay itay. Iay annotcay inkthay osay eryvay illay ofay
Ickhamway. Ancay ouyay, ourselfyay, Izzielay, osay ollywhay ivegay imhay upay, asay otay elievebay
imhay apablecay ofay itay?”

oT“nay erhapspay ofay eglectingnay ishay ownay interestay. Utbay ofay everyay otheray eglectnay
Iay ancay elievebay imhay apablecay. Ifay, indeeday, itay ouldshay ebay osay! Utbay Iay areday otnay
opehay itay. whyay ouldshay eythay otnay ogay onay otay Otlandscay, ifay atthay adhay eenbay ethay
asecay?”

iN“ay ethay irstfay aceplay,” epliedray mray. Ardinergay, ere“thay isay onay absoluteay oofpray
atthay eythay areay otnay onegay otay Otlandscay.”

oH“ay, utbay eirthay emovingray omfray ethay aisechay intoay aay ackneyhay oachcay isay uchsay aay
esumptionpray! Anday, esidesbay, onay acestray ofay emthay ereway otay ebay oundfay onay ethay
Arnetbay oadray.”

eLl“way, en,--supposingthay emthay otay ebay inay Ondon--theylay aymay ebay erethay, oughthay
orfay ethay urposepay ofay oncealmentcay, orfay onay oremay exceptionableay urposepay. Itay isay
otnay ikelylay atthay oneymay ouldshay ebay eryvay abundantay onay eitheray idesay; anday itay
ightmay ikestray emthay atthay eythay ouldcay ebay oremay economicallyay, oughthay esslay
expeditiouslyay, arriedmay inay Ondonlay, anthay inay Otlandscay.”

uT“bay whyay allay isthay ecrecysay? whyay anyay earfay ofay etectionday? whyay ustmay eirthay
arriagemay ebay ivatepray? Ohay, onay, o--thisnay isay otnay ikelylay. Ishay ostmay articularpay
iendfray, ouyay eesay byay Ane’sjay accountay, asway ersuadedpay ofay ishay evernay intendingay
otay arrymay erhay. Ickhamway illway evernay arrymay aay omanway ithoutway omesay oneymay. Ehay
annotcay afforday itay. Anday atwhay aimsclay ashay Ialyday, atwhay attractionsay ashay eshay
eyondbay outhyay, ealthhay, anday oodgay umourhay, atthay ouldcay akemay imhay orfay erhay akesay
oregofay everyay ancechay ofay enefitingbay imselfhay byay arryingmay ellway? Asay otay atwhay
estraintray ethay apprehensionsay ofay isgraceday inay ethay orpscay ightmay owthray onay aay
ishonourableday elopementay ithway erhay, Iay amay otnay ableay otay udgejay; orfay Iay owknay
othingnay ofay ethay effectsay atthay uchsay aay epstay ightmay oducepray. Utbay asay otay ouryay
otheray objectionay, Iay amay afraiday itay illway ardlyhay oldhay oodgay. Ialyday ashay onay
othersbray otay epstay orwardfay; anday ehay ightmay imagineay, omfray myay ather’sfay
ehaviourbay, omfray ishay indolenceay anday ethay ittlelay attentionay ehay ashay everay
eemedsay otay ivegay otay atwhay asway oinggay orwardfay inay ishay amilyfay, atthay e_hay_ ouldway
oday asay ittlelay anday inkthay asay ittlelay aboutay itay, asay anyay atherfay ouldcay oday, inay
uchsay aay attermay.”

uT“bay ancay ouyay inkthay atthay Ialyday isay osay ostlay otay everythingay utbay ovelay ofay imhay,
asay otay onsentcay otay ivelay ithway imhay onay anyay otheray ermstay anthay arriagemay?”

iT“ay oesday eemsay, anday itay isay ostmay ockingshay, indeeday,” epliedray Elizabethay, ithway
earstay inay erhay eyesay, at“thay aay ister’ssay ensesay ofay ecencyday anday irtuevay inay uchsay
aay ointpay ouldshay admitay ofay oubtday. Utbay, eallyray, Iay owknay otnay atwhay otay aysay.
Erhapspay Iay amay otnay oingday erhay usticejay. Utbay eshay isay eryvay oungyay: eshay ashay evernay
eenbay aughttay otay inkthay onay erioussay ubjectssay; anday orfay ethay astlay alfhay earyay,
aynay, orfay aay elvemonthtway, eshay ashay eenbay ivengay upay otay othingnay utbay amusementay
anday anityvay. Eshay ashay eenbay alloweday otay isposeday ofay erhay imetay inay ethay ostmay idleay
anday ivolousfray annermay, anday otay adoptay anyay opinionsay atthay amecay inay erhay ayway.
Incesay ethay ire----shay ereway irstfay uarteredqay inay Erytonmay, othingnay utbay ovelay,
irtationflay, anday officersay, avehay eenbay inay erhay eadhay. Eshay ashay eenbay oingday
everythingay inay erhay owerpay, byay inkingthay anday alkingtay onay ethay ubjectsay, otay ivegay
eater--whatgray allshay Iay allcay it?--susceptibilityay otay erhay eelingsfay; ichwhay
areay aturallynay ivelylay enoughay. Anday eway allay owknay atthay Ickhamway ashay everyay
armchay ofay ersonpay anday addressay atthay ancay aptivatecay aay omanway.”

uT“bay ouyay eesay atthay Anejay,” aidsay erhay auntay, oes“day otnay inkthay osay illay ofay
Ickhamway, asay otay elievebay imhay apablecay ofay ethay attemptay.”

oF“ay omwhay oesday Anejay everay inkthay illay? Anday owhay isay erethay, ateverwhay ightmay ebay
eirthay ormerfay onductcay, atthay eshay ouldway elievebay apablecay ofay uchsay anay attemptay,
illtay itay ereway ovedpray againstay emthay? Utbay Anejay owsknay, asay ellway asay Iay oday, atwhay
Ickhamway eallyray isay. Eway othbay owknay atthay ehay ashay eenbay ofligatepray inay everyay
ensesay ofay ethay ordway; atthay ehay ashay eithernay integrityay ornay onourhay; atthay ehay isay
asay alsefay anday eceitfulday asay ehay isay insinuatingay.”

aNd“ay oday ouyay eallyray owknay allay isthay?” iedcray mrsay. Ardinergay, osewhay uriositycay
asay otay ethay odemay ofay erhay intelligenceay asway allay aliveay.

i“ay oday, indeeday,” epliedray Elizabethay, olouringcay. i“ay oldtay ouyay ethay otheray ayday
ofay ishay infamousay ehaviourbay otay mray. Arcyday; anday ouyay, ourselfyay, enwhay astlay atay
Ongbournlay, eardhay inay atwhay annermay ehay okespay ofay ethay anmay owhay adhay ehavedbay ithway
uchsay orbearancefay anday iberalitylay owardstay imhay. Anday erethay areay otheray
ircumstancescay ichwhay Iay amay otnay atay iberty--whichlay itay isay otnay orthway ilewhay otay
elateray; utbay ishay ieslay aboutay ethay olewhay Emberleypay amilyfay areay endlessay. Omfray
atwhay ehay aidsay ofay Issmay Arcyday, Iay asway oroughlythay eparedpray otay eesay aay oudpray,
eservedray, isagreeableday irlgay. Etyay ehay ewknay otay ethay ontrarycay imselfhay. Ehay
ustmay owknay atthay eshay asway asay amiableay anday unpretendingay asay eway avehay oundfay
erhay.”

uT“bay oesday Ialyday owknay othingnay ofay isthay? ancay eshay ebay ignorantay ofay atwhay ouyay
anday Anejay eemsay osay ellway otay understanday?”

oH“ay, es!--thatyay, atthay isay ethay orstway ofay allay. Illtay Iay asway inay Entkay, anday awsay
osay uchmay othbay ofay mray. Arcyday anday ishay elationray Olonelcay Itzwilliamfay, Iay asway
ignorantay ofay ethay uthtray elfmysay. Anday enwhay Iay eturnedray omehay ethay ire----shay
asway otay eavelay Erytonmay inay aay eekway oray ortnight’sfay imetay. Asay atthay asway ethay
asecay, eithernay Anejay, otay omwhay Iay elatedray ethay olewhay, ornay Iay, oughtthay itay
ecessarynay otay akemay ouray owledgeknay ublicpay; orfay ofay atwhay useay ouldcay itay
apparentlyay ebay otay anyoneay, atthay ethay oodgay opinionay, ichwhay allay ethay
eighbourhoodnay adhay ofay imhay, ouldshay enthay ebay overthrownay? Anday evenay enwhay itay
asway ettledsay atthay Ialyday ouldshay ogay ithway mrsay. Orsterfay, ethay ecessitynay ofay
openingay erhay eyesay otay ishay aracterchay evernay occurreday otay emay. Atthay e_shay_ ouldcay
ebay inay anyay angerday omfray ethay eceptionday evernay entereday myay eadhay. Atthay uchsay aay
onsequencecay asay is_thay_ ouldshay ensueay, ouyay aymay easilyay elievebay asway arfay
enoughay omfray myay oughtsthay.”

eN“whay eythay allay emovedray otay Ightonbray, ereforethay, ouyay adhay onay easonray, Iay
upposesay, otay elievebay emthay ondfay ofay eachay otheray?”

oT“nay ethay ightestslay. Iay ancay ememberray onay omsymptay ofay affectionay onay eitheray
idesay; anday adhay anythingay ofay ethay indkay eenbay erceptiblepay, ouyay ustmay ebay awareay
atthay oursay isay otnay aay amilyfay onay ichwhay itay ouldcay ebay ownthray awayay. Enwhay irstfay
ehay entereday ethay orpscay, eshay asway eadyray enoughay otay admireay imhay; utbay osay eway allay
ereway. Everyay irlgay inay oray earnay Erytonmay asway outay ofay erhay ensessay aboutay imhay orfay
ethay irstfay otway onthsmay: utbay ehay evernay istinguishedday er_hay_ byay anyay articularpay
attentionay; anday, onsequentlycay, afteray aay oderatemay eriodpay ofay extravagantay anday
ildway admirationay, erhay ancyfay orfay imhay avegay ayway, anday othersay ofay ethay egimentray,
owhay eatedtray erhay ithway oremay istinctionday, againay ecamebay erhay avouritesfay.”

Itay aymay ebay easilyay elievedbay, atthay oweverhay ittlelay ofay oveltynay ouldcay ebay addeday
otay eirthay earsfay, opeshay, anday onjecturescay, onay isthay interestingay ubjectsay byay
itsay epeatedray iscussionday, onay otheray ouldcay etainday emthay omfray itay onglay, uringday
ethay olewhay ofay ethay ourneyjay. Omfray Elizabeth’say oughtsthay itay asway evernay absentay.
Ixedfay erethay byay ethay eenestkay ofay allay anguishay, elf-reproachsay, eshay ouldcay
indfay onay intervalay ofay easeay oray orgetfulnessfay.

Eythay avelledtray asay expeditiouslyay asay ossiblepay; anday eepingslay oneay ightnay onay
ethay oadray, eachedray Ongbournlay byay innertimeday ethay extnay ayday. Itay asway aay omfortcay
otay Elizabethay otay onsidercay atthay Anejay ouldcay otnay avehay eenbay eariedway byay onglay
expectationsay.

Ethay ittlelay Ardinersgay, attracteday byay ethay ightsay ofay aay aisechay, ereway andingstay
onay ethay epsstay ofay ethay ousehay, asay eythay entereday ethay addockpay; anday enwhay ethay
arriagecay ovedray upay otay ethay oorday, ethay oyfuljay urprisesay atthay ightedlay upay eirthay
acesfay anday isplayedday itselfay overay eirthay olewhay odiesbay, inay aay arietyvay ofay
aperscay anday isksfray, asway ethay irstfay easingplay earnestay ofay eirthay elcomeway.

Elizabethay umpedjay outay; anday afteray ivinggay eachay ofay emthay aay astyhay isskay,
urriedhay intoay ethay estibulevay, erewhay Anejay, owhay amecay unningray ownstairsday omfray
erhay other’smay apartmentay, immediatelyay etmay erhay.

Elizabethay, asay eshay affectionatelyay embraceday erhay, ilstwhay earstay illedfay ethay
eyesay ofay othbay, ostlay otnay aay omentmay inay askingay etherwhay anythingay adhay eenbay
eardhay ofay ethay ugitivesfay.

oT“nay etyay,” epliedray Anejay. uT“bay ownay atthay myay earday uncleay isay omecay, Iay opehay
everythingay illway ebay ellway.”

iS“ay myay atherfay inay owntay?”

eS“yay, ehay entway onay Uesdaytay, asay Iay otewray ouyay ordway.”

aNd“ay avehay ouyay eardhay omfray imhay oftenay?”

e“way avehay eardhay onlyay onceay. Ehay otewray emay aay ewfay ineslay onay Ednesdayway, otay aysay
atthay ehay adhay arriveday inay afetysay, anday otay ivegay emay ishay irectionsday, ichwhay Iay
articularlypay eggedbay imhay otay oday. Ehay erelymay addeday, atthay ehay ouldshay otnay itewray
againay, illtay ehay adhay omethingsay ofay importanceay otay entionmay.”

aNd“ay myay other--howmay isay eshay? Owhay areay ouyay allay?”

“myay othermay isay olerablytay ellway, Iay usttray; oughthay erhay iritsspay areay eatlygray
akenshay. Eshay isay upstairsay, anday illway avehay eatgray atisfactionsay inay eeingsay ouyay
allay. Eshay oesday otnay etyay eavelay erhay essing-roomdray. Arymay anday Ittykay, ankthay
Eavenhay! areay uiteqay ellway.”

uT“bay ou--howyay areay ouyay?” iedcray Elizabethay. oU“yay ooklay alepay. Owhay uchmay ouyay
ustmay avehay onegay oughthray!”

Erhay istersay, oweverhay, assureday erhay ofay erhay eingbay erfectlypay ellway; anday eirthay
