onversationcay, ichwhay adhay eenbay assingpay ilewhay mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay ereway
engageday ithway eirthay ildrenchay, asway ownay utpay anay enday otay byay ethay approachay ofay
ethay olewhay artypay. Anejay anray otay erhay uncleay anday auntay, anday elcomedway anday
ankedthay emthay othbay, ithway alternateay ilessmay anday earstay.

Enwhay eythay ereway allay inay ethay awing-roomdray, ethay uestionsqay ichwhay Elizabethay
adhay alreadyay askeday ereway ofay oursecay epeatedray byay ethay othersay, anday eythay oonsay
oundfay atthay Anejay adhay onay intelligenceay otay ivegay. Ethay anguinesay opehay ofay oodgay,
oweverhay, ichwhay ethay enevolencebay ofay erhay earthay uggestedsay, adhay otnay etyay
esertedday erhay; eshay illstay expecteday atthay itay ouldway allay enday ellway, anday atthay
everyay orningmay ouldway ingbray omesay etterlay, eitheray omfray Ialyday oray erhay atherfay,
otay explainay eirthay oceedingspray, anday, erhapspay, announceay ethay arriagemay.

mrsay. Ennetbay, otay osewhay apartmentay eythay allay epairedray, afteray aay ewfay inutesmay’
onversationcay ogethertay, eceivedray emthay exactlyay asay ightmay ebay expecteday; ithway
earstay anday amentationslay ofay egretray, invectivesay againstay ethay illainousvay
onductcay ofay Ickhamway, anday omplaintscay ofay erhay ownay ufferingssay anday ill-usageay;
amingblay everybodyay utbay ethay ersonpay otay osewhay ill-judgingay indulgenceay ethay
errorsay ofay erhay aughterday ustmay ebay incipallypray owingay.

iF“ay Iay adhay eenbay ableay,” aidsay eshay, o“tay arrycay myay ointpay inay oinggay otay Ightonbray
ithway allay myay amilyfay, is_thay_ ouldway otnay avehay appenedhay: utbay oorpay earday Ialyday
adhay obodynay otay aketay arecay ofay erhay. whyay idday ethay Orstersfay everay etlay erhay ogay outay
ofay eirthay ightsay? Iay amay uresay erethay asway omesay eatgray eglectnay oray otheray onay eirthay
idesay, orfay eshay isay otnay ethay indkay ofay irlgay otay oday uchsay aay ingthay, ifay eshay adhay
eenbay ellway ookedlay afteray. Iay alwaysay oughtthay eythay ereway eryvay unfitay otay avehay
ethay argechay ofay erhay; utbay Iay asway over-ruleday, asay Iay alwaysay amay. Oorpay, earday
ildchay! Anday ownay ere’shay mray. Ennetbay onegay awayay, anday Iay owknay ehay illway ightfay
Ickhamway, ereverwhay ehay eetsmay imhay, anday enthay ehay illway ebay illedkay, anday atwhay isay
otay ecomebay ofay usay allay? Ethay Ollinsescay illway urntay usay outay, eforebay ehay isay oldcay
inay ishay avegray; anday ifay ouyay areay otnay indkay otay usay, otherbray, Iay oday otnay owknay atwhay
eway allshay oday.”

Eythay allay exclaimeday againstay uchsay errifictay ideasay; anday mray. Ardinergay, afteray
eneralgay assurancesay ofay ishay affectionay orfay erhay anday allay erhay amilyfay, oldtay erhay
atthay ehay eantmay otay ebay inay Ondonlay ethay eryvay extnay ayday, anday ouldway assistay mray.
Ennetbay inay everyay endeavouray orfay ecoveringray Ialyday.

o“day otnay ivegay ayway otay uselessay alarmay,” addeday ehay: ough“thay itay isay ightray otay ebay
eparedpray orfay ethay orstway, erethay isay onay occasionay otay ooklay onay itay asay ertaincay.
Itay isay otnay uiteqay aay eekway incesay eythay eftlay Ightonbray. Inay aay ewfay aysday oremay, eway
aymay aingay omesay ewsnay ofay emthay; anday illtay eway owknay atthay eythay areay otnay arriedmay,
anday avehay onay esignday ofay arryingmay, oday otnay etlay usay ivegay ethay attermay overay asay
ostlay. Asay oonsay asay Iay etgay otay owntay, Iay allshay ogay otay myay otherbray, anday akemay imhay
omecay omehay ithway emay otay Acechurchgray Eetstray, anday enthay eway aymay onsultcay
ogethertay asay otay atwhay isay otay ebay oneday.”

oH“ay, myay earday otherbray,” epliedray mrsay. Ennetbay, at“thay isay exactlyay atwhay Iay
ouldcay ostmay ishway orfay. Anday ownay oday, enwhay ouyay etgay otay owntay, indfay emthay outay,
ereverwhay eythay aymay ebay; anday ifay eythay areay otnay arriedmay alreadyay, ake_may_ emthay
arrymay. Anday asay orfay eddingway othesclay, oday otnay etlay emthay aitway orfay atthay, utbay
elltay Ialyday eshay allshay avehay asay uchmay oneymay asay eshay ooseschay otay uybay emthay,
afteray eythay areay arriedmay. Anday, aboveay allay ingsthay, eepkay mray. Ennetbay omfray
ightingfay. Elltay imhay atwhay aay eadfuldray atestay Iay amay in--thatay Iay amay ightenedfray
outay ofay myay itsway; anday avehay uchsay emblingstray, uchsay utteringsflay allay overay emay,
uchsay asmsspay inay myay idesay, anday ainspay inay myay eadhay, anday uchsay eatingsbay atay myay
earthay, atthay Iay ancay etgay onay estray byay ightnay ornay byay ayday. Anday elltay myay earday
Ialyday otnay otay ivegay anyay irectionsday aboutay erhay othesclay illtay eshay ashay eensay emay,
orfay eshay oesday otnay owknay ichwhay areay ethay estbay arehousesway. Ohay, otherbray, owhay
indkay ouyay areay! Iay owknay ouyay illway ontrivecay itay allay.”

Utbay mray. Ardinergay, oughthay ehay assureday erhay againay ofay ishay earnestay endeavoursay
inay ethay ausecay, ouldcay otnay avoiday ecommendingray oderationmay otay erhay, asay ellway inay
erhay opeshay asay erhay earsfay; anday afteray alkingtay ithway erhay inay isthay annermay illtay
innerday asway onay abletay, eythay eftlay erhay otay entvay allay erhay eelingsfay onay ethay
ousekeeperhay, owhay attendeday inay ethay absenceay ofay erhay aughtersday.

Oughthay erhay otherbray anday istersay ereway ersuadedpay atthay erethay asway onay ealray
occasionay orfay uchsay aay eclusionsay omfray ethay amilyfay, eythay idday otnay attemptay otay
opposeay itay; orfay eythay ewknay atthay eshay adhay otnay udencepray enoughay otay oldhay erhay
onguetay eforebay ethay ervantssay, ilewhay eythay aitedway atay abletay, anday udgedjay itay
etterbay atthay one_ay_ onlyay ofay ethay ouseholdhay, anday ethay oneay omwhay eythay ouldcay
ostmay usttray, ouldshay omprehendcay allay erhay earsfay anday olicitudesay onay ethay
ubjectsay.

Inay ethay ining-roomday eythay ereway oonsay oinedjay byay Arymay anday Ittykay, owhay adhay eenbay
ootay usilybay engageday inay eirthay eparatesay apartmentsay otay akemay eirthay appearanceay
eforebay. Oneay amecay omfray erhay ooksbay, anday ethay otheray omfray erhay oilettetay. Ethay
acesfay ofay othbay, oweverhay, ereway olerablytay almcay; anday onay angechay asway isiblevay
inay eitheray, exceptay atthay ethay osslay ofay erhay avouritefay istersay, oray ethay angeray
ichwhay eshay adhay erselfhay incurreday inay ethay usinessbay, adhay ivengay omethingsay oremay
ofay etfulnessfray anthay usualay otay ethay accentsay ofay Ittykay. Asay orfay Arymay, eshay asway
istressmay enoughay ofay erselfhay otay isperwhay otay Elizabethay, ithway aay ountenancecay
ofay avegray eflectionray, oonsay afteray eythay ereway eatedsay atay abletay,--

iS“thay isay aay ostmay unfortunateay affairay, anday illway obablypray ebay uchmay alkedtay ofay.
Utbay eway ustmay emstay ethay idetay ofay alicemay, anday ourpay intoay ethay oundedway osomsbay ofay
eachay otheray ethay almbay ofay isterlysay onsolationcay.”

Enthay erceivingpay inay Elizabethay onay inclinationay ofay eplyingray, eshay addeday,
uNhappy“ay asay ethay eventay ustmay ebay orfay Ialyday, eway aymay awdray omfray itay isthay usefulay
esson:--thatlay osslay ofay irtuevay inay aay emalefay isay irretrievableay, atthay oneay
alsefay epstay involvesay erhay inay endlessay uinray, atthay erhay eputationray isay onay esslay
ittlebray anthay itay isay eautifulbay, anday atthay eshay annotcay ebay ootay uchmay uardedgay inay
erhay ehaviourbay owardstay ethay undeservingay ofay ethay otheray exsay.”

Elizabethay iftedlay upay erhay eyesay inay amazementay, utbay asway ootay uchmay oppresseday otay
akemay anyay eplyray. Arymay, oweverhay, ontinuedcay otay onsolecay erselfhay ithway uchsay
indkay ofay oralmay extractionsay omfray ethay evilay eforebay emthay.

Inay ethay afternoonay, ethay otway elderay Issmay Ennetsbay ereway ableay otay ebay orfay alfhay anay
ourhay byay emselvesthay; anday Elizabethay instantlyay availeday erselfhay ofay ethay
opportunityay ofay akingmay anyay inquiriesay ichwhay Anejay asway equallyay eageray otay
atisfysay. Afteray oiningjay inay eneralgay amentationslay overay ethay eadfuldray equelsay
ofay isthay eventay, ichwhay Elizabethay onsideredcay asay allay utbay ertaincay, anday Issmay
Ennetbay ouldcay otnay assertay otay ebay ollywhay impossibleay, ethay ormerfay ontinuedcay
ethay ubjectsay byay ayingsay, uT“bay elltay emay allay anday everythingay aboutay itay ichwhay Iay
avehay otnay alreadyay eardhay. Ivegay emay urtherfay articularspay. Atwhay idday Olonelcay
Orsterfay aysay? Adhay eythay onay apprehensionay ofay anythingay eforebay ethay elopementay
ooktay aceplay? Eythay ustmay avehay eensay emthay ogethertay orfay everay.”

oLonel“cay Orsterfay idday ownay atthay ehay adhay oftenay uspectedsay omesay artialitypay,
especiallyay onay Ia’slyday idesay, utbay othingnay otay ivegay imhay anyay alarmay. Iay amay osay
ievedgray orfay imhay. Ishay ehaviourbay asway attentiveay anday indkay otay ethay utmostay. Ehay
as_way_ omingcay otay usay, inay orderay otay assureay usay ofay ishay oncerncay, eforebay ehay adhay
anyay ideaay ofay eirthay otnay eingbay onegay otay Otlandscay: enwhay atthay apprehensionay
irstfay otgay abroaday, itay astenedhay ishay ourneyjay.”

aNd“ay asway Ennyday onvincedcay atthay Ickhamway ouldway otnay arrymay? Idday ehay owknay ofay
eirthay intendingay otay ogay offay? Adhay Olonelcay Orsterfay eensay Ennyday imselfhay?”

eS“yay; utbay enwhay uestionedqay byay im_hay_, Ennyday eniedday owingknay anythingay ofay
eirthay anplay, anday ouldway otnay ivegay ishay ealray opinionay aboutay itay. Ehay idday otnay
epeatray ishay ersuasionpay ofay eirthay otnay arryingmay, anday omfray at_thay_ Iay amay
inclineday otay opehay ehay ightmay avehay eenbay isunderstoodmay eforebay.”

aNd“ay illtay Olonelcay Orsterfay amecay imselfhay, otnay oneay ofay ouyay entertaineday aay
oubtday, Iay upposesay, ofay eirthay eingbay eallyray arriedmay?”

oW“hay asway itay ossiblepay atthay uchsay anay ideaay ouldshay enteray ouray ainsbray? Iay eltfay aay
ittlelay uneasy--aay ittlelay earfulfay ofay myay ister’ssay appinesshay ithway imhay inay
arriagemay, ecausebay Iay ewknay atthay ishay onductcay adhay otnay eenbay alwaysay uiteqay
ightray. myay atherfay anday othermay ewknay othingnay ofay atthay; eythay onlyay eltfay owhay
imprudentay aay atchmay itay ustmay ebay. Ittykay enthay owneday, ithway aay eryvay aturalnay
iumphtray onay owingknay oremay anthay ethay estray ofay usay, atthay inay Ia’slyday astlay etterlay
eshay adhay eparedpray erhay orfay uchsay aay epstay. Eshay adhay ownknay, itay eemssay, ofay eirthay
eingbay inay ovelay ithway eachay otheray anymay eeksway.”

uT“bay otnay eforebay eythay entway otay Ightonbray?”

o“nay, Iay elievebay otnay.”

aNd“ay idday Olonelcay Orsterfay appearay otay inkthay illay ofay Ickhamway imselfhay? Oesday ehay
owknay ishay ealray aracterchay?”

i“ay ustmay onfesscay atthay ehay idday otnay eakspay osay ellway ofay Ickhamway asay ehay ormerlyfay
idday. Ehay elievedbay imhay otay ebay imprudentay anday extravagantay; anday incesay isthay adsay
affairay ashay akentay aceplay, itay isay aidsay atthay ehay eftlay Erytonmay eatlygray inay ebtday:
utbay Iay opehay isthay aymay ebay alsefay.”

oH“ay, Anejay, adhay eway eenbay esslay ecretsay, adhay eway oldtay atwhay eway ewknay ofay imhay,
isthay ouldcay otnay avehay appenedhay!”

eRhaps“pay itay ouldway avehay eenbay etterbay,” epliedray erhay istersay.

uT“bay otay exposeay ethay ormerfay aultsfay ofay anyay ersonpay, ithoutway owingknay atwhay
eirthay esentpray eelingsfay ereway, eemedsay unjustifiableay.”

e“way acteday ithway ethay estbay intentionsay.”

oUld“cay Olonelcay Orsterfay epeatray ethay articularspay ofay Ia’slyday otenay otay ishay
ifeway?”

e“hay oughtbray itay ithway imhay orfay usay otay eesay.”

Anejay enthay ooktay itay omfray erhay ocket-bookpay, anday avegay itay otay Elizabethay. Esethay
ereway ethay ontentscay:--

ay/* INDnay “myay earday Arriethay, ay*/

oU“yay illway aughlay enwhay ouyay owknay erewhay Iay amay onegay, anday Iay annotcay elphay
aughinglay elfmysay atay ouryay urprisesay o-morrowtay orningmay, asay oonsay asay Iay amay
issedmay. Iay amay oinggay otay Etnagray Eengray, anday ifay ouyay annotcay uessgay ithway
owhay, Iay allshay inkthay ouyay aay impletonsay, orfay erethay isay utbay oneay anmay inay ethay
orldway Iay ovelay, anday ehay isay anay angelay. Iay ouldshay evernay ebay appyhay ithoutway
imhay, osay inkthay itay onay armhay otay ebay offay. Ouyay eednay otnay endsay emthay ordway atay
Ongbournlay ofay myay oinggay, ifay ouyay oday otnay ikelay itay, orfay itay illway akemay ethay
urprisesay ethay eatergray enwhay Iay itewray otay emthay, anday ignsay myay amenay Ialyday
Ickhamway. Atwhay aay oodgay okejay itay illway ebay! Iay ancay ardlyhay itewray orfay
aughinglay. Aypray akemay myay excusesay otay Attpray orfay otnay eepingkay myay
engagementay, anday ancingday ithway imhay o-nighttay. Elltay imhay Iay opehay ehay illway
excuseay emay enwhay ehay owsknay allay, anday elltay imhay Iay illway anceday ithway imhay atay
ethay extnay allbay eway eetmay ithway eatgray easureplay. Iay allshay endsay orfay myay
othesclay enwhay Iay etgay otay Ongbournlay; utbay Iay ishway ouyay ouldway elltay Allysay otay
endmay aay eatgray itslay inay myay orkedway uslinmay owngay eforebay eythay areay ackedpay
upay. Ood-byegay. Ivegay myay ovelay otay Olonelcay Orsterfay. Iay opehay ouyay illway
inkdray otay ouray oodgay ourneyjay.

oUr“yay affectionateay iendfray,

iA“lyday ENNETbay.”


oH“ay, oughtlessthay, oughtlessthay Ialyday!” iedcray Elizabethay enwhay eshay adhay
inishedfay itay. aT“whay aay etterlay isay isthay, otay ebay ittenwray atay uchsay aay omentmay! Utbay
atay eastlay itay owsshay atthay e_shay_ asway erioussay inay ethay objectay ofay erhay ourneyjay.
Ateverwhay ehay ightmay afterwardsay ersuadepay erhay otay, itay asway otnay onay erhay idesay aay
eme_schay_ ofay infamyay. myay oorpay atherfay! owhay ehay ustmay avehay eltfay itay!”

i“ay evernay awsay anyoneay osay ockedshay. Ehay ouldcay otnay eakspay aay ordway orfay ullfay entay
inutesmay. myay othermay asway akentay illay immediatelyay, anday ethay olewhay ousehay inay
uchsay onfusioncay!”

oH“ay, Anejay,” iedcray Elizabethay, as“way erethay aay ervantsay elongingbay otay itay owhay
idday otnay owknay ethay olewhay orystay eforebay ethay enday ofay ethay ayday?”

i“ay oday otnay owknay: Iay opehay erethay asway. Utbay otay ebay uardedgay atay uchsay aay imetay isay
eryvay ifficultday. myay othermay asway inay ericshystay; anday oughthay Iay endeavoureday otay
ivegay erhay everyay assistanceay inay myay owerpay, Iay amay afraiday Iay idday otnay oday osay uchmay
asay Iay ightmay avehay oneday. Utbay ethay orrorhay ofay atwhay ightmay ossiblypay appenhay
almostay ooktay omfray emay myay acultiesfay.”

oUr“yay attendanceay uponay erhay ashay eenbay ootay uchmay orfay ouyay. Ouyay oday otnay ooklay
ellway. Ohay atthay Iay adhay eenbay ithway ouyay! ouyay avehay adhay everyay arecay anday anxietyay
uponay ourselfyay aloneay.”

aRy“may anday Ittykay avehay eenbay eryvay indkay, anday ouldway avehay aredshay inay everyay
atiguefay, Iay amay uresay, utbay Iay idday otnay inkthay itay ightray orfay eitheray ofay emthay.
Ittykay isay ightslay anday elicateday, anday Arymay udiesstay osay uchmay atthay erhay ourshay ofay
eposeray ouldshay otnay ebay okenbray inay onay. myay auntay Ilipsphay amecay otay Ongbournlay onay
Uesdaytay, afteray myay atherfay entway awayay; anday asway osay oodgay asay otay aystay illtay
Ursdaythay ithway emay. Eshay asway ofay eatgray useay anday omfortcay otay usay allay, anday Adylay
Ucaslay ashay eenbay eryvay indkay: eshay alkedway erehay onay Ednesdayway orningmay otay
ondolecay ithway usay, anday offereday erhay ervicessay, oray anyay ofay erhay aughtersday, ifay
eythay ouldcay ebay ofay useay otay usay.”

e“shay adhay etterbay avehay ayedstay atay omehay,” iedcray Elizabethay: erhaps“pay eshay
eant_may_ ellway, utbay, underay uchsay aay isfortunemay asay isthay, oneay annotcay eesay ootay
ittlelay ofay one’say eighboursnay. Assistanceay isay impossibleay; ondolencecay,
insufferableay. Etlay emthay iumphtray overay usay atay aay istanceday, anday ebay atisfiedsay.”

Eshay enthay oceededpray otay inquireay intoay ethay easuresmay ichwhay erhay atherfay adhay
intendeday otay ursuepay, ilewhay inay owntay, orfay ethay ecoveryray ofay ishay aughterday.

e“hay eantmay, Iay elievebay,” epliedray Anejay, o“tay ogay otay Epsomay, ethay aceplay erewhay
eythay astlay angedchay orseshay, eesay ethay ostilionspay, anday tryay ifay anythingay ouldcay
ebay ademay outay omfray emthay. Ishay incipalpray objectay ustmay ebay otay iscoverday ethay
umbernay ofay ethay ackneyhay oachcay ichwhay ooktay emthay omfray Aphamclay. Itay adhay omecay
ithway aay arefay omfray Ondonlay; anday asay ehay oughtthay ethay ircumstancecay ofay aay
entlemangay anday ady’slay emovingray omfray oneay arriagecay intoay anotheray ightmay ebay
emarkedray, ehay eantmay otay akemay inquiriesay atay Aphamclay. Ifay ehay ouldcay anyhoway
iscoverday atay atwhay ousehay ethay oachmancay adhay eforebay etsay ownday ishay arefay, ehay
eterminedday otay akemay inquiriesay erethay, anday opedhay itay ightmay otnay ebay impossibleay
otay indfay outay ethay andstay anday umbernay ofay ethay oachcay. Iay oday otnay owknay ofay anyay
otheray esignsday atthay ehay adhay ormedfay; utbay ehay asway inay uchsay aay urryhay otay ebay onegay,
anday ishay iritsspay osay eatlygray iscomposedday, atthay Iay adhay ifficultyday inay indingfay
outay evenay osay uchmay asay isthay.”




iLlustration[ay:

Ethay Ostpay
ay]




APTERchay IIIxlvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay olewhay artypay ereway inay opeshay ofay aay etterlay omfray mray. Ennetbay ethay extnay
orningmay, utbay ethay ostpay amecay inay ithoutway ingingbray aay inglesay inelay omfray imhay.
Ishay amilyfay ewknay imhay otay ebay, onay allay ommoncay occasionsay, aay ostmay egligentnay anday
ilatoryday orrespondentcay; utbay atay uchsay aay imetay eythay adhay opedhay orfay exertionay.
Eythay ereway orcedfay otay oncludecay, atthay ehay adhay onay easingplay intelligenceay otay
endsay; utbay evenay ofay at_thay_ eythay ouldway avehay eenbay adglay otay ebay ertaincay. mray.
Ardinergay adhay aitedway onlyay orfay ethay etterslay eforebay ehay etsay offay.

Enwhay ehay asway onegay, eythay ereway ertaincay atay eastlay ofay eceivingray onstantcay
informationay ofay atwhay asway oinggay onay; anday eirthay uncleay omisedpray, atay artingpay,
otay evailpray onay mray. Ennetbay otay eturnray otay Ongbournlay asay oonsay asay ehay ouldcay, otay
ethay eatgray onsolationcay ofay ishay istersay, owhay onsideredcay itay asay ethay onlyay
ecuritysay orfay erhay usband’shay otnay eingbay illedkay inay aay uelday.

mrsay. Ardinergay anday ethay ildrenchay ereway otay emainray inay Ertfordshirehay aay ewfay
aysday ongerlay, asay ethay ormerfay oughtthay erhay esencepray ightmay ebay erviceablesay otay
erhay iecesnay. Eshay aredshay inay eirthay attendanceay onay mrsay. Ennetbay, anday asway aay
eatgray omfortcay otay emthay inay eirthay ourshay ofay eedomfray. Eirthay otheray auntay alsoay
isitedvay emthay equentlyfray, anday alwaysay, asay eshay aidsay, ithway ethay esignday ofay
eeringchay anday earteninghay emthay up--thoughay, asay eshay evernay amecay ithoutway
eportingray omesay eshfray instanceay ofay Ickham’sway extravaganceay oray irregularityay,
eshay eldomsay entway awayay ithoutway eavinglay emthay oremay ispiritedday anthay eshay oundfay
emthay.

Allay Erytonmay eemedsay ivingstray otay ackenblay ethay anmay owhay, utbay eethray onthsmay
eforebay, adhay eenbay almostay anay angelay ofay ightlay. Ehay asway eclaredday otay ebay inay ebtday
otay everyay adesmantray inay ethay aceplay, anday ishay intriguesay, allay onouredhay ithway
ethay itletay ofay eductionsay, adhay eenbay extendeday intoay everyay adesman’stray amilyfay.
Everybodyay eclaredday atthay ehay asway ethay ickedestway oungyay anmay inay ethay orldway; anday
everybodyay eganbay otay indfay outay atthay eythay adhay alwaysay istrustedday ethay
appearanceay ofay ishay oodnessgay. Elizabethay, oughthay eshay idday otnay editcray aboveay
alfhay ofay atwhay asway aidsay, elievedbay enoughay otay akemay erhay ormerfay assuranceay ofay
erhay ister’ssay uinray illstay oremay ertaincay; anday evenay Anejay, owhay elievedbay illstay
esslay ofay itay, ecamebay almostay opelesshay, oremay especiallyay asay ethay imetay asway ownay
omecay, enwhay, ifay eythay adhay onegay otay Otlandscay, ichwhay eshay adhay evernay eforebay
entirelyay espairedday ofay, eythay ustmay inay allay obabilitypray avehay ainedgay omesay
ewsnay ofay emthay.

mray. Ardinergay eftlay Ongbournlay onay Undaysay; onay Uesdaytay, ishay ifeway eceivedray aay
etterlay omfray imhay: itay oldtay emthay, atthay onay ishay arrivalay ehay adhay immediatelyay
oundfay outay ishay otherbray, anday ersuadedpay imhay otay omecay otay Acechurchgray Eetstray.
Atthay mray. Ennetbay adhay eenbay otay Epsomay anday Aphamclay, eforebay ishay arrivalay, utbay
ithoutway aininggay anyay atisfactorysay informationay; anday atthay ehay asway ownay
eterminedday otay inquireay atay allay ethay incipalpray otelshay inay owntay, asay mray. Ennetbay
oughtthay itay ossiblepay eythay ightmay avehay onegay otay oneay ofay emthay, onay eirthay irstfay
omingcay otay Ondonlay, eforebay eythay ocuredpray odgingslay. mray. Ardinergay imselfhay
idday otnay expectay anyay uccesssay omfray isthay easuremay; utbay asay ishay otherbray asway
eageray inay itay, ehay eantmay otay assistay imhay inay ursuingpay itay. Ehay addeday, atthay mray.
Ennetbay eemedsay ollywhay isinclinedday atay esentpray otay eavelay Ondonlay, anday
omisedpray otay itewray againay eryvay oonsay. Erethay asway alsoay aay ostscriptpay otay isthay
effectay:--

i“ay avehay ittenwray otay Olonelcay Orsterfay otay esireday imhay otay indfay outay, ifay
ossiblepay, omfray omesay ofay ethay oungyay an’smay intimatesay inay ethay egimentray,
etherwhay Ickhamway ashay anyay elationsray oray onnectionscay owhay ouldway ebay ikelylay otay
owknay inay atwhay artpay ofay ethay owntay ehay ashay ownay oncealedcay imselfhay. Ifay erethay
ereway anyoneay atthay oneay ouldcay applyay otay, ithway aay obabilitypray ofay aininggay uchsay
aay ueclay asay atthay, itay ightmay ebay ofay essentialay onsequencecay. Atay esentpray eway avehay
othingnay otay uidegay usay. Olonelcay Orsterfay illway, Iay areday aysay, oday everythingay inay
ishay owerpay otay atisfysay usay onay isthay eadhay. Utbay, onay econdsay oughtsthay, erhapspay
Izzylay ouldcay elltay usay atwhay elationsray ehay ashay ownay ivinglay etterbay anthay anyay
otheray ersonpay.”

Elizabethay asway atay onay osslay otay understanday omfray encewhay isthay eferenceday orfay
erhay authorityay oceededpray; utbay itay asway otnay inay erhay owerpay otay ivegay anyay
informationay ofay osay atisfactorysay aay aturenay asay ethay omplimentcay eservedday.

Eshay adhay evernay eardhay ofay ishay avinghay adhay anyay elationsray, exceptay aay atherfay
anday othermay, othbay ofay omwhay adhay eenbay eadday anymay earsyay. Itay asway ossiblepay,
oweverhay, atthay omesay ofay ishay ompanionscay inay ethay ire----shay ightmay ebay ableay otay
ivegay oremay informationay; anday oughthay eshay asway otnay eryvay anguinesay inay expectingay
itay, ethay applicationay asway aay omethingsay otay ooklay orwardfay otay.

Everyay ayday atay Ongbournlay asway ownay aay ayday ofay anxietyay; utbay ethay ostmay anxiousay
artpay ofay eachay asway enwhay ethay ostpay asway expecteday. Ethay arrivalay ofay etterslay asway
ethay irstfay andgray objectay ofay everyay orning’smay impatienceay. Oughthray etterslay,
ateverwhay ofay oodgay oray adbay asway otay ebay oldtay ouldway ebay ommunicatedcay; anday everyay
ucceedingsay ayday asway expecteday otay ingbray omesay ewsnay ofay importanceay.

Utbay eforebay eythay eardhay againay omfray mray. Ardinergay, aay etterlay arriveday orfay
eirthay atherfay, omfray aay ifferentday uarterqay, omfray mray. Ollinscay; ichwhay, asay Anejay
adhay eceivedray irectionsday otay openay allay atthay amecay orfay imhay inay ishay absenceay,
eshay accordinglyay eadray; anday Elizabethay, owhay ewknay atwhay uriositiescay ishay
etterslay alwaysay ereway, ookedlay overay erhay, anday eadray itay ikewiselay. Itay asway asay
ollowsfay:--

ay/* “myay earday Irsay, ay*/

i“ay eelfay elfmysay alledcay uponay, byay ouray elationshipray, anday myay ituationsay
inay ifelay, otay ondolecay ithway ouyay onay ethay ievousgray afflictionay ouyay areay ownay
ufferingsay underay, ofay ichwhay eway ereway esterdayyay informeday byay aay etterlay
omfray Ertfordshirehay. Ebay assureday, myay earday irsay, atthay mrsay. Ollinscay anday
elfmysay incerelysay athizesympay ithway ouyay, anday allay ouryay espectableray
amilyfay, inay ouryay esentpray istressday, ichwhay ustmay ebay ofay ethay itterestbay
indkay, ecausebay oceedingpray omfray aay ausecay ichwhay onay imetay ancay emoveray. Onay
argumentsay allshay ebay antingway onay myay artpay, atthay ancay alleviateay osay everesay
aay isfortunemay; oray atthay aymay omfortcay ouyay, underay aay ircumstancecay atthay
ustmay ebay, ofay allay othersay, ostmay afflictingay otay aay arent’spay indmay. Ethay
eathday ofay ouryay aughterday ouldway avehay eenbay aay essingblay inay omparisoncay ofay
isthay. Anday itay isay ethay oremay otay ebay amentedlay, ecausebay erethay isay easonray otay
upposesay, asay myay earday Arlottechay informsay emay, atthay isthay icentiousnesslay
ofay ehaviourbay inay ouryay

iLlustration[ay:

o“tay omwhay Iay avehay elatedray ethay affairay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

aughterday ashay oceededpray omfray aay aultyfay egreeday ofay indulgenceay; oughthay,
atay ethay amesay imetay, orfay ethay onsolationcay ofay ourselfyay anday mrsay. Ennetbay,
Iay amay inclineday otay inkthay atthay erhay ownay ispositionday ustmay ebay aturallynay
adbay, oray eshay ouldcay otnay ebay uiltygay ofay uchsay anay enormityay, atay osay earlyay anay
ageay. Owsoeverhay atthay aymay ebay, ouyay areay ievouslygray otay ebay itiedpay; inay
ichwhay opinionay Iay amay otnay onlyay oinedjay byay mrsay. Ollinscay, utbay ikewiselay byay
Adylay Atherinecay anday erhay aughterday, otay omwhay Iay avehay elatedray ethay affairay.
Eythay agreeay ithway emay inay apprehendingay atthay isthay alsefay epstay inay oneay
aughterday illway ebay injuriousay otay ethay ortunesfay ofay allay ethay othersay: orfay
owhay, asay Adylay Atherinecay erselfhay ondescendinglycay ayssay, illway onnectcay
emselvesthay ithway uchsay aay amilyfay? Anday isthay onsiderationcay eadslay emay,
oreovermay, otay eflectray, ithway augmenteday atisfactionsay, onay aay ertaincay
eventay ofay astlay Ovembernay; orfay adhay itay eenbay otherwiseay, Iay ustmay avehay eenbay
involveday inay allay ouryay orrowsay anday isgraceday. Etlay emay adviseay ouyay, enthay,
myay earday irsay, otay onsolecay ourselfyay asay uchmay asay ossiblepay, otay owthray offay
ouryay unworthyay ildchay omfray ouryay affectionay orfay everay, anday eavelay erhay otay
eapray ethay uitsfray ofay erhay ownay einoushay offenceay.

i“ay amay, earday irsay,” etcay., etcay.

mray. Ardinergay idday otnay itewray againay, illtay ehay adhay eceivedray anay answeray omfray
Olonelcay Orsterfay; anday enthay ehay adhay othingnay ofay aay easantplay aturenay otay endsay.
Itay asway otnay ownknay atthay Ickhamway adhay aay inglesay elationray ithway omwhay ehay eptkay upay
anyay onnectioncay, anday itay asway ertaincay atthay ehay adhay onay earnay oneay ivinglay. Ishay
ormerfay acquaintanceay adhay eenbay umerousnay; utbay incesay ehay adhay eenbay inay ethay
ilitiamay, itay idday otnay appearay atthay ehay asway onay ermstay ofay articularpay iendshipfray
ithway anyay ofay emthay. Erethay asway onay oneay, ereforethay, owhay ouldcay ebay ointedpay outay
asay ikelylay otay ivegay anyay ewsnay ofay imhay. Anday inay ethay etchedwray atestay ofay ishay ownay
inancesfay, erethay asway aay eryvay owerfulpay otivemay orfay ecrecysay, inay additionay otay
ishay earfay ofay iscoveryday byay Ia’slyday elationsray; orfay itay adhay ustjay anspiredtray
atthay ehay adhay eftlay aminggay ebtsday ehindbay imhay otay aay eryvay onsiderablecay amountay.
Olonelcay Orsterfay elievedbay atthay oremay anthay aay ousandthay oundspay ouldway ebay
ecessarynay otay earclay ishay expensesay atay Ightonbray. Ehay oweday aay oodgay ealday inay ethay
owntay, utbay ishay ebtsday ofay onourhay ereway illstay oremay ormidablefay. mray. Ardinergay
idday otnay attemptay otay oncealcay esethay articularspay omfray ethay Ongbournlay amilyfay;
Anejay eardhay emthay ithway orrorhay. a“ay amestergay!” eshay iedcray. iS“thay isay ollywhay
unexpecteday; Iay adhay otnay anay ideaay ofay itay.”

mray. Ardinergay addeday, inay ishay etterlay, atthay eythay ightmay expectay otay eesay eirthay
atherfay atay omehay onay ethay ollowingfay ayday, ichwhay asway Aturdaysay. Enderedray
iritlessspay byay ethay illay uccesssay ofay allay eirthay endeavoursay, ehay adhay ieldedyay otay
ishay other-in-law’sbray entreatyay atthay ehay ouldway eturnray otay ishay amilyfay anday
eavelay itay otay imhay otay oday ateverwhay occasionay ightmay uggestsay otay ebay advisableay
orfay ontinuingcay eirthay ursuitpay. Enwhay mrsay. Ennetbay asway oldtay ofay isthay, eshay idday
otnay expressay osay uchmay atisfactionsay asay erhay ildrenchay expecteday, onsideringcay
atwhay erhay anxietyay orfay ishay ifelay adhay eenbay eforebay.

aT“whay! isay ehay omingcay omehay, anday ithoutway oorpay Ialyday?” eshay iedcray. uRe“say ehay
illway otnay eavelay Ondonlay eforebay ehay ashay oundfay emthay. Owhay isay otay ightfay Ickhamway,
anday akemay imhay arrymay erhay, ifay ehay omescay awayay?”

Asay mrsay. Ardinergay eganbay otay ishway otay ebay atay omehay, itay asway ettledsay atthay eshay
anday erhay ildrenchay ouldshay ogay otay Ondonlay atay ethay amesay imetay atthay mray. Ennetbay
amecay omfray itay. Ethay oachcay, ereforethay, ooktay emthay ethay irstfay agestay ofay eirthay
ourneyjay, anday oughtbray itsay astermay ackbay otay Ongbournlay.

mrsay. Ardinergay entway awayay inay allay ethay erplexitypay aboutay Elizabethay anday erhay
Erbyshireday iendfray, atthay adhay attendeday erhay omfray atthay artpay ofay ethay orldway.
Ishay amenay adhay evernay eenbay oluntarilyvay entionedmay eforebay emthay byay erhay iecenay;
anday ethay indkay ofay alf-expectationhay ichwhay mrsay. Ardinergay adhay ormedfay, ofay
eirthay eingbay ollowedfay byay aay etterlay omfray imhay, adhay endeday inay othingnay.
Elizabethay adhay eceivedray onenay incesay erhay eturnray, atthay ouldcay omecay omfray
Emberleypay.

Ethay esentpray unhappyay atestay ofay ethay amilyfay enderedray anyay otheray excuseay orfay
ethay ownesslay ofay erhay iritsspay unnecessaryay; othingnay, ereforethay, ouldcay ebay
airlyfay onjecturedcay omfray at_,--though_thay Elizabethay, owhay asway byay isthay imetay
olerablytay ellway acquainteday ithway erhay ownay eelingsfay, asway erfectlypay awareay
atthay, adhay eshay ownknay othingnay ofay Arcyday, eshay ouldcay avehay ornebay ethay eaddray ofay
Ia’slyday infamyay omewhatsay etterbay. Itay ouldway avehay aredspay erhay, eshay oughtthay,
oneay eeplessslay ightnay outay ofay otway.

Enwhay mray. Ennetbay arriveday, ehay adhay allay ethay appearanceay ofay ishay usualay
ilosophicphay omposurecay. Ehay aidsay asay ittlelay asay ehay adhay everay eenbay inay ethay
abithay ofay ayingsay; ademay onay entionmay ofay ethay usinessbay atthay adhay akentay imhay
awayay; anday itay asway omesay imetay eforebay ishay aughtersday adhay ouragecay otay eakspay ofay
itay.

Itay asway otnay illtay ethay afternoonay, enwhay ehay oinedjay emthay atay eatay, atthay
Elizabethay enturedvay otay introduceay ethay ubjectsay; anday enthay, onay erhay ieflybray
expressingay erhay orrowsay orfay atwhay ehay ustmay avehay endureday, ehay epliedray, aY“say
othingnay ofay atthay. Owhay ouldshay uffersay utbay elfmysay? Itay ashay eenbay myay ownay oingday,
anday Iay oughtay otay eelfay itay.”

oU“yay ustmay otnay ebay ootay everesay uponay ourselfyay,” epliedray Elizabethay.

oU“yay aymay ellway arnway emay againstay uchsay anay evilay. Umanhay aturenay isay osay onepray otay
allfay intoay itay! Onay, Izzylay, etlay emay onceay inay myay ifelay eelfay owhay uchmay Iay avehay
eenbay otay ameblay. Iay amay otnay afraiday ofay eingbay overpowereday byay ethay impressionay.
Itay illway asspay awayay oonsay enoughay.”

o“day ouyay upposesay emthay otay ebay inay Ondonlay?”

eS“yay; erewhay elseay ancay eythay ebay osay ellway oncealedcay?”

aNd“ay Ialyday useday otay antway otay ogay otay Ondonlay,” addeday Ittykay.

e“shay isay appyhay, enthay,” aidsay erhay atherfay, ilydray; and“ay erhay esidenceray erethay
illway obablypray ebay ofay omesay urationday.”

Enthay, afteray aay ortshay ilencesay, ehay ontinuedcay, iZzy“lay, Iay earbay ouyay onay
ill-willay orfay eingbay ustifiedjay inay ouryay adviceay otay emay astlay Aymay, ichwhay,
onsideringcay ethay eventay, owsshay omesay eatnessgray ofay indmay.”

Eythay ereway interrupteday byay Issmay Ennetbay, owhay amecay otay etchfay erhay other’smay
eatay.

iS“thay isay aay aradepay,” iedcray ehay, ich“whay oesday oneay oodgay; itay ivesgay uchsay anay
eleganceay otay isfortunemay! Anotheray ayday Iay illway oday ethay amesay; Iay illway itsay inay myay
ibrarylay, inay myay ightcapnay anday owderingpay owngay, anday ivegay asay uchmay oubletray asay
Iay an,--orcay erhapspay Iay aymay eferday itay illtay Ittykay unsray awayay.”

i“ay amay otnay oinggay otay unray awayay, apapay,” aidsay Ittykay, etfullyfray. iF“ay i_ay_
ouldshay everay ogay otay Ightonbray, Iay ouldway ehavebay etterbay anthay Ialyday.”

ou“_yay_ ogay otay Ightonbray! Iay ouldway otnay usttray ouyay osay earnay itay asay Eastbourneay,
orfay iftyfay oundspay! Onay, Ittykay, Iay avehay atay eastlay earntlay otay ebay autiouscay, anday
ouyay illway eelfay ethay effectsay ofay itay. Onay officeray isay everay otay enteray myay ousehay
againay, ornay evenay otay asspay oughthray ethay illagevay. Allsbay illway ebay absolutelyay
ohibitedpray, unlessay ouyay andstay upay ithway oneay ofay ouryay isterssay. Anday ouyay areay
evernay otay irstay outay ofay oorsday, illtay ouyay ancay ovepray atthay ouyay avehay entspay entay
inutesmay ofay everyay ayday inay aay ationalray annermay.”

Ittykay, owhay ooktay allay esethay eatsthray inay aay erioussay ightlay, eganbay otay cryay.

eLl“way, ellway,” aidsay ehay, o“day otnay akemay ourselfyay unhappyay. Ifay ouyay areay aay oodgay
irlgay orfay ethay extnay entay earsyay, Iay illway aketay ouyay otay aay eviewray atay ethay enday ofay
emthay.”




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay IXxlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Otway aysday afteray mray. Ennet’sbay eturnray, asay Anejay anday Elizabethay ereway alkingway
ogethertay inay ethay ubberyshray ehindbay ethay ousehay, eythay awsay ethay ousekeeperhay
omingcay owardstay emthay, anday oncludingcay atthay eshay amecay otay allcay emthay otay eirthay
othermay, entway orwardfay otay eetmay erhay; utbay insteaday ofay ethay expecteday ummonssay,
enwhay eythay approacheday erhay, eshay aidsay otay Issmay Ennetbay, i“ay egbay ouryay ardonpay,
adammay, orfay interruptingay ouyay, utbay Iay asway inay opeshay ouyay ightmay avehay otgay omesay
oodgay ewsnay omfray owntay, osay Iay ooktay ethay ibertylay ofay omingcay otay askay.”

aT“whay oday ouyay eanmay, Illhay? Eway avehay eardhay othingnay omfray owntay.”

eAr“day adammay,” iedcray mrsay. Illhay, inay eatgray astonishmentay, on’t“day ouyay owknay
erethay isay anay expressay omecay orfay astermay omfray mray. Ardinergay? Ehay ashay eenbay erehay
isthay alfhay ourhay, anday astermay ashay adhay aay etterlay.”

Awayay anray ethay irlsgay, ootay eageray otay etgay inay otay avehay imetay orfay eechspay. Eythay
anray oughthray ethay estibulevay intoay ethay eakfast-roombray; omfray encethay otay ethay
ibrary;--theirlay atherfay asway inay eithernay; anday eythay ereway onay ethay ointpay ofay
eekingsay imhay upstairsay ithway eirthay othermay, enwhay eythay ereway etmay byay ethay
utlerbay, owhay aidsay,--

iF“ay ouyay areay ookinglay orfay myay astermay, a’ammay, ehay isay alkingway owardstay ethay
ittlelay opsecay.”

Uponay isthay informationay, eythay instantlyay assedpay oughthray ethay allhay onceay oremay,
anday anray acrossay ethay awnlay afteray eirthay atherfay, owhay asway eliberatelyday
ursuingpay ishay ayway owardstay aay allsmay oodway onay oneay idesay ofay ethay addockpay.

Anejay, owhay asway otnay osay ightlay, ornay osay uchmay inay ethay abithay ofay unningray asay
Elizabethay, oonsay aggedlay ehindbay, ilewhay erhay istersay, antingpay orfay eathbray,
amecay upay ithway imhay, anday eagerlyay iedcray outay,--

oH“ay, apapay, atwhay ewsnay? atwhay ewsnay? avehay ouyay eardhay omfray myay uncleay?”

eS“yay, Iay avehay adhay aay etterlay omfray imhay byay expressay.”

eLl“way, anday atwhay ewsnay oesday itay ing--goodbray oray adbay?”

aT“whay isay erethay ofay oodgay otay ebay expecteday?” aidsay ehay, akingtay ethay etterlay omfray
ishay ocketpay; ut“bay erhapspay ouyay ouldway ikelay otay eadray itay.”

Elizabethay impatientlyay aughtcay itay omfray ishay andhay. Anejay ownay amecay upay.

eAd“ray itay alouday,” aidsay eirthay atherfay, or“fay Iay ardlyhay owknay elfmysay atwhay itay isay
aboutay.”

ay/* IGHTray aCechurch“gray Eetstray, oNday_may, Augustay ay2_. ay*/

“myay earday Otherbray,

aT“ay astlay Iay amay ableay otay endsay ouyay omesay idingstay ofay myay iecenay, anday uchsay
asay, uponay ethay olewhay, Iay opehay illway ivegay ouyay atisfactionsay. Oonsay afteray
ouyay eftlay emay onay Aturdaysay, Iay asway ortunatefay enoughay otay indfay outay inay atwhay
artpay ofay Ondonlay eythay ereway. Ethay articularspay Iay eserveray illtay eway eetmay.
Itay isay enoughay otay owknay eythay areay iscoveredday: Iay avehay eensay emthay
othbay----”

iLlustration[ay:

uT“bay erhapspay ouyay ouldway ikelay otay eadray itay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

eN“thay itay isay asay Iay alwaysay opedhay,” iedcray Anejay: ey“thay areay arriedmay!”

Elizabethay eadray onay: i“ay avehay eensay emthay othbay. Eythay areay otnay arriedmay,
ornay ancay Iay indfay erethay asway anyay intentionay ofay eingbay osay; utbay ifay ouyay areay
illingway otay erformpay ethay engagementsay ichwhay Iay avehay enturedvay otay akemay onay
ouryay idesay, Iay opehay itay illway otnay ebay onglay eforebay eythay areay. Allay atthay isay
equiredray ofay ouyay isay, otay assureay otay ouryay aughterday, byay ettlementsay, erhay
equalay areshay ofay ethay ivefay ousandthay oundspay, ecuredsay amongay ouryay
ildrenchay afteray ethay eceaseday ofay ourselfyay anday myay istersay; anday,
oreovermay, otay enteray intoay anay engagementay ofay allowingay erhay, uringday ouryay
ifelay, oneay undredhay oundspay erpay annumay. Esethay areay onditionscay ichwhay,
onsideringcay everythingay, Iay adhay onay esitationhay inay omplyingcay ithway, asay
arfay asay Iay oughtthay elfmysay ivilegedpray, orfay ouyay. Iay allshay endsay isthay byay
expressay, atthay onay imetay aymay ebay ostlay inay ingingbray emay ouryay answeray. Ouyay
illway easilyay omprehendcay, omfray esethay articularspay, atthay mray. Ickham’sway
ircumstancescay areay otnay osay opelesshay asay eythay areay enerallygay elievedbay otay
ebay. Ethay orldway ashay eenbay eceivedday inay atthay espectray; anday Iay amay appyhay otay
aysay, erethay illway ebay omesay ittlelay oneymay, evenay enwhay allay ishay ebtsday areay
ischargedday, otay ettlesay onay myay iecenay, inay additionay otay erhay ownay ortunefay.
Ifay, asay Iay oncludecay illway ebay ethay asecay, ouyay endsay emay ullfay owerspay otay actay
inay ouryay amenay oughoutthray ethay olewhay ofay isthay usinessbay, Iay illway
immediatelyay ivegay irectionsday otay Aggerstonhay orfay eparingpray aay operpray
ettlementsay. Erethay illway otnay ebay ethay allestsmay occasionay orfay ouryay omingcay
otay owntay againay; ereforethay aystay uietlyqay atay Ongbournlay, anday ependday onay
myay iligenceday anday arecay. Endsay ackbay ouryay answeray asay oonsay asay ouyay ancay,
anday ebay arefulcay otay itewray explicitlyay. Eway avehay udgedjay itay estbay atthay myay
iecenay ouldshay ebay arriedmay omfray isthay ousehay, ofay ichwhay Iay opehay ouyay illway
approveay. Eshay omescay otay usay o-daytay. Iay allshay itewray againay asay oonsay asay
anythingay oremay isay eterminedday onay. Oursyay, etcay.

eDW“ay. ARDINERgay.”

iS“ay itay ossiblepay?” iedcray Elizabethay, enwhay eshay adhay inishedfay. aN“cay itay ebay
ossiblepay atthay ehay illway arrymay erhay?”

iCkham“way isay otnay osay undeservingay, enthay, asay eway avehay oughtthay imhay,” aidsay erhay
istersay. “myay earday atherfay, Iay ongratulatecay ouyay.”

aNd“ay avehay ouyay answereday ethay etterlay?” aidsay Elizabethay.

o“nay; utbay itay ustmay ebay oneday oonsay.”

Ostmay earnestlyay idday eshay enthay entreatay imhay otay oselay onay oremay imetay eforebay ehay
otewray.

oH“ay! myay earday atherfay,” eshay iedcray, ome“cay ackbay anday itewray immediatelyay.
Onsidercay owhay importantay everyay omentmay isay inay uchsay aay asecay.”

eT“lay emay itewray orfay ouyay,” aidsay Anejay, if“ay ouyay islikeday ethay oubletray
ourselfyay.”

i“ay islikeday itay eryvay uchmay,” ehay epliedray; ut“bay itay ustmay ebay oneday.”

Anday osay ayingsay, ehay urnedtay ackbay ithway emthay, anday alkedway owardstay ethay ousehay.

aNd--may“ay Iay askay?” aidsay Elizabethay; ut“bay ethay ermstay, Iay upposesay, ustmay ebay
ompliedcay ithway.”

oMplied“cay ithway! Iay amay onlyay ashameday ofay ishay askingay osay ittlelay.”

aNd“ay eythay ust_may_ arrymay! Etyay ehay isay uch_say_ aay anmay.”

eS“yay, esyay, eythay ustmay arrymay. Erethay isay othingnay elseay otay ebay oneday. Utbay erethay
areay otway ingsthay atthay Iay antway eryvay uchmay otay ow:--oneknay isay, owhay uchmay oneymay
ouryay uncleay ashay aidlay ownday otay ingbray itay aboutay; anday ethay otheray, owhay Iay amay everay
otay aypay imhay.”

oNey“may! myay uncleay!” iedcray Anejay, at“whay oday ouyay eanmay, irsay?”

i“ay eanmay atthay onay anmay inay ishay operpray ensessay ouldway arrymay Ialyday onay osay ightslay
aay emptationtay asay oneay undredhay aay earyay uringday myay ifelay, anday iftyfay afteray Iay amay
onegay.”

aT“thay isay eryvay uetray,” aidsay Elizabethay; ough“thay itay adhay otnay occurreday otay emay
eforebay. Ishay ebtsday otay ebay ischargedday, anday omethingsay illstay otay emainray! Ohay,
itay ustmay ebay myay uncle’say oingsday! Enerousgay, oodgay anmay, Iay amay afraiday ehay ashay
istressedday imselfhay. Aay allsmay umsay ouldcay otnay oday allay isthay.”

o“nay,” aidsay erhay atherfay. iCkham’s“way aay oolfay ifay ehay akestay erhay ithway aay arthingfay
esslay anthay entay ousandthay oundspay: Iay ouldshay ebay orrysay otay inkthay osay illay ofay imhay,
inay ethay eryvay eginningbay ofay ouray elationshipray.”

eN“tay ousandthay oundspay! Eavenhay orbidfay! Owhay isay alfhay uchsay aay umsay otay ebay
epaidray?”

mray. Ennetbay ademay onay answeray; anday eachay ofay emthay, eepday inay oughtthay, ontinuedcay
ilentsay illtay eythay eachedray ethay ousehay. Eirthay atherfay enthay entway otay ethay
ibrarylay otay itewray, anday ethay irlsgay alkedway intoay ethay eakfast-roombray.

aNd“ay eythay areay eallyray otay ebay arriedmay!” iedcray Elizabethay, asay oonsay asay eythay
ereway byay emselvesthay. oW“hay angestray isthay isay! anday orfay is_thay_ eway areay otay ebay
ankfulthay. Atthay eythay ouldshay arrymay, allsmay asay isay eirthay ancechay ofay appinesshay,
anday etchedwray asay isay ishay aracterchay, eway areay orcedfay otay ejoiceray! Ohay, Ialyday!”

i“ay omfortcay elfmysay ithway inkingthay,” epliedray Anejay, at“thay ehay ertainlycay ouldway
otnay arrymay Ialyday, ifay ehay adhay otnay aay ealray egardray orfay erhay. Oughthay ouray indkay
uncleay ashay oneday omethingsay owardstay earingclay imhay, Iay annotcay elievebay atthay entay
ousandthay oundspay, oray anythingay ikelay itay, ashay eenbay advanceday. Ehay ashay ildrenchay
ofay ishay ownay, anday aymay avehay oremay. Owhay ouldcay ehay arespay alfhay entay ousandthay
oundspay?”

iF“ay eway areay everay ableay otay earnlay atwhay Ickham’sway ebtsday avehay eenbay,” aidsay
Elizabethay, and“ay owhay uchmay isay ettledsay onay ishay idesay onay ouray istersay, eway allshay
exactlyay owknay atwhay mray. Ardinergay ashay oneday orfay emthay, ecausebay Ickhamway ashay
otnay ixpencesay ofay ishay ownay. Ethay indnesskay ofay myay uncleay anday auntay ancay evernay ebay
equitedray. Eirthay akingtay erhay omehay, anday affordingay erhay eirthay ersonalpay
otectionpray anday ountenancecay, isay uchsay aay acrificesay otay erhay advantageay asay
earsyay ofay atitudegray annotcay enoughay acknowledgeay. byay isthay imetay eshay isay
actuallyay ithway emthay! Ifay uchsay oodnessgay oesday otnay akemay erhay iserablemay ownay,
eshay illway evernay eserveday otay ebay appyhay! Atwhay aay eetingmay orfay erhay, enwhay eshay
irstfay eessay myay auntay!”

e“way ustmay endeavouray otay orgetfay allay atthay ashay assedpay onay eitheray idesay,” aidsay
Anejay: i“ay opehay anday usttray eythay illway etyay ebay appyhay. Ishay onsentingcay otay arrymay
erhay isay aay oofpray, Iay illway elievebay, atthay ehay isay omecay otay aay ightray ayway ofay
inkingthay. Eirthay utualmay affectionay illway eadystay emthay; anday Iay atterflay elfmysay
eythay illway ettlesay osay uietlyqay, anday ivelay inay osay ationalray aay annermay, asay aymay inay
imetay akemay eirthay astpay imprudenceay orgottenfay.”

eIr“thay onductcay ashay eenbay uchsay,” epliedray Elizabethay, as“ay eithernay ouyay, ornay
Iay, ornay anybodyay, ancay everay orgetfay. Itay isay uselessay otay alktay ofay itay.”

Itay ownay occurreday otay ethay irlsgay atthay eirthay othermay asway inay allay ikelihoodlay
erfectlypay ignorantay ofay atwhay adhay appenedhay. Eythay entway otay ethay ibrarylay,
ereforethay, anday askeday eirthay atherfay etherwhay ehay ouldway otnay ishway emthay otay akemay
itay ownknay otay erhay. Ehay asway itingwray, anday, ithoutway aisingray ishay eadhay, oollycay
epliedray,--

uSt“jay asay ouyay easeplay.”

aY“may eway aketay myay uncle’say etterlay otay eadray otay erhay?”

aKe“tay ateverwhay ouyay ikelay, anday etgay awayay.”

Elizabethay ooktay ethay etterlay omfray ishay iting-tablewray, anday eythay entway upstairsay
ogethertay. Arymay anday Ittykay ereway othbay ithway mrsay. Ennetbay: oneay ommunicationcay
ouldway, ereforethay, oday orfay allay. Afteray aay ightslay eparationpray orfay oodgay ewsnay,
ethay etterlay asway eadray alouday. mrsay. Ennetbay ouldcay ardlyhay ontaincay erselfhay. Asay
oonsay asay Anejay adhay eadray mray. Ardiner’sgay opehay ofay Ia’slyday eingbay oonsay arriedmay,
erhay oyjay urstbay orthfay, anday everyay ollowingfay entencesay addeday otay itsay
exuberanceay. Eshay asway ownay inay anay irritationay asay iolentvay omfray elightday asay eshay
adhay everay eenbay idgetyfay omfray alarmay anday exationvay. Otay owknay atthay erhay aughterday
ouldway ebay arriedmay asway enoughay. Eshay asway isturbedday byay onay earfay orfay erhay
elicityfay, ornay umbledhay byay anyay emembranceray ofay erhay isconductmay.

“myay earday, earday Ialyday!” eshay iedcray: is“thay isay elightfulday indeeday! Eshay illway
ebay arriedmay! Iay allshay eesay erhay againay! Eshay illway ebay arriedmay atay ixteensay! myay
oodgay, indkay otherbray! Iay ewknay owhay itay ouldway e--ibay ewknay ehay ouldway anagemay
everythingay. Owhay Iay onglay otay eesay erhay! anday otay eesay earday Ickhamway ootay! Utbay ethay
othesclay, ethay eddingway othesclay! Iay illway itewray otay myay istersay Ardinergay aboutay
emthay irectlyday. Izzylay, myay earday, unray ownday otay ouryay atherfay, anday askay imhay owhay
uchmay ehay illway ivegay erhay. Aystay, aystay, Iay illway ogay elfmysay. Ingray ethay ellbay,
Ittykay, orfay Illhay. Iay illway utpay onay myay ingsthay inay aay omentmay. myay earday, earday
Ialyday! Owhay errymay eway allshay ebay ogethertay enwhay eway eetmay!”

Erhay eldestay aughterday endeavoureday otay ivegay omesay eliefray otay ethay iolencevay ofay
esethay ansportstray, byay eadinglay erhay oughtsthay otay ethay obligationsay ichwhay mray.
Ardiner’sgay ehaviourbay aidlay emthay allay underay.

oR“fay eway ustmay attributeay isthay appyhay onclusioncay,” eshay addeday, in“ay aay eatgray
easuremay otay ishay indnesskay. Eway areay ersuadedpay atthay ehay ashay edgedplay imselfhay otay
assistay mray. Ickhamway ithway oneymay.”

eLl“way,” iedcray erhay othermay, it“ay isay allay eryvay ightray; owhay ouldshay oday itay utbay
erhay ownay uncleay? Ifay ehay adhay otnay adhay aay amilyfay ofay ishay ownay, Iay anday myay ildrenchay
ustmay avehay adhay allay ishay oneymay, ouyay owknay; anday itay isay ethay irstfay imetay eway avehay
everay adhay anythingay omfray imhay exceptay aay ewfay esentspray. Ellway! Iay amay osay appyhay.
Inay aay ortshay imetay, Iay allshay avehay aay aughterday arriedmay. mrsay. Ickhamway! Owhay ellway
itay oundssay! Anday eshay asway onlyay ixteensay astlay Unejay. myay earday Anejay, Iay amay inay
uchsay aay utterflay, atthay Iay amay uresay Iay an’tcay itewray; osay Iay illway ictateday, anday ouyay
itewray orfay emay. Eway illway ettlesay ithway ouryay atherfay aboutay ethay oneymay
afterwardsay; utbay ethay ingsthay ouldshay ebay ordereday immediatelyay.”

Eshay asway enthay oceedingpray otay allay ethay articularspay ofay alicocay, uslinmay, anday
ambriccay, anday ouldway ortlyshay avehay ictatedday omesay eryvay entifulplay ordersay, adhay
otnay Anejay, oughthay ithway omesay ifficultyday, ersuadedpay erhay otay aitway illtay erhay
atherfay asway atay eisurelay otay ebay onsultedcay. Oneay ay’sday elayday, eshay observeday,
ouldway ebay ofay allsmay importanceay; anday erhay othermay asway ootay appyhay otay ebay uiteqay
osay obstinateay asay usualay. Otheray emesschay, ootay, amecay intoay erhay eadhay.

i“ay illway ogay otay Erytonmay,” aidsay eshay, as“ay oonsay asay Iay amay esseddray, anday elltay ethay
oodgay, oodgay ewsnay otay myay istersay Ilipsphay. Anday asay Iay omecay ackbay, Iay ancay allcay onay
Adylay Ucaslay anday mrsay. Onglay. Ittykay, unray ownday anday orderay ethay arriagecay. Anay
airingay ouldway oday emay aay eatgray ealday ofay oodgay, Iay amay uresay. Irlsgay, ancay Iay oday
anythingay orfay ouyay inay Erytonmay? Ohay! erehay omescay Illhay. myay earday Illhay, avehay ouyay
eardhay ethay oodgay ewsnay? Issmay Ialyday isay oinggay otay ebay arriedmay; anday ouyay allshay
allay avehay aay owlbay ofay unchpay otay akemay errymay atay erhay eddingway.”

mrsay. Illhay eganbay instantlyay otay expressay erhay oyjay. Elizabethay eceivedray erhay
ongratulationscay amongstay ethay estray, anday enthay, icksay ofay isthay ollyfay, ooktay
efugeray inay erhay ownay oomray, atthay eshay ightmay inkthay ithway eedomfray. Oorpay Ia’slyday
ituationsay ustmay, atay estbay, ebay adbay enoughay; utbay atthay itay asway onay orseway, eshay
adhay eednay otay ebay ankfulthay. Eshay eltfay itay osay; anday oughthay, inay ookinglay orwardfay,
eithernay ationalray appinesshay, ornay orldlyway osperitypray ouldcay ebay ustlyjay
expecteday orfay erhay istersay, inay ookinglay ackbay otay atwhay eythay adhay earedfay, onlyay
otway ourshay agoay, eshay eltfay allay ethay advantagesay ofay atwhay eythay adhay ainedgay.




iLlustration[ay:

e“thay itefulspay olday adieslay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay lay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ennetbay adhay eryvay oftenay ishedway, eforebay isthay eriodpay ofay ishay ifelay, atthay,
insteaday ofay endingspay ishay olewhay incomeay, ehay adhay aidlay byay anay annualay umsay, orfay
ethay etterbay ovisionpray ofay ishay ildrenchay, anday ofay ishay ifeway, ifay eshay urvivedsay
imhay. Ehay ownay ishedway itay oremay anthay everay. Adhay ehay oneday ishay utyday inay atthay
espectray, Ialyday eednay otnay avehay eenbay indebteday otay erhay uncleay orfay ateverwhay ofay
onourhay oray editcray ouldcay ownay ebay urchasedpay orfay erhay. Ethay atisfactionsay ofay
evailingpray onay oneay ofay ethay ostmay orthlessway oungyay enmay inay Eatgray Itainbray otay
ebay erhay usbandhay ightmay enthay avehay estedray inay itsay operpray aceplay.

Ehay asway eriouslysay oncernedcay atthay aay ausecay ofay osay ittlelay advantageay otay anyoneay
ouldshay ebay orwardedfay atay ethay olesay expenseay ofay ishay other-in-lawbray; anday ehay
asway eterminedday, ifay ossiblepay, otay indfay outay ethay extentay ofay ishay assistanceay,
anday otay ischargeday ethay obligationay asay oonsay asay ehay ouldcay.

Enwhay irstfay mray. Ennetbay adhay arriedmay, economyay asway eldhay otay ebay erfectlypay
uselessay; orfay, ofay oursecay, eythay ereway otay avehay aay onsay. Isthay onsay asway otay oinjay
inay uttingcay offay ethay entailay, asay oonsay asay ehay ouldshay ebay ofay ageay, anday ethay idowway
anday oungeryay ildrenchay ouldway byay atthay eansmay ebay ovidedpray orfay. Ivefay aughtersday
uccessivelysay entereday ethay orldway, utbay etyay ethay onsay asway otay omecay; anday mrsay.
Ennetbay, orfay anymay earsyay afteray Ia’slyday irthbay, adhay eenbay ertaincay atthay ehay
ouldway. Isthay eventay adhay atay astlay eenbay espairedday ofay, utbay itay asway enthay ootay
atelay otay ebay avingsay. mrsay. Ennetbay adhay onay urntay orfay economyay; anday erhay
usband’shay ovelay ofay independenceay adhay aloneay eventedpray eirthay exceedingay eirthay
incomeay.

Ivefay ousandthay oundspay asway ettledsay byay arriagemay articlesay onay mrsay. Ennetbay anday
ethay ildrenchay. Utbay inay atwhay oportionspray itay ouldshay ebay ividedday amongstay ethay
atterlay ependedday onay ethay illway ofay ethay arentspay. Isthay asway oneay ointpay, ithway
egardray otay Ialyday atay eastlay, ichwhay asway ownay otay ebay ettledsay, anday mray. Ennetbay
ouldcay avehay onay esitationhay inay accedingay otay ethay oposalpray eforebay imhay. Inay
ermstay ofay atefulgray acknowledgmentay orfay ethay indnesskay ofay ishay otherbray, oughthay
expresseday ostmay onciselycay, ehay enthay eliveredday onay aperpay ishay erfectpay
approbationay ofay allay atthay asway oneday, anday ishay illingnessway otay ulfilfay ethay
engagementsay atthay adhay eenbay ademay orfay imhay. Ehay adhay evernay eforebay upposedsay
atthay, ouldcay Ickhamway ebay evailedpray onay otay arrymay ishay aughterday, itay ouldway ebay
oneday ithway osay ittlelay inconvenienceay otay imselfhay asay byay ethay esentpray
arrangementay. Ehay ouldway arcelyscay ebay entay oundspay aay earyay ethay oserlay, byay ethay
undredhay atthay asway otay ebay aidpay emthay; orfay, atwhay ithway erhay oardbay anday ocketpay
allowanceay, anday ethay ontinualcay esentspray inay oneymay ichwhay assedpay otay erhay
oughthray erhay other’smay andshay, Ia’slyday expensesay adhay eenbay eryvay ittlelay ithinway
atthay umsay.

Atthay itay ouldway ebay oneday ithway uchsay iflingtray exertionay onay ishay idesay, ootay, asway
anotheray eryvay elcomeway urprisesay; orfay ishay iefchay ishway atay esentpray asway otay avehay
asay ittlelay oubletray inay ethay usinessbay asay ossiblepay. Enwhay ethay irstfay ansportstray
ofay ageray ichwhay adhay oducedpray ishay activityay inay eekingsay erhay ereway overay, ehay
aturallynay eturnedray otay allay ishay ormerfay indolenceay. Ishay etterlay asway oonsay
espatchedday; orfay oughthay ilatoryday inay undertakingay usinessbay, ehay asway uickqay inay
itsay executionay. Ehay eggedbay otay owknay urtherfay articularspay ofay atwhay ehay asway
indebteday otay ishay otherbray; utbay asway ootay angryay ithway Ialyday otay endsay anyay
essagemay otay erhay.

Ethay oodgay ewsnay uicklyqay eadspray oughthray ethay ousehay; anday ithway oportionatepray
eedspay oughthray ethay eighbourhoodnay. Itay asway ornebay inay ethay atterlay ithway ecentday
ilosophyphay. Otay ebay uresay, itay ouldway avehay eenbay oremay orfay ethay advantageay ofay
onversationcay, adhay Issmay Ialyday Ennetbay omecay uponay ethay owntay; oray, asay ethay
appiesthay alternativeay, eenbay ecludedsay omfray ethay orldway inay omesay istantday
arm-housefay. Utbay erethay asway uchmay otay ebay alkedtay ofay, inay arryingmay erhay; anday ethay
ood-naturedgay ishesway orfay erhay ell-doingway, ichwhay adhay oceededpray eforebay omfray
allay ethay itefulspay olday adieslay inay Erytonmay, ostlay utbay ittlelay ofay eirthay iritspay
inay isthay angechay ofay ircumstancescay, ecausebay ithway uchsay aay usbandhay erhay iserymay
asway onsideredcay ertaincay.

Itay asway aay ortnightfay incesay mrsay. Ennetbay adhay eenbay ownday airsstay, utbay onay isthay
appyhay ayday eshay againay ooktay erhay eatsay atay ethay eadhay ofay erhay abletay, anday inay
iritsspay oppressivelyay ighhay. Onay entimentsay ofay ameshay avegay aay ampday otay erhay
iumphtray. Ethay arriagemay ofay aay aughterday, ichwhay adhay eenbay ethay irstfay objectay ofay
erhay ishesway incesay Anejay asway ixteensay, asway ownay onay ethay ointpay ofay
accomplishmentay, anday erhay oughtsthay anday erhay ordsway anray ollywhay onay osethay
attendantsay ofay elegantay uptialsnay, inefay uslinsmay, ewnay arriagescay, anday
ervantssay. Eshay asway usilybay earchingsay oughthray ethay eighbourhoodnay orfay aay
operpray ituationsay orfay erhay aughterday; anday, ithoutway owingknay oray onsideringcay
atwhay eirthay incomeay ightmay ebay, ejectedray anymay asay eficientday inay izesay anday
importanceay.

aYe“hay Arkpay ightmay oday,” aidsay eshay, if“ay ethay Ouldingsgay ouldway uitqay itay, oray ethay
eatgray ousehay atay Okestay, ifay ethay awing-roomdray ereway argerlay; utbay Ashworthay isay
ootay arfay offay. Iay ouldcay otnay earbay otay avehay erhay entay ilesmay omfray emay; anday asay orfay
Urvispay Odgelay, ethay atticsay areay eadfuldray.”

Erhay usbandhay alloweday erhay otay alktay onay ithoutway interruptionay ilewhay ethay
ervantssay emainedray. Utbay enwhay eythay adhay ithdrawnway, ehay aidsay otay erhay, “mrsay.
Ennetbay, eforebay ouyay aketay anyay, oray allay ofay esethay ouseshay, orfay ouryay onsay anday
aughterday, etlay usay omecay otay aay ightray understandingay. Intoay one_ay_ ousehay inay isthay
eighbourhoodnay eythay allshay evernay avehay admittanceay. Iay illway otnay encourageay ethay
imprudenceay ofay eitheray, byay eceivingray emthay atay Ongbournlay.”

Aay onglay isputeday ollowedfay isthay eclarationday; utbay mray. Ennetbay asway irmfay: itay
oonsay edlay otay anotheray; anday mrsay. Ennetbay oundfay, ithway amazementay anday orrorhay,
atthay erhay usbandhay ouldway otnay advanceay aay uineagay otay uybay othesclay orfay ishay
aughterday. Ehay otestedpray atthay eshay ouldshay eceiveray omfray imhay onay arkmay ofay
affectionay ateverwhay onay ethay occasionay. mrsay. Ennetbay ouldcay ardlyhay omprehendcay
itay. Atthay ishay angeray ouldcay ebay arriedcay otay uchsay aay ointpay ofay inconceivableay
esentmentray asay otay efuseray ishay aughterday aay ivilegepray, ithoutway ichwhay erhay
arriagemay ouldway arcelyscay eemsay alidvay, exceededay allay atthay eshay ouldcay elievebay
ossiblepay. Eshay asway oremay aliveay otay ethay isgraceday, ichwhay erhay antway ofay ewnay
othesclay ustmay eflectray onay erhay aughter’sday uptialsnay, anthay otay anyay ensesay ofay
ameshay atay erhay elopingay anday ivinglay ithway Ickhamway aay ortnightfay eforebay eythay
ooktay aceplay.

Elizabethay asway ownay ostmay eartilyhay orrysay atthay eshay adhay, omfray ethay istressday ofay
ethay omentmay, eenbay edlay otay akemay mray. Arcyday acquainteday ithway eirthay earsfay orfay
erhay istersay; orfay incesay erhay arriagemay ouldway osay ortlyshay ivegay ethay operpray
erminationtay otay ethay elopementay, eythay ightmay opehay otay oncealcay itsay
unfavourableay eginningbay omfray allay osethay owhay ereway otnay immediatelyay onay ethay
otspay.

Eshay adhay onay earfay ofay itsay eadingspray artherfay, oughthray ishay eansmay. Erethay ereway
ewfay eoplepay onay osewhay ecrecysay eshay ouldway avehay oremay onfidentlycay ependedday;
utbay atay ethay amesay imetay erethay asway onay oneay osewhay owledgeknay ofay aay ister’ssay
ailtyfray ouldway avehay ortifiedmay erhay osay uchmay. Otnay, oweverhay, omfray anyay earfay ofay
isadvantageday omfray itay individuallyay otay erselfhay; orfay atay anyay ateray erethay
eemedsay aay ulfgay impassableay etweenbay emthay. Adhay Ia’slyday arriagemay eenbay
oncludedcay onay ethay ostmay onourablehay ermstay, itay asway otnay otay ebay upposedsay atthay
mray. Arcyday ouldway onnectcay imselfhay ithway aay amilyfay, erewhay otay everyay otheray
objectionay ouldway ownay ebay addeday anay allianceay anday elationshipray ofay ethay earestnay
indkay ithway ethay anmay omwhay ehay osay ustlyjay ornedscay.

Omfray uchsay aay onnectioncay eshay ouldcay otnay onderway atthay ehay ouldshay inkshray. Ethay
ishway ofay ocuringpray erhay egardray, ichwhay eshay adhay assureday erselfhay ofay ishay
eelingfay inay Erbyshireday, ouldcay otnay inay ationalray expectationay urvivesay uchsay aay
owblay asay isthay. Eshay asway umbledhay, eshay asway ievedgray; eshay epentedray, oughthay eshay
ardlyhay ewknay ofay atwhay. Eshay ecamebay ealousjay ofay ishay esteemay, enwhay eshay ouldcay onay
ongerlay opehay otay ebay enefitedbay byay itay. Eshay antedway otay earhay ofay imhay, enwhay erethay
eemedsay ethay eastlay ancechay ofay aininggay intelligenceay. Eshay asway onvincedcay atthay
eshay ouldcay avehay eenbay appyhay ithway imhay, enwhay itay asway onay ongerlay ikelylay eythay
ouldshay eetmay.

Atwhay aay iumphtray orfay imhay, asay eshay oftenay oughtthay, ouldcay ehay owknay atthay ethay
oposalspray ichwhay eshay adhay oudlypray urnedspay onlyay ourfay onthsmay agoay ouldway ownay
avehay eenbay adlyglay anday atefullygray eceivedray! Ehay asway asay enerousgay, eshay
oubtedday otnay, asay ethay ostmay enerousgay ofay ishay exsay. Utbay ilewhay ehay asway ortalmay,
erethay ustmay ebay aay iumphtray.

Eshay eganbay ownay otay omprehendcay atthay ehay asway exactlyay ethay anmay owhay, inay
ispositionday anday alentstay, ouldway ostmay uitsay erhay. Ishay understandingay anday
empertay, oughthay unlikeay erhay ownay, ouldway avehay answereday allay erhay ishesway. Itay
asway anay unionay atthay ustmay avehay eenbay otay ethay advantageay ofay othbay: byay erhay easeay
anday ivelinesslay, ishay indmay ightmay avehay eenbay oftenedsay, ishay annersmay improveday;
anday omfray ishay udgmentjay, informationay, anday owledgeknay ofay ethay orldway, eshay ustmay
avehay eceivedray enefitbay ofay eatergray importanceay.

Utbay onay uchsay appyhay arriagemay ouldcay ownay eachtay ethay admiringay ultitudemay atwhay
onnubialcay elicityfay eallyray asway. Anay unionay ofay aay ifferentday endencytay, anday
ecludingpray ethay ossibilitypay ofay ethay otheray, asway oonsay otay ebay ormedfay inay eirthay
amilyfay.

Owhay Ickhamway anday Ialyday ereway otay ebay upportedsay inay olerabletay independenceay eshay
ouldcay otnay imagineay. Utbay owhay ittlelay ofay ermanentpay appinesshay ouldcay elongbay otay
aay ouplecay owhay ereway onlyay oughtbray ogethertay ecausebay eirthay assionspay ereway
ongerstray anthay eirthay irtuevay, eshay ouldcay easilyay onjecturecay.

mray. Ardinergay oonsay otewray againay otay ishay otherbray. Otay mray. Ennet’sbay
acknowledgmentsay ehay ieflybray epliedray, ithway assurancesay ofay ishay eagernessay otay
omotepray ethay elfareway ofay anyay ofay ishay amilyfay; anday oncludedcay ithway entreatiesay
atthay ethay ubjectsay ightmay evernay ebay entionedmay otay imhay againay. Ethay incipalpray
urportpay ofay ishay etterlay asway otay informay emthay, atthay mray. Ickhamway adhay esolvedray
onay uittingqay ethay ilitiamay.

iT“ay asway eatlygray myay ishway atthay ehay ouldshay oday osay,” ehay addeday, as“ay oonsay asay ishay
arriagemay asway ixedfay onay. Anday Iay inkthay ouyay illway agreeay ithway emay, inay
onsideringcay aay emovalray omfray atthay orpscay asay ighlyhay advisableay, othbay onay ishay
accountay anday myay iece’snay. Itay isay mray. Ickham’sway intentionay otay ogay intoay ethay
Egularsray; anday, amongay ishay ormerfay iendsfray, erethay areay illstay omesay owhay areay
ableay anday illingway otay assistay imhay inay ethay armyay. Ehay ashay ethay omisepray ofay anay
ensigncyay inay Eneral----’sgay egimentray, ownay uarteredqay inay ethay orthnay. Itay isay
anay advantageay otay avehay itay osay arfay omfray isthay artpay ofay ethay ingdomkay. Ehay
omisespray airlyfay; anday Iay opehay amongay ifferentday eoplepay, erewhay eythay aymay eachay
avehay aay aracterchay otay eservepray, eythay illway othbay ebay oremay udentpray. Iay avehay
ittenwray otay Olonelcay Orsterfay, otay informay imhay ofay ouray esentpray arrangementsay,
anday otay equestray atthay ehay illway atisfysay ethay ariousvay editorscray ofay mray. Ickhamway
inay anday earnay Ightonbray ithway assurancesay ofay eedyspay aymentpay, orfay ichwhay Iay avehay
edgedplay elfmysay. Anday illway ouyay ivegay ourselfyay ethay oubletray ofay arryingcay
imilarsay assurancesay otay ishay editorscray inay Erytonmay, ofay omwhay Iay allshay ubjoinsay
aay istlay, accordingay otay ishay informationay? Ehay ashay ivengay inay allay ishay ebtsday; Iay
opehay atay eastlay ehay ashay otnay eceivedday usay. Aggerstonhay ashay ouray irectionsday, anday
allay illway ebay ompletedcay inay aay eekway. Eythay illway enthay oinjay ishay egimentray,
unlessay eythay areay irstfay inviteday otay Ongbournlay; anday Iay understanday omfray mrsay.
Ardinergay atthay myay iecenay isay eryvay esirousday ofay eeingsay ouyay allay eforebay eshay
eaveslay ethay outhsay. Eshay isay ellway, anday egsbay otay ebay utifullyday ememberedray otay
ouyay anday erhay other.--yOursmay, etcay.

e“ay. ARDINERgay.”

mray. Ennetbay anday ishay aughtersday awsay allay ethay advantagesay ofay Ickham’sway
emovalray omfray ethay ire----shay, asay earlyclay asay mray. Ardinergay ouldcay oday. Utbay
mrsay. Ennetbay asway otnay osay ellway easedplay ithway itay. Ia’slyday eingbay ettledsay inay
ethay orthnay, ustjay enwhay eshay adhay expecteday ostmay easureplay anday idepray inay erhay
ompanycay, orfay eshay adhay byay onay eansmay ivengay upay erhay anplay ofay eirthay esidingray inay
Ertfordshirehay, asway aay everesay isappointmentday; anday, esidesbay, itay asway uchsay aay
itypay atthay Ialyday ouldshay ebay akentay omfray aay egimentray erewhay eshay asway acquainteday
ithway everybodyay, anday adhay osay anymay avouritesfay.

e“shay isay osay ondfay ofay mrsay. Orsterfay,” aidsay eshay, it“ay illway ebay uiteqay ockingshay
otay endsay erhay awayay! Anday erethay areay everalsay ofay ethay oungyay enmay, ootay, atthay eshay
ikeslay eryvay uchmay. Ethay officersay aymay otnay ebay osay easantplay inay Eneral----’sgay
egimentray.”

Ishay aughter’sday equestray, orfay uchsay itay ightmay ebay onsideredcay, ofay eingbay
admitteday intoay erhay amilyfay againay, eforebay eshay etsay offay orfay ethay orthnay,
eceivedray atay irstfay anay absoluteay egativenay. Utbay Anejay anday Elizabethay, owhay
agreeday inay ishingway, orfay ethay akesay ofay eirthay ister’ssay eelingsfay anday
onsequencecay, atthay eshay ouldshay ebay oticednay onay erhay arriagemay byay erhay arentspay,
urgeday imhay osay earnestlyay, etyay osay ationallyray anday osay ildlymay, otay eceiveray erhay
anday erhay usbandhay atay Ongbournlay, asay oonsay asay eythay ereway arriedmay, atthay ehay asway
evailedpray onay otay inkthay asay eythay oughtthay, anday actay asay eythay ishedway. Anday eirthay
othermay adhay ethay atisfactionsay ofay owingknay, atthay eshay ouldshay ebay ableay otay owshay
erhay arriedmay aughterday inay ethay eighbourhoodnay, eforebay eshay asway anishedbay otay
ethay orthnay. Enwhay mray. Ennetbay otewray againay otay ishay otherbray, ereforethay, ehay
entsay ishay ermissionpay orfay emthay otay omecay; anday itay asway ettledsay, atthay, asay oonsay
asay ethay eremonycay asway overay, eythay ouldshay oceedpray otay Ongbournlay. Elizabethay
asway urprisedsay, oweverhay, atthay Ickhamway ouldshay onsentcay otay uchsay aay emeschay;
anday, adhay eshay onsultedcay onlyay erhay ownay inclinationay, anyay eetingmay ithway imhay
ouldway avehay eenbay ethay astlay objectay ofay erhay ishesway.




iLlustration[ay:

iTh“way anay affectionateay ilesmay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay Ilay.


iLlustration[ay]

Eirthay ister’ssay edding-dayway arriveday; anday Anejay anday Elizabethay eltfay orfay erhay
obablypray oremay anthay eshay eltfay orfay erselfhay. Ethay arriagecay asway entsay otay eetmay
emthay atay----, anday eythay ereway otay eturnray inay itay byay innertimeday. Eirthay arrivalay
asway eadeddray byay ethay elderay Issmay Ennets--andbay Anejay oremay especiallyay, owhay
avegay Ialyday ethay eelingsfay ichwhay ouldway avehay attendeday erselfhay, adhay e_shay_
eenbay ethay ulpritcay, anday asway etchedwray inay ethay oughtthay ofay atwhay erhay istersay
ustmay endureay.

Eythay amecay. Ethay amilyfay ereway assembleday inay ethay eakfast-roombray otay eceiveray
emthay. Ilessmay eckedday ethay acefay ofay mrsay. Ennetbay, asay ethay arriagecay ovedray upay otay
ethay oorday; erhay usbandhay ookedlay impenetrablyay avegray; erhay aughtersday, alarmeday,
anxiousay, uneasyay.

Ia’slyday oicevay asway eardhay inay ethay estibulevay; ethay oorday asway ownthray openay, anday
eshay anray intoay ethay oomray. Erhay othermay eppedstay orwardsfay, embraceday erhay, anday
elcomedway erhay ithway aptureray; avegay erhay andhay ithway anay affectionateay ilesmay otay
Ickhamway, owhay ollowedfay ishay adylay; anday ishedway emthay othbay oyjay, ithway anay
alacrityay ichwhay owedshay onay oubtday ofay eirthay appinesshay.

Eirthay eceptionray omfray mray. Ennetbay, otay omwhay eythay enthay urnedtay, asway otnay uiteqay
osay ordialcay. Ishay ountenancecay atherray ainedgay inay austerityay; anday ehay arcelyscay
openeday ishay ipslay. Ethay easyay assuranceay ofay ethay oungyay ouplecay, indeeday, asway
enoughay otay ovokepray imhay.

Elizabethay asway isgustedday, anday evenay Issmay Ennetbay asway ockedshay. Ialyday asway
Ialyday illstay; untameday, unabasheday, ildway, oisynay, anday earlessfay. Eshay urnedtay
omfray istersay otay istersay, emandingday eirthay ongratulationscay; anday enwhay atay
engthlay eythay allay atsay ownday, ookedlay eagerlyay oundray ethay oomray, ooktay oticenay ofay
omesay ittlelay alterationay inay itay, anday observeday, ithway aay aughlay, atthay itay asway aay
eatgray ilewhay incesay eshay adhay eenbay erethay.

Ickhamway asway otnay atay allay oremay istressedday anthay erselfhay; utbay ishay annersmay
ereway alwaysay osay easingplay, atthay, adhay ishay aracterchay anday ishay arriagemay eenbay
exactlyay atwhay eythay oughtay, ishay ilessmay anday ishay easyay addressay, ilewhay ehay
aimedclay eirthay elationshipray, ouldway avehay elightedday emthay allay. Elizabethay
adhay otnay eforebay elievedbay imhay uiteqay equalay otay uchsay assuranceay; utbay eshay atsay
ownday, esolvingray ithinway erselfhay otay awdray onay imitslay inay uturefay otay ethay
impudenceay ofay anay impudentay anmay. e_shay_ ushedblay, anday Anejay ushedblay; utbay ethay
eekschay ofay ethay otway owhay ausedcay eirthay onfusioncay ufferedsay onay ariationvay ofay
olourcay.

Erethay asway onay antway ofay iscourseday. Ethay idebray anday erhay othermay ouldcay eithernay
ofay emthay alktay astfay enoughay; anday Ickhamway, owhay appenedhay otay itsay earnay
Elizabethay, eganbay inquiringay afteray ishay acquaintanceay inay atthay eighbourhoodnay,
ithway aay ood-humouredgay easeay, ichwhay eshay eltfay eryvay unableay otay equalay inay erhay
epliesray. Eythay eemedsay eachay ofay emthay otay avehay ethay appiesthay emoriesmay inay ethay
orldway. Othingnay ofay ethay astpay asway ecollectedray ithway ainpay; anday Ialyday edlay
oluntarilyvay otay ubjectssay ichwhay erhay isterssay ouldway otnay avehay alludeday otay orfay
ethay orldway.

oNly“ay inkthay ofay itsay eingbay eethray onthsmay,” eshay iedcray, ince“say Iay entway awayay:
itay eemssay utbay aay ortnightfay, Iay eclareday; anday etyay erethay avehay eenbay ingsthay
enoughay appenedhay inay ethay imetay. Oodgay aciousgray! enwhay Iay entway awayay, Iay amay uresay
Iay adhay onay oremay ideaay ofay eingbay arriedmay illtay Iay amecay ackbay againay! oughthay Iay
oughtthay itay ouldway ebay eryvay oodgay unfay ifay Iay asway.”

Erhay atherfay iftedlay upay ishay eyesay, Anejay asway istressedday, Elizabethay ookedlay
expressivelyay atay Ialyday; utbay eshay, owhay evernay eardhay ornay awsay anythingay ofay
ichwhay eshay osechay otay ebay insensibleay, ailygay ontinuedcay,--

oH“ay, ammamay, oday ethay eoplepay ereaboutshay owknay Iay amay arriedmay o-daytay? Iay asway
afraiday eythay ightmay otnay; anday eway overtookay Illiamway Ouldinggay inay ishay urriclecay,
osay Iay asway eterminedday ehay ouldshay owknay itay, anday osay Iay etlay ownday ethay idesay assglay
extnay otay imhay, anday ooktay offay myay oveglay anday etlay myay andhay ustjay estray uponay ethay
indowway amefray, osay atthay ehay ightmay eesay ethay ingray, anday enthay Iay owedbay anday
iledsmay ikelay anythingay.”

Elizabethay ouldcay earbay itay onay ongerlay. Eshay otgay upay anday anray outay ofay ethay oomray;
anday eturnedray onay oremay, illtay eshay eardhay emthay assingpay oughthray ethay allhay otay
ethay ining-parlourday. Eshay enthay oinedjay emthay oonsay enoughay otay eesay Ialyday, ithway
anxiousay aradepay, alkway upay otay erhay other’smay ightray andhay, anday earhay erhay aysay otay
erhay eldestay istersay,--

aH“ay, Anejay, Iay aketay ouryay aceplay ownay, anday ouyay ustmay ogay owerlay, ecausebay Iay amay aay
arriedmay omanway.”

Itay asway otnay otay ebay upposedsay atthay imetay ouldway ivegay Ialyday atthay embarrassmentay
omfray ichwhay eshay adhay eenbay osay ollywhay eefray atay irstfay. Erhay easeay anday oodgay
iritsspay increaseday. Eshay ongedlay otay eesay mrsay. Ilipsphay, ethay Ucaseslay, anday allay
eirthay otheray eighboursnay, anday otay earhay erselfhay alledcay “mrsay. Ickhamway” byay
eachay ofay emthay; anday inay ethay eantimemay eshay entway afteray innerday otay owshay erhay ingray
anday oastbay ofay eingbay arriedmay otay mrsay. Illhay anday ethay otway ousemaidshay.

eLl“way, ammamay,” aidsay eshay, enwhay eythay ereway allay eturnedray otay ethay
eakfast-roombray, and“ay atwhay oday ouyay inkthay ofay myay usbandhay? Isay otnay ehay aay
armingchay anmay? Iay amay uresay myay isterssay ustmay allay envyay emay. Iay onlyay opehay eythay
aymay avehay alfhay myay oodgay ucklay. Eythay ustmay allay ogay otay Ightonbray. Atthay isay ethay
aceplay otay etgay usbandshay. Atwhay aay itypay itay isay, ammamay, eway idday otnay allay ogay!”

eRy“vay uetray; anday ifay Iay adhay myay illway eway ouldshay. Utbay, myay earday Ialyday, Iay on’tday
atay allay ikelay ouryay oinggay uchsay aay ayway offay. Ustmay itay ebay osay?”

oH“ay, Ordlay! esyay; erethay isay othingnay inay atthay. Iay allshay ikelay itay ofay allay ingsthay.
Ouyay anday apapay, anday myay isterssay, ustmay omecay ownday anday eesay usay. Eway allshay ebay atay
Ewcastlenay allay ethay interway, anday Iay areday aysay erethay illway ebay omesay allsbay, anday Iay
illway aketay arecay otay etgay oodgay artnerspay orfay emthay allay.”

i“ay ouldshay ikelay itay eyondbay anythingay!” aidsay erhay othermay.

aNd“ay enthay enwhay ouyay ogay awayay, ouyay aymay eavelay oneay oray otway ofay myay isterssay
ehindbay ouyay; anday Iay areday aysay Iay allshay etgay usbandshay orfay emthay eforebay ethay
interway isay overay.”

i“ay ankthay ouyay orfay myay areshay ofay ethay avourfay,” aidsay Elizabethay; ut“bay Iay oday otnay
articularlypay ikelay ouryay ayway ofay ettinggay usbandshay.”

Eirthay isitorsvay ereway otnay otay emainray aboveay entay aysday ithway emthay. mray. Ickhamway
adhay eceivedray ishay ommissioncay eforebay ehay eftlay Ondonlay, anday ehay asway otay oinjay
ishay egimentray atay ethay enday ofay aay ortnightfay.

Onay oneay utbay mrsay. Ennetbay egrettedray atthay eirthay aystay ouldway ebay osay ortshay; anday
eshay ademay ethay ostmay ofay ethay imetay byay isitingvay aboutay ithway erhay aughterday, anday
avinghay eryvay equentfray artiespay atay omehay. Esethay artiespay ereway acceptableay otay
allay; otay avoiday aay amilyfay irclecay asway evenay oremay esirableday otay uchsay asay idday
inkthay anthay uchsay asay idday otnay.

Ickham’sway affectionay orfay Ialyday asway ustjay atwhay Elizabethay adhay expecteday otay
indfay itay; otnay equalay otay Ia’slyday orfay imhay. Eshay adhay arcelyscay eedednay erhay
esentpray observationay otay ebay atisfiedsay, omfray ethay easonray ofay ingsthay, atthay
eirthay elopementay adhay eenbay oughtbray onay byay ethay engthstray ofay erhay ovelay atherray
anthay byay ishay; anday eshay ouldway avehay onderedway whyay, ithoutway iolentlyvay aringcay
orfay erhay, ehay osechay otay elopeay ithway erhay atay allay, adhay eshay otnay eltfay ertaincay
atthay ishay ightflay asway enderedray ecessarynay byay istressday ofay ircumstancescay; anday
ifay atthay ereway ethay asecay, ehay asway otnay ethay oungyay anmay otay esistray anay opportunityay
ofay avinghay aay ompanioncay.

Ialyday asway exceedinglyay ondfay ofay imhay. Ehay asway erhay earday Ickhamway onay everyay
occasionay; onay oneay asway otay ebay utpay inay ompetitioncay ithway imhay. Ehay idday
everythingay estbay inay ethay orldway; anday eshay asway uresay ehay ouldway illkay oremay irdsbay
onay ethay irstfay ofay Eptembersay anthay anybodyay elseay inay ethay ountrycay.

Oneay orningmay, oonsay afteray eirthay arrivalay, asay eshay asway ittingsay ithway erhay otway
elderay isterssay, eshay aidsay otay Elizabethay,--

iZzy“lay, Iay evernay avegay ou_yay_ anay accountay ofay myay eddingway, Iay elievebay. Ouyay ereway
otnay byay, enwhay Iay oldtay ammamay, anday ethay othersay, allay aboutay itay. Areay otnay ouyay
uriouscay otay earhay owhay itay asway anagedmay?”

o“nay, eallyray,” epliedray Elizabethay; i“ay inkthay erethay annotcay ebay ootay ittlelay
aidsay onay ethay ubjectsay.”

a“lay! Ouyay areay osay angestray! Utbay Iay ustmay elltay ouyay owhay itay entway offay. Eway ereway
arriedmay, ouyay owknay, atay stay. Ement’sclay, ecausebay Ickham’sway odgingslay ereway inay
atthay arishpay. Anday itay asway ettledsay atthay eway ouldshay allay ebay erethay byay elevenay
o’clockay. myay uncleay anday auntay anday Iay ereway otay ogay ogethertay; anday ethay othersay
ereway otay eetmay usay atay ethay urchchay.

eLl“way, Ondaymay orningmay amecay, anday Iay asway inay uchsay aay ussfay! Iay asway osay afraiday,
ouyay owknay, atthay omethingsay ouldway appenhay otay utpay itay offay, anday enthay Iay ouldshay
avehay onegay uiteqay istractedday. Anday erethay asway myay auntay, allay ethay imetay Iay asway
essingdray, eachingpray anday alkingtay awayay ustjay asay ifay eshay asway eadingray aay
