ermonsay. Oweverhay, Iay idday otnay earhay aboveay oneay ordway inay entay, orfay Iay asway
inkingthay, ouyay aymay upposesay, ofay myay earday Ickhamway. Iay ongedlay otay owknay etherwhay
ehay ouldway ebay arriedmay inay ishay ueblay oatcay.

eLl“way, anday osay eway eakfastedbray atay entay asay usualay: Iay oughtthay itay ouldway evernay
ebay overay; orfay, byay ethay ebyay, ouyay areay otay understanday atthay myay uncleay anday auntay
ereway orridhay unpleasantay allay ethay imetay Iay asway ithway emthay. Ifay ou’llyay elievebay
emay, Iay idday otnay onceay utpay myay ootfay outay ofay oorsday, oughthay Iay asway erethay aay
ortnightfay. Otnay oneay artypay, oray emeschay, oray anythingay! Otay ebay uresay, Ondonlay asway
atherray inthay, utbay, oweverhay, ethay Ittlelay Eatrethay asway openay.

eLl“way, anday osay, ustjay asay ethay arriagecay amecay otay ethay oorday, myay uncleay asway
alledcay awayay uponay usinessbay otay atthay orridhay anmay mray. Onestay. Anday enthay, ouyay
owknay, enwhay onceay eythay etgay ogethertay, erethay isay onay enday ofay itay. Ellway, Iay asway osay
ightenedfray Iay idday otnay owknay atwhay otay oday, orfay myay uncleay asway otay ivegay emay awayay;
anday ifay eway ereway eyondbay ethay ourhay eway ouldcay otnay ebay arriedmay allay ayday. Utbay,
uckilylay, ehay amecay ackbay againay inay entay inutesmay’ imetay, anday enthay eway allay etsay
outay. Oweverhay, Iay ecollectedray afterwardsay, atthay ifay ehay ad_hay_ eenbay eventedpray
oinggay, ethay eddingway eednay otnay ebay utpay offay, orfay mray. Arcyday ightmay avehay oneday asay
ellway.”

“mray. Arcyday!” epeatedray Elizabethay, inay utteray amazementay.

oH“ay, esyay! ehay asway otay omecay erethay ithway Ickhamway, ouyay owknay. Utbay, aciousgray emay!
Iay uiteqay orgotfay! Iay oughtay otnay otay avehay aidsay aay ordway aboutay itay. Iay omisedpray
emthay osay aithfullyfay! Atwhay illway Ickhamway aysay? Itay asway otay ebay uchsay aay ecretsay!”

iF“ay itay asway otay ebay aay ecretsay,” aidsay Anejay, ay“say otnay anotheray ordway onay ethay
ubjectsay. Ouyay aymay ependday uponay myay eekingsay onay urtherfay.”

oH“ay, ertainlycay,” aidsay Elizabethay, oughthay urningbay ithway uriositycay; e“way illway
askay ouyay onay uestionsqay.”

aNk“thay ouyay,” aidsay Ialyday; or“fay ifay ouyay idday, Iay ouldshay ertainlycay elltay ouyay
allay, anday enthay Ickhamway ouldway ebay osay angryay.”

Onay uchsay encouragementay otay askay, Elizabethay asway orcedfay otay utpay itay outay ofay erhay
owerpay, byay unningray awayay.

Utbay otay ivelay inay ignoranceay onay uchsay aay ointpay asway impossibleay; oray atay eastlay itay
asway impossibleay otnay otay tryay orfay informationay. mray. Arcyday adhay eenbay atay erhay
ister’ssay eddingway. Itay asway exactlyay aay enescay, anday exactlyay amongay eoplepay,
erewhay ehay adhay apparentlyay eastlay otay oday, anday eastlay emptationtay otay ogay.
Onjecturescay asay otay ethay eaningmay ofay itay, apidray anday ildway, urriedhay intoay erhay
ainbray; utbay eshay asway atisfiedsay ithway onenay. Osethay atthay estbay easedplay erhay, asay
acingplay ishay onductcay inay ethay oblestnay ightlay, eemedsay ostmay improbableay. Eshay
ouldcay otnay earbay uchsay uspensesay; anday astilyhay eizingsay aay eetshay ofay aperpay,
otewray aay ortshay etterlay otay erhay auntay, otay equestray anay explanationay ofay atwhay
Ialyday adhay oppeddray, ifay itay ereway ompatiblecay ithway ethay ecrecysay ichwhay adhay eenbay
intendeday.

oU“yay aymay eadilyray omprehendcay,” eshay addeday, at“whay myay uriositycay ustmay ebay otay
owknay owhay aay ersonpay unconnecteday ithway anyay ofay usay, anday, omparativelycay
eakingspay, aay angerstray otay ouray amilyfay, ouldshay avehay eenbay amongstay ouyay atay uchsay
aay imetay. Aypray itewray instantlyay, anday etlay emay understanday it--unlessay itay isay,
orfay eryvay ogentcay easonsray, otay emainray inay ethay ecrecysay ichwhay Ialyday eemssay otay
inkthay ecessarynay; anday enthay Iay ustmay endeavouray otay ebay atisfiedsay ithway
ignoranceay.”

oT“nay atthay Iay all_shay_, oughthay,” eshay addeday otay erselfhay, anday eshay inishedfay ethay
etterlay; and“ay, myay earday auntay, ifay ouyay oday otnay elltay emay inay anay onourablehay
annermay, Iay allshay ertainlycay ebay educedray otay ickstray anday atagemsstray otay indfay itay
outay.”

Ane’sjay elicateday ensesay ofay onourhay ouldway otnay alloway erhay otay eakspay otay
Elizabethay ivatelypray ofay atwhay Ialyday adhay etlay allfay; Elizabethay asway adglay ofay
it:--tillay itay appeareday etherwhay erhay inquiriesay ouldway eceiveray anyay
atisfactionsay, eshay adhay atherray ebay ithoutway aay onfidantecay.




iLlustration[ay:

i“ay amay uresay eshay idday otnay istenlay.”
ay]




APTERchay IIlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabethay adhay ethay atisfactionsay ofay eceivingray anay answeray otay erhay etterlay asay
oonsay asay eshay ossiblypay ouldcay. Eshay asway onay oonersay inay ossessionpay ofay itay, anthay
urryinghay intoay ethay ittlelay opsecay, erewhay eshay asway eastlay ikelylay otay ebay
interrupteday, eshay atsay ownday onay oneay ofay ethay enchesbay, anday eparedpray otay ebay
appyhay; orfay ethay engthlay ofay ethay etterlay onvincedcay erhay atthay itay idday otnay
ontaincay aay enialday.

ay/* IGHTray aCechurch“gray Eetstray, ePt_say. ay6_. ay*/

“myay earday Iecenay,

i“ay avehay ustjay eceivedray ouryay etterlay, anday allshay evoteday isthay olewhay
orningmay otay answeringay itay, asay Iay oreseefay atthay aay ittle_lay_ itingwray illway
otnay omprisecay atwhay Iay avehay otay elltay ouyay. Iay ustmay onfesscay elfmysay
urprisedsay byay ouryay applicationay; Iay idday otnay expectay itay omfray ou_yay_.
On’tday inkthay emay angryay, oweverhay, orfay Iay onlyay eanmay otay etlay ouyay owknay,
atthay Iay adhay otnay imagineday uchsay inquiriesay otay ebay ecessarynay onay our_yay_
idesay. Ifay ouyay oday otnay oosechay otay understanday emay, orgivefay myay
impertinenceay. Ouryay uncleay isay asay uchmay urprisedsay asay Iay amay; anday othingnay
utbay ethay eliefbay ofay ouryay eingbay aay artypay oncernedcay ouldway avehay alloweday
imhay otay actay asay ehay ashay oneday. Utbay ifay ouyay areay eallyray innocentay anday
ignorantay, Iay ustmay ebay oremay explicitay. Onay ethay eryvay ayday ofay myay omingcay
omehay omfray Ongbournlay, ouryay uncleay adhay aay ostmay unexpecteday isitorvay. mray.
Arcyday alledcay, anday asway utshay upay ithway imhay everalsay ourshay. Itay asway allay
overay eforebay Iay arriveday; osay myay uriositycay asway otnay osay eadfullydray ackedray
asay ours_yay_ eemssay otay avehay eenbay. Ehay amecay otay elltay mray. Ardinergay atthay ehay
adhay oundfay outay erewhay ouryay istersay anday mray. Ickhamway ereway, anday atthay ehay
adhay eensay anday alkedtay ithway emthay oth--wIckhambay epeatedlyray, Ialyday onceay.
Omfray atwhay Iay ancay ollectcay, ehay eftlay Erbyshireday onlyay oneay ayday afteray
ourselvesay, anday amecay otay owntay ithway ethay esolutionray ofay untinghay orfay
emthay. Ethay otivemay ofessedpray asway ishay onvictioncay ofay itsay eingbay owingay otay
imselfhay atthay Ickham’sway orthlessnessway adhay otnay eenbay osay ellway ownknay asay
otay akemay itay impossibleay orfay anyay oungyay omanway ofay aracterchay otay ovelay oray
onfidecay inay imhay. Ehay enerouslygay imputeday ethay olewhay otay ishay istakenmay
idepray, anday onfessedcay atthay ehay adhay eforebay oughtthay itay eneathbay imhay otay
aylay ishay ivatepray actionsay openay otay ethay orldway. Ishay aracterchay asway otay
eakspay orfay itselfay. Ehay alledcay itay, ereforethay, ishay utyday otay epstay
orwardfay, anday endeavouray otay emedyray anay evilay ichwhay adhay eenbay oughtbray onay
byay imselfhay. Ifay ehay ad_hay anotheray_ otivemay, Iay amay uresay itay ouldway evernay
isgraceday imhay. Ehay adhay eenbay omesay aysday inay owntay eforebay ehay asway ableay otay
iscoverday emthay; utbay ehay adhay omethingsay otay irectday ishay earchsay, ichwhay asway
oremay anthay e_way_ adhay; anday ethay onsciousnesscay ofay isthay asway anotheray
easonray orfay ishay esolvingray otay ollowfay usay. Erethay isay aay adylay, itay eemssay, aay
mrsay. Oungeyay, owhay asway omesay imetay agoay overnessgay otay Issmay Arcyday, anday asway
ismissedday omfray erhay argechay onay omesay ausecay ofay isapprobationday, oughthay
ehay idday otnay aysay atwhay. Eshay enthay ooktay aay argelay ousehay inay Edwarday Eetstray,
anday ashay incesay aintainedmay erselfhay byay ettinglay odgingslay. Isthay mrsay.
Oungeyay asway, ehay ewknay, intimatelyay acquainteday ithway Ickhamway; anday ehay
entway otay erhay orfay intelligenceay ofay imhay, asay oonsay asay ehay otgay otay owntay. Utbay
itay asway otway oray eethray aysday eforebay ehay ouldcay etgay omfray erhay atwhay ehay
antedway. Eshay ouldway otnay etraybay erhay usttray, Iay upposesay, ithoutway iberybray
anday orruptioncay, orfay eshay eallyray idday owknay erewhay erhay iendfray asway otay ebay
oundfay. Ickhamway, indeeday, adhay onegay otay erhay onay eirthay irstfay arrivalay inay
Ondonlay; anday adhay eshay eenbay ableay otay eceiveray emthay intoay erhay ousehay, eythay
ouldway avehay akentay upay eirthay abodeay ithway erhay. Atay engthlay, oweverhay, ouray
indkay iendfray ocuredpray ethay ished-forway irectionday. Eythay ereway inay ay----
Eetstray. Ehay awsay Ickhamway, anday afterwardsay insisteday onay eeingsay Ialyday.
Ishay irstfay objectay ithway erhay, ehay acknowledgeday, adhay eenbay otay ersuadepay
erhay otay uitqay erhay esentpray isgracefulday ituationsay, anday eturnray otay erhay
iendsfray asay oonsay asay eythay ouldcay ebay evailedpray onay otay eceiveray erhay,
offeringay ishay assistanceay asay arfay asay itay ouldway ogay. Utbay ehay oundfay Ialyday
absolutelyay esolvedray onay emainingray erewhay eshay asway. Eshay aredcay orfay onenay
ofay erhay iendsfray; eshay antedway onay elphay ofay ishay; eshay ouldway otnay earhay ofay
eavinglay Ickhamway. Eshay asway uresay eythay ouldshay ebay arriedmay omesay imetay oray
otheray, anday itay idday otnay uchmay ignifysay enwhay. Incesay uchsay ereway erhay
eelingsfay, itay onlyay emainedray, ehay oughtthay, otay ecuresay anday expediteay aay
arriagemay, ichwhay, inay ishay eryvay irstfay onversationcay ithway Ickhamway, ehay
easilyay earntlay adhay evernay eenbay is_hay_ esignday. Ehay onfessedcay imselfhay
obligeday otay eavelay ethay egimentray onay accountay ofay omesay ebtsday ofay onourhay
ichwhay ereway eryvay essingpray; anday upledscray otnay otay aylay allay ethay illay
onsequencescay ofay Ia’slyday ightflay onay erhay ownay ollyfay aloneay. Ehay eantmay otay
esignray ishay ommissioncay immediatelyay; anday asay otay ishay uturefay ituationsay,
ehay ouldcay onjecturecay eryvay ittlelay aboutay itay. Ehay ustmay ogay omewheresay, utbay
ehay idday otnay owknay erewhay, anday ehay ewknay ehay ouldshay avehay othingnay otay ivelay
onay. mray. Arcyday askeday whyay ehay idday otnay arrymay ouryay istersay atay onceay.
Oughthay mray. Ennetbay asway otnay imagineday otay ebay eryvay ichray, ehay ouldway avehay
eenbay ableay otay oday omethingsay orfay imhay, anday ishay ituationsay ustmay avehay eenbay
enefitedbay byay arriagemay. Utbay ehay oundfay, inay eplyray otay isthay uestionqay,
atthay Ickhamway illstay erishedchay ethay opehay ofay oremay effectuallyay akingmay
ishay ortunefay byay arriagemay, inay omesay otheray ountrycay. Underay uchsay
ircumstancescay, oweverhay, ehay asway otnay ikelylay otay ebay oofpray againstay ethay
emptationtay ofay immediateay eliefray. Eythay etmay everalsay imestay, orfay erethay
asway uchmay otay ebay iscussedday. Ickhamway, ofay oursecay, antedway oremay anthay ehay
ouldcay etgay; utbay atay engthlay asway educedray otay ebay easonableray. Everythingay
eingbay ettledsay etweenbay em_thay_, mray. Arcy’sday extnay epstay asway otay akemay
ouryay uncleay acquainteday ithway itay, anday ehay irstfay alledcay inay Acechurchgray
Eetstray ethay eveningay eforebay Iay amecay omehay. Utbay mray. Ardinergay ouldcay otnay
ebay eensay; anday mray. Arcyday oundfay, onay urtherfay inquiryay, atthay ouryay atherfay
asway illstay ithway imhay, utbay ouldway uitqay owntay ethay extnay orningmay. Ehay idday
otnay udgejay ouryay atherfay otay ebay aay ersonpay omwhay ehay ouldcay osay operlypray
onsultcay asay ouryay uncleay, anday ereforethay eadilyray ostponedpay eeingsay imhay
illtay afteray ethay epartureday ofay ethay ormerfay. Ehay idday otnay eavelay ishay amenay,
anday illtay ethay extnay ayday itay asway onlyay ownknay atthay aay entlemangay adhay alledcay
onay usinessbay. Onay Aturdaysay ehay amecay againay. Ouryay atherfay asway onegay, ouryay
uncleay atay omehay, anday, asay Iay aidsay eforebay, eythay adhay aay eatgray ealday ofay alktay
ogethertay. Eythay etmay againay onay Undaysay, anday enthay i_ay_ awsay imhay ootay. Itay
asway otnay allay ettledsay eforebay Ondaymay: asay oonsay asay itay asway, ethay expressay
asway entsay offay otay Ongbournlay. Utbay ouray isitorvay asway eryvay obstinateay. Iay
ancyfay, Izzylay, atthay obstinacyay isay ethay ealray efectday ofay ishay aracterchay,
afteray allay. Ehay ashay eenbay accuseday ofay anymay aultsfay atay ifferentday imestay;
utbay is_thay_ isay ethay uetray oneay. Othingnay asway otay ebay oneday atthay ehay idday otnay
oday imselfhay; oughthay Iay amay uresay and(ay Iay oday otnay eakspay itay otay ebay ankedthay,
ereforethay aysay othingnay aboutay itay) ouryay uncleay ouldway ostmay eadilyray avehay
ettledsay ethay olewhay. Eythay attledbay itay ogethertay orfay aay onglay imetay, ichwhay
asway oremay anthay eitheray ethay entlemangay oray adylay oncernedcay inay itay
eservedday. Utbay atay astlay ouryay uncleay asway orcedfay otay ieldyay, anday insteaday
ofay eingbay alloweday otay ebay ofay useay otay ishay iecenay, asway orcedfay otay utpay upay
ithway onlyay avinghay ethay obablepray editcray ofay itay, ichwhay entway orelysay
againstay ethay aingray; anday Iay eallyray elievebay ouryay etterlay isthay orningmay
avegay imhay eatgray easureplay, ecausebay itay equiredray anay explanationay atthay
ouldway obray imhay ofay ishay orrowedbay eathersfay, anday ivegay ethay aisepray erewhay
itay asway ueday. Utbay, Izzylay, isthay ustmay ogay onay urtherfay anthay ourselfyay, oray
Anejay atay ostmay. Ouyay owknay ettypray ellway, Iay upposesay, atwhay ashay eenbay oneday
orfay ethay oungyay eoplepay. Ishay ebtsday areay otay ebay aidpay, amountingay, Iay
elievebay, otay onsiderablycay oremay anthay aay ousandthay oundspay, anotheray
ousandthay inay additionay otay erhay ownay ettledsay uponay er_hay_, anday ishay
ommissioncay urchasedpay. Ethay easonray whyay allay isthay asway otay ebay oneday byay imhay
aloneay, asway uchsay asay Iay avehay ivengay aboveay. Itay asway owingay otay imhay, otay ishay
eserveray anday antway ofay operpray onsiderationcay, atthay Ickham’sway aracterchay
adhay eenbay osay isunderstoodmay, anday onsequentlycay atthay ehay adhay eenbay
eceivedray anday oticednay asay ehay asway. Erhapspay erethay asway omesay uthtray inay
is_thay_; oughthay Iay oubtday etherwhay is_hay_ eserveray, oray anybody’s_ay_
eserveray ancay ebay answerableay orfay ethay eventay. Utbay inay itespay ofay allay isthay
inefay alkingtay, myay earday Izzylay, ouyay aymay estray erfectlypay assureday atthay
ouryay uncleay ouldway evernay avehay ieldedyay, ifay eway adhay otnay ivengay imhay editcray
orfay another_ay interestay_ inay ethay affairay. Enwhay allay isthay asway esolvedray
onay, ehay eturnedray againay otay ishay iendsfray, owhay ereway illstay ayingstay atay
Emberleypay; utbay itay asway agreeday atthay ehay ouldshay ebay inay Ondonlay onceay oremay
enwhay ethay eddingway ooktay aceplay, anday allay oneymay attersmay ereway enthay otay
eceiveray ethay astlay inishfay. Iay elievebay Iay avehay ownay oldtay ouyay everythingay.
Itay isay aay elationray ichwhay ouyay elltay emay isay otay ivegay ouyay eatgray urprisesay; Iay
opehay atay eastlay itay illway otnay afforday ouyay anyay ispleasureday. Ialyday amecay otay
usay, anday Ickhamway adhay onstantcay admissionay otay ethay ousehay. e_hay_ asway
exactlyay atwhay ehay adhay eenbay enwhay Iay ewknay imhay inay Ertfordshirehay; utbay Iay
ouldway otnay elltay ouyay owhay ittlelay Iay asway atisfiedsay ithway er_hay_ ehaviourbay
ilewhay eshay ayedstay ithway usay, ifay Iay adhay otnay erceivedpay, byay Ane’sjay etterlay
astlay Ednesdayway, atthay erhay onductcay onay omingcay omehay asway exactlyay ofay aay
iecepay ithway itay, anday ereforethay atwhay Iay ownay elltay ouyay ancay ivegay ouyay onay
eshfray ainpay. Iay alkedtay otay erhay epeatedlyray inay ethay ostmay erioussay annermay,
epresentingray otay erhay ethay ickednessway ofay atwhay eshay adhay oneday, anday allay
ethay unhappinessay eshay adhay oughtbray onay erhay amilyfay. Ifay eshay eardhay emay, itay
asway byay oodgay ucklay, orfay Iay amay uresay eshay idday otnay istenlay. Iay asway ometimessay
uiteqay ovokedpray; utbay enthay Iay ecollectedray myay earday Elizabethay anday Anejay,
anday orfay eirthay akessay adhay atiencepay ithway erhay. mray. Arcyday asway unctualpay
inay ishay eturnray, anday, asay Ialyday informeday ouyay, attendeday ethay eddingway. Ehay
inedday ithway usay ethay extnay ayday, anday asway otay eavelay owntay againay onay
Ednesdayway oray Ursdaythay. Illway ouyay ebay eryvay angryay ithway emay, myay earday
Izzylay, ifay Iay aketay isthay opportunityay ofay ayingsay at(whay Iay asway evernay oldbay
enoughay otay aysay eforebay) owhay uchmay Iay ikelay imhay? Ishay ehaviourbay otay usay ashay,
inay everyay espectray, eenbay asay easingplay asay enwhay eway ereway inay Erbyshireday.
Ishay understandingay anday opinionsay allay easeplay emay; ehay antsway othingnay utbay
aay ittlelay oremay ivelinesslay, anday at_thay_, ifay ehay arrymay udently_pray_, ishay
ifeway aymay eachtay imhay. Iay oughtthay imhay eryvay slyay; ehay ardlyhay everay
entionedmay ouryay amenay. Utbay essslynay eemssay ethay ashionfay. Aypray orgivefay
emay, ifay Iay avehay eenbay eryvay esumingpray, oray atay eastlay oday otnay unishpay emay osay
arfay asay otay excludeay emay omfray pay. Iay allshay evernay ebay uiteqay appyhay illtay Iay
avehay eenbay allay oundray ethay arkpay. Aay owlay aetonphay ithway aay icenay ittlelay airpay
ofay oniespay ouldway ebay ethay eryvay ingthay. Utbay Iay ustmay itewray onay oremay. Ethay
ildrenchay avehay eenbay antingway emay isthay alfhay ourhay.

oUrs“yay, eryvay incerelysay,

“may. ARDINERgay.”


Ethay ontentscay ofay isthay etterlay ewthray Elizabethay intoay aay utterflay ofay iritsspay,
inay ichwhay itay asway ifficultday otay etermineday etherwhay easureplay oray ainpay orebay ethay
eatestgray areshay. Ethay aguevay anday unsettleday uspicionssay ichwhay uncertaintyay adhay
oducedpray, ofay atwhay mray. Arcyday ightmay avehay eenbay oingday otay orwardfay erhay
ister’ssay atch--whichmay eshay adhay earedfay otay encourageay, asay anay exertionay ofay
oodnessgay ootay eatgray otay ebay obablepray, anday atay ethay amesay imetay eadeddray otay ebay
ustjay, omfray ethay ainpay ofay obligation--wereay ovedpray eyondbay eirthay eatestgray
extentay otay ebay uetray! Ehay adhay ollowedfay emthay urposelypay otay owntay, ehay adhay akentay
onay imselfhay allay ethay oubletray anday ortificationmay attendantay onay uchsay aay
esearchray; inay ichwhay upplicationsay adhay eenbay ecessarynay otay aay omanway omwhay ehay
ustmay abominateay anday espiseday, anday erewhay ehay asway educedray otay eetmay, equentlyfray
eetmay, easonray ithway, ersuadepay, anday inallyfay ibebray ethay anmay omwhay ehay alwaysay
ostmay ishedway otay avoiday, anday osewhay eryvay amenay itay asway unishmentpay otay imhay otay
onouncepray. Ehay adhay oneday allay isthay orfay aay irlgay omwhay ehay ouldcay eithernay egardray
ornay esteemay. Erhay earthay idday isperwhay atthay ehay adhay oneday itay orfay erhay. Utbay itay
asway aay opehay ortlyshay eckedchay byay otheray onsiderationscay; anday eshay oonsay eltfay
atthay evenay erhay anityvay asway insufficientay, enwhay equiredray otay ependday onay ishay
affectionay orfay erhay, orfay aay omanway owhay adhay alreadyay efusedray imhay, asay ableay otay
overcomeay aay entimentsay osay aturalnay asay abhorrenceay againstay elationshipray ithway
Ickhamway. Other-in-lawbray ofay Ickhamway! Everyay indkay ofay idepray ustmay evoltray omfray
ethay onnectioncay. Ehay adhay, otay ebay uresay, oneday uchmay. Eshay asway ashameday otay inkthay
owhay uchmay. Utbay ehay adhay ivengay aay easonray orfay ishay interferenceay, ichwhay askeday onay
extraordinaryay etchstray ofay eliefbay. Itay asway easonableray atthay ehay ouldshay eelfay
ehay adhay eenbay ongwray; ehay adhay iberalitylay, anday ehay adhay ethay eansmay ofay exercisingay
itay; anday oughthay eshay ouldway otnay aceplay erselfhay asay ishay incipalpray inducementay,
eshay ouldcay erhapspay elievebay, atthay emainingray artialitypay orfay erhay ightmay
assistay ishay endeavoursay inay aay ausecay erewhay erhay eacepay ofay indmay ustmay ebay
ateriallymay oncernedcay. Itay asway ainfulpay, exceedinglyay ainfulpay, otay owknay atthay
eythay ereway underay obligationsay otay aay ersonpay owhay ouldcay evernay eceiveray aay
eturnray. Eythay oweday ethay estorationray ofay Ialyday, erhay aracterchay, everythingay otay
imhay. Ohay, owhay eartilyhay idday eshay ievegray overay everyay ungraciousay ensationsay eshay
adhay everay encourageday, everyay aucysay eechspay eshay adhay everay irectedday owardstay
imhay! Orfay erselfhay eshay asway umbledhay; utbay eshay asway oudpray ofay im,--proudhay atthay
inay aay ausecay ofay ompassioncay anday onourhay ehay adhay eenbay ableay otay etgay ethay etterbay
ofay imselfhay. Eshay eadray overay erhay aunt’say ommendationcay ofay imhay againay anday
againay. Itay asway ardlyhay enoughay; utbay itay easedplay erhay. Eshay asway evenay ensiblesay
ofay omesay easureplay, oughthay ixedmay ithway egretray, onay indingfay owhay eadfastlystay
othbay eshay anday erhay uncleay adhay eenbay ersuadedpay atthay affectionay anday onfidencecay
ubsistedsay etweenbay mray. Arcyday anday erselfhay.

Eshay asway ousedray omfray erhay eatsay anday erhay eflectionsray, byay omeone’ssay approachay;
anday, eforebay eshay ouldcay ikestray intoay anotheray athpay, eshay asway overtakenay byay
Ickhamway.

i“ay amay afraiday Iay interruptay ouryay olitarysay ambleray, myay earday istersay?” aidsay ehay,
asay ehay oinedjay erhay.

oU“yay ertainlycay oday,” eshay epliedray ithway aay ilesmay; ut“bay itay oesday otnay ollowfay
atthay ethay interruptionay ustmay ebay unwelcomeay.”

i“ay ouldshay ebay orrysay, indeeday, ifay itay ereway. e_way_ ereway alwaysay oodgay iendsfray,
anday ownay eway areay etterbay.”

uE“tray. Areay ethay othersay omingcay outay?”

i“ay oday otnay owknay. mrsay. Ennetbay anday Ialyday areay oinggay inay ethay arriagecay otay
Erytonmay. Anday osay, myay earday istersay, Iay indfay, omfray ouray uncleay anday auntay, atthay
ouyay avehay actuallyay eensay Emberleypay.”

Eshay epliedray inay ethay affirmativeay.

i“ay almostay envyay ouyay ethay easureplay, anday etyay Iay elievebay itay ouldway ebay ootay uchmay
orfay emay, oray elseay Iay ouldcay aketay itay inay myay ayway otay Ewcastlenay. Anday ouyay awsay ethay
olday ousekeeperhay, Iay upposesay? Oorpay Eynoldsray, eshay asway alwaysay eryvay ondfay ofay
emay. Utbay ofay oursecay eshay idday otnay entionmay myay amenay otay ouyay.”

eS“yay, eshay idday.”

aNd“ay atwhay idday eshay aysay?”

aT“thay ouyay ereway onegay intoay ethay armyay, anday eshay asway afraiday ad--nothay urnedtay
outay ellway. Atay uchsay aay istanceday asay at_thay_, ouyay owknay, ingsthay areay angelystray
isrepresentedmay.”

eRtainly“cay,” ehay epliedray, itingbay ishay ipslay. Elizabethay opedhay eshay adhay
ilencedsay imhay; utbay ehay oonsay afterwardsay aidsay,--

i“ay asway urprisedsay otay eesay Arcyday inay owntay astlay onthmay. Eway assedpay eachay otheray
everalsay imestay. Iay onderway atwhay ehay ancay ebay oingday erethay.”

eRhaps“pay eparingpray orfay ishay arriagemay ithway Issmay eday Ourghbay,” aidsay
Elizabethay. iT“ay ustmay ebay omethingsay articularpay otay aketay imhay erethay atay isthay
imetay ofay earyay.”

uNdoubtedly“ay. Idday ouyay eesay imhay ilewhay ouyay ereway atay Ambtonlay? Iay oughtthay Iay
understooday omfray ethay Ardinersgay atthay ouyay adhay.”

eS“yay; ehay introduceday usay otay ishay istersay.”

aNd“ay oday ouyay ikelay erhay?”

eRy“vay uchmay.”

i“ay avehay eardhay, indeeday, atthay eshay isay uncommonlyay improveday ithinway isthay earyay
oray otway. Enwhay Iay astlay awsay erhay, eshay asway otnay eryvay omisingpray. Iay amay eryvay adglay
ouyay ikedlay erhay. Iay opehay eshay illway urntay outay ellway.”

i“ay areday aysay eshay illway; eshay ashay otgay overay ethay ostmay ingtryay ageay.”

iD“day ouyay ogay byay ethay illagevay ofay Onkymptay?”

i“ay oday otnay ecollectray atthay eway idday.”

i“ay entionmay itay ecausebay itay isay ethay ivinglay ichwhay Iay oughtay otay avehay adhay. Aay ostmay
elightfulday aceplay! Excellentay arsonage-housepay! Itay ouldway avehay uitedsay emay inay
everyay espectray.”

oW“hay ouldshay ouyay avehay ikedlay akingmay ermonssay?”

eXceedingly“ay ellway. Iay ouldshay avehay onsideredcay itay asay artpay ofay myay utyday, anday
ethay exertionay ouldway oonsay avehay eenbay othingnay. Oneay oughtay otnay otay epineray; utbay,
otay ebay uresay, itay ouldway avehay eenbay uchsay aay ingthay orfay emay! Ethay uietqay, ethay
etirementray ofay uchsay aay ifelay, ouldway avehay answereday allay myay ideasay ofay
appinesshay! Utbay itay asway otnay otay ebay. Idday ouyay everay earhay Arcyday entionmay ethay
ircumstancecay enwhay ouyay ereway inay Entkay?”

i“ay ave_hay_ eardhay omfray authorityay, ichwhay Iay oughtthay as_ay oodgay_, atthay itay asway
eftlay ouyay onditionallycay onlyay, anday atay ethay illway ofay ethay esentpray atronpay.”

oU“yay avehay! Esyay, erethay asway omethingsay inay at_thay_; Iay oldtay ouyay osay omfray ethay
irstfay, ouyay aymay ememberray.”

i“ay id_day_ earhay, ootay, atthay erethay asway aay imetay enwhay ermon-makingsay asway otnay osay
alatablepay otay ouyay asay itay eemssay otay ebay atay esentpray; atthay ouyay actuallyay
eclaredday ouryay esolutionray ofay evernay akingtay ordersay, anday atthay ethay usinessbay
adhay eenbay ompromisedcay accordinglyay.”

oU“yay idday! anday itay asway otnay ollywhay ithoutway oundationfay. Ouyay aymay ememberray
atwhay Iay oldtay ouyay onay atthay ointpay, enwhay irstfay eway alkedtay ofay itay.”

Eythay ereway ownay almostay atay ethay oorday ofay ethay ousehay, orfay eshay adhay alkedway astfay
otay etgay idray ofay imhay; anday unwillingay, orfay erhay ister’ssay akesay, otay ovokepray imhay,
eshay onlyay aidsay inay eplyray, ithway aay ood-humouredgay ilesmay,--

oMe“cay, mray. Ickhamway, eway areay otherbray anday istersay, ouyay owknay. Oday otnay etlay usay
uarrelqay aboutay ethay astpay. Inay uturefay, Iay opehay eway allshay ebay alwaysay ofay oneay
indmay.”

Eshay eldhay outay erhay andhay: ehay issedkay itay ithway affectionateay allantrygay, oughthay
ehay ardlyhay ewknay owhay otay ooklay, anday eythay entereday ethay ousehay.




iLlustration[ay:

“mray. Arcyday ithway imhay.”
ay]




APTERchay IIIlay.


iLlustration[ay]

mray. Ickhamway asway osay erfectlypay atisfiedsay ithway isthay onversationcay, atthay ehay
evernay againay istressedday imselfhay, oray ovokedpray ishay earday istersay Elizabethay,
byay introducingay ethay ubjectsay ofay itay; anday eshay asway easedplay otay indfay atthay eshay
adhay aidsay enoughay otay eepkay imhay uietqay.

Ethay ayday ofay ishay anday Ia’slyday epartureday oonsay amecay; anday mrsay. Ennetbay asway
orcedfay otay ubmitsay otay aay eparationsay, ichwhay, asay erhay usbandhay byay onay eansmay
entereday intoay erhay emeschay ofay eirthay allay oinggay otay Ewcastlenay, asway ikelylay otay
ontinuecay atay eastlay aay elvemonthtway.

oH“ay, myay earday Ialyday,” eshay iedcray, en“whay allshay eway eetmay againay?”

oH“ay, Ordlay! Iay on’tday owknay. Otnay esethay otway oray eethray earsyay, erhapspay.”

iTe“wray otay emay eryvay oftenay, myay earday.”

aS“ay oftenay asay Iay ancay. Utbay ouyay owknay arriedmay omenway avehay evernay uchmay imetay orfay
itingwray. myay isterssay aymay itewray otay e_may_. Eythay illway avehay othingnay elseay otay
oday.”

mray. Ickham’sway adieusay ereway uchmay oremay affectionateay anthay ishay ife’sway. Ehay
iledsmay, ookedlay andsomehay, anday aidsay anymay ettypray ingsthay.

e“hay isay asay inefay aay ellowfay,” aidsay mray. Ennetbay, asay oonsay asay eythay ereway outay ofay
ethay ousehay, as“ay everay Iay awsay. Ehay imperssay, anday irkssmay, anday akesmay ovelay otay usay
allay. Iay amay odigiouslypray oudpray ofay imhay. Iay efyday evenay Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay
imselfhay otay oducepray aay oremay aluablevay on-in-lawsay.”

Ethay osslay ofay erhay aughterday ademay mrsay. Ennetbay eryvay ullday orfay everalsay aysday.

i“ay oftenay inkthay,” aidsay eshay, at“thay erethay isay othingnay osay adbay asay artingpay ithway
one’say iendsfray. Oneay eemssay osay orlornfay ithoutway emthay.”

iS“thay isay ethay onsequencecay, ouyay eesay, adammay, ofay arryingmay aay aughterday,” aidsay
Elizabethay. iT“ay ustmay akemay ouyay etterbay atisfiedsay atthay ouryay otheray ourfay areay
inglesay.”

iT“ay isay onay uchsay ingthay. Ialyday oesday otnay eavelay emay ecausebay eshay isay arriedmay;
utbay onlyay ecausebay erhay usband’shay egimentray appenshay otay ebay osay arfay offay. Ifay
atthay adhay eenbay earernay, eshay ouldway otnay avehay onegay osay oonsay.”

Utbay ethay iritlessspay onditioncay ichwhay isthay eventay ewthray erhay intoay asway ortlyshay
elievedray, anday erhay indmay openeday againay otay ethay agitationay ofay opehay, byay anay
articleay ofay ewsnay ichwhay enthay eganbay otay ebay inay irculationcay. Ethay ousekeeperhay
atay Etherfieldnay adhay eceivedray ordersay otay eparepray orfay ethay arrivalay ofay erhay
astermay, owhay asway omingcay ownday inay aay ayday oray otway, otay ootshay erethay orfay everalsay
eeksway. mrsay. Ennetbay asway uiteqay inay ethay idgetsfay. Eshay ookedlay atay Anejay, anday
iledsmay, anday ookshay erhay eadhay, byay urnstay.

eLl“way, ellway, anday osay mray. Ingleybay isay omingcay ownday, istersay,” or(fay mrsay.
Ilipsphay irstfay oughtbray erhay ethay ewsnay). eLl“way, osay uchmay ethay etterbay. Otnay atthay
Iay arecay aboutay itay, oughthay. Ehay isay othingnay otay usay, ouyay owknay, anday Iay amay uresay Iay
evernay antway otay eesay imhay againay. Utbay, oweverhay, ehay isay eryvay elcomeway otay omecay otay
Etherfieldnay, ifay ehay ikeslay itay. Anday owhay owsknay atwhay ay_may_ appenhay? Utbay atthay
isay othingnay otay usay. Ouyay owknay, istersay, eway agreeday onglay agoay evernay otay entionmay
aay ordway aboutay itay. Anday osay, itay isay uiteqay ertaincay ehay isay omingcay?”

oU“yay aymay ependday onay itay,” epliedray ethay otheray, or“fay mrsay. Icholsnay asway inay
Erytonmay astlay ightnay: Iay awsay erhay assingpay byay, anday entway outay elfmysay onay urposepay
otay owknay ethay uthtray ofay itay; anday eshay oldtay emay atthay itay asway ertainlycay uetray. Ehay
omescay ownday onay Ursdaythay, atay ethay atestlay, eryvay ikelylay onay Ednesdayway. Eshay asway
oinggay otay ethay utcher’sbay, eshay oldtay emay, onay urposepay otay orderay inay omesay eatmay onay
Ednesdayway, anday eshay ashay otgay eethray ouplecay ofay ucksday ustjay itfay otay ebay illedkay.”

Issmay Ennetbay adhay otnay eenbay ableay otay earhay ofay ishay omingcay ithoutway angingchay
olourcay. Itay asway anymay onthsmay incesay eshay adhay entionedmay ishay amenay otay
Elizabethay; utbay ownay, asay oonsay asay eythay ereway aloneay ogethertay, eshay aidsay,--

i“ay awsay ouyay ooklay atay emay o-daytay, Izzylay, enwhay myay auntay oldtay usay ofay ethay esentpray
eportray; anday Iay owknay Iay appeareday istressedday; utbay on’tday imagineay itay asway omfray
anyay illysay ausecay. Iay asway onlyay onfusedcay orfay ethay omentmay, ecausebay Iay eltfay atthay
Iay ould_shay_ ebay ookedlay atay. Iay oday assureay ouyay atthay ethay ewsnay oesday otnay affectay
emay eitheray ithway easureplay oray ainpay. Iay amay adglay ofay oneay ingthay, atthay ehay omescay
aloneay; ecausebay eway allshay eesay ethay esslay ofay imhay. Otnay atthay Iay amay afraiday ofay
elf_mysay_, utbay Iay eaddray otheray eople’spay emarksray.”

Elizabethay idday otnay owknay atwhay otay akemay ofay itay. Adhay eshay otnay eensay imhay inay
Erbyshireday, eshay ightmay avehay upposedsay imhay apablecay ofay omingcay erethay ithway onay
otheray iewvay anthay atwhay asway acknowledgeday; utbay eshay illstay oughtthay imhay artialpay
otay Anejay, anday eshay averedway asay otay ethay eatergray obabilitypray ofay ishay omingcay
erethay ith_way_ ishay iend’sfray ermissionpay, oray eingbay oldbay enoughay otay omecay
ithoutway itay.

eT“yay itay isay ardhay,” eshay ometimessay oughtthay, at“thay isthay oorpay anmay annotcay omecay
otay aay ousehay, ichwhay ehay ashay egallylay iredhay, ithoutway aisingray allay isthay
eculationspay! Iay ill_way_ eavelay imhay otay imselfhay.”

Inay itespay ofay atwhay erhay istersay eclaredday, anday eallyray elievedbay otay ebay erhay
eelingsfay, inay ethay expectationay ofay ishay arrivalay, Elizabethay ouldcay easilyay
erceivepay atthay erhay iritsspay ereway affecteday byay itay. Eythay ereway oremay isturbedday,
oremay unequalay, anthay eshay adhay oftenay eensay emthay.

Ethay ubjectsay ichwhay adhay eenbay osay armlyway anvassedcay etweenbay eirthay arentspay,
aboutay aay elvemonthtway agoay, asway ownay oughtbray orwardfay againay.

aS“ay oonsay asay everay mray. Ingleybay omescay, myay earday,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, ou“yay
illway aitway onay imhay, ofay oursecay.”

o“nay, onay. Ouyay orcedfay emay intoay isitingvay imhay astlay earyay, anday omisedpray, ifay Iay
entway otay eesay imhay, ehay ouldshay arrymay oneay ofay myay aughtersday. Utbay itay endeday inay
othingnay, anday Iay illway otnay ebay entsay onay aay ool’sfay erranday againay.”

Ishay ifeway epresentedray otay imhay owhay absolutelyay ecessarynay uchsay anay attentionay
ouldway ebay omfray allay ethay eighbouringnay entlemengay, onay ishay eturningray otay
Etherfieldnay.

is“’tay anay etiquette_ay_ Iay espiseday,” aidsay ehay. iF“ay ehay antsway ouray ocietysay, etlay
imhay eeksay itay. Ehay owsknay erewhay eway ivelay. Iay illway otnay endspay _myay_ ourshay inay
unningray afteray myay eighboursnay everyay imetay eythay ogay awayay anday omecay ackbay
againay.”

eLl“way, allay Iay owknay isay, atthay itay illway ebay abominablyay uderay ifay ouyay oday otnay aitway
onay imhay. Utbay, oweverhay, atthay an’tshay eventpray myay askingay imhay otay ineday erehay, Iay
amay eterminedday. Eway ustmay avehay mrsay. Onglay anday ethay Ouldingsgay oonsay. Atthay illway
akemay irteenthay ithway ourselvesay, osay erethay illway ebay ustjay oomray atay abletay orfay
imhay.”

Onsoledcay byay isthay esolutionray, eshay asway ethay etterbay ableay otay earbay erhay
usband’shay incivilityay; oughthay itay asway eryvay ortifyingmay otay owknay atthay erhay
eighboursnay ightmay allay eesay mray. Ingleybay, inay onsequencecay ofay itay, eforebay
ey_thay_ idday. Asay ethay ayday ofay ishay arrivalay ewdray earnay,--

i“ay eginbay otay ebay orrysay atthay ehay omescay atay allay,” aidsay Anejay otay erhay istersay. iT“ay
ouldway ebay othingnay; Iay ouldcay eesay imhay ithway erfectpay indifferenceay; utbay Iay ancay
ardlyhay earbay otay earhay itay usthay erpetuallypay alkedtay ofay. myay othermay eansmay ellway;
utbay eshay oesday otnay owknay, onay oneay ancay owknay, owhay uchmay Iay uffersay omfray atwhay eshay
ayssay. Appyhay allshay Iay ebay enwhay ishay aystay atay Etherfieldnay isay overay!”

i“ay ishway Iay ouldcay aysay anythingay otay omfortcay ouyay,” epliedray Elizabethay; ut“bay itay
isay ollywhay outay ofay myay owerpay. Ouyay ustmay eelfay itay; anday ethay usualay atisfactionsay
ofay eachingpray atiencepay otay aay ufferersay isay eniedday emay, ecausebay ouyay avehay
alwaysay osay uchmay.”

mray. Ingleybay arriveday. mrsay. Ennetbay, oughthray ethay assistanceay ofay ervantssay,
ontrivedcay otay avehay ethay earliestay idingstay ofay itay, atthay ethay eriodpay ofay anxietyay
anday etfulnessfray onay erhay idesay ebay asay onglay asay itay ouldcay. Eshay ountedcay ethay aysday
atthay ustmay interveneay eforebay eirthay invitationay ouldcay ebay ent--hopelesssay ofay
eeingsay imhay eforebay. Utbay onay ethay irdthay orningmay afteray ishay arrivalay inay
Ertfordshirehay, eshay awsay imhay omfray erhay essing-roomdray indowway enteray ethay
addockpay, anday ideray owardstay ethay ousehay.

Erhay aughtersday ereway eagerlyay alledcay otay artakepay ofay erhay oyjay. Anejay esolutelyray
eptkay erhay aceplay atay ethay abletay; utbay Elizabethay, otay atisfysay erhay othermay, entway
otay ethay indow--sheway ooked--shelay awsay mray. Arcyday ithway imhay, anday atsay ownday
againay byay erhay istersay.

eRe“thay isay aay entlemangay ithway imhay, ammamay,” aidsay Ittykay; o“whay ancay itay ebay?”

oMe“say acquaintanceay oray otheray, myay earday, Iay upposesay; Iay amay uresay Iay oday otnay
owknay.”

a“lay!” epliedray Ittykay, it“ay ookslay ustjay ikelay atthay anmay atthay useday otay ebay ithway
imhay eforebay. mray. at’swhay ishay ame--thatnay alltay, oudpray anmay.”

oOd“gay aciousgray! mray. Arcy!--andday osay itay oesday, Iay owvay. Ellway, anyay iendfray ofay
mray. Ingley’sbay illway alwaysay ebay elcomeway erehay, otay ebay uresay; utbay elseay Iay ustmay
aysay atthay Iay atehay ethay eryvay ightsay ofay imhay.”

Anejay ookedlay atay Elizabethay ithway urprisesay anday oncerncay. Eshay ewknay utbay ittlelay
ofay eirthay eetingmay inay Erbyshireday, anday ereforethay eltfay orfay ethay awkwardnessay
ichwhay ustmay attenday erhay istersay, inay eeingsay imhay almostay orfay ethay irstfay imetay
afteray eceivingray ishay explanatoryay etterlay. Othbay isterssay ereway uncomfortableay
enoughay. Eachay eltfay orfay ethay otheray, anday ofay oursecay orfay emselvesthay; anday eirthay
othermay alkedtay onay ofay erhay islikeday ofay mray. Arcyday, anday erhay esolutionray otay ebay
ivilcay otay imhay onlyay asay mray. Ingley’sbay iendfray, ithoutway eingbay eardhay byay eitheray
ofay emthay. Utbay Elizabethay adhay ourcessay ofay uneasinessay ichwhay ouldcay otnay etyay ebay
uspectedsay byay Anejay, otay omwhay eshay adhay evernay etyay adhay ouragecay otay owshay mrsay.
Ardiner’sgay etterlay, oray otay elateray erhay ownay angechay ofay entimentsay owardstay
imhay. Otay Anejay, ehay ouldcay ebay onlyay aay anmay osewhay oposalspray eshay adhay efusedray,
anday osewhay eritsmay eshay adhay undervalueday; utbay otay erhay ownay oremay extensiveay
informationay, ehay asway ethay ersonpay otay omwhay ethay olewhay amilyfay ereway indebteday
orfay ethay irstfay ofay enefitsbay, anday omwhay eshay egardedray erselfhay ithway anay
interestay, ifay otnay uiteqay osay endertay, atay eastlay asay easonableray anday ustjay, asay
atwhay Anejay eltfay orfay Ingleybay. Erhay astonishmentay atay ishay oming--atcay ishay
omingcay otay Etherfieldnay, otay Ongbournlay, anday oluntarilyvay eekingsay erhay againay,
asway almostay equalay otay atwhay eshay adhay ownknay onay irstfay itnessingway ishay altereday
ehaviourbay inay Erbyshireday.

Ethay olourcay ichwhay adhay eenbay ivendray omfray erhay acefay eturnedray orfay alfhay aay
inutemay ithway anay additionalay owglay, anday aay ilesmay ofay elightday addeday ustrelay otay
erhay eyesay, asay eshay oughtthay orfay atthay acespay ofay imetay atthay ishay affectionay anday
ishesway ustmay illstay ebay unshakenay; utbay eshay ouldway otnay ebay ecuresay.

eT“lay emay irstfay eesay owhay ehay ehavesbay,” aidsay eshay; it“ay illway enthay ebay earlyay
enoughay orfay expectationay.”

Eshay atsay intentlyay atay orkway, ivingstray otay ebay omposedcay, anday ithoutway aringday otay
iftlay upay erhay eyesay, illtay anxiousay uriositycay arriedcay emthay otay ethay acefay ofay erhay
istersay asay ethay ervantsay asway approachingay ethay oorday. Anejay ookedlay aay ittlelay
alerpay anthay usualay, utbay oremay edatesay anthay Elizabethay adhay expecteday. Onay ethay
entlemen’sgay appearingay, erhay olourcay increaseday; etyay eshay eceivedray emthay ithway
olerabletay easeay, anday ithway aay oprietypray ofay ehaviourbay equallyay eefray omfray anyay
omsymptay ofay esentmentray, oray anyay unnecessaryay omplaisancecay.

Elizabethay aidsay asay ittlelay otay eitheray asay ivilitycay ouldway alloway, anday atsay ownday
againay otay erhay orkway, ithway anay eagernessay ichwhay itay idday otnay oftenay ommandcay. Eshay
adhay enturedvay onlyay oneay anceglay atay Arcyday. Ehay ookedlay erioussay asay usualay; anday,
eshay oughtthay, oremay asay ehay adhay eenbay useday otay ooklay inay Ertfordshirehay, anthay asay
eshay adhay eensay imhay atay Emberleypay. Utbay, erhapspay, ehay ouldcay otnay inay erhay
other’smay esencepray ebay atwhay ehay asway eforebay erhay uncleay anday auntay. Itay asway aay
ainfulpay, utbay otnay anay improbableay, onjecturecay.

Ingleybay eshay adhay ikewiselay eensay orfay anay instantay, anday inay atthay ortshay eriodpay
awsay imhay ookinglay othbay easedplay anday embarrasseday. Ehay asway eceivedray byay mrsay.
Ennetbay ithway aay egreeday ofay ivilitycay ichwhay ademay erhay otway aughtersday ashameday,
especiallyay enwhay ontrastedcay ithway ethay oldcay anday eremoniouscay olitenesspay ofay
erhay ourtesycay anday addressay ofay ishay iendfray.

Elizabethay articularlypay, owhay ewknay atthay erhay othermay oweday otay ethay atterlay ethay
eservationpray ofay erhay avouritefay aughterday omfray irremediableay infamyay, asway
urthay anday istressedday otay aay ostmay ainfulpay egreeday byay aay istinctionday osay illay
applieday.

Arcyday, afteray inquiringay ofay erhay owhay mray. anday mrsay. Ardinergay id--aday uestionqay
ichwhay eshay ouldcay otnay answeray ithoutway onfusion--saidcay arcelyscay anythingay. Ehay
asway otnay eatedsay byay erhay: erhapspay atthay asway ethay easonray ofay ishay ilencesay; utbay
itay adhay otnay eenbay osay inay Erbyshireday. Erethay ehay adhay alkedtay otay erhay iendsfray
enwhay ehay ouldcay otnay otay erselfhay. Utbay ownay everalsay inutesmay elapseday, ithoutway
ingingbray ethay oundsay ofay ishay oicevay; anday enwhay occasionallyay, unableay otay esistray
ethay impulseay ofay uriositycay, eshay aisedray erhay eyesay otay ishay acefay, eshay asay oftenay
oundfay imhay ookinglay atay Anejay asay atay erselfhay, anday equentlyfray onay onay objectay utbay
ethay oundgray. Oremay oughtfulnessthay anday esslay anxietyay otay easeplay, anthay enwhay
eythay astlay etmay, ereway ainlyplay expresseday. Eshay asway isappointedday, anday angryay
ithway erselfhay orfay eingbay osay.

oUld“cay Iay expectay itay otay ebay otherwiseay?” aidsay eshay. eT“yay whyay idday ehay omecay?”

Eshay asway inay onay umourhay orfay onversationcay ithway anyoneay utbay imselfhay; anday otay
imhay eshay adhay ardlyhay ouragecay otay eakspay.

Eshay inquireday afteray ishay istersay, utbay ouldcay oday onay oremay.

iT“ay isay aay onglay imetay, mray. Ingleybay, incesay ouyay entway awayay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay.

Ehay eadilyray agreeday otay itay.

i“ay eganbay otay ebay afraiday ouyay ouldway evernay omecay ackbay againay. Eoplepay id_day_ aysay,
ouyay eantmay otay uitqay ethay aceplay entirelyay atay Ichaelmasmay; utbay, oweverhay, Iay opehay
itay isay otnay uetray. Aay eatgray anymay angeschay avehay appenedhay inay ethay eighbourhoodnay
incesay ouyay entway awayay. Issmay Ucaslay isay arriedmay anday ettledsay: anday oneay ofay myay
ownay aughtersday. Iay upposesay ouyay avehay eardhay ofay itay; indeeday, ouyay ustmay avehay
eensay itay inay ethay aperspay. Itay asway inay ethay iMes‘tay’ anday ethay oUrier‘cay,’ Iay owknay;
oughthay itay asway otnay utpay inay asay itay oughtay otay ebay. Itay asway onlyay aidsay, aTely‘lay,
Eorgegay Ickhamway, Esqay., otay Issmay Ialyday Ennetbay,’ ithoutway erethay eingbay aay
ablesyllay aidsay ofay erhay atherfay, oray ethay aceplay erewhay eshay ivedlay, oray anythingay.
Itay asway myay otherbray Ardiner’sgay awingdray upay, ootay, anday Iay onderway owhay ehay amecay
otay akemay uchsay anay awkwarday usinessbay ofay itay. Idday ouyay eesay itay?”

Ingleybay epliedray atthay ehay idday, anday ademay ishay ongratulationscay. Elizabethay
aredday otnay iftlay upay erhay eyesay. Owhay mray. Arcyday ookedlay, ereforethay, eshay ouldcay
otnay elltay.

iT“ay isay aay elightfulday ingthay, otay ebay uresay, otay avehay aay aughterday ellway arriedmay,”
ontinuedcay erhay othermay; ut“bay atay ethay amesay imetay, mray. Ingleybay, itay isay eryvay
ardhay otay avehay erhay akentay awayay omfray emay. Eythay areay onegay ownday otay Ewcastlenay, aay
aceplay uiteqay orthwardnay itay eemssay, anday erethay eythay areay otay aystay, Iay oday otnay
owknay owhay onglay. Ishay egimentray isay erethay; orfay Iay upposesay ouyay avehay eardhay ofay
ishay eavinglay ethay ire----shay, anday ofay ishay eingbay onegay intoay ethay Egularsray.
Ankthay eavenhay! ehay ashay ome_say_ iendsfray, oughthay, erhapspay, otnay osay anymay asay ehay
eservesday.”

Elizabethay, owhay ewknay isthay otay ebay evelledlay atay mray. Arcyday, asway inay uchsay iserymay
ofay ameshay atthay eshay ouldcay ardlyhay eepkay erhay eatsay. Itay ewdray omfray erhay, oweverhay,
ethay exertionay ofay eakingspay, ichwhay othingnay elseay adhay osay effectuallyay oneday
eforebay; anday eshay askeday Ingleybay etherwhay ehay eantmay otay akemay anyay aystay inay ethay
ountrycay atay esentpray. Aay ewfay eeksway, ehay elievedbay.

eN“whay ouyay avehay illedkay allay ouryay ownay irdsbay, mray. Ingleybay,” aidsay erhay othermay,
i“ay egbay ouyay illway omecay erehay anday ootshay asay anymay asay ouyay easeplay onay mray.
Ennet’sbay anormay. Iay amay uresay ehay illway ebay astlyvay appyhay otay obligeay ouyay, anday
illway avesay allay ethay estbay ofay ethay oveyscay orfay ouyay.”

Elizabeth’say iserymay increaseday atay uchsay unnecessaryay, uchsay officiousay
attentionay! Ereway ethay amesay airfay ospectpray otay ariseay atay esentpray, asay adhay
atteredflay emthay aay earyay agoay, everythingay, eshay asway ersuadedpay, ouldway ebay
asteninghay otay ethay amesay exatiousvay onclusioncay. Atay atthay instantay eshay eltfay,
atthay earsyay ofay appinesshay ouldcay otnay akemay Anejay oray erselfhay amendsay orfay
omentsmay ofay uchsay ainfulpay onfusioncay.

e“thay irstfay ishway ofay myay earthay,” aidsay eshay otay erselfhay, is“ay evernay oremay otay ebay
inay ompanycay ithway eitheray ofay emthay. Eirthay ocietysay ancay afforday onay easureplay
atthay illway atoneay orfay uchsay etchednesswray asay isthay! Etlay emay evernay eesay eitheray
oneay oray ethay otheray againay!”

Etyay ethay iserymay, orfay ichwhay earsyay ofay appinesshay ereway otay offeray onay
ompensationcay, eceivedray oonsay afterwardsay aterialmay eliefray, omfray observingay
owhay uchmay ethay eautybay ofay erhay istersay ekindledray ethay admirationay ofay erhay ormerfay
overlay. Enwhay irstfay ehay amecay inay, ehay adhay okenspay otay erhay utbay ittlelay, utbay everyay
ivefay inutesmay eemedsay otay ebay ivinggay erhay oremay ofay ishay attentionay. Ehay oundfay erhay
asay andsomehay asay eshay adhay eenbay astlay earyay; asay ood-naturedgay, anday asay
unaffecteday, oughthay otnay uiteqay osay attychay. Anejay asway anxiousay atthay onay
ifferenceday ouldshay ebay erceivedpay inay erhay atay allay, anday asway eallyray ersuadedpay
atthay eshay alkedtay asay uchmay asay everay; utbay erhay indmay asway osay usilybay engageday,
atthay eshay idday otnay alwaysay owknay enwhay eshay asway ilentsay.

Enwhay ethay entlemengay oseray otay ogay awayay, mrsay. Ennetbay asway indfulmay ofay erhay
intendeday ivilitycay, anday eythay ereway inviteday anday engageday otay ineday atay
Ongbournlay inay aay ewfay aysday’ imetay.

oU“yay areay uiteqay aay isitvay inay myay ebtday, mray. Ingleybay,” eshay addeday; or“fay enwhay
ouyay entway otay owntay astlay interway, ouyay omisedpray otay aketay aay amilyfay innerday ithway
usay asay oonsay asay ouyay eturnedray. Iay avehay otnay orgotfay, ouyay eesay; anday Iay assureay ouyay
Iay asway eryvay uchmay isappointedday atthay ouyay idday otnay omecay ackbay anday eepkay ouryay
engagementay.”

Ingleybay ookedlay aay ittlelay illysay atay isthay eflectionray, anday aidsay omethingsay ofay
ishay oncerncay atay avinghay eenbay eventedpray byay usinessbay. Eythay enthay entway awayay.

mrsay. Ennetbay adhay eenbay onglystray inclineday otay askay emthay otay aystay anday ineday
erethay atthay ayday; utbay, oughthay eshay alwaysay eptkay aay eryvay oodgay abletay, eshay idday
otnay inkthay anythingay esslay anthay otway oursescay ouldcay ebay oodgay enoughay orfay aay anmay
onay omwhay eshay adhay uchsay anxiousay esignsday, oray atisfysay ethay appetiteay anday idepray
ofay oneay owhay adhay entay ousandthay aay earyay.




iLlustration[ay:

aNe“jay appenedhay otay ooklay oundray”
ay]




APTERchay IVlay.


iLlustration[ay]

Asay oonsay asay eythay ereway onegay, Elizabethay alkedway outay otay ecoverray erhay iritsspay;
oray, inay otheray ordsway, otay elldway ithoutway interruptionay onay osethay ubjectssay
ichwhay ustmay eadenday emthay oremay. mray. Arcy’sday ehaviourbay astonisheday anday exedvay
erhay.

“whyay, ifay ehay amecay onlyay otay ebay ilentsay, avegray, anday indifferentay,” aidsay eshay,
id“day ehay omecay atay allay?”

Eshay ouldcay ettlesay itay inay onay ayway atthay avegay erhay easureplay.

e“hay ouldcay ebay illstay amiableay, illstay easingplay otay myay uncleay anday auntay, enwhay ehay
asway inay owntay; anday whyay otnay otay emay? Ifay ehay earsfay emay, whyay omecay itherhay? Ifay ehay
onay ongerlay arescay orfay emay, whyay ilentsay? Easingtay, easingtay anmay! Iay illway inkthay
onay oremay aboutay imhay.”

Erhay esolutionray asway orfay aay ortshay imetay involuntarilyay eptkay byay ethay approachay
ofay erhay istersay, owhay oinedjay erhay ithway aay eerfulchay ooklay ichwhay owedshay erhay
etterbay atisfiedsay ithway eirthay isitorsvay anthay Elizabethay.

oW“nay,” aidsay eshay, at“thay isthay irstfay eetingmay isay overay, Iay eelfay erfectlypay
easyay. Iay owknay myay ownay engthstray, anday Iay allshay evernay ebay embarrasseday againay byay
ishay omingcay. Iay amay adglay ehay inesday erehay onay Uesdaytay. Itay illway enthay ebay ubliclypay
eensay, atthay onay othbay idessay eway eetmay onlyay asay ommoncay anday indifferentay
acquaintanceay.”

eS“yay, eryvay indifferentay, indeeday,” aidsay Elizabethay, aughinglylay. oH“ay, Anejay!
aketay arecay.”

“myay earday Izzylay, ouyay annotcay inkthay emay osay eakway asay otay ebay inay angerday ownay.”

i“ay inkthay ouyay areay inay eryvay eatgray angerday ofay akingmay imhay asay uchmay inay ovelay ithway
ouyay asay everay.”

Eythay idday otnay eesay ethay entlemengay againay illtay Uesdaytay; anday mrsay. Ennetbay, inay
ethay eanwhilemay, asway ivinggay ayway otay allay ethay appyhay emesschay ichwhay ethay
ood-humourgay anday ommoncay olitenesspay ofay Ingleybay, inay alfhay anay our’shay isitvay,
adhay evivedray.

Onay Uesdaytay erethay asway aay argelay artypay assembleday atay Ongbournlay; anday ethay otway
owhay ereway ostmay anxiouslyay expecteday, otay ethay editcray ofay eirthay unctualitypay asay
ortsmenspay, ereway inay eryvay oodgay imetay. Enwhay eythay epairedray otay ethay
ining-roomday, Elizabethay eagerlyay atchedway otay eesay etherwhay Ingleybay ouldway aketay
ethay aceplay ichwhay, inay allay eirthay ormerfay artiespay, adhay elongedbay otay imhay, byay
erhay istersay. Erhay udentpray othermay, occupieday byay ethay amesay ideasay, orborefay otay
inviteay imhay otay itsay byay erselfhay. Onay enteringay ethay oomray, ehay eemedsay otay
esitatehay; utbay Anejay appenedhay otay ooklay oundray, anday appenedhay otay ilesmay: itay asway
ecidedday. Ehay acedplay imselfhay byay erhay.

Elizabethay, ithway aay iumphanttray ensationsay, ookedlay owardstay ishay iendfray. Ehay
orebay itay ithway oblenay indifferenceay; anday eshay ouldway avehay imagineday atthay
Ingleybay adhay eceivedray ishay anctionsay otay ebay appyhay, adhay eshay otnay eensay ishay eyesay
ikewiselay urnedtay owardstay mray. Arcyday, ithway anay expressionay ofay alf-laughinghay
alarmay.

Ishay ehaviourbay otay erhay istersay asway uchsay uringday innertimeday asay owedshay anay
admirationay ofay erhay, ichwhay, oughthay oremay uardedgay anthay ormerlyfay, ersuadedpay
Elizabethay, atthay, ifay eftlay ollywhay otay imselfhay, Ane’sjay appinesshay, anday ishay
ownay, ouldway ebay eedilyspay ecuredsay. Oughthay eshay aredday otnay ependday uponay ethay
onsequencecay, eshay etyay eceivedray easureplay omfray observingay ishay ehaviourbay. Itay
avegay erhay allay ethay animationay atthay erhay iritsspay ouldcay oastbay; orfay eshay asway inay
onay eerfulchay umourhay. mray. Arcyday asway almostay asay arfay omfray erhay asay ethay abletay
ouldcay ivideday emthay. Ehay asway onay oneay idesay ofay erhay othermay. Eshay ewknay owhay ittlelay
uchsay aay ituationsay ouldway ivegay easureplay otay eitheray, oray akemay eitheray appearay otay
advantageay. Eshay asway otnay earnay enoughay otay earhay anyay ofay eirthay iscourseday; utbay
eshay ouldcay eesay owhay eldomsay eythay okespay otay eachay otheray, anday owhay ormalfay anday
oldcay asway eirthay annermay eneverwhay eythay idday. Erhay other’smay ungraciousnessay
ademay ethay ensesay ofay atwhay eythay oweday imhay oremay ainfulpay otay Elizabeth’say indmay;
anday eshay ouldway, atay imestay, avehay ivengay anythingay otay ebay ivilegedpray otay elltay
imhay, atthay ishay indnesskay asway eithernay unknownay ornay unfeltay byay ethay olewhay ofay
ethay amilyfay.

Eshay asway inay opeshay atthay ethay eveningay ouldway afforday omesay opportunityay ofay
ingingbray emthay ogethertay; atthay ethay olewhay ofay ethay isitvay ouldway otnay asspay awayay
ithoutway enablingay emthay otay enteray intoay omethingsay oremay ofay onversationcay,
anthay ethay eremay eremoniouscay alutationsay attendingay ishay entranceay. Anxiousay anday
uneasyay, ethay eriodpay ichwhay assedpay inay ethay awing-roomdray eforebay ethay entlemengay
amecay, asway earisomeway anday ullday otay aay egreeday atthay almostay ademay erhay uncivilay.
Eshay ookedlay orwardfay otay eirthay entranceay asay ethay ointpay onay ichwhay allay erhay
ancechay ofay easureplay orfay ethay eveningay ustmay ependday.

iF“ay ehay oesday otnay omecay otay emay, en_thay_,” aidsay eshay, i“ay allshay ivegay imhay upay orfay
everay.”

Ethay entlemengay amecay; anday eshay oughtthay ehay ookedlay asay ifay ehay ouldway avehay
answereday erhay opeshay; utbay, alasay! ethay adieslay adhay owdedcray oundray ethay abletay,
erewhay Issmay Ennetbay asway akingmay eatay, anday Elizabethay ouringpay outay ethay offeecay,
inay osay oseclay aay onfederacycay, atthay erethay asway otnay aay inglesay acancyvay earnay erhay
ichwhay ouldway admitay ofay aay airchay. Anday onay ethay entlemen’sgay approachingay, oneay ofay
ethay irlsgay ovedmay oserclay otay erhay anthay everay, anday aidsay, inay aay isperwhay,--

e“thay enmay an’tshay omecay anday artpay usay, Iay amay eterminedday. Eway antway onenay ofay emthay;
oday eway?”

Arcyday adhay alkedway awayay otay anotheray artpay ofay ethay oomray. Eshay ollowedfay imhay ithway
erhay eyesay, envieday everyoneay otay omwhay ehay okespay, adhay arcelyscay atiencepay enoughay
otay elphay anybodyay otay offeecay, anday enthay asway enrageday againstay erselfhay orfay
eingbay osay illysay!

a“ay anmay owhay ashay onceay eenbay efusedray! Owhay ouldcay Iay everay ebay oolishfay enoughay otay
expectay aay enewalray ofay ishay ovelay? Isay erethay oneay amongay ethay exsay owhay ouldway otnay
otestpray againstay uchsay aay eaknessway asay aay econdsay oposalpray otay ethay amesay omanway?
Erethay isay onay indignityay osay abhorrentay otay eirthay eelingsfay.”

Eshay asway aay ittlelay evivedray, oweverhay, byay ishay ingingbray ackbay ishay offee-cupcay
imselfhay; anday eshay eizedsay ethay opportunityay ofay ayingsay,--

iS“ay ouryay istersay atay Emberleypay illstay?”

eS“yay; eshay illway emainray erethay illtay Istmaschray.”

aNd“ay uiteqay aloneay? Avehay allay erhay iendsfray eftlay erhay?”

“mrsay. Annesleyay isay ithway erhay. Ethay othersay avehay eenbay onegay onay otay Arboroughscay
esethay eethray eeksway.”

Eshay ouldcay inkthay ofay othingnay oremay otay aysay; utbay ifay ehay ishedway otay onversecay
ithway erhay, ehay ightmay avehay etterbay uccesssay. Ehay oodstay byay erhay, oweverhay, orfay
omesay inutesmay, inay ilencesay; anday, atay astlay, onay ethay oungyay ady’slay isperingwhay
otay Elizabethay againay, ehay alkedway awayay.

Enwhay ethay eatay ingsthay ereway emovedray, anday ethay ardcay ablestay acedplay, ethay adieslay
allay oseray; anday Elizabethay asway enthay opinghay otay ebay oonsay oinedjay byay imhay, enwhay
allay erhay iewsvay ereway overthrownay, byay eeingsay imhay allfay aay ictimvay otay erhay
other’smay apacityray orfay istwhay ayersplay, anday inay aay ewfay omentsmay afteray eatedsay
ithway ethay estray ofay ethay artypay. Eshay ownay ostlay everyay expectationay ofay easureplay.
Eythay ereway onfinedcay orfay ethay eveningay atay ifferentday ablestay; anday eshay adhay
othingnay otay opehay, utbay atthay ishay eyesay ereway osay oftenay urnedtay owardstay erhay idesay
ofay ethay oomray, asay otay akemay imhay ayplay asay unsuccessfullyay asay erselfhay.

mrsay. Ennetbay adhay esignedday otay eepkay ethay otway Etherfieldnay entlemengay otay
uppersay; utbay eirthay arriagecay asway, unluckilyay, ordereday eforebay anyay ofay ethay
othersay, anday eshay adhay onay opportunityay ofay etainingday emthay.

eLl“way, irlsgay,” aidsay eshay, asay oonsay asay eythay ereway eftlay otay emselvesthay, at“whay
aysay ouyay otay ethay ayday? Iay inkthay everythingay ashay assedpay offay uncommonlyay ellway, Iay
assureay ouyay. Ethay innerday asway asay ellway esseddray asay anyay Iay everay awsay. Ethay
enisonvay asway oastedray otay aay urn--andtay everybodyay aidsay, eythay evernay awsay osay atfay
aay aunchhay. Ethay oupsay asway iftyfay imestay etterbay anthay atwhay eway adhay atay ethay
Ucaseslay’ astlay eekway; anday evenay mray. Arcyday acknowledgeday atthay ethay artridgespay
ereway emarkablyray ellway oneday; anday Iay upposesay ehay ashay otway oray eethray Enchfray
ookscay atay eastlay. Anday, myay earday Anejay, Iay evernay awsay ouyay ooklay inay eatergray
eautybay. mrsay. Onglay aidsay osay ootay, orfay Iay askeday erhay etherwhay ouyay idday otnay. Anday
atwhay oday ouyay inkthay eshay aidsay esidesbay? aH‘ay! mrsay. Ennetbay, eway allshay avehay erhay
atay Etherfieldnay atay astlay!’ Eshay idday, indeeday. Iay oday inkthay mrsay. Onglay isay asay
oodgay aay eaturecray asay everay ived--andlay erhay iecesnay areay eryvay ettypray ehavedbay
irlsgay, anday otnay atay allay andsomehay: Iay ikelay emthay odigiouslypray.”

iLlustration[ay:

“m^{rsay}. Onglay anday erhay iecesnay.”
ay]

mrsay. Ennetbay, inay ortshay, asway inay eryvay eatgray iritsspay: eshay adhay eensay enoughay ofay
Ingley’sbay ehaviourbay otay Anejay otay ebay onvincedcay atthay eshay ouldway etgay imhay atay
astlay; anday erhay expectationsay ofay advantageay otay erhay amilyfay, enwhay inay aay appyhay
umourhay, ereway osay arfay eyondbay easonray, atthay eshay asway uiteqay isappointedday atay
otnay eeingsay imhay erethay againay ethay extnay ayday, otay akemay ishay oposalspray.

iT“ay ashay eenbay aay eryvay agreeableay ayday,” aidsay Issmay Ennetbay otay Elizabethay. e“thay
artypay eemedsay osay ellway electedsay, osay uitablesay oneay ithway ethay otheray. Iay opehay eway
aymay oftenay eetmay againay.”

Elizabethay iledsmay.

iZzy“lay, ouyay ustmay otnay oday osay. Ouyay ustmay otnay uspectsay emay. Itay ortifiesmay emay. Iay
assureay ouyay atthay Iay avehay ownay earntlay otay enjoyay ishay onversationcay asay anay
agreeableay anday ensiblesay oungyay anmay ithoutway avinghay aay ishway eyondbay itay. Iay amay
erfectlypay atisfiedsay, omfray atwhay ishay annersmay ownay areay, atthay ehay evernay adhay
anyay esignday ofay engagingay myay affectionay. Itay isay onlyay atthay ehay isay essedblay ithway
eatergray eetnesssway ofay addressay, anday aay ongerstray esireday ofay enerallygay
easingplay, anthay anyay otheray anmay.”

oU“yay areay eryvay uelcray,” aidsay erhay istersay, ou“yay illway otnay etlay emay ilesmay, anday
areay ovokingpray emay otay itay everyay omentmay.”

oW“hay ardhay itay isay inay omesay asescay otay ebay elievedbay! Anday owhay impossibleay inay
othersay! Utbay whyay ouldshay ouyay ishway otay ersuadepay emay atthay Iay eelfay oremay anthay Iay
acknowledgeay?”

aT“thay isay aay uestionqay ichwhay Iay ardlyhay owknay owhay otay answeray. Eway allay ovelay otay
instructay, oughthay eway ancay eachtay onlyay atwhay isay otnay orthway owingknay. Orgivefay
emay; anday ifay ouyay ersistpay inay indifferenceay, oday otnay akemay e_may_ ouryay
onfidantecay.”




iLlustration[ay:

iZzy“lay, myay earday, Iay antway otay eakspay otay ouyay.”
ay]




APTERchay lvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Aay ewfay aysday afteray isthay isitvay, mray. Ingleybay alledcay againay, anday aloneay. Ishay
iendfray adhay eftlay imhay atthay orningmay orfay Ondonlay, utbay asway otay eturnray omehay inay
entay aysday’ imetay. Ehay atsay ithway emthay aboveay anay ourhay, anday asway inay emarkablyray
oodgay iritsspay. mrsay. Ennetbay inviteday imhay otay ineday ithway emthay; utbay, ithway anymay
expressionsay ofay oncerncay, ehay onfessedcay imselfhay engageday elsewhereay.

eXt“nay imetay ouyay allcay,” aidsay eshay, i“ay opehay eway allshay ebay oremay uckylay.”

Ehay ouldshay ebay articularlypay appyhay atay anyay imetay, etcay., etcay.; anday ifay eshay
ouldway ivegay imhay eavelay, ouldway aketay anay earlyay opportunityay ofay aitingway onay
emthay.

aN“cay ouyay omecay o-morrowtay?”

Esyay, ehay adhay onay engagementay atay allay orfay o-morrowtay; anday erhay invitationay asway
accepteday ithway alacrityay.

Ehay amecay, anday inay uchsay eryvay oodgay imetay, atthay ethay adieslay ereway onenay ofay emthay
esseddray. Inay anray mrsay. Ennetbay otay erhay aughtersday’ oomray, inay erhay
essing-gowndray, anday ithway erhay airhay alfhay inishedfay, ingcryay outay,--

“myay earday Anejay, akemay astehay anday urryhay ownday. Ehay isay ome--mRcay. Ingleybay isay
omecay. Ehay isay, indeeday. Akemay astehay, akemay astehay. Erehay, Arahsay, omecay otay Issmay
Ennetbay isthay omentmay, anday elphay erhay onay ithway erhay owngay. Evernay indmay Issmay
Izzy’slay airhay.”

e“way illway ebay ownday asay oonsay asay eway ancay,” aidsay Anejay; ut“bay Iay areday aysay Ittykay isay
orwarderfay anthay eitheray ofay usay, orfay eshay entway upstairsay alfhay anay ourhay agoay.”

oH“ay! anghay Ittykay! atwhay ashay eshay otay oday ithway itay? Omecay, ebay uickqay, ebay uickqay!
erewhay isay ouryay ashsay, myay earday?”

Utbay enwhay erhay othermay asway onegay, Anejay ouldway otnay ebay evailedpray onay otay ogay ownday
ithoutway oneay ofay erhay isterssay.

Ethay amesay anxietyay otay etgay emthay byay emselvesthay asway isiblevay againay inay ethay
eveningay. Afteray eatay, mray. Ennetbay etiredray otay ethay ibrarylay, asay asway ishay
ustomcay, anday Arymay entway upstairsay otay erhay instrumentay. Otway obstaclesay ofay ethay
ivefay eingbay usthay emovedray, mrsay. Ennetbay atsay ookinglay anday inkingway atay
Elizabethay anday Atherinecay orfay aay onsiderablecay imetay, ithoutway akingmay anyay
impressionay onay emthay. Elizabethay ouldway otnay observeay erhay; anday enwhay atay astlay
Ittykay idday, eshay eryvay innocentlyay aidsay, aT“whay isay ethay attermay, ammamay? Atwhay oday
ouyay eepkay inkingway atay emay orfay? Atwhay amay Iay otay oday?”

oThing“nay, ildchay, othingnay. Iay idday otnay inkway atay ouyay.” Eshay enthay atsay illstay
ivefay inutesmay ongerlay; utbay unableay otay asteway uchsay aay eciouspray occasionay, eshay
uddenlysay otgay upay, anday ayingsay otay Ittykay,--

oMe“cay erehay, myay ovelay, Iay antway otay eakspay otay ouyay,” ooktay erhay outay ofay ethay oomray.
Anejay instantlyay avegay aay ooklay atay Elizabethay ichwhay okespay erhay istressday atay uchsay
emeditationpray, anday erhay entreatyay atthay e_shay_ ouldway otnay ivegay inay otay itay. Inay aay
ewfay inutesmay, mrsay. Ennetbay alfhay openeday ethay oorday anday alledcay outay,--

iZzy“lay, myay earday, Iay antway otay eakspay ithway ouyay.”

Elizabethay asway orcedfay otay ogay.

e“way aymay asay ellway eavelay emthay byay emselvesthay, ouyay owknay,” aidsay erhay othermay asay
oonsay asay eshay asway inay ethay allhay. iTty“kay anday Iay areay oinggay upstairsay otay itsay inay
myay essing-roomdray.”

Elizabethay ademay onay attemptay otay easonray ithway erhay othermay, utbay emainedray
uietlyqay inay ethay allhay illtay eshay anday Ittykay ereway outay ofay ightsay, enthay eturnedray
intoay ethay awing-roomdray.

mrsay. Ennet’sbay emesschay orfay isthay ayday ereway ineffectualay. Ingleybay asway
everythingay atthay asway armingchay, exceptay ethay ofessedpray overlay ofay erhay
aughterday. Ishay easeay anday eerfulnesschay enderedray imhay aay ostmay agreeableay
additionay otay eirthay eveningay artypay; anday ehay orebay ithway ethay ill-judgeday
officiousnessay ofay ethay othermay, anday eardhay allay erhay illysay emarksray ithway aay
orbearancefay anday ommandcay ofay ountenancecay articularlypay atefulgray otay ethay
aughterday.

Ehay arcelyscay eedednay anay invitationay otay aystay uppersay; anday eforebay ehay entway awayay
anay engagementay asway ormedfay, ieflychay oughthray ishay ownay anday mrsay. Ennet’sbay
eansmay, orfay ishay omingcay extnay orningmay otay ootshay ithway erhay usbandhay.

Afteray isthay ayday, Anejay aidsay onay oremay ofay erhay indifferenceay. Otnay aay ordway assedpay
etweenbay ethay isterssay oncerningcay Ingleybay; utbay Elizabethay entway otay edbay inay ethay
appyhay eliefbay atthay allay ustmay eedilyspay ebay oncludedcay, unlessay mray. Arcyday
eturnedray ithinway ethay atedstay imetay. Eriouslysay, oweverhay, eshay eltfay olerablytay
ersuadedpay atthay allay isthay ustmay avehay akentay aceplay ithway atthay entleman’sgay
oncurrencecay.

Ingleybay asway unctualpay otay ishay appointmentay; anday ehay anday mray. Ennetbay entspay ethay
orningmay ogethertay, asay adhay eenbay agreeday onay. Ethay atterlay asway uchmay oremay
agreeableay anthay ishay ompanioncay expecteday. Erethay asway othingnay ofay esumptionpray
oray ollyfay inay Ingleybay atthay ouldcay ovokepray ishay idiculeray, oray isgustday imhay intoay
ilencesay; anday ehay asway oremay ommunicativecay, anday esslay eccentricay, anthay ethay
otheray adhay everay eensay imhay. Ingleybay ofay oursecay eturnedray ithway imhay otay innerday;
anday inay ethay eveningay mrsay. Ennet’sbay inventionay asway againay atay orkway otay etgay
everybodyay awayay omfray imhay anday erhay aughterday. Elizabethay, owhay adhay aay etterlay otay
itewray, entway intoay ethay eakfast-roombray orfay atthay urposepay oonsay afteray eatay; orfay
asay ethay othersay ereway allay oinggay otay itsay ownday otay ardscay, eshay ouldcay otnay ebay
antedway otay ounteractcay erhay other’smay emesschay.

Utbay onay erhay eturningray otay ethay awing-roomdray, enwhay erhay etterlay asway inishedfay,
eshay awsay, otay erhay infiniteay urprisesay, erethay asway easonray otay earfay atthay erhay
othermay adhay eenbay ootay ingeniousay orfay erhay. Onay openingay ethay oorday, eshay
erceivedpay erhay istersay anday Ingleybay andingstay ogethertay overay ethay earthhay, asay
ifay engageday inay earnestay onversationcay; anday adhay isthay edlay otay onay uspicionsay,
ethay acesfay ofay othbay, asay eythay astilyhay urnedtay oundray anday ovedmay awayay omfray eachay
otheray, ouldway avehay oldtay itay allay. eIr_thay_ ituationsay asway awkwarday enoughay; utbay
ers_hay_ eshay oughtthay asway illstay orseway. Otnay aay ablesyllay asway uttereday byay
eitheray; anday Elizabethay asway onay ethay ointpay ofay oinggay awayay againay, enwhay
Ingleybay, owhay asay ellway asay ethay otheray adhay atsay ownday, uddenlysay oseray, anday,
isperingwhay aay ewfay ordsway otay erhay istersay, anray outay ofay ethay oomray.

Anejay ouldcay avehay onay eservesray omfray Elizabethay, erewhay onfidencecay ouldway ivegay
easureplay; anday, instantlyay embracingay erhay, acknowledgeday, ithway ethay iveliestlay
emotionay, atthay eshay asway ethay appiesthay eaturecray inay ethay orldway.

is“’tay ootay uchmay!” eshay addeday, “byay arfay ootay uchmay. Iay oday otnay eserveday itay. Ohay,
whyay isay otnay everybodyay asay appyhay?”

Elizabeth’say ongratulationscay ereway ivengay ithway aay inceritysay, aay armthway, aay
elightday, ichwhay ordsway ouldcay utbay oorlypay expressay. Everyay entencesay ofay
indnesskay asway aay eshfray ourcesay ofay appinesshay otay Anejay. Utbay eshay ouldway otnay
alloway erselfhay otay aystay ithway erhay istersay, oray aysay alfhay atthay emainedray otay ebay
aidsay, orfay ethay esentpray.

i“ay ustmay ogay instantlyay otay myay othermay,” eshay iedcray. i“ay ouldway otnay onay anyay
accountay ifletray ithway erhay affectionateay olicitudesay, oray alloway erhay otay earhay itay
omfray anyoneay utbay elfmysay. Ehay isay onegay otay myay atherfay alreadyay. Ohay, Izzylay, otay
owknay atthay atwhay Iay avehay otay elateray illway ivegay uchsay easureplay otay allay myay earday
amilyfay! owhay allshay Iay earbay osay uchmay appinesshay?”

Eshay enthay astenedhay awayay otay erhay othermay, owhay adhay urposelypay okenbray upay ethay
ard-partycay, anday asway ittingsay upstairsay ithway Ittykay.

Elizabethay, owhay asway eftlay byay erselfhay, ownay iledsmay atay ethay apidityray anday easeay
ithway ichwhay anay affairay asway inallyfay ettledsay, atthay adhay ivengay emthay osay anymay
eviouspray onthsmay ofay uspensesay anday exationvay.

aNd“ay isthay,” aidsay eshay, is“ay ethay enday ofay allay ishay iend’sfray anxiousay
ircumspectioncay! ofay allay ishay ister’ssay alsehoodfay anday ontrivancecay! ethay
appiesthay, isestway, anday ostmay easonableray enday!”

Inay aay ewfay inutesmay eshay asway oinedjay byay Ingleybay, osewhay onferencecay ithway erhay
atherfay adhay eenbay ortshay anday otay ethay urposepay.

eRe“whay isay ouryay istersay?” aidsay ehay astilyhay, asay ehay openeday ethay oorday.

iTh“way myay othermay upstairsay. Eshay illway ebay ownday inay aay omentmay, Iay areday aysay.”

Ehay enthay utshay ethay oorday, anday, omingcay upay otay erhay, aimedclay ethay oodgay ishesway
anday affectionay ofay aay istersay. Elizabethay onestlyhay anday eartilyhay expresseday erhay
elightday inay ethay ospectpray ofay eirthay elationshipray. Eythay ookshay andshay ithway
eatgray ordialitycay; anday enthay, illtay erhay istersay amecay ownday, eshay adhay otay istenlay
otay allay ehay adhay otay aysay ofay ishay ownay appinesshay, anday ofay Ane’sjay erfectionspay;
anday inay itespay ofay ishay eingbay aay overlay, Elizabethay eallyray elievedbay allay ishay
expectationsay ofay elicityfay otay ebay ationallyray oundedfay, ecausebay eythay adhay orfay
asisbay ethay excellentay understandingay anday uper-excellentsay ispositionday ofay
Anejay, anday aay eneralgay imilaritysay ofay eelingfay anday astetay etweenbay erhay anday
imselfhay.

Itay asway anay eveningay ofay onay ommoncay elightday otay emthay allay; ethay atisfactionsay ofay
Issmay Ennet’sbay indmay avegay uchsay aay owglay ofay eetsway animationay otay erhay acefay, asay
ademay erhay ooklay andsomerhay anthay everay. Ittykay imperedsay anday iledsmay, anday opedhay
erhay urntay asway omingcay oonsay. mrsay. Ennetbay ouldcay otnay ivegay erhay onsentcay, oray
eakspay erhay approbationay inay ermstay armway enoughay otay atisfysay erhay eelingsfay,
oughthay eshay alkedtay otay Ingleybay ofay othingnay elseay, orfay alfhay anay ourhay; anday enwhay
mray. Ennetbay oinedjay emthay atay uppersay, ishay oicevay anday annermay ainlyplay owedshay
owhay eallyray appyhay ehay asway.

Otnay aay ordway, oweverhay, assedpay ishay ipslay inay allusionay otay itay, illtay eirthay
isitorvay ooktay ishay eavelay orfay ethay ightnay; utbay asay oonsay asay ehay asway onegay, ehay
urnedtay otay ishay aughterday anday aidsay,--

aNe“jay, Iay ongratulatecay ouyay. Ouyay illway ebay aay eryvay appyhay omanway.”

Anejay entway otay imhay instantlyay, issedkay imhay, anday ankedthay imhay orfay ishay
oodnessgay.

oU“yay areay aay oodgay irlgay,” ehay epliedray, and“ay Iay avehay eatgray easureplay inay
inkingthay ouyay illway ebay osay appilyhay ettledsay. Iay avehay otnay aay oubtday ofay ouryay
oingday eryvay ellway ogethertay. Ouryay emperstay areay byay onay eansmay unlikeay. Ouyay areay
eachay ofay ouyay osay omplyingcay, atthay othingnay illway everay ebay esolvedray onay; osay
easyay, atthay everyay ervantsay illway eatchay ouyay; anday osay enerousgay, atthay ouyay illway
alwaysay exceeday ouryay incomeay.”

i“ay opehay otnay osay. Imprudenceay oray oughtlessnessthay inay oneymay attersmay ouldway ebay
unpardonableay inay e_may_.”

eXceed“ay eirthay incomeay! myay earday mray. Ennetbay,” iedcray ishay ifeway, at“whay areay ouyay
alkingtay ofay? whyay, ehay ashay ourfay oray ivefay ousandthay aay earyay, anday eryvay ikelylay
oremay.” Enthay addressingay erhay aughterday, oH“ay, myay earday, earday Anejay, Iay amay osay
appyhay! Iay amay uresay Iay an’tshay etgay aay inkway ofay eepslay allay ightnay. Iay ewknay owhay itay
ouldway ebay. Iay alwaysay aidsay itay ustmay ebay osay, atay astlay. Iay asway uresay ouyay ouldcay otnay
ebay osay eautifulbay orfay othingnay! Iay ememberray, asay oonsay asay everay Iay awsay imhay, enwhay
ehay irstfay amecay intoay Ertfordshirehay astlay earyay, Iay oughtthay owhay ikelylay itay asway
atthay ouyay ouldshay omecay ogethertay. Ohay, ehay isay ethay andsomesthay oungyay anmay atthay
everay asway eensay!”

Ickhamway, Ialyday, ereway allay orgottenfay. Anejay asway eyondbay ompetitioncay erhay
avouritefay ildchay. Atay atthay omentmay eshay aredcay orfay onay otheray. Erhay oungeryay
isterssay oonsay eganbay otay akemay interestay ithway erhay orfay objectsay ofay appinesshay
ichwhay eshay ightmay inay uturefay ebay ableay otay ispenseday.

Arymay etitionedpay orfay ethay useay ofay ethay ibrarylay atay Etherfieldnay; anday Ittykay
eggedbay eryvay ardhay orfay aay ewfay allsbay erethay everyay interway.

Ingleybay, omfray isthay imetay, asway ofay oursecay aay ailyday isitorvay atay Ongbournlay;
omingcay equentlyfray eforebay eakfastbray, anday alwaysay emainingray illtay afteray
uppersay; unlessay enwhay omesay arbarousbay eighbournay, owhay ouldcay otnay ebay enoughay
etestedday, adhay ivengay imhay anay invitationay otay innerday, ichwhay ehay oughtthay
imselfhay obligeday otay acceptay.

Elizabethay adhay ownay utbay ittlelay imetay orfay onversationcay ithway erhay istersay; orfay
ilewhay ehay asway esentpray Anejay adhay onay attentionay otay estowbay onay anyoneay elseay: utbay
eshay oundfay erselfhay onsiderablycay usefulay otay othbay ofay emthay, inay osethay ourshay ofay
eparationsay atthay ustmay ometimessay occuray. Inay ethay absenceay ofay Anejay, ehay alwaysay
attacheday imselfhay otay Elizabethay orfay ethay easureplay ofay alkingtay ofay erhay; anday
enwhay Ingleybay asway onegay, Anejay onstantlycay oughtsay ethay amesay eansmay ofay eliefray.

e“hay ashay ademay emay osay appyhay,” aidsay eshay, oneay eveningay, “byay ellingtay emay atthay ehay
asway otallytay ignorantay ofay myay eingbay inay owntay astlay ingspray! Iay adhay otnay elievedbay
itay ossiblepay.”

i“ay uspectedsay asay uchmay,” epliedray Elizabethay. uT“bay owhay idday ehay accountay orfay
itay?”

iT“ay ustmay avehay eenbay ishay isterssay’ oingday. Eythay ereway ertainlycay onay iendsfray otay
ishay acquaintanceay ithway emay, ichwhay Iay annotcay onderway atay, incesay ehay ightmay avehay
osenchay osay uchmay oremay advantageouslyay inay anymay espectsray. Utbay enwhay eythay eesay,
asay Iay usttray eythay illway, atthay eirthay otherbray isay appyhay ithway emay, eythay illway
earnlay otay ebay ontentedcay, anday eway allshay ebay onay oodgay ermstay againay: oughthay eway
ancay evernay ebay atwhay eway onceay ereway otay eachay otheray.”

aT“thay isay ethay ostmay unforgivingay eechspay,” aidsay Elizabethay, at“thay Iay everay
eardhay ouyay utteray. Oodgay irlgay! Itay ouldway exvay emay, indeeday, otay eesay ouyay againay
ethay upeday ofay Issmay Ingley’sbay etendedpray egardray.”

oUld“way ouyay elievebay itay, Izzylay, atthay enwhay ehay entway otay owntay astlay Ovembernay ehay
eallyray ovedlay emay, anday othingnay utbay aay ersuasionpay ofay _myay_ eingbay indifferentay
ouldway avehay eventedpray ishay omingcay ownday againay?”

e“hay ademay aay ittlelay istakemay, otay ebay uresay; utbay itay isay otay ethay editcray ofay ishay
odestymay.”

Isthay aturallynay introduceday aay anegyricpay omfray Anejay onay ishay iffidenceday, anday
ethay ittlelay aluevay ehay utpay onay ishay ownay oodgay ualitiesqay.

Elizabethay asway easedplay otay indfay atthay ehay adhay otnay etrayedbay ethay interferenceay
ofay ishay iendfray; orfay, oughthay Anejay adhay ethay ostmay enerousgay anday orgivingfay
earthay inay ethay orldway, eshay ewknay itay asway aay ircumstancecay ichwhay ustmay ejudicepray
erhay againstay imhay.

i“ay amay ertainlycay ethay ostmay ortunatefay eaturecray atthay everay existeday!” iedcray
Anejay. oH“ay, Izzylay, whyay amay Iay usthay ingledsay omfray myay amilyfay, anday essedblay
aboveay emthay allay? Ifay Iay ouldcay utbay eesay ouyay asay appyhay! Ifay erethay ereway utbay uchsay
anotheray anmay orfay ouyay!”

iF“ay ouyay ereway otay ivegay emay ortyfay uchsay enmay Iay evernay ouldcay ebay osay appyhay asay ouyay.
Illtay Iay avehay ouryay ispositionday, ouryay oodnessgay, Iay evernay ancay avehay ouryay
appinesshay. Onay, onay, etlay emay iftshay orfay elfmysay; anday, erhapspay, ifay Iay avehay eryvay
oodgay ucklay, Iay aymay eetmay ithway anotheray mray. Ollinscay inay imetay.”

Ethay ituationsay ofay affairsay inay ethay Ongbournlay amilyfay ouldcay otnay ebay onglay aay
ecretsay. mrsay. Ennetbay asway ivilegedpray otay isperwhay itay otay mrsay. Ilipsphay, anday
eshay enturedvay, ithoutway anyay ermissionpay, otay oday ethay amesay byay allay erhay
eighboursnay inay Erytonmay.

Ethay Ennetsbay ereway eedilyspay onouncedpray otay ebay ethay uckiestlay amilyfay inay ethay
orldway; oughthay onlyay aay ewfay eeksway eforebay, enwhay Ialyday adhay irstfay unray awayay,
eythay adhay eenbay enerallygay ovedpray otay ebay arkedmay outay orfay isfortunemay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay Ilvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Oneay orningmay, aboutay aay eekway afteray Ingley’sbay engagementay ithway Anejay adhay eenbay
ormedfay, asay ehay anday ethay emalesfay ofay ethay amilyfay ereway ittingsay ogethertay inay ethay
ining-roomday, eirthay attentionay asway uddenlysay awndray otay ethay indowway byay ethay
oundsay ofay aay arriagecay; anday eythay erceivedpay aay aisechay anday ourfay ivingdray upay ethay
