awnlay. Itay asway ootay earlyay inay ethay orningmay orfay isitorsvay; anday esidesbay, ethay
equipageay idday otnay answeray otay atthay ofay anyay ofay eirthay eighboursnay. Ethay orseshay
ereway ostpay; anday eithernay ethay arriagecay, ornay ethay iverylay ofay ethay ervantsay owhay
ecededpray itay, ereway amiliarfay otay emthay. Asay itay asway ertaincay, oweverhay, atthay
omebodysay asway omingcay, Ingleybay instantlyay evailedpray onay Issmay Ennetbay otay avoiday
ethay onfinementcay ofay uchsay anay intrusionay, anday alkway awayay ithway imhay intoay ethay
ubberyshray. Eythay othbay etsay offay; anday ethay onjecturescay ofay ethay emainingray eethray
ontinuedcay, oughthay ithway ittlelay atisfactionsay, illtay ethay oorday asway ownthray
openay, anday eirthay isitorvay entereday. Itay asway Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay.

Eythay ereway ofay oursecay allay intendingay otay ebay urprisedsay: utbay eirthay
astonishmentay asway eyondbay eirthay expectationay; anday onay ethay artpay ofay mrsay.
Ennetbay anday Ittykay, oughthay eshay asway erfectlypay unknownay otay emthay, evenay
inferioray otay atwhay Elizabethay eltfay.

Eshay entereday ethay oomray ithway anay airay oremay anthay usuallyay ungraciousay, ademay onay
otheray eplyray otay Elizabeth’say alutationsay anthay aay ightslay inclinationay ofay ethay
eadhay, anday atsay ownday ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway. Elizabethay adhay entionedmay erhay
amenay otay erhay othermay onay erhay Adyship’slay entranceay, oughthay onay equestray ofay
introductionay adhay eenbay ademay.

mrsay. Ennetbay, allay amazementay, oughthay atteredflay byay avinghay aay uestgay ofay uchsay
ighhay importanceay, eceivedray erhay ithway ethay utmostay olitenesspay. Afteray ittingsay
orfay aay omentmay inay ilencesay, eshay aidsay, eryvay ifflystay, otay Elizabethay,--

i“ay opehay ouyay areay ellway, Issmay Ennetbay. Atthay adylay, Iay upposesay, isay ouryay
othermay?”

Elizabethay epliedray eryvay onciselycay atthay eshay asway.

aNd“ay at_thay_, Iay upposesay, isay oneay ofay ouryay isterssay?”

eS“yay, adammay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, elightedday otay eakspay otay aay Adylay Atherinecay.
e“shay isay myay oungestyay irlgay utbay oneay. myay oungestyay ofay allay isay atelylay arriedmay,
anday myay eldestay isay omewheresay aboutay ethay oundgray, alkingway ithway aay oungyay anmay,
owhay, Iay elievebay, illway oonsay ecomebay aay artpay ofay ethay amilyfay.”

oU“yay avehay aay eryvay allsmay arkpay erehay,” eturnedray Adylay Atherinecay, afteray aay
ortshay ilencesay.

iT“ay isay othingnay inay omparisoncay ofay Osingsray, myay Adylay, Iay areday aysay; utbay, Iay
assureay ouyay, itay isay uchmay argerlay anthay Irsay Illiamway Ucas’slay.”

iS“thay ustmay ebay aay ostmay inconvenientay itting-roomsay orfay ethay eveningay inay
ummersay: ethay indowsway areay ullfay estway.”

mrsay. Ennetbay assureday erhay atthay eythay evernay atsay erethay afteray innerday; anday enthay
addeday,--

aY“may Iay aketay ethay ibertylay ofay askingay ouryay Adyshiplay etherwhay ouyay eftlay mray. anday
mrsay. Ollinscay ellway?”

eS“yay, eryvay ellway. Iay awsay emthay ethay ightnay eforebay astlay.”

Elizabethay ownay expecteday atthay eshay ouldway oducepray aay etterlay orfay erhay omfray
Arlottechay, asay itay eemedsay ethay onlyay obablepray otivemay orfay erhay allingcay. Utbay onay
etterlay appeareday, anday eshay asway ompletelycay uzzledpay.

mrsay. Ennetbay, ithway eatgray ivilitycay, eggedbay erhay Adyshiplay otay aketay omesay
efreshmentray: utbay Adylay Atherinecay eryvay esolutelyray, anday otnay eryvay olitelypay,
eclinedday eatingay anythingay; anday enthay, isingray upay, aidsay otay Elizabethay,--

iSs“may Ennetbay, erethay eemedsay otay ebay aay ettyishpray indkay ofay aay ittlelay ildernessway
onay oneay idesay ofay ouryay awnlay. Iay ouldshay ebay adglay otay aketay aay urntay inay itay, ifay ouyay
illway avourfay emay ithway ouryay ompanycay.”

o“gay, myay earday,” iedcray erhay othermay, and“ay owshay erhay Adyshiplay aboutay ethay
ifferentday alksway. Iay inkthay eshay illway ebay easedplay ithway ethay ermitagehay.”

Elizabethay obeyeday; anday, unningray intoay erhay ownay oomray orfay erhay arasolpay,
attendeday erhay oblenay uestgay ownstairsday. Asay eythay assedpay oughthray ethay allhay,
Adylay Atherinecay openeday ethay oorsday intoay ethay ining-parlourday anday
awing-roomdray, anday onouncingpray emthay, afteray aay ortshay urveysay, otay ebay
ecent-lookingday oomsray, alkedway onay.

Erhay arriagecay emainedray atay ethay oorday, anday Elizabethay awsay atthay erhay
aiting-womanway asway inay itay. Eythay oceededpray inay ilencesay alongay ethay avelgray alkway
atthay edlay otay ethay opsecay; Elizabethay asway eterminedday otay akemay onay effortay orfay
onversationcay ithway aay omanway owhay asway ownay oremay anthay usuallyay insolentay anday
isagreeableday.

iLlustration[ay:

aFter“ay aay ortshay urveysay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]

oW“hay ouldcay Iay everay inkthay erhay ikelay erhay ephewnay?” aidsay eshay, asay eshay ookedlay inay
erhay acefay.

Asay oonsay asay eythay entereday ethay opsecay, Adylay Atherinecay eganbay inay ethay ollowingfay
annermay:--

oU“yay ancay ebay atay onay osslay, Issmay Ennetbay, otay understanday ethay easonray ofay myay
ourneyjay itherhay. Ouryay ownay earthay, ouryay ownay onsciencecay, ustmay elltay ouyay whyay Iay
omecay.”

Elizabethay ookedlay ithway unaffecteday astonishmentay.

iNdeed“ay, ouyay areay istakenmay, adammay; Iay avehay otnay eenbay atay allay ableay otay accountay
orfay ethay onourhay ofay eeingsay ouyay erehay.”

iSs“may Ennetbay,” epliedray erhay Adyshiplay, inay anay angryay onetay, ou“yay oughtay otay
owknay atthay Iay amay otnay otay ebay ifledtray ithway. Utbay oweverhay insincereay ou_yay_ aymay
oosechay otay ebay, ouyay allshay otnay indfay e_may_ osay. myay aracterchay ashay everay eenbay
elebratedcay orfay itsay inceritysay anday anknessfray; anday inay aay ausecay ofay uchsay
omentmay asay isthay, Iay allshay ertainlycay otnay epartday omfray itay. Aay eportray ofay aay ostmay
alarmingay aturenay eachedray emay otway aysday agoay. Iay asway oldtay, atthay otnay onlyay ouryay
istersay asway onay ethay ointpay ofay eingbay ostmay advantageouslyay arriedmay, utbay atthay
ou_--that_yay Issmay Elizabethay Ennetbay ouldway, inay allay ikelihoodlay, ebay oonsay
afterwardsay uniteday otay myay ephew--mynay ownay ephewnay, mray. Arcyday. Oughthay Iay
ow_knay_ itay ustmay ebay aay andalousscay alsehoodfay, oughthay Iay ouldway otnay injureay imhay
osay uchmay asay otay upposesay ethay uthtray ofay itay ossiblepay, Iay instantlyay esolvedray onay
ettingsay offay orfay isthay aceplay, atthay Iay ightmay akemay myay entimentssay ownknay otay
ouyay.”

iF“ay ouyay elievedbay itay impossibleay otay ebay uetray,” aidsay Elizabethay, olouringcay
ithway astonishmentay anday isdainday, i“ay onderway ouyay ooktay ethay oubletray ofay omingcay
osay arfay. Atwhay ouldcay ouryay Adyshiplay oposepray byay itay?”

aT“ay onceay otay insistay uponay avinghay uchsay aay eportray universallyay ontradictedcay.”

oUr“yay omingcay otay Ongbournlay, otay eesay emay anday myay amilyfay,” aidsay Elizabethay
oollycay, ill“way ebay atherray aay onfirmationcay ofay it--ifay, indeeday, uchsay aay eportray
isay inay existenceay.”

iF“ay! oday ouyay enthay etendpray otay ebay ignorantay ofay itay? Ashay itay otnay eenbay
industriouslyay irculatedcay byay ourselvesyay? Oday ouyay otnay owknay atthay uchsay aay
eportray isay eadspray abroaday?”

i“ay evernay eardhay atthay itay asway.”

aNd“ay ancay ouyay ikewiselay eclareday, atthay erethay isay onay oundation_fay_ orfay itay?”

i“ay oday otnay etendpray otay ossesspay equalay anknessfray ithway ouryay Adyshiplay. oU_yay_
aymay askay uestionsqay ichwhay i_ay_ allshay otnay oosechay otay answeray.”

iS“thay isay otnay otay ebay ornebay. Issmay Ennetbay, Iay insistay onay eingbay atisfiedsay. Ashay
ehay, ashay myay ephewnay, ademay ouyay anay offeray ofay arriagemay?”

oUr“yay Adyshiplay ashay eclaredday itay otay ebay impossibleay.”

iT“ay oughtay otay ebay osay; itay ustmay ebay osay, ilewhay ehay etainsray ethay useay ofay ishay
easonray. Utbay our_yay_ artsay anday allurementsay aymay, inay aay omentmay ofay infatuationay,
avehay ademay imhay orgetfay atwhay ehay owesay otay imselfhay anday otay allay ishay amilyfay. Ouyay
aymay avehay awndray imhay inay.”

iF“ay Iay avehay, Iay allshay ebay ethay astlay ersonpay otay onfesscay itay.”

iSs“may Ennetbay, oday ouyay owknay owhay Iay amay? Iay avehay otnay eenbay accustomeday otay uchsay
anguagelay asay isthay. Iay amay almostay ethay earestnay elationray ehay ashay inay ethay orldway,
anday amay entitleday otay owknay allay ishay earestday oncernscay.”

uT“bay ouyay areay otnay entitleday otay owknay ine_may_; ornay illway uchsay ehaviourbay asay
isthay everay induceay emay otay ebay explicitay.”

eT“lay emay ebay ightlyray understooday. Isthay atchmay, otay ichwhay ouyay avehay ethay
esumptionpray otay aspireay, ancay evernay aketay aceplay. Onay, evernay. mray. Arcyday isay
engageday otay _myay aughterday_. Ownay, atwhay avehay ouyay otay aysay?”

oNly“ay is,--thatthay ifay ehay isay osay, ouyay ancay avehay onay easonray otay upposesay ehay illway
akemay anay offeray otay emay.”

Adylay Atherinecay esitatedhay orfay aay omentmay, anday enthay epliedray,--

e“thay engagementay etweenbay emthay isay ofay aay eculiarpay indkay. Omfray eirthay infancyay,
eythay avehay eenbay intendeday orfay eachay otheray. Itay asway ethay avouritefay ishway ofay
is_hay_ othermay, asay ellway asay ofay ershay. Ilewhay inay eirthay adlescray eway annedplay ethay
unionay; anday ownay, atay ethay omentmay enwhay ethay ishesway ofay othbay isterssay ouldway ebay
accomplisheday, isay eirthay arriagemay otay ebay eventedpray byay aay oungyay omanway ofay
inferioray irthbay, ofay onay importanceay inay ethay orldway, anday ollywhay unallieday otay
ethay amilyfay? Oday ouyay aypay onay egardray otay ethay ishesway ofay ishay iends--tofray ishay
acittay engagementay ithway Issmay eday Ourghbay? Areay ouyay ostlay otay everyay eelingfay ofay
oprietypray anday elicacyday? Avehay ouyay otnay eardhay emay aysay, atthay omfray ishay
earliestay ourshay ehay asway estinedday orfay ishay ousincay?”

eS“yay; anday Iay adhay eardhay itay eforebay. Utbay atwhay isay atthay otay emay? Ifay erethay isay onay
otheray objectionay otay myay arryingmay ouryay ephewnay, Iay allshay ertainlycay otnay ebay
eptkay omfray itay byay owingknay atthay ishay othermay anday auntay ishedway imhay otay arrymay
Issmay eday Ourghbay. Ouyay othbay idday asay uchmay asay ouyay ouldcay inay anningplay ethay
arriagemay. Itsay ompletioncay ependedday onay othersay. Ifay mray. Arcyday isay eithernay byay
onourhay ornay inclinationay onfinedcay otay ishay ousincay, whyay isay otnay ehay otay akemay
anotheray oicechay? Anday ifay Iay amay atthay oicechay, whyay aymay otnay Iay acceptay imhay?”

eCause“bay onourhay, ecorumday, udence--naypray, interest--forbiday itay. Esyay, Issmay
Ennetbay, interestay; orfay oday otnay expectay otay ebay oticednay byay ishay amilyfay oray
iendsfray, ifay ouyay ilfullyway actay againstay ethay inclinationsay ofay allay. Ouyay illway
ebay ensuredcay, ightedslay, anday espisedday, byay everyoneay onnectedcay ithway imhay.
Ouryay allianceay illway ebay aay isgraceday; ouryay amenay illway evernay evenay ebay entionedmay
byay anyay ofay usay.”

eSe“thay areay eavyhay isfortunesmay,” epliedray Elizabethay. uT“bay ethay ifeway ofay mray.
Arcyday ustmay avehay uchsay extraordinaryay ourcessay ofay appinesshay ecessarilynay
attacheday otay erhay ituationsay, atthay eshay ouldcay, uponay ethay olewhay, avehay onay ausecay
otay epineray.”

oBstinate“ay, eadstronghay irlgay! Iay amay ashameday ofay ouyay! Isay isthay ouryay atitudegray
orfay myay attentionsay otay ouyay astlay ingspray? Isay othingnay ueday otay emay onay atthay
orescay? Etlay usay itsay ownday. Ouyay areay otay understanday, Issmay Ennetbay, atthay Iay amecay
erehay ithway ethay eterminedday esolutionray ofay arryingcay myay urposepay; ornay illway Iay
ebay issuadedday omfray itay. Iay avehay otnay eenbay useday otay ubmitsay otay anyay erson’spay
imswhay. Iay avehay otnay eenbay inay ethay abithay ofay ookingbray isappointmentday.”

at“_thay_ illway akemay ouryay Adyship’slay ituationsay atay esentpray oremay itiablepay;
utbay itay illway avehay onay effectay onay e_may_.”

i“ay illway otnay ebay interrupteday! Earhay emay inay ilencesay. myay aughterday anday myay
ephewnay areay ormedfay orfay eachay otheray. Eythay areay escendedday, onay ethay aternalmay
idesay, omfray ethay amesay oblenay inelay; anday, onay ethay ather’sfay, omfray espectableray,
onourablehay, anday ancientay, oughthay untitleday, amiliesfay. Eirthay ortunefay onay
othbay idessay isay endidsplay. Eythay areay estinedday orfay eachay otheray byay ethay oicevay ofay
everyay embermay ofay eirthay espectiveray ouseshay; anday atwhay isay otay ivideday
em?--thethay upstartay etensionspray ofay aay oungyay omanway ithoutway amilyfay,
onnectionscay, oray ortunefay! Isay isthay otay ebay endureday? Utbay itay ustmay otnay, allshay
otnay ebay! Ifay ouyay ereway ensiblesay ofay ouryay ownay oodgay, ouyay ouldway otnay ishway otay
uitqay ethay eresphay inay ichwhay ouyay avehay eenbay oughtbray upay.”

iN“ay arryingmay ouryay ephewnay, Iay ouldshay otnay onsidercay elfmysay asay uittingqay atthay
eresphay. Ehay isay aay entlemangay; Iay amay aay entleman’sgay aughterday; osay arfay eway areay
equalay.”

uE“tray. Ouyay are_ay_ aay entleman’sgay aughterday. Utbay atwhay asway ouryay othermay? Owhay
areay ouryay unclesay anday auntsay? Oday otnay imagineay emay ignorantay ofay eirthay
onditioncay.”

aTever“whay myay onnectionscay aymay ebay,” aidsay Elizabethay, if“ay ouryay ephewnay oesday
otnay objectay otay emthay, eythay ancay ebay othingnay otay ou_yay_.”

eLl“tay emay, onceay orfay allay, areay ouyay engageday otay imhay?”

Oughthay Elizabethay ouldway otnay, orfay ethay eremay urposepay ofay obligingay Adylay
Atherinecay, avehay answereday isthay uestionqay, eshay ouldcay otnay utbay aysay, afteray aay
oment’smay eliberationday,--

i“ay amay otnay.”

Adylay Atherinecay eemedsay easedplay.

aNd“ay illway ouyay omisepray emay evernay otay enteray intoay uchsay anay engagementay?”

i“ay illway akemay onay omisepray ofay ethay indkay.”

iSs“may Ennetbay, Iay amay ockedshay anday astonisheday. Iay expecteday otay indfay aay oremay
easonableray oungyay omanway. Utbay oday otnay eceiveday ourselfyay intoay aay eliefbay atthay Iay
illway everay ecederay. Iay allshay otnay ogay awayay illtay ouyay avehay ivengay emay ethay
assuranceay Iay equireray.”

aNd“ay Iay ertainlycay ever_nay_ allshay ivegay itay. Iay amay otnay otay ebay intimidateday intoay
anythingay osay ollywhay unreasonableay. Ouryay Adyshiplay antsway mray. Arcyday otay arrymay
ouryay aughterday; utbay ouldway myay ivinggay ouyay ethay ished-forway omisepray akemay
eir_thay_ arriagemay atay allay oremay obablepray? Upposingsay imhay otay ebay attacheday otay
emay, ouldway _myay_ efusingray otay acceptay ishay andhay akemay imhay ishway otay estowbay itay onay
ishay ousincay? Alloway emay otay aysay, Adylay Atherinecay, atthay ethay argumentsay ithway
ichwhay ouyay avehay upportedsay isthay extraordinaryay applicationay avehay eenbay asay
ivolousfray asay ethay applicationay asway ill-judgeday. Ouyay avehay idelyway istakenmay myay
aracterchay, ifay ouyay inkthay Iay ancay ebay orkedway onay byay uchsay ersuasionspay asay esethay.
Owhay arfay ouryay ephewnay ightmay approveay ofay ouryay interferenceay inay is_hay_ affairsay,
Iay annotcay elltay; utbay ouyay avehay ertainlycay onay ightray otay oncerncay ourselfyay inay
inemay. Iay ustmay egbay, ereforethay, otay ebay importuneday onay urtherfay onay ethay
ubjectsay.”

oT“nay osay astyhay, ifay ouyay easeplay. Iay avehay byay onay eansmay oneday. Otay allay ethay
objectionsay Iay avehay alreadyay urgeday Iay avehay illstay anotheray otay adday. Iay amay onay
angerstray otay ethay articularspay ofay ouryay oungestyay ister’ssay infamousay
elopementay. Iay owknay itay allay; atthay ethay oungyay an’smay arryingmay erhay asway aay
atched-uppay usinessbay, atay ethay expenseay ofay ouryay atherfay anday uncleay. Anday isay
uch_say_ aay irlgay otay ebay myay ephew’snay istersay? Isay er_hay_ usbandhay, owhay isay ethay onsay
ofay ishay atelay ather’sfay ewardstay, otay ebay ishay otherbray? Eavenhay anday earth!--ofay
atwhay areay ouyay inkingthay? Areay ethay adesshay ofay Emberleypay otay ebay usthay ollutedpay?”

oU“yay ancay ow_nay_ avehay othingnay urtherfay otay aysay,” eshay esentfullyray answereday.
oU“yay avehay insulteday emay, inay everyay ossiblepay ethodmay. Iay ustmay egbay otay eturnray otay
ethay ousehay.”

Anday eshay oseray asay eshay okespay. Adylay Atherinecay oseray alsoay, anday eythay urnedtay
ackbay. Erhay Adyshiplay asway ighlyhay incenseday.

oU“yay avehay onay egardray, enthay, orfay ethay onourhay anday editcray ofay myay ephewnay!
Unfeelingay, elfishsay irlgay! Oday ouyay otnay onsidercay atthay aay onnectioncay ithway ouyay
ustmay isgraceday imhay inay ethay eyesay ofay everybodyay?”

aDy“lay Atherinecay, Iay avehay othingnay urtherfay otay aysay. Ouyay owknay myay entimentssay.”

oU“yay areay enthay esolvedray otay avehay imhay?”

i“ay avehay aidsay onay uchsay ingthay. Iay amay onlyay esolvedray otay actay inay atthay annermay,
ichwhay illway, inay myay ownay opinionay, onstitutecay myay appinesshay, ithoutway
eferenceray otay ou_yay_, oray otay anyay ersonpay osay ollywhay unconnecteday ithway emay.”

iT“ay isay ellway. Ouyay efuseray, enthay, otay obligeay emay. Ouyay efuseray otay obeyay ethay
aimsclay ofay utyday, onourhay, anday atitudegray. Ouyay areay eterminedday otay uinray imhay inay
ethay opinionay ofay allay ishay iendsfray, anday akemay imhay ethay ontemptcay ofay ethay orldway.”

eIther“nay utyday, ornay onourhay, ornay atitudegray,” epliedray Elizabethay, as“hay anyay
ossiblepay aimclay onay emay, inay ethay esentpray instanceay. Onay inciplepray ofay eitheray
ouldway ebay iolatedvay byay myay arriagemay ithway mray. Arcyday. Anday ithway egardray otay ethay
esentmentray ofay ishay amilyfay, oray ethay indignationay ofay ethay orldway, ifay ethay ormerfay
ere_way_ exciteday byay ishay arryingmay emay, itay ouldway otnay ivegay emay oneay oment’smay
oncern--andcay ethay orldway inay eneralgay ouldway avehay ootay uchmay ensesay otay oinjay inay
ethay ornscay.”

aNd“ay isthay isay ouryay ealray opinionay! Isthay isay ouryay inalfay esolveray! Eryvay ellway. Iay
allshay ownay owknay owhay otay actay. Oday otnay imagineay, Issmay Ennetbay, atthay ouryay
ambitionay illway everay ebay atifiedgray. Iay amecay otay tryay ouyay. Iay opedhay otay indfay ouyay
easonableray; utbay ependday uponay itay Iay illway arrycay myay ointpay.”

Inay isthay annermay Adylay Atherinecay alkedtay onay illtay eythay ereway atay ethay oorday ofay
ethay arriagecay, enwhay, urningtay astilyhay oundray, eshay addeday,--

i“ay aketay onay eavelay ofay ouyay, Issmay Ennetbay. Iay endsay onay omplimentscay otay ouryay
othermay. Ouyay eserveday onay uchsay attentionay. Iay amay ostmay eriouslysay ispleasedday.”

Elizabethay ademay onay answeray; anday ithoutway attemptingay otay ersuadepay erhay
Adyshiplay otay eturnray intoay ethay ousehay, alkedway uietlyqay intoay itay erselfhay. Eshay
eardhay ethay arriagecay ivedray awayay asay eshay oceededpray upstairsay. Erhay othermay
impatientlyay etmay erhay atay ethay oorday ofay erhay essing-roomdray, otay askay whyay Adylay
Atherinecay ouldway otnay omecay inay againay anday estray erselfhay.

e“shay idday otnay oosechay itay,” aidsay erhay aughterday; e“shay ouldway ogay.”

e“shay isay aay eryvay ine-lookingfay omanway! anday erhay allingcay erehay asway odigiouslypray
ivilcay! orfay eshay onlyay amecay, Iay upposesay, otay elltay usay ethay Ollinsescay ereway ellway.
Eshay isay onay erhay oadray omewheresay, Iay areday aysay; anday osay, assingpay oughthray
Erytonmay, oughtthay eshay ightmay asay ellway allcay onay ouyay. Iay upposesay eshay adhay
othingnay articularpay otay aysay otay ouyay, Izzylay?”

Elizabethay asway orcedfay otay ivegay inay otay aay ittlelay alsehoodfay erehay; orfay otay
acknowledgeay ethay ubstancesay ofay eirthay onversationcay asway impossibleay.




iLlustration[ay:

uT“bay ownay itay omescay outay”
ay]




APTERchay IIlvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Ethay iscomposureday ofay iritsspay ichwhay isthay extraordinaryay isitvay ewthray
Elizabethay intoay ouldcay otnay ebay easilyay overcomeay; ornay ouldcay eshay orfay anymay
ourshay earnlay otay inkthay ofay itay esslay anthay incessantlyay. Adylay Atherinecay, itay
appeareday, adhay actuallyay akentay ethay oubletray ofay isthay ourneyjay omfray Osingsray
orfay ethay olesay urposepay ofay eakingbray offay erhay upposedsay engagementay ithway mray.
Arcyday. Itay asway aay ationalray emeschay, otay ebay uresay! utbay omfray atwhay ethay eportray ofay
eirthay engagementay ouldcay originateay, Elizabethay asway atay aay osslay otay imagineay;
illtay eshay ecollectedray atthay is_hay_ eingbay ethay intimateay iendfray ofay Ingleybay,
anday er_hay_ eingbay ethay istersay ofay Anejay, asway enoughay, atay aay imetay enwhay ethay
expectationay ofay oneay eddingway ademay everybodyay eageray orfay anotheray, otay upplysay
ethay ideaay. Eshay adhay otnay erselfhay orgottenfay otay eelfay atthay ethay arriagemay ofay erhay
istersay ustmay ingbray emthay oremay equentlyfray ogethertay. Anday erhay eighboursnay atay
Ucaslay Odgelay, ereforethay, or(fay oughthray eirthay ommunicationcay ithway ethay
Ollinsescay, ethay eportray, eshay oncludedcay, adhay eachedray Adylay Atherinecay,) adhay
onlyay etsay at_thay_ ownday asay almostay ertaincay anday immediateay ichwhay e_shay_ adhay
ookedlay orwardfay otay asay ossiblepay atay omesay uturefay imetay.

Inay evolvingray Adylay Atherine’scay expressionsay, oweverhay, eshay ouldcay otnay elphay
eelingfay omesay uneasinessay asay otay ethay ossiblepay onsequencecay ofay erhay ersistingpay
inay isthay interferenceay. Omfray atwhay eshay adhay aidsay ofay erhay esolutionray otay
eventpray ethay arriagemay, itay occurreday otay Elizabethay atthay eshay ustmay editatemay anay
applicationay otay erhay ephewnay; anday owhay ehay ightmay aketay aay imilarsay
epresentationray ofay ethay evilsay attacheday otay aay onnectioncay ithway erhay eshay aredday
otnay onouncepray. Eshay ewknay otnay ethay exactay egreeday ofay ishay affectionay orfay ishay
auntay, oray ishay ependenceday onay erhay udgmentjay, utbay itay asway aturalnay otay upposesay
atthay ehay oughtthay uchmay igherhay ofay erhay Adyshiplay anthay e_shay_ ouldcay oday; anday itay
asway ertaincay, atthay inay enumeratingay ethay iseriesmay ofay aay arriagemay ithway one_ay_
osewhay immediateay onnectionscay ereway osay unequalay otay ishay ownay, ishay auntay ouldway
addressay imhay onay ishay eakestway idesay. Ithway ishay otionsnay ofay ignityday, ehay ouldway
obablypray eelfay atthay ethay argumentsay, ichwhay otay Elizabethay adhay appeareday eakway
anday idiculousray, ontainedcay uchmay oodgay ensesay anday olidsay easoningray.

Ifay ehay adhay eenbay averingway eforebay, asay otay atwhay ehay ouldshay oday, ichwhay adhay oftenay
eemedsay ikelylay, ethay adviceay anday entreatyay ofay osay earnay aay elationray ightmay
ettlesay everyay oubtday, anday etermineday imhay atay onceay otay ebay asay appyhay asay ignityday
unblemisheday ouldcay akemay imhay. Inay atthay asecay ehay ouldway eturnray onay oremay. Adylay
Atherinecay ightmay eesay imhay inay erhay ayway oughthray owntay; anday ishay engagementay otay
Ingleybay ofay omingcay againay otay Etherfieldnay ustmay ivegay ayway.

iF“ay, ereforethay, anay excuseay orfay otnay eepingkay ishay omisepray ouldshay omecay otay ishay
iendfray ithinway aay ewfay aysday,” eshay addeday, i“ay allshay owknay owhay otay understanday
itay. Iay allshay enthay ivegay overay everyay expectationay, everyay ishway ofay ishay
onstancycay. Ifay ehay isay atisfiedsay ithway onlyay egrettingray emay, enwhay ehay ightmay
avehay obtaineday myay affectionsay anday andhay, Iay allshay oonsay easecay otay egretray imhay
atay allay.”

Ethay urprisesay ofay ethay estray ofay ethay amilyfay, onay earinghay owhay eirthay isitorvay adhay
eenbay, asway eryvay eatgray: utbay eythay obliginglyay atisfiedsay itay ithway ethay amesay
indkay ofay uppositionsay ichwhay adhay appeaseday mrsay. Ennet’sbay uriositycay; anday
Elizabethay asway aredspay omfray uchmay easingtay onay ethay ubjectsay.

Ethay extnay orningmay, asay eshay asway oinggay ownday airsstay, eshay asway etmay byay erhay
atherfay, owhay amecay outay ofay ishay ibrarylay ithway aay etterlay inay ishay andhay.

iZzy“lay,” aidsay ehay, i“ay asway oinggay otay ooklay orfay ouyay: omecay intoay myay oomray.”

Eshay ollowedfay imhay itherthay; anday erhay uriositycay otay owknay atwhay ehay adhay otay elltay
erhay asway eightenedhay byay ethay uppositionsay ofay itsay eingbay inay omesay annermay
onnectedcay ithway ethay etterlay ehay eldhay. Itay uddenlysay uckstray erhay atthay itay ightmay
ebay omfray Adylay Atherinecay, anday eshay anticipateday ithway ismayday allay ethay
onsequentcay explanationsay.

Eshay ollowedfay erhay atherfay otay ethay ireplacefay, anday eythay othbay atsay ownday. Ehay
enthay aidsay,--

i“ay avehay eceivedray aay etterlay isthay orningmay atthay ashay astonisheday emay
exceedinglyay. Asay itay incipallypray oncernscay ourselfyay, ouyay oughtay otay owknay itsay
ontentscay. Iay idday otnay owknay eforebay atthay Iay adhay o_tway_ aughtersday onay ethay inkbray
ofay atrimonymay. Etlay emay ongratulatecay ouyay onay aay eryvay importantay onquestcay.”

Ethay olourcay ownay ushedray intoay Elizabeth’say eekschay inay ethay instantaneousay
onvictioncay ofay itsay eingbay aay etterlay omfray ethay ephewnay, insteaday ofay ethay auntay;
anday eshay asway undetermineday etherwhay ostmay otay ebay easedplay atthay ehay explaineday
imselfhay atay allay, oray offendeday atthay ishay etterlay asway otnay atherray addresseday otay
erselfhay, enwhay erhay atherfay ontinuedcay,--

oU“yay ooklay onsciouscay. Oungyay adieslay avehay eatgray enetrationpay inay uchsay attersmay
asay esethay; utbay Iay inkthay Iay aymay efyday evenay our_yay_ agacitysay otay iscoverday ethay
amenay ofay ouryay admireray. Isthay etterlay isay omfray mray. Ollinscay.”

oM“fray mray. Ollinscay! anday atwhay ancay e_hay_ avehay otay aysay?”

oMething“say eryvay uchmay otay ethay urposepay, ofay oursecay. Ehay eginsbay ithway
ongratulationscay onay ethay approachingay uptialsnay ofay myay eldestay aughterday, ofay
ichwhay, itay eemssay, ehay ashay eenbay oldtay byay omesay ofay ethay ood-naturedgay, ossipinggay
Ucaseslay. Iay allshay otnay ortspay ithway ouryay impatienceay byay eadingray atwhay ehay ayssay
onay atthay ointpay. Atwhay elatesray otay ourselfyay isay asay ollows:--‘hAvingfay usthay
offereday ouyay ethay inceresay ongratulationscay ofay mrsay. Ollinscay anday elfmysay onay
isthay appyhay eventay, etlay emay ownay adday aay ortshay inthay onay ethay ubjectsay ofay anotheray,
ofay ichwhay eway avehay eenbay advertiseday byay ethay amesay authorityay. Ouryay aughterday
Elizabethay, itay isay esumedpray, illway otnay onglay earbay ethay amenay ofay Ennetbay, afteray
erhay eldestay istersay ashay esignedray itay; anday ethay osenchay artnerpay ofay erhay atefay
aymay ebay easonablyray ookedlay upay otay asay oneay ofay ethay ostmay illustriousay ersonagespay
inay isthay andlay.’ Ancay ouyay ossiblypay uessgay, Izzylay, owhay isay eantmay byay isthay?
iS‘thay oungyay entlemangay isay essedblay, inay aay eculiarpay ayway, ithway everythingay ethay
earthay ofay ortalmay ancay ostmay esire,--splendidday opertypray, oblenay indredkay, anday
extensiveay atronagepay. Etyay, inay itespay ofay allay esethay emptationstay, etlay emay arnway
myay ousincay Elizabethay, anday ourselfyay, ofay atwhay evilsay ouyay aymay incuray byay aay
ecipitatepray osureclay ithway isthay entleman’sgay oposalspray, ichwhay, ofay oursecay,
ouyay illway ebay inclineday otay aketay immediateay advantageay ofay.’ Avehay ouyay anyay ideaay,
Izzylay, owhay isthay entlemangay isay? Utbay ownay itay omescay outay. ‘myay otivemay orfay
autioningcay ouyay isay asay ollows:--wEfay avehay easonray otay imagineay atthay ishay auntay,
Adylay Atherinecay eday Ourghbay, oesday otnay ooklay onay ethay atchmay ithway aay iendlyfray
eyeay.’ _mray. Arcyday_, ouyay eesay, isay ethay anmay! Ownay, Izzylay, Iay inkthay Iay ave_hay_
urprisedsay ouyay. Ouldcay ehay, oray ethay Ucaseslay, avehay itchedpay onay anyay anmay, ithinway
ethay irclecay ofay ouray acquaintanceay, osewhay amenay ouldway avehay ivengay ethay ielay oremay
effectuallyay otay atwhay eythay elatedray? mray. Arcyday, owhay evernay ookslay atay anyay
omanway utbay otay eesay aay emishblay, anday owhay obablypray evernay ookedlay atay ou_yay_ inay
ishay ifelay! Itay isay admirableay!”

Elizabethay iedtray otay oinjay inay erhay ather’sfay easantryplay, utbay ouldcay onlyay orcefay
oneay ostmay eluctantray ilesmay. Evernay adhay ishay itway eenbay irectedday inay aay annermay osay
ittlelay agreeableay otay erhay.

aRe“ay ouyay otnay ivertedday?”

oH“ay, esyay. Aypray eadray onay.”

afTer“‘ay entioningmay ethay ikelihoodlay ofay isthay arriagemay otay erhay Adyshiplay astlay
ightnay, eshay immediatelyay, ithway erhay usualay ondescensioncay, expresseday atwhay eshay
eltfay onay ethay occasionay; enwhay itay ecamebay apparentay, atthay, onay ethay orescay ofay
omesay amilyfay objectionsay onay ethay artpay ofay myay ousincay, eshay ouldway evernay ivegay
erhay onsentcay otay atwhay eshay ermedtay osay isgracefulday aay atchmay. Iay oughtthay itay myay
utyday otay ivegay ethay eediestspay intelligenceay ofay isthay otay myay ousincay, atthay eshay
anday erhay oblenay admireray aymay ebay awareay ofay atwhay eythay areay aboutay, anday otnay unray
astilyhay intoay aay arriagemay ichwhay ashay otnay eenbay operlypray anctionedsay.’ mray.
Ollinscay, oreovermay, addsay, i‘ay amay ulytray ejoicedray atthay myay ousincay Ia’slyday adsay
usinessbay ashay eenbay osay ellway ushedhay upay, anday amay onlyay oncernedcay atthay eirthay
ivinglay ogethertay eforebay ethay arriagemay ooktay aceplay ouldshay ebay osay enerallygay
ownknay. Iay ustmay otnay, oweverhay, eglectnay ethay utiesday ofay myay ationstay, oray efrainray
omfray eclaringday myay amazementay, atay earinghay atthay ouyay eceivedray ethay oungyay
ouplecay intoay ouryay ousehay asay oonsay asay eythay ereway arriedmay. Itay asway anay
encouragementay ofay icevay; anday adhay Iay eenbay ethay ectorray ofay Ongbournlay, Iay ouldshay
eryvay enuouslystray avehay opposeday itay. Ouyay oughtay ertainlycay otay orgivefay emthay asay
aay Istianchray, utbay evernay otay admitay emthay inay ouryay ightsay, oray alloway eirthay
amesnay otay ebay entionedmay inay ouryay earinghay.’ aT_thay_ isay ishay otionnay ofay
Istianchray orgivenessfay! Ethay estray ofay ishay etterlay isay onlyay aboutay ishay earday
Arlotte’schay ituationsay, anday ishay expectationay ofay aay oungyay olive-branchay. Utbay,
Izzylay, ouyay ooklay asay ifay ouyay idday otnay enjoyay itay. Ouyay areay otnay oinggay otay ebay
issish_may_, Iay opehay, anday etendpray otay ebay affronteday atay anay idleay eportray. Orfay
atwhay oday eway ivelay, utbay otay akemay ortspay orfay ouray eighboursnay, anday aughlay atay emthay
inay ouray urntay?”

oH“ay,” iedcray Elizabethay, i“ay amay exceedinglyay ivertedday. Utbay itay isay osay
angestray!”

eS“yay, at_thay_ isay atwhay akesmay itay amusingay. Adhay eythay ixedfay onay anyay otheray anmay
itay ouldway avehay eenbay othingnay; utbay is_hay_ erfectpay indifferenceay anday our_yay_
ointedpay islikeday akemay itay osay elightfullyday absurday! Uchmay asay Iay abominateay
itingwray, Iay ouldway otnay ivegay upay mray. Ollins’scay orrespondencecay orfay anyay
onsiderationcay. Aynay, enwhay Iay eadray aay etterlay ofay ishay, Iay annotcay elphay ivinggay
imhay ethay eferencepray evenay overay Ickhamway, uchmay asay Iay aluevay ethay impudenceay anday
ocrisyhypay ofay myay on-in-lawsay. Anday aypray, Izzylay, atwhay aidsay Adylay Atherinecay
aboutay isthay eportray? Idday eshay allcay otay efuseray erhay onsentcay?”

Otay isthay uestionqay ishay aughterday epliedray onlyay ithway aay aughlay; anday asay itay adhay
eenbay askeday ithoutway ethay eastlay uspicionsay, eshay asway otnay istressedday byay ishay
epeatingray itay. Elizabethay adhay evernay eenbay oremay atay aay osslay otay akemay erhay
eelingsfay appearay atwhay eythay ereway otnay. Itay asway ecessarynay otay aughlay enwhay eshay
ouldway atherray avehay iedcray. Erhay atherfay adhay ostmay uellycray ortifiedmay erhay byay
atwhay ehay aidsay ofay mray. Arcy’sday indifferenceay; anday eshay ouldcay oday othingnay utbay
onderway atay uchsay aay antway ofay enetrationpay, oray earfay atthay, erhapspay, insteaday ofay
ishay eeingsay ootay ittle_lay_, eshay ightmay avehay anciedfay ootay uch_may_.




iLlustration[ay:

e“thay effortsay ofay ishay auntay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IIIlvay.


iLlustration[ay]

Insteaday ofay eceivingray anyay uchsay etterlay ofay excuseay omfray ishay iendfray, asay
Elizabethay alfhay expecteday mray. Ingleybay otay oday, ehay asway ableay otay ingbray Arcyday
ithway imhay otay Ongbournlay eforebay anymay aysday adhay assedpay afteray Adylay Atherine’scay
isitvay. Ethay entlemengay arriveday earlyay; anday, eforebay mrsay. Ennetbay adhay imetay otay
elltay imhay ofay eirthay avinghay eensay ishay auntay, ofay ichwhay erhay aughterday atsay inay
omentarymay eaddray, Ingleybay, owhay antedway otay ebay aloneay ithway Anejay, oposedpray
eirthay allay alkingway outay. Itay asway agreeday otay. mrsay. Ennetbay asway otnay inay ethay
abithay ofay alkingway, Arymay ouldcay evernay arespay imetay, utbay ethay emainingray ivefay
etsay offay ogethertay. Ingleybay anday Anejay, oweverhay, oonsay alloweday ethay othersay otay
outstripay emthay. Eythay aggedlay ehindbay, ilewhay Elizabethay, Ittykay, anday Arcyday
ereway otay entertainay eachay otheray. Eryvay ittlelay asway aidsay byay eitheray; Ittykay asway
ootay uchmay afraiday ofay imhay otay alktay; Elizabethay asway ecretlysay ormingfay aay
esperateday esolutionray; anday, erhapspay, ehay ightmay ebay oingday ethay amesay.

Eythay alkedway owardstay ethay Ucaseslay’, ecausebay Ittykay ishedway otay allcay uponay
Ariamay; anday asay Elizabethay awsay onay occasionay orfay akingmay itay aay eneralgay oncerncay,
enwhay Ittykay eftlay emthay eshay entway oldlybay onay ithway imhay aloneay. Ownay asway ethay
omentmay orfay erhay esolutionray otay ebay executeday; anday ilewhay erhay ouragecay asway
ighhay, eshay immediatelyay aidsay,--

“mray. Arcyday, Iay amay aay eryvay elfishsay eaturecray, anday orfay ethay akesay ofay ivinggay
eliefray otay myay ownay eelingsfay arecay otnay owhay uchmay Iay aymay ebay oundingway oursyay. Iay
ancay onay ongerlay elphay ankingthay ouyay orfay ouryay unexampleday indnesskay otay myay oorpay
istersay. Everay incesay Iay avehay ownknay itay Iay avehay eenbay ostmay anxiousay otay
acknowledgeay otay ouyay owhay atefullygray Iay eelfay itay. Ereway itay ownknay otay ethay estray
ofay myay amilyfay Iay ouldshay otnay avehay erelymay myay ownay atitudegray otay expressay.”

i“ay amay orrysay, exceedinglyay orrysay,” epliedray Arcyday, inay aay onetay ofay urprisesay
anday emotionay, at“thay ouyay avehay everay eenbay informeday ofay atwhay aymay, inay aay
istakenmay ightlay, avehay ivengay ouyay uneasinessay. Iay idday otnay inkthay mrsay. Ardinergay
asway osay ittlelay otay ebay ustedtray.”

oU“yay ustmay otnay ameblay myay auntay. Ia’slyday oughtlessnessthay irstfay etrayedbay otay
emay atthay ouyay adhay eenbay oncernedcay inay ethay attermay; anday, ofay oursecay, Iay ouldcay
otnay estray illtay Iay ewknay ethay articularspay. Etlay emay ankthay ouyay againay anday againay,
inay ethay amenay ofay allay myay amilyfay, orfay atthay enerousgay ompassioncay ichwhay induceday
ouyay otay aketay osay uchmay oubletray, anday earbay osay anymay ortificationsmay, orfay ethay
akesay ofay iscoveringday emthay.”

iF“ay ouyay ill_way_ ankthay emay,” ehay epliedray, et“lay itay ebay orfay ourselfyay aloneay.
Atthay ethay ishway ofay ivinggay appinesshay otay ouyay ightmay adday orcefay otay ethay otheray
inducementsay ichwhay edlay emay onay, Iay allshay otnay attemptay otay enyday. Utbay ouryay
amily_fay_ oweay emay othingnay. Uchmay asay Iay espectray emthay, Iay elievebay Iay oughtthay
onlyay ofay ou_yay_.”

Elizabethay asway ootay uchmay embarrasseday otay aysay aay ordway. Afteray aay ortshay ausepay,
erhay ompanioncay addeday, oU“yay areay ootay enerousgay otay ifletray ithway emay. Ifay ouryay
eelingsfay areay illstay atwhay eythay ereway astlay Aprilay, elltay emay osay atay onceay. _myay_
affectionsay anday ishesway areay unchangeday; utbay oneay ordway omfray ouyay illway ilencesay
emay onay isthay ubjectsay orfay everay.”

Elizabethay, eelingfay allay ethay oremay anthay ommoncay awkwardnessay anday anxietyay ofay
ishay ituationsay, ownay orcedfay erselfhay otay eakspay; anday immediatelyay, oughthay otnay
eryvay uentlyflay, avegay imhay otay understanday atthay erhay entimentssay adhay undergoneay
osay aterialmay aay angechay incesay ethay eriodpay otay ichwhay ehay alludeday, asay otay akemay
erhay eceiveray ithway atitudegray anday easureplay ishay esentpray assurancesay. Ethay
appinesshay ichwhay isthay eplyray oducedpray asway uchsay asay ehay adhay obablypray evernay
eltfay eforebay; anday ehay expresseday imselfhay onay ethay occasionay asay ensiblysay anday asay
armlyway asay aay anmay iolentlyvay inay ovelay ancay ebay upposedsay otay oday. Adhay Elizabethay
eenbay ableay otay encounteray ishay eyesay, eshay ightmay avehay eensay owhay ellway ethay
expressionay ofay eartfelthay elightday iffusedday overay ishay acefay ecamebay imhay: utbay
oughthay eshay ouldcay otnay ooklay eshay ouldcay istenlay; anday ehay oldtay erhay ofay eelingsfay
ichwhay, inay ovingpray ofay atwhay importanceay eshay asway otay imhay, ademay ishay affectionay
everyay omentmay oremay aluablevay.

Eythay alkedway onay ithoutway owingknay inay atwhay irectionday. Erethay asway ootay uchmay otay
ebay oughtthay, anday eltfay, anday aidsay, orfay attentionay otay anyay otheray objectsay. Eshay
oonsay earntlay atthay eythay ereway indebteday orfay eirthay esentpray oodgay understandingay
otay ethay effortsay ofay ishay auntay, owhay id_day_ allcay onay imhay inay erhay eturnray oughthray
Ondonlay, anday erethay elateray erhay ourneyjay otay Ongbournlay, itsay otivemay, anday ethay
ubstancesay ofay erhay onversationcay ithway Elizabethay; ellingdway emphaticallyay onay
everyay expressionay ofay ethay atterlay, ichwhay, inay erhay Adyship’slay apprehensionay,
eculiarlypay enotedday erhay erversenesspay anday assuranceay, inay ethay eliefbay atthay
uchsay aay elationray ustmay assistay erhay endeavoursay otay obtainay atthay omisepray omfray
erhay ephewnay ichwhay e_shay_ adhay efusedray otay ivegay. Utbay, unluckilyay orfay erhay
Adyshiplay, itsay effectay adhay eenbay exactlyay ontrariwisecay.

iT“ay aughttay emay otay opehay,” aidsay ehay, as“ay Iay adhay arcelyscay everay alloweday elfmysay
otay opehay eforebay. Iay ewknay enoughay ofay ouryay ispositionday otay ebay ertaincay, atthay
adhay ouyay eenbay absolutelyay, irrevocablyay ecidedday againstay emay, ouyay ouldway avehay
acknowledgeday itay otay Adylay Atherinecay anklyfray anday openlyay.”

Elizabethay olouredcay anday aughedlay asay eshay epliedray, eS“yay, ouyay owknay enoughay ofay
myay ankness_fray_ otay elievebay emay apablecay ofay at_thay_. Afteray abusingay ouyay osay
abominablyay otay ouryay acefay, Iay ouldcay avehay onay uplescray inay abusingay ouyay otay allay
ouryay elationsray.”

aT“whay idday ouyay aysay ofay emay atthay Iay idday otnay eserveday? Orfay oughthay ouryay
accusationsay ereway ill-foundeday, ormedfay onay istakenmay emisespray, myay ehaviourbay
otay ouyay atay ethay imetay adhay eritedmay ethay everestsay eproofray. Itay asway
unpardonableay. Iay annotcay inkthay ofay itay ithoutway abhorrenceay.”

e“way illway otnay uarrelqay orfay ethay eatergray areshay ofay ameblay annexeday otay atthay
eveningay,” aidsay Elizabethay. e“thay onductcay ofay eithernay, ifay ictlystray
examineday, illway ebay irreproachableay; utbay incesay enthay eway avehay othbay, Iay opehay,
improveday inay ivilitycay.”

i“ay annotcay ebay osay easilyay econciledray otay elfmysay. Ethay ecollectionray ofay atwhay Iay
enthay aidsay, ofay myay onductcay, myay annersmay, myay expressionsay uringday ethay olewhay ofay
itay, isay ownay, anday ashay eenbay anymay onthsmay, inexpressiblyay ainfulpay otay emay. Ouryay
eproofray, osay ellway applieday, Iay allshay evernay orgetfay: aD‘hay ouyay ehavedbay inay aay
oremay entlemanlikegay annermay.’ Osethay ereway ouryay ordsway. Ouyay owknay otnay, ouyay ancay
arcelyscay onceivecay, owhay eythay avehay orturedtay emay; oughthay itay asway omesay imetay, Iay
onfesscay, eforebay Iay asway easonableray enoughay otay alloway eirthay usticejay.”

i“ay asway ertainlycay eryvay arfay omfray expectingay emthay otay akemay osay ongstray anay
impressionay. Iay adhay otnay ethay allestsmay ideaay ofay eirthay eingbay everay eltfay inay uchsay
aay ayway.”

i“ay ancay easilyay elievebay itay. Ouyay oughtthay emay enthay evoidday ofay everyay operpray
eelingfay, Iay amay uresay ouyay idday. Ethay urntay ofay ouryay ountenancecay Iay allshay evernay
orgetfay, asay ouyay aidsay atthay Iay ouldcay otnay avehay addresseday ouyay inay anyay ossiblepay
ayway atthay ouldway induceay ouyay otay acceptay emay.”

oH“ay, oday otnay epeatray atwhay Iay enthay aidsay. Esethay ecollectionsray illway otnay oday atay
allay. Iay assureay ouyay atthay Iay avehay onglay eenbay ostmay eartilyhay ashameday ofay itay.”

Arcyday entionedmay ishay etterlay. iD“day itay,” aidsay e,--“didhay itay oon_say_ akemay ouyay
inkthay etterbay ofay emay? Idday ouyay, onay eadingray itay, ivegay anyay editcray otay itsay
ontentscay?”

Eshay explaineday atwhay itsay effectsay onay erhay adhay eenbay, anday owhay aduallygray allay
erhay ormerfay ejudicespray adhay eenbay emovedray.

i“ay ewknay,” aidsay ehay, at“thay atwhay Iay otewray ustmay ivegay ouyay ainpay, utbay itay asway
ecessarynay. Iay opehay ouyay avehay estroyedday ethay etterlay. Erethay asway oneay artpay,
especiallyay ethay openingay ofay itay, ichwhay Iay ouldshay eaddray ouryay avinghay ethay owerpay
ofay eadingray againay. Iay ancay ememberray omesay expressionsay ichwhay ightmay ustlyjay
akemay ouyay atehay emay.”

e“thay etterlay allshay ertainlycay ebay urntbay, ifay ouyay elievebay itay essentialay otay ethay
eservationpray ofay myay egardray; utbay, oughthay eway avehay othbay easonray otay inkthay myay
opinionsay otnay entirelyay unalterableay, eythay areay otnay, Iay opehay, uiteqay osay easilyay
angedchay asay atthay impliesay.”

eN“whay Iay otewray atthay etterlay,” epliedray Arcyday, i“ay elievedbay elfmysay erfectlypay
almcay anday oolcay; utbay Iay amay incesay onvincedcay atthay itay asway ittenwray inay aay
eadfuldray itternessbay ofay iritspay.”

e“thay etterlay, erhapspay, eganbay inay itternessbay, utbay itay idday otnay enday osay. Ethay
adieuay isay aritychay itselfay. Utbay inkthay onay oremay ofay ethay etterlay. Ethay eelingsfay
ofay ethay ersonpay owhay otewray anday ethay ersonpay owhay eceivedray itay areay ownay osay idelyway
ifferentday omfray atwhay eythay ereway enthay, atthay everyay unpleasantay ircumstancecay
attendingay itay oughtay otay ebay orgottenfay. Ouyay ustmay earnlay omesay ofay myay
ilosophyphay. Inkthay onlyay ofay ethay astpay asay itsay emembranceray ivesgay ouyay
easureplay.”

i“ay annotcay ivegay ouyay editcray orfay anyay ilosophyphay ofay ethay indkay. oUr_yay_
etrospectionsray ustmay ebay osay otallytay oidvay ofay eproachray, atthay ethay ontentmentcay
arisingay omfray emthay isay otnay ofay ilosophyphay, utbay, atwhay isay uchmay etterbay, ofay
ignoranceay. Utbay ithway e_may_, itay isay otnay osay. Ainfulpay ecollectionsray illway
intrudeay, ichwhay annotcay, ichwhay oughtay otnay otay ebay epelledray. Iay avehay eenbay aay
elfishsay eingbay allay myay ifelay, inay acticepray, oughthay otnay inay inciplepray. Asay aay
ildchay Iay asway aughttay atwhay asway ight_ray_, utbay Iay asway otnay aughttay otay orrectcay myay
empertay. Iay asway ivengay oodgay inciplespray, utbay eftlay otay ollowfay emthay inay idepray
anday onceitcay. Unfortunatelyay anay onlyay onsay or(fay anymay earsyay anay onlyay ild_chay_),
Iay asway oiledspay byay myay arentspay, owhay, oughthay oodgay emselvesthay, (myay atherfay
articularlypay, allay atthay asway enevolentbay anday amiableay,) alloweday, encourageday,
almostay aughttay emay otay ebay elfishsay anday overbearingay, otay arecay orfay onenay eyondbay
myay ownay amilyfay irclecay, otay inkthay eanlymay ofay allay ethay estray ofay ethay orldway, otay
ish_way_ atay eastlay otay inkthay eanlymay ofay eirthay ensesay anday orthway omparedcay ithway
myay ownay. Uchsay Iay asway, omfray eightay otay eight-and-twentyay; anday uchsay Iay ightmay
illstay avehay eenbay utbay orfay ouyay, earestday, oveliestlay Elizabethay! Atwhay oday Iay otnay
oweay ouyay! Ouyay aughttay emay aay essonlay, ardhay indeeday atay irstfay, utbay ostmay
advantageousay. byay ouyay, Iay asway operlypray umbledhay. Iay amecay otay ouyay ithoutway aay
oubtday ofay myay eceptionray. Ouyay owedshay emay owhay insufficientay ereway allay myay
etensionspray otay easeplay aay omanway orthyway ofay eingbay easedplay.”

aD“hay ouyay enthay ersuadedpay ourselfyay atthay Iay ouldshay?”

iNdeed“ay Iay adhay. Atwhay illway ouyay inkthay ofay myay anityvay? Iay elievedbay ouyay otay ebay
ishingway, expectingay myay addressesay.”

“myay annersmay ustmay avehay eenbay inay aultfay, utbay otnay intentionallyay, Iay assureay
ouyay. Iay evernay eantmay otay eceiveday ouyay, utbay myay iritsspay ightmay oftenay eadlay emay
ongwray. Owhay ouyay ustmay avehay atedhay emay afteray at_thay_ eveningay!”

aTe“hay ouyay! Iay asway angryay, erhapspay, atay irstfay, utbay myay angeray oonsay eganbay otay
aketay aay operpray irectionday.”

i“ay amay almostay afraiday ofay askingay atwhay ouyay oughtthay ofay emay enwhay eway etmay atay
Emberleypay. Ouyay amedblay emay orfay omingcay?”

o“nay, indeeday, Iay eltfay othingnay utbay urprisesay.”

oUr“yay urprisesay ouldcay otnay ebay eatergray anthay ine_may_ inay eingbay oticednay byay ouyay.
myay onsciencecay oldtay emay atthay Iay eservedday onay extraordinaryay olitenesspay, anday Iay
onfesscay atthay Iay idday otnay expectay otay eceiveray ore_may_ anthay myay ueday.”

“myay objectay en_thay_,” epliedray Arcyday, as“way otay owshay ouyay, byay everyay ivilitycay
inay myay owerpay, atthay Iay asway otnay osay eanmay asay otay esentray ethay astpay; anday Iay opedhay
otay obtainay ouryay orgivenessfay, otay essenlay ouryay illay opinionay, byay ettinglay ouyay
eesay atthay ouryay eproofsray adhay eenbay attendeday otay. Owhay oonsay anyay otheray ishesway
introduceday emselvesthay, Iay ancay ardlyhay elltay, utbay Iay elievebay inay aboutay alfhay
anay ourhay afteray Iay adhay eensay ouyay.”

Ehay enthay oldtay erhay ofay Eorgiana’sgay elightday inay erhay acquaintanceay, anday ofay erhay
isappointmentday atay itsay uddensay interruptionay; ichwhay aturallynay eadinglay otay
ethay ausecay ofay atthay interruptionay, eshay oonsay earntlay atthay ishay esolutionray ofay
ollowingfay erhay omfray Erbyshireday inay uestqay ofay erhay istersay adhay eenbay ormedfay
eforebay ehay uittedqay ethay innay, anday atthay ishay avitygray anday oughtfulnessthay erethay
adhay arisenay omfray onay otheray ugglesstray anthay atwhay uchsay aay urposepay ustmay
omprehendcay.

Eshay expresseday erhay atitudegray againay, utbay itay asway ootay ainfulpay aay ubjectsay otay
eachay otay ebay eltdway onay artherfay.

Afteray alkingway everalsay ilesmay inay aay eisurelylay annermay, anday ootay usybay otay owknay
anythingay aboutay itay, eythay oundfay atay astlay, onay examiningay eirthay atchesway, atthay
itay asway imetay otay ebay atay omehay.

aT“whay ouldcay avehay ecomebay ofay mray. Ingleybay anday Anejay?” asway aay onderway ichwhay
introduceday ethay iscussionday ofay eir_thay_ affairsay. Arcyday asway elightedday ithway
eirthay engagementay; ishay iendfray adhay ivengay imhay ethay earliestay informationay ofay
itay.

i“ay ustmay askay etherwhay ouyay ereway urprisedsay?” aidsay Elizabethay.

oT“nay atay allay. Enwhay Iay entway awayay, Iay eltfay atthay itay ouldway oonsay appenhay.”

aT“thay isay otay aysay, ouyay adhay ivengay ouryay ermissionpay. Iay uessedgay asay uchmay.” Anday
oughthay ehay exclaimeday atay ethay ermtay, eshay oundfay atthay itay adhay eenbay ettypray uchmay
ethay asecay.

oN“ay ethay eveningay eforebay myay oinggay otay Ondonlay,” aidsay ehay, i“ay ademay aay
onfessioncay otay imhay, ichwhay Iay elievebay Iay oughtay otay avehay ademay onglay agoay. Iay oldtay
imhay ofay allay atthay adhay occurreday otay akemay myay ormerfay interferenceay inay ishay
affairsay absurday anday impertinentay. Ishay urprisesay asway eatgray. Ehay adhay evernay adhay
ethay ightestslay uspicionsay. Iay oldtay imhay, oreovermay, atthay Iay elievedbay elfmysay
istakenmay inay upposingsay, asay Iay adhay oneday, atthay ouryay istersay asway indifferentay
otay imhay; anday asay Iay ouldcay easilyay erceivepay atthay ishay attachmentay otay erhay asway
unabateday, Iay eltfay onay oubtday ofay eirthay appinesshay ogethertay.”

Elizabethay ouldcay otnay elphay ilingsmay atay ishay easyay annermay ofay irectingday ishay
iendfray.

iD“day ouyay eakspay omfray ouryay ownay observationay,” aidsay eshay, en“whay ouyay oldtay imhay
atthay myay istersay ovedlay imhay, oray erelymay omfray myay informationay astlay ingspray?”

oM“fray ethay ormerfay. Iay adhay arrowlynay observeday erhay, uringday ethay otway isitsvay
ichwhay Iay adhay atelylay ademay erhay erehay; anday Iay asway onvincedcay ofay erhay affectionay.”

aNd“ay ouryay assuranceay ofay itay, Iay upposesay, arriedcay immediateay onvictioncay otay
imhay.”

iT“ay idday. Ingleybay isay ostmay unaffectedlyay odestmay. Ishay iffidenceday adhay
eventedpray ishay ependingday onay ishay ownay udgmentjay inay osay anxiousay aay asecay, utbay
ishay elianceray onay inemay ademay everythingay easyay. Iay asway obligeday otay onfesscay oneay
ingthay, ichwhay orfay aay imetay, anday otnay unjustlyay, offendeday imhay. Iay ouldcay otnay
alloway elfmysay otay oncealcay atthay ouryay istersay adhay eenbay inay owntay eethray onthsmay
astlay interway, atthay Iay adhay ownknay itay, anday urposelypay eptkay itay omfray imhay. Ehay asway
angryay. Utbay ishay angeray, Iay amay ersuadedpay, astedlay onay ongerlay anthay ehay emainedray
inay anyay oubtday ofay ouryay ister’ssay entimentssay. Ehay ashay eartilyhay orgivenfay emay
ownay.”

Elizabethay ongedlay otay observeay atthay mray. Ingleybay adhay eenbay aay ostmay elightfulday
iendfray; osay easilyay uidedgay atthay ishay orthway asway invaluableay; utbay eshay eckedchay
erselfhay. Eshay ememberedray atthay ehay adhay etyay otay earnlay otay ebay aughedlay atay, anday
itay asway atherray ootay earlyay otay eginbay. Inay anticipatingay ethay appinesshay ofay
Ingleybay, ichwhay ofay oursecay asway otay ebay inferioray onlyay otay ishay ownay, ehay
ontinuedcay ethay onversationcay illtay eythay eachedray ethay ousehay. Inay ethay allhay eythay
artedpay.




iLlustration[ay:

uNable“ay otay utteray aay ablesyllay”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay IXlay.


iLlustration[ay]

“myay earday Izzylay, erewhay ancay ouyay avehay eenbay alkingway otay?” asway aay uestionqay
ichwhay Elizabethay eceivedray omfray Anejay asay oonsay asay eshay entereday ethay oomray, anday
omfray allay ethay othersay enwhay eythay atsay ownday otay abletay. Eshay adhay onlyay otay aysay inay
eplyray, atthay eythay adhay anderedway aboutay illtay eshay asway eyondbay erhay ownay
owledgeknay. Eshay olouredcay asay eshay okespay; utbay eithernay atthay, ornay anythingay
elseay, awakeneday aay uspicionsay ofay ethay uthtray.

Ethay eveningay assedpay uietlyqay, unmarkeday byay anythingay extraordinaryay. Ethay
acknowledgeday overslay alkedtay anday aughedlay; ethay unacknowledgeday ereway ilentsay.
Arcyday asway otnay ofay aay ispositionday inay ichwhay appinesshay overflowsay inay irthmay;
anday Elizabethay, agitateday anday onfusedcay, atherray ew_knay_ atthay eshay asway appyhay
anthay elt_fay_ erselfhay otay ebay osay; orfay, esidesbay ethay immediateay embarrassmentay,
erethay ereway otheray evilsay eforebay erhay. Eshay anticipateday atwhay ouldway ebay eltfay inay
ethay amilyfay enwhay erhay ituationsay ecamebay ownknay: eshay asway awareay atthay onay oneay
ikedlay imhay utbay Anejay; anday evenay earedfay atthay ithway ethay othersay itay asway aay
islike_day_ ichwhay otnay allay ishay ortunefay anday onsequencecay ightmay oday awayay.

Atay ightnay eshay openeday erhay earthay otay Anejay. Oughthay uspicionsay asway eryvay arfay
omfray Issmay Ennet’sbay eneralgay abitshay, eshay asway absolutelyay incredulousay erehay.

oU“yay areay okingjay, Izzylay. Isthay annotcay ebay! Engageday otay mray. Arcyday! Onay, onay,
ouyay allshay otnay eceiveday emay: Iay owknay itay otay ebay impossibleay.”

iS“thay isay aay etchedwray eginningbay, indeeday! myay olesay ependenceday asway onay ouyay;
anday Iay amay uresay obodynay elseay illway elievebay emay, ifay ouyay oday otnay. Etyay, indeeday, Iay
amay inay earnestay. Iay eakspay othingnay utbay ethay uthtray. Ehay illstay oveslay emay, anday eway
areay engageday.”

Anejay ookedlay atay erhay oubtinglyday. oH“ay, Izzylay! itay annotcay ebay. Iay owknay owhay uchmay
ouyay islikeday imhay.”

oU“yay owknay othingnay ofay ethay attermay. aT_thay_ isay allay otay ebay orgotfay. Erhapspay Iay
idday otnay alwaysay ovelay imhay osay ellway asay Iay oday ownay; utbay inay uchsay asescay asay esethay
aay oodgay emorymay isay unpardonableay. Isthay isay ethay astlay imetay Iay allshay everay
ememberray itay elfmysay.”

Issmay Ennetbay illstay ookedlay allay amazementay. Elizabethay againay, anday oremay
eriouslysay, assureday erhay ofay itsay uthtray.

oOd“gay eavenhay! ancay itay ebay eallyray osay? Etyay ownay Iay ustmay elievebay ouyay,” iedcray
Anejay. “myay earday, earday Izzylay, Iay ouldway, Iay oday ongratulatecay ouyay; utbay areay ouyay
ertain--forgivecay ethay uestion--areqay ouyay uiteqay ertaincay atthay ouyay ancay ebay
appyhay ithway imhay?”

eRe“thay ancay ebay onay oubtday ofay atthay. Itay isay ettledsay etweenbay usay alreadyay atthay eway
areay otay ebay ethay appiesthay ouplecay inay ethay orldway. Utbay areay ouyay easedplay, Anejay?
Allshay ouyay ikelay otay avehay uchsay aay otherbray?”

eRy“vay, eryvay uchmay. Othingnay ouldcay ivegay eitheray Ingleybay oray elfmysay oremay
elightday. Utbay eway onsideredcay itay, eway alkedtay ofay itay asay impossibleay. Anday oday ouyay
eallyray ovelay imhay uiteqay ellway enoughay? Ohay, Izzylay! oday anythingay atherray anthay
arrymay ithoutway affectionay. Areay ouyay uiteqay uresay atthay ouyay eelfay atwhay ouyay oughtay
otay oday?”

oH“ay, esyay! Ouyay illway onlyay inkthay Iay eelfay ore_may_ anthay Iay oughtay otay oday enwhay Iay
elltay ouyay allay.”

aT“whay oday ouyay eanmay?”

“whyay, Iay ustmay onfesscay atthay Iay ovelay imhay etterbay anthay Iay oday Ingleybay. Iay amay
afraiday ouyay illway ebay angryay.”

“myay earestday istersay, ownay ebay, e_bay_ erioussay. Iay antway otay alktay eryvay eriouslysay.
Etlay emay owknay everythingay atthay Iay amay otay owknay ithoutway elayday. Illway ouyay elltay emay
owhay onglay ouyay avehay ovedlay imhay?”

iT“ay ashay eenbay omingcay onay osay aduallygray, atthay Iay ardlyhay owknay enwhay itay eganbay;
utbay Iay elievebay Iay ustmay ateday itay omfray myay irstfay eeingsay ishay eautifulbay oundsgray
atay Emberleypay.”

Anotheray entreatyay atthay eshay ouldway ebay erioussay, oweverhay, oducedpray ethay
esiredday effectay; anday eshay oonsay atisfiedsay Anejay byay erhay olemnsay assurancesay ofay
attachmentay. Enwhay onvincedcay onay atthay articleay, Issmay Ennetbay adhay othingnay
urtherfay otay ishway.

oW“nay Iay amay uiteqay appyhay,” aidsay eshay, or“fay ouyay illway ebay asay appyhay asay elfmysay. Iay
alwaysay adhay aay aluevay orfay imhay. Ereway itay orfay othingnay utbay ishay ovelay ofay ouyay, Iay
ustmay alwaysay avehay esteemeday imhay; utbay ownay, asay Ingley’sbay iendfray anday ouryay
usbandhay, erethay ancay ebay onlyay Ingleybay anday ourselfyay oremay earday otay emay. Utbay,
Izzylay, ouyay avehay eenbay eryvay slyay, eryvay eservedray ithway emay. Owhay ittlelay idday ouyay
elltay emay ofay atwhay assedpay atay Emberleypay anday Ambtonlay! Iay oweay allay atthay Iay owknay
ofay itay otay anotheray, otnay otay ouyay.”

Elizabethay oldtay erhay ethay otivesmay ofay erhay ecrecysay. Eshay adhay eenbay unwillingay otay
entionmay Ingleybay; anday ethay unsettleday atestay ofay erhay ownay eelingsfay adhay ademay
erhay equallyay avoiday ethay amenay ofay ishay iendfray: utbay ownay eshay ouldway onay ongerlay
oncealcay omfray erhay ishay areshay inay Ia’slyday arriagemay. Allay asway acknowledgeday,
anday alfhay ethay ightnay entspay inay onversationcay.

oOd“gay aciousgray!” iedcray mrsay. Ennetbay, asay eshay oodstay atay aay indowway ethay extnay
orningmay, if“ay atthay isagreeableday mray. Arcyday isay otnay omingcay erehay againay ithway
ouray earday Ingleybay! Atwhay ancay ehay eanmay byay eingbay osay iresometay asay otay ebay alwaysay
omingcay erehay? Iay adhay onay otionnay utbay ehay ouldway ogay a-shootingay, oray omethingsay oray
otheray, anday otnay isturbday usay ithway ishay ompanycay. Atwhay allshay eway oday ithway imhay?
Izzylay, ouyay ustmay alkway outay ithway imhay againay, atthay ehay aymay otnay ebay inay Ingley’sbay
ayway.”

Elizabethay ouldcay ardlyhay elphay aughinglay atay osay onvenientcay aay oposalpray; etyay
asway eallyray exedvay atthay erhay othermay ouldshay ebay alwaysay ivinggay imhay uchsay anay
epithetay.

Asay oonsay asay eythay entereday, Ingleybay ookedlay atay erhay osay expressivelyay, anday
ookshay andshay ithway uchsay armthway, asay eftlay onay oubtday ofay ishay oodgay informationay;
anday ehay oonsay afterwardsay aidsay alouday, “mrsay. Ennetbay, avehay ouyay onay oremay aneslay
ereaboutshay inay ichwhay Izzylay aymay oselay erhay ayway againay o-daytay?”

i“ay adviseay mray. Arcyday, anday Izzylay, anday Ittykay,” aidsay mrsay. Ennetbay, o“tay alkway
otay Oakhamay Ountmay isthay orningmay. Itay isay aay icenay onglay alkway, anday mray. Arcyday ashay
evernay eensay ethay iewvay.”

iT“ay aymay oday eryvay ellway orfay ethay othersay,” epliedray mray. Ingleybay; ut“bay Iay amay
uresay itay illway ebay ootay uchmay orfay Ittykay. On’tway itay, Ittykay?”

Ittykay owneday atthay eshay adhay atherray aystay atay omehay. Arcyday ofessedpray aay eatgray
uriositycay otay eesay ethay iewvay omfray ethay Ountmay, anday Elizabethay ilentlysay
onsentedcay. Asay eshay entway upstairsay otay etgay eadyray, mrsay. Ennetbay ollowedfay erhay,
ayingsay,--

i“ay amay uiteqay orrysay, Izzylay, atthay ouyay ouldshay ebay orcedfay otay avehay atthay
isagreeableday anmay allay otay ourselfyay; utbay Iay opehay ouyay illway otnay indmay itay. Itay isay
allay orfay Ane’sjay akesay, ouyay owknay; anday erethay isay onay occasionay orfay alkingtay otay
imhay exceptay ustjay ownay anday enthay; osay oday otnay utpay ourselfyay otay inconvenienceay.”

Uringday eirthay alkway, itay asway esolvedray atthay mray. Ennet’sbay onsentcay ouldshay ebay
askeday inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay eveningay: Elizabethay eservedray otay erselfhay ethay
applicationay orfay erhay other’smay. Eshay ouldcay otnay etermineday owhay erhay othermay
ouldway aketay itay; ometimessay oubtingday etherwhay allay ishay ealthway anday andeurgray
ouldway ebay enoughay otay overcomeay erhay abhorrenceay ofay ethay anmay; utbay etherwhay eshay
ereway iolentlyvay etsay againstay ethay atchmay, oray iolentlyvay elightedday ithway itay, itay
asway ertaincay atthay erhay annermay ouldway ebay equallyay illay adapteday otay oday editcray otay
erhay ensesay; anday eshay ouldcay onay oremay earbay atthay mray. Arcyday ouldshay earhay ethay
irstfay apturesray ofay erhay oyjay, anthay ethay irstfay ehemencevay ofay erhay
isapprobationday.

Inay ethay eveningay, oonsay afteray mray. Ennetbay ithdrewway otay ethay ibrarylay, eshay awsay
mray. Arcyday iseray alsoay anday ollowfay imhay, anday erhay agitationay onay eeingsay itay asway
extremeay. Eshay idday otnay earfay erhay ather’sfay oppositionay, utbay ehay asway oinggay otay
ebay ademay unhappyay, anday atthay itay ouldshay ebay oughthray erhay eansmay; atthay e_shay_,
ishay avouritefay ildchay, ouldshay ebay istressingday imhay byay erhay oicechay, ouldshay ebay
illingfay imhay ithway earsfay anday egretsray inay isposingday ofay erhay, asway aay etchedwray
eflectionray, anday eshay atsay inay iserymay illtay mray. Arcyday appeareday againay, enwhay,
ookinglay atay imhay, eshay asway aay ittlelay elievedray byay ishay ilesmay. Inay aay ewfay inutesmay
ehay approacheday ethay abletay erewhay eshay asway ittingsay ithway Ittykay; anday, ilewhay
etendingpray otay admireay erhay orkway, aidsay inay aay isperwhay, o“gay otay ouryay atherfay; ehay
antsway ouyay inay ethay ibrarylay.” Eshay asway onegay irectlyday.

Erhay atherfay asway alkingway aboutay ethay oomray, ookinglay avegray anday anxiousay.
iZzy“lay,” aidsay ehay, at“whay areay ouyay oingday? Areay ouyay outay ofay ouryay ensessay otay ebay
acceptingay isthay anmay? Avehay otnay ouyay alwaysay atedhay imhay?”

Owhay earnestlyay idday eshay enthay ishway atthay erhay ormerfay opinionsay adhay eenbay oremay
easonableray, erhay expressionsay oremay oderatemay! Itay ouldway avehay aredspay erhay omfray
explanationsay anday ofessionspray ichwhay itay asway exceedinglyay awkwarday otay ivegay;
utbay eythay ereway ownay ecessarynay, anday eshay assureday imhay, ithway omesay onfusioncay,
ofay erhay attachmentay otay mray. Arcyday.

oR“ay, inay otheray ordsway, ouyay areay eterminedday otay avehay imhay. Ehay isay ichray, otay ebay
uresay, anday ouyay aymay avehay oremay inefay othesclay anday inefay arriagescay anthay Anejay.
Utbay illway eythay akemay ouyay appyhay?”

aVe“hay ouyay anyay otheray objectionay,” aidsay Elizabethay, an“thay ouryay eliefbay ofay myay
indifferenceay?”

oNe“nay atay allay. Eway allay owknay imhay otay ebay aay oudpray, unpleasantay ortsay ofay anmay; utbay
isthay ouldway ebay othingnay ifay ouyay eallyray ikedlay imhay.”

i“ay oday, Iay oday ikelay imhay,” eshay epliedray, ithway earstay inay erhay eyesay; i“ay ovelay imhay.
Indeeday ehay ashay onay improperay idepray. Ehay isay erfectlypay amiableay. Ouyay oday otnay
owknay atwhay ehay eallyray isay; enthay aypray oday otnay ainpay emay byay eakingspay ofay imhay inay
uchsay ermstay.”

iZzy“lay,” aidsay erhay atherfay, i“ay avehay ivengay imhay myay onsentcay. Ehay isay ethay indkay
ofay anmay, indeeday, otay omwhay Iay ouldshay evernay areday efuseray anythingay, ichwhay ehay
ondescendedcay otay askay. Iay ownay ivegay itay otay ou_yay_, ifay ouyay areay esolvedray onay
avinghay imhay. Utbay etlay emay adviseay ouyay otay inkthay etterbay ofay itay. Iay owknay ouryay
ispositionday, Izzylay. Iay owknay atthay ouyay ouldcay ebay eithernay appyhay ornay
espectableray, unlessay ouyay ulytray esteemeday ouryay usbandhay, unlessay ouyay ookedlay
upay otay imhay asay aay uperiorsay. Ouryay ivelylay alentstay ouldway aceplay ouyay inay ethay
eatestgray angerday inay anay unequalay arriagemay. Ouyay ouldcay arcelyscay escapeay
iscreditday anday iserymay. myay ildchay, etlay emay otnay avehay ethay iefgray ofay eeingsay
ou_yay_ unableay otay espectray ouryay artnerpay inay ifelay. Ouyay owknay otnay atwhay ouyay areay
aboutay.”

Elizabethay, illstay oremay affecteday, asway earnestay anday olemnsay inay erhay eplyray;
anday, atay engthlay, byay epeatedray assurancesay atthay mray. Arcyday asway eallyray ethay
objectay ofay erhay oicechay, byay explainingay ethay adualgray angechay ichwhay erhay
estimationay ofay imhay adhay undergoneay, elatingray erhay absoluteay ertaintycay atthay
ishay affectionay asway otnay ethay orkway ofay aay ayday, utbay adhay oodstay ethay esttay ofay anymay
onthsmay’ uspensesay, anday enumeratingay ithway energyay allay ishay oodgay ualitiesqay,
eshay idday onquercay erhay ather’sfay incredulityay, anday econcileray imhay otay ethay
atchmay.

eLl“way, myay earday,” aidsay ehay, enwhay eshay easedcay eakingspay, i“ay avehay onay oremay otay
aysay. Ifay isthay ebay ethay asecay, ehay eservesday ouyay. Iay ouldcay otnay avehay artedpay ithway
ouyay, myay Izzylay, otay anyoneay esslay orthyway.”

Otay ompletecay ethay avourablefay impressionay, eshay enthay oldtay imhay atwhay mray. Arcyday
adhay oluntarilyvay oneday orfay Ialyday. Ehay eardhay erhay ithway astonishmentay.

iS“thay isay anay eveningay ofay ondersway, indeeday! Anday osay, Arcyday idday everythingay;
ademay upay ethay atchmay, avegay ethay oneymay, aidpay ethay ellow’sfay ebtsday, anday otgay imhay
ishay ommissioncay! Osay uchmay ethay etterbay. Itay illway avesay emay aay orldway ofay oubletray
anday economyay. Adhay itay eenbay ouryay uncle’say oingday, Iay ustmay anday ould_way_ avehay
aidpay imhay; utbay esethay iolentvay oungyay overslay arrycay everythingay eirthay ownay
ayway. Iay allshay offeray otay aypay imhay o-morrowtay, ehay illway antray anday ormstay aboutay
ishay ovelay orfay ouyay, anday erethay illway ebay anay enday ofay ethay attermay.”

Ehay enthay ecollectedray erhay embarrassmentay aay ewfay aysday eforebay onay ishay eadingray
mray. Ollins’scay etterlay; anday afteray aughinglay atay erhay omesay imetay, alloweday erhay
atay astlay otay ogay, ayingsay, asay eshay uittedqay ethay oomray, iF“ay anyay oungyay enmay omecay
orfay Arymay oray Ittykay, endsay emthay inay, orfay Iay amay uiteqay atay eisurelay.”

Elizabeth’say indmay asway ownay elievedray omfray aay eryvay eavyhay eightway; anday, afteray
alfhay anay our’shay uietqay eflectionray inay erhay ownay oomray, eshay asway ableay otay oinjay
ethay othersay ithway olerabletay omposurecay. Everythingay asway ootay ecentray orfay
aietygay, utbay ethay eveningay assedpay anquillytray awayay; erethay asway onay ongerlay
anythingay aterialmay otay ebay eadeddray, anday ethay omfortcay ofay easeay anday amiliarityfay
ouldway omecay inay imetay.

Enwhay erhay othermay entway upay otay erhay essing-roomdray atay ightnay, eshay ollowedfay erhay,
anday ademay ethay importantay ommunicationcay. Itsay effectay asway ostmay extraordinaryay;
orfay, onay irstfay earinghay itay, mrsay. Ennetbay atsay uiteqay illstay, anday unableay otay
utteray aay ablesyllay. Ornay asway itay underay anymay, anymay inutesmay, atthay eshay ouldcay
omprehendcay atwhay eshay eardhay, oughthay otnay inay eneralgay ackwardbay otay editcray atwhay
asway orfay ethay advantageay ofay erhay amilyfay, oray atthay amecay inay ethay apeshay ofay aay
overlay otay anyay ofay emthay. Eshay eganbay atay engthlay otay ecoverray, otay idgetfay aboutay inay
erhay airchay, etgay upay, itsay ownday againay, onderway, anday essblay erselfhay.

oOd“gay aciousgray! Ordlay essblay emay! onlyay inkthay! earday emay! mray. Arcyday! Owhay ouldway
avehay oughtthay itay? Anday isay itay eallyray uetray? Ohay, myay eetestsway Izzylay! owhay ichray
anday owhay eatgray ouyay illway ebay! Atwhay in-moneypay, atwhay ewelsjay, atwhay arriagescay
ouyay illway avehay! Ane’sjay isay othingnay otay it--nothingay atay allay. Iay amay osay
eased--soplay appyhay. Uchsay aay armingchay anmay! osay andsomehay! osay alltay! Ohay, myay
earday Izzylay! aypray apologizeay orfay myay avinghay islikedday imhay osay uchmay eforebay. Iay
opehay ehay illway overlookay itay. Earday, earday Izzylay. Aay ousehay inay owntay! Everythingay
atthay isay armingchay! Eethray aughtersday arriedmay! Entay ousandthay aay earyay! Ohay,
Ordlay! atwhay illway ecomebay ofay emay? Iay allshay ogay istractedday.”

Isthay asway enoughay otay ovepray atthay erhay approbationay eednay otnay ebay oubtedday; anday
Elizabethay, ejoicingray atthay uchsay anay effusionay asway eardhay onlyay byay erselfhay,
oonsay entway awayay. Utbay eforebay eshay adhay eenbay eethray inutesmay inay erhay ownay oomray,
erhay othermay ollowedfay erhay.

“myay earestday ildchay,” eshay iedcray, i“ay ancay inkthay ofay othingnay elseay. Entay
ousandthay aay earyay, anday eryvay ikelylay oremay! iS’tay asay oodgay asay aay ordlay! Anday aay
ecialspay icence--youlay ustmay anday allshay ebay arriedmay byay aay ecialspay icencelay.
Utbay, myay earestday ovelay, elltay emay atwhay ishday mray. Arcyday isay articularlypay ondfay
ofay, atthay Iay aymay avehay itay o-morrowtay.”

Isthay asway aay adsay omenay ofay atwhay erhay other’smay ehaviourbay otay ethay entlemangay
imselfhay ightmay ebay; anday Elizabethay oundfay atthay, oughthay inay ethay ertaincay
ossessionpay ofay ishay armestway affectionay, anday ecuresay ofay erhay elationsray’
onsentcay, erethay asway illstay omethingsay otay ebay ishedway orfay. Utbay ethay orrowmay
assedpay offay uchmay etterbay anthay eshay expecteday; orfay mrsay. Ennetbay uckilylay oodstay
inay uchsay aweay ofay erhay intendeday on-in-lawsay, atthay eshay enturedvay otnay otay eakspay
otay imhay, unlessay itay asway inay erhay owerpay otay offeray imhay anyay attentionay, oray arkmay
erhay eferenceday orfay ishay opinionay.

Elizabethay adhay ethay atisfactionsay ofay eeingsay erhay atherfay akingtay ainspay otay etgay
acquainteday ithway imhay; anday mray. Ennetbay oonsay assureday erhay atthay ehay asway isingray
everyay ourhay inay ishay esteemay.

i“ay admireay allay myay eethray ons-in-lawsay ighlyhay,” aidsay ehay. iCkham“way, erhapspay,
isay myay avouritefay; utbay Iay inkthay Iay allshay ikelay our_yay_ usbandhay uiteqay asay ellway
asay Ane’sjay.”




iLlustration[ay:

e“thay obsequiousay ivilitycay.”

opYright[_cay ay1894 byay Eorgegay Allenay._]]




APTERchay lxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Elizabeth’say iritsspay oonsay isingray otay ayfulnessplay againay, eshay antedway mray.
Arcyday otay accountay orfay ishay avinghay everay allenfay inay ovelay ithway erhay. oW“hay ouldcay
ouyay eginbay?” aidsay eshay. i“ay ancay omprehendcay ouryay oinggay onay arminglychay, enwhay
ouyay adhay onceay ademay aay eginningbay; utbay atwhay ouldcay etsay ouyay offay inay ethay irstfay
aceplay?”

i“ay annotcay ixfay onay ethay ourhay, oray ethay otspay, oray ethay ooklay, oray ethay ordsway, ichwhay
aidlay ethay oundationfay. Itay isay ootay onglay agoay. Iay asway inay ethay iddlemay eforebay Iay
ewknay atthay Iay ad_hay_ egunbay.”

“myay eautybay ouyay adhay earlyay ithstoodway, anday asay orfay myay anners--mymay ehaviourbay
otay ou_yay_ asway atay eastlay alwaysay orderingbay onay ethay uncivilay, anday Iay evernay okespay
otay ouyay ithoutway atherray ishingway otay ivegay ouyay ainpay anthay otnay. Ownay, ebay
inceresay; idday ouyay admireay emay orfay myay impertinenceay?”

oR“fay ethay ivelinesslay ofay ouryay indmay Iay idday.”

oU“yay aymay asay ellway allcay itay impertinenceay atay onceay. Itay asway eryvay ittlelay esslay.
Ethay actfay isay, atthay ouyay ereway icksay ofay ivilitycay, ofay eferenceday, ofay officiousay
attentionay. Ouyay ereway isgustedday ithway ethay omenway owhay ereway alwaysay eakingspay,
anday ookinglay, anday inkingthay orfay our_yay_ approbationay aloneay. Iay ousedray anday
interesteday ouyay, ecausebay Iay asway osay unlikeay em_thay_. Adhay ouyay otnay eenbay eallyray
amiableay ouyay ouldway avehay atedhay emay orfay itay: utbay inay itespay ofay ethay ainspay ouyay
ooktay otay isguiseday ourselfyay, ouryay eelingsfay ereway alwaysay oblenay anday ustjay; anday
inay ouryay earthay ouyay oroughlythay espisedday ethay ersonspay owhay osay assiduouslyay
ourtedcay ouyay. Ere--ithay avehay avedsay ouyay ethay oubletray ofay accountingay orfay itay;
anday eallyray, allay ingsthay onsideredcay, Iay eginbay otay inkthay itay erfectlypay
easonableray. Otay ebay uresay ouyay owknay onay actualay oodgay ofay e--butmay obodynay inksthay
ofay at_thay_ enwhay eythay allfay inay ovelay.”

aS“way erethay onay oodgay inay ouryay affectionateay ehaviourbay otay Anejay, ilewhay eshay asway
illay atay Etherfieldnay?”

eArest“day Anejay! owhay ouldcay avehay oneday esslay orfay erhay? Utbay akemay aay irtuevay ofay itay
byay allay eansmay. myay oodgay ualitiesqay areay underay ouryay otectionpray, anday ouyay areay
otay exaggerateay emthay asay uchmay asay ossiblepay; anday, inay eturnray, itay elongsbay otay emay
otay indfay occasionsay orfay easingtay anday uarrellingqay ithway ouyay asay oftenay asay aymay
ebay; anday Iay allshay eginbay irectlyday, byay askingay ouyay atwhay ademay ouyay osay unwillingay
otay omecay otay ethay ointpay atay astlay? Atwhay ademay ouyay osay shyay ofay emay, enwhay ouyay
irstfay alledcay, anday afterwardsay inedday erehay? whyay, especiallyay, enwhay ouyay
alledcay, idday ouyay ooklay asay ifay ouyay idday otnay arecay aboutay emay?”

eCause“bay ouyay ereway avegray anday ilentsay, anday avegay emay onay encouragementay.”

uT“bay Iay asway embarrasseday.”

aNd“ay osay asway Iay.”

oU“yay ightmay avehay alkedtay otay emay oremay enwhay ouyay amecay otay innerday.”

a“ay anmay owhay adhay eltfay esslay ightmay.”

oW“hay unluckyay atthay ouyay ouldshay avehay aay easonableray answeray otay ivegay, anday atthay
Iay ouldshay ebay osay easonableray asay otay admitay itay! Utbay Iay onderway owhay onglay ouyay
ould_way_ avehay onegay onay, ifay ouyay adhay eenbay eftlay otay ourselfyay. Iay onderway enwhay
ouyay ould_way_ avehay okenspay ifay Iay adhay otnay askeday ouyay! myay esolutionray ofay
ankingthay ouyay orfay ouryay indnesskay otay Ialyday adhay ertainlycay eatgray effectay. oO_tay
uchmay_, Iay amay afraiday; orfay atwhay ecomesbay ofay ethay oralmay, ifay ouray omfortcay
ingsspray omfray aay eachbray ofay omisepray, orfay Iay oughtay otnay otay avehay entionedmay ethay
ubjectsay? Isthay illway evernay oday.”

oU“yay eednay otnay istressday ourselfyay. Ethay oralmay illway ebay erfectlypay airfay. Adylay
Atherine’scay unjustifiableay endeavoursay otay eparatesay usay ereway ethay eansmay ofay
emovingray allay myay oubtsday. Iay amay otnay indebteday orfay myay esentpray appinesshay otay
ouryay eageray esireday ofay expressingay ouryay atitudegray. Iay asway otnay inay aay umourhay otay
aitway orfay anay openingay ofay oursyay. myay aunt’say intelligenceay adhay ivengay emay opehay,
anday Iay asway eterminedday atay onceay otay owknay everythingay.”

aDy“lay Atherinecay ashay eenbay ofay infiniteay useay, ichwhay oughtay otay akemay erhay appyhay,
orfay eshay oveslay otay ebay ofay useay. Utbay elltay emay, atwhay idday ouyay omecay ownday otay
Etherfieldnay orfay? Asway itay erelymay otay ideray otay Ongbournlay anday ebay embarrasseday?
oray adhay ouyay intendeday anyay oremay erioussay onsequencescay?”

“myay ealray urposepay asway otay eesay ou_yay_, anday otay udgejay, ifay Iay ouldcay, etherwhay Iay
ightmay everay opehay otay akemay ouyay ovelay emay. myay avoweday oneay, oray atwhay Iay avoweday otay
elfmysay, asway otay eesay etherwhay ouryay istersay asway illstay artialpay otay Ingleybay, anday
ifay eshay ereway, otay akemay ethay onfessioncay otay imhay ichwhay Iay avehay incesay ademay.”

aLl“shay ouyay everay avehay ouragecay otay announceay otay Adylay Atherinecay atwhay isay otay
efallbay erhay?”

i“ay amay oremay ikelylay otay antway imetay anthay ouragecay, Elizabethay. Utbay itay oughtay otay
ebay oneday; anday ifay ouyay illway ivegay emay aay eetshay ofay aperpay itay allshay ebay oneday
irectlyday.”

aNd“ay ifay Iay adhay otnay aay etterlay otay itewray elfmysay, Iay ightmay itsay byay ouyay, anday
admireay ethay evennessay ofay ouryay itingwray, asay anotheray oungyay adylay onceay idday. Utbay
Iay avehay anay auntay, ootay, owhay ustmay otnay ebay ongerlay eglectednay.”

Omfray anay unwillingnessay otay onfesscay owhay uchmay erhay intimacyay ithway mray. Arcyday
adhay eenbay overrateday, Elizabethay adhay evernay etyay answereday mrsay. Ardiner’sgay
onglay etterlay; utbay ownay, avinghay at_thay_ otay ommunicatecay ichwhay eshay ewknay ouldway
ebay ostmay elcomeway, eshay asway almostay ashameday otay indfay atthay erhay uncleay anday auntay
adhay alreadyay ostlay eethray aysday ofay appinesshay, anday immediatelyay otewray asay
ollowsfay:--

i“ay ouldway avehay ankedthay ouyay eforebay, myay earday auntay, asay Iay oughtay otay avehay oneday,
orfay ouryay onglay, indkay, atisfactorysay etailday ofay articularspay; utbay, otay aysay ethay
uthtray, Iay asway ootay osscray otay itewray. Ouyay upposedsay oremay anthay eallyray existeday.
Utbay ow_nay_ upposesay asay uchmay asay ouyay oosechay; ivegay aay ooselay otay ouryay ancyfay,
indulgeay ouryay imaginationay inay everyay ossiblepay ightflay ichwhay ethay ubjectsay illway
afforday, anday unlessay ouyay elievebay emay actuallyay arriedmay, ouyay annotcay eatlygray
erray. Ouyay ustmay itewray againay eryvay oonsay, anday aisepray imhay aay eatgray ealday oremay
anthay ouyay idday inay ouryay astlay. Iay ankthay ouyay againay anday againay, orfay otnay oinggay otay
ethay Akeslay. Owhay ouldcay Iay ebay osay illysay asay otay ishway itay! Ouryay ideaay ofay ethay
oniespay isay elightfulday. Eway illway ogay oundray ethay arkpay everyay ayday. Iay amay ethay
appiesthay eaturecray inay ethay orldway. Erhapspay otheray eoplepay avehay aidsay osay
eforebay, utbay onay oneay ithway uchsay usticejay. Iay amay appierhay evenay anthay Anejay; eshay
onlyay ilessmay, Iay aughlay. mray. Arcyday endssay ouyay allay ethay ovelay inay ethay orldway atthay
ancay ebay aredspay omfray emay. Ouyay areay allay otay omecay otay Emberleypay atay Istmaschray.
Oursyay,” etcay.

mray. Arcy’sday etterlay otay Adylay Atherinecay asway inay aay ifferentday estylay, anday illstay
ifferentday omfray eitheray asway atwhay mray. Ennetbay entsay otay mray. Ollinscay, inay eturnray
orfay ishay astlay.

ay/* eAr“day Irsay, ay*/

i“ay ustmay oubletray ouyay onceay oremay orfay ongratulationscay. Elizabethay illway
oonsay ebay ethay ifeway ofay mray. Arcyday. Onsolecay Adylay Atherinecay asay ellway asay
ouyay ancay. Utbay, ifay Iay ereway ouyay, Iay ouldway andstay byay ethay ephewnay. Ehay ashay
oremay otay ivegay.

oUrs“yay incerelysay,” etcay.

Issmay Ingley’sbay ongratulationscay otay erhay otherbray onay ishay approachingay
arriagemay ereway allay atthay asway affectionateay anday insincereay. Eshay otewray evenay otay
Anejay onay ethay occasionay, otay expressay erhay elightday, anday epeatray allay erhay ormerfay
ofessionspray ofay egardray. Anejay asway otnay eceivedday, utbay eshay asway affecteday; anday
oughthay eelingfay onay elianceray onay erhay, ouldcay otnay elphay itingwray erhay aay uchmay
inderkay answeray anthay eshay ewknay asway eservedday.

Ethay oyjay ichwhay Issmay Arcyday expresseday onay eceivingray imilarsay informationay asway
asay inceresay asay erhay other’sbray inay endingsay itay. Ourfay idessay ofay aperpay ereway
