insufficientay otay ontaincay allay erhay elightday, anday allay erhay earnestay esireday ofay
eingbay ovedlay byay erhay istersay.

Eforebay anyay answeray ouldcay arriveay omfray mray. Ollinscay, oray anyay ongratulationscay
otay Elizabethay omfray ishay ifeway, ethay Ongbournlay amilyfay eardhay atthay ethay
Ollinsescay ereway omecay emselvesthay otay Ucaslay Odgelay. Ethay easonray ofay isthay
uddensay emovalray asway oonsay evidentay. Adylay Atherinecay adhay eenbay enderedray osay
exceedinglyay angryay byay ethay ontentscay ofay erhay ephew’snay etterlay, atthay
Arlottechay, eallyray ejoicingray inay ethay atchmay, asway anxiousay otay etgay awayay illtay
ethay ormstay asway ownblay overay. Atay uchsay aay omentmay, ethay arrivalay ofay erhay iendfray
asway aay inceresay easureplay otay Elizabethay, oughthay inay ethay oursecay ofay eirthay
eetingsmay eshay ustmay ometimessay inkthay ethay easureplay earlyday oughtbay, enwhay eshay
awsay mray. Arcyday exposeday otay allay ethay aradingpay anday obsequiousay ivilitycay ofay erhay
usbandhay. Ehay orebay itay, oweverhay, ithway admirableay almnesscay. Ehay ouldcay evenay
istenlay otay Irsay Illiamway Ucaslay, enwhay ehay omplimentedcay imhay onay arryingcay awayay
ethay ightestbray eweljay ofay ethay ountrycay, anday expresseday ishay opeshay ofay eirthay allay
eetingmay equentlyfray atay stay. Ames’sjay, ithway eryvay ecentday omposurecay. Ifay ehay idday
ugshray ishay ouldersshay, itay asway otnay illtay Irsay Illiamway asway outay ofay ightsay.

mrsay. Ilips’sphay ulgarityvay asway anotheray, anday, erhapspay, aay eatergray axtay onay ishay
orbearancefay; anday oughthay mrsay. Ilipsphay, asay ellway asay erhay istersay, oodstay inay
ootay uchmay aweay ofay imhay otay eakspay ithway ethay amiliarityfay ichwhay Ingley’sbay
ood-humourgay encourageday; etyay, eneverwhay eshay id_day_ eakspay, eshay ustmay ebay
ulgarvay. Ornay asway erhay espectray orfay imhay, oughthay itay ademay erhay oremay uietqay, atay
allay ikelylay otay akemay erhay oremay elegantay. Elizabethay idday allay eshay ouldcay otay
ieldshay imhay omfray ethay equentfray oticenay ofay eitheray, anday asway everay anxiousay otay
eepkay imhay otay erselfhay, anday otay osethay ofay erhay amilyfay ithway omwhay ehay ightmay
onversecay ithoutway ortificationmay; anday oughthay ethay uncomfortableay eelingsfay
arisingay omfray allay isthay ooktay omfray ethay easonsay ofay ourtshipcay uchmay ofay itsay
easureplay, itay addeday otay ethay opehay ofay ethay uturefay; anday eshay ookedlay orwardfay
ithway elightday otay ethay imetay enwhay eythay ouldshay ebay emovedray omfray ocietysay osay
ittlelay easingplay otay eitheray, otay allay ethay omfortcay anday eleganceay ofay eirthay
amilyfay artypay atay Emberleypay.




iLlustration[ay]




APTERchay Ilxay.


iLlustration[ay]

Appyhay orfay allay erhay aternalmay eelingsfay asway ethay ayday onay ichwhay mrsay. Ennetbay otgay
idray ofay erhay otway ostmay eservingday aughtersday. Ithway atwhay elightedday idepray eshay
afterwardsay isitedvay mrsay. Ingleybay, anday alkedtay ofay mrsay. Arcyday, aymay ebay
uessedgay. Iay ishway Iay ouldcay aysay, orfay ethay akesay ofay erhay amilyfay, atthay ethay
accomplishmentay ofay erhay earnestay esireday inay ethay establishmentay ofay osay anymay ofay
erhay ildrenchay oducedpray osay appyhay anay effectay asay otay akemay erhay aay ensiblesay,
amiableay, ell-informedway omanway orfay ethay estray ofay erhay ifelay; oughthay, erhapspay,
itay asway uckylay orfay erhay usbandhay, owhay ightmay otnay avehay elishedray omesticday
elicityfay inay osay unusualay aay ormfay, atthay eshay illstay asway occasionallyay ervousnay
anday invariablyay illysay.

mray. Ennetbay issedmay ishay econdsay aughterday exceedinglyay; ishay affectionay orfay erhay
ewdray imhay ofteneray omfray omehay anthay anythingay elseay ouldcay oday. Ehay elightedday inay
oinggay otay Emberleypay, especiallyay enwhay ehay asway eastlay expecteday.

mray. Ingleybay anday Anejay emainedray atay Etherfieldnay onlyay aay elvemonthtway. Osay earnay
aay icinityvay otay erhay othermay anday Erytonmay elationsray asway otnay esirableday evenay otay
is_hay_ easyay empertay, oray er_hay_ affectionateay earthay. Ethay arlingday ishway ofay ishay
isterssay asway enthay atifiedgray: ehay oughtbay anay estateay inay aay eighbouringnay ountycay
otay Erbyshireday; anday Anejay anday Elizabethay, inay additionay otay everyay otheray ourcesay
ofay appinesshay, ereway ithinway irtythay ilesmay ofay eachay otheray.

Ittykay, otay erhay eryvay aterialmay advantageay, entspay ethay iefchay ofay erhay imetay ithway
erhay otway elderay isterssay. Inay ocietysay osay uperiorsay otay atwhay eshay adhay enerallygay
ownknay, erhay improvementay asway eatgray. Eshay asway otnay ofay osay ungovernableay aay
empertay asay Ialyday; anday, emovedray omfray ethay influenceay ofay Ia’slyday exampleay, eshay
ecamebay, byay operpray attentionay anday anagementmay, esslay irritableay, esslay
ignorantay, anday esslay insipiday. Omfray ethay urtherfay isadvantageday ofay Ia’slyday
ocietysay eshay asway ofay oursecay arefullycay eptkay; anday oughthay mrsay. Ickhamway
equentlyfray inviteday erhay otay omecay anday aystay ithway erhay, ithway ethay omisepray ofay
allsbay anday oungyay enmay, erhay atherfay ouldway evernay onsentcay otay erhay oinggay.

Arymay asway ethay onlyay aughterday owhay emainedray atay omehay; anday eshay asway ecessarilynay
awndray omfray ethay ursuitpay ofay accomplishmentsay byay mrsay. Ennet’sbay eingbay uiteqay
unableay otay itsay aloneay. Arymay asway obligeday otay ixmay oremay ithway ethay orldway, utbay
eshay ouldcay illstay oralizemay overay everyay orningmay isitvay; anday asay eshay asway onay
ongerlay ortifiedmay byay omparisonscay etweenbay erhay isterssay’ eautybay anday erhay ownay,
itay asway uspectedsay byay erhay atherfay atthay eshay ubmittedsay otay ethay angechay ithoutway
uchmay eluctanceray.

Asay orfay Ickhamway anday Ialyday, eirthay aracterschay ufferedsay onay evolutionray omfray
ethay arriagemay ofay erhay isterssay. Ehay orebay ithway ilosophyphay ethay onvictioncay atthay
Elizabethay ustmay ownay ecomebay acquainteday ithway ateverwhay ofay ishay ingratitudeay
anday alsehoodfay adhay eforebay eenbay unknownay otay erhay; anday, inay itespay ofay
everythingay, asway otnay ollywhay ithoutway opehay atthay Arcyday ightmay etyay ebay
evailedpray onay otay akemay ishay ortunefay. Ethay ongratulatorycay etterlay ichwhay
Elizabethay eceivedray omfray Ialyday onay erhay arriagemay explaineday otay erhay atthay, byay
ishay ifeway atay eastlay, ifay otnay byay imselfhay, uchsay aay opehay asway erishedchay. Ethay
etterlay asway otay isthay effectay:--

ay/* “myay earday Izzylay, ay*/

i“ay ishway ouyay oyjay. Ifay ouyay ovelay mray. Arcyday alfhay osay ellway asay Iay oday myay earday
Ickhamway, ouyay ustmay ebay eryvay appyhay. Itay isay aay eatgray omfortcay otay avehay ouyay
osay ichray; anday enwhay ouyay avehay othingnay elseay otay oday, Iay opehay ouyay illway
inkthay ofay usay. Iay amay uresay Ickhamway ouldway ikelay aay aceplay atay ourtcay eryvay
uchmay; anday Iay oday otnay inkthay eway allshay avehay uiteqay oneymay enoughay otay ivelay
uponay ithoutway omesay elphay. Anyay aceplay ouldway oday ofay aboutay eethray oray ourfay
undredhay aay earyay; utbay, oweverhay, oday otnay eakspay otay mray. Arcyday aboutay itay,
ifay ouyay adhay atherray otnay.

oUrs“yay,” etcay.

Asay itay appenedhay atthay Elizabethay adhay uchmay atherray otnay, eshay endeavoureday inay
erhay answeray otay utpay anay enday otay everyay entreatyay anday expectationay ofay ethay indkay.
Uchsay eliefray, oweverhay, asay itay asway inay erhay owerpay otay afforday, byay ethay acticepray
ofay atwhay ightmay ebay alledcay economyay inay erhay ownay ivatepray expensesay, eshay
equentlyfray entsay emthay. Itay adhay alwaysay eenbay evidentay otay erhay atthay uchsay anay
incomeay asay eirsthay, underay ethay irectionday ofay otway ersonspay osay extravagantay inay
eirthay antsway, anday eedlesshay ofay ethay uturefay, ustmay ebay eryvay insufficientay otay
eirthay upportsay; anday eneverwhay eythay angedchay eirthay uartersqay, eitheray Anejay oray
erselfhay ereway uresay ofay eingbay applieday otay orfay omesay ittlelay assistanceay owardstay
ischargingday eirthay illsbay. Eirthay annermay ofay ivinglay, evenay enwhay ethay
estorationray ofay eacepay ismissedday emthay otay aay omehay, asway unsettleday inay ethay
extremeay. Eythay ereway alwaysay ovingmay omfray aceplay otay aceplay inay uestqay ofay aay
eapchay ituationsay, anday alwaysay endingspay oremay anthay eythay oughtay. Ishay affectionay
orfay erhay oonsay unksay intoay indifferenceay: ershay astedlay aay ittlelay ongerlay; anday,
inay itespay ofay erhay outhyay anday erhay annersmay, eshay etainedray allay ethay aimsclay otay
eputationray ichwhay erhay arriagemay adhay ivengay erhay. Oughthay Arcyday ouldcay evernay
eceiveray im_hay_ atay Emberleypay, etyay, orfay Elizabeth’say akesay, ehay assisteday imhay
urtherfay inay ishay ofessionpray. Ialyday asway occasionallyay aay isitorvay erethay, enwhay
erhay usbandhay asway onegay otay enjoyay imselfhay inay Ondonlay oray Athbay; anday ithway ethay
Ingleysbay eythay othbay ofay emthay equentlyfray ayedstay osay onglay, atthay evenay
Ingley’sbay ood-humourgay asway overcomeay, anday ehay oceededpray osay arfay asay otay alk_tay_
ofay ivinggay emthay aay inthay otay ebay onegay.

Issmay Ingleybay asway eryvay eeplyday ortifiedmay byay Arcy’sday arriagemay; utbay asay eshay
oughtthay itay advisableay otay etainray ethay ightray ofay isitingvay atay Emberleypay, eshay
oppeddray allay erhay esentmentray; asway onderfay anthay everay ofay Eorgianagay, almostay asay
attentiveay otay Arcyday asay eretoforehay, anday aidpay offay everyay arrearay ofay ivilitycay
otay Elizabethay.

Emberleypay asway ownay Eorgiana’sgay omehay; anday ethay attachmentay ofay ethay isterssay
asway exactlyay atwhay Arcyday adhay opedhay otay eesay. Eythay ereway ableay otay ovelay eachay
otheray, evenay asay ellway asay eythay intendeday. Eorgianagay adhay ethay ighesthay opinionay
inay ethay orldway ofay Elizabethay; oughthay atay irstfay eshay oftenay istenedlay ithway anay
astonishmentay orderingbay onay alarmay atay erhay ivelylay, ortivespay annermay ofay
alkingtay otay erhay otherbray. Ehay, owhay adhay alwaysay inspireday inay erselfhay aay espectray
ichwhay almostay overcameay erhay affectionay, eshay ownay awsay ethay objectay ofay openay
easantryplay. Erhay indmay eceivedray owledgeknay ichwhay adhay evernay eforebay allenfay inay
erhay ayway. byay Elizabeth’say instructionsay eshay eganbay otay omprehendcay atthay aay
omanway aymay aketay ibertieslay ithway erhay usbandhay, ichwhay aay otherbray illway otnay
alwaysay alloway inay aay istersay oremay anthay entay earsyay oungeryay anthay imselfhay.

Adylay Atherinecay asway extremelyay indignantay onay ethay arriagemay ofay erhay ephewnay;
anday asay eshay avegay ayway otay allay ethay enuinegay anknessfray ofay erhay aracterchay, inay
erhay eplyray otay ethay etterlay ichwhay announceday itsay arrangementay, eshay entsay imhay
anguagelay osay eryvay abusiveay, especiallyay ofay Elizabethay, atthay orfay omesay imetay
allay intercourseay asway atay anay enday. Utbay atay engthlay, byay Elizabeth’say ersuasionpay,
ehay asway evailedpray onay otay overlookay ethay offenceay, anday eeksay aay econciliationray;
anday, afteray aay ittlelay urtherfay esistanceray onay ethay artpay ofay ishay auntay, erhay
esentmentray avegay ayway, eitheray otay erhay affectionay orfay imhay, oray erhay uriositycay
otay eesay owhay ishay ifeway onductedcay erselfhay; anday eshay ondescendedcay otay aitway onay
emthay atay Emberleypay, inay itespay ofay atthay ollutionpay ichwhay itsay oodsway adhay
eceivedray, otnay erelymay omfray ethay esencepray ofay uchsay aay istressmay, utbay ethay
isitsvay ofay erhay uncleay anday auntay omfray ethay itycay.

Ithway ethay Ardinersgay eythay ereway alwaysay onay ethay ostmay intimateay ermstay. Arcyday,
asay ellway asay Elizabethay, eallyray ovedlay emthay; anday eythay ereway othbay everay
ensiblesay ofay ethay armestway atitudegray owardstay ethay ersonspay owhay, byay ingingbray
erhay intoay Erbyshireday, adhay eenbay ethay eansmay ofay unitingay emthay.

iLlustration[ay:

Ethay
ENDay

1.fay.

1.fay.1. Ojectpray Utenberggay olunteersvay anday employeesay expenday onsiderablecay
effortay otay identifyay, oday opyrightcay esearchray onay, anscribetray anday oofreadpray
orksway otnay otectedpray byay U.Say. opyrightcay awlay inay eatingcray ethay Ojectpray

otheray ediummay, aay omputercay irusvay, oray omputercay odescay atthay amageday oray
